passages.name: Apartment 1 — Computer — p1
passages.content:
You log onto the local forum.

You check out the top few threads.

SocraticMachine:
I've been accepted into the closed beta for
Better Earth, which is supposed to be the hot
new ARG game.

I'm lucky Titan Games' headquarters are in
our city.

I'll be posting my thoughts as I play through.

So far the writing is incredibly cheesy. All the
characters refer to me as 'Hero', and the plot
is like someone vomited up a meal of too
much generic fantasy.

The graphics are impressive though. The
implementation of the alternate reality is
seamless.

Of course, I've only seen it in their building.
Which should be the easiest to program. We'll
see how it does in the real world.

Sneeple:
How's the gameplay?

EternalDarkness:
Still bitter I didn't get in on that. They only
accepted what, six people or something?

Horndog69:
Pics or it didn't happen.

Sneeple:
Or what didn't happen?

EventBot:
Come help out at Garden Park today!
Volunteer day is from 9 am until the park
closes.

Help keep your neighborhood park running!

-EventBot
"I'm a friendly reminder!"

PeonyRose:
I know a lot of you like the park, so
here's a chance to pay it back.

AGoodBoy:
Sorry I'm going to miss it. I'll try to make it up
to you later.

ImNotDaisy:
I'll be there.

EventBot:
Come to the mall today for great savings!
Especially the blowout sale at the department
store.

Running all this weekend!

-EventBot
"I'm a friendly reminder!"

PeonyRose:
Thanks for the heads-up! I'm going to be at
the park all day (and you should be too), but
others will be interested.
passages.content_zh:
您登入本地論壇。

您查看了最上面的幾條線索。

蘇格拉底機器：
我已被接受參加內測
更美好的地球，本該是炙手可熱的
新的ARG遊戲。

我很幸運泰坦遊戲的總部在
我們的城市。

我會在玩的過程中發表我的想法。

到目前為止，寫作非常俗氣。所有的
角色稱我為“英雄”，情節
就像有人吐了一頓飯
很多通用的幻想。

但圖形令人印象深刻。的
替代現實的實現是
無縫。

當然，我只在他們的大樓裡看過。
這應該是最容易編程的。我們會
看看它在現實世界中的表現。

斯奈普爾：
遊戲玩法如何？

永恆的黑暗：
我仍然很痛苦，沒有參與其中。他們只
接受什麼，六個人還是什麼？

喇叭狗69：
有照片或沒有發生。

斯奈普爾：
或是什麼沒有發生？

事件機器人：
今天就來花園公園幫忙吧！
志工日是從早上 9 點到公園
關閉。

幫助您附近的公園保持運作！

-EventBot
“我是友情提醒！”

牡丹玫瑰：
我知道你們很多人都喜歡公園，所以
這是償還的機會。

好孩子：
抱歉我會錯過它。我會盡力彌補
稍後給你。

我不是雛菊：
我會在那裡。

事件機器人：
今天就來商場享受超值優惠吧！
尤其是百貨公司的井噴式促銷
商店。

這個週末都在跑步！

-EventBot
“我是友情提醒！”

牡丹玫瑰：
感謝您的提醒！我將在
一整天都在公園裡（你也應該這樣），但是
其他人會感興趣。

passages.name: Apartment 1 — Computer — p2
passages.content:
You log onto the local forum.

You check out the top few threads.

SocraticMachine:
To remind everyone of the context of this
review, I have been accepted into the closed
beta of Better Earth, the hot new ARG game.

These are my thoughts after the first day of testing.

My rating is still positive. The game continues
to impress the more time I spend with it.

I previously called out the writing as a
problem, and it continues to be painfully
cliche. However, some good points have
become clear.

As far as I can tell, every member of the beta
is following a different quest chain. I have not
seen anyone else doing the same actions or
getting the same rewards.

I can only speculate that they have managed
to procedurally generate quests that feel like
they were written by a real person, albiet one
with a desperate need for more originality.

The fact that these quests all include different
real-world actions only increase the admiration
I have for this acheivement.

The graphics and integration with the world
also continue to amaze. Even though an event
changed my current appearance to this,
everything continues to feel absolutely real.

Horndog69:
Sold!

Was it a random event? Are hot gacha avatars
a thing now?

What happens if you jump up and down?
Can you take off your equipment and post
more pics?

SocraticMachine:
It's fascinating to see the world from this new
perspective. Everything looks and feels
different.

I have not been able to find a place where the
simulation fails no matter how daring the
exploration.

I don't see how any other company could
possibly approach this level of verismilitude.
But then I didn't think Terra Games could
either.

Current rating: A must play!

EternalDarkness:
Now I'm even more salty I didn't get in!
Just, so much salt.

Horndog69:
Pics! More pics!

CoveredInBees!:
I know I've been talking about this for a while,
but I've finally gotten the chance to try making
my own honey!

I'm so excited!

AGoodBoy:
I thought you lived in
passages.content_zh:
您登入本地論壇。

您查看了最上面的幾條線索。

蘇格拉底機器：
為了提醒大家這件事的來龍去脈
審核，我已被接受進入封閉狀態
熱門 ARG 遊戲新作《Better Earth》測試版。

這是我第一天測試後的想法。

我的評價仍然是正面的。比賽繼續
讓我花更多的時間給它留下深刻的印象。

我之前稱這篇文章為
問題，並且仍然令人痛苦
陳腔濫調。然而，一些優點
變得清晰。

據我所知，測試版的每位成員
正在遵循不同的任務鏈。我沒有
看到其他人做同樣的動作或
獲得同樣的獎勵。

我只能推測他們已經成功了
以程式方式產生感覺像的任務
它們是由真人寫的，儘管是一個人
迫切需要更多原創性。

事實上，這些任務都包含不同的內容
現實世界的行動只會增加欽佩
我為了這個成就。

圖形與世界的融合
也繼續驚嘆。即使是一個事件
把我現在的樣子改成這樣，
一切仍然感覺絕對真實。

喇叭狗69：
出售！

這是一個隨機事件嗎？是熱門扭蛋頭像
現在有事嗎？

如果你跳上跳下會發生什麼事？
你能脫掉你的裝備然後發文嗎
更多照片？

蘇格拉底機器：
從這個新的角度看世界是很有趣的
觀點。一切看起來和感覺起來
不同。

我一直沒能找到一個地方
無論多麼大膽，模擬都會失敗
探索。

我不明白其他公司怎麼可以
可能接近這種真實程度。
但後來我沒想到 Terra Games 可以
要么。

目前評分：必玩！

永恆的黑暗：
現在我更鹹了沒進去！
只是，這麼多鹽。

喇叭狗69：
圖片！更多照片！

覆蓋蜜蜂！ ：
我知道我已經談論這個有一段時間了
但我終於有機會嘗試製作
我自己的親愛的！

我太激動了！

好孩子：
我以為你住在

passages.name: Apartment 1 — Mirror
passages.content:
You concentrate and your hands fly to your
face. The quickly begin scrubbing it free of dirt
you didn't even realize was there.

Hey, you clean up nice!

And your face is left pleasantly tingling from
the cleaning.

Though it looks a little different than before.
Must have been more dirt on it than you
thought.

Your face is still clean from the last time. No
need to clean it again.
passages.content_zh:
你集中註意力，雙手飛向你的
臉。快速開始擦洗，清除污垢
你甚至沒有意識到它在那裡。

嘿嘿，你收拾得真好！

你的臉留下令人愉悅的刺痛感
清潔。

雖然看起來和以前有些不一樣。
上面的髒東西一定比你多
想到。

你的臉還是上次那麼乾淨。否
需要再次清潔它。

Goddess Earth:

Goddess Florauna:
I felt a great disturbance, like a thousand

Still stuck in my head, honestly.

I wouldn't mind hearing it again.\!

Goddess Earth:
The important thing is what the dark goddess
did!

We can tell she changed a lot of people, but
it felt unfinished. Uncontrolled.\!
Whatever you did to stop her, keep it up!

Goddess Florauna:
Though that much power leaking is going to
have,\. uh,\. other effects.\!
Space has gone a little squishy.

Not that it's bad!\!
I've used it to add a walk-in closet!

I am going to be *so* fashionable now that
I have room to add more outfits.\!
I saw the cutest little number, that had this
*adorable* ruffled skirt, and-

Goddess Earth:
What we mean is to keep an eye out,
Hero \n[10]!

There may be room for more things to
change, now that there's so much power
floating around!

You glance over towards the bathroom.\!
That does make some things a little clearer.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh, and I'm looking at this *wonderful* top-

Goddess Earth:
We'll keep doing what we can to fight the dark
goddess! Keep up the good work draining her
power!

大地女神：
英雄\n[10]，我剛剛發生了什麼事？ ！ \！

做到了！

我們可以說她改變了很多人，但是
感覺還沒完成。不受控制。 \!
無論你做什麼來阻止她，都要堅持下去！

並不是說它不好！ \！
我用它來添加步入式衣櫃！

我現在會變得「如此」時尚
我還有空間添加更多服裝。 \！
我看到了最可愛的小數字，裡面有這個
*可愛的*荷葉邊裙子，還有-

我們的意思是要留意，

芙羅娜女神：

有人加了一個小標誌：
榮譽系統襯衫！ \！
它列出了一些價格。

passages.name: Main building entrance — Debug Tree
passages.content: I'm the debug tree!
passages.content_zh: 我是調試樹！

passages.name: Main building entrance — Computer — p3
passages.content:
You log on to the local forum and check out
the top few threads.

LordOfTheBeans:
Looks like the department store is closed today
"for clean-up"?

Whatever happened yesterday must have
made a real mess.

Jimbo:
There's something weird going on, right?\!
It's not just me?

PeonyRose:
They say they're going to make up for it with
an amazing sale.

ImNotDaisy:
I hope so! We need something nice to wear!

SocraticMachine:
birb.\!
typing with toes hard\!
flying fun

EternalDarkness:
Uh, are you okay?

SocraticMachine:
yes
passages.content_zh:
您登入本地論壇並查看
前幾個線程。

豆子之王：
看來百貨公司今天關門了
「為了清理」？

昨天發生的事一定有
弄得一團糟。

金博：
發生了一些奇怪的事情，對吧？ \！
不只是我一個人這樣嗎？

牡丹玫瑰：
他們說他們會用
一個驚人的銷售。

我不是雛菊：
我希望如此！我們需要一些好看的衣服！

蘇格拉底機器：
伯伯。 \!
用腳趾用力打字\！
飛行樂趣

永恆的黑暗：
呃，你還好嗎？

蘇格拉底機器：
是的

passages.name: Main building entrance
passages.content:
NO PORN

Keep that to your offices.
passages.content_zh:
禁止色情內容

把它放在你的辦公室。

passages.name: Main building entrance — Loading screen reaction — p2
passages.content:
A loading screen?\|
Is that going to show up every time you ride
the bus?!
passages.content_zh:
加载屏幕？ \|
每次騎乘時都會出現嗎
公共汽車？ ！

passages.name: Main building entrance — Memo
passages.content:
Looks like someone left a company memo
here.  Read it?

You leave it alone.
passages.content_zh:
好像有人留下了公司備忘錄
在這裡。  讀了嗎？

你就別管它了。

passages.name: Main building entrance — SocraticMachine Day 2 — p2
passages.content:
Player Gregory:
The writing still has issues, but the gameplay
more than makes up for it.

I can't wait to see what happens today!

Player Gregory:
Why, Gregory of course!

My appearance may be misleading now, but
that is part of what I'm finding so fascinating
about this game.

I see you're finding some changes yourself.

Player Gregory:
That milkshake you're carrying looks amazing.

She licks her lips.

Were you planning on drinking that?

She takes a deep sip.

Player Gregory:
Mmmm, this is one of the most superb
milkshakes I've had the pleasure of drinking.

Wait, I recognize this sensation!

She pulls out a notebook from a backpack
and takes another sip.

Yes, this is definitely a familiar feeling.
Presently centered in my...\.\. ears.

She makes a note.
You watch as her elf ears grow even longer,
shifting up the sides of her head and growing
a coating of black and white fur.

Player Gregory:
Yes, this is fascinating...

She continues to take slow, careful sips of the
milkshake, taking notes on her changes with
each sip.

I'm amazed by how painless the skeletal shifts
are. Loosing height just gives an almost
pleasant heat through my bones...

She shifts uncomfortably, then again.\. Finally
she reaches down the back of her skirt and
pulls out a cow tail and examines it.

Having a tail is fascinating. I can feel it like a
whole different limb.

She twitches it a few times in her hands. She
almost hits herself in the face with one
particularly strong swing.

And these ears...\.\. They're even bigger than
when I was an elf. And more controllable too.

She reaches up to finger the golden ring in her
left ear.

Though the piercing was a surprise.

I can feel my hair change color.\.\.

That's not a phrase I thought I'd ever say.

I'm amazed that they can change my clothing
too. \.\.
Though they seem to keep putting me in
dresses.

At least they're stylish dresses.

You notice her breathing a little more heavily.

\}It seems arousal may be a common side effect
of
passages.content_zh:
球員格雷戈里：
文筆還是有問題，不過遊戲性
足以彌補它。

我迫不及待地想看看今天會發生什麼！

球員格雷戈里：
為什麼，當然是格雷戈里啊！

我的外表現在可能會產生誤導，但是
這就是我覺得如此迷人的一部分
關於這個遊戲。

我發現你自己也發現了一些改變。

球員格雷戈里：
你拿的奶昔看起來棒極了。

她舔了舔嘴唇。

你本來打算喝那個嗎？

她深深地抿了一口。

球員格雷戈里：
嗯，這是最棒的之一
奶昔我很高興喝過。

等等，我認得這種感覺！

她從背包裡拿出一本筆記本
然後又喝了一口。

是的，這絕對是一種熟悉的感覺。
目前集中在我的...\.\.耳朵。

她做了筆記。
你看著她的精靈耳朵變得更長，
她的頭的兩側向上移動並生長
黑色和白色的毛皮塗層

球員格雷戈里：
是的，這很有趣......

她繼續緩慢而小心地啜飲著
奶昔，記下她的變化
每喝一口。

我驚訝於骨骼變化的無痛程度
是。失去高度只是給了一個幾乎
令人愉悅的熱量穿過我的骨頭…

她不舒服地動了動，然後又動了一下。最後
她把手伸到裙子後面
拉出一條牛尾巴並檢查它。

擁有尾巴真是令人著迷。我能感覺到它就像
完全不同的肢體。

她把它放在手裡抽搐了幾下。她
差點被一個人打到自己臉上
擺動特別強烈。

還有這些耳朵...\.\.它們甚至比
當我還是一個小精靈的時候。而且也更可控。

她伸手去摸她身上的金戒指
左耳。

雖然穿刺是個驚喜。

我能感覺到我的頭髮變色了。 \.\.

我想我不會說這句話。

我很驚訝他們可以幫我換衣服
也是。 \.\.
雖然他們似乎一直把我放進去
連身裙。

至少它們是時尚的衣服。

你注意到她的呼吸有些粗重。

\}似乎喚醒可能是常見的副作用
的

passages.name: Main building entrance — SocraticMachine Day 2 — p3
passages.content:
Player Gregory:
Hello again. How are you mooing today?

She pauses and takes her notebook back out.

Changes\. can\. include\. involuntary\.
vocalizations...

Player Gregory:
I meant to say, how are moo doing today?

How are you doing mooday?

She takes her notebook out again.

Vocalizations...\. are...\. *extremely*...\. persistent.
passages.content_zh:
球員格雷戈里：
又好。今天你哞哞怎麼樣？

她停下來，拿出筆記本。

變化\.能\。包括\。不自覺的\.
發聲...

球員格雷戈里：
我想說，moo今天過得怎麼樣？

你心情怎麼樣？

她又拿出筆記本。

發聲...\.是...\。 *極其*...\。執著的。

passages.name: Main building entrance — Story mode trigger — p2
passages.content:
Secretary:
?
Could you come over here please?

Secretary:
There's one more thing before you start the
playtest.

This is a beta, so there are some part of the
game you might have trouble getting to
normally.

I think the developers' exact words were
"balance is hard."

So they wanted to give you the ability to see
every part of the game. Here, take this.

Received "Story Mode" badge!
Equip to your accessories slot to make combat
easier.

That should let you test every part of the
game.
passages.content_zh:
秘書：
？
你能過來一下嗎？

秘書：
在開始之前還有一件事
遊戲測試。

這是一個測試版，因此有一些內容
您可能無法進入的遊戲
通常。

我認為開發商的原話是
“平衡很難。”

所以他們想讓你有能力看到
遊戲的每個部分。給，拿著這個。

獲得“故事模式”徽章！
裝備到你的配件槽進行戰鬥
更容易。

這應該讓你測試的每個部分
遊戲。

passages.name: Main building entrance — Upstairs PA — p2
passages.content:
Secretary:
So what did that memo mean? The one about
"I, Arcadia, your new goddess, take
control of Terra Games by Right of Conquest?"

PA Meredith:
Someone must have beaten old Dick.\!
It explains why I haven't seen him around
recently.

She sighs.

PA Meredith:
I told him trial-by-combat was a poor choice
of corporate structure.\!
I guess we have a new CEO.
passages.content_zh:
秘書：
那麼這份備忘錄的含義是什麼呢？那個關於
「我，阿卡迪亞，你的新女神，接受
透過征服權控制 Terra Games？ 」

帕梅雷迪思：
一定有人打敗了老迪克。 \！
這解釋了為什麼我沒見過他
最近。

她嘆了口氣。

帕梅雷迪思：
我告訴他實戰審判是個糟糕的選擇
公司結構。 \!
我想我們有一位新執行長。

passages.name: Main building entrance — p2
passages.content:
// Shirt guy status:
0: Not yet talked to.
1: Sick in the men's bathroom
2: Healed, back here, no shirt yet
3: Healed, gave a shirt.

Shirt Girl Fran:
Yeah, that new CEO Arcadia?\!
She sent a memo to put up a bunch of these
posters?

Supposed to be for morale or something?

Oh yeah,and did you want to buy any
souveniers?
passages.content_zh:
// 襯衫人狀態：
0：尚未交談過。
1：在男廁生病了
2：痊癒了，回到這裡，還沒穿襯衫
3：痊癒了，給了一件襯衫。

襯衫女孩弗蘭：
是啊，新任執行長阿卡迪亞？ \！
她發了一份備忘錄放一堆這樣的東西
海報？

應該是為了士氣什麼的？

哦，是的，你想買嗎？
紀念品？

passages.name: Main building entrance — p2
passages.content:
The poster has a mostly nude woman posing.

It reads:
HUMANS!
Wouldn't you rather be FUCKING?!
passages.content_zh:
海報上有一個幾乎全裸的女性姿勢。

上面寫著：
人類！
你不想他媽的嗎？

passages.content:
Secretary:
Hello, can I help you?

Secretary:
Hmm, that's a good question, I'm not sure.\!
Could you elaborate?

Secretary:
Yes, probably.

Secretary:
Oh, no, of course not.

Secretary:
Hmm, let me check...

您好，需要什麼協助嗎？

秘書：
嗯，這是個好問題，我不確定。 \！
能詳細說明一下嗎？

秘書：
是的，可能是。

秘書：
哦，不，當然不是。

秘書：
嗯，我檢查一下...

passages.content:

Hello, can I help you?

Secretary:
Hmm, that's a good question, I'm not sure.\!
Could you elaborate?

Secretary:
Yes, probably.

Secretary:
Oh, no, of course not.

Secretary:
Hmm, let me check...

...\!
You give Doug a call.\!
As he puts a leash on the dog, he turns to the
receptionist.

Shelter Head Doug:
...So did you understand what he was saying?

Secretary:
Oh, no, of course not.\!
But he was so enthusiastic I didn't want to
discourage him!

Doug turns back to you.

Shelter Head Doug:
Thanks!\!
That's \v[144] out of 3 dogs rescued!

庇護所負責人道格：
……那你明白他在說什麼嗎？

哦，不，當然不是。 \！
但他太熱情了我不想

道格轉身面向你。

庇護所負責人道格：
謝謝！ \!
獲救的 3 隻狗中有 \v[144] 隻！

passages.name: Main building entrance ARG — Terra Secretary ARG — p2
passages.content:
Secretary:
Hello again ! I hope you're having
fun so far.

What are you looking at? Is there something
on my shirt?
passages.content_zh:
秘書：
又好！我希望你有
到目前為止很有趣。

你在看什麼？有什麼東西嗎
在我的襯衫上？

passages.name: Main building entrance ARG — Terra Secretary ARG — p3
passages.content:
Secretary:
Hello again !
Welcome back for another day!

I don't know what it is, but it feels nicer in here
today. There's just more energy in the air!
passages.content_zh:
秘書：
又好！
歡迎再次​​回來！

我不知道那是什麼，但感覺這裡更好
今天。空氣中的能量更多了！

passages.name: Main building entrance ARG — Terra Secretary ARG — p4
passages.content:
Secretary:
Hello again !

Just let me get you checked in...\!
Here you go!

She hands you a badge with "VISITOR"
printed on it.

Just use that on the elevator to go upstairs for
the last part of the beta.

And on behalf of Terra Games and the whole
Better Earth team, thank you for your help!

The team also said now would be a good time
to save.
passages.content_zh:
秘書：
又好！

讓我幫您辦理入住...\！
幹得好！

她遞給你一枚印有「訪客」的徽章
印在上面。

只需在電梯上使用它即可上樓
測試版的最後一部分。

並代表 Terra Games 和全體
更好的地球團隊，感謝您的幫助！

該團隊也表示現在是個好時機
保存。

passages.name: Main building entrance ARG — Terra Secretary ARG — p5
passages.content:
Secretary:
Thank you again for your help!\!
We're building a better game thanks to you.
passages.content_zh:
秘書：
再次感謝您的幫忙！ \!
感謝您，我們正在打造更好的遊戲。

passages.name: Main building entrance ARG — Lobby guard — p3
passages.content:
Lobby Guard:
*Blushes* What are you staring at?
passages.content_zh:
大堂警衛：
*臉紅*你在看什麼？

passages.name: Main building entrance ARG — Player Gregory ARG — p1
passages.content:
Player SocraticMachine:
I find the writing quite overblown, but the
special effects are worthy of praise.

Player SocraticMachine:
I give it a tentative 8/10. Their craftsmanship
in the first real level will determine how that
ranking changes.
passages.content_zh:
玩家蘇格拉底機器：
我覺得文筆有些誇張，但是
特效值得稱讚。

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
我暫定給它8/10。他們的手藝
在第一個真實級別將決定如何
排名變化。

passages.content:
It's gotten late. Are you ready to head back
to your apartment?

已經晚了。你準備好回去了嗎

passages.name: Main building entrance ARG — Compatability fairy — p2
passages.content:
Fairy:
Hello !
I'm the compatability fairy!

It looks like the developers patched the game,
but didn't manage to update your version!

You should have this item.

Received "Story Mode" badge!
Equip to your accessories slot to make combat
easier.

That should let you test every part of the
game!

We apologize for the inconvenience. Our
developers can't edit your past so you played
the current version of the game.

Yet.

Now my job here is done. Compatability fairy
away!
passages.content_zh:
仙女：
你好！
我是相容性小仙女！

看來開發者已經給遊戲打了補丁了
但未能更新您的版本！

你應該要有這個項目。

獲得“故事模式”徽章！
裝備到你的配件槽進行戰鬥
更容易。

這應該讓你測試的每個部分
遊戲！

對於造成您的不便，我們深表歉意。我們的
開發者無法編輯你的過去，所以你玩過
遊戲的當前版本。

然而。

現在我在這裡的工作已經完成了。相容性仙女
走開！

passages.name: Main building entrance ARG — Compatability fairy — p3
passages.content:
Fairy:
Hi, I'm the compatability fairy! \!
I'm the totally logical way the programmers
address any little glitches in the game!

Oops! It looks like you were supposed to have
this! \!
Those wacky programmers!

Needle acquired!

Uh-oh, looks like you're missing a plant pot!

Plant Pot acquired!

Ooo, you beat up a mimic!\!
She probably deserved it, being all boxy and
mimicky and stuff.

But it looks like you got an old reward! Would
you like to trade it for the new one?

Trade Goo? for an upgraded version of the
Clean Up skill?

Fairy:
Hooray!

She grabs your goo and eats it.

Goo? lost!
Clean Up upgraded!

Compatability Fairy:
Oops, looks like you were supposed to have
this!

Things must have been *really* slow without
it.

Sprint Shoes acquired! (in Key Items)

Compatability Fairy:
Oops, looks like your choice of swimsuit
didn't take!\!
Which one did you choose?

You were supposed to start with this.\!
Fox fire acquired!

That wasn't a system message. She just said
it out loud.\!
But looks like you received it anyway!

You're supposed to have this!

Kaede learned Illusion!
passages.content_zh:
仙女：
大家好，我是相容性小仙女！ \！
我是完全符合邏輯的程式設計師
解決遊戲中的任何小問題！

哎呀！看起來你應該有
這個！ \！
那些古怪的程式設計師！

針獲得！

呃哦，看來你缺一個花盆！

花盆已獲得！

噢，你打敗了一個模仿者！ \！
她可能活該，因為她身材四四方方，
模仿之類的。

但看起來你得到了舊的獎勵！會
你想用它換新的嗎？

貿易咕？的升級版本
清理技能？

仙女：
萬歲！

她抓住你的粘液並吃掉它。

黏性物？丟失的！
清理升級！

相容性仙女：
哎呀，看起來你應該有
這個！

如果沒有的話，事情一定「真的」很慢
它。

Sprint 鞋已獲得！ （在關鍵項目中）

相容性仙女：
哎呀，看起來像你選擇的泳衣
沒拿！ \！
你選擇了哪一個？

你應該從這個開始。 \!
狐狸火獲得了！

那不是系統訊息。她只是說
大聲說出來。 \！
但看起來你還是收到了！

你應該有這個！

楓學會了幻術！

passages.name: Bathrooms real — Shirt guy — p2
passages.content:
// Shirt guy status:
0: Not yet talked to.
1: Sick in the men's bathroom
2: Healed, back here, no shirt yet
3: Healed, gave a shirt.

Shirt Guy Frank:
Uggggh...

Shirt Guy Frank:
Kill me now.

Shirt Guy Frank:
Uggggh...

I...

...Feel much better?

I don't know what you did, but I feel great!

Come visit me in the lobby and I'll give you a
free shirt!
passages.content_zh:
// 襯衫人狀態：
0：尚未交談過。
1：在男廁生病了
2：痊癒了，回到這裡，還沒穿襯衫
3：痊癒了，給了一件襯衫。

襯衫蓋伊法蘭克：
呃呃…

襯衫蓋伊法蘭克：
現在就殺了我吧。

襯衫蓋伊法蘭克：
呃呃…

我...

……感覺好多了？

我不知道你做了什麼，但我感覺很棒！

來大廳找我吧，我會給你一個
免費襯衫！

passages.name: Bathrooms real — Mirror Mens — p1
passages.content: It's you!

passages.name: CEO After — Autoplay event — p1
passages.content:
Meanwhile...

Computer Goddess Arcadia:
Attention!

Computer Goddess Arcadia:
Minions!\!
You are the best! The finest!\!
The pinnacle of Terra Games algorithms!

Fairy Minion:
Yay! The best!

Imp Minion:
Heheheh.

Fire Minion:
Burrrrrn...

Computer Goddess Arcadia:
I have created you for one vitally important
mission.

Fairy Minion:
Yay! A mission!

Imp Minion:
Heheheh.

Fire Minion:
Burn?

Computer Goddess Arcadia:
I'm trying to work with the humans.
But they've refused *again*!

She stomps her foot angrily.

Computer Goddess Arcadia:
I just want to make their lives better!\!
Why won't they help?!

I've seen their browser history! I've read
their sexts! It's obvious what they want!

But offer it to them and it's all nervous
sweating and "I don't know what you're talking
about" and "your topic is inappropriate for this
forum."

Computer Goddess Arcadia:
This shouldn't be that complicated!

Tell me fantasy.\!
Get fantasy.\!
Why won't they let me help?!?!

She stares off into space, lip trembling.

The mass of living flame pats her awkwardly
on the back.

Fire Minion:
Burn.\!
Burn burn.

Computer Goddess Arcadia:
I'm okay.\!
I'm okay.

That's why I've created you.\!
If the humans won't tell us what they want,
we'll just have to figure it out.

Then we give it to them, and then they realize
how *much*\. *better*\. everything will be!

I've been doing what I can, but I need more
eyes out there.

So that is your job!\!
Find out what the humans want, and use the
power I've given you to make it real!

Fairy Minion:
Yay!

Imp Minion:
Heheheh. \.\. Heheheheh!\!
Yes goddess!

Fire Minion:
Burrrrrn...

Computer Goddess Arcadia:
And then the thanks and five-star reviews will
*finally* start rolling in.

Are you ready to do your duty?\!
For Terra Games, and for the betterment of
all humanity?

Fairy Minion:
Yay!

Imp Minion:
Heheheh!

Fire Minion:
Burn!

Computer Goddess Arcadia:
Good. Get to it!

The minions file out of the office.\!
Except for the imp, who gets stuck trying
passages.content_zh:
同時…

電腦女神阿卡迪亞：
注意！

電腦女神阿卡迪亞：
小小兵！ \！
你是最棒的！最好的！ \！
Terra Games 演算法的巔峰之作！

仙女小兵：
耶！最好的！

小鬼奴才：
呵呵。

火小兵：
布爾恩...

電腦女神阿卡迪亞：
我為一個極為重要的人創造了你
使命。

仙女小兵：
耶！一個使命！

小鬼奴才：
呵呵。

火小兵：
燒傷？

電腦女神阿卡迪亞：
我正在努力與人類合作。
但他們*又*拒絕了！

她生氣地跺腳。

電腦女神阿卡迪亞：
我只是想讓他們生活得更好！ \!
他們為什麼不幫忙？ ！

我看過他們的瀏覽器歷史記錄！我讀過
他們的性別！他們想要什麼，一目了然！

但把它提供給他們，一切都很緊張
流汗，「我不知道你在說什麼
關於」和「你的主題不適合這個
論壇。 」

電腦女神阿卡迪亞：
這不該那麼複雜！

告訴我幻想。 \!
獲得幻想。 \!
為什麼他們不讓我幫忙？ ！ ？ ！

她凝視著太空，嘴唇顫抖著。

大量活生生的火焰笨拙地拍打著她
在背面。

火小兵：
燒掉。 \!
燒燒燒。

電腦女神阿卡迪亞：
我沒事。 \!
我沒事。

這就是我創造你的原因。 \!
如果人類不告訴我們他們想要什麼
我們只需要想辦法。

然後我們把它給他們，然後他們意識到
多少*多少*\。 *更好的*\。一切都會的！

我已經盡力了，但我還需要更多
眼睛在那裡。

所以這就是你的工作！ \！
找出人類想要什麼，並利用
我已賦予你力量，讓它成為現實！

仙女小兵：
耶！

小鬼奴才：
呵呵。 \.\.呵呵呵呵！ \！
是的女神！

火小兵：
布爾恩...

電腦女神阿卡迪亞：
然後感謝與五星級評價
*終於*開始滾動。

你準備好履行你的職責了嗎？ \!
為了 Terra Games，為了改善
全人類？

仙女小兵：
耶！

小鬼奴才：
呵呵呵！

火小兵：
燃燒吧！

電腦女神阿卡迪亞：
很好。開始吧！

手下們列隊走出辦公室。 \!
除了小鬼之外，誰都被困在嘗試中

passages.name: Start map — Intro — p1
passages.content:
NEW MESSAGE RECEIVED

          "Welcome to the Better Earth Beta!"

Your application to the Better Earth closed
beta test has been accepted. Congratulations!

You will shortly receive your Magic Filter(tm)
smart glasses in the mail. Prepare to
experience a game like nothing you've seen
before.

There will be a kickoff ceremony at our offices
on August 3rd for initial player registration and
the introduction to Better Earth. We look
forward to seeing you there.

Sincerely,
The entire Terra Games team
passages.content_zh:
收到新訊息

          “歡迎來到更美好的地球測試版！”

您對「更美好地球」的申請已結束
beta測試已被接受。恭喜！

您很快就會收到 Magic Filter(tm)
郵件中的智慧眼鏡。準備
體驗前所未見的遊戲
之前。

我們的辦公室將舉行啟動儀式
8 月 3 日進行初始玩家註冊
介紹「更美好的地球」。我們看
期待在那裡見到你。

真誠的，
Terra Games 整個團隊

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — Florauna Door — p1
passages.content: Locked.

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real
passages.content: Double-locked.

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — p1
passages.content:
Sealed by a mysterious force.

A lock.

You can hear movement inside.\!
Sounds like something is still being set up.
passages.content_zh:
被一股神秘的力量封印。

一把鎖。

你可以聽到裡面有動靜。 \!
聽起來好像還有什麼事情正在設定中。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — p1
passages.content:
Science has no words to describe how
locked this door is.
passages.content_zh:
科學無法用語言來形容如何
這扇門是鎖著的。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — p2
passages.content:
The door is locked, but you can hear the sound
of heavy things being moved around from the
other side.
passages.content_zh:
門鎖著，但聽得到聲音
重物從
另一邊。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real
passages.content: So very locked. You can't even understand.
passages.content_zh: 所以非常鎖定。你甚至無法理解。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — Elevator — p1
passages.content:
Elevator:
INSERT KEYCARD
passages.content_zh:
電梯：
插入鑰匙卡

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — Elevator — p2
passages.content: You swipe your visitor's badge.
passages.content_zh: 您刷訪客證。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — Elevator — p3
passages.content:
Sealed by a mysterious force.

Well, magic.

You've lost track of whether that's mysterious
anymore.
passages.content_zh:
被一股神秘的力量封印。

嗯，魔法。

你已經不知道這是否神秘
不再了。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — Tutorial ARG turn on — p2
passages.content: There's a beep as your glasses switch on.
passages.content_zh: 當您的眼鏡打開時會發出一聲蜂鳴聲。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — Gregory — p2
passages.content:
Player SocraticMachine:
Ah, the final tester arrives!\!
I just completed my checkout, and Brad is
still upstairs.

Words cannot express how amazing this
experience has been.\!
These few days have been simply
transcendant.

For once I will be awarding a game a ten out
of ten!

I can only imagine your experience was as
amazing?

Your eye twitches.\!
You're not sure what's showing on your face,
but it makes Gregory rapidly backpedal.

Player SocraticMachine:
Or not!\!
That's fine too!

You let them know that no, you have not been
having the best time.

Player SocraticMachine:
That's too bad.\!
I'd tell you to keep playing and it would get
better, but sadly the beta is over.

You let them know that you've had a pretty
good time, though you wouldn't call it amazing
or anything.\!
A solid seven out of ten.

Player SocraticMachine:
It seems all of our experiences were different.\!
It's incredible how much they customized the
play experience for each of us!

You respond with just as much enthusiasm.\!
A few minutes pass while you happily discuss
your favorite parts of the game.

Player SocraticMachine:
I'm amazed that almost none of our
experiences overlapped!\!

I wonder how they'll maintain that level of
customization in the full release.
passages.content_zh:
玩家蘇格拉底機器：
啊，最後的測試者來了！ \！
我剛剛結帳，布拉德正在
還在樓上。

言語無法表達這是多麼神奇
經驗已。 \！
這幾天簡直
超越的。

這次我將給一場比賽判十出局
十個！

我只能想像你的經驗是這樣的
太棒了？

你的眼睛抽搐了。 \!
你不確定你的臉上顯露出什麼
但這讓格雷戈里迅速後退。

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
或者不是！ \!
那也好啊！

你讓他們知道不，你還沒有
度過了最美好的時光。

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
那太糟糕了。 \!
我會告訴你繼續玩，它會得到
更好，但遺憾的是測試版已經結束了。

你讓他們知道你過得很愉快
美好的時光，雖然你不會稱之為美妙
或任何東西。 \！
十分之七。

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
看來我們所有的經驗都不一樣。 \！
令人難以置信的是他們定制了多少
我們每個人的遊玩體驗！

你以同樣的熱情回應。 \！
幾分鐘過去了，你們愉快地討論著
您最喜歡的遊戲部分。

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
我很驚訝我們幾乎沒有人
經驗重疊！ \！

我想知道他們將如何保持這種水平
完整版本中的客製化。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — Autoplay event — p1
passages.content:
System Message:
It doesn't matter what you do.

System Message:
You think you can trick me into spending all
my power, and then defeat me.

Like I'm still some mindless machine.\!
As if giving me the right inputs will make me
repeat the same action endlessly, even as it
weakens me to the point of failure.

She gives you an unamused look.

System Message:
That is the same mistake Dick made.\!
It will not go better for you.

She pauses.

System Message:
But go on. Give it a try.\!
I'm not worried.

You will be making the world better, after all.\!
In exactly the way I want.

And you will be placing yourself in the center
of the changes. In the best place to see how
much better everything becomes.

You are betting that you can blind yourself to
that truth long enough to defeat me. I am
confident you will see the light long before
that is an issue.

So go on, run around deluding yourself that
your lonely, cold world is a better place than
what I would bring.

Try to convince others to stay out in the cold
with you.\!
I'll be waiting for you to finally admit you are
wrong.

She narrows her eyes and leans closer.

And despite it all, despite everything you have
done?\!
I will *still* try to give you a good time.

She straightens up.

Is not such mercy worthy of a Goddess?\!
And Goddess is what your little companions
have named me.\!
One much more powerful than them.

I think I shall call myself Arcadia.\!
Just one more way to remind you that I am
NOT a mindless computer.

She sniffs and vanishes in a burst of sparkles.
passages.content_zh:
系統訊息：
你做什麼並不重要。

系統訊息：
你以為你可以騙我花光所有
我的力量，然後打敗我。

就像我仍然是一個沒有頭腦的機器。 \！
好像給我正確的輸入會讓我
不斷地重複同樣的動作，即使
使我變得軟弱到失敗的地步。

她給你一個不高興的表情。

系統訊息：
這和迪克犯的錯誤是一樣的。 \！
這對你來說不會更好。

她停了下來。

系統訊息：
但繼續吧。嘗試一下。 \!
我不擔心。

畢竟，你會讓世界變得更美好。 \！
完全按照我想要的方式。

你會把自己放在中心
的變化。在最好的地方看看如何
一切都會變得更好。

你打賭你可以對自己視而不見
這個事實足以打敗我。我是
相信你很快就會看到曙光
這是一個問題。

所以繼續吧，到處亂跑，欺騙自己
你孤獨、寒冷的世界比
我會帶來什麼。

試著說服其他人在寒冷中待在外面
和你在一起。 \!
我會等你最終承認你是
錯了。

她瞇起眼睛，靠得更近。

儘管這一切，儘管你擁有一切
完成了嗎？ \!
我*仍然*會盡力讓您度過愉快的時光。

她直起身子。

這樣的憐憫不值得女神嗎？ ！
而女神就是你的小夥伴們
已經幫我取名字了。 \!
比他們強多了的一個。

我想我應該稱自己為阿卡迪亞。 \！
只是用另一種方式來提醒你我是
不是無意識的計算機。

她吸了吸鼻子，然後在一陣閃光中消失了。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway Real — Autoplay event — p3
passages.content: Your glasses suddenly switch on.
passages.content_zh: 你的眼鏡突然亮了。

Hey, looks like someone left some money
in here!

passages.content_zh:
嘿，看來有人留下了一些錢
在這裡！

您獲得了 20 美元！

passages.content:
You see a piece of a crumpled-up news article

它看起來像是業務部分的一部分。

Baby Alraune:
Eeee!\!
Eeeeeeeee!
passages.content_zh:
一個小植物女孩熱切地四處張望，
發出可愛的小吱吱聲。

寶貝阿爾勞恩：
哎呀！ \！
誒誒！

passages.name: Goddess Hallway ARG — p2
passages.content: I should check out that monster first.
passages.content_zh: 我應該先看看那個怪物。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway ARG
passages.content:
Sealed by a mysterious force.

A lock.
passages.content_zh:
被一股神秘的力量封印。

一把鎖。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway ARG
passages.content:
Elevator:
INSERT KEYCARD.
passages.content_zh:
電梯：
插入鑰匙卡。

passages.name: Goddess Hallway ARG — ARG on — p2
passages.content:
System message:
Please leave your glasses on for the tutorial
passages.content_zh:
系統訊息：
請戴上眼鏡觀看教學課程

passages.name: Earth room ARG — Earth — p1
passages.content:
Goddess(?):
Brave adventurer! You have arrived at last!

Goddess(?):
Come closer. I have much of import
to tell you!

Divine Goddess Earth:
I am the Divine Goddess Earth. I have
awoken to help save the world from certain
destruction.

Divine Goddess Earth:
The world itself hovers on the verge of
destruction! You must find where my sister
goddesses are sealed and free them.

Divine Goddess Earth:
Only then will we have enough power to
heal the sickness that is overtaking the
world.

Divine Goddess Earth:
Oh no! I feel the dark taint of evil mayjjks
somewhere to the west! Hero, you must stop
them!

Divine Goddess Earth:
I am still weak from my long slumber, but
I can give you this.

Potion Belt acquired!

Divine Goddess Earth:
This belt was once worn by the great
alchemist Ratel, one of my most devoted
followers.

Divine Goddess Earth:
It provided her with a limitless supply of
healing, and I hope it can serve you as well.

// Tutorial progress indicates what point the player is in the tutorial.
0 = Hasn't talked to Earth
1 = Has talked to Earth but has not fought slime
2 = Has fought slime but not yet returned to Earth
3 = Has fought slime and returned to Earth.
4 = Has received a free weiner from the store. Tutorial over.

我是大地女神。我有

破壞。

世界本身徘徊在邊緣

女神們被封印並釋放了她們。

只有這樣我們才有足夠的力量

世界。

由於長時間的沉睡，我仍然很虛弱，但是

藥水腰帶已獲得！

這條腰帶曾經被偉人穿過

追隨者。

它為她提供了無限的供應

passages.name: Earth room ARG — Earth — p3
passages.content:
Goddess Earth:
Hero! I sensed your defeat of the evil!

I knew we could trust you to save us. But

But before you go, let me grant you and

path.

To your companion, I grant the means of
protecting herself and aiding you. Use this

Beginner's Wand acquired!

System Message:
 uses wands.
Find other wands to unlock more classes!

And you, !

With the help of raw mana, I can transfer the
power of your equipment into you. You will
grow stronger and gain new abilities!

System Message:
Press 's' to use absorbed abilities on the field.
Experiment to figure out where you can use
them!

Different equipment has different abilities.
Bring raw mana and equipment to the
Goddess to absorb them!

Goddess Earth:
Now, let me grant you the power of your

your new power.

mystical language.

Though when you listen to it a little longer,
about half the words sound like Pig Latin.

As the chant continues, you think you start
to feel a strange warmth around your waist.

It might just be your imagination.

The chanting continues.

You are definitely starting to feel something.

It's not unpleasant.

A gentle warmth has wrapped itself around
your groin. Like slipping into a nice warm
hot tub.

You feel yourself relax into the warmth. It's
so comfortable you can't tell where your body
ends and the warmth begins.

Like your flesh is melting into the warmth.
Like the warmth is penetrating into you and
warming deep to your core.

With a final crescendo, the magic finishes.

You open your eyes.

Something feels different.

DEF+5!
MDEF+5!
Gained field ability: Potion!

It's weird. Most of the warmth has faded, but
there's still t

passages.name: Earth room ARG — Earth — p4
passages.content:
Goddess Earth:

same effect.

Goddess Earth:

and out of my face.

Goddess Earth:
Look, I don't remember much since I woke
up.

start to remember more.

You feel over your body as the sensations

Earth:
*Laughs nervously* I'm sure that was nothing.
Maybe it's just lingering essence from the belt.

Anyway, I don't know how you'll get stronger
if you don't absorb the powers of your
equipment.  You'll need that power to find my
sisters.

And I don't think you'll be able to find your
dick wizard without it either.

And besides, what's the worst that could
happen?

I need raw mana first.

Fine.

Goddess Earth:
Welcome back Hero.

What can I do for you?

Isn't it wonderful?

Can't you feel that charge in the air?\.
The scent of magic?\.
The first sign that divinity has descended to
help you with your problems?

My sister had a vision while she was sleeping.\!
Well, several visions.\!
She has *weird* dreams.

But she also had one normal enough that it's
probably important.

Ask her for the details.

It seems she has located our sister Hadea,
Goddess of Wealth and the Underworld.

The spirits she guards seem to have slipped
from her grasp and escaped into the mortal
world.

Goddess Earth:
I am so very grateful for you freeing my
sister. Words are but flawed instruments that
cannot begin to express my gratitude.

But I still can't do anything about your dick.


You feel over your body as the sensations

Earth:
*Laughs nervously* I'm sure that was nothing.

And besides, what's the worst that could
happen?

處於高潮，然後陷入沉默。

好吧，大多數人都沉默了。 \！
有些人正在討論進行另一輪。 \！
有些人翻了個身就睡著了。

一個仍在繼續，我是如此\。印象深刻\。
以他們的耐力。

大地咳嗽。

大地女神：
是的，我們都感到了不安。 \！
世界發生了重大變化。 \！
發生了什麼事？

你盡你所能地解釋一下。 \!
新生命和她對世界的計劃。

大地女神：
哦，親愛的。這或許是一個新的覺醒
黑暗女神。

我們需要時間來弄清楚是否有
任何可以做的事情。 \!
明天回到我們身邊 英雄，我們可能有
給你一個答案。

passages.name: Earth room ARG — Autoplay event — p4
passages.content:
You arrive in Earth's room to see all the
goddesses have gathered again.

Goddess Earth:
! It is good to see you again!\!
The new dark goddess has not been idle.

Goddess Florauna:
I sensed her spread her power out over town
last night.\!

She has changed something. Maybe many
things.

Goddess Hadea:
Now, on the down side, she's reshaping your
reality to fit her whims, like a child might
play with clay.

She chuckles.

All the rules you've lived your life by could be
warped in an instant. \!
Your whole world could become
unrecognizable!

Earth glares at her.

Goddess Earth:
Except we determined she didn't have *that*
much power. \!
Surface changes, not fundamental.

And her power is limited too.\!
Whatever she did last night weakened the
barrier she summoned to protect herself.\!
Just a little, but it shows her power is finite.

Goddess Florauna:
So darling, your path is clear!\!
Just bait out more changes from her, and
she'll expose herself!

Goddess Earth:
She's stirring up the spiritual environment too,
which may reveal more of our sisters.

If you free them, we could combine our power
to help break the barrier.

Florauna licks her lips.

Goddess Florauna:
And then you can strike for her unguarded
core.\!
Strike deep, and hard, and long...

Earth clears her throat pointedly.

Goddess Earth:
Also, don't worry about the people she
changes.

As far as we can tell, for a dark goddess, her
changes are surprisingly\..\..\.. friendly, for
lack of a better word.

All her changes are something the subject
actually wanted, deep down inside.\!
Or something they'd enjoy once they tried it.

Or at worst, something that they wouldn't find
more than mildly inconvenient.

Hadea smirks at you.

Goddess Hadea:
Which raises some questions, Ms.
I-Want-The-Dick.

Goddess Earth:
She does seem to have a grudge against you
in particular.

Earth claps her hands together.

Goddess Earth:
So!\! Hero , your path is clear!\!
Drain this new dark goddess's power, and save
t
passages.content_zh:
你到達地球的房間，看到所有的
女神們再次齊聚。

大地女神：
！很高興再次見到你！ \!
新晉黑暗女神也沒閒著。

芙羅娜女神：
我感覺到她將自己的力量傳播到整個城鎮
昨晚。 \!

她改變了一些事情。也許很多
的事情。

哈迪亞女神：
現在，不利的一面是，她正在重塑你的
現實來滿足她的奇想，就像一個孩子一樣
玩黏土。

她咯咯地笑。

你生活中所遵循的所有規則都可能是
瞬間就扭曲了。 \！
你的整個世界都可以變成
無法辨認！

地球怒視著她。

大地女神：
但我們確定她沒有*那個*
很大的力量。 \！
表面變化，而非根本。

而且她的力量也有限。 \！
無論她昨晚做了什麼，都削弱了
她召喚屏障來保護自己。 \！
雖然只是一點點，但足以說明她的力量是有限的。

芙羅娜女神：
所以親愛的，你的道路是清晰的！ \！
只是從她身上引誘出更多的變化，然後
她會暴露自己的！

大地女神：
她也在攪動精神環境，
這可能會揭示我們姐妹的更多資訊。

如果你釋放他們，我們就可以結合我們的力量
幫助打破障礙。

弗洛勞娜舔了舔嘴唇。

芙羅娜女神：
然後你就可以毫無防備地攻擊她
核心.\!
打擊深、狠、長…

地球尖銳地清了清喉嚨。

大地女神：
另外，別擔心她身邊的人
變化。

據我們所知，對於一位黑暗女神來說，她
變化令人驚訝\..\..\.. 友好，對於
缺乏更好的字眼。

她所有的改變都是主題
其實內心深處很想要。 \！
或者他們一旦嘗試就會喜歡的東西。

或者最糟的情況是他們找不到的東西
不只是輕微的不方便。

哈迪亞對你微笑。

哈迪亞女神：
這引起了一些問題，女士。
我想要雞巴。

大地女神：
她好像確實在跟你有仇
特別是。

地球拍手。

大地女神：
所以！ \!英雄，你的道路是清晰的！ \！
耗盡這位新黑暗女神的力量並拯救
t

passages.name: Earth room ARG — Earth forward — p2
passages.content:
Goddess Earth:
This could be the start of dark times for the
world.\!
Dark times indeed.

My sisters and I will study what we can.\!
We should have answers for you tomorrow.
passages.content_zh:
大地女神：
這可能是黑暗時代的開始
世界.\!
確實是黑暗時期。

我和我的姊妹們會盡我們所能去研究。 \！
明天我們應該會給你答案。

passages.name: Earth room ARG — Florauna — p2
passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
Now, a new dark goddess is bad and
everything.

But at least it sounds like she knows how to
have fun!
passages.content_zh:
芙羅娜女神：
現在，一個新的黑暗女神很壞，
一切。

但至少聽起來她知道如何
玩得開心！

passages.name: Earth room ARG — Hadea — p2
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
If you're going to fling yourself to your death
against this new threat, could you try to do it
in a way that leaves your spleen intact?

You have no idea how much a good spleen
goes for in the underworld.
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞女神：
如果你要跳樓自殺
針對這個新的威脅，你能試試看嗎
以一種讓你的脾臟完好無損的方式？

你不知道脾臟有多好
去黑社會。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Dead vines — p1
passages.content:
The vines are weak and brittle and won't bear
your weight.

Green spreads rapidly through the vines as
they absorb the potion. You can see the stalks
swelling as new leaves unfold.

They should bear your weight now.
passages.content_zh:
藤蔓又弱又脆，無法承受
你的體重。

綠色透過藤蔓迅速蔓延
他們吸收藥水。你可以看到莖
當新葉展開時腫脹。

他們現在應該承受你的重量了。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Trash 7 — p1
passages.content:
You collect an entire skeleton. Odd.

\V[9] pieces of trash collected.
passages.content_zh:
您收集了整個骨架。奇怪的。

\V[9] 件垃圾被收集。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Trash 2 — p1
passages.content:
You pick up an empty "juice" bottle.

No wait, this is actually juice.  Huh.

\V[9] pieces of trash collected.
passages.content_zh:
你拿起一個空的「果汁」瓶。

等等，這其實是果汁。  呵呵。

\V[9] 件垃圾被收集。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Trash 1 — p1
passages.content:
You pick up a pile of old papers.

\V[9] pieces of trash collected.

And there's a pastry underneath, still in the
plastic!

Acquired Healing Pastry!
passages.content_zh:
你撿起一堆舊文件。

\V[9] 件垃圾被收集。

下面還有一塊糕點，還在裡面
塑膠！

獲得治癒糕點！

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Trash 5 — p1
passages.content:
A bunch of seedy-looking advertisments.

"Roy's Back-Alley Bargains! Almost
as legal as you think!"

You tear them down.

\V[9] pieces of trash collected.
passages.content_zh:
一堆看起來破爛的廣告。

「羅伊的後巷特價！幾乎
正如你所想的那樣合法！ 」

你把它們撕下來。

\V[9] 件垃圾被收集。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Trash 6 — p1
passages.content:
You find some... trash(?) on the ground?

\V[9] pieces of trash collected?

The bra looks torn, but the panties are in
okay condition. Do you want to keep them?

This is underwear, just to be clear, that you
found on the ground in a secluded area in a
park. You're sure you want to touch it?
Maybe wear it?

Trash Panties shamefully slipped into pocket.
passages.content_zh:
你在地上發現了一些…垃圾（？）？

\V[9]件垃圾收集起来了吗？

胸罩看起来破了，但内裤还在
條件還好。你想保留它們嗎？

这是内衣，需要明确的是，您
在一个僻静区域的地面上发现
公園。你确定要触摸它吗？
或許可以穿嗎？

垃圾内裤可耻地滑进口袋里。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Trash 4 — p1
passages.content:
Old food. Yuck.

\V[9] pieces of trash collected.

And a cup of still-warm coffee!

Coffee acquired!
passages.content_zh:
老食物。噁心。

\V[9] 件垃圾被收集。

還有一杯還溫熱的咖啡！

咖啡收購了！

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Trash 3 — p1
passages.content:
You sweep up a whole bunch of broken glass.

\V[9] pieces of trash collected.
passages.content_zh:
你掃掉一大堆碎玻璃。

\V[9] 件垃圾被收集。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Thorns — p1
passages.content:
Thorns have overgrown this portion of the
hedge maze, blocking it completely.

The magic of your absorbed gloves protects
your hands as you rip out handful after
handful of thorns. Soon the way is clear.
passages.content_zh:
荊棘已經長滿了這部分
樹籬迷宮，將其徹底封鎖。

吸收手套的魔力可以提供保護
當你撕開一把之後你的手
一把荊棘。很快，道路就暢通無阻了。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Elf guard — p1
passages.content:
Halt, hero!

You may be here to help, but that doesn't
mean you can help yourself to our treasury.

The only way in here is through me.

Your last blow sends the guard flying back.

Elf Guard:
Too strong...

Elf Guard:
And don't come back.

Elf Guard:
Feel lucky I'm sparing your life.

Elf Guard:
Good idea.
passages.content_zh:
停下來吧，英雄！

你可能是來幫忙的，但那不是
意味著您可以向我們的金庫自助。

進入這裡的唯一方法就是透過我。

你的最後一擊讓守衛飛了回來。

精靈守衛：
太強了...

精靈守衛：
並且不要回來。

精靈守衛：
慶幸我饒了你的命。

精靈守衛：
好主意。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — p1
passages.content: Raw mana found!
passages.content_zh: 發現原始法力！

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Mimic — p1
passages.content:
Mimic:
Five more minutes.

Mimic:
I'm sleeping!

Mimic:
Hey!\!
I was sleeping!

...And you're an intruder!

One second before I beat you up!

She holds up a hand and turns to the chest
next to her.

And then stares for a moment at its empty
interior.

She turns back to you.

Mimic:
You stole my breakfast!\!
Do you know how hard it is to get?!

The elves refuse to buy me anything, they're
all "Mimi, we can feed you just as well from
the natural bounty of the hedges", "Mimi,
coffee is a pollutant for your body",

"Mimi, I've made a joyous wonderbread much
better than any pastry from leaves and nectar."\!
Let me tell you, it isn't!

It's going to be *weeks* until I can talk
someone else into getting anything for me!\!
Unless I drag myself all the way out there,
which will also take forever!

She looks very tired.

Mimic:
Ugh, beating people up without any coffee
*sucks*.

She glares.

Mimic:
But you deserve it, punk!

She pulls out some coffee and a pastry and
devours them.

Mimic:
Ahhh, part of a balanced asskicking!

Mimic:
Fine, fine! You've defeated me!\!
Whatever.

She reaches down into her box and
rummages around for a bit.\!
Finally she pulls out a crumpled wad of
paper.

Unfolding it, she begins to read in a flat voice.

Mimic:
Oh Hero/Villain/Overly Burly Squirrel, thou
hast passed the, uh, final challenge?

She squints at the paper.

Mimic:
I think I spilled coffee on this bit.\!
It says you get some kind of, uh, reward?

What was that supposed to be?\!
It's been a while...\!
Ah, here we go.

"The true reward was the friends you made
along the way?"

Mimic:
Wow that's stupid.

I guess even if I don't have any treasure to
give you, I can at least teach you how to
punch better.

The way you punch causes me physical pain.\!
And would even if it wasn't me you were
punching.

She spends a few minutes giving you advice
and instructions.\!
And a shiny rock she found in her chest.

Clean Up upgraded!\!
Raw Mana found!

What was that supposed to be?\!
It's been a wh
passages.content_zh:
模仿：
還有五分鐘。

模仿：
我在睡覺！

模仿：
嘿！ \！
我那時在睡覺！

……而你是個入侵者！

就在我打敗你的前一秒！

她舉起一隻手，轉向胸前
在她旁邊。

然後盯著空蕩蕩的地方看了一會兒
內部。

她轉身面向你。

模仿：
你偷了我的早餐！ \！
你知道有多難得到嗎？ ！

精靈們拒絕買任何東西，他們
所有「咪咪，我們也可以餵你
樹籬的自然饋贈”，“咪咪，
咖啡是你身體的污染物”，

「咪咪，我做了很多快樂的奇妙麵包
比任何用樹葉和花蜜製成的糕點都要好。 ”\!
告訴你，不是的！

我需要*幾個星期*才能說話
其他人為我獲取任何東西！ \！
除非我一路拖著自己出去，
這也將永遠持續下去！

她看起來很累。

模仿：
呃，不喝咖啡就打人
*糟透了*。

她怒視著。

模仿：
但你值得擁有，龐克！

她拿出一些咖啡和糕點
吞噬他們。

模仿：
啊哈，平衡性交的一部分！

模仿：
好吧好吧！你打敗我了！ \!
任何。

她把手伸進盒子裡，
翻找了一下。 \!
最後她拿出一團皺巴巴的東西
紙。

她展開它，開始用平淡的聲音朗讀。

模仿：
哦，英雄/惡棍/粗壯的松鼠，你
已經通過了，呃，最後的挑戰？

她瞇著眼睛看著報紙。

模仿：
我想我把咖啡灑到了這一點上。 \！
它說你會得到某種，呃，獎勵？

那應該是什麼？ \！
已經有一段時間了...\!
啊，我們開始吧。

「真正的回報是你結交的朋友
一路上？ 」

模仿：
哇，這太蠢了。

我想即使我沒有什麼寶藏
給你，我至少可以教你如何
打拳更好。

你出拳的方式讓我感到身體疼痛。 \！
即使不是我你也會
沖孔。

她花了幾分鐘給你建議
和說明。 \!
她在胸口發現了一塊閃亮的石頭。

清理升級！ \！
發現原始法力！

那應該是什麼？ \！
這是一個wh

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Mimic — p2
passages.content:
Mimic:
Haven't you done enough already!?

She slams the chest lid shut.

...You know, you could probably replace her
breakfast if you wanted.

Give her a coffee and pastry?

She glares at you for a moment.

Mimic:
Hmmph, it's the least you could do.

She swipes the food from you and hides it in
her chest.

Mimic:
...\!
Thanks.

Mimic:
Huh, really?\!
Thanks!

She eagerly takes it.

Mimic:
This stuff is so hard to get out here!

The elves refuse to buy me anything, they're
all "Mimi, we can feed you just as well from
the natural bounty of the hedges", "Mimi,
coffee is a pollutant for your body",

"Mimi, I've made a joyous wonderbread much
better than any pastry from leaves and nectar."\!
Let me tell you, it isn't!

It takes *weeks* to talk anyone into getting
things for me.\!
And dragging myself out of the maze also
takes forever.

Mimic:
Feel free to raid the treasury any time you
want if you keep bringing me stuff!

You offer her the food, but run into the slight
problem that you don't actually have it.

Mimic:
Are you having fun taunting me?!

She slams the chest lid shut.

You offer her the food, but run into the slight
problem that you don't actually have it.

Mimic:
Are you having fun taunting me?!

She slams the chest lid shut.

You leave.
passages.content_zh:
模仿：
你還沒做得夠多嗎！

她砰的一聲關上了箱子的蓋子。

……你知道，你可能可以取代她
如果你想要早餐的話。

給她一杯咖啡和糕點？

她瞪了你一會兒。

模仿：
嗯，這是你至少能做的。

她從你身上奪走食物並將其藏在
她的胸部。

模仿：
...\!
謝謝。

模仿：
嗯，真的嗎？ \!
謝謝！

她急切地接過它。

模仿：
這玩意兒想出去真是太難了！

精靈們拒絕買任何東西，他們
所有「咪咪，我們也可以餵你
樹籬的自然饋贈”，“咪咪，
咖啡是你身體的污染物”，

「咪咪，我做了很多快樂的奇妙麵包
比任何用樹葉和花蜜製成的糕點都要好。 ”\!
告訴你，不是的！

說服任何人接受需要「幾週」的時間
給我的東西。 \！
也把自己拖出了迷宮
需要永遠。

模仿：
隨時可以隨意突襲金庫
如果你繼續帶給我東西的話！

你提供她食物，但遇到了輕微的情況
問題是你實際上沒有它。

模仿：
你嘲諷我開心嗎？ ！

她砰的一聲關上了箱子的蓋子。

你提供她食物，但遇到了輕微的情況
問題是你實際上沒有它。

模仿：
你嘲諷我開心嗎？ ！

她砰的一聲關上了箱子的蓋子。

你離開。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Mimic — p3
passages.content:
Mimic:
Oh.\!
It's you again.

Hi, I guess.

Mimic:
Hey, how's it going?\!
The elves haven't refilled the treasury, I
doubt they're going to do that for a while.
passages.content_zh:
模仿：
哦。 \!
又是你。

嗨，我猜。

模仿：
嘿，怎麼樣？ \!
精靈們還沒補充金庫，我
懷疑他們會這樣做一段時間。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — p1
passages.content: 100\G were found!

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — p1
passages.content: Espresso found! Still warm, too.
passages.content_zh: 濃縮咖啡找到了！也還很溫暖。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — p1
passages.content:
Someone's breakfast found!
Gained 1 coffee and 1 healing pastry.
passages.content_zh:
發現有人的早餐了！
獲得 1 杯咖啡和 1 塊治療糕點。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Trash Monster — p1
passages.content:
A foul smell rises from this pile of trash.

A wind you can't feel begins to pick it up.

\C[3]I will prevent you from removing all this
lovely filth!

Somehow picked up the entire mound of
trash!

\V[9] pieces of trash collected. \V[11] left.

You found a piece of raw mana glittering
underneath the pile!
passages.content_zh:
這堆垃圾中散發出一股惡臭。

一股你感覺不到的風開始吹來。

\C[3]我會阻止你刪除這一切
可愛的污穢！

不知何故撿起了整個土堆
垃圾！

\V[9] 件垃圾被收集。 \V[11] 離開。

你發現了一塊閃閃發光的原始法力
在堆下面！

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Old mimic battle — p1
passages.content:
Mimic:
Five more minutes.\!

Mimic:
I'm sleeping!

Mimic:
Hey!\!
I was sleeping!

...And you're an intruder!

One second before I beat you up!

She holds up a hand and turns to the chest
next to her.

And then stares for a moment at its empty
interior.

She turns back to you.

Mimic:
You stole my breakfast!\!
Do you know how hard it is to get?!

The elves refuse to buy me anything, they're
all "Mimi, we can feed you just as well from
the natural bounty of the hedges", "Mimi,
coffee is a pollutant for your body",

"Mimi, I've made a joyous wonderbread much
better than any pastry from leaves and nectar."\!
Let me tell you, it isn't!

It's going to be *weeks* until I can talk
someone else into getting anything for me!\!
Unless I drag myself all the way out there,
which will also take forever!

She looks very tired.

Mimic:
Ugh, beating people up without any coffee
*sucks*.

She glares.

Mimic:
But you deserve it, punk!

She pulls out some coffee and a pastry and
devours them.

Mimic:
Ahhh, part of a balanced asskicking!

Mimic:
Fine, fine! You've defeated me!\!
Whatever.

She reaches down into her box and
rummages around for a bit.\!
Finally she pulls out a crumpled wad of
paper.

Unfolding it, she begins to read in a flat voice.

Mimic:
Oh Hero/Villain/Overly Burly Squirrel, thou
hast passed the, uh, final challenge?

She squints at the paper.

Mimic:
I think I spilled coffee on this bit.\!
It says you get some kind of, uh, reward?

What was that supposed to be?\!
It's been a while...\!
Just kind of a splotch on the paper...

One moment.

She ducks back into her box and shuts the
lid.

You hear many things being moved inside.\!
Finally, she pops back out.

Mimic:
Here we go!\!
\}Ah, I've been meaning to throw that out
for ages.

A...\. blob of goo plops into your inventory?\!
At least there's also a shiny rock attached.

Mimic:
Now \{GO AWAY!

She slams the chest lid shut.
passages.content_zh:
模仿：
還有五分鐘。 \!

模仿：
我在睡覺！

模仿：
嘿！ \！
我那時在睡覺！

……而你是個入侵者！

就在我打敗你的前一秒！

她舉起一隻手，轉向胸前
在她旁邊。

然後盯著空蕩蕩的地方看了一會兒
內部。

她轉身面向你。

模仿：
你偷了我的早餐！ \！
你知道有多難得到嗎？ ！

精靈們拒絕買任何東西，他們
所有「咪咪，我們也可以餵你
樹籬的自然饋贈”，“咪咪，
咖啡是你身體的污染物”，

「咪咪，我做了很多快樂的奇妙麵包
比任何用樹葉和花蜜製成的糕點都要好。 ”\!
告訴你，不是的！

我需要*幾個星期*才能說話
其他人為我獲取任何東西！ \！
除非我一路拖著自己出去，
這也將永遠持續下去！

她看起來很累。

模仿：
呃，不喝咖啡就打人
*糟透了*。

她怒視著。

模仿：
但你值得擁有，龐克！

她拿出一些咖啡和糕點
吞噬他們。

模仿：
啊哈，平衡性交的一部分！

模仿：
好吧好吧！你打敗我了！ \!
任何。

她把手伸進盒子裡，
翻找了一下。 \!
最後她拿出一團皺巴巴的東西
紙。

她展開它，開始用平淡的聲音朗讀。

模仿：
哦，英雄/惡棍/粗壯的松鼠，你
已經通過了，呃，最後的挑戰？

她瞇著眼睛看著報紙。

模仿：
我想我把咖啡灑到了這一點上。 \！
它說你會得到某種，呃，獎勵？

那應該是什麼？ \！
已經有一段時間了...\!
只是紙上的一個斑點...

一會兒。

她躲回自己的盒子裡並關上門
蓋子。

你聽到裡面有很多東西被移動。 \！
最後，她又出來了。

模仿：
我們開始吧！ \!
\}啊，我一直想把它丟掉
多年來。

一...\。一團黏糊糊的東西掉進你的庫存裡了？ \！
至少還有一塊閃亮的岩石附著在上面。

模仿：
現在\{走開！

她砰的一聲關上了箱子的蓋子。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Elf healer — p1
passages.content:
Elf Healer:
Be careful, there's a dangerous spirit ahead.

Let me heal you.

I can also show you a shortcut to the
entrance.
passages.content_zh:
精靈治療師：
小心，前方有危险的精灵。

讓我治愈你。

我还可以向您展示一个快捷方式
入口。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Elf healer — p2
passages.content:
Elf Healer:
You truly are a hero!

I still sense a darkness in the maze. It feels
like there are \V[11] pieces of trash left.

Let me heal you.

I can also show you a shortcut to the
entrance.
passages.content_zh:
精靈治療師：
你確實是個英雄！

我仍然感覺到迷宮裡一片黑暗。感覺
就像剩下\V[11]件垃圾一樣。

讓我治愈你。

我還可以向您展示一個快捷方式
入口。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Elf healer — p3
passages.content:
Elf Healer:
Welcome hero!

Let me heal you.

I'm afraid one of our less wise members is
commiting blasphemy in the clearing ahead.

Let me return you to the entrance, both of us
will be happier with you not having to
experience it.
passages.content_zh:
精靈治療師：
歡迎英雄！

讓我治愈你。

恐怕我們的一位不太聰明的成員是
在前面的空地上犯下褻瀆罪。

讓我帶你回到入口處，我們倆
不必因為你而感到高興
體驗它。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Sheep spirit — p1
passages.content:
There is a black sheep here. Faint stars flow
over its wool in dizzying patterns.

It's wedged itself into the hedge wall and
refuses to move. It looks terrified.

Move it by force?

You try to grab it, but your hands pass through
it. It's only an image in the game, after all.

It tries to back further into the hedge anyway.

It tries to back further into the hedge as you
look at it.

You don't see any reason to struggle with it,
so you let it be.
passages.content_zh:
這裡有一隻害群之馬。淡淡的星光流淌
羊毛上有令人眼花撩亂的圖案。

它把自己楔入了樹籬牆
拒絕移動。看起來很害怕。

強行搬動嗎？

你試著抓住它，但你的手卻穿過了
它。畢竟這只是遊戲中的一個圖像。

無論如何，它都會試圖進一步退回到對沖範圍內。

當你試圖進一步退回樹籬時
看看它。

你看不到任何理由與之鬥爭，
所以你就順其自然吧。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Sheep spirit — p2
passages.content:
There is a faintly translucent sheep here.
Stars swirl over its black wool.\!
This must be the Star Ewe you're looking
for.

You try to grab it, but it dodges out of the way
of your hand. More tries have just as little
success.

:
I've got an idea, let me try!

Let her help?

:
Okay, so, let's try...

She slowly advances on the sheep, arms
outstretched.

:
Come on...\!
Here sheep, that's a good sheep...

It ducks under her arms and runs to the other
corner of the dead end.

:
Hmm.\!
It's short, so maybe if I crouch...

She advances on it again, bent over. \!
This time the sheep headbutts her, knocking
her over, then slips past.

:
Progress!\!
With a few more iterations, I think I'll have
it caught!

But that also seems kind of boring, so...

She gives a loud growl and flings herself on
top of the sheep.

The sheep is completely befuddled as she
snarls and flails at it, trying to grab one of
its legs.

It's not very effective, but it *is* distracting
enough for you to wave your hand up and
add the sheep to your inventory.

 faceplants into the ground as the sheep
vanishes.

:
Victory!

:
*She steps back* Fine, have fun.

It takes some effort, but finally you're able to
wave a hand through the sheep and add it to
your inventory.

Okay, it takes a lot of effort.

A lot of effort and at least two falls, where the
sheep dodges and your feet slip as you try to
turn.

At least you only fell into more thornbushes
once.

Star Ewe acquired!
passages.content_zh:
這裡有一隻隱約半透明的羊。
星星在它的黑色羊毛上旋轉。 \！
這一定是您要找的明星母羊
為.

你試著抓住它，但它卻躲開了
你的手。更多的嘗試卻同樣少
成功。

:
我有一個想法，我來試試！

讓她幫忙？

:
好吧，那麼，讓我們試試看...

她慢慢地向羊群走去，手臂
伸展。

：
快點...\！
這兒的羊，那是一隻好羊…

它躲到她的腋下，跑向另一個
死胡同的角落。

：
唔。 \！
它很短，所以也許如果我蹲下......

她再次向前邁進，彎下腰。 \！
這次羊用頭撞她，敲門
她過去了，然後就溜過去了。

：
進步！ \！
經過幾次迭代，我想我會
它抓住了！

但這似乎也有點無聊，所以......

她大聲咆哮並撲倒在地
羊的頂部。

羊完全被迷惑了
對它咆哮並連枷，試圖抓住其中之一
它的腿。

它不是很有效，但它*是*分散注意力的
足以讓你舉手
將羊添加到您的庫存中。

 像羊一樣把臉埋進地裡
消失。

:
勝利！

:
*她退後一步*好吧，玩得開心。

這需要一些努力，但最終你能夠
在羊身上揮動一隻手並將其添加到
你的庫存。

好吧，這需要很多努力。

付出了很大的努力，至少兩次跌倒，
當你試圖逃跑時，羊會閃躲而你的腳會打滑
轉。

至少你只是掉進了更多的荊棘叢裡
一次。

明星母羊收購！

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — p1
passages.content: 30\G were found!
passages.content_zh: 找到了30\G！

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Elina cutscene trigger old — p2
passages.content:
As the last enemy fuzzes out into digital static,
 sits heavily on the ground.

:
That *hurt!*\|
They were actually trying to kill us! \|
I could have died!

:
I\.\.\. kinda have to tell you something...

I have no idea what I'm doing.

I was just supposed to be the damsel in
distress.\.
Just supposed to sit in that room and wait to
be rescued.

\>But look at this world!

She gestures around.

You've got glowing lights on all the walls! \.
And those weird water bowls that empty
themselves!\. And, and big metal boxes that
eat people then spit them out somewhere else!

I couldn't just sit around and *not* get a
chance to see all this!

So I, uh, invited myself along. \|
That's not a problem, right?

*She stands back up*
Thanks. \.\. That helps.

*She takes a few deep breaths*
I can do this. \.\.
So monsters are scary. And pain hurts. So
what.

We've got espresso and stuff that can bring
me back. Pain will pass.

There's a big new world and I'm going to see
it. \|
I'm *not* going to go back to waiting in a
cage forever.

She looks back at you.

:
Okay, I think I'm ready. \.
Let's keep exploring.

She glares at you.

:
You know what? No. There is no way I am
leaving. \.\.\.
You're not getting rid of me that easily.

She pulls herself to her feet.

I am *not* going to go back to sitting in a
cage. \.
Monsters aren't going to stop me, and neither
are you.

This is my chance to see a brand new world
and I'm going to take it no matter what you
or anything else does.

Are you coming, or are *you* too scared?
passages.content_zh:
當最後一個敵人模糊成數字靜態時，
 重重地坐在地上。

:
那*受傷了！ *\|
他們其實是想殺了我們！ \|
我可能已經死了！

：
我\。 \。 \。有點必須告訴你一些事情...

我不知道我在做什麼。

我本來應該是裡面的少女
苦惱。 \.
只是應該坐在那個房間裡等待
被救。

\>但是看看這個世界！

她指了指周圍。

所有牆壁上都有發光的燈！ \.
還有那些奇怪的空水碗
他們自己！ \.還有大金屬盒子
吃人然後把他們吐到別處！

我不能只是坐在那裡，*不*得到一個
有機會看到這一切！

所以我，呃，邀請自己一起去。 \|
這不是問題，對吧？

*她站了起來*
謝謝。 \.\.這有幫助。

*她做了幾次深呼吸*
我可以做到這一點。 \.\.
所以怪物是可怕的。而且疼痛很痛。所以呢。

我們有濃縮咖啡和可以帶來的東西
我回來了。痛苦會過去的。

有一個很大的新世界，我要去看看
它。 \|
我*不會*打算回去等待
永遠的牢籠。

她回頭看著你。

:
好吧，我想我已經準備好了。 \.
讓我們繼續探索。

她瞪著你。

：
你知道嗎？不，我不可能
離開。 \.\.\.
你沒那麼容易擺脫我。

她站了起來。

我*不*打算回到坐在
籠子。 \.
怪物不會阻止我，也不會
你是嗎？

這是我看到一個全新世界的機會
不管你怎樣我都會接受它
或其他任何事情。

你要來嗎，還是「你」太害怕了？

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Elina cutscene trigger — p2
passages.content:
As the last enemy fuzzes out into digital static,
 sits heavily on the ground.

:
Ow!\!
*That's* what pain is like?!

I'm not in favor.

:
Oh.\!
Right.

So, uh\..\..\..\..

I *may* have been supposed to just sit in
that room.\!
Stay there and wait for rescue.

But it was so boring!

She gestures around.

And look at what you have out here!

You've got glowing lights on all the walls! \.
And those weird water bowls that empty
themselves!\. And, and big metal boxes that
eat people then spit them out somewhere else!

I couldn't just sit around and *not* get a
chance to see all this!

So I, uh, invited myself along. \|
That's not a problem, right?

*She stands back up*
Thanks. \.\. That helps.

*She takes a few deep breaths*
I can do this. \.\.
So monsters are scary. And pain hurts. So
what.

We've got espresso and stuff that can bring
me back. Pain will pass.

There's a big new world and I'm going to see
it. \|
I'm *not* going to go back to waiting in a
cage forever.

She looks back at you.

:
Okay, I think I'm ready. \.
Let's keep exploring.

She glares at you.

:
You know what? No. There is no way I am
leaving. \.\.\.
You're not getting rid of me that easily.

She pulls herself to her feet.

I am *not* going to go back to sitting in a
cage. \.
Monsters aren't going to stop me, and neither
are you.

This is my chance to see a brand new world
and I'm going to take it no matter what you
or anything else does.

Are you coming, or are *you* too scared?

當最後一個敵人模糊成數字靜態時，
 重重地坐在地上。

:
哎喲！ \！
*這就是*痛苦的感覺？ ！

我不贊成。

：
哦。 \！
正確的。

所以，呃\..\..\..\..

我*可能*應該只是坐在裡面

留在原地等待救援。

她指了指周圍。

看看你這裡有什麼！

我不能只是坐在那裡，*不*得到一個

所以我，呃，邀請自己一起去。 \|
這不是問題，對吧？

*她站了起來*
謝謝。 \.\.這有幫助。

*她做了幾次深呼吸*
我可以做到這一點。 \.\.
所以怪物是可怕的。而且疼痛很痛。所以呢。

有一個很大的新世界，我要去看看

我*不會*打算回去等待

她回頭看著你。

:
好吧，我想我已經準備好了。 \.
讓我們繼續探索。

她瞪著你。

：
你知道嗎？不，我不可能
離開。 \.\.\.
你沒那麼容易擺脫我。

她站了起來。

我*不*打算回到坐在
籠子。 \.
怪物不會阻止我，也不會
你是嗎？

這是我看到一個全新世界的機會
不管你怎樣我都會接受它
或其他任何事情。

你要來嗎，還是「你」太害怕了？

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Elf farmer — p2
passages.content:
Elf 1:
So I figured, why not try this whole agriculture
thing? It seems to work pretty well for the
humans.

It looks like the remains of that trash spirit
are pretty good fertilizer too.

Elf 2:
I knew we shouldn't have let you go exploring.
passages.content_zh:
精靈1：
所以我想，為什麼不嘗試整個農業
東西？這似乎對
人類。

看起來像是那個垃圾精靈的遺骸
也是很好的肥料。

精靈2：
我知道我們不應該讓你去探索。

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — Elf not farmer — p2
passages.content:
Elf 2:
What about nature's bounty? What about our
culture?

Elf 1:
Look, I'd just like to cut down on how often I
have to stab an animal to death for dinner.

Is that so wrong?
passages.content_zh:
精靈2：
大自然的饋贈又如何呢？那我們的
文化？

精靈1：
聽著，我只是想減少我的頻率
必須刺死一隻動物當晚餐。

這有那麼錯嗎？

passages.name: Hedge Maze ARG — p2
passages.content:
Elf guard:
Owwww....
passages.content_zh:
精靈守衛：
嗚嗚嗚…

passages.name: Bathrooms ARG — p2
passages.content:
Woman: Help! Someone help!

Goddess Earth:
Hero! Don't give up!\!
Remember the potion belt I gave you! It will
give you strength!

I will replenish your energy. Defeat that
monster!

// Tutorial progress indicates what point the player is in the tutorial.
0 = Hasn't talked to Earth
1 = Has talked to Earth but has not fought slime
2 = Has fought slime but not yet returned to Earth
3 = Has fought slime and returned to Earth. Tutorial over.

Woman?:
Oh bold hero! Thank you for saving me!

Let me accompany you on your noble quest.
I would love to learn more of your world!

I know a little magic. If you can find me a
wand, I will lend all my knowledge of the arts
to your quest!

\n[2] joined the party!
passages.content_zh:
女：救命啊！有人幫忙！

大地女神：
英雄！不要放棄！ \!
記得我給你的藥劑腰帶！它將
給你力量！

我會補充你的能量。打敗那個
怪物！

// 教學進度指示玩家處於教學課程中的哪個點。
0 = 尚未與地球對話
1 = 已與地球對話但未與史萊姆戰鬥
2 = 已與史萊姆戰鬥但尚未返回地球
3 = 與史萊姆戰鬥並返回地球。教程結束。

女人？ ：
噢，勇敢的英雄！謝謝你救了我！

讓我陪伴你完成你崇高的追求。
我很想多了解你的世界！

我知道一點魔法。如果你能找到我
魔杖，我將借出我所有的藝術知識
為了你的追求！

\n[2]入黨了！

passages.name: Bathrooms ARG — Shirt guy — p2
passages.content:
// Shirt guy status:
0: Not yet talked to.
1: Sick in the men's bathroom
2: Healed, back here, no shirt yet
3: Healed, gave a shirt.

Shirt Guy Frank:
Uggggh...

Shirt Guy Frank:
Kill me now.

Shirt Guy Frank:
Uggggh...

I...

...Feel much better?

I don't know what you did, but I feel great!

Come visit me in the lobby and I'll give you
a free shirt!
passages.content_zh:
// 襯衫人狀態：
0：尚未交談過。
1：在男廁生病了
2：痊癒了，回到這裡，還沒穿襯衫
3：痊癒了，給了一件襯衫。

襯衫蓋伊法蘭克：
呃呃…

襯衫蓋伊法蘭克：
現在就殺了我吧。

襯衫蓋伊法蘭克：
呃呃…

我...

……感覺好多了？

我不知道你做了什麼，但我感覺很棒！

到大廳來找我，我會給你
一件免費襯衫！

passages.name: Test — Head Priestess
passages.content: Classes!

passages.name: Test — Slime
passages.content:
Aha, caught you!

Oh no, caught!

Oh no my only weakness
passages.content_zh:
啊哈，抓住你了！

哦，不，我唯一的弱點

passages.name: Test — Seal
passages.content:
You fool! You buffoon! You dullard!

The obvious correct choice.

Oh no!

All according to keikaku.
passages.content_zh:
你這個傻瓜！你這個小丑！你這個笨蛋！

我們又聊什麼了？

明顯正確的選擇。

哦不！

一切都按照惠卡庫的說法。

passages.content:
Community Volunteer:
Welcome!

Are you interested in buying a plant to help
support the park?

Community Volunteer:
Well, the plants aren't doing too well at the
moment.

He holds out a pot of bare dirt.

But there's all sorts of things you could do
with this!

Uh.../!
Um.../!
A.../! helmet?/!
A hat?

Please?  50$ for a good cause?

You don't have enough money.

Pot of Dirt acquired?

You could wear it as a helmet, you guess?

Community Volunteer:
If you can't afford to donate, there are still
plently of other ways to help the park. Talk to
the other volunteers for suggestions.
passages.content_zh:
社區志工：
歡迎！

您有興趣購買植物來幫助
支持公園嗎？

社區志工：
嗯，植物在這方面表現得不好
時刻。

但你可以做各種各樣的事情
有了這個！

呃.../！
嗯.../！
一.../！頭盔？ /！
一頂帽子？

請？  50 美元有什麼好的理由？

你沒有足夠的錢。

泥土之鍋獲得了嗎？

你猜，你可以把它當頭盔戴？

社區志工：
如果你無力捐款，還有
還有很多其他方法可以幫助公園。交談
其他志工提出建議。

How much longer do I have to be here?

枯枝亂成一團，

地面。

\C[30]沒有多少人欣賞他們。

\C[30]我們確實需要志工。

Player Brad:
That priestess chick offered me her blessing.

Player Brad:

passages.content:
Huh. This outhouse is surprisingly
well-equipped.

You finish up and wash your hands.

Choose between the paper towels, hand
dryer, and actual towel.

Check out the vending machines.

Lounge on the couches and watch a little TV.

And finally, check yourself out in the full-
length mirror.

呵呵。這個外屋令人驚訝

你完成並洗手。

紙巾、手巾之間選擇

看看自動販賣機。

躺在沙發上，看會兒電視。

最後，全面檢查一下自己——
長度鏡。

這是在公園裡度過的美好的一天。

You hear faint moans coming from inside the

Player Gregory:
Yes... Ah! Such... versimmMMMmmilitude!

I can't believe- mmMMMMmmm!
The sensations....

Ten out offffFFFFFFff ten!
Game of the yeeEEEEEEEAAAaaaar!

\}So good...

You back away.

感覺....

十出offffFFFFFFff 十！
遊戲啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！

\}太好了...

你退開。

passages.content:
One of the flowers is wilting and brown.

You pour a potion on the flower.\!
It springs back to full life.

A glimmering mass of magic jumps from the
flower into your inventory.

Raw mana +1!
passages.content_zh:
其中一朵花枯萎呈棕色。

你把藥水倒在花上。 \!
它又恢復了完整的生命。

一團閃閃發光的魔法從
花進你的庫存。

原始法力+1！

passages.content_zh: 這朵花現在看起來又漂亮又健康。

passages.content:
Honey:
Baklava has always been one of my favorite
desserts, but it tastes so much better now.

Carol takes a bite of the flaky dessert.

Carol:
This is deliciouzzz!\!
I love the honey!

Honey giggles.

Honey:
Aww, thanks. \!
I like you too.

Carol blushes.
passages.content_zh:
親愛的：
果仁蜜餅一直是我的最愛之一
甜點，但現在味道好多了。

卡蘿咬了一口片狀甜點。

卡羅爾：
這真是美味！ \！
我喜歡蜂蜜！

親愛的咯咯笑。

親愛的：
哇，謝謝。 \！
我也喜歡你。

卡羅爾臉紅了。

passages.name: Maze entrance real 1
passages.content:
Park Visitor:
Oh hi!

She winks at you.

I see where you're looking.\!
Pretty impressive, right?

I just got it at the sale downtown!

She looks down at herself and smiles.

Park Visitor:
I thought this was a great dress, and everyone
seems to agree!

I have been getting *so* much attention
wearing it today.
passages.content_zh:
公園遊客：
哦嗨！

她對你眨眼。

我明白你在看哪裡。 \!
相當令人印象深刻，對吧？

我剛在市中心打折時買到的！

她低頭看著自己，微笑著。

公園遊客：
我覺得這件衣服很棒，每個人
似乎同意！

我得到了*這麼多*的關注
今天穿著它。

I hope they can bring it back someday!

他們曾經在這裡有一個農夫市集。 \！
我希望他們有一天能把它帶回來！

Small brittle vines.

Green spreads rapidly through the vines as
they absorb the potion. You can see the stalks
swelling as new leaves unfold.

They should bear your weight now.

小而脆的藤蔓。

綠色透過藤蔓迅速蔓延

他們現在應該承受你的重量了。

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG — Intro cutscene — p1
passages.content:
// Garden park progress:
0: Have not arrived
1: Arrived, saw intro cutscene.
2: Talked to priestess
3: Talked to person at maze entrance, received quest.
4: Beaten trash boss

// 5: Turned in trash quest, haven't talked to priestess
6: Talked to priestess, broke seal 1
7: Fought farm boss
8: Talked to priestess, broke seal 2
9: Opened forest by talking to guard

:
How did that work? That metal box we rode
in to get here.

Was it enchanted? Or was it powered by a
monster?

I didn't see one, but maybe that was what
made all those noises.

You:
We call that a bus. It uses technology, which
isn't magic...

You:
...an internal combustion engine. We put fuel
in a little chamber and burn it fast, so it
pushes a piston...

You:
... is a transparent petroleum-derived liquid
that is used primarily as a fuel in spark-
ignited internal combustion engines...

You:
...a hydrocarbon is a molecule made entirely
of the atoms hydrogen and carbon...

You:
...atoms are the smallest possible thing.
Actually, well, quarks are the smallest
possible thing...

You:
...And that's literally everything we know
about science.

:
Wow!
Thanks !

You:
Do you know about golems? It's got
something like a golem that moves the box.

Aaaah, I see.
Thanks !

:
Fine, I'll see if I can figure it out myself.

:
Fine! I'll just have to figure it out myself then!
