1：到達，看到介紹過場動畫。
2：與女祭司交談
3：與迷宮入口處的人交談，收到任務。
4：擊敗垃圾老闆

// 5: 交了垃圾任務，還沒跟女祭司交談
6：與女祭司交談，打破封印1
7：與農場老闆戰鬥
8：與女祭司交談，打破封印2
9：透過與守衛交談打開森林

:
那是如何運作的？我們搭乘的那個金屬盒子
到達這裡。

是不是著魔了？或者它是由一個
怪物？

我沒看到，但也許就是這樣
發出所有這些噪音。

你：
我們稱之為公共汽車。它使用的技術，
不是魔法嗎...

你：
……內燃機我們放燃料
在一個小房間裡快速燃燒，所以它
推動活塞...

你：
...是一種透明的石油衍生液體
主要用作火星塞的燃料
點燃的內燃機...

你：
...碳氫化合物是完全由
氫原子和碳原子的...

你：
...原子是最小的可能的東西。
事實上，夸克是最小的
可能的事...

你：
……這就是我們所知道的一切
關於科學。

：
哇！
謝謝 ！

你：
你了解傀儡嗎？它有
像傀儡一樣移動盒子的東西。

啊啊啊，我明白了。
謝謝 ！

:
好吧，我看看我自己能不能解決。

：
美好的！那我就得自己想辦法了！

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG — Head Priestess — p1
passages.content:
// Garden park progress:
0: Have not arrived
1: Arrived, saw intro cutscene.
2: Talked to priestess
3: Talked to person at maze entrance, received quest.
4: Beaten trash boss

// 5: Turned in trash quest, haven't talked to priestess
6: Talked to priestess, broke seal 1
7: Saw farm boss cutscene
8: Fought farm boss
9: Talked to priestess, broke seal 2
10: Opened forest by talking to guard

Head Priestess:
Greetings !
The plants have brought me word of your
brave journey.

I am the head priestess of Florauna, the
Goddess of Bounty, She Who Brings The
Harvest, The Blossoming Lady.

You have come at an auspicious time. After
countless centuries of searching, we have
finally found the resting place of our Great
Lady.

We are so close to freeing her, but we lack
the power to collect the last few components
for our ritual. We could use the help of such a
noble warrior as yourself.

I do not ask you to work for nothing, of
course.

As head priestess of Florauna, I can
see there is something you are missing.
Something whose absence must weigh heavy
on your mind.

I can assure you, once Florauna walks these
fields again, it will be well within my power to
help.


Please, brave hero ,
will you lend us your strength?

Head Priestess:
Thank you noble !

Three things must be done before the ritual
may be completed.

First, a taint has settled on this land, one
which blocks our holy magics.

Go north, to the place of towering leaves, and
cleanse this land.

When you return victorious, I shall have the
second mission ready for you.

Head Priestess:
Sorry, I'm not sure you heard me correctly.

I said please brave hero, will you lend us
your strength?
passages.content_zh:
// 花園公園進度：
0：尚未到達
1：到達，看到介紹過場動畫。
2：與女祭司交談
3：與迷宮入口處的人交談，收到任務。
4：擊敗垃圾老闆

// 5: 交了垃圾任務，還沒跟女祭司交談
6：與女祭司交談，打破封印1
7：看到農場老闆過場動畫
8：與農場老闆戰鬥
9：與女祭司交談，打破封印2
10：透過與守衛交談打開森林

女祭司長：
問候！
植物給我帶來了你的消息
勇敢的旅程。

我是弗洛勞納的女祭司長，
賞金女神，她帶來了
收穫，花開的女士。

你來得正是時候。之後
經過無數個世紀的探索，我們得到了
終於找到了我們偉人的安息之地
女士。

我們距離釋放她已經很近了，但我們還缺乏
收集最後幾個組件的能力
為了我們的儀式。我們可以利用這樣的幫助
像你一樣高貴的戰士。

我不要求你無緣無故工作
當然。

身為弗洛勞納的首席女祭司，我可以
看看你缺少什麼。
缺席的東西一定很沉重
在你的腦海裡。

我可以向你保證，一旦弗洛勞娜走過這些
再次領域，我將完全有能力
幫助。


請勇敢的英雄，
你願意借給我們你的力量嗎？

女祭司長：
謝謝貴人！

祭祀前必須做三件事
可能會完成。

首先，這片土地上已經有了污點，一個
它阻止了我們的神聖魔法。

往北走，到樹葉參天的地方，
淨化這片土地。

當你凱旋歸來時，我將擁有
第二個任務已經為你準備好了。

女祭司長：
抱歉，我不確定您是否聽對了。

我說請勇敢的英雄，可以藉給我們嗎
你的實力？

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG — Head Priestess — p2
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
Hero, have you cleansed the place of towering
leaves yet?

Here, let the power of the Growing Mother
heal your wounds!

:
\}You know we don't actually have to talk
like that, right?

Head Priestess:
\}But it's so fun!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
英雄，你淨化巍峨之地嗎？
離開了嗎？

在這裡，讓成長母親的力量
療癒你的傷口！

:
\}你知道我們其實不必說話
就這樣吧？

女祭司長：
\}但是太有趣了！

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG — Head Priestess — p3
passages.content:
// Garden park progress:
0: Have not arrived
1: Arrived, saw intro cutscene.
2: Talked to priestess
3: Talked to person at maze entrance, received quest.
4: Beaten trash boss

// 5: Turned in trash quest, haven't talked to priestess
6: Talked to priestess, broke seal 1
7: Fought farm boss
8: Talked to priestess, broke seal 2
9: Opened forest by talking to guard

Head Priestess:
Welcome back hero!

I can already feel that you have cleansed
part of the park.

We are ready to release the first seal on the
Great Green Grower.

Arise, Goddess! \^

Arise! \^

Head Priestess:
I can feel it! I can feel the Goddess's power!
\^

The first seal is broken!
passages.content_zh:
// 花園公園進度：
0：尚未到達
1：到達，看到介紹過場動畫。
2：與女祭司交談
3：與迷宮入口處的人交談，收到任務。
4：擊敗垃圾老闆

// 5: 交了垃圾任務，還沒跟女祭司交談
6：與女祭司交談，打破封印1
7：與農場老闆戰鬥
8：與女祭司交談，打破封印2
9：透過與守衛交談打開森林

女祭司長：
歡迎英雄歸來！

我已經能感覺到你已經淨化了
公園的一部分。

我們已準備好釋放第一個封印
偉大的綠色種植者。

崛起吧，女神！ \^

起來！ \^

女祭司長：
我能感覺到！我感受到女神的力量了！
\^

第一道封印被破！

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG — Junior Priestess
passages.content:
Junior Priestess:
Why hello hero.

Would you like to buy some equipment?
passages.content_zh:
初級女祭司：
為什麼你好英雄。

您想購買一些設備嗎？

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG — Elina wondering
passages.content:
:
This is obviously a lamp, but how does it
work?

This must be some of that "science".

Maybe that thing in the center is quarks.

That "bus" was a golem, so maybe this has
a fire elemental in it?

It can't be a normal lamp, there's nothing to
burn.

Is there a fairy trapped inside? Is that thing
in the middle enchanted?
passages.content_zh:
:
這明明是一盞燈，但它是怎麼做到的？
工作？

這一定是其中的一些「科學」。

也許中心的那個東西就是夸克。

那輛「公共汽車」是個傀儡，所以也許這有
裡面有火元素嗎？

它不可能是普通的燈，沒有什麼可做的
燒掉。

難道裡面有仙人被困？是那個東西嗎
中間著魔了？

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG
passages.content:
\{        DO NOT DISTURB

\}Sleeping Goddess

Head Priestess:
Yes, we really should have paid more
attention to that.
passages.content_zh:
\{ 請勿打擾

\}沉睡的女神

女祭司長：
是的，我們確實應該付出更多
注意這一點。

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG — Elf scene — p2
passages.content:
You hear faint moans coming from inside the
grove of trees. Take a look inside?

You peer past a tree trunk and see one of the
other players sitting against a tree. The same
player you recently saw change in the hedge
maze.

They seem... distracted.

Player SocraticMachine:
Yes... Ah! Such... versimmMMMmmilitude!

I can't believe- mmMMMMmmm!
The sensations....

Ten out offffFFFFFFff ten!
Game of the yeeEEEEEEEAAAaaaar!

\}So good...

You back away.
passages.content_zh:
你聽到從裡面傳來微弱的呻吟聲
樹林。看看裡面？

你凝視著樹幹，看到其中一個
其他玩家靠著樹坐著。一樣的
您最近在對沖中看到變化的玩家
迷宮。

他們看起來……心煩意亂。

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
是的……啊！這樣... versimmMMMmilitude！

我簡直不敢相信──嗯嗯嗯！
感覺....

十出offffFFFFFFff 十！
遊戲啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！

\}太好了...

你退開。

passages.name: Farm real — Dassi — p1
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Dassi:
Oh great, you're one of those gamer people.

We had people like you here before. All
they do is stomp through the plants and spook
the animals.

I don't care what the park management says,
I'm not letting you do anything until I hear
you're not going to mess up the park.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
Especially after that last guy.

Just kept muttering "could be bigger".

Creep.
passages.content_zh:
志工負責人達西：
哦，太棒了，你就是那些遊戲玩家之一。

我們這裡以前也有像你這樣的人。全部
他們所做的就是踐踏植物並驚嚇
動物們。

我不在乎公園管理人員說什麼
在我聽到之前我不會讓你做任何事
你不會把公園弄亂的。

志工負責人達西：
尤其是在最後那傢伙之後。

只是一直嘀咕「可以更大」。

蠕變。

passages.name: Farm real — Dassi — p2
passages.content:
// Garden park progress:
0: Have not arrived
1: Arrived, saw intro cutscene.
2: Talked to priestess
3: Talked to person at maze entrance, received quest.
4: Beaten trash boss

// 5: Turned in trash quest, haven't talked to priestess
6: Talked to priestess, broke seal 1
7: Saw farm boss cutscene
8: Fought farm boss
9: Talked to priestess, broke seal 2
10: Opened forest by talking to guard

Head Volunteer Dassi:
Hey.

I heard you helped clean up the maze.

Thanks.

I guess you're not what I was worried about.

Sorry bout that, I'm just worried for the park.
Someone trashed the maze, and all the
animals have been real listless lately.

But I guess that ain't your fault.

Listen, I think this is the point where I'm
supposed to send you to do a buncha
nonsense.

Those Terra Games people suggested I send
you to kill some rats. Said it was "traditional".

But really, I can't be bothered.

They said they've got a quest lined up for you
in the cow pen. If I let you in, do ya think you
can manage it without getting yourself killed?

Head Volunteer Dassi:
I'll get someone to unlock the gates for you.
Don't let the cows out.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
I gotta admire your self-awareness. Come
back if you change your mind.

Dassi gives you a stare.

Rats may be vermin. But if you harm a single
animal on my farm, I hope you realize you're
going to find yourself at the bottom of that
well over there.

Don't try me, missy.

Don't try me, gamer-boy.
passages.content_zh:
// 花園公園進度：
0：尚未到達
1：到達，看到介紹過場動畫。
2：與女祭司交談
3：與迷宮入口處的人交談，收到任務。
4：擊敗垃圾老闆

// 5: 交了垃圾任務，還沒跟女祭司交談
6：與女祭司交談，打破封印1
7：看到農場老闆過場動畫
8：與農場老闆戰鬥
9：與女祭司交談，打破封印2
10：透過與守衛交談打開森林

志工負責人達西：
嘿。

我聽說你幫忙清理迷宮了。

謝謝。

我想我擔心的並不是你。

抱歉，我只是擔心公園。
有人毀掉了迷宮，所有的東西
動物們最近真是無精打采。

但我想這不是你的錯。

聽著，我想這就是我現在的處境
應該派你去做一個bunda
廢話。

那些 Terra Games 的人建議我發送
你去殺一些老鼠。說這是「傳統」。

但說實話，我不能被打擾。

他們說他們已經為你安排了一個任務
在牛欄裡。如果我讓你進來，你認為你
能在不被殺的情況下做到這一點嗎？

志工負責人達西：
我會派人為你打開大門。
別讓牛出去。

志工負責人達西：
我不得不佩服你的自我意識。來吧
如果你改變主意就回來。

達西瞪了你一眼。

老鼠可能是害蟲。但如果你傷害一個人
我農場裡的動物，我希望你能意識到你
會發現自己處於最底層
就在那裡。

別嘗試我，小姐。

不要嘗試我，玩家男孩。

passages.name: Farm real — Dassi — p3
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Dassi:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Still scared of the cows?

Not that I'm complaining. It's a healthy
attitude to have.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
I'll get someone to unlock the gates for you.
Don't let the cows out.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
Fair enough. Come back if you change your
mind.
passages.content_zh:
志工負責人達西：
嘿，又是小姐。

志工負責人達西：
嘿，遊戲男孩。

還怕牛嗎？

並不是我在抱怨。這是一個健康的
要有的態度。

志工負責人達西：
我會派人為你打開大門。
別讓牛出去。

志工負責人達西：
很公平。如果你改變了就回來吧
介意。

passages.name: Farm real — Dassi — p4
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Dassi:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Dassi:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Got a chance to play with the cows yet?

I see you don't have any hoofprints on your
face. I recommend staying that way.
passages.content_zh:
志工負責人達西：
嘿，又是小姐。

志工負責人達西：
嘿，遊戲男孩。

有機會和乳牛一起玩嗎？

我發現你身上沒有蹄印
臉。我建議保持這種方式。

passages.name: Farm real — Dassi — p5
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Looks like the cows have started giving milk
again. \.
I couldn't be happier.

I'm gonna make all the volunteers milkshakes
to celebrate once we get enough.
passages.content_zh:
首席志工黛西：
嘿，又是小姐。

首席志工黛西：
嘿，遊戲男孩。

看來乳牛已經開始產奶了
再次。 \.
我高興極了。

我要為所有志工做奶昔
一旦我們得到足夠的東西來慶祝。

passages.name: Farm real — Dassi — p7
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Thanks again for your help earlier.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Oh. It's you.

Thanks for the help, I guess. It only took two
tries.

Welcome to the farm.\!
Let me know if there's anything you need
explained with simple words.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
*She buries her face in her hands.*
Oh. It's you.

I can't ban you from the farm, but please,
don't try to do anything complicated.

Like look at the animals too hard.\!
Maybe just don't touch anything?
passages.content_zh:
首席志工黛西：
嘿，又是小姐。

首席志工黛西：
嘿，遊戲男孩。

再次感謝您之前的幫助。

首席志工黛西：
哦。是你。

謝謝你的幫助，我想。只用了兩個
嘗試。

歡迎來到農場。 \!
如果您需要什麼，請告訴我
用簡單的話解釋。

首席志工黛西：
*她把臉埋在手裡。 *
哦。是你。

我不能禁止你進入農場，但拜託，
不要嘗試做任何複雜的事情。

就像看動物太難了。 \！
也許只是不碰任何東西？

passages.name: Farm real — Cow 1
passages.content:
An employee badge dangles from the cow's
ear.
passages.content_zh:
牛身上懸掛著員工徽章
耳朵。

passages.name: Farm real — Volunteer Kitty — p1
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Kitty:
Gotta make sure everything stays stocked.

Farm Volunteer Kitty:
It takes so many trips to keep these filled.
passages.content_zh:
农场志愿者小猫：
必須確保所有東西都有庫存。

农场志愿者小猫：
需要很多次旅行才能讓這些充滿。

passages.name: Farm real — Volunteer Kitty — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Kitty:
This is great!

I can carry so much more this way!

And maybe people will finally stop making
jokes about my name.

Farm Volunteer Kitty:
Though I should probably find a shirt that fits.

I don't think this one survived the change.
passages.content_zh:
農場志工小貓：
這太棒了！

這樣我可以攜帶更多東西！

也許人們最終會停止製造
關於我的名字的笑話。

農場志工小貓：
不過我應該要找到一件合適的襯衫。

我不認為這個能在這變化中倖存下來。

passages.name: Farm real — p1
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Welcome to the farm!

Here you can get a taste of what it's like
living in the country!

Farm Volunteer:
The last guy with those glasses said we were
"A bit quaint, but an excellent backing for the
weaving of a fantastical endeavor."

Which I'm pretty sure is good?

Farm volunteer:
Guatemalan insanity peppers?\!
I'm not sure...

When the animals got sick, all the plants
started wilting too.\!
Even if we had some planted they don't have
any peppers grown.

If only the farm was back in good condition!
passages.content_zh:
農場志工：
歡迎來到農場！

在這裡你可以體驗它的滋味
住在鄉下！

農場志工：
最後一個戴眼鏡的人說我們是
「有點古怪，但為
編織一個夢幻般的努力。 」

我很確定哪一個很好？

農場志工：
危地馬拉瘋狂辣椒？ \！
我不確定...

當動物生病時，所有的植物
也開始枯萎。 \!
即使我們種了一些，他們也沒有
任何種植的辣椒。

要是農場能恢復到良好狀態就好了！

passages.name: Farm real — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Wow, suddenly I'm finding a lot of new things
in the fields!

At least, I didn't think we planted Guatemalan
insanity peppers...

Farm Volunteer:
Oh, you need one?\!
Sure, that shouldn't be a problem!

Just be careful with it, okay? That's one of the
spiciest peppers known!

Gained one super-spicy pepper!
passages.content_zh:
農場志工：
哇，突然間我發現了許多新東西
在田野裡！

至少，我不認為我們種植了瓜地馬拉
瘋狂的辣椒...

農場志工：
哦，你需要一個嗎？ \！
當然，這不應該是個問題！

只是要小心一點，好嗎？這是其中之一
已知最辣的辣椒！

獲得了一個超級辣的辣椒！

passages.name: Farm real — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p1
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Dassi's a good person, she's just really
protective of the farm.

I can't blame her, after what happened to the
hedge maze.

Anyway, want to buy something? Everything's
produced here on the farm!

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
I'd have more, but the orchard's closed and
the cows haven't been giving milk recently...
passages.content_zh:
農場志工阿米莉亞：
Dassi 是個好人，她真的很
保護農場。

發生了那件事之後我不能怪她
樹籬迷宮。

無論如何，想買點東西嗎？一切的
產自這裡的農場！

農場志工阿米莉亞：
我想要更多，但果園關門了
乳牛最近不產奶了

passages.name: Farm real — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Good news! The orchard's opened up and
we can sell fruit again!

Though something's still odd with the cows.
passages.content_zh:
農場志工阿米莉亞：
好消息！果園已經開放了
我們又可以賣水果了！

儘管乳牛仍然有些奇怪。

passages.name: Farm real — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p3
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
I'm so glad the cows are producing again. \.
Daisy makes the best milkshakes.

We don't have enough to sell yet, but we will
soon.

Want to buy some produce while you wait?
passages.content_zh:
農場志工阿米莉亞：
我很高興乳牛又開始生產了。 \.
黛西製作的奶昔是最好的。

我們還沒有足夠的東西可以賣，但我們會
很快。

想在等待時購買一些農產品嗎？

passages.name: Farm real — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p4
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Mind doing me a favor?

Head Volunteer Daisy:
I've been making milkshakes for everyone to
celebrate how much better the farm's doing.

I want to get Amelia's to her before it gets
warm, but I have to hold down the store.
Could you take it to her?

Thanks!
She's down in the orchard, shouldn't be hard
to find.

Received milkshake! Daisy's speciality.
It looks delicious.

She seems a bit taken aback.

You refuse this what? \.

Doesn't matter I guess, just come back if you
change your mind.
passages.content_zh:
首席志工黛西：
嘿，又是小姐。

首席志工黛西：
嘿，遊戲男孩。

介意幫我一個忙嗎？

首席志工黛西：
我一直在為大家做奶昔
慶祝農場的表現有多好。

我想在它到來之前把阿米莉亞的送給她
溫暖，但我必須按住商店。
你能拿給她嗎？

謝謝！
她在果園裡，應該不難
去尋找。

奶昔收到了！黛西的特產。
看起來很好吃。

她似乎有點吃驚。

你拒絕這個什麼？ \.

我想沒關係，如果你回來的話
改變你的想法。

passages.name: Farm real — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p5
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey there gamer-boy.

You give Amelia her milkshake yet?

Head Volunteer Daisy:
You *what*?

How do you lose a milkshake?!

*Sighs*
No, I get it, you probably just drank the thing.
My fault for making them so delicious.

*She gives you a suspicious look*
But now you're full, right?
I can give you another one and it'll make it
to Amelia, right?

Head Volunteer Daisy:
I have to admit, I really don't want to leave the
store alone.

I'll give you one more chance.

\{Don't \}lose this one.

Gained another one of Daisy's milkshakes!
This one looks just as delicious as the last one.

Did you manage to get Amelia her milkshake
*this* time?

She flings up her hands.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Fine! I'll do it myself!

I guess you can't be trusted to do one simple
task!

She puts together another milkshake and
stomps angrily off to the south.
passages.content_zh:
首席志工黛西：
嘿，又是小姐。

首席志工黛西：
嘿，遊戲男孩。

你給阿米莉亞喝奶昔了嗎？

首席志工黛西：
你*什麼*？

奶昔怎麼丟了？ ！

*嘆息*
不，我明白了，你可能剛剛喝了那東西。
我的錯讓它們如此美味。

*她用懷疑的眼神看著你*
但現在你已經吃飽了，對嗎？
我可以再給你一個，它會成功的
給阿米莉亞，對嗎？

首席志工黛西：
我不得不承認，我真的不想離開
單獨存放。

我再給你一次機會。

\{不要\}失去這個。

又獲得了一杯黛西的奶昔！
這個看起來和上一個一樣好吃。

你買奶昔給阿米莉亞了嗎
*這*次？

她舉起雙手。

首席志工黛西：
好吧！我自己來做吧！

我猜你不能相信你會做一件簡單的事
任務！

她又準備了一杯奶昔
憤怒地跺著腳向南走去。

passages.name: Farm real — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p6
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Thanks again! Amelia's gonna love this!

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Please don't lose this new milkshake. Let me
keep some of my flagging faith in humanity.
passages.content_zh:
首席志工黛西：
再次感謝！阿米莉亞一定會喜歡這個！

首席志工黛西：
請不要失去這款新奶昔。讓我
保持我對人性的一些搖搖欲墜的信心。

passages.name: Farm real — Shopkeeper Amelia stall — p7
passages.content:
Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey again missy.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Hey there gamer-boy.

Thanks again for your help earlier.

Looking to buy anything?

Head Volunteer Daisy:
Oh. It's you.

Thanks for the help, I guess. It only took two
tries.

Are you looking to buy something?
Let me know if there's anything you need
explained with simple words.

Head Volunteer Daisy:
*She buries her face in her hands.*
Oh. It's you.

Please, just buy whatever you're looking for
and leave.
passages.content_zh:
首席志工黛西：
嘿，又是小姐。

首席志工黛西：
嘿，遊戲男孩。

再次感謝您之前的幫助。

想買什麼東西嗎？

首席志工黛西：
哦。是你。

謝謝你的幫助，我想。只用了兩個
嘗試。

您想買東西嗎？
如果您需要什麼，請告訴我
用簡單的話解釋。

首席志工黛西：
*她把臉埋在手裡。 *
哦。是你。

請購買您想要的任何東西
然後離開。

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
The cows are finally making enough milk to

And we're getting fruit from the orchard again!

Everything's going so much better than

Go ahead, take a look at our stock!
passages.content_zh:

我們又從果園摘到水果了！

一切都比
之前。 \!

別告訴達西，我來這裡只是為了

The cats seem much more friendly now.

Farm Volunteer:
You're such a good kitty!

Oh!\.

農場志工：
哇，誰是一隻好貓。

你是一隻好貓！

她暫時停止撫摸貓

她小心翼翼地拍了拍自己

農場志工：

哦！ \。
這就是為什麼貓如此喜歡它。

公園遊客：

看看他們，世間無憂無慮…

passages.content:
Park Visitor:
Recently...\.\.
I feel like I'm connecting with the cows so

That with just a little more contemplation,

Would you like to meditate with me?

Park Visitor:
\^Focus on the cows...\|

\^Let the sight of them wash through you...\|

\^Fill your mind with thoughts of grass...\|

Park Visitor:
Return when you are ready for enlightenment.

最近...\.\.
我感覺我正在與乳牛建立聯繫

只要多一點思考，

\^聚焦於乳牛...\|

passages.content:

我的眼睛已經睜開，看到了牛

Player Brad:

公園遊客：

passages.content:
As your mind calms, it begins to fill with

Days spent in silent contemplation of your
next bite.

Nights spent pondering the deep mysteries

You feel that your connection to the great

While you meditate on your insights, a light

I feel the cowsmos!

Park Visitor:

当你的头脑平静下来时，它开始充满

默默沉思你的日子

彻夜思考深奥的奥秘
牛奶和田地。

你觉得你与伟人的联系

...\!
You get the feeling the plant she's sleeping
in is probably catnip.

Catnip acquired!

She's completely passed out in the middle of
the catnip field.\!
Every so often she moves a bit to rub her
face against the plants.
passages.content_zh:
她在中間完全昏倒了
植物。 \！
時不時地她會動一下摩擦她
面對他們。

...\!
你能感覺到她正在睡覺的植物
裡面可能是貓薄荷。

貓薄荷已獲得！

她在中間完全昏倒了
貓薄荷田。 \!
時不時地她會動一下摩擦她
面對植物。

passages.name: Farm real — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
The animal control person is lying sprawled
out on the catnip.

Animal Control:
.\..\..\.Ugh.\!
What a day.\!
Makes me want to just take a nap.

He sniffs the catnip.

Animal Control:
Smells nice here, at least.

A soft glow appears around him, and he
almost melts into it.

Animal Control:
Mmmm\..\..\..
Warm\..\..\..

Small sparks of light drift up from the catnip,
floating through the aura and into him.

He shifts around as he shrinks, moving into
a more comfortable position for his smaller
body.

His pants flop off, having grown much too
large to be comfortable.\!
His dress shirt flops off a slim shoulder, even
as it pulls tight against new cleavage.

She gives an especially huge yawn, stretching
so hard that cat ears pop out of her head and
a tail from her back.

Animal Control:
Yeah, I think I'll just take a nap here.\!
It just smells so nice...

She settles back down to the ground.

You hear her boss talking on a radio from the
farm entrance.

Animal Control Boss:
What's that?\!
They've been sighted on the clothing floor of
the department store?

No pants are safe?!\!
We're on our way!
passages.content_zh:
動物管理人員四肢攤開躺著
在貓薄荷上。

動物管制：
.\..\..\.呃.\！
多麼美好的一天。 \!
讓我只想小睡一會兒。

他聞了聞貓薄荷。

動物管制：
至少這裡聞起來很香。

一道柔和的光芒出現在他的周圍，他
幾乎要融入其中。

動物管制：
嗯\..\..\..
暖\..\..\..

小小的火花從貓薄荷中飄出，
飄過氣場，進入他體內。

他一邊縮小一邊移動，進入
為他的小孩子提供更舒適的位置
身體。

他的褲子掉下來了，也長大了
大到舒服。 \！
他的正裝襯衫從纖細的肩膀上垂下來，甚至
因為它會拉緊新的乳溝。

她打了個特別大的哈欠，伸了個懶腰
太用力了，貓耳從她的頭上彈出來
她背後的一條尾巴。

動物管制：
是的，我想我就在這裡睡一會兒吧。 \!
簡直太好聞了...

她又坐回到地上。

你聽到她的老闆在收音機裡講話
農場入口。

動物管制主管：
那是什麼？ \!
有人在服裝地板上看到它們
百貨公司？

沒有褲子就安全了？ ！ \！
我們正在路上！

passages.name: Farm real — Animal control — p2
passages.content:
Animal Control:
Yeah?

She yawns.

Actually, can it wait?

She nestles back down into the catnip without
waiting for an answer.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
是嗎？

她打哈欠。

其實，還可以等嗎？

她依偎在貓薄荷裡，沒有
等待答案。

passages.name: Farm real — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
A cow is repeatedly nudging a bruise on
this man's side.

Animal Control:
Ow.

Animal Control:
Ow.

Animal Control:
Ow.

Animal Control:
Stop.

Animal Control:
That.

A soft glow envelops him. His scratches and
bruises slowly start to fade.

And then the cow nudges him again.\!
You see something flash into the aura, sinking
into it like paper dropped into water.

Another nudge, and you can see his form
softening and rounding.

Hair bursts out around a pair of swelling horns,
falling long and flowing to his thighs.

His uniform shrinks as his chest swells,
pushing out into two soft breasts.

Then grows again.

And again.

Only a few strips of cloth remain, struggling
to contain their massive chest and a plush
and rounded ass.

The last of her injuries vanish, leaving soft
and unbroken skin, as a pair of bovine ears
flop out of her scalp.

The cow gives her a lick, contented.

You hear her boss talking on a radio from the
farm entrance.

Animal Control Boss:
What's that?\!
They've been sighted on the clothing floor of
the department store?

No pants are safe?!\!
We're on our way!
passages.content_zh:
一頭牛反覆輕推瘀傷
這個男人的身邊。

動物管制：
噢。

動物管制：
噢。

動物管制：
噢。

動物管制：
停下來。

動物管制：
那個。

柔和的光芒籠罩著他。他的刮痕和
瘀青慢慢開始消退。

然後牛又推了他一下。 \！
你看到有東西閃進光環，下沉
就像紙掉進水裡一樣。

再輕推一下，你就可以看到他的形狀
軟化和圓化。

一對腫脹的角周圍的毛髮迸發，
長長地垂落至大腿。

他的製服隨著胸部的膨脹而縮小，
推入兩個柔軟的乳房。

然後又長出來了。

又來了。

只剩下幾塊布條，掙扎著
容納他們巨大的胸部和毛絨玩具
和渾圓的屁股。

她最後的傷痕消失了，只剩下柔軟的身體
和完整的皮膚，就像一對牛耳朵
從她的頭皮上掉下來。

牛舔了舔她，很滿足。

你聽到她的老闆在收音機裡講話
農場入口。

動物管制主管：
那是什麼？ \!
有人在服裝地板上看到它們
百貨公司？

沒有褲子就安全了？ ！ \！
我們正在路上！

passages.name: Farm real — Animal control — p2
passages.content:
The animal control officer is trying to ward
off an overly affectionate cow.\!
She keeps pushing it back as it tries to give
her big enthusiastic licks.

Animal Control:
Back, back!\!
I think I preferred the headbutts!
passages.content_zh:
動物管制官員正在努力保護
擺脫一頭過於深情的牛。 \！
當它試圖給予時，她不斷地推回它
她熱情的大舔。

動物管制：
回來，回來！ \！
我想我比較喜歡用頭撞！

passages.name: Farm real — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
Ugh...\!
I'm covered in horse spit...

He tries to wring some water out of his shirt.

A soft pink glow covers him, scratches and
bruises begining to visibly fade.

Then suddenly the glow turns brown, wicking
up the color from the trough he's sitting in.

His ears twitch, then begin to slowly elongate,
turning brown and pointed.

He puts a hand up to his head in surprise as
his hair suddenly drops into freefall, dragging
longer and longer tresses behind it as it plunges
to float on the surface of the trough.

Another hand goes to his chest as his uniform
simply crumbles away. A bit of dust lingers on
his fingertips, before swirling away on the
breeze.

And then that hand starts to move as soft
bumps swell underneath it.\!
Then grow.\!
And grow.

Until his- her arm is supporting mounds twice
the side of her head or larger, as a
blush spreads across her face.

Animal Control:
-What?

And then she stands up.\!
The trough was hiding a lot, as her lower
body appears like a submarine surfacing.

Animal Control:
...I don't suppose you saw where my shirt
went?

You hear her boss talking on a radio from the
farm entrance.

Animal Control Boss:
What's that?\!
They've been sighted on the clothing floor of
the department store?

No pants are safe?!\!
We're on our way!
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
呃...\！
我渾身都是馬唾沫…

他試圖從襯衫上擰乾一些水。

柔和的粉紅色光芒覆蓋了他，划痕和
瘀傷開始明顯消退。

然後光芒突然變成棕色，吸濕排汗
從他所坐的槽中調出顏色。

他的耳朵抽搐，然後開始慢慢拉長，
變成棕色並變尖。

他驚訝地舉起一隻手
他的頭髮突然自由落體，拖著
隨著它的下降，後面的頭髮越來越長
浮在槽的表面。

另一隻手放在他的胸前，作為他的製服
簡直崩潰了。上面還殘留著一點灰塵
他的指尖，然後在
微風。

然後那隻手開始柔軟地移動
腫塊在它下面膨脹。 \!
然後成長。 \!
並成長。

直到他-她的手臂兩次支撐土堆
她的頭的一側或更大，作為
她的臉上泛起紅暈。

動物管制：
-什麼？

然後她站了起來。 \!
低谷隱藏得很多，因為她的下半身
身體看起來就像一艘浮出水面的潛水艇。

動物管制：
……我想你沒有看到我的襯衫在哪裡
去了嗎？

你聽到她的老闆在收音機裡講話
農場入口。

動物管制主管：
那是什麼？ \!
有人在服裝地板上看到它們
百貨公司？

沒有褲子就安全了？ ！ \！
我們正在路上！

passages.name: Farm real — Animal control — p2
passages.content:
Animal Control:
This is fine.\!
Everything is fine.

It's rare for us to deal with horses, but we
covered it in training.

I just hope the boss doesn't consider this
fraternizing with the enemy.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
這很好。 \!
一切都很好。

我們很少與馬打交道，但我們
在訓練中涵蓋了它。

只希望老闆不要考慮這個
與敵人稱兄道弟。

passages.name: Farm real — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
The animal control officer has carved a furrow
when landing, leaving them completely
covered in shredded lettuce.

Animal Control:
Ugh, what is this rabbit food?

A soft yellow glow springs up around the
animal control officer, as their wounds begin
to heal.

Green suddenly spreads out of the lettuce,
swiftly dying the whole aura.

Two long floppy ears spring out of the man's
head.

And the rest of his body shifts as well.

She fingers one of her new ears.

Animal Control:
Ugh, I knew I hated lettuce for a good reason.

You hear her boss talking on a radio from the
farm entrance.

Animal Control Boss:
What's that?\!
They've been sighted on the clothing floor of
the department store?

No pants are safe?!\!
We're on our way!
passages.content_zh:
動物管制官員已經刻了一道溝渠
著陸時，完全離開他們
覆蓋著切碎的生菜。

動物管制：
呃，這是什麼兔糧？

周圍泛起柔和的黃色光芒
動物管制官員，當他們的傷口開始出現時
治愈。

綠色突然從生菜中蔓延開來，
整個氣場迅速消亡。

兩隻長長的、耷拉著的耳朵從男人的耳朵裡伸出來
頭。

他身體的其餘部分也發生了變化。

她用手指撫摸自己的一隻新耳朵。

動物管制：
呃，我知道我討厭生菜是有充分理由的。

你聽到她的老闆在收音機裡講話
農場入口。

動物管制主管：
那是什麼？ \!
有人在服裝地板上看到它們
百貨公司？

沒有褲子就安全了？ ！ \！
我們正在路上！

passages.name: Farm real — Animal control — p2
passages.content:
Animal Control:
I'd better still be able to eat a goddamn steak.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
我最好還能吃一塊該死的牛排。

passages.name: Farm real — Animal Control Boss — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control Boss:
They've vanished, but we'll run them to
ground soon enough.

No feral animal can escape me and my men!
passages.content_zh:
動物管制主管：
他們已經消失了，但我們會把他們趕到
盡快落地。

沒有一隻野獸能逃脫我和我的手下！

passages.name: Farm real — Lovely Spirit — p1
passages.content:
Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Oof.\!
That really takes it out of me, nya.

You've got \v[23] more warriors to heal, nya!
passages.content_zh:
愛與正義的可愛精神：
噢。 \！
這真的讓我很沮喪，nya。

你還有 \v[23] 個更多的戰士需要治療，nya！

passages.name: Farm real — Lovely Spirit — p2
passages.content:
Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
I hope they don't need much more healing.\!
Even justice can get a little tired...
passages.content_zh:
愛與正義的可愛精神：
我希望他們不需要更多的治療。 \！
連正義也會有點累…

passages.name: Farm real — Doggirl farmer
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Man, ever since I had some of that cinnamon
tea at the new shelter cafe I've really been
wanting to get out in the fields.

Her tail wags eagerly.

I hope there's a lot of digging to do!
passages.content_zh:
農場志工：
夥計，自從我吃了一些肉桂之後
我真的去過新開的避難所咖啡館喝茶
想要出去到田裡去。

她的尾巴急切地搖著。

我希望有很多挖掘工作要做！

passages.name: Farm real — Catnip 4
passages.content:
Catgirl:
Whoa.\..\..\..\..

She stares at you dazedly, *incredibly* high.

Catgirl:
You've got, like...\!
A face...

She continues staring at you.
passages.content_zh:
貓女：
哇哦..\..\..\..

她茫然地盯著你，*令人難以置信地*高。

貓女：
你有，就像...\！
一張臉...

她繼續盯著你。

passages.name: Farm real
passages.content:
Farm Visitor:
You know, I have the weirdest urge to try to
steal one of those cows.
passages.content_zh:
農場訪客：
你知道，我有一種最奇怪的衝動想要嘗試
偷其中一頭牛。

passages.name: Maze entrance ARG — Entrance elf — p2
passages.content:
// Garden park progress:
0: Have not arrived
1: Arrived, saw intro cutscene.
2: Talked to priestess
3: Talked to person at maze entrance, received quest.
4: Beaten trash boss

// 5: Turned in trash quest, haven't talked to priestess
6: Talked to priestess, broke seal 1
7: Fought farm boss
8: Talked to priestess, broke seal 2
9: Opened forest by talking to guard

Elf:
You there!  You bear the glasses of a hero.

Our home has been tainted with... we'll just
call it evil.  Would you help us cleanse it?

If you could pick up eight pieces of trash,
that would be a great help.

Elf:
Good luck hero!
passages.content_zh:
// 花園公園進度：
0：尚未到達
1：到達，看到介紹過場動畫。
2：與女祭司交談
3：與迷宮入口處的人交談，收到任務。
4：擊敗垃圾老闆

// 5: 交了垃圾任務，還沒跟女祭司交談
6：與女祭司交談，打破封印1
7：與農場老闆戰鬥
8：與女祭司交談，打破封印2
9：透過與守衛交談打開森林

精靈：
你在那裡！  你戴著英雄的眼鏡。

我們的家已經被污染了…我們只是
稱為邪惡。  你能幫我們清理一下嗎？

如果你能撿起八件垃圾
這將是一個很大的幫助。

精靈：
祝英雄好運！

passages.name: Maze entrance ARG — Entrance elf moved — p2
passages.content:
Elf:
Oh great hero, you've collected \V[9] pieces
of trash out of 8.

Good luck!
passages.content_zh:
精靈：
哦偉大的英雄，你已經收集了\V[9]件
垃圾佔 8.

祝你好運！

passages.name: Maze entrance ARG — Entrance elf moved — p3
passages.content:
// Garden park progress:
0: Have not arrived
1: Arrived, saw intro cutscene.
2: Talked to priestess
3: Talked to person at maze entrance, received quest.
4: Beaten trash boss

// 5: Turned in trash quest, haven't talked to priestess
6: Talked to priestess, broke seal 1
7: Fought farm boss
8: Talked to priestess, broke seal 2
9: Opened forest by talking to guard

Elf:
Thank you for your help hero!

Our home should be safe now.

Please, take this as a token of our thanks.

Gained Magic Branch!

Now that the trash sprite is gone, it should
be easy for us to get rid of the rest of the
monsters in the maze.

Elf:
Thank you again for your help!
passages.content_zh:
// 花園公園進度：
0：尚未到達
1：到達，看到介紹過場動畫。
2：與女祭司交談
3：與迷宮入口處的人交談，收到任務。
4：擊敗垃圾老闆

// 5: 交了垃圾任務，還沒跟女祭司交談
6：與女祭司交談，打破封印1
7：與農場老闆戰鬥
8：與女祭司交談，打破封印2
9：透過與守衛交談打開森林

精靈：
感謝英雄的幫助！

我們的家現在應該安全了。

請將此作為我們的謝意。

獲得魔法枝！

現在垃圾精靈已經消失了，應該
我們可以輕易地擺脫其餘的
迷宮裡的怪物。

精靈：
再次感謝您的幫忙！

passages.name: Maze entrance ARG — Entrance elf moved — p4
passages.content:
Elf:
Welcome again Hero!

Now that the maze is cleaned up, we've been
able to capture the monsters in it.

We could release them back into the maze if
you wanted to get some practice.

We've released them into the maze, but we
could recapture them easily.

Enable random encounters in the hedge
maze?
passages.content_zh:
精靈：
再次歡迎英雄！

現在迷宮已經清理乾淨了，我們已經
能夠捕捉其中的怪物。

如果我們可以把他們放回迷宮
你想要練習一下。

我們已將他們釋放到迷宮中，但我們
可以輕鬆地奪回他們。

允許在樹籬中隨機遭遇
迷宮？

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 2
passages.content:
Welcome to Garden Park!

Today is Volunteer Day. Help keep the park
running!
passages.content_zh:
歡迎來到花園公園！

今天是志工日。幫助維護公園
跑！

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 2
passages.content:
An impossible tangle of dead branches and
weeds blocks the way.

A few small leaves have sprouted on some
of the branches.

There's a little more give in the branches, but
they're still too tightly entwined to remove.

No matter how much potion you pour, it
doesn't seem to help. It just soaks into the
ground.
passages.content_zh:
枯枝亂成一團，
雜草擋住了去路。

有的地方已經長出了幾片小葉子
的分支機構。

樹枝上還多了一點，但是
它們仍然糾纏得太緊而無法移除。

不管你倒多少藥水，
似乎沒有幫助。它只是浸入
地面。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 2 — Player Brad quest turn-in — p2
passages.content:
Player Brad:
Time to get a blessing, if you know what I
mean.
passages.content_zh:
球員布拉德：
是時候得到祝福了，如果你知道我什麼的話
意思是。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 2 — Player Brad quest turn-in — p3
passages.content:
Player Brad:
Did you see that? I got to stare at her tits the
whole time!

And she's barely even covering them now!

You both spend a moment staring. \.
The priestess smiles at you when she notices.

She glances down at her chest.

Player Brad:
With these tiny things? I *barely* count as
female.

She goes back to staring at the priestess.

Player Brad:
Now, *she's* a real woman.

She glances over at your chest.

Player Brad:
I see you're making a start on that yourself.
Nice.
passages.content_zh:
球員布拉德：
你看到了嗎？我必須盯著她的乳房
整個時間！

而她現在幾乎沒有遮蓋它們！

你們倆都凝視了一會兒。 \.
當女祭司注意到時，她會對你微笑。

她低頭看著自己的胸部。

球員布拉德：
就靠這些小東西？我*勉強*算作
女。

她又繼續盯著女祭司。

球員布拉德：
現在，*她*是個真正的女人。

她瞥了一眼你的胸部。

球員布拉德：
我看到你自己正在開始做這件事。
好的。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 2 — Rose — p2
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Did you feel that?
\C[5]Look, some of the flowers bloomed!

\C[30]That energy-
\C[5]-when everything grew?

\C[30]I felt it.
\C[5]I still feel it.

\C[30]That connection-
\C[5]That connection-

\C[30]We \C[5]can \C[30]feel \C[5]the \C[30]earth.
passages.content_zh:

passages.content:

\C[5]Oo yes, fertilizing!

\C[30]Ooo yes, so many seeds to be planted.

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Head Priestess — p1
passages.content:
// Garden park progress:
0: Have not arrived
1: Arrived, saw intro cutscene.
2: Talked to priestess
3: Talked to person at maze entrance, received quest.
4: Beaten trash boss

// 5: Turned in trash quest, haven't talked to priestess
6: Talked to priestess, broke seal 1
7: Saw farm boss cutscene
8: Fought farm boss
9: Talked to priestess, broke seal 2
10: Opened forest by talking to guard

Head Priestess:
Well.

That was intense.

Head Priestess:
We have managed to remove the first of the
three seals on the goddess's prison.

Already her power begins to flow out. Look,
it has started to rejuvenate this park.

I hear the voices of many animals crying out
in fear to the north. To undo the next seal, I
believe you will have to travel there and
sooth them.

Bring back a remnant of the problem and we
can use its power to break the next seal.

Thank you again for your help, O wonderful
Hero!
passages.content_zh:
// 花園公園進度：
0：尚未到達
1：到達，看到介紹過場動畫。
2：與女祭司交談
3：與迷宮入口處的人交談，收到任務。
4：擊敗垃圾老闆

// 5: 交了垃圾任務，還沒跟女祭司交談
6：與女祭司交談，打破封印1
7：看到農場老闆過場動畫
8：與農場老闆戰鬥
9：與女祭司交談，打破封印2
10：透過與守衛交談打開森林

女祭司長：
好吧。

那很激烈。

女祭司長：
我們已經成功刪除了第一個
女神監獄上的三道封印。

她的力量已經開始流失。看，
它已經開始讓這個公園煥發活力。

我聽到許多動物的呼喊聲
害怕到北方。為了解開下一個封印，我
相信你一定會去那裡旅行
安撫他們。

帶回問題的殘餘部分，我們
可以利用它的力量來打破下一個封印。

再次感謝您的幫助，哦，太棒了
英雄！

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Head Priestess — p2
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
Oh Hero, the Goddess is already helping heal
the world!
I'm so excited!

Let me heal your wounds before you go to
confront the evil to the north.
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
英雄啊，女神已經在幫忙治癒了
世界！
我太激動了！

在你去之前讓我治癒你的傷口
對抗北方的邪惡。

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Head Priestess — p3
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
Praise the Goddess! I sensed your defeat of
the evil to the north!

I can tell you carry its remnants with you.
Please, give it to me so we may become one
step closer to the Goddess's awakening.

Demon... something handed over.
Still dripping.

The head priestess takes it gingerly with the
tips of two fingers, wrinkling her nose.

Head Priestess:
Well. This is certainly an interesting choice of
bits to harvest.

She steels herself, then grabs it firmly with an
audible squelch. Her hand begins to glow.

Head Priestess:
The seal is released!

Head Priestess:
Praise Florauna!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
讚美女神！我感覺到你的失敗
邪惡到北方了！

我可以告訴你，你隨身攜帶它的殘餘物。
請把它給我，這樣我們就可以成為一體
距離女神的覺醒又更近了一步。

惡魔……交出了東西。
還在滴水。

女祭司長小心翼翼地拿著它
兩個手指尖，皺起她的鼻子。

女祭司長：
好吧。這當然是個有趣的選擇
收穫的碎片。

她堅強起來，然後用力抓住它
可聽見的靜噪。她的手開始發光。

女祭司長：
封印解除了！

女祭司長：
讚美弗勞娜！

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Junior Priestess — p1
passages.content:
Junior Priestess:
I can feel the goddess's energy flow through
me!

It feels \{so good!\}

Junior Priestess:
*Looks down at herself*
Praise be to Florauna!
passages.content_zh:
初級女祭司：
我能感覺到女神的能量流過
我！

感觉\{真好！ \}

初級女祭司：
*低头看着自己*
赞美弗洛劳纳！

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Junior Priestess — p2
passages.content:
Junior Priestess:
*Looks down at herself*
Now this is why I worship the goddess. <3

Would you like to buy some equipment?

*低頭看著自己*
這就是我崇拜女神的原因。 <3

您想購買一些設備嗎？

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 2 — Junior Priestess — p3
passages.content:
Brad and the junior priestess are talking.

Junior Priestess:
You have proven yourself to the Goddess,
Hero. \.\.
Step forward and gain her blessing.

It is weak for now, but every great deed you
do will make it grow. \.\.\.
In time it will be everything you desire and
more.

He steps forward, eyes fixed firmly on her

She raises her hands and rests them just
above his shoulders.

Junior Priestess:
Oh Goddess Florauna, please bless this worthy
hero.

Her hands begin to glow the soft green of
spring leaves.\.\.
The glow spreads to cover Brad's body.

As you watch, Brad's body almost seems to
deflate. It's odd to watch. \.
He's shrinking in all directions, but not
evenly.

His hips, for example, are staying almost the
same. But his waist is rapidly shrinking, while
his chest is deflating more slowly. It's leaving
him with a much curvier figure than before.

This is happening all over his body. His face is
rounding inwards while his eyes and lips stay
the same, looking much bigger proportionally.

His chest is shrinking too, but his nipples are
staying in the same place, dragging two small
mounds out behind them as the rest of his
chest recedes.

It's an odd sight. It's like Brad was a balloon
blown up into the shape of a man, but hiding
a figurine of a woman inside.

Now the air is leaking out, letting the balloon
deflate to take the shape of the feminine
structure underneath.

His clothes would be much too big for him, as
he loses inches and pounds. But they're
shrinking as well.

They lose a lot of fabric, baring a lot of the
new woman's body and clinging to her figure.

As Brad is growing smaller almost
everywhere, the priestess is growing. \.
It's almost like the mass Brad is losing is
moving to her.

But unlike Brad, she's only growing in one
place. \.\.
Her chest.

You can see the two sides of her robe start to
spread farther and farther apart as her breasts
grow too larger for even its generous size to
contain.

Finally they slip fully
passages.content_zh:
布萊德和初級女祭司正在交談。

初級女祭司：
你已經向女神證明了自己
英雄。 \.\.
向前邁出一步，獲得她的祝福。

現在還很弱，但你的每一個偉大行為
做會讓它成長。 \.\.\.
到時候它就會變成你想要的一切
更多。

他向前一步，目光牢牢地盯著她
大量解理。 \.
她舉起雙手並休息一下
在他的肩膀上方。

初級女祭司：
噢女神芙羅娜，請保佑這個值得的人
英雄。

她的雙手開始發出柔和的綠色光芒
春葉.\.\.
光芒蔓延覆蓋布拉德的身體。

當你看的時候，布拉德的身體幾乎就像
放氣。看起來很奇怪。 \.
他向各個方向縮小，但沒有
均勻。

例如，他的臀部幾乎保持在
一樣。但他的腰圍正在迅速縮小，同時
他的胸口癟得更慢了。它要離開了
他的身材比以前更有曲線。

他的全身都在發生這種情況。他的臉是
向內轉，眼睛和嘴唇保持不動
一樣的，按比例看起來大很多。

他的胸部也在縮小，但他的乳頭變小了
待在同一個地方，拖著兩個小
和他的其他人一樣在他們身後堆積起來
胸部後退。

這是一個奇怪的景象。就像布拉德是一個氣球
被炸成一個人的形狀，但隱藏起來
裡面有一個女人的雕像。

現在空氣洩漏了，讓氣球
放氣以呈現女性化的形狀
下面的結構。

他的衣服對他來說太大了，因為
他減掉了幾英寸和幾磅。但他們是
也在萎縮。

他們失去了很多布料，露出了很多
新女人的身體並緊貼著她的身材。

隨著布拉德幾乎變得越來越小
到處，女祭司都在成長。 \.
布拉德正在失去的質量幾乎是
向她移動。

但與布拉德不同的是，她只在其中一個方面成長
地方。 \.\.
她的胸部。

你可以看到她長袍的兩側開始
隨著她的乳房越來越遠
即使它的尺寸夠大，也變得太大了
包含。

最後他們完全滑倒了

sidles up to the priestess.

:

passages.content:
Player SocraticMachine:
Well then.

I have retrieved the twelve Sacred Boughs,

Elf Priestess:
Yes brave hero!

Player SocraticMachine:
So far this is just a light show.

You watch as his hair suddenly begins to
shift color, slowly lightening to blond. His ears
begin to lengthen into points.

Player SocraticMachine:
I could see this in any game. Better quality,
too.

His hat curls itself up into a narrow hairband
as his newly blond hair begins to lengthen
and curl past his shoulders.

The rest of his clothes are following suit. The
sleeves of his jacket pull off at the shoulders,
crawling down his arms and forming long
gloves.

His pants split horizontally. The bottom half
shrinks down a few inches, forming long
white stockings.

The legs of the top half merge together into a
skirt, shifting to a nice forest green as they go.

Player SocraticMachine:
Animated music notes? Really?

I can already tell that you're chanting.

And those notes were pixelated. Really, where
did your graphical budget go?

His shirt splits apart again, this time along the
top of his chest.  The top portion begins to
wrap itself around his neck, forming a long
scarf that waves behind his now-golden hair.

The bottom portion shrinks to a narrow band
around his chest, then begins to stretch
outward as his chest rapidly expands into a
generous pair of breasts.

Player SocraticMachine:
More stock effects. This had better give me an
impressive stat boost, because I am otherwise
very unimpressed.

My followers will be duly informed of all the
flaws of your game, you may be certain.

As he speaks, his breasts continue to swell,
stretching out the front of his now-tiny shirt.

His skirt begins to grow shorter and shorter,
growing more transparent as
passages.content_zh:
玩家蘇格拉底機器：

他的帽子捲曲成一條窄髮帶

他的褲子水平裂開。下半部

上半部的腿合併成一個

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
動畫音符？真的嗎？

我已經知道你在念誦。

這些筆記都是像素化的。真的，哪裡

他的襯衫再次裂開，這次是沿著

底部收縮成窄帶
圍繞他的胸部，然後開始伸展

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
更多股票效應。這最好給我一個
令人印象深刻的統計提升，因為我在其他方面
非常不為所動。

我的追隨者將及時告知所有
你的遊戲有缺陷，你可以肯定。

說著說著，他的胸脯不斷的隆起，

他的裙子開始變得越來越短，

左邊：“For Thee Cayre Of Thee Skynne”
右邊：「讓你的肌肉膨脹
威斯活力”

您快速瀏覽一下兩者。

passages.name: Elf houses ARG — Alchemy
passages.content:
Looks like a set of equipment for making
potions. Lots of weird glassware and burners.

There's a sign on the equipment:
ALCHEMISTS ONLY
WE MEAN IT

It looks like there's a little bit of ingredients
still in bowls around the equipment. Want to
try to make something?
passages.content_zh:
看起來像是一套製作設備
藥水。很多奇怪的玻璃器皿和燃燒器。

設備上有一個標誌：
僅限煉金術士
我們是認真的

貌似還有一點成分
仍在設備周圍的碗中。想要
嘗試做點什麼？

passages.name: Elf houses ARG — Elina alchemy — p1
passages.content:
:
Have you done much alchemy? It looks like
this is a well-stocked setup.

It's not using the ingredients I'm used to, but
if you can find me a recipe then I should be
able to make something.

Make sure it's something you want. I think
there's only enough stuff here to make one
potion.

Looks like the only thing missing from the
supplies is an apple. Fortunately we've got
one on hand.

She spends a minute tinkering with the
equipment.

:
There we go!
*She holds out a bubbling pink flask to you*

Your hand of course passes through the flask.
When it does, the flask bursts, flinging a mass
of pink goo right at your face.

Nothing hits you, of course. But you still feel
like a thin coating of something is on your
face. Something that won't come off no matter
how hard you rub.

Your face feels a little odd too.

:
That's interesting. I wish I had more supplies;
I could see if it would do that again.

I've got everything here except an apple.
Something about "applying the blush of the
apple to your rosy cheeks."

Let's see if we can find one somewhere.

The only thing not here is a watermelon, the
"most vigorous of fruits".  Good thing we
have one with us.

She spends a minute tinkering with the
equipment.

:
There we go!

She pulls a bottle out from some sort of
funnel. As soon as its mouth is clear, it starts
putting out a thick red smoke.

:
Don't worry, I'm pretty sure it's supposed to
do that.

You barely feel a sweet scent in the air. It's
so faint you might just be imagining it. But as
you try to see through the smoke, you do feel
a warmth in your muscles.

ATK +2!
DEF +2!

You feel a warmth in your chest as some other
things swell with vigor too.\!
Oops.

The smoke clears.

I've got everything here except a watermelon.
Says it "needs the vigor of the strongest of
fruits."

I'm happy to try later.
passages.content_zh:
:
你練過很多煉金術嗎？看起來像
這是一個庫存充足的設定。

它沒有使用我習慣的成分，但是
如果你能為我找到一個食譜那麼我應該
能夠做某事。

確保這是您想要的東西。我認為
這裡的東西只夠做一個
藥水。

看起來唯一缺少的東西
用品是一個蘋果。幸運的是我們有
手頭上有一份。

她花了一分鐘修補
設備。

:
我們開始吧！
*她向你遞出一個冒泡的粉紅色燒瓶*

你的手當然會穿過燒瓶。
當它發生時，燒瓶會破裂，拋出大量物質
粉紅色的黏液就在你的臉上。

當然，沒有什麼會打到你。但你還是覺得
就像你身上有一層薄薄的東西
臉。無論如何都不會脫落的東西
你擦得有多用力。

你的臉也覺得有點奇怪。

：
那很有意思。我希望我有更多的物資；
我可以看看它是否會再次這樣做。

我這裡什麼都有，除了蘋果。
關於「塗抹腮紅」的事情
蘋果給你紅潤的臉頰。 」

讓我們看看是否能在某個地方找到一個。

這裡唯一沒有的是西瓜
「最有生命力的水果」。  還好我們
和我們一起擁有一份。

她花了一分鐘修補
設備。

:
我們開始吧！

她從某種東西裡拿出一個瓶子
漏斗。嘴巴一清清楚楚就開始了
冒出濃濃的紅色煙霧。

:
別擔心，我很確定它應該是
這樣做。

你幾乎感覺不到空氣中瀰漫著甜甜的氣味。這是
如此微弱，你可能只是想像而已。但作為
你試圖透過煙霧看清，你確實感覺到
肌肉中的溫暖。

攻擊力+2！
防禦+2！

你和其他人一樣感到胸口溫暖
事物也蓬勃發展。 \！
哎呀。

煙霧散去。

除了西瓜，我這裡什麼都有。
說它「需要最強大的力量
水果。 」

我很高興稍後再試。

passages.name: Elf houses ARG — Elina alchemy — p2
passages.content:
:
Any luck finding those ingredients?

Looks like the only thing missing from the
supplies is an apple. Fortunately we've got
one on hand.

She spends a minute tinkering with the
equipment.

:
There we go!
*She holds out a bubbling pink flask to you*

Your hand of course passes through the flask.
When it does, the flask bursts, flinging a mass
of pink goo right at your face.

Nothing hits you, of course. But you still feel
like a thin coating of something is on your
face. Something that won't come off no matter
how hard you rub.

:
That's interesting. I wish I had more supplies;
I could see if it would do that again.

I've got everything here except an apple.
Something about "applying the blush of the
apple to your rosy cheeks."

Let's see if we can find one somewhere.

The only thing not here is a watermelon, the
"most vigorous of fruits".  Good thing we
have one with us.

She spends a minute tinkering with the
equipment.

:
There we go!

She pulls a bottle out from some sort of
funnel. As soon as its mouth is clear, it starts
putting out a thick red smoke.

:
Don't worry, I'm pretty sure it's supposed to
do that.

You barely feel a sweet scent in the air. It's
so faint you might just be imagining it. But as
you try to see through the smoke, you do feel
a warmth in your muscles.

ATK +2!
DEF +2!

The smoke clears.

I've got everything here except a watermelon.
Says it "needs the vigor of the strongest of
fruits."

I'm happy to try later.
passages.content_zh:
:
找到這些成分有運氣嗎？

看起來唯一缺少的東西
用品是一個蘋果。幸運的是我們有
手頭上有一份。

她花了一分鐘修補
設備。

:

我這裡什麼都有，除了蘋果。
關於「塗抹腮紅」的事情
蘋果給你紅潤的臉頰。 」

設備。

:
我們開始吧！

她從某種東西裡拿出一個瓶子

:

你幾乎感覺不到空氣中瀰漫著甜甜的氣味。這是
如此微弱，你可能只是想像而已。但作為
你試圖透過煙霧看清，你確實感覺到
肌肉中的溫暖。

攻擊力+2！
防禦+2！

煙霧散去。

除了西瓜，我這裡什麼都有。
說它「需要最強大的力量
水果。 」

我很高興稍後再試。

passages.name: Elf houses ARG — Elina alchemy — p3
passages.content:
:
That was fascinating.

I've never worked with powdered succubus
horn before.
passages.content_zh:
:
那真是令人著迷。

我從來沒有和魅魔粉一起工作過
之前的喇叭。

passages.name: Elf houses ARG — Elf Priestess — p1
passages.content:
Elf Priestess:
It's so wonderful to welcome another sister.

Elf Priestess:
I just wish I could touch her. Then I could
show her some of the true joys of the elves.
passages.content_zh:
精靈女祭司：
歡迎另一位姊妹真是太好了。

精靈女祭司：
我只希望我能觸碰她。然後我就可以
向她展示精靈的一些真正的樂趣。

passages.name: Elf houses ARG — p1
passages.content: 50\G were found!
passages.content_zh: 找到50\G！

passages.name: Farm ARG — Volunteer Kitty — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Kitty:
This is great!

I can carry so much more this way!

And maybe people will finally stop making
jokes about my name!

Farm Volunteer Kitty:
Though I should probably find a shirt that fits.

I don't think this one survived the change.
passages.content_zh:
農場志工小貓：
這太棒了！

這樣我可以攜帶更多東西！

也許人們最終會停止製造
關於我的名字的笑話！

農場志工小貓：
不過我應該要找到一件合適的襯衫。

我不認為這個能在這變化中倖存下來。

passages.name: Farm ARG — Cat volunteer — p3
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Aww, who's a good kitty.

You're a good kitty!

She stops petting the cat for a moment and
tentatively reaches up. \.
She carefully gives herself a few scratches
around her cat ears.

Farm Volunteer:
You're such a good kitty!

Oh!\.
That's why cats like it so much!
passages.content_zh:
農場志工：
哇，誰是一隻好貓。

你是一隻好貓！

她暫時停止撫摸貓
試探性地伸手。 \.
她小心翼翼地在自己身上劃了幾處刮痕
在她的貓耳朵周圍。

農場志工：
你真是一隻好貓！

哦！ \。
這就是為什麼貓這麼喜歡它！

passages.name: Farm ARG — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
Hay ho, hay ho, it's off to work we go.
passages.content_zh:
農場志工：
嘿嘿，嘿嘿，我們去上班吧。

passages.name: Farm ARG — Minotaur — p1
passages.content:
bends over the body of the
demon.

:
This should be what the priestess needs.

She reaches down and pulls out... something.
It's just a blurry mass of censored pixels.

It's dripping.

Demon... something acquired!
passages.content_zh:
彎過身體
惡魔。

:
這應該就是女祭司所需要的。

她彎下腰，拿出……某樣東西。
它只是一團經過審查的模糊像素。

正在滴水。

惡魔……獲得的東西！

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shrine maiden — p1
passages.content:
Priestess:
Thank the Goddess you're here! A terrible
monster has awoken on the farm!

It's terrorizing the animals. And the guardian
spirits that protect the farm have fled for their
lives.

You must find your way into the pen here and
defeat it!

And you can shut up! You're just fodder for
the hero!

You heard me.
passages.content_zh:
女祭司：
感謝女神你來了！一個可怕的
農場裡的怪物甦醒了！

這是在恐嚇動物。還有守護者
保護農場的神靈已經逃往他們的家園了
生活。

你必須找到進入這裡的圍欄的路
打敗它！

你可以閉嘴了！你只是飼料
英雄！

你聽到了。

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shrine maiden — p2
passages.content:
Priestess:
Please, destroy this evil. It's terrorizing the
animals of the farm.

Priestess:
Also, it's just a massive jerk.
passages.content_zh:
女祭司：
請消滅這個邪惡。它正在恐嚇
農場的動物。

女祭司：
而且，這只是一個巨大的混蛋。

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shrine maiden — p3
passages.content:
Priestess:
You defeated the monster! You should let the
head priestess know.

This will help the farm recover.

But it frightened away the animal spirits that
protect the farm.  Things won't truly be back
to normal until the four of them are found.

Please keep an eye out for them while you
explore! They must be somewhere else in
the park.

They are:
The Cow Mother
The Great Mare
The Star Ewe

And Bubbles the Perfectly Adequate Cat.

The Cow Mother finds the sound of moving
water very soothing. She's probably near
something that makes water move.

I have the feeling she's ready to be caught
now!

She's a very good hider though. You may
need to let some time pass for her to be
reachable.

The Great Mare should be a goat. Somehow
she keeps getting into high places.\!
We don't know how either.

She may need something to help her trust
you. She's very into food.

The Star Ewe is always getting lost. Maybe if
you found a place where it was easy to get
lost you'd be able to find her there?

And Bubbles...\!
I hope Bubbles is okay.\!
Sometimes mean fairies come by and try to
bully her!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司：
你打敗了怪物！你應該讓
女祭司長知道。

這將有助於農場恢復。

但它嚇跑了動物精神
保護農場。  事情不會真正回來
直到找到四人為止。

請在您使用時留意他們
探索！他們一定在其他地方
公園。

他們是：
牛媽媽
偉大的母馬
明星母羊

和泡泡貓完全足夠了。

牛媽媽發現了移動的聲音
水非常舒緩。她大概就在附近
使水流動的東西。

我有預感她已經準備好被抓住了
現在！

不過她是一個非常好的隱藏者。你可以
需要給她一些時間
可達。

大母馬應該是一隻山羊。不知何故
她不斷登上高位。 \!
我們也不知道該怎麼辦。

她可能需要一些東西來增強她的信任
你。她非常喜歡食物。

星母羊總是迷路。也許如果
你找到了一個很容易到達的地方
迷路了你能在那裡找到她嗎？

還有泡泡...\！
希望泡泡沒事。 \!
有時卑鄙的仙女會過來並試圖
欺負她！

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shrine maiden — p4
passages.content:
Priestess:
There are four animal spirits that guard this
farm.

They are:
The Cow Mother
The Great Mare
The Star Ewe

And Bubbles the Perfectly Adequate Cat.

The Cow Mother has returned to bless us with
her bounty once again.

The cows' udders still run dry for want of the
Cow Mother.

She finds the sound of moving water very
soothing. She's probably near something that
makes water move.

I have the feeling she's ready to be caught
now!

She's a very good hider though. You may
need to let some time pass for her to be
reachable.

The Great Mare runs freely through the fields
again.

The horses still cry out for the Great Mare.

She's practically a goat. Somehow she keeps
getting into high places.\!
We don't know how either.

She may need something to help her trust
you. She's very into food.

The Star Ewe leads the sheep once more.

The sheep still wander alone without the light
of the Star Ewe.

The Star Ewe is always getting lost. Maybe if
you found a place where it was easy to get
lost you'd be able to find her there?

And Bubbles is back and just the cutest. Who's
a cute little kitty face? You are!

And Bubbles is still lost. What a silly kitty!

I hope she's okay.\!
Sometimes mean fairies come by and try to
bully her!

Priestess:
You've found all the animal spirits!
Thank you !

I can feel their power flowing through the farm
again!

Everything will be much better now. Thank
you again!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司：
有四種動物精神守護著這個
農場。

他們是：
牛媽媽
偉大的母馬
明星母羊

和泡泡貓完全足夠了。

牛媽媽回來祝福我們了
她的賞金再次出現。

乳牛的乳房仍然乾涸，因為缺乏
牛媽媽。

她覺得流水的聲音非常好聽
舒緩。她可能正在接近某個東西
使水移動。

我有預感她已經準備好被抓住了
現在！

不過她是一個非常好的隱藏者。你可以
需要給她一些時間
可達。

大母馬在田裡自由奔跑
再次。

馬匹仍在呼喚偉大的母馬。

她其實是一隻山羊。不知怎的，她一直
進入高位。 \!
我們也不知道該怎麼辦。

她可能需要一些東西來增強她的信任
你。她非常喜歡食物。

明星母羊再次帶領羊群。

羊群依然在沒有燈光的情況下獨自徘徊
星母羊的。

星母羊總是迷路。也許如果
你找到了一個很容易到達的地方
迷路了你能在那裡找到她嗎？

泡泡回來了，而且是最可愛的。誰的
可愛的小貓臉？你是！

而泡泡仍然迷失了方向。多麼愚蠢的小貓啊！

我希望她沒事。 \!
有時卑鄙的仙女會過來並試圖
欺負她！

女祭司：
你已經找到所有的動物靈魂了！
謝謝 ！

我能感覺到他們的力量流經農場
又來了！

現在一切都會好得多。謝謝
又是你！

passages.name: Farm ARG — Shrine maiden — p5
passages.content:
Priestess:
The farm is running so much better now that
you've fixed all our problems!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司：
現在農場經營得好多了
你已經解決了我們所有的問題！

passages.name: Farm ARG — Bubbles — p2
passages.content:
This is the most adequate cat you've ever
seen. \.

It's staggering.

Shrine Maiden:
Awwww, you're such an okay kitty!
passages.content_zh:
這是你養過的最適合的貓
看到了。 \.

真是令人震驚。

聖女：
哇哦，你真是一隻好貓！

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal return and autorun — p2
passages.content:
You enter the farm to find the animal control
head sprawled on the ground, covered in hoof
marks.

Animal Control Boss:
Ugh...\!
No fair!

Something happened again? Does that mean-

Ah.\. Yes it does.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Oh nyo! \n[10]!\!
These brave warriors, wounded again!

Sometimes the pursuit of lovely justice
requires so much pain.\!
But not while we're here, nya!

She turns to you.

Pursuant to our early agreement, I'm enlisting
your help to heal these brave warriors!

\n[4]:
Hmm...

She pulls out a thick sheaf of notes and looks
through them.

\n[4]:
Okay, I'll allow it.\!
No further payments in either direction, though.

Lovely Warrior of Love and Justice:
Great!\!
Now, remember the dance!

She leads you through it again, jiggling and
shaking.\!
Though she's slowed down a lot by the end.

Thankfully the animal control boss is too
distracted to notice, though Daisy is giving
you some weird looks.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Magical Lovely *pant* Love Power!

She throws out her hands, then sits down
breathing heavily.

You follow.\!
A wave of power washes out of you.

...And then sputters and dies.\!
At least it got far enough to touch the animal
control boss.

Her wounds once more fade away in front of
your eyes.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Oh,\. uh,\. *pant* this is embarrassing, nya.

She takes a moment to try to catch her breath.

\}I knew I should have practiced more...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
I *pant* can't do another one of those for a
while, but these warriors still need our help...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
I knyow!\!
\n[10]!

I see you already possess the power of
healing!\!
If I just...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Nyo, not quite...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Just a little more...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
There!

Potion skill upgraded!

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Nyow you just need to use that on the poor
warriors!

I can sense four of them across the farm,
passages.content_zh:
你進入農場找到動物管制中心
頭趴在地上，被蹄覆蓋
標記。

動物管制主管：
呃...\！
不公平！

又出什麼事了？這是否意味著——

啊。 \.是的，確實如此。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
喔喲！ \n[10]!\!
這些勇敢的戰士，再次受傷！

有時追求可愛的正義
需要這麼多的痛苦。 \！
但我們在這裡的時候就不行了，尼亞！

她轉向你。

根據我們早期的協議，我入伍
你的幫助治癒了這些勇敢的戰士！

\n[4]:
嗯...

她拿出一疊厚厚的紙條，看起來
透過他們。

\n[4]:
好吧，我就允許了。 \!
不過，這兩個方向都沒有進一步的付款。

愛與正義的可愛戰士：
太棒了！ \!
現在，記住舞蹈！

她會再次引導你完成它，搖晃著
顫抖。 \!
儘管到最後她的速度已經慢了很多。

值得慶幸的是動物管制中心的老闆也是
儘管黛西正在給予，但她卻分心了
你看起來有些奇怪。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
神奇可愛*褲子*愛的力量！

她伸出雙手，然後坐下
呼吸粗重。

你跟著。 \!
一股力量從你身上沖走。

……然後濺射而死。 \！
至少它已經夠遠，可以觸摸到動物了
控制老闆。

她的傷口再次在眼前消退
你的眼睛。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
哦，\.呃，\. *氣喘吁籲*這太尷尬了，nya。

她花了一點時間試著平復呼吸。

\}我知道我應該多練習...

愛與正義的可愛精神：
我*喘氣*不能再做其中一個了
雖然，但是這些戰士仍然需要我們的幫助...

愛與正義的可愛精神：
我知道！ \！
\n[10]！

我看你已經擁有這樣的力量
治癒！ \！
如果我只是...

愛與正義的可愛精神：
尼奧，不太...

愛與正義的可愛精神：
再多一點...

愛與正義的可愛精神：
在那裡！

藥劑技能升級！

愛與正義的可愛精神：
現在你只需要把它用在窮人身上
勇士們！

我能感覺到農場對面有四個人

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal return and autorun — p4
passages.content:
Great Mare leapt out of your inventory and
galloped out into the farm!

You see a wave of light wash over the farm
as the Great Mare's power returns.
passages.content_zh:
偉大的母馬從你的庫存中跳出來，
馳騁進了農場！

你看到一波光波籠罩著農場
當偉大母馬的力量回歸時。

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal return and autorun — p5
passages.content:
The Star Ewe ambles out of your inventory.

The farm sparkles for a moment as its power
returns.
passages.content_zh:
明星母羊從你的庫存中緩慢地走出來。

農場因其力量而短暫閃耀
返回。

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal return and autorun — p6
passages.content:
The Cow Mother walks out of your inventory.

She pauses for a moment in front of you, as
if in thanks.

The farm sparkles for a moment as its power
returns.
passages.content_zh:
牛媽媽從你的庫存中走出。

她在你面前停頓了一會兒，
如果在謝謝。

農場因其力量而短暫閃耀
返回。

passages.name: Farm ARG — Animal return and autorun — p7
passages.content:
Bubbles jumps down from your inventory.

Then settles down for a nice nap.

Shrine Maiden:
\{Bubbles!

You hear the shrine maiden's voice fade off
into the distance.

Shrine Maiden:
Who's a good \}kitty? You're a good kitty! Such
a \}good kitty!

The farm sparkles for a moment as Bubble's
power returns.
passages.content_zh:
氣泡從你的庫存中跳下來。

然後坐下來美美地睡個午覺。

聖女：
\{泡泡！

你聽到巫女的聲音漸漸消失
到遠方。

聖女：
誰是好貓\}？你是一隻好貓！這樣的
\}好小貓！

農場像泡泡一樣閃閃發光
電力恢復。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 3 — Bored volunteer — p1
passages.content:
Bored Volunteer:
How much longer do I have to be here?

If I have to keep sitting here much longer I'm
going to grow roots.

Bored Volunteer:
Told you so.
passages.content_zh:
無聊的志工：
我還要在這裡待多久？

如果我必須繼續坐在這裡更長我
將會生根發芽。

無聊的志工：
告訴過你了。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 3 — Bored volunteer — p2
passages.content:
Bored Volunteer:
I guess this was *slightly* interesting.

And this tree is a lot comfier than that bench.

So won't you buy something?

That would be interesting too.
passages.content_zh:
無聊的志工：
我想這「有點」有趣。

這棵樹比那張長椅舒服多了。

那你不買點東西嗎？

那也會很有趣。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 3
passages.content:
More of the branches have sprouted leaves.
A few have pulled out of the tangle, but many
still block the way.

Everything is still too tangled to remove, but
it feels like it's getting better.

Just a little more improvement should be
enough to pull them apart.

No matter how much potion you pour, it
doesn't seem to help. It just soaks into the
ground.
passages.content_zh:
更多的樹枝已經長出了葉子。
有些人已經擺脫了困境，但許多人
仍然擋路。

一切仍然糾纏不清，無法清除，但是
感覺好像越來越好了。

應該再多一點改進
足以將他們分開。

不管你倒多少藥水，
似乎沒有幫助。它只是浸入
地面。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 3 — Rose — p2
passages.content:
You overhear Rose and Lily talking to each
other.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]She's really cute...
\C[5]And so eager!

\C[5]I'd love to give her a taste of my nectar.
\C[30]And I think butterflies are supposed to
have really long tongues...

You overhear Rose and Lily talking to each
other.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]We were just talking about a threesome
and now we're looking for what, a foursome?
Fivesome?

\C[5]Ooo, that does sound good. Have you
gotten a reply yet?
\C[30]Still waiting.
passages.content_zh:
你無意中聽到羅絲和莉莉互相交談
其他。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]她真的很可愛...
\C[5]而且非常渴望！

\C[5]我很想讓她嚐嚐我的花蜜。
\C[30]我認為蝴蝶應該
舌頭真的很長...

你無意中聽到羅絲和莉莉互相交談
其他。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]我們只是在談論三人行
現在我們要找什麼，四人組？
五人組？

\C[5]哦，聽起來不錯。有你嗎
收到回覆了嗎？
\C[30]仍在等待。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 3 — Butterfly — p2
passages.content:
You see the butterfly girl hovering nervously
in front of Rose and Lily.

\C[20]Orchard Guard(?):
You... you smell amazing...

She blushes.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Aww, thank you.
\C[5]You're pretty cute yourself!

\C[30]I'm Rose.
\C[5]And I'm Lily!
\C[30]What's your name?
\C[5]I don't think we've seen you around.

\C[20]Honey:
You... You can call me Honey...

Honey is casting shy glances at the pool of
nectar the two flower girls are standing in.

\C[20]Honey:
Do... Do you think I could try some of your
nectar?

\C[20]It just smells so wonderful. You smell
so wonderful.

Lily and Rose trade glances.  And smiles.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]I think we'd love to share it with you.
\C[5]We have some people to check with
first!

\C[30]But I think the answer is going to be
yes.
passages.content_zh:
你看蝴蝶女孩緊張地盤旋
在羅絲和莉莉面前。

\C[20]果園守衛(?):
你……你聞起來好香……

她臉紅了。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]哇，謝謝。
\C[5]你自己也很可愛！

\C[30]我是羅斯。
\C[5]我是莉莉！
\C[30]你叫什麼名字？
\C[5]我想我們沒見過你。

\C[20]親愛的：
你……你可以叫我親愛的……

蜜糖害羞地看了一下池子
兩個花童站在花蜜裡。

\C[20]親愛的：
你覺得我可以嘗試你的嗎
花蜜？

\C[20]聞起來真是太棒了。你聞到
太棒了。

莉莉和羅絲交換了眼神。  並微笑。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]我想我們很樂意與您分享。
\C[5]我們有一些人需要核實
首先！

\C[30]但我認為答案是
是的。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 3 — Orchard guard — p1
passages.content:
Sorry, the orchard is currently closed.

We're- \^

He pauses and looks around.

Do you smell that?

His eyes widen, then widen further,
growing larger and larger in his face.

His irises shift to a bright gold, then
begin to grow as well, flooding his larger
eyes with a uniform color.

He gives a quick shake to his head. When
he raises it again, his moustache has
completely vanished. A second time, and
his hair has grown shoulder length.

A third, and you see the roots grow pale
green and then flood out to color the rest of
his hair.

He winces, and with an almost audible
*pop* you see two long thin antenna
leap out of his forehead.

Whoa… \C[6]suddenly fee\C[17]ling dizzy…

He puts out a hand for support to the
nearby tree, not noticing it slim down as
he reaches. He also doesn’t notice it turn
pale orange, or the thin layer of chitin.

Another moment, and he reaches out
another hand for more support. One of
the pair that’s just sprouted from his
shoulders.

He rubs his eyes with the top arm on the
other side. It looks like something is
bugging him but he can’t put any of his
new abundance of fingers on it.

\C[17]Something \C[14]feels \C[21]strange…

He doesn’t seem to notice his voice
shifting pitch to a more feminine
register.

You can tell something is going on with
his body, but it’s hidden beneath his
clothes.

Until his clothes suddenly start shrinking
down into a tiny top and some tight
black shorts, revealing his new slim
feminine body.

Slim, but with a nice pair of breasts.
Though next to the priestesses they look
like nothing.

\C[21]Something really \C[20]itches…

The newly-formed woman reaches over
 her head with her top pair of arms and
 starts scratching frantically at her back.

With surprising speed, butterfly wings
burst from her back, growing until
each one is nearly as large as her body.

She gives them an experimental flap,
actually lifting her a few inches off the
ground for a moment.

\C[20]I’m… feeling better?

She does another l
passages.content_zh:
抱歉，果園目前已關閉。

我們是-\^

他停下來環顧四周。

你聞到了嗎？

他的眼睛睜大，然後睜得更大，
他的臉越來越大。

他的虹膜變成了明亮的金色，然後
也開始生長，淹沒了他更大的
眼睛顏色均勻。

他快速搖頭。當
他再次舉起它，他的鬍子已經
完全消失了。第二次，並且
他的頭髮已長及肩。

第三次，你會看到根部變得蒼白
綠色，然後泛出以給其餘部分上色
他的頭髮。

他皺起眉頭，幾乎可以聽見
*流行*你看到兩支又長又細的天線
從他的額頭上跳了出來。

哇…\C[6]突然費了\C[17]頭暈…

他伸出手來支持
附近的樹，沒有註意到它瘦下來了
他到達了。他也沒有註意到它的轉變
淡橙色，或薄薄的幾丁質層。

又過了一會兒，他伸出手來
另一隻手尋求更多支持。其中之一
剛從他身上萌芽的那對
肩膀。

他用上面的手臂揉了揉眼睛
另一邊。看起來好像有東西
打擾他，但他不能把他的任何
新的大量手指放在上面。

\C[17]有些東西\C[14]感覺\C[21]很奇怪…

他似乎沒有註意到自己的聲音
將音調改為更女性化
註冊。

你可以看出有什麼事發生了
他的身體，但它隱藏在他的下面
衣服。

直到他的衣服突然開始縮水
向下進入一個小頂部，有些緊
黑色短褲，露出他的新修身
女性的身體。

身材苗條，但有一雙漂亮的乳房。
儘管在女祭司旁邊，她們看起來
就像什麼都沒有一樣。

\C[21]真的有東西\C[20]很癢…

新形成的女人伸手過來
 她的頭和她上面的一對手臂
 開始瘋狂地抓她的背。

蝴蝶翅膀以驚人的速度
從她的背上爆發出來，不斷增長，直到
每一個都幾乎和她的身體一樣大。

她給了他們一個實驗皮瓣，
實際上把她舉離了幾英寸
接地一會兒。

\C[20]我…感覺好多了？

她又做了一次

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 3 — Orchard guard — p2
passages.content:
Orchard Guard(?):
\C[20]Hey, do you smell that?

\C[20]Something smells *amazing*.

\C[20]I think it's coming from over there...
passages.content_zh:
果園守衛（？）：
\C[20]嘿，你聞到了嗎？

\C[20]有些東西聞起來*令人驚奇*。

\C[20]我認為它來自那邊......

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Junior Priestess — p3
passages.content:
Junior Priestess:
Welcome Hero!

The tales of your deeds are spreading
throughout the park.\.
I eagerly await your revival of Florauna!

Let me show you our equipment.
passages.content_zh:
初級女祭司：
歡迎英雄！

你的事蹟正在流傳
整個公園。 \.
我熱切地等待著你讓 Florauna 復活！

讓我給你展示一下我們的設備。

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Head Priestess — p1
passages.content:
// Garden park progress:
0: Have not arrived
1: Arrived, saw intro cutscene.
2: Talked to priestess
3: Talked to person at maze entrance, received quest.
4: Beaten trash boss

// 5: Turned in trash quest, haven't talked to priestess
6: Talked to priestess, broke seal 1
7: Saw farm boss cutscene
8: Fought farm boss
9: Talked to priestess, broke seal 2
10: Opened forest by talking to guard

Head Priestess:
*Smiles*
The goddess is only one step away from
awakening, hero!

To break the final seal, you must travel to the
west.  There I sense a monster growing. fierce
of form and sweet and delicious of flesh.

You must slay this monster and finally free this
park of the darkness that threatens it.
passages.content_zh:
// 花園公園進度：
0：尚未到達
1：到達，看到介紹過場動畫。
2：與女祭司交談
3：與迷宮入口處的人交談，收到任務。
4：擊敗垃圾老闆

// 5: 交了垃圾任務，還沒跟女祭司交談
6：與女祭司交談，打破封印1
7：看到農場老闆過場動畫
8：與農場老闆戰鬥
9：與女祭司交談，打破封印2
10：透過與守衛交談打開森林

女祭司長：
*微笑*
距離女神只有一步之遙
覺醒吧，英雄！

要打破最後的封印，你必須前往
西。  我感覺到那裡有個怪物在生長。兇猛
形狀和肉質香甜可口。

你必須殺死這個怪物並最終釋放它
威脅它的黑暗公園。

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Head Priestess — p2
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
You are always welcome here Hero.

She attempts to clasp her hands together in
front of her, but moves a bit too fast. Her
elbows almost bounce off her new massive
bust.

She pulls her hands apart.

Head Priestess:
Have you any questions for me?

Head Priestess:
A monster is growing in the west, one fierce
of spirit and sweet and delicious of body.

You must defeat it to free the park and allow
us to break the last seal.

Head Priestess:
Yes, don't worry.  As I said, I can tell you're
missing something.

Something very important. Something you're
worried about.

Once the goddess is freed, I should finally
have the power to help you.

She smiles.

Head Priestess:
Oh, I hope so.

Head Priestess:
Before you go, let me heal your wounds.
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
英雄，這裡隨時歡迎您。

她試著將雙手握在一起
就在她面前，不過動作有點太快了。她的
手肘幾乎從她新的巨大物體上彈開
半身像。

她將雙手分開。

女祭司長：
你有什麼問題想問我嗎？

女祭司長：
西方正在生長一隻怪物，一隻兇猛的怪物
精神和身體的甜蜜和美味。

你必須擊敗它才能釋放公園並允許
我們要打破最後的封印。

女祭司長：
是的，不用擔心。  正如我所說，我可以告訴你
缺少一些東西。

非常重要的事情。你是什​​麼東西
擔心。

一旦女神獲得自由，我終於應該
有能力幫助你。

她微笑著。

女祭司長：
哦，我希望如此。

女祭司長：
在你離開之前，讓我來治癒你的傷口。

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Head Priestess — p3
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
I sensed you defeat the evil to the west, Hero
!

The time has come to break the third seal!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
我感覺到你打敗了西方的邪惡，英雄
！

打破第三層封印的時候到了！

從他的額頭上跳了出來。

哇…\C[6]突然費了\C[17]頭暈…

他伸出手來支持
附近的樹，沒有註意到它瘦下來了
他到達了。他也沒有註意到它的轉變
淡橙色，或薄薄的幾丁質層。

又過了一會兒，他伸出手來
另一隻手尋求更多支持。其中之一
剛從他身上萌芽的那對
肩膀。

他用上面的手臂揉了揉眼睛
另一邊。看起來好像有東西
打擾他，但他不能把他的任何
新的大量手指放在上面。

\C[17]有些東西\C[14]感覺\C[21]很奇怪…

他似乎沒有註意到自己的聲音
將音調改為更女性化
註冊。

你可以看出有什麼事發生了
他的身體，但它隱藏在他的下面
衣服。

直到他的衣服突然開始縮水
向下進入一個小頂部，有些緊
黑色短褲，露出他的新修身
女性的身體。

身材苗條，但有一雙漂亮的乳房。
儘管在女祭司旁邊，她們看起來
就像什麼都沒有一樣。

\C[21]真的有東西\C[20]很癢…

新形成的女人伸手過來
 她的頭和她上面的一對手臂
 開始瘋狂地抓她的背。

蝴蝶翅膀以驚人的速度
從她的背上爆發出來，不斷增長，直到
每一個都幾乎和她的身體一樣大。

她給了他們一個實驗皮瓣，
實際上把她舉離了幾英寸
接地一會兒。

\C[20]我…感覺好多了？

她做了另一件事

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 3 — Elina wondering
passages.content:
:
It's amazing how much these plants are
regrowing.

:
Florauna is just as powerful as I've heard.
passages.content_zh:
:
這些植物的數量令人驚訝
重新生長。

:
Florauna 和我聽說的一樣強大。

passages.name: Orchards real — Beehive — p1
passages.content:
An agitated beehive. An orb made of buzz
and rage.

It does not want to be your friend.
passages.content_zh:
一個激動的蜂箱。由嗡嗡聲製成的球體
和憤怒。

它不想成為你的朋友。

passages.name: Orchards real — Beehive — p2
passages.content:
The hive is surrounded by a swarm of angry
bees, wildly whirling around as it looks for
something to attack.

You carefully creep closer.

An increase in the buzzing suggests that bees
aren't really something you can sneak up on.

Look, bee brains are tiny. Who knows better
whether you're sneaking, you or some bug
that spends its life having sex with flowers?

Secure in your intellectual superiority, you
creep closer to the hive.

The enormous horde of bees flying straight
for your face suggests that you miscalculated.

You run for your life.

Hmph. They probably just got lucky.

Oh crap! Ohcrapohcrapohcrap!

You dive forward and throw the Bee Blanket
over the hive.  Then huddle on the ground
hiding your face with your arms.

The sound of the swarm increases to a roar.

You can feel the wind from a million tiny wings
as it prepares to swoop upon you.

Then slowly
\.slowly...
\|ever so slowly...

It quiets.

You feel gentle impacts all over your body as
the bees slide from the air.  But no stings.

A soft sound of gentle buzzy snoring whispers
from a million insects.

A few bees have even slid into your pockets
as they fell asleep.

Bees acquired?!

Yeah! You're pretty sure there was a movie
about that!

You think it also said that... bees can open
doors.  So you'd better keep that in mind.

Apparently the bees have not watched the
same movie.

You break and run screaming as the swarm
charges straight at you.
passages.content_zh:
蜂巢被一群憤怒的蜂群包圍
蜜蜂瘋狂地旋轉著尋找
要攻擊的東西。

你小心翼翼地靠近。

嗡嗡聲的增加表明蜜蜂
並不是真正可以偷偷摸摸的東西。

看，蜜蜂的大腦很小。誰更了解
無論你是在偷偷摸摸，你還是某個蟲子
它一生都在與花做愛嗎？

確保你的智力優勢，你
爬近蜂巢。

巨大的蜂群直線飛行
因為你的表情顯示你算錯了。

你為你的生命奔跑。

哼。他們可能只是運氣好而已。

哦糟糕！噢克拉珀克拉珀！

你向前俯衝並丟出蜂毯
蜂巢上方。  然後蜷縮在地上
用雙臂遮住臉。

蜂群的聲音增強為咆哮聲。

你可以感受到來自一百萬個小翅膀的風
當它準備向你撲來時。

然後慢慢地
\.慢慢地...
\|就這樣慢慢...

它安靜了。

您會感覺到全身受到輕柔的衝擊
蜜蜂從空中滑落。  但沒有刺痛。

輕柔的嗡嗡鼾聲
來自一百萬隻昆蟲。

有些蜜蜂甚至溜進了你的口袋
當他們睡著的時候。

蜜蜂獲得了？ ！

是的！你很確定有一部電影
關於那個！

你認為它還說...蜜蜂可以打開
門。  所以你最好記住這一點。

顯然蜜蜂沒有註意到
同一部電影。

你像蜂群一樣尖叫著逃跑
直接向你衝鋒。

passages.name: Orchards real — Beehive — p3
passages.content:
The bees are still sleeping peacefully.

You decide waking them up would be a
*really* bad idea.
passages.content_zh:
蜜蜂們還在安靜地睡覺。

你決定叫醒他們是
*真的*壞主意。

passages.name: Orchards real — Starting cutscene — p1
passages.content:
Park Volunteer TJ:
You're not supposed to be here.

I should call the police on you, but I'll be nice.

I'm supposed to be collecting all the possibly-
infected fruit. But the orchard's full of bugs.

There's no way I'm going in there, so you have
the chance to do me a favor. Bring me fruit
and I won't call the police on you.

Let's say four apples to start. If you can't find
them on the ground, you can always shake
the trees to knock some down.

Go on, get in there.
passages.content_zh:
公園志工TJ：
你不應該在這裡。

我應該報警抓你，但我會很友善的。

我應該收集所有可能的——
受感染的水果。但果園裡充滿了蟲子。

我不可能進去，所以你必須進去
有機會幫我一個忙。帶水果
我不會報警抓你的。

讓我們先從四個蘋果開始。如果你找不到
它們在地上，你可以隨時搖晃
樹木擊倒一些。

走吧，進去吧。

passages.content:
This tree isn't doing well.  The leaves are
brown and slowly dying.

You pour one out for the tree. \!

A potion, that is.

Green starts spreading through the dying
leaves, while new buds begin to sprout from
the branches.

A shining gem falls from the newly revived
branches into your inventory.

Raw mana +1!

這棵樹長得不太好。  葉子是

綠色開始在垂死者身上蔓延
葉子開始萌芽，新的芽也開始萌芽
樹枝。

一顆閃亮的寶石從新復活的地方掉落
分支到您的庫存。

原始法力+1！

I've brought that guy a ton of fruit and he's

I don't know if he's ever going to.
passages.content_zh:
我帶了很多水果，他

我不知道他是否會去。

Hah, that jerk got what he deserved!

passages.content_zh:
呵呵，這混蛋也得到應有的報應了！

其中兩隻蜜蜂也抓到了我，但那是
值得！

passages.name: Orchards real — Orchard person 2 — p3
passages.content:
The slim man looks frightened.

Park Volunteer:
I thought I was okay when those bees stung
me, but now I think I'm having a reaction!

People die from bee stings!\. I don't want to die!

I think I'm swelling up. Does it feel like I'm
swelling up?

He grabs your hands and places them flat
against the front of his chest.

You can definitely feel something. \.\.

Feels like\| two little nubs, one on each side?\.
He gives a little gasp at the feel of your hands.

Oh, they're sensitive!\.

That's bad,that's probably bad.

You can feel the tiny nubs swelling larger and
larger under your hands.\|
Two little peaks of flesh. What else could those
be?

Soon they're big enough they'd be clearly
visible through his shirt, if you weren't covering
them.

They're still swelling! And tender! That can't
be good!

Yet he doesn't pull himself away. Almost the
opposite.\.\.
He keeps pushing into your hands, dragging
those two bumps across your palms.

You notice him giving a little gasp every time
he does.

And now I'm starting to feel warm all over!\.
Is this the end?!

He does look very flushed. And...\.\.
Is he shrinking?\|
He is shrinking!

Just a little, but you can see him getting
more petite as he continues to thrust himself
against your hands.

His waist is slimming too, while his hips seem
to be widening. And his face is definitely
starting to soften.

Oh!

He gasps, biting thickening lips.

I'm feeling so\. *pant*\. warm! I'm \.*gasp*\.
burning up!

His breath is coming in faster and faster
gasps, hovering on the edge of moans. \.
And rising in pitch with each one.

\C[5]Oh *gasp* no! \. I'm starting to *moan* have
trouble breathing!

At this point you can't really call him a "him"
anymore.

Her face has softened into complete
femininity, her body has shifted into a slight
hourglass, and her hair is starting to curl down
around her face.

\C[5]*Mmmm!*\| Call an *moan*\.\.\. ambulance!\.
The *oh!*\| swelling isn't *ah!*\| stopping!

You can feel her chest starting to sof
passages.content_zh:
瘦小的男人看起來很害怕。

公園志工：
當那些蜜蜂螫傷我時我以為我沒事
我，但現在我想我有反應了！

人們死於蜜蜂螫傷！ \.我不想死！

我覺得我快腫了是不是覺得我像
腫脹？

他抓住你的手並將它們放平

你絕對能感覺到一些東西。 \.\.

感覺就像\|兩個小結點，每邊一個？ \.
感受到你雙手的觸感，他有點喘不過氣。

哦，他們很敏感！ \.

這很糟糕，這可能很糟糕。

你可以感覺到小疙瘩腫得更大了
在你的手下更大。 \|
兩個小肉峰。那些還能做什麼

他們。

他們還在腫脹！而且溫柔！那不能
乖！

但他並沒有抽身離開。幾乎是
對面。 \.\.
他不斷地推入你的手中，拖著
你手掌上的那兩個凸起。

你注意到他每次都會有點喘息

現在我開始感到全身溫暖！ \.
這就是結局了嗎？ ！

他看起來確實很紅。和...\。 \。
他在縮小嗎？ \|
他在縮小！

雖然只有一點點，但你可以看到他得到了

他的腰也瘦了，而他的臀部似乎
有待擴大。而且他的臉絕對是

哦！

他喘息著，咬著變厚的嘴唇。

我的感覺是這樣\. *喘氣*\。溫暖的！我是\.*喘氣*\。
燃燒起來！

他的呼吸越來越急促
喘息著，徘徊在呻吟的邊緣。 \.
並且隨著每個人的音調升高。

\C[5]喔*喘氣*不！ \.我開始*抱怨*有
呼吸困難！

這時候你已經不能再稱他為「他」了
不再了。

她的臉已經完全軟化了
女性氣質，她的身體已經變得輕微
沙漏，她的頭髮開始捲曲

\C[5]*嗯！ *\|發出*呻吟*\.\.\.救護車！ \。
