passages.name: Orchards real — Bees 2 — p1
passages.content:
So many bees!  Why?!

Before you can react, they fly straight at your
face.

It...\. doesn't actually hurt very much?\|

But your face feels weird and swollen.
passages.content_zh:
這麼多蜜蜂！  為什麼？ ！

還沒等你反應過來，它們就會直接飛向你
臉。

它...\。實際上並沒有很痛嗎？ \|

但你的臉感覺很奇怪而且腫脹。

passages.name: Orchards real — Bees 3 — p1
passages.content:
Bees! Angry bees! Angry bees everywhere!

You shield your face and hope for the best.

They fly in and sting you on the chest.

It...\. doesn't actually hurt very much?\|

Though your chest feels warm and swollen.
passages.content_zh:
蜜蜂！憤怒的蜜蜂！憤怒的蜜蜂無所不在！

你保护好自己的脸，并抱有最好的希望。

它們飛過來並蜇你的胸口。

它...\。實際上並沒有很痛嗎？ \|

儘管你的胸部感覺溫暖且腫脹。

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist — p1
passages.content:
Park Volunteer Carol:
Speaking as a professional beeologist,
something's gotten the bees up there real
angry.

Fortunately, I have this specially prepared bee
wrap. It's full of all sorts of calming bee
pheremones.

All we need is someone to run up and wrap
the hive in this, and it should put the bees
right to sleep.

Park Volunteer Carol:
Great! Let me know how it goes!

Uh, unless you're going to come back chased
by a giant swarm of bees.

Not that that's going to happen. Perfectly safe!
\|
But still, no need to come back.

Acquired Bee Blanket! \.

It smells like honey and slumber.

Park Volunteer Carol:
Well what else are you going to do? Get more
fruit for that idiot at the entrance?

At least this is different.

\}And surely even he wouldn't keep us from
calling an ambulance...

:
That weird person at the entrance does seem
to dislike bugs...

Maybe this is an opportunity to acquire some?

And I want to see how the bee blanket
works...

Park Volunteer Carol:
I'll have you know I'm the park's leading
beetician.

Beeicist.

Bee-science-person.

Look, this is almost certainly probably going
to work.  How about it?

:
That weird man at the entrance does seem to
dislike bugs...

I don't think we're going to get a better chance
to get some than a plan made by a certified
beeologist.

Park Volunteer Carol:
Remember, you can either try to keep
pleasing that idiot at the front, or you can go
for plan Bee.
passages.content_zh:
公園志工卡羅爾：
身為專業蜜蜂學家來說，
確實有什麼東西把蜜蜂引到了那裡
生氣。

幸好我有這隻特意準備的蜜蜂
包裹。裡面充滿了各種鎮定的蜜蜂
信息素。

我們所需要的只是有人跑過來包裹
蜂巢在這，它應該把蜜蜂
睡覺的權利。

公園志工卡羅爾：
太棒了！讓我知道進展如何！

呃，除非你回來被追趕
由一大群蜜蜂。

但這並不是說會發生。萬無一失！
\|
但仍然沒有必要回來。

獲得蜜蜂毯！ \.

它聞起來像蜂蜜和睡眠。

公園志工卡羅爾：
那你還打算做什麼呢？獲得更多
給入口處那個白痴吃水果嗎？

至少這是不同的。

\}當然，即使祂也不會阻止我們
叫救護車...

:
門口那個奇怪的人看起來確實
不喜歡 bug...

也許這是一個獲得一些東西的機會？

我想看看蜂毯怎麼樣
作品...

公園志工卡羅爾：
我會讓你知道我是公園的領隊
養蜂師。

蜜蜂主義者。

蜜蜂科學家。

看，這幾乎肯定會發生
去工作。  怎麼樣？

:
門口那個奇怪的人看起來確實
不喜歡蟲子...

我不認為我們會得到更好的機會
得到一些不僅僅是由經過認證的人制定的計劃
蜜蜂學家。

公園志工卡羅爾：
請記住，您可以嘗試保留
取悅前面那個白痴，不然你走吧
對於蜜蜂計劃。

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist — p2
passages.content:
Park Volunteer Carol:
Good luck!

Not that you need it.

I'm sure bee stings are just psychosomatic.
passages.content_zh:
公園志工卡羅爾：
祝你好運！

並不是說你需要它。

我確信蜜蜂螫傷只是心身問題。

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist — p3
passages.content:
Park Volunteer Carol:
Holy crap, you're still alive?!\.
And the bees are calm?!

I mean, uh, just as expected!
passages.content_zh:
公園志工卡羅爾：
天哪，你還活著嗎？ ！ \.
蜜蜂很平靜？ ！

我的意思是，呃，正如預期的那樣！

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist — p4
passages.content:
Park Volunteer Carol:
Hah! Not a single sting from that swarm!
Beestrology wins again!

Park Volunteer Carol:
Though I have to admit that I'm not a fully
trained Beeologist yet.

That takes a PhD and all I've got is a BeeA.
passages.content_zh:
公園志工卡羅爾：
哈！沒有被那群蟲子蟄​​過！
野獸學再次獲勝！

公園志工卡羅爾：
雖然我必須承認我不是一個完整的人
尚未受過訓練的蜜蜂學家。

這需要博士學位，而我只有 BeeA 資格。

passages.name: Orchards real — Bees 1 — p1
passages.content:
Aaaah! Bees!

You try to run, but they follow and sting you
all over your butt.

It quickly stops hurting, but it feels swollen.
passages.content_zh:
啊啊啊！蜜蜂！

你試圖逃跑，但它們跟著你並蜇你
遍佈你的屁股。

它很快就不再疼痛，但感覺腫脹。

passages.name: Orchards real — Goggles tree — p1
passages.content:
You look up at the tree.

Something is gleaming up in the top branches.

You could probably knock it down by shaking
the tree, but the branches also hold a ton of
fruit. And the fruit looks angry.

Shake the tree?

Fruit rains down on your head!

A pair of goggles plummets out of the tree in
front of you.  They look big enough to fit over
your glasses.

Better to leave it alone.
passages.content_zh:
你抬頭看那棵樹。

頂部的樹枝上有東西在閃閃發光。

你可能可以透過搖晃將其擊倒
樹，但樹枝也承載著大量
水果。而且水果看起來很生氣。

搖動樹？

水果雨落在你頭上！

一副護目鏡從樹上掉下來
在你面前。  它們看起來足夠大，可以穿進去
你的眼鏡。

最好別管它。

passages.name: Orchards real — Goggles tree — p2
passages.content: The tree is empty now.
passages.content_zh: 現在樹是空的。

passages.name: Orchards real — Orchard guard version bee — p2
passages.content:
Park Volunteer BeeJ:
Thizzz izzz all your fault.

She pouts.

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
Where am I even supposed to find clothezz?
No one makes shirtzz for four armzz and thizz
zztinger thing!
passages.content_zh:
公園志工BeeJ：
嘶嘶嘶嘶都是你的錯。

她嘟起嘴。

公園志工BeeJ：
我應該在哪裡找到clothezz？
沒有人為四個 Armzz 和 thizz 製作襯衫
zztinger 的事！

passages.name: Orchards real — Orchard guard version bee — p3
passages.content:
Park Volunteer BeeJ:
Pleazze tell thizz idiot to shut up.

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
Or I'm going to figure out how to uzze thizz
zztinger.
passages.content_zh:
公園志工BeeJ：
請告訴這個白痴閉嘴。

公園志工BeeJ：
或者我要弄清楚如何 uzze thizz
zztinger。

passages.name: Orchards real — Orchard guard version bee — p4
passages.content:
Park Volunteer BeeJ:
How izzz she enjoying thizzz?!

Park Volunteer Carol:
Beecause itzzz amazzzzzzzing!

Hey hey, I'm going to do a dance! Try to
guess where the flowerzzz are!
passages.content_zh:
公園志工BeeJ：
她多麼享受 thizzz？ ！

公園志工卡羅爾：
因為 itzzz 令人驚嘆！

嘿嘿嘿，我要跳舞了！嘗試
猜猜看哪裡！

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist interviewing — p2
passages.content:
Park Volunteer BeeJ:
What are you- go away!

Park Volunteer Carol:
But I've never met a bee I could interview
before!

You have to answer my questions! It's for
science!

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
I zzzaid no!

Park Volunteer Carol:
Come on, just a few questions.

\^What dances do you know?\.
Can you talk to normal bees?\.
On a scale of 1-10, how much do you want to
have sex with flowers?\.

\^Are you fertile?
Do you have a queen?
Do you want a queen?
Where does your honey come out of?\.

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
*Glares*
I am going to zzzting you zzzooo hard.

// Bee people: determines progress of this event
1: saw intro conversation
2: Beeologist has transformed
passages.content_zh:
公園志工BeeJ：
你是什麼－走開！

公園志工卡羅爾：
但我從未見過一隻可以採訪的蜜蜂
之前！

你必須回答我的問題！這是為了
科學！

公園志工BeeJ：
我不！

公園志工卡羅爾：
來吧，只是幾個問題。

\^你知道什麼舞蹈？ \.
你能和普通蜜蜂說話嗎？
從 1 到 10 的範圍內，您想要多少
與花發生性關係？ \.

\^你有生育能力嗎？
你有女王嗎？
你想要一個女王嗎？
你的蜂蜜是從哪裡來的？ \.

公園志工BeeJ：
*怒視*
我要狠狠地折磨你。

// 蜜蜂人：決定這次事件的進度
1：看到介紹性對話
2：蜜蜂學家已經轉變

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist interviewing — p3
passages.content:
Park Volunteer BeeJ:
I'm not anzzering quezzztions!

Park Volunteer Carol:
Come on, it's for science! Bee science!

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
*Glares*
I am going to zzzting you zzzooo hard.
passages.content_zh:
公園志工BeeJ：
我不是提問！

公園志工卡羅爾：
來吧，這是為了科學！蜜蜂科學！

公園志工BeeJ：
*怒視*
我要狠狠地折磨你。

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist interviewing — p4
passages.content:
Park Volunteer Carol:
This is amazzzing!

Park Volunteer Carol:
Hey hey, want to go shove our faces in zzome
flowerzzz together? \.
It'll bee amazzzing!

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
How did thizzz make you even worse?!
passages.content_zh:
公園志工卡羅爾：
這太神奇了！

公園志工卡羅爾：
嘿嘿，想把我們的臉推到zzome
花齊齊了？ \.
這將會令人驚嘆不已！

公園志工BeeJ：
thizzz 怎麼讓你變得更糟了？

passages.name: Orchards real — Beeologist trigger — p2
passages.content: You heard a cry of pain from the north.
passages.content_zh: 你聽到北方傳來痛苦的叫聲。

passages.name: Orchards real — Player Brad — p2
passages.content:
Player Brad:
I bet if I do more quests that priestess'll swell
up even bigger.

Player Brad:
Uh, about quests. \.Any idea how to punch a
fish?
passages.content_zh:
球員布拉德：
我打賭如果我做更多的任務，女祭司就會膨脹
甚至更大。

球員布拉德：
呃，關於任務。 \.知道如何打一個
魚？

passages.name: Orchards real — D2 Beeologist After — p2
passages.content:
Carol:
Now thezzze are quality flowerzz!

Perfect shape, a zzweet but not cloying zzmell,
just the right mouthfeel...

The beezzz have given them a 9.8 out of ten.

And the low zzcore is Beetrice, zzzhe doezzn't
give *anything* a perfect.
passages.content_zh:
卡羅爾：
現在thezzze 是優質的flowerzz！

完美的形狀，zzweet但不令人膩味的zzmell，
剛剛好的口感...

beezzz 給他們打了 9.8 分（滿分 10 分）。

低 zzcore 是 Beetrice，zzzhe doezzn't
給*任何*一個完美。

passages.name: Orchards real — Honey and Carol intro — p2
passages.content:
Honey:
I never knew flowers could be this amazing!

You hear a voice off in the distance.

DID ZZZOMEONE MENTION FLOWERZZZ?!

Carol:
Who izz it?! Who'zzz zzhe flower lover?!

Honey:
...Me?

Carol:
I love flowerzzz! They're zzzo pretty and they
smell zzzo great and-
Want to zzzee my favorite flower?

Honey:
Yeah!

Carol:
They're zzzo good! You'll love them!
They're over here!

Carol:
Thozze flowerzzz are nice, \}but not the bezzt.
A bit insipid...
passages.content_zh:
親愛的：
我從來不知道花可以這麼神奇！

你聽到遠處有聲音。

ZZZOMEONE 有提到 FlowerZZZ 嗎？ ！

卡羅爾：
誰給的？ ！誰是花愛人？ ！

親愛的：
....我？

卡羅爾：
我愛花花！他們很漂亮而且他們
聞起來 zzzo 很棒而且-
想欣賞我最喜歡的花嗎？

親愛的：
是啊！

卡羅爾：
他們很好！你一定會喜歡他們的！
他們在這裡！

卡羅爾：
Thozze Flowerzzz 很好，\}但不是 bezzt。
有點平淡...

passages.name: Orchards real — D2 Honey after — p2
passages.content:
Honey buries her face in the flowers and takes
a deep breath.

Her face is mostly hidden by the flowers, but
you think you see her unusually long tongue
lick up some nectar.

Honey:
These really are the best!
passages.content_zh:
親愛的把臉埋進花里，
深吸一口氣。

她的臉幾乎被花朵遮住了，但是
你認為你看到她異常長的舌頭
舔一些花蜜。

親愛的：
這些確實是最好的！

passages.name: Orchards real — Shopkeeper Amelia — p2
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
I heard the orchard was having problems,
but it looks like it completely recovered!

There's no problem with selling fruit now!

She doesn't seem to have noticed the
milkshake you're holding.

Give it to her?

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Is that one of Daisy's milkshakes?

Thank you!
She said she was going to send me one, but
I wasn't sure when I would get it.

She takes a deep drink and licks off the
milkshake moustache.

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Mmm, no one makes milkshakes like Daisy.

She takes another drink, and another. \.\.
You watch as she works her way through the
whole shake. \|
Nothing happens?

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
I always tell myself I'm not going to drink
it that quickly, but it's just too good to stop.

Though-- *She hiccups*

Oh no, this always-\.\^

She hiccups again. With an almost audible
*pop*, a pair of black-and-white spotted ears
spring out of the sides of her head.

This *hic*\. is *hic*\. why *hic*\. I should
*hic*\. go slower!

A horn pops out of the left side of her head
with the first hiccup, then the right horn follows
on the second.

After the third the tip of a tail sticks out of the
back of her pants. With the fourth, it flops out
to swing freely behind her.

Farm Volunteer Amelia:
I... \|
I always forget that?\|
They stopped!

She gives a contented sigh and licks the last
bit of milkshake off her lips.

Still, it's so worth it.

You keep the milkshake for now.
passages.content_zh:
農場志工阿米莉亞：
聽說果園出了問題
但看起來已經完全恢復了！

現在賣水果沒問題了！

她似乎沒有註意到
你手上拿的奶昔。

給她？

農場志工阿米莉亞：
那是黛西的奶昔之一嗎？

謝謝你！
她說她要寄一份，但是
我不確定什麼時候能拿到它。

她喝了一大口，然後舔掉了
奶昔小鬍子。

農場志工阿米莉亞：
嗯，沒有人像黛西那樣製作奶昔。

她又喝了一杯，又喝了一杯。 \.\.
你看著她努力工作
整個震動。 \|
什麼也沒發生？

農場志工阿米莉亞：
我總是告訴自己我不會喝酒
速度雖快，但實在讓人停不下來。

雖然—*她打嗝*

哦不，這總是-\.\^

她又打嗝了。伴隨著幾乎聽得見的聲音
*啪*，一對黑白斑點的耳朵
從她頭的兩側跳出來。

這個*急促*\。是 *hic*\。為什麼*呃*\。我應該
*呃呃*\。慢點！

一隻角從她頭的左側彈出
第一次打嗝後，右角隨之而來
在第二個。

第三次之後，尾巴尖伸出來
她的褲子後面。第四個，它失敗了
在她身後自由搖擺。

農場志工阿米莉亞：
我...\|
我總是忘記這一點？ \|
他們停了下來！

她滿足地嘆了口氣，舔了最後一口
她嘴唇上有一點奶昔。

儘管如此，這還是非常值得的。

你暫時保留奶昔。

passages.name: Orchards real — Shopkeeper Amelia — p3
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Thanks again for delivering my milkshake!

I can't wait until the next time Daisy makes
them.
passages.content_zh:
農場志工阿米莉亞：
再次感謝您送我的奶昔！

我等不及黛西下次做
他們。

passages.name: Orchards real — Shopkeeper Amelia — p4
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer Amelia:
Daisy makes the best milkshakes!\.\.
Though I'm surprised she left the stand to
deliver it.
passages.content_zh:
農場志工阿米莉亞：
黛西做的奶昔最好吃！ \.\.
雖然我很驚訝她離開了看台
交付它。

passages.name: Orchards real — Dying tree — p1
passages.content:
This tree isn't doing well.  The leaves are
brown and slowly dying.
passages.content_zh:
這棵樹長得不太好。  葉子是
呈褐色並慢慢死亡。

passages.name: Orchards real — Darren — p1
passages.content:
The man on the left is staring worriedly into
his drink.

Man:
I'm just worried that it'll all turn out wrong.

The other man reaches out and grabs his hand
reassuringly.

Other man:
Kyle. Kyle. It'll be fine.

We've both talked to them about joining our
relationships before. It'll all work out.

Kyle:
But Lily has never been up for it before.

Other Man:
And so we gave them space. But now Rose
and Lily have both said they want to discuss
it.

Kyle:
Darren, that's why everything has to go right!
If this is a chance for us all to join together,
it needs to go perfectly.

And that's not happening with the store
closed.

Darren:
Look, you know that Rose and Lily care for
each other, right?

Kyle:
Yes...

Darren:
And they both care about both of us?

Kyle:
Yes...

Darren:
That's what's needed. That's the important
part.

We'll be able to work out the rest somehow,
if we're all trying.  Whatever form that takes.

Look, it's just a power outage. Soon the
store's going to open back up.

And then we're going to go back in there and
get them something that shows just how
valuable they are to us.

It'll be fine.

Kyle stares into his drink again. But he does
seem less worried.
passages.content_zh:
左邊的男人憂心忡忡地看著
他的飲料。

男士：
我只是擔心這一切都會變得錯誤。

另一個人伸出手抓住了他的手
令人安心地。

另一個男人：
凱爾.凱爾.會沒事的。

我們都和他們談過加入我們的
之前的關係。一切都會解決的。

凱爾：
但莉莉以前從來沒有這樣做過。

其他人：
所以我們給了他們空間。但現在羅斯
和莉莉都表示想討論
它。

凱爾：
達倫，這就是為什麼一切都必須順利進行！
如果這是我們大家團結起來的機會，
它需要完美地進行。

而這並沒有發生在商店裡
關閉。

達倫：
聽著，你知道羅絲和莉莉關心的
彼此，對嗎？

凱爾：
是的...

達倫：
他們都關心我們兩個？

凱爾：
是的...

達倫：
這就是所需要的。這才是重要的
部分。

我們將能夠以某種方式解決剩下的問題
如果我們都努力的話。  無論採取什麼形式。

你看，只是停電了。很快
商店將重新開業。

然後我們要回到那裡
給他們一些可以展示如何做的東西
它們對我們來說很有價值。

會沒事的。

凱爾再次盯著他的飲料。但他確實
看起來不那麼擔心了。

passages.name: Orchards real — Quadruple scene — p1
passages.content:
You see Kyle and Darren behind the barn.

Kyle is sitting on a stump while Darren is
crouched down, examining her leg.

Darren:
Look at the articulation on this!

He bends her leg up and down, staring at her
knee.

Darren:
It's so lifelike!

And this material!

He runs his hands up her thighs, completely
oblivious to her slowly flushing face.

Darren:
Smooth...\!
Protective...\!
Durable...

Yet somehow still soft and warm!

He gently rubs her inner thigh, completely
missing her soft intake of breath.

Darren:
It's like the perfect blend of plastic and skin!

He shuffles forward a little, pulling her leg
aside and leaning in to examine where her
leg joins her torso.

He doesn't seem to notice his face is right up
against her crotch.\!
She definitely does.

Darren:
And this joint! It-

His robot girlfriend can no long bite back a
soft moan as he rubs his hands along it.

Kyle:
MODESTY COVERS RETRACTED.

Hidden ports iris open on her breasts,
deploying already-stiff blue nipples.

You catch another hint of blue behind
Darren's head, but he's hiding it from view.

A faint smell fills the air, a strange but
surprisingly alluring mix of feminine arousal
and clear mineral oil.

Darren jerks back in surprise.

Darren:
I-

Kyle catches his head before he can move
far.\!
She gently starts to press him closer.

Kyle:
Please...\!
Don't stop...

She starts to moan, as he brings his mouth
down to her slit.

You back off before they can see you
watching.
passages.content_zh:
你看到穀倉後面的凱爾和達倫。

凱爾坐在樹樁上，而達倫則坐在樹樁上
蹲下來，檢查她的腿。

達倫：
看看這個的闡述！

他上下彎曲她的腿，盯著她
膝蓋。

達倫：
真是栩栩如生！

還有這個材料！

他的手完全地撫過她的大腿
沒有註意到她慢慢泛紅的臉。

達倫：
順利...\!
保護的...\！
耐用...

但不知何故仍然柔軟溫暖！

他輕輕地揉著她的大腿內側，徹底
想念她輕柔的呼吸。

達倫：
就像塑膠和皮膚的完美融合！

他向前挪了一點，拉著她的腿
放在一邊，傾身檢查她在哪裡
腿與她的軀幹相連。

他似乎沒有註意到自己的臉正朝上
抵住她的胯部。 \！
她絕對會的。

達倫：
還有這個聯名！它——

他的機器人女友再也無法反咬一口了
他用手撫摸它，發出輕柔的呻吟聲。

凱爾：
謙虛的封面被收回。

隱藏的虹膜端口在她的乳房上打開，
部署已經僵硬的藍色乳頭。

你在背後捕捉到另一抹藍色
達倫的頭，但他把它藏起來了。

空氣中瀰漫著淡淡的味道，但又有些奇怪
令人驚訝的女性興奮組合
和透明礦物油。

達倫驚訝地猛地回頭。

達倫：
我-

凱爾在移動之前抓住了他的頭
遠。 \!
她輕輕地開始把他壓得更近。

凱爾：
請...\！
別停下來...

當他張開嘴時，她開始呻吟
一直到她的縫隙。

在他們看到你之前你退後
觀看。

passages.name: Orchards real — Quadruple scene — p2
passages.content:
You can still hear soft moaning and cries from
behind the barn.\!
You decide not to interrupt.
passages.content_zh:
你仍然可以聽到輕柔的呻吟聲和哭聲
穀倉後面。 \!
你決定不打擾。

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Beehive — p2
passages.content:
The hive is surrounded by a swarm of angry
bees, wildly whirling around as it looks for
something to attack.

You carefully creep closer.

An increase in the buzzing suggests that bees
aren't really something you can sneak up on.

Look, bee brains are tiny. Who knows better
whether you're sneaking, you or some bug
that spends its life having sex with flowers?

Secure in your intellectual superiority, you
creep closer to the hive.

The enormous horde of bees flying straight
for your face suggests that you miscalculated.

You run for your life.

Hmph. They probably just got lucky.

Oh crap! Ohcrapohcrapohcrap!

You dive forward and throw the Bee Blanket
over the hive.  Then huddle on the ground
hiding your face with your arms.

The sound of the swarm increases to a roar.

You can feel the wind from a million tiny wings
as it prepares to swoop upon you.

Then slowly
\.slowly...
\|ever so slowly...

It quiets.

You feel gentle impacts all over your body as
the bees slide from the air.  But no stings.

A soft sound of gentle buzzy snoring whispers
from a million insects.

A few bees have even slid into your pockets
as they fell asleep.

Bees acquired?!

Yeah! You're pretty sure there was a movie
about that!

You think it also said that...\. bees can open
doors.  So you'd better keep that in mind.

Apparently the bees have not watched the
same movie.

You break and run screaming as the swarm
charges straight at you.
passages.content_zh:
蜂巢被一群憤怒的蜂群包圍
蜜蜂瘋狂地旋轉著尋找
要攻擊的東西。

你小心翼翼地靠近。

嗡嗡聲的增加表明蜜蜂
並不是真正可以偷偷摸摸的東西。

看，蜜蜂的大腦很小。誰更了解
無論你是在偷偷摸摸，你還是某個蟲子
它一生都在與花做愛嗎？

確保你的智力優勢，你
爬近蜂巢。

巨大的蜂群直線飛行
因為你的表情顯示你算錯了。

你為你的生命奔跑。

哼。他們可能只是運氣好而已。

哦糟糕！噢克拉珀克拉珀！

你向前俯衝並丟出蜂毯
蜂巢上方。  然後蜷縮在地上
用雙臂遮住臉。

蜂群的聲音增強為咆哮聲。

你可以感受到來自一百萬個小翅膀的風
當它準備向你撲來時。

然後慢慢地
\.慢慢地...
\|就這樣慢慢...

它安靜了。

您會感覺到全身受到輕柔的衝擊
蜜蜂從空中滑落。  但沒有刺痛。

輕柔的嗡嗡鼾聲
來自一百萬隻昆蟲。

有些蜜蜂甚至溜進了你的口袋
當他們睡著的時候。

蜜蜂獲得了？ ！

是的！你很確定有一部電影
關於那個！

你認為它還說...\.蜜蜂可以打開
門。  所以你最好記住這一點。

顯然蜜蜂沒有註意到
同一部電影。

你像蜂群一樣尖叫著逃跑
直接向你衝鋒。

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Orchard person 2 — p4
passages.content:
She looks up at you, one hand still buried in
her pants and the other gently squeezing her
breast.

Park Volunteer:
\C[5]Thank you\.\. thank you for the help.\|

I don't think I'll need that ambulance.

Park Volunteer:
\C[5]I guess bees aren't that bad after all.
passages.content_zh:
她抬頭看著你，一隻手仍然埋在
她的褲子和另一個輕輕地擠壓她
乳房。

公園志工：
\C[5]謝謝\.\.謝謝您的幫忙。 \|

我想我不需要那輛救護車

公園志工：
\C[5]我猜蜜蜂畢竟沒那麼壞。

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Bees 2 — p1
passages.content:
So many bees!  Why?!

Before you can react, they fly straight at your
face.

It...\. doesn't actually hurt very much?\|

But your lips feel weird and swollen.\!
Heck, your whole face feels kind of weird.
passages.content_zh:
這麼多蜜蜂！  為什麼？ ！

還沒等你反應過來，它們就會直接飛向你
臉。

它...\。實際上並沒有很痛嗎？ \|

但你的嘴唇感覺很奇怪而且腫脹。 \！
哎呀，你的整個臉感覺有點奇怪。

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Yellow fairy — p1
passages.content:
Yellow Fairy:
Hero! I'm so glad you've come!

Red Fairy:
Why do you keep doing this? No one has been
able to see you.

The hero's not coming.

Red Fairy:
See, even the hero agrees with me!

Red Fairy:
Wait, you can see us?!

Yellow Fairy:
Welcome great Hero!

Yellow Fairy:
The hero will come if we wait long enough!

They already helped the elves. It's just a
matter of time!

Yellow Fairy:
Hero!  You've arrived!

Yellow Fairy:
Welcome oh great Hero!

The orchard is in dire straits!

Once it was a peaceful place, where children
played and adults picked fruit at high but not
extreme prices.

But then the Bad Apple came.

No, not just a bad apple, the Worst Apple.

Before long, its corruption spread to all the
other fruit. The apples, the melons, the
grapefruit, they've all gone wrong.

Red Fairy:
I saw a pile of grapefruit attack a squirrel.
\}It was horrible...

Yellow Fairy:
Please Hero, defeat the Worst Apple and bring
peace back to our home!

The Worst Apple is hiding somewhere in the
melon patch to the north.  I know you can
defeat it!
passages.content_zh:
黃仙女：
英雄！我很高興你能來！

紅仙子：
為什麼一直這樣做？沒有人去過
能夠見到你。

英雄沒有來。

紅仙子：
你看，連英雄都同意我的觀點了！

紅仙子：
等等，你看得到我們嗎？ ！

黃仙女：
歡迎偉大的英雄！

黃仙女：
只要我們等得夠久，英雄就會來！

他們已經幫助了精靈。這只是一個
時間問題！

黃仙女：
英雄！  你來了！

黃仙女：
歡迎偉大的英雄！

果園陷入困境！

曾經這裡是一個寧靜的地方，孩子們
玩和大人在高處摘水果但不
極端的價格。

但壞蘋果來了。

不，不只是一個壞蘋果，還是最糟糕的蘋果。

不久之後，它的腐敗就蔓延到了所有國家。
其他水果。蘋果、甜瓜、
柚子，他們都錯了。

紅仙子：
我看到一堆柚子攻擊一隻松鼠。
\}太可怕了...

黃仙女：
請英雄，擊敗最壞的蘋果並帶來
平安回到我們的家！

最糟糕的蘋果藏在某個地方
北邊有瓜田。  我知道你可以
打敗它！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Yellow fairy — p2
passages.content:
Yellow Fairy:
Please Hero, defeat the Worst Apple and save
our home!

It's still hiding somewhere in the melon patch
to the north.
passages.content_zh:
黃仙女：
請英雄，擊敗最壞的蘋果並拯救
我們的家！

它還藏在瓜地裡的某個地方
向北。

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Yellow fairy — p3
passages.content:
Yellow Fairy:
Thank you so much Hero!

The curse has been
lifted!
passages.content_zh:
黃仙女：
非常感謝英雄！

詛咒已經
解除了！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Yellow fairy — p4
passages.content:
Yellow Fairy:
She's just selling fruit juice.\.\.

But somehow it works?
passages.content_zh:
黃仙女：
她只是賣果汁。 \.\.

但不知何故它有效嗎？

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Red fairy — p1
passages.content:
Red Fairy:
Great, another idiot who can't see us.

Yellow Fairy:
Red, be polite! What if that was the Hero?
passages.content_zh:
紅仙子：
太好了，又一個看不到我們的白痴。

黃仙女：
紅，有禮貌！如果那是英雄呢？

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Red fairy — p2
passages.content:
Red Fairy:
Fine, I guess you're the Hero. Doesn't mean
you'll accomplish anything.

Yellow Fairy:
Sorry, Red's just grumpy her prize melon
tried to eat her yesterday.
passages.content_zh:
紅仙子：
好吧，我猜你就是英雄。並不意味著
你會完成任何事。

黃仙女：
抱歉，小紅只是對她的獎品瓜脾氣暴躁
昨天想吃掉她。

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Red fairy — p3
passages.content:
Red Fairy:
I have a new idea. Fruit deathmatches!

Yellow Fairy:
Red, no.  Just... no.
passages.content_zh:
紅仙子：
我有一個新想法。水果死亡競賽！

黃仙女：
紅色，沒有。  只是...不。

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Red fairy — p4
passages.content:
Red Fairy:
Hero! I have studied the fruit and learned its
ways.

I have run with the fruit in the wild. I have
swam with the fruit in the rivers. And I have
learned.

I can give you a potion I made that will bring
the fruit out. And I can teach you chants,
insults in the language of the fruit that will
drive it into a blind rage.

But, uh, it wasn't cheap. So if you wouldn't
mind contributing to my studies?

Red Fairy:
Hello again hero!
Interested in more fruit bait?
passages.content_zh:
紅仙子：
英雄！我研究了這種水果並了解了它
方式。

I have run with the fruit in the wild.我有
swam with the fruit in the rivers.我有
學到了。

I can give you a potion I made that will bring
水果出來了。 And I can teach you chants,
用水果的語言來侮辱
讓它陷入盲目的憤怒。

但是，呃，它並不便宜。所以如果你不這樣做
mind contributing to my studies?

紅仙子：
英雄你好！
Interested in more fruit bait?

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Blue Fairy — p1
passages.content:
An apple a day
Keeps the doctor away

Because it jumps on his head
And smashes his nose
And punches his ears
And...
passages.content_zh:
一天一蘋果
讓醫生遠離我

因為它跳到了他的頭上
還打碎了他的鼻子
還用拳頭打他的耳朵
還有...

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Blue Fairy — p2
passages.content:
Everything is awesome!
Everything is cool when the mean fruit's been
smashed!

Except the fruit hiding in the trees
The angry fruit out for revenge
passages.content_zh:
一切都很棒！
當卑鄙的水果被吃掉後，一切都變得很酷
砸了！

除了藏在樹上的果實
憤怒的果子出去報仇

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Compliment fairy — p1
passages.content:
Blue Fairy:
Ooo, you're pretty!

She pouts.

Blue Fairy:
I hope you learn to enjoy being pretty!

Blue Fairy:
Yay pretty!

Blue Fairy:
It's okay if you don't think so.

I'm sure you'll get prettier!
passages.content_zh:
藍精靈：
哦哦，你很漂亮！

她嘟起嘴。

藍精靈：
希望你學會享受美麗！

藍精靈：
耶，漂亮！

藍精靈：
如果你不這麼認為也沒關係。

相信你會變得更漂亮！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Compliment fairy — p2
passages.content:
Blue Fairy:
Hello again pretty lady!
passages.content_zh:
藍精靈：
美麗的女士再次你好！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Compliment fairy — p3
passages.content:
Blue Fairy:
I knew such a pretty lady could save us!
passages.content_zh:
藍精靈：
我就知道這麼漂亮的女士可以救我們！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Cat — p1
passages.content:
The most adequate cat you've ever seen is
lying here.

It offers no resistance as you scoop it into
your inventory.
passages.content_zh:
你見過的最合格的貓是
躺在這裡。

當您將其舀入時，它不會產生任何阻力
你的庫存。

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon fairy 1 — p1
passages.content:
Blue Fairy:
Yay! The Hero is here!

Go Hero!

I saw the Apple run off to the north!

And I've been saving this for the hero!

*Gained watermelon!*
passages.content_zh:
藍精靈：
耶！英雄來了！

英雄出擊！

我看見蘋果往北跑了！

我一直把這個留給英雄！

*獲得西瓜！ *

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon fairy 1 — p2
passages.content:
Blue Fairy:
Yay Hero! Yay!
passages.content_zh:
藍精靈：
耶英雄！耶！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon fairy 1 — p3
passages.content:
Blue Fairy:
Yay! You did it!

Now the orchard will be normal again!
passages.content_zh:
藍精靈：
耶！你做到了！

現在果園又恢復正常了！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon fairy 2 — p1
passages.content:
Red Fairy:
All the others say I have to give you these to
help.

Gained 2 grapefruit.

Red Fairy:
Just because you're saving us all or whatever.

Why are you even talking to me anyway. The
monster ran off to the northwest.
passages.content_zh:
紅仙子：
其他人都說我必須給你這些
幫助。

獲得2個柚子。

紅仙子：
只是因為你拯救了我們所有人或其他什麼。

為什麼還要跟我說話呢？的
怪物向西北方向跑去。

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon fairy 2 — p2
passages.content:
Red Fairy:
Shouldn't you be off fighting something?
passages.content_zh:
紅仙子：
你不應該去戰鬥嗎？

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon fairy 2 — p3
passages.content:
Red Fairy:
Okay I guess you did defeat the Worst Apple
and save the orchard.

But what have you done for us recently?
passages.content_zh:
紅仙子：
好吧，我猜你確實打敗了最糟糕的蘋果
並拯救果園。

但你最近为我们做了什么？

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon Fairy 3 — p1
passages.content:
Yellow Fairy:
You're close Hero! I saw the Worst Apple run
south!

Here, I saved this for you!

She holds out a pile of fruit.

Suddenly you hear a roar from the south.

The fruit comes to life and attacks!

Yellow Fairy:
I'm so sorry Hero! Please forgive meeee!
passages.content_zh:
黃仙女：
你很接近英雄！我看到最糟糕的蘋果跑了
南邊！

在這裡，我為你保存了這個！

她拿出一堆水果。

突然，你聽到南邊傳來一聲怒吼。

果實復活並攻擊！

黃仙女：
英雄真對不起！請原諒我！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon Fairy 3 — p2
passages.content:
Yellow Fairy:
I'm sooooooo sorry!
passages.content_zh:
黃仙女：
我非常抱歉！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon Fairy 3 — p3
passages.content:
Yellow Fairy:
I'm sooo glad you could save the orchard
anyway!

Yellow Fairy:
Thank you!
passages.content_zh:
黃仙女：
我很高興你能拯救果園
無論如何！

黃仙女：
謝謝！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon Fairy 4 — p1
passages.content:
Red Fairy:
Watch out! WATCH OUT! It's right behind you!

Yup, there it is.

Time for the fight scene!

You're not going to give it the satisfaction.

The Worst Apple gives one last cry, then
dissolves into sparkles and vanishes.

Red Fairy:
That was amazing!

It was all "rahr!"! And you were all "thwack!"
and "zap!" and "jiggle!"

It was all "rahr!"! And you were all "thwack!"
and "zap!"

Do it again! Do it again!
passages.content_zh:
紅仙子：
當心！當心！它就在你身後！

是的，就在那裡。

打鬥場面到了！

你不會給它帶來滿足。

最壞的蘋果發出最後的呼喊，然後
溶解成火花並消失。

紅仙子：
太棒了！

一切都是「啊！」！你們都「重擊」了！
和“扎！”和“搖晃！”

一切都是「啊！」！你們都「重擊」了！
和“扎！”

再做一次！再做一次！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Melon Fairy 4 — p2
passages.content:
Red Fairy:
You were so cool when you beat that monster!

Red Fairy:
I'm gonna go find you an even bigger monster
and it'll be even cooler to watch!
passages.content_zh:
紅仙子：
你打敗那個怪物的時候真是太酷了！

紅仙子：
我要去幫你找一個更大的怪物
而且觀看起來會更酷！

passages.name: Orchards ARG — Fairy fight start — p1
passages.content:
You see three fairies clustered around a
spectral cat.

Purple Fairy:
Caught you!

Blue Fairy:
We'll protect everyone from you evil fruit!

Red Fairy:
Uh boss, are you sure this is a fruit?

Purple Fairy:
Of course! Look, it's fuzzy like a peach! And
it's got that big stem in back!

Blue Fairy:
And sharp teeth like an apple!

Red Fairy:
Boss! Humans!

Purple Fairy:
Humans! Are you here to protect this evil
fruit? Are you enemies of justice?!

Blue Fairy:
Yeah! Justice!

Red Fairy:
Can they even hear us?

Purple Fairy:
How many times do I have to tell you? It's the
speech that's important, not if they can hear!

Blue Fairy:
Yeah! Warriors of Justice give speeches!

Red Fairy:
They're villains! Finally, real villains!

Purple Fairy:
Lovely Warrior Rangers of Justice! Attack!

Red Fairy:
Boss! Boss! I've heard of this!\.\. I think they're
trying to use "logic" against us!

Purple Fairy:
Logic?! How evil!\.
Attack!

Red Fairy:
Boss! They're leaving!

Purple Fairy:
Enemies of justice always run! \.
Attack!

Purple Fairy:
They're too powerful!\.
RUUUUUUUN!!!!!
passages.content_zh:
你看到三個仙女聚集在一個
光譜貓。

紫仙子：
抓住你了！

藍精靈：
我們會保護大家免受你們邪惡果實的侵害！

紅仙子：
呃老闆，你確定這是水果嗎？

紫仙子：
當然！你看，它像桃子一樣毛茸茸的！並且
它後面有那麼大的莖！

藍精靈：
還有像蘋果一樣尖銳的牙齒！

紅仙子：
老闆！人類！

紫仙子：
人類！你是來保護這個邪惡的嗎
水果？你們是正義的敵人嗎？ ！

藍精靈：
是啊！正義！

紅仙子：
他們甚至能聽到我們的聲音嗎？

紫仙子：
我要告訴你多少次？這是
演講很重要，而不是他們能否聽到！

藍精靈：
是啊！正義戰士演講！

紅仙子：
他們是惡棍！最後，真正的惡棍！

紫仙子：
可愛的正義戰士遊俠！攻擊！

紅仙子：
老闆！老闆！我聽過這個！ \.\.我認為他們是
試著用「邏輯」來對付我們！

紫仙子：
邏輯？ ！多麼邪惡啊！ \.
攻擊！

紅仙子：
老闆！他們要走了！

紫仙子：
正義的敵人總是逃跑！ \.
攻擊！

紫仙子：
他們太強大了！ \.
嗚嗚嗚！ ！ ！ ！ ！ ！

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 4 — Flower seller — p2
passages.content:
Community Volunteer:
Did you feel that?!

Why, I feel five years younger!

And look, all the plants are blooming now!
passages.content_zh:
社區志工：
你有感覺嗎？

為什麼，我感覺自己年輕了五歲！

看，現在所有的植物都開花了！

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 4 — Flower seller — p3
passages.content:
Community Volunteer:
The flowers have been selling much better
since they all bloomed!

Would you like to buy one?

Please?  50$ for a good cause?

You don't have enough money.

Plant pot acquired!

You could wear it as a helmet, you guess?

Community Volunteer:
If you can't afford to donate, there are still
plently of other ways to help the park. Talk to
the other volunteers for suggestions.

Why, that wouldn't happen to be one of
Daisy's milkshakes you've got there, would it?

Could I, uh, give it a taste?
No one makes milkshakes like Daisy does.

You hand over the milkshake.

He takes a long drink.

He takes another long drink. \.

You blink. It almost looks like his wrinkles
are starting to fade.

Community Volunteer:
Ah, that's the stuff.

Another drink.\. His skin is definitely smoothing
itself out, like time is running backwards. And
he seems to be leaning less on his cane.

You know, I used to help out with the farm,
before these old bones stopped being able to
handle it.

He takes a big stretch. There's a series of
loud popping noises, and when he relaxes
he's easily standing straight.
He props his cane up on one shoulder.

Daisy made these back then too. Best things
I ever tasted.

He's standing straight now, but he's still just
as short as when he was hunched over his
cane. In fact, you think you see him dropping
another inch or two as you watch.

His skin has finished smoothing out to a
healthy young texture, seeming to suck
his beard back into his face as it goes.

I've missed it, since I moved out to the front.
Don't want to just stop by and ask for one if
I'm not helping.

His face has rounded, any hard lines smoothed
away.  Meanwhile his clothing has started to
shift around his body, tightening up to reveal
slim but fit curves.

But my old bones just won't take the farm
work anymore.

His cane is changing too, growing longer. The
end shifts to a silvery color then expands,
splitting into four tines and leaving him holding
a pitchfork.

His clothe
passages.content_zh:
社區志工：
鮮花賣得更好了
因為它們都開花了！

您想買一個嗎？

請？  50 美元有什麼好的理由？

你沒有足夠的錢。

花盆買了！

你猜，你可以把它當頭盔戴？

社區志工：
如果你無力捐款，還有
還有很多其他方法可以幫助公園。交談
其他志工提出建議。

為什麼，那不會是其中之一
你那裡有黛西奶昔，是嗎？

我可以，呃，嚐嚐嗎？
沒有人像黛西那樣製作奶昔。

你把奶昔遞過來。

他喝了一大口。

他又喝了一大口。 \.

你眨眼。幾乎看起來像他的皺紋
開始褪色。

社區志工：
啊，就是這個東西。

再來一杯。 \.他的皮膚絕對光滑
自己出去了，就像時間倒流一樣。並且
他似乎不再那麼倚著拐杖了。

你知道嗎 我以前在農場幫忙
在這些老骨頭失去能力之前
處理它。

他舒了一口氣。有一系列的
巨大的爆裂聲，當他放鬆時
他很容易站直。
他把拐杖撐在一側肩膀上。

黛西當時也做了這些事。最好的事情
我曾經嚐過。

他現在站直了，但他仍然只是
就像他彎腰駝背時一樣短
甘蔗。事實上，你認為你看到他摔倒了
當你觀看時，再增加一兩英寸。

他的皮膚已經變得光滑了
健康年輕的質感，看起來很吸
當它消失時，他的鬍子又回到了臉上。

自從我搬到前面後，我就錯過了。
不想只是停下來索取一個如果
我不幫忙。

他的臉變圓了，所有的硬紋都變得平滑了
離開。  同時，他的衣服也開始改變
在他的身體周圍移動，收緊以揭示
苗條但貼合曲線。

但我的老骨頭就是不肯佔領農場
不再工作了。

他的手杖也發生了變化，變得更長了。的
末端變成銀色然後膨脹，
分裂成四個尖齒並讓他握住
乾草叉。

他的衣服

啊，那個奶昔真是太對了！

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 4 — Vines — p1
passages.content:
A loose tangle of lush vines blocks the way.

There's almost enough room to squeeze past.
If you could just clear them a little...

You tear out the vines and push them to
the side.

Behind them you see a faintly shimmering
cow, grazing contentedly on the grass.

When she sees you she ambles into your
inventory.

Cow Mother acquired!

The vines have already turned green and
soft. There's nothing for the potion to do.
passages.content_zh:
茂盛的藤蔓鬆散地纏結，擋住了去路。

幾乎有足夠的空間可以擠過去。
如果你能把它們清除一點的話...

你撕下藤蔓並將它們推向
側面。

在他們身後，你會看到一道微弱的光芒
牛，在草地上心滿意足地吃草。

當她看到你時，她會慢慢地走進你的身邊
庫存。

牛媽媽收購了！

藤蔓已經變綠了
柔軟。藥水沒有什麼作用。

Ready to go back to your apartment for the

Buy something?

passages.content:
A dark passage leads into the seal.

You can't see what's inside.

passages.content:
You approach the seal. \.

Suddenly, a figure appears from inside.

The Great Goddess Florauna:
\{Heeeeello everyone~~

She steps forward.

The Great Goddess Florauna:
Thank you for freeing me!

The Great Goddess Florauna:
And thank you!

The Great Goddess Florauna:
And thank you!

The Great Goddess Florauna:
And thank you again! \!
Now, great hero ,
are you ready to receive your reward?

She cuts you off before you can get a word
out.

Oh don't worry, I know exactly what you must
want.

She looks you up and down, considering.

Yes, yes, it's very clear.

She puts her hands out towards you and
focuses.

Now, receive my blessing!

// Raises lowest of breasts, hips, butt? She's glad to have fixed that
"flatness" problem you have.

As the light washes over you, you feel a
gentle warmth pass through you. \.\.

Warm and welcoming, like a kind hug.

It lingers for a moment, then concentrates
in your chest.

It lingers for a moment, then concentrates
in your ass.

You feel flesh rub against your clothes as you
swell larger.

The Great Goddess Florauna:
I would love to stay longer with you lovely
people, but destiny calls!

Guardian:
Aren't you forgetting the other blessing, oh

Such a loyal follower is deserving of a
companion like me.

The Great Goddess Florauna:
(What are you talking about?)

Shrine Guardian:
(Do you know how many centuries I've been
waiting here? I deserve a vacation!)

*She motions to you*
(And look at her! So much potential, so easy
to shape. She'll be so fun to play with!)

The Great Goddess Florauna:
*Coughs*
Uh, yes, I also meant to award you a
companion.

Be honored, for this is a boon granted to only
my most loyal followers!

Kaede joined your party!

 joined-\.\^

Nope, we're not having any of that. My name
is Kaede, got it?

Kaede joined your party!

Kaede:
*She grins at you, staring at your chest*
We're going to have so much fun together.

Great Goddess Florauna:
Well, I would love to be staying, but the wor

偉大女神弗洛勞娜：

楓加入你的隊伍了！

 加入-\.\^

楓：

*她對你微笑，盯著你的胸部*
我們會一起玩得很開心。

偉大女神弗洛勞娜：
嗯，我很想留下來，但世界

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 4 — Head Priestess — p1
passages.content:
A wave of energy rolls out as the final pillar

The head priestess begins to blossom as well

Head Priestess:
Hero! You've done it!

A final seal remains on the godess's prison,
but with this we have more than enough
power to open it.

But beware, legend says that a fearsome
creature will test any who wish to approach
the goddess for worthiness.

Let me heal you.

Speak to me when you are ready to face the
goddess's guardian.

一股能量波作為最後的支柱展開

你，花草，撕裂自己

英雄！你已經做到了！

女神的監獄上還殘留著最後的封印，

但要小心，傳說中有一個可怕的

值得的女神。

讓我治愈你。

當你準備好面對的時候就跟我說話吧

Open!

You dare-\.

The guardian gets blasted forward by the last

Guardian(?):
\}You win.

The priestesses step back from each other
and open their eyes.

Head Priestess:
Did it work?

Return to me when you are ready to face the
goddess's challenge.
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
你準備好面對女神了嗎？
守護者、英雄？

女祭司長：
我準備的時候退後一步。

謝謝。現在，讓我們確保我們打破了
印章。

她把初級女祭司叫了過來。

女祭司長：
做好準備。我們將傾注我們的全部
喚醒我們女神的能量。

初級女祭司：
這是一種榮幸！

兩位女祭司面對面並聯繫在一起
手。他們閉上眼睛，開始
念誦。

慢慢地，他們低下頭，直到他們
額頭相觸。

她們巨大的乳房緊緊地壓在一起
當他們移動時擠壓他們的手臂
更近了。

他們周圍開始散發出光芒。

女祭司長：\^
噢，偉大的弗洛勞娜女神，請聆聽我們的懇求。 \|

\>女祭司長：
\>哦偉大的女神弗洛勞娜，請聆聽我們的懇求。

讓你的封印打開吧！

初級和女祭司長：
打開！

密封件的前部慢慢地磨開。

一道人影從裡面出現。

監護人（？）：
封印已經打開！

\^誰認為自己值得-\。

\^初級和女祭司長：
打開！ \|

\^守護者（？）：
你敢——\。

\^初級和女祭司長：
打開！ \|

\^守護者（？）：
等等！ \.

\^初級和女祭司長：
打開！ \|

\^守護者（？）：
停下來！ \.

\^初級和女祭司長：
打開！ \|

守護者被最後一個砲彈向前推進
一道閃電，撞在其中一個封印上
柱子。

她倒在地上，煙霧繚繞
輕輕地離開她的身體。

監護人（？）：
\}你贏了。

女祭司們互相後退一步
並睜開他們的眼睛。

女祭司長：
有效嗎？

當你準備好面對的時候回到我身邊
女神的挑戰。

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 4 — Head Priestess — p3
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
Hero, you defeated the guardian!

Please, bring the goddess out!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
英雄，你打敗守護者了！

請把女神帶出來吧！

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 4 — Head Priestess — p4
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
I can't believe it! The goddess is finally
returned to us!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
我簡直不敢相信！女神終於來了
回到了我們身邊！

passages.name: Street Real — Bird feeder — p1
passages.content:
Bird Feeder:
Don't fight dears, there's enough seed for
everyone.
passages.content_zh:
餵鳥器：
別吵了親愛的，有足夠的種子
大家。

passages.name: Street Real — Bird feeder — p2
passages.content:
Bird Feeder:
I may not have much left to do with my days,
but at least the birds are always happy to see
me.
passages.content_zh:
餵鳥器：
我的日子可能已經沒有太多可做的了
但至少鳥兒總是很高興看到
我。

passages.name: Street Real — Bird feeder — p3
passages.content:
Bird Feeder:
The girls at the bank have been so nice
recently!

One of them shared her snacks with me and
I feel twenty years younger!
passages.content_zh:
餵鳥器：
銀行的姑娘們都很好
最近！

其中一位與我分享了她的零食
我覺得自己年輕了二十歲！

passages.name: Street Real — p3
passages.content:
The door is locked.\!
They probably need time to calm the animals.
passages.content_zh:
門鎖著。 \!
他們可能需要時間讓動物平靜下來。

passages.name: Street Real — p6
passages.content:
Locked.\!
You hope everyone is doing okay.
passages.content_zh:
已鎖定。 \!
你希望每個人都一切都好。

passages.name: Street Real — Alley entrance 2
passages.content:
You see a dark alley ahead. Probably not a
good place to go exploring.
passages.content_zh:
你看到前面有一條黑暗的小巷。可能不是一個
探索的好地方。

passages.name: Street Real — p1
passages.content:
It looks like the police officer guarding the
door is distracted.  Slip inside?
passages.content_zh:
看起來像是守衛的警察
門心煩意亂。  溜進去？

passages.name: Street Real — p3
passages.content:
\{CLOSED FOR CLEANUP
    Apologies for the inconvenience!

Look forward to apology sales in the next few
days!
passages.content_zh:
\{關閉進行清理
    造成您的不便，敬請諒解！

期待未來幾年的道歉銷售
天！

passages.name: Street Real — Bus stop — p1
Street Real — p1
passages.content:
Security Guard:
This is not in my job description.
passages.content_zh:
保全員：
這不在我的工作說明中。

passages.name: Street Real — Door guard — p1
passages.content:
Hassled Security Guard:
Yes ma'am, I know how difficult it is that we
had to close down the department store.

But it's not safe to let anyone in before they
turn the power back on.
passages.content_zh:
麻煩的保全：
是的，女士，我知道我們有多困難
不得不關閉百貨公司。

但在他們之前讓任何人進來並不安全
重新打開電源。

passages.name: Street Real — Door guard — p2
passages.content:
Hassled Security Guard:
Yes ma'am, I know how difficult it is that we
had to close down the department store.

But they need to make sure everything's safe
before they let people back in.
passages.content_zh:
麻煩的保全：
是的，女士，我知道我們有多困難
不得不關閉百貨公司。

但他們需要確保一切安全
在他們讓人們回來之前。

passages.name: Street Real — Door guard — p3
passages.content:
Security Guard:
Ma'am, are you sure you wouldn't like a
blanket?

Customer:
I told you, I want my own clothes back!
Nothing else!
passages.content_zh:
保全員：
女士，您確定不喜歡
毯子？

客戶：
我告訴過你，我要回我自己的衣服！
沒有別的了！

passages.name: Street Real — p1
passages.content:
Persistent Customer:
How about now?

Persistent Customer:
When can we go back in? \|
Are the lights back on? \|
Can we go back in now?
passages.content_zh:
持久客戶：
現在怎麼樣？

持久客戶：
我們什麼時候可以回去？ \|
燈又亮了嗎？ \|
我們現在可以回去了嗎？

passages.name: Street Real — p2
passages.content:
Persistent Customer:
If the employees get to go back in, why can't
I?\!
Are you saying customers are less important?!
passages.content_zh:
持久客戶：
如果員工可以回去，為什麼不能
我？ \！
你是說客戶不那麼重要嗎？ ！

passages.name: Street Real — Merchant — p1
passages.content:
Store Employee:
I can't believe the power went out on the day
of the big sale.

I took my jewelry case with me, so I can still
sell you a few things.
passages.content_zh:
店員：
我不敢相信那天停電了
的大拍賣。

我帶著我的首飾盒，所以我仍然可以
賣給你一些東西。

passages.name: Street Real — p1
passages.content:
Angry Customer:
One star! One star everywhere!

Angry Customer:
I can't believe they closed the department
store in the middle of the sale!

Who cares if the power went out? I have cash!
passages.content_zh:
憤怒的顧客：
一顆星！到處都是一顆星！

憤怒的顧客：
我不敢相信他們關閉了這個部門
商店正在促銷！

誰在乎停電了？我有現金！

passages.name: Street Real — p2
passages.content:
Player Brad:
That was amazing! \!
I can't wait to see what they do tomorrow.
passages.content_zh:
球員布拉德：
太棒了！ \！
我迫不及待地想看看他們明天會做什麼。

passages.name: Street Real — Bored employee — p1
passages.content:
Bored Employee:
I'd better still get paid for this.
passages.content_zh:
無聊的員工：
我最好還是為此付錢。

passages.name: Street Real — Manager — p1
passages.content:
Manager:
I can't believe this happened during the big
opening!
passages.content_zh:
經理：
我不敢相信這發生在大
開幕！

passages.name: Street Real — Autoplay event — p2
passages.content:
Manager:
I saw the lights come on! Is everything fixed
now?

Manager:
Finally!\!

\{BACK TO WORK EVERYONE!

System Message:
This concludes our testing for today.\!
Thank you for another day of excellent work!

Manager:
Oh, I hope they fix everything soon. \!
How could this have happened?!
passages.content_zh:
經理：
我看到燈亮了！一切都確定了嗎
現在？

經理：
終於！ \!

\{大家回去工作！

系統訊息：
我們今天的測試到此結束。 \!
感謝您又一天出色的工作！

經理：
哦，我希望他們盡快解決所有問題。 \！
怎麼會發生這樣的事？ ！

passages.name: Street Real — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
So cozy.

She yawns.

Maybe I should get some coffee before
heading home.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
好溫馨。

她打哈欠。

也許我應該先喝點咖啡
回家。

passages.name: Street Real — p2
passages.content:
Panicked Employee:
Please don't tell anyone I snuck out.

There's no way I'm staying in there to get
attacked again.
passages.content_zh:
驚慌失措的員工：
請不要告訴任何人我偷偷溜出去了。

我不可能待在那裡
再次襲擊。

passages.name: Street Real — p2
passages.content:
Persistent Customer:
I can't believe it!\!
The police let all the employees back in but
not the customers!

I should complain to their manager.\!
Do police even have managers?
passages.content_zh:
持久客戶：
我簡直不敢相信！ \!
警察讓所有員工回來了，但是
不是顧客！

我應該向他們的經理投訴。 \！
警察有管理人員嗎？

passages.name: Street Real — p2
passages.content:
Player BirbcraticMachine:
Is it just me, or does that birdseed look really
tempting for some reason?
passages.content_zh:
玩家 BirbcraticMachine：
只有我覺得這樣嗎，還是那鳥食看起來真的
出於某種原因誘惑？

passages.name: Street Real — Driver — p2
passages.content:
The man is staring blankly into the open hood
of the car.

Driver:
Why won't you start?

I gave you gas.\.\. I changed your oil.\!
Do you need a jump? \.\.A new battery?\|
A hug?

Driver:
Ow!\.\.
I don't need a jump, the car does!
passages.content_zh:
男人茫然地盯著打開的引擎蓋
汽車的。

司機：
為什麼不開始呢？

我給了你汽油。 \.\.我幫你換油了。 \!
你需要跳嗎？ \.\.新電池？ \|
一個擁抱？

司機：
噢！ \.\.
我不需要跳躍，汽車需要！

passages.name: Street Real — Driver — p3
passages.content:
She's carefully rocking back and forth on her
wheels.

Driver:
So that's the brake...\|
That's the gas...

She starts, then blushes.

Driver:
And that must be the stick shift.

Driver:
Hee!\.\.
That tickles!
passages.content_zh:
她小心翼翼地在她身上來回搖晃
輪子。

司機：
這就是煞車...\|
就是這個氣體...

她吃了一驚，然後臉紅了。

司機：
那一定是變速桿。

司機：
嘿！ \.\.
好癢啊！

passages.name: Street Real — Dog walker — p2
passages.content:
Dog walker:
Who's a good Poochie? You're a good Poochie!
passages.content_zh:
遛狗者：
誰是好波奇？你真是一隻好狗狗！

passages.name: Street Real — Car front — p2
passages.content:
A lightning bolt shoots from your fingers, and
you hear the car engine rumble to life.

But the energy keeps pouring out of you.

And then the stream of electricity arcs.

Driver:
Whaaaaaaaa!!!

The stream of electricity continues to pour
from your fingers, despite anything you do to
try and stop it.

So much energy passes through the car that
it begins to glow and twist. \.\.
Meanwhile the man is nearly floating off the
ground on a web of electricity.

The hood of the car rises into the air, pulled
up by strings of lightning.\!
Folds itself much smaller.

Then slams into the man, wrapping around
him.

Then another piece.\.\. And another.

The whole scene grows so bright that you
have to close your eyes, tears streaming down
your face.

// 0 = event not activated
1 - pulled self away, no TF.
2 - just changed
3 - day after change

Until finally you feel the flow of energy abate.

You open your eyes.

The car has vanished, leaving behind a single
changed figure.

Driver:
Uh...

She looks ill.

Driver:
I...\.\.\. ugh...

She spasms, making a loud clicking noise.\.\.
She clutches her stomach.

She clicks again, looking like she's about
to heave.

And again.

Except this time it's followed by the sound of
an engine starting up.

She gives a massive belch, blasting you with
the smell of exhaust.\!
Then pounds her chest a time or two,
straightening up and looking relieved.

Driver:
Oh, that feels so much better.

She turns to you.

Driver:
Thanks for the help!
passages.content_zh:
一道閃電從你的手指中射出，然後
你聽到汽車引擎的轟鳴聲。

但能量不斷從你身上湧出。

然後電弧流。

司機：
哇啊啊啊！ ！ ！

電流不斷傾瀉
從你的手指，無論你做什麼
嘗試阻止它。

如此多的能量通過汽車
它開始發光並扭曲。 \.\.
與此同時，這名男子幾乎已經從海面上飄走了。
接地在電力網路上。

汽車引擎蓋升到空中，被拉
被閃電串起來。 \！
折疊起來小得多。

然後猛地撞向男人，包裹住
他。

然後是另一塊。 \.\.還有另一個。

整個場景變得如此明亮，以至於你
不得不閉上眼睛，淚水流下來
你的臉。

// 0 = 事件未啟動
1 - 自我拉開，沒有TF。
2 - 剛剛改變
更改後 3 天

直到最後你感覺到能量的流動減弱了。

你睜開眼睛。

車子消失了，只剩下一個
改變了數字。

司機：
呃...

她看起來病了。

司機：
我...\.\.\.呃...

她痙攣著，發出很大的喀喀聲。 \.\.
她摀著肚子。

她再次點擊，看起來她即將
舉起。

又來了。

只是這次緊跟在後的是
引擎啟動。

她打了個大大的嗝，用
排氣的味道。 \！
然後捶打她的胸部一兩次，
直起身來，看起來如釋重負。

司機：
哦，那感覺好多了。

她轉向你。

司機：
感謝您的幫忙！

passages.name: Street Real — Driver zooming — p2
passages.content:
Driver:
Wheeeeee!\!
This is so much more fun than driving!

And I get double the gas mileage!
passages.content_zh:
司機：
哎喲！ \！
這比開車有趣多了！

而且我的油耗增加了一倍！

passages.name: Street Real
passages.content:
System Message:
No need for boring old money, !\!
The game drops exciting BE Bucks for you to
spend!
passages.content_zh:
系統訊息：
不需要無聊的舊錢，！ \！
遊戲將為您掉落令人興奮的 BE Bucks
花！

passages.name: Street Real — p1
passages.content:
Park Volunteer BeeJ:
Look at what zzzey did to me! I demand you
arrezzzt them!

Security Guard:
Sorry Ma'am, but for one, I can't arrest a
beehive no matter what it's done.

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
Then at leazzt go after that zzztupid bee lover!

Security Guard:
And two, I'm just mall security.\!
I can't arrest anyone!

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
I can't beelieve it! Thizzz hazzz to break
zzzome zzzort of law!
passages.content_zh:
公園志工BeeJ：
看看zzzey對我做了什麼！我要求你
逮捕他們！

保全員：
抱歉，女士，但我不能逮捕一個人
蜂箱，無論它做了什麼。

公園志工BeeJ：
然後就去追那個愚蠢的蜜蜂愛好者吧！

保全員：
第二，我只是商場保全。 \！
我不能逮捕任何人！

公園志工BeeJ：
我簡直不敢相信！嘶嘶嘶嘶地打破
zzzome zzzort 法律！

passages.name: Street Real
passages.content:
\{Historic Landmark
\}Open for public use!

For all your religish needs!
passages.content_zh:
\{歷史地標
\}開放供民眾使用！

滿足您所有的宗教需求！

passages.name: Street Real — p1
passages.content: Your glasses click on as you enter the bank.
passages.content_zh: 當你進入銀行時，你的眼鏡發出喀喀聲。

passages.name: Street Real — Escaped dog — p1
passages.content:
A dog is here eagerly sniffing at a dumpster.

You give Doug a call and he arrives a few
minutes later.

Shelter Head Doug:
Come on Daisy, good girls don't roll in trash.\!
We are going to have to give you such a bath
when you get back.

\v[144] out of 3 dogs rescued!
passages.content_zh:
一隻狗正急切地嗅著垃圾箱。

你給道格打個電話，他會來幾個
分鐘後。

庇護所負責人道格：
來吧，黛西，好女孩不會在垃圾桶裡滾。 \！
我們得給你一個這樣的澡
當你回來時。

\v[144] 三隻狗獲救！

passages.name: Street Real — Kyle — p1
passages.content:
Kyle:
Oh no oh no oh no.

He's staring at the box for the model robot he
just bought.

Kyle:
Batteries not included.\!
My gift for Darren needs to be perfect! It can't
be missing anything!

He turns to the department store.

Kyle:
It's okay Kyle. You can just go buy batteries.
It'll be fine.

He turns back.

Kyle:
But I shouldn't *need* to buy batteries!\!
It's fine, this is fine!

I don't need to make everything perfect, no
one will mind. No one.

Kyle:
...But what if he does?

Kyle:
He won't.

Kyle:
Unless...

Kyle:
Come on Kyle, just make a decision!\!
One or the other!

Kyle:
I'm stuck.\!
I-\. I just can't-

I just can't get the strength to move!\!
It'll all go wrong somehow!
passages.content_zh:
凱爾：
哦不哦不哦不。

他盯著他模型機器人的盒子
剛買的。

凱爾：
不包括電池。 \!
我給達倫的禮物必須是完美的！它不能
會漏掉什麼嗎！

他轉向百貨公司。

凱爾：
沒關係，凱爾。你可以去買電池。
會沒事的。

他回頭。

凱爾：
但我不應該*需要*買電池！ \！
沒事，這樣就好了！

我不需要讓一切都完美，不
有人會介意的。沒有人。

凱爾：
……但如果他這麼做了怎麼辦？

凱爾：
他不會。

凱爾：
除非...

凱爾：
來吧，凱爾，做出決定吧！ \!
一個或另一個！

凱爾：
我被困住了。 \!
我-\。我就是不能-

我就是沒有力氣移動！ \!!
一切都會以某種方式出錯！

passages.name: Street Real — Kyle — p2
passages.content:
Kyle:
I-\. I can't.

I just need a nudge.\!
The energy to choose!\!
Augh, why am I like this?!

He takes a deep breath.

Kyle:
No, no, this is fine.\!
I can just give this to Darren.

I wouldn't mind if he gave me this, so he
won't mind if I give him this.\!
He won't hate me forever for a single tiny
mistake.

He takes another deep breath, not noticing
his boxed robot starting to crackle with
electricity.

You have to shield your eyes as it grows
brighter and brighter.

Kyle:
This will all be fine.\!
This is fine.\!
This is fine.

This is-\!
\{ALL SYSTEMS OPTIMAL

The light fades, revealing a changed Kyle.

Kyle:
I'm going to-

She jerks as she realizes her hands are
empty.

Kyle:
Oh no.\!
Oh no oh no oh no.

She starts frantically patting herself down,
searching for the box.

Kyle:
It can't be missing.\!
Oh god, how is it missing.

She checks the former location of her pockets,
her front...

Kyle:
Where?\!
Where?!\!
W- where...?

Her hands find something unexpected on her
chest.

Kyle:
What...?

She squeezes.

Kyle:
Ah!

She finally takes a look at herself.

Kyle:
Oh.\!
Oh!

Kyle:
Oh, I think Darren is going to enjoy this

passages.name: Florauna room ARG — Goddess — p1
passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
Hero! I have seen things!\!
Dreams!\! Visions!\! Things you wouldn't
believe!

Things that would snap your frail mortal mind
like a twig!

She pauses.

A dry twig.\!
Green twigs can be extremely tough.\!
Almost exactly unlike a mortal mind.

She pauses again.

Anyway! The visions!

I have seen a chained seed, slowly beginning
to sprout.  The seed itself is trapped, but its
roots are starting to spread and spread...

I have seen my sister Hadea! She is safe, but
eternallly trapped in an impossible task.\!
She strives and strives, but she will never
complete it, not without aid.

And while she struggles, the spirits she keeps
locked away have made a bid for freedom...

I have seen a strange blue bird, faster than
the wind.  Though a hungry beast forever
stalks its steps, it never falters, never fails.

It's such a funny little bird! It beeps, and it
runs, and there was this one time that the
beast tried to paint a tunnel to fool it but then
it ran through anyway and--

The head priestess clears her throat.

Head Priestess:
Oh great Florauna, I believe you are getting
just a bit off track.

Goddesss Florauna:
Oh yes, what would I do without you?

She beams at her priestess.

Goddess Florauna:
Hero, you must save my sister Hadea!

She is trapped in just the biggest store I've
ever seen!\!
One with the \{cutest\} outfits!

Why, I saw a skirt that would just go perfectly
with your eyes, !
And then you could add-

The priestess clears her throat again.
Loudly.

Goddess Florauna:
Er, yes.

You must free my sister Hadea!\!
Defeat the escaped spirits!\!
Find your way through the seal hiding her!\!
Complete her impossible task!

And if you did a little accessorizing while you
were there, I think it would look pretty great
on you~

System Message:
Your next challenge awaits at the department
store downtown.

System Message:
Will you be able to find the Goddess and
complete her impossible task?
passages.content_zh:
芙羅娜女神：
英雄！我看到東西了！ \！
夢想！ \！願景！ \！你不會做的事
相信！

那些會擊碎你脆弱的凡人心靈的事情
像一根樹枝！

她停了下來。

一根乾樹枝。 \!
綠色的樹枝可能非常堅韌。 \！
幾乎與凡人的頭腦完全不同。

她又停了下來。

反正！願景！

我看到一粒被鎖住的種子，慢慢開始
發芽。  種子本身被困住了，但它
根開始蔓延、蔓延…

我看見我妹妹哈迪亞了！她很安全，但是
永遠陷入不可能的任務。 \！
她努力又努力，但她永遠不會
完成它，而不是沒有幫助。

當她掙扎時，她仍保持著精神
被鎖起來的人們為自由而努力…

我看過一隻奇怪的藍鳥，速度比
風。  雖然永遠是飢餓的野獸
堅定自己的腳步，永不動搖，永不失敗。

這是一隻多麼有趣的小鳥啊！它發出嘟嘟聲，然後
運行，有一次
野獸試圖畫一條隧道來愚弄它，但後來
無論如何它都跑過去了——

女祭司長清了清喉嚨。

哦，是的，沒有你我該怎麼辦？

她對她的女祭司微笑。

英雄，你一定要救我的妹妹哈迪亞！

她被困在我見過的最大的商店裡
見過！ \！
擁有\{最可愛\}服裝的人！

為什麼，我看到了一條完美搭配的裙子
用你的眼睛，！
然後你可以添加-

女祭司再次清了清喉嚨。
高聲。

芙羅娜女神：

你必須釋放我的妹妹哈迪亞！ \！
擊敗逃脫的靈魂！ \！
找到隱藏她的封印的出路！ \！
完成她不可能的任務！

如果你在穿衣服的時候做了一些配件
在那裡，我認為它看起來會很棒
在你身上~

passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
Hero! I am so glad to see you again!

Why, I was just thinking how lovely it would

And it looks like you have made some
connection with forces beyond yourself, as
heroes so often do!

Let me read your energies.

She holds her hands out to you and
concentrates.

Goddess Florauna:
I see you have made a connection with the
great and noble cow! I would say its strength
is about \V[80].

Goddess Florauna:
The power of nature itself flows through you!
About \V[76] units of nature, I'd say.

看起來你已經做了一些

讓我讀一下你的能量。

她向你伸出雙手
集中。

passages.name: Florauna room ARG — Goddess — p5
passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
A wonderful morning to you, !

This is just such a wonderful day!\!
The birds are singing, the bees are buzzing,
and all the animals are screwing!

Why, it fills me with such energy!

She twirls, while birds sing in chorus and
rabbits hump each other in the room's corners.

Goddess Florauna:
This new energy has given me all sorts of
ideas!

Why, I think I might be able to help your
companions blossom into their true potential!

And I could always check if you've made a
connection to the greater spirits of the world.

She holds her hands out to you and
concentrates.

Goddess Florauna:
I see you have made a connection with the
great and noble cow! I would say its strength
is about [...].

Goddess Florauna:
The power of nature itself flows through you!
About [...] units of nature, I'd say.

Goddess Florauna:
Darling, you've been hanging out with a
dragon? Spicy!
You've absorbed [...] units of it's nature!

Goddess Florauna:
I'm afraid you have not made any connection
with the greater forces of our world,
.

It's sad!\!
Tragic!\!
Go out there and explore!

The goddess presses a hand dramatically to
her forehead.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh!\!
I'm so sorry darling, but you lack the raw
mana I need for this!

Please, come back with some and I would
*love* to help you out.

You ask Florauna what she means by upgrading
your companions.

Goddess Florauna:
Why darling, I am the Goddess of Growth!
Of Overflowing Bounty!

Helping people grow is my duty! My calling!

Helping them blossom forth, swell into their
true potential...\!
Why, I'd love to help even if you *hadn't* done
so much for me and my sisters!

Now, their exact upgrade will depend on their
class.

And they'll need to have advanced far enough
in it - you can't build a tower without a base!

But get far enough and who knows how many
times I can help them grow!

She hugs herself with delight.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh darling, it's going to be wonderful!

Her priestess gives a cough.

He

passages.content:

Nice, nice. Could be better, but nice.

concentrates.

gives her chest a poke.

passages.name: Florauna room ARG — Kaede — p2
passages.content:
Kaede is looking down at her changed figure.

Kaede:
Ah, it dost my heart good to be a small step
back towards my former glory.

She turns to look at her tails.

Kaede:
And I have always liked the way black looks
on me.

Kaede is looking down at her changed figure.

Kaede:
Ah, it dost my heart good to be a small step
back towards my former glory.

Kaede is looking down at her changed figure.

Kaede:
I do not believe that I have ever possessed
so slight a stature.

She bounces on her feet.

Kaede:
Though it dost leave me feeling quite nimble!

Kaede:
It dost mine heart good to be able to bask
in the presence of mine goddess for a nonce.
passages.content_zh:
楓低頭看著自己變化的身影。

楓：
啊，踏出一小步對我來說是件好事
回到我以前的輝煌。

她轉身看著自己的尾巴。

楓：
我一直很喜歡黑色的樣子
在我身上。

楓低頭看著自己變化的身影。

楓：
啊，踏出一小步對我來說是件好事
回到我以前的輝煌。

楓低頭看著自己變化的身影。

楓：
我不相信我曾經擁有過
身材如此纖弱。

她用腳彈跳。

楓：
雖然它確實讓我感覺很靈活！

楓：
能夠曬太陽對我的心有好處

:

 is still practicing her magic.

:
Firebolt!

Ice!

Shocking grasp!

Ow!

:

 is still staring in amazement at

passages.content_zh:
:

 仍在練習她的魔法。

 仍然驚訝地看著

：

passages.name: Pet shelter 1
passages.content:
Shelter Head Felix:
I guess if you really have to get a dog, you
can go to the other side of the counter.

But wouldn't you rather have a cat?

Shelter Head Felix:
Welcome to the pet shelter!

Let me know if you're interested in meeting
our cats!

A cat is one of the most affectionate pets you
can get, and it knows how to take care of
itself.
passages.content_zh:
庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
我想如果你真的必須養一隻狗，你
可以走到櫃檯的另一邊。

但你不想養隻貓嗎？

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
歡迎來到寵物收容所！

如果您有興趣見面請告訴我
我們的貓！

貓是你最愛的寵物之一
可以獲得，而且它知道如何照顧
本身。

passages.name: Pet shelter 1
passages.content:
Shelter Head Doug:
We've also got some cats too I guess.

But honestly, most of them are jerks.

Go to the other end of the counter if you
want to meet them anyway.

Welcome!

We've got some amazing dogs here looking
for a new home.

They're called man's best friend for a reason.
You won't find another pet as loyal or as
friendly.
passages.content_zh:
庇護所負責人道格：
我想我們也有一些貓。

但說實話，他們大多都是混蛋。

如果您有以下情況，請前往櫃檯的另一端：
無論如何都想見他們。

歡迎！

我們這裡有一些很棒的狗在尋找
為了一個新家。

它們被稱為人類最好的朋友是有原因的。
您不會找到其他寵物如此忠誠或如此
友好的。

passages.name: Pet shelter 1
passages.content:
There are two donation jars here, labeled
CATS and DOGS.

It looks like they have exactly the same
amount of money in each.

Donate?

Volunteer:
Thank you for your donation!

Please ask us if you're interested in meeting
our animals.

He waits until you step away.

Out of the corner of your eye, you see him
scowling at the CATS jar.

He slips a dollar into the DOGS jar to bring
them equal again.

You don't have enough money!

Volunteer:
Thank you for your donation!

Please ask us if you're interested in meeting
our animals.

He waits until you step away.

Out of the corner of your eye, you catch him
frowning at the DOGS jar.

He dumps a handful of change into the CATS
jar to balance it out.

You don't have enough money!

You leave the jars alone.
passages.content_zh:
這裡有兩個捐款罐，貼標籤
貓和狗。

看起來他們有完全相同的
每項金額。

捐？

志工：
感謝您的捐贈！

請詢問我們您是否有興趣見面
我們的動物。

他會等到你走開。

你用眼角的餘光看到了他
皺起眉頭看著貓罐。

他把一美元塞進狗罐裡
他們又平等了。

你錢不夠！

志工：
感謝您的捐贈！

請詢問我們您是否有興趣見面
我們的動物。

他會等到你走開。

你用眼角的餘光捕捉了他
皺著眉頭看著狗罐。

他把一些零錢扔進了CATS
jar 來平衡它。

你錢不夠！

你別管罐子了。

passages.name: Pet shelter 1
passages.content:
Confused Person:
I told them I was equally interested in dogs
and cats.

They called me a heathen and made me sit in
the corner?
passages.content_zh:
迷惘的人：
我告訴他們我對狗同樣感興趣
和貓。

他們稱我為異教徒並讓我坐在裡面
角落？

If I can't shop, I guess looking at cute kitties

如果我不能購物，我想看看可愛的小貓

        超級食物冰沙

達裡爾注意到你正在看黑板。

咖啡師達裡爾：

奇怪的梦，但它承诺“得到

passages.name: Coffee shop — Coffee shop menu
passages.content:
You overhear the two baristas talking.

Barista Joel:
Have you restocked yet?

Barista Daryl:
I still haven't found a local place to get
everything.

Barista Joel:
Have you looked?

Barista Joel:
Look, you need to get moving on this. I know
buying local is important to you, but we're
nearly out of sweeteners *and* dairy.

Barista Daryl:
Okay, fine, I'll do it tomorrow.

Barista Joel:
You'd better. \.Or I'm going to do it.

Barista Joel:
I figure I can just go to the supermarket. \.\.
Non-dairy creamer's super cheap there.

Barista Joel:
They've got bulk honey too. \.\.
Or even better, corn syrup!

Daryl dramatically clutches his chest.

Barista Daryl:
No, please! You wouldn't do that to me, would
you?

Barista Joel:
As long as you get started tomorrow I won't.

Barista Daryl:
I promise, I promise!

Joel notices you waiting at the counter.

Barista Joel:
What can I get started for you?
passages.content_zh:
你無意中聽到兩個咖啡師的談話。

咖啡師喬爾：
你補貨了嗎？

咖啡師達裡爾：
我還沒找到當地的去處
一切。

咖啡師喬爾：
你看過嗎？

咖啡師喬爾：
聽著，你需要繼續前進。我知道
購買本地產品對您來說很重要，但我們
幾乎不含甜味劑*和*乳製品。

咖啡師達裡爾：
好吧，好吧，我明天就去做。

咖啡師喬爾：
你最好。 \.或者我要這麼做。

咖啡師喬爾：
我想我可以去超市。 \.\.
那裡的植脂末超便宜。

咖啡師喬爾：
他們也有散裝蜂蜜。 \.\.
或者更好的是，玉米糖漿！

達裡爾戲劇性地摀住胸口。

咖啡師達裡爾：
不，拜託！你不會那樣對我，會
你？

咖啡師喬爾：
只要你明天開始我就不會。

咖啡師達裡爾：
我保證，我保證！

喬爾注意到你在櫃檯等候。

咖啡師喬爾：
我能為您做些什麼？

passages.name: Coffee shop — Kyle — p2
passages.content:
The man on the left is staring worriedly into
his drink.

Man:
I'm just worried that it'll all turn out wrong.

The other man reaches out and grabs his hand
reassuringly.

Other man:
Kyle. Kyle. It'll be fine.

We've both talked to them about joining our
relationships before. It'll all work out.

Kyle:
But Lily has never been up for it before.

Other Man:
And so we gave them space. But now Rose
and Lily have both said they want to discuss
it.

Kyle:
Darren, that's why everything has to go right!
If this is a chance for us all to join together,
it needs to go perfectly.

But what if I choose the wrong gift?

Darren:
Look, you know that Rose and Lily care for
each other, right?

Kyle:
Yes...

Darren:
And they both care about both of us?

Kyle:
Yes...

Darren:
That's what's needed. That's the important
part.

We'll be able to work out the rest somehow,
if we're all trying.  Whatever form that takes.

Look, a gift is a nice idea, but it's not the
essential part. The essential part is us, and the
love we'll communicate with our gift.

Here, let's take a minute to finish our drinks
and relax.

And then we're going to go back in the store
and get them something that shows just how
valuable they are to us.

It'll be fine.

Kyle stares into his drink again. But he does
seem less worried.
passages.content_zh:
左邊的男人憂心忡忡地看著
他的飲料。

男士：
我只是擔心這一切都會變得錯誤。

另一個人伸出手抓住了他的手
令人安心地。

另一個男人：
凱爾.凱爾.會沒事的。

我們都和他們談過加入我們的
之前的關係。一切都會解決的。

凱爾：
但莉莉以前從來沒有這樣做過。

其他人：
所以我們給了他們空間。但現在羅斯
和莉莉都表示想討論
它。

凱爾：
達倫，這就是為什麼一切都必須順利進行！
如果這是我們大家團結起來的機會，
它需要完美地進行。

但如果我選錯禮物了怎麼辦？

達倫：
聽著，你知道羅絲和莉莉關心的
彼此，對嗎？

凱爾：
是的...

達倫：
他們都關心我們兩個？

凱爾：
是的...

達倫：
這就是所需要的。這才是重要的
部分。

我們將能夠以某種方式解決剩下的問題
如果我們都努力的話。  無論採取什麼形式。

聽著，禮物是個好主意，但它不是
必不可少的部分。最重要的部分是我們，而
愛，我們會用我們的禮物來溝通。

來，讓我們花一點時間喝完我們的飲料
並放鬆。

然後我們就回到商店
並給他們一些東西來展示如何
它們對我們來說很有價值。

會沒事的。

凱爾再次盯著他的飲料。但他確實
看起來不那麼擔心了。

passages.name: Coffee shop — p1
passages.content:
Customer:
Excuse me, I'm *trying* to enjoy my drink.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
對不起，我正在*嘗試*享受我的飲料。

passages.name: Coffee shop — p1
passages.content:
Customer:
What happened? It suddenly got really busy
in here.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
發生了什麼事？突然變得很忙
在這裡。

passages.name: Coffee shop — p1
passages.content:
Frustrated Customer:
The department store shuts down *and* it's
going to take forever to get coffee.

Today is the worst.
passages.content_zh:
沮喪的顧客：
百貨公司關門了*而且*
要花很長時間才能喝到咖啡。

今天是最糟糕的一天。

passages.name: Coffee shop — p1
passages.content:
Annoyed Customer:
I can't believe they kicked us out of the
department store.

And I had just found the perfect skirt too!
passages.content_zh:
惱怒的顧客：
我不敢相信他們把我們趕出了
百貨公司。

我也剛找到了完美的裙子！

passages.name: Coffee shop — p1
passages.content:
Irritated Customer:
This was supposed to be a pick-me up before
more shopping.

Now it's a pick-me-up until I can shop again.
passages.content_zh:
惱怒的顧客：
之前這本來是為了接我
更多購物。

現在，在我可以再次購物之前，它可以讓我提神。

passages.name: Coffee shop — p1
passages.content:
Customer:
I tell you, the manager of that department
store is going to be getting quite the stronly
worded note from me.

I can't believe the power went out in a new
building. If their building is that shoddy, how
is their merchandise?
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我告訴你，那個部門的經理
商店將會變得相當強大
我的措詞說明。

我不敢相信新的電源突然斷了
建築物。如果他們的建築這麼簡陋，怎麼辦？
是他們的商品嗎？

passages.name: Coffee shop — p1
passages.content:
Annoyed Customer:
I can't believe they shut down the department
store in the middle of the big opening sale!
passages.content_zh:
惱怒的顧客：
我不敢相信他們關閉了該部門
專賣店正在大開張促銷中！

passages.name: Coffee shop — Other counter clerk — p1
passages.content:
Barista Joel:
Whoa, we got a huge rush of people suddenly.
What happened?
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師喬爾：
哇哦，突然來了一大群人。
發生了什麼事？

passages.name: Coffee shop — Other counter clerk — p2
passages.content:
Barista Joel:
Welcome!\!
Talk to Daryl if you want to order something.
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師喬爾：
歡迎光臨！ \!
如果您想訂購一些東西，請與達裡爾聯繫。

passages.name: Coffee shop — Other counter clerk — p3
passages.content:
Barista Joel:
I'm so happy to see Daryl making new drinks
again.

He's really been hurting, not being able to
come up with anything.
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師喬爾：
我很高興看到達裡爾製作新飲料
再次。

他真的很痛苦，卻無法
想出任何辦法。

passages.name: Coffee shop — Other counter clerk — p4
passages.content:
Barista Joel:
You need something to wake up someone, and
normal coffee doesn't work?

Hmmm.

Barista Joel:
Hey Daryl, do you still remember the recipe for
that super-espresso you made a few years
back?

The one that kept us up for a week straight?

Barista Daryl:
Yeah, let me see if we've got everything.

He starts going through the shelves.

Fine ground coffee.\..\..\..\.. check.

Yerba mate.\..\..\..\.. check.

Guayusa extract.\..\..\..\.. check.

Desoxyn Lite.\..\..\..\.. check.

And that just leaves.\..\..\..\..\..\..\..\..\..\..

Barista Daryl:
Hey Joel, did we ever more Guatemalan
insanity peppers?

Barista Joel:
No.\!
I don't know why you had those in the first
place.

Those things are *nasty*!

Barista Daryl:
For passion!\!
For art!\!

To explore never-before seen frontiers of the
barista's craft!

Joel sighs.

Barista Joel:
No, there was no way I was getting more of
those things if we didn't need them.\!
Can you leave them out?

Barista Daryl:
Leave them out?\!
Leave them *out*?!\!
They were the heart and soul of that drink!

Without them I might be able to make a
drink that would awaken your mind, but it
wouldn't nourish your *soul*!

Also, I'm pretty sure you need the peppers \}to
make you sweat out the rest of the drink
before it makes your heart explode.

Barista Joel:
Daryl, you know I love helping you with your
art.

And you've made some stunning works of
unparalleled creativity.

But do we need to have The Talk again about
liability and how far you can go without
requiring a waiver?

Barista Daryl:
Fine, I'll tone it down some.\!
But it still needs an insanity pepper!\!
That's my limit!

Joel sighs and turns back to you.

Barista Joel:
And there you have it.\!
If you bring us a Guatemalan insanity pepper,
we can make you your drink.

You should check the farm in Garden Park.
They've grown some pretty weird stuff in the
past.
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師喬爾：
你需要一些東西來喚醒某人，並且
普通咖啡不行嗎？

嗯。

咖啡師喬爾：
嘿達裡爾，你還記得食譜嗎
你幾年前製作的超級濃縮咖啡
回來？

那個讓我們連續一週熬夜的人？

咖啡師達裡爾：
是的，讓我看看我們是否已經擁有一切。

他開始翻閱貨架。

細磨咖啡。 \..\..\..\.. 檢查。

馬黛茶馬黛茶。 \..\..\..\.. 檢查。

Guayusa 萃取物。 \..\..\..\.. 檢查。

Desoxyn Lite.\..\..\..\.. 檢查。

就剩下了\..\..\..\..\..\..\..\..\..\..

咖啡師達裡爾：
嘿喬爾，我們有沒有更多危地馬拉
瘋狂辣椒？

咖啡師喬爾：
不。 \!
我不知道你為什麼一開始就有這些
地方。

那些東西太*噁心*了！

咖啡師達裡爾：
為了激情！ \！
為了藝術！ \！

探索前所未見的前沿領域
咖啡師的手藝！

喬爾嘆了口氣。

咖啡師喬爾：
不，我不可能得到更多
那些東西，如果我們不需要它們的話。 \！
你能把它們排除在外嗎？

咖啡師達裡爾：
把他們排除在外？ \!
把他們*排除在外*？ ！ \！
它們是該飲料的核心和靈魂！

沒有他們我也許可以做一個
飲料會喚醒你的思想，但它
不會滋養你的*靈魂*！

另外，我很確定你需要辣椒\}
讓你流汗，喝掉剩下的飲料
在它讓你的心爆炸之前。

咖啡師喬爾：
達裡爾，你知道我喜歡幫助你
藝術。

你已經創作了一些令人驚嘆的作品
無與倫比的創造力。

但我們是否需要再次討論
責任以及您可以在沒有責任的情況下走多遠
需要豁免？

咖啡師達裡爾：
好吧，我會把它調低一些。 \!
但它仍然需要瘋狂的辣椒！ \！
這就是我的極限了！

喬爾嘆了口氣，轉身面向你。

咖啡師喬爾：
就這樣了。 \!
如果你帶給我們危地馬拉瘋狂辣椒
我們可以為您調製飲料。

你應該去看看花園公園的農場。
他們在裡面種了一些很奇怪的東西
過去。

passages.name: Coffee shop — Other counter clerk — p5
passages.content:
Barista Daryl:
Have they found the ingredients for my genius
to work yet?

Barista Joel:
Take a look in the farm in Garden Park to see
if they've got any insanity peppers.
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師達裡爾：
他們找到我天才的成分了嗎
上班了嗎？

咖啡師喬爾：
到花園公園的農場看看
如果他們有瘋狂的辣椒。

passages.name: Coffee shop — Other counter clerk — p6
passages.content:
Daryl takes a sniff of the pepper you hand him
and immediately starts coughing.

Barista Daryl:
Oh wow.

He continues, eyes streaming.

Barista Daryl:
That's the kick I remember!\!
With this I can make something that would
wake up a *rock*.

Barista Joel:
(May not actually work on rocks).

Barista Daryl:
Just give me a minute.

He pulls out a bunch of equipment and gets
to work.\!
Grinding, blending, filtering, until finally he
hands pours the final product into a cup.

He starts to hand it to you, until Joel pointedly
clears his throat.

Barista Joel:
A-*hem*!

Daryl rolls his eyes.

Barista Daryl:
Fine.

He hands Joel the cup.

Barista Joel:
Order for !

He hands you the cup.

Barista Joel:
Enjoy!

You hear them talking as you turn away.

Barista Daryl:
You know, I had forgotten how fun that was to
make. I think I'll add it to the daily special
rotation.
passages.content_zh:
達裡爾聞了聞你遞給他的胡椒
並立即開始咳嗽。

咖啡師達裡爾：
哦哇。

他繼續說道，眼睛流淌著。

咖啡師達裡爾：
這就是我記得的踢球！ \！
有了這個我可以做一些東西
醒來*搖滾*。

咖啡師喬爾：
（實際上可能不適用於岩石）。

咖啡師達裡爾：
請給我一分鐘。

他拿出一堆設備並得到
去工作。 \!
研磨、混合、過濾，直到最後
手將最終產品倒入杯中。

他開始把它遞給你，直到喬爾尖銳地指出
清了清喉嚨。

咖啡師喬爾：
A-*下擺*！

達裡爾翻白眼。

咖啡師達裡爾：
很好。

他把杯子遞給喬爾。

咖啡師喬爾：
訂購！

他把杯子遞給你。

咖啡師喬爾：
享受吧！

當你轉身離開時，你聽到他們說話。

咖啡師達裡爾：
你知道，我已經忘記了那是多麼有趣
使。我想我會把它加到每日特價中
旋轉。

passages.name: Coffee shop — Other counter clerk — p7
passages.content:
Barista Joel:
Good luck with the drink!\!
And if you ever want to try a less *intense*
version, Daryl's added it to the daily specials.

Check back every day to see if it's available!
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師喬爾：
祝你喝酒好運！ \!
如果你想嘗試一下不太*激烈的*
版本，達裡爾將其添加到每日特價中。

每天回來查看是否可用！

passages.name: Coffee shop — Brad — p2
passages.content:
Brad is staring dejectedly into a cup of coffee.

She sighes a deep, heartfelt sigh.

Player Brad:
I just, I just don't know what to do next.

I've spent my whole life looking for the
perfect boobs.

And now, I've found them.

A smile briefly passes across her face, as she
looks down at her massive chest.

Player Brad:
And they're wonderful!

She hugs her chest, boobflesh squishing out
around her arms.\!
But as she releases them, her smile fades.

Player Brad:
But now that I've found them, I don't know
what to do *next*!

Where do I go? What do I do?\!
What do I want anymore, now that I've gotten
everything I wanted?

She sighes and stares back into her coffee.

Player Brad:
Money can't buy happiness.\!
Or breasts, which are basically the same thing.

Well, implants, I guess.\!
But I don't need them!

She pats her chest, sending it wobbling.

Player Brad:
These babies are all real.

She looks a little offended.

Player Brad:
What would I use it for?\!
Boobs forced on others are cruel and
unworthy boobs!

She gives her breasts another hug.

Player Brad:
I'm happy to lead by example.

She shakes her head vigorously.

Player Brad:
No way!\!
I want to see if I can snap this shirt.

Power to the boobs!

She looks taken aback.

Player Brad:
Bigger\..\..\..\.\.
Bigger breasts?

She looks down at herself.\!
Gives her right boob a poke.

Hefts both of them thoughtfully.

Squeezes.

Player Brad:
Huh.

She starts looking a little excited.

Player Brad:
You know, you're totally right.

Yeah!\.\.
I could always go bigger!\!
Why not?!

She gives your chest a considering look.

Player Brad:
I mean, look at you!\!
I've barely gotten started!

She's getting more and more enthusiastic
as she speaks.

Player Brad:
Why should this be the end?

If I've reached my dreams, that just means
I didn't dream big enough!

If you're not growing, you're dying!\!
The sky's the limit!

She stands up suddenly, shouting in
excitment.

Player Brad:
I am Brad!\!
And I'll show this lousy world bett
passages.content_zh:
布拉德沮喪地盯著一杯咖啡。

她深深地、發自內心地嘆了口氣。

球員布拉德：
我只是，我只是不知道下一步該做什麼。

我一生都在尋找
完美的胸部。

現在，我找到他們了。

當她
低頭看著她巨大的胸部。

球員布拉德：
他們太棒了！

她摀住胸口，奶子被擠壓出來
摟住她的手臂。 \！
但當她鬆開它們時，她的笑容消失了。

球員布拉德：
但現在我找到了他們，我不知道
*下一步*做什麼！

我該去哪裡？我該怎麼辦？ \！
既然我已經得到了，我還想要什麼
我想要的一切？

她嘆了口氣，重新盯著咖啡。

球員布拉德：
金錢買不到幸福。 \!
或乳房，它們基本上是同一件事。

好吧，我猜是植入物。 \！
但我不需要它們！

她拍拍自己的胸口，讓它顫抖起來。

球員布拉德：
這些嬰兒都是真實的。

她看起來有點生氣。

球員布拉德：
我要用它做什麼？ \!
強迫別人胸部是殘忍的
不值得的胸部！

她再次擁抱自己的乳房。

球員布拉德：
我很高興以身作則。

她用力搖頭。

球員布拉德：
沒辦法！ \!
我想看看我能不能把這件襯衫折斷。

給胸部力量！

她看起來很驚訝。

球員布拉德：
更大\..\..\..\.\.
胸部更大嗎？

她低頭看著自己。 \!
戳了一下她的右胸。

若有所思地舉起他們兩人。

擠壓。

球員布拉德：
呵呵。

她開始顯得有點興奮。

球員布拉德：
你知道，你是完全正確的。

是的！ \。 \。
我總是可以變得更大！ \！
為什麼不呢？

她深思熟慮地看著你的胸部。

球員布拉德：
我的意思是，看看你！ \！
我才剛開始呢！

她越來越熱情了
正如她所說。

球員布拉德：
為什麼這就是結局？

如果我已經實現了我的夢想，那就意味著
我的夢想還不夠遠大！

如果你不成長，你就會死！ \!
天空才是極限！

她突然站起來，大聲喊道
興奮。

球員布拉德：
我是布拉德！ \！
我會更好地展示這個糟糕的世界

passages.name: Coffee shop — Coffee shop order — p1
passages.content:
Barista Daryl:
Hi, can I take your order?

We're out of the special. Too much demand
today.

And I like to make it something interesting,
but lately I just haven't been feeling it?

We've still got all the normal stuff.

Barista Daryl:
Sure, we'll have that right out for you.

Barista Joel:
I have an order for !

Barista Joel:
Have a nice day!
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師達裡爾：
你好，我可以接受你的訂單嗎？

我們已經脫離特殊狀態了需求太多
今天。

我喜歡讓它變得有趣，
但最近我卻沒有感覺？

我們仍然擁有所有正常的東西。

咖啡師達裡爾：
當然，我們會為您解決的。

咖啡師喬爾：

咖啡師喬爾：
祝你有美好的一天！

passages.name: Coffee shop — Coffee shop order — p2
passages.content:
Barista Daryl:
Hi, can I take your order?

Barista Daryl:
I recommend our new drink, the flattest
white.

I've finally started to create again! To work
my caffeinated arts!

Please, give it a try! If there's just a little more
interest, I might add it to the menu
permanently!

Barista Daryl:
Sure, we'll have that right out for you.

Barista Joel:
I have an order for !

// Coffee shop progress advances if the player buys a flattest white.

Barista Joel:
Hey, thanks for trying the new drink.\!
Daryl was worried no one would be interested.

He's been having so much trouble coming up
with new drinks...\!
But the response has been amazing!

Barista Joel:
Have a nice day!
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師達裡爾：
你好，我可以接受你的訂單嗎？

咖啡師達裡爾：
我推薦我們的新飲料，最平淡的
白色。

我終於又開始創作了！去上班
我的咖啡藝術！

請嘗試！如果還有一點點
有興趣，我可能會將其添加到菜單中
永久！

咖啡師達裡爾：

咖啡師喬爾：
嘿，感謝您嘗試新飲料。 \！
達裡爾擔心沒有人感興趣。

但反響卻是驚人的！

咖啡師喬爾：
祝你有美好的一天！

passages.name: Coffee shop — Coffee shop order — p3
passages.content:
Barista Daryl:
Make sure to check out the special of the day,
to the left!

I've finally starting making my special drinks
again!

What would you like?

Barista Daryl:
Sure, we'll have that right out for you.

Barista Joel:
I have an order for !

Barista Joel:
Have a nice day!

Barista Daryl:
Sure, we'll have that right out for you.

Barista Joel:
I have an order for !

You take a sip of your drink. Huh, this is
actually pretty good!

:
Why do I-

Kaede:
What *is* this flavor?! Mine tongue has never
felt the like?

:
Why can I taste things? How can I taste
things?!

Party experience +500!

You take a sip of your drink. Mmmm, tastes
nothing like steroids!

ATK +1!

You take a sip of your drink.\!
It's...\.\.\. well, it's exactly what the menu
said. Perfectly ordinary coffee with a pile of
cinnamon halfheartedly dumped on top.

It doesn't seem worthy of being a special.\!
Heck, it barely seems worthy of being on the
menu at all.

It carries such a lack of inspiration, such a
deep sense of creative failure, that it feels
like the world has grown a little dimmer
around you.

That a touch of the magic, the joy of life, has
drained away.

On the bright side, that's great for resisting
hostile magic!\.\.
MDF +1!

Barista Joel:
You're ?

He shrugs.

Barista Joel:
Well, remember that you asked for this.

As he swings his fist towards your face, you
notice he's written your name on his knuckles.

Ow!\.\.\.
25 HP lost!

But you feel a little tougher afterwards.\!
DEF +1!

You take a sip of your drink. For a moment,
you pause to consider the flavor.\.\.
Then the caffeine hits.

The universe freezes.\!
For a single perfect moment you can see
everything, do anything.\!
Your mind commands and your body obeys.

You watch with detached interest as your hand
begins the glacial crawl to bring another sip of
this ambrosia up to your mouth.

Ponder the eons between each beat of your
heart.\!
The eternity that passes between each breath
in and breath out.

T

咖啡師達裡爾：
請務必查看當天的特價商品，
向左！

我終於開始製作我的特色飲品了
又來了！

你要什麼？

咖啡師達裡爾：
當然，我們會為您解決的。

咖啡師喬爾：
我有訂單！

咖啡師喬爾：
祝你有美好的一天！

:
為什麼我-

楓：

:

聚會經驗+500！

攻擊力+1！

看來不值得特化啊！ \!
哎呀，它似乎幾乎不值得出現在

它是如此缺乏靈感，如此

就像世界變得有點暗淡
你周圍。

那一絲魔力、生命的喜悅，已經

從好的方面來說，這對於抵抗非常有用

中密度纖維板+1！

咖啡師喬爾：

噢！ \.\.\.
失去25點生命值！

防禦+1！

然後咖啡因襲來。

宇宙凍結了。 \!
為了一個完美的時刻，你可以看到

你的思想命令你的身體服從。

你帶著超然的興趣看著你的手

思考你的每個節拍之間的數億年
心.\!
每一次呼吸之間流逝的永恆
吸氣並呼氣。

時間

passages.name: Coffee shop — Shopper — p1
passages.content:
Customer:
Mmmm, there's nothing like a good cup of coffee
after a day of shopping.

She takes a deep sniff of her coffee.\!
There's a sudden *POP* as her chest swells.

Customer:
I, uh, guess this didn't fit as well as I thought.

Customer:
You're right! I shouldn't think of this as a
problem, it's an opportunity!

嗯，沒有什麼比一杯好咖啡更好的了

她深深地吸了一口咖啡。 \！
當她的胸部膨脹時，突然發出「砰」的一聲。

客戶：

客戶：

Mmmm...

嗯…
