passages.name: Coffee shop — Shopper — p3
passages.content:
The same woman as yesterday is here,
warming her hands on a cup of coffee.

Customer:
I had to move up a size or two, but I managed
to find some nice replacements.

She takes a deep sniff of her coffee.\!
With a loud *POP*, a button flies off the top of
her shirt, revealing a deep canyon of cleavage.

Customer:
Seriously?\!
Maybe I should go somewhere with
better-sewn buttons.

Customer:
...\.\.This is one of my favorite stores. I'd hate
to just walk away.\!
I'll give it one more try tomorrow.
passages.content_zh:
和昨天一樣的女人在這裡，
用一杯咖啡暖手。

客戶：
我不得不大一兩號，但我成功了
找到一些不錯的替代品。

她深深地吸了一口咖啡。 \！
隨著一聲響亮的*POP*，一個按鈕從頂部飛了下來
她的襯衫，露出深深的乳溝。

客戶：
認真的嗎？ \!
也許我應該和
縫製得更好的紐扣。

客戶：
...\.\.這是我最喜歡的商店之一。我討厭
就走開。 \！
明天我再試一次。

passages.name: Coffee shop — Shopper — p4
passages.content:
Customer:
And besides, I am a queen at shopping. There's
no way this store is going to defeat me.

She takes a determined sip of coffee.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
而且，我還是購物女王。有
這家商店不可能打敗我。

她堅定地抿了一口咖啡。

passages.name: Coffee shop — Shopper — p5
passages.content:
Customer:
I just don't get it.

She stares into her coffee.

Customer:
I've used all my tricks.\!
Checked all my favorite brands.

I even got my measurements checked *three
times*.

But, well, you can see the results.

She gestures at her shirt which is trying and
failing to contain her chest.

Customer:
Maybe this sale just isn't for me.\!
Maybe I've finally met my match.

She sighes, too discouraged to even drink her
coffee.

You give her a brief pep talk.

Sales can't defeat people. The only one who
can defeat her is herself.\!
And even if she doesn't find something, isn't
the experience enough?

Isn't it worth it just for the thrill of the hunt?

Customer:
You're right!\!
I'm not going to give in until I'm sure I've seen
everything this sale has to offer!

If nothing matches my style, I can make a
new style!

Customer:
Yeah...

She sighes and goes back to staring glumly
into her cup.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我就是不懂。

她盯著咖啡。

客戶：
我已經用盡了所有的技巧。 \!
檢查了所有我最喜歡的品牌。

我什至檢查了我的尺寸*三
次*。

但是，好吧，你可以看到結果。

她指著自己的襯衫，這件襯衫已經很費力了
無法抑制自己的胸口。

客戶：
也許這次促銷不適合我。 \！
也許我終於遇到對手了。

她嘆了口氣，灰心喪氣，連酒都不敢喝了
咖啡。

你給她簡短的鼓舞士氣的話。

銷售不能打敗人。唯一一個
能打敗她的就是她自己。 \！
即使她沒有找到什麼，不是嗎？
經驗夠嗎？

僅僅為了狩獵的刺激不值得嗎？

客戶：
你說得對！ \!
在我確信我已經看到之前我不會屈服
此次促銷所提供的一切！

如果沒有什麼符合我的風格，我可以做一個
新風格！

客戶：
是啊...

她嘆了口氣，又悶悶不樂地盯著
到她的杯子裡。

passages.name: Coffee shop — Shopper — p6
passages.content:
Customer:
Mmmm...

She takes a long, happy sip of her coffee.

Customer:
Tomorrow is going to be the big day.\!
I'll find something nice even if I have to try on
every outfit in the store!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
嗯…

她愉快地喝了一大口咖啡。

客戶：
明天將是重要的一天。 \!
即使我必須嘗試，我也會找到一些不錯的東西
店裡的每一套衣服都有！

passages.name: Coffee shop — Shopper — p7
passages.content:
Customer:
So.\!
I may have tried on every outfit in the store.

This is the best fit I could find.

She looks down at herself.

But you know what?\!
I think I kind of like this look.

Bold and unconventional, while still being
casual.\!
Really says "I'm not afraid to relax."

Though I am probably going to have to start
shopping in speciality stores.

Which is great! Totally new stores to check
out!

She takes a long, happy sip of her coffee.

Customer:
Shopping trip: complete success!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
所以。 \!
我可能已經試穿了店裡的每件衣服。

這是我能找到的最合適的。

她低頭看著自己。

但你知道嗎？ \!
我想我有點喜歡這個樣子。

大膽、不落俗套，同時又不失格調
休閒.\!
真的說「我不怕放鬆」。

雖然我可能必須開始
在專賣店購物。

這太棒了！全新商店可供檢查
出來！

她愉快地喝了一大口咖啡。

客戶：
購物之旅：圓滿成功！

passages.name: Coffee shop
passages.content:
Customer:
I prefer my tea, thank you.

The honey compliments it perfectly.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我更喜歡我的茶，謝謝。

蜂蜜完美地補充了它。

passages.name: Coffee shop
passages.content:
Customer:
Ah, nothing like a latte in the morning.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
啊，沒有什麼比早上喝拿鐵更好的了。

passages.name: Coffee shop — Alraune
passages.content:
She's holding a cup of coffee and staring at
the sweeteners.

Garden Volunteer:
Hmm... don't really feel like sugar today...\!
Artificial sweeteners taste weird...\!
Honey in coffee is weirder...

She reaches down and tries a bit of her nectar.

Garden Volunteer:
Mmmm!

She dumps more in her coffee and takes
a happy sip.

Garden Volunteer:
This is delicious!
passages.content_zh:
她拿著一杯咖啡，凝視著
甜味劑。

花園志工：
嗯...今天不太想吃糖...\！
人造甜味劑味道很奇怪......\！
咖啡裡加蜂蜜更奇怪…

她彎下身子嘗試了一點花蜜。

花園志工：
嗯嗯！

她在咖啡裡倒了更多，然後喝了
幸福地喝了一口。

花園志工：
這真好吃！

passages.name: Coffee shop — Escaped cat — p1
passages.content:
Barista Daryl:
Yeah, that cat just showed up recently. But
they look so comfy, I don't want to disturb
them!
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師達裡爾：
是的，那隻貓最近才出現。但是
他們看起來很舒服，我不想打擾
他們！

passages.name: Coffee shop — Escaped cat — p2
passages.content:
Barista Daryl:
Yeah, that cat just showed up recently. But
they look so comfy, I don't want to disturb
them!

You give Felix a call.

Shelter Head Felix:
Hello Coffee Bean.\!
I hope you know this misbehavior is going
in your permanent record.

You're lucky you didn't get roasted and
brewed here!

Daryl gets a sudden thoughtful look.

Barista Joel:
No.

Barista Daryl:
What?

Barista Joel:
Whatever drink idea you had about brewing
cats, we are *not* serving it.

Barista Daryl:
Aww....

Meanwhile Felix has gotten Coffee Bean into
a cat carrier.

Shelter Head Felix:
Thank you!\!
That's \v[143] out of 3 cats rescued!
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師達裡爾：
是的，那隻貓最近才出現。但是
他們看起來很舒服，我不想打擾
他們！

你打電話給菲利克斯。

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
你好咖啡豆。 \！
我希望你知道這種不當行為將會發生
在你的永久記錄中。

你很幸運沒有被烤
這裡釀造！

達裡爾突然露出若有所思的表情。

咖啡師喬爾：
不。

咖啡師達裡爾：
什麼？

咖啡師喬爾：
無論您對釀造飲料有什麼想法
貓，我們*不*提供它。

咖啡師達裡爾：
哇....

與此同時，菲利克斯已經把咖啡豆放進去
貓載體。

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
謝謝！ \!
獲救的 3 隻貓中有 \v[143] 隻！

passages.name: Coffee shop — Escaped cat — p5
passages.content:
Barista Daryl:
Everyone enjoyed having the cat around so
much that we went back to the shelter and
adopted them.

If I can't serve a cat drink I can at least have
a cat!
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師達裡爾：
每個人都喜歡有貓咪在身邊，所以
我們回到避難所並
採用了他們。

如果我不能提供貓飲料，我至少可以喝
一隻貓！

passages.name: Coffee shop — Matcha latte — p1
passages.content:
Customer:
Lattes are fine as long as they're *matcha*
lattes.

Coffee tastes like ass.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
拿鐵咖啡只要是*抹茶*就可以了
拿鐵咖啡。

咖啡嘗起來像屁股。

passages.content:
Customer:
Lattes are fine as long as they're *matcha*
lattes.

Coffee tastes like ass.

Other Customer:
Shouldn't that mean-

Using it and eating it are two different things!

客戶：
拿鐵咖啡只要是*抹茶*就可以了
拿鐵咖啡。

咖啡嘗起來像屁股。

其他客戶：
這不應該意味著——

客戶：
用和吃是兩件事！

passages.name: Police Station Real
passages.content:
Park Volunteer BeeJ:
Look at what zzzey did to me! I demand you
arrezzzt them!

Police Officer:
I'm sorry Ma'am, but no matter *what* they did
I can't arrest a beehive.

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
Then at leazzt go after that zzztupid bee lover!

Park Volunteer BeeJ:
I can't beelieve it! Thizzz hazzz to break
zzzome zzzort of law!
passages.content_zh:
公園志工BeeJ：
看看zzzey對我做了什麼！我要求你
逮捕他們！

警官：
對不起，女士，但無論他們做了什麼
我無法逮捕蜂箱。

公園志工BeeJ：
然後就去追那個愚蠢的蜜蜂愛好者吧！

公園志工BeeJ：
我簡直不敢相信！嘶嘶嘶嘶地打破
zzzome zzzort 法律！

passages.name: Police Station Real
passages.content:
Angry Customer:
And I had all my coupons picked out!

Police Officer:
I'm sorry, but I can't arrest anyone for
closing their store while they're having
a sale.

I'm sure they'll open back up soon.
passages.content_zh:
憤怒的顧客：
我已經把我所有的優惠券都挑出來了！

警官：
抱歉，但我不能逮捕任何人
在他們吃飯的時候關掉他們的商店
一次銷售。

我相信他們很快就會重新開放。

passages.name: Police Station Real — p1
passages.content:
Customer:
I hope they're okay...

Customer:
I think some people didn't make it out of the
store when the power went out.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我希望他們沒事...

客戶：
我覺得有些人沒能走出困境
停電時保存。

passages.name: Police Station Real — Courthouse exit
passages.content: The courthouse is closed today.
passages.content_zh: 法院今天關閉。

passages.name: Florauna room real — Whiteboard
passages.content:
No one's erased this whiteboard.\.

Take a look?
passages.content_zh:
沒有人擦掉這塊白板。 \.

看看？

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Computer — p4
passages.content:
You overclock your computer.

It now loads forums twice as fast!
passages.content_zh:
您對計算機進行超頻。

現在加載論壇的速度提高了一倍！

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Exit — p2
passages.content:
System Message:
Good morning playtesters!
Please stop by the Terra Games offices for
your next quest!

System Message:
And thank you again for helping Terra Games!

You see the bus just pulling up.

Where would you like to go?

System Message:
Downtown is still under construction.
Please excuse our dust!
passages.content_zh:
系統訊息：
各位遊戲測試員早安！
請前往 Terra Games 辦公室
你的下一個任務！

系統訊息：
再次感謝您對 Terra Games 的幫助！

你看到公共汽車剛停下來。

您想去哪裡？

系統訊息：
市中心仍在建設中。
請原諒我們的灰塵！

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Exit — p4
passages.content:
System Message:
Good morning playtesters!
Today marks the official end of the Better
Earth playtest!

System Message:
Please stop by the Terra Games office for
the final activities!\!
And thank you again for all your help!

Head to Terra Games?

As you get ready to leave,  stumbles
up to you.\!
She looks completely exhausted.

:
I-\. *yawn*\. was up all night studying those
bits I tore off the "robot".

I think-\.\. I think I should take a nap.

She stumbles back over to the desk and sits
down.\!
Then pillows her head on her arms and
immediately falls asleep.
passages.content_zh:
系統訊息：
各位遊戲測試員早安！
今天標誌著更好的正式結束
地球遊戲測試！

系統訊息：
請前往 Terra Games 辦公室
最後的活動！ \！
再次感謝您的幫忙！

前往 Terra Games？

當你準備離開時，卻絆倒了
由你決定。 \!
她看起來完全筋疲力盡了。

：
我-\。 *打哈欠*\。整晚都在研究那些
我撕下了「機器人」的碎片。

我認為-\。 \。我想我應該小睡一下。

她跌跌撞撞地回到辦公桌前坐下
下來。 \!
然後把頭枕在手臂上
立即入睡。

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Bed — p1
passages.content:
Go to bed for the night?

You slide into bed and close your eyes.

As you start to fall asleep, your mind drifts
back over the events of the day.

Your initial change is still a shock. But you've
managed to avoid anything else happening.

Several parts of your body have started to
shift as the game does... \.\. whatever it's
doing.

You've changed quite a bit, your body shifting
time and time again.

You're almost starting to get used to the
sensation of flesh reshaping itself.

Your last thoughts about the day, just before
you finally drop into a deep dreamless sleep,
are mostly:

Time passes.

Unwillingly, you start to slowly wake up.

Trying to move as little as possible, you feel
around for your glasses and slide them on. \.\.

You open your eyes to the sight of Kaede,
virtual hands groping through your chest.\.

 is futilely trying to pull her away.

:
Stop that already!

Kaede:
But aren't you curious?

 grew these in a day! \.\.

Don't you want to know how they feel?

Look at the bountiful breasts
already has! And they grew them in a day! \.\.

Don't you want to know how they feel?

:
No, just stop!

Kaede:
You don't understand how rare it is for a mortal
to have this much flexibility. And I can feel
they have the potential to be so much more.

Kaede:
There has been little change, but there is so
much potential here. So many slumbering
possibilities.

She licks her lips and gives  a
too-large grin.

Kaede:
Won't it be fun to find out how much
 can grow?

You must have moved, because they both
suddenly notice you're awake.\.
 starts babbling apologies.

:
I'm sorry! I tried to stop her but she wouldn't-

Kaede grins at you and takes one last swipe
through your chest. Then she moves back to
let you up.

Kaede:
Aren't you curious too?

You may have rejected the Goddess's
blessing, but you must realize how rare it is
for a mortal like you to get this much of a
chance to change.

Kaede:
I can see you're uncer
passages.content_zh:
晚上去睡覺嗎？

你滑到床上並閉上眼睛。

當你開始入睡時，你的思緒開始飄移
回顧一下當天發生的事情。

你最初的改變仍然令人震驚。但你已經
設法避免其他事情發生。

你身體的幾個部位已經開始
隨著遊戲的變化而改變... \.\.不管是什麼
做。

你變了很多，身體也發生了變化
一次又一次。

你幾乎開始習慣了
肉體重塑自身的感覺。

就在之前，您對這一天的最後想法
你終於陷入了無夢的深度睡眠，
大多是：

時間流逝。

不自覺地，你開始慢慢醒來。

盡量少移動，你會感覺
圍繞您的眼鏡並將其戴上。 \.\.

睜開眼睛看到了楓，
虛擬的手在你的胸口摸索。

 徒勞地試圖把她拉走。

:
快停止吧！

楓：
但你不好奇嗎？

 一天之內就長出這些了！ \.\.

你不想知道他們的感受嗎？

看看豐碩的胸脯
已經有了！他們一天之內就把它們種好了！ \.\.

你不想知道他們的感受嗎？

:
不，停下來吧！

楓：
你不明白對凡人來說這是多麼罕見
擁有如此大的靈活性。我能感覺到
他們有潛力做得更多。

楓：
雖然變化不大，但還是有很大的變化
這裡有很大的潛力。這麼多人沉睡
的可能性。

她舔了舔嘴唇，
笑容太大。

楓：
知道多少錢不是很有趣嗎
 可以成長嗎？

你一定搬家了，因為他們倆
突然發現你醒了。 \.
 開始喋喋不休地道歉。

：
對不起！我試圖阻止她，但她不——

楓對你微笑並最後一擊
透過你的胸部。然後她搬回
讓你起來。

楓：
你不也好奇嗎？

你可能拒絕了女神的要求
祝福，但你必須意識到它是多麼罕見
像你這樣的凡人能得到這麼多
改變的機會。

楓：
我看得出來你很不安

你不想知道他們的感受嗎？

:
不，停下來吧！

楓：
你不明白對凡人來說這是多麼罕見

楓：
雖然變化不大，但還是有很大的變化

變化。

她舔了舔嘴唇，
笑容太大。

楓：
知道多少錢不是很有趣嗎
 可以成長嗎？

你一定搬家了，因為他們倆
突然發現你醒了。 \.
 開始喋喋不休地道歉。

：
對不起！我試圖阻止她，但她不——

楓對你微笑並最後一擊
透過你的胸部。然後她搬回

楓：
你不也好奇嗎？

你可能拒絕了女神的要求
祝福，但你必須意識到它是多麼罕見
像你這樣的凡人能得到這麼多
改變的機會。

楓：
我看得出你很不確定。也許你是
害怕。

但你必須知道

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Elina — p1
passages.content:
// Ask how she's doing, ask about class, let her bring something up?

:
We did it!

We survived.\. That's good.\. That's very good.

And we saved a goddess.

I think I'm starting to get the hang of this.

:
Tomorrow will be less dangerous, right?
passages.content_zh:
// 問她過得怎麼樣，詢問上課的狀況，讓她提出一些事情？

:
我們做到了！

我們活了下來。 \.那蠻好的。 \。那很好。

我們拯救了一位女神。

我想我已經開始掌握這個訣竅了。

:
明天就不那麼危險了，對嗎？

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Elina — p3
passages.content:
is humming happily to herself as
she tinkers with the arms she took from
's robot.

:
That was exciting! \!
Seeing that "robot" move.

I'm sure I can learn something if I keep
studying it!

:
Programmed?\! What?!\!
I...

She freezes.\!
Not like a person does.\!
Like software does.

You hadn't realized until now, but people, real
3-D humans, are never truly still.\!
Their chests move as they breathe.\! They sway
a little on their feet as they stand.

There are a thousand tiny motions, never the
same twice, that communicate that you're
seeing a real person in front of you.

And it's only as  goes as flat and still
as an image on a computer screen that you
realize she had all those little tics as well.

And then she blinks, and suddenly she's a
moving, breathing person again.

:
Sorry, I got distracted for a moment there.\!
Did you ask something?
passages.content_zh:
高興地自言自語
她擺弄著她奪走的手臂
的機器人。

:
太令人興奮了！ \！
看到那個「機器人」動了。

我相信如果我堅持下去我能學到一些東西
學習它！

:
已編程？ \!什麼？ ！ \！
我...

她僵住了。 \！
不像一個人。 \!
就像軟體一樣。

直到現在你才意識到，但是人們，真實的
3D 人類永遠不會真正靜止。 \！
他們的胸部隨著呼吸而移動。 \！他們搖擺
當他們站立時，他們的腳稍微站起來了。

有一千種微小的動作，從來沒有
同樣的兩次，顯示你是
看到一個真實的人在你面前。

一切都只是平坦而靜止
作為電腦螢幕上的圖像
意識到她也有那些小抽動症。

然後她眨了眨眼，突然間她變成了一個
再次移動、呼吸的人。

:
抱歉，我一時分心了。 \!
你有問什麼嗎？

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Elina — p4
passages.content:
is still sitting here, studying the arms
she tore off 's robot.

:
If I trace this wire\. *yawn*\. here...\!
Yes! That's part of the\. *yawn*\. trigger!

She blinks up at you.

:
Oh, is it morning already?

She sways a little.

:
It was so interesting I lost track of time.\!
But maybe...\.\. maybe I should take a little
nap.

She puts her head down on the desk and
immediately falls asleep.
passages.content_zh:
仍然坐在這裡，研究手臂
她撕下了機器人。

:
如果我追蹤這條電線\. *打哈欠*\。這裡...\！
是的！這是\的一部份。 *打哈欠*\。扳機！

她對你眨眼。

:
哦，已經早上了嗎？

她有點搖晃。

:
這太有趣了，我忘了時間。 \!
但也許...\.\.也許我應該採取一點
打盹。

她把頭放在桌子上
立即入睡。

passages.content:
has pillowed her head on one of the
robot arms and gone to sleep.

I said I'd come later!

She goes back to sleep.

把她的頭枕在其中之一上

:
我說我晚點來！

她回去睡覺了。

:

我試圖阻止她...

is muttering to herself.

:
Hey, don't worry about today.\!
Everyone fails their first overthrowing.\!

:

Kaede:

This form ist an odd one, but enjoyable.

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Iterate day — p2

You wake up to the sound of repeated chimes

You fumble them on to see  with

:
Why isn't this working?! \!

System Message:

Ability disabled!

Kaede is perched on your dresser laughing at

Kaede:
Perhaps a little more to the left?\!
Try squeezing yon mammary, might as well

Kaede is perched on your dresser giving

Kaede:
No, slightly to thy left!\!
Thou art completely missing the soul! Have

So this is your life now.\!
Starting every day with someone's arms

You sigh and walk through  to get

:
Hey!

:
I'll get you next time!\!
You and your little kitsune too!

Kaede laughs.

You compliment  on her betrayal.\!
Really, she should have had you. You didn't

I don't need your pity!

Still, you think she looks a little pleased.

你在重複的鐘聲中醒來

你摸索著看
她的手臂深埋在你的胸口。

:
為什麼這不起作用？ \！

你完全失去了靈魂！有

：

：
住口！ \！

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Iterate day — p3
passages.content:
// This is for compatability. There are some tfs that could have
happened before I added tracking for people changed, so this is
checking if those have happened and then iterating the appropriate
variables.

// If the milkshake quest was completed but the farm hasn't been
iterated (due to using a save from an older version), iterate it now.

You wake up to the sound of voices from your
glasses.\!
It seems you were so tired last night you
forgot to take them off.

:
What?\.\. No!

Kaede:
But this is how we have awakened the hero
every day so far!\.\. And now thine turn hast
come!

Wouldst thou go against tradition?

:
I hate to say it, but furry and brainless has a
point. \.\.
I took my turn yesterday.

:
You were trying to steal \n[10]'s soul!

:
And now it's your turn!

Kaede:
Compose thyself, the hero's soul is safe. Just,\.
give that heroic chest a gentle caress.\!
T'will be fun for both you and them.

:
I said no!

...\.\.This is kind of weird, but you have to admit
this is a pretty funny prank to play on
.

...\.\.It looks like this really *is* your life now.\!
Sigh.

You open your eyes to see your three
companions arguing.

Kaede notices you stirring.

Kaede:
Look, thou hast nearly lost the moment with
thy indecision!\!
Needs must!

She hops on to your bed and begins to make
squeezing motions at your chest.

You both freeze for a moment when you
actually feel a faint pressure on your chest.

It's faint.\.\. More like the touch of the wind
than anything else.\.\.
But you can definitely feel something where
her hands pass.

Kaede:
Praise Florauna!

She redoubles her efforts, rubbing and
caressing and even bending down to give
gentle nips with her teeth.

Your back arches by itself.\!
It's only feather-light touches!\.\.
Why does it feel so *good*?!

But her touch is so light that it doesn't do much
at all.

System Message:
Good morning !\.\.
Today-\.\.\. Uh...

System Message:
...Am I interrupting something?

System

看來你昨晚太累了

你試圖竊取\n[10]的靈魂！

這對你和他們來說都會很有趣。

:

...\.\.這有點奇怪，但你必須承認

。

...\.\.看起來這確實是你現在的生活。 \！
嘆。

你睜開眼睛看到你的三個

瞧，你差點就失去了與

當你們
實際上感覺到胸部有微弱的壓力。

讚美弗勞娜！

系統訊息：
早安！ \.\.
今天-\。 \。 \。呃...

系統訊息：

系統

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Iterate day — p4
passages.content:
You wake up slightly during the night when
something soft and warm slips into your bed.\!
Purring, it lulls you back to sleep.

// Morning cutscenes. Each cutscene should be wrapped in its own
chack for switch 160, so that only one can trigger.

You are awakened by the sound of something
incredibly heavy hitting the ground.

Mysterious Voice:
\{ONE.

Goddess Hadea:
Stop that!\!
Don't lift that!

Mysterious Voice:
\{TWO.

You can somehow hear faint voices.

Goddess Hadea:
I'm not responsible for anything that breaks
when you do that!

Mysterious Voice:
\{THREE.

Goddess Hadea:
Stop already!\!
We have things to do!\!
A dark goddess to fight!

Mysterious Voice:
\{FOUR.

Goddess Hadea:
Isn't that a better thing to do with your
muscles?!

Mysterious Voice:
\{FIVE.

Goddess Hadea:
Don't just move on to your next exercise,
respond to me!!

The goddess's voice suddenly gets louder.

Goddess Hadea:
Hero!\!
Another of our sisters has reappeared!

But the idiot musclehead won't listen to a word
I say!

Go!\!
Recruit her to our cause!\!
Bring her to help!

And if you can make sure I'm not responsible
for anything she breaks, do it!

As she finishes speaking, you get a hazy vision
of a building.\!
The\..\..\..\. Louis Armstrong Rec Center?\!
Looks like that's your next destination.

// Changes > 20, gym completed (except for talking to fittina), Miku
event not started yet, Miku tf forum thread read (only shows up
after changes >20)

.\..\..\..Five more minutes.

// If no morning cutscene was played, get out of bed normally.

咕嚕聲會讓你重新入睡。

這不是更好地處理你的事情嗎？
肌肉？ ！

神秘的聲音：
\{五。

哈迪亞女神：
不要只是繼續下一個練習，
回覆我！ ！

女神的聲音突然變大了。

哈迪亞女神：
英雄！ \!
我們的又一位姊妹又出現了！

但這白痴肌肉頭不會聽任何一句話
我說！

去！ \！
招募她加入我們的事業！ \！
帶她來幫忙！

如果你能確定我不負責

這\..\..\..\。路易斯阿姆斯特朗休閒中心？ \！
看起來那是你的下一個目的地。

.\..\..\..還有五分鐘。

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Pride muttering — p2
passages.content:
You can hear  talking to herself.

:
So what if you're tied to some idiots?\!
Doomed to haunt them for eternity?\!
Come on, you've worked with worse!

Remember, these are idiots.\!
Morons.\!
Gullible fools!

It's just a setback. \!
Just a little setback.
You can do it, !

She frowns.

No, I meant . \!
My name is !

:
Stupid curse.

你可以聽到她自言自語。

:
如果你跟一些白痴綁在一起怎麼辦？ \！
注定要永遠困擾他們？ \！
來吧，你曾與更糟糕的人一起工作過！

請記住，這些都是白痴。 \！
白痴。 \!
輕信的傻瓜們！

這只是一個挫折。 \！
只是一點點挫折。
你可以做到的，！

她皺起眉頭。

不，我的意思是。 \！
我的名字是 ！

:
愚蠢的詛咒。

passages.content:
gives you a bright, insincere smile.

:
Why hello Hero!\!
I'm so happy to be saving puppies with you!

Or whatever other trite inanities you want me
to help with!
passages.content_zh:
給你一個燦爛的、不真誠的微笑。

:
為什麼你好英雄！ \！
我很高興能和你一起拯救小狗！

或者你想要我講的任何其他陳詞濫調的愚蠢內容

passages.content:
:
So we may have created a new goddess.\!
A new dark goddess.

Who's angry at us.\!
And can casually obliterate an archmage.

She takes a few panicky breaths.

I'm sure this is fine.\!
Everything's fine.
passages.content_zh:
:
所以我們可能創造了一個新的女神。 \！
新的黑暗女神。

誰生我們的氣了。 \!
並且可以隨手消滅一個大法師。

她驚慌地吸了幾口氣。

我確信這沒問題。 \!
一切都很好。

passages.name: Apartment 1 ARG — Character in front of dresser — p2
passages.content:
// Responses:
1: Told her to check behind the dresser
2: Told her to check the computer
3: Told her no.

Kaede is sticking her face in each drawer,

Kaede:
Boring. \!
Boring. \!
Boring.

She turns to you.

Kaede:
Why dost thou only have clothes within thy

Kaede:

All.\.\. The.\.\. Time!!!

Come, I shall guide you to the

神秘女人：
英雄！
謝天謝地你在這裡！

太可怕了，太可怕了！
不安的死者的靈魂已經崩潰
擺脫哈迪亞的監獄！
你必須幫忙！

我找到了哈迪亞女神被困的地方，
軟弱和孤立，所以非常非常
脆弱。

作為一個弱小的無辜者，我知道這是什麼樣子，所以
我想幫助她。 \.

但我太弱了！

你必須幫助我英雄！幫忙打開她的監獄！

來吧，我帶你去那裡！

神秘女人：
女神被困在這道屏障後面，但是
我找到了這個突破障礙的裝置——

:
這是什麼？

這是金屬傀儡嗎？不，它沒有任何
力量符文。

神秘女人：
這是一-\.\.\^

:
會不會是一種新的類型？或者是其中之一
世界上有哪些「機器」？

神秘女人：
是的，這是為了-\.\.\^

:
看起來就像是為了移動而生的。但如何
它動了？我沒有感覺到任何魔法！

神秘女人：
你看，它-\.\.\^

:
那麼呢-\.\.\^

神秘女人：
閉嘴你這個胡言亂語的傻瓜，讓我
說話！

我發現的這個設備有能力承擔
這封印和裡面的女神！這是
解決我所有問題的完美工具！

但這些白痴鬼已經喝醉了
他們的自由不肯聽我的！
這就是為什麼我需要像你這樣的棋子！

你的角色是去頂樓然後返回
上電！而已！

她呼吸粗重了一分鐘。

神秘女人：
呃，拜託，英雄。 \！
高貴.\!
幫助一個弱小的無辜者？

神秘女人：
我認為你不了解英雄，我是一個
無辜的人需要幫助。

你不接受我的任務嗎？

神秘女人：
你知道嗎，我只是假裝你
說是的。

神秘女人：
謝謝你太棒了！

我知道你必須把神祕神器放在哪裡
激活是，但我無法通過戰鬥
守護它的靈魂。

跟著我，我會引導你。

但要小心，因為潛伏著許多類型的靈魂
我們和我們的目標之間。

我相信，大多數罪過。地獄
喜歡它的主題。

來吧，我帶你去

passages.name: Floor 1 ARG — Autorun event — p3
passages.content:
You step into a surprisingly busy store.

Manager:
Everyone! Please! Quiet down!

Now, as I was saying, we're prepared to
reward anyone who can figure out how to
make the store *stay* clean!

Money!\.\. Free merchandise!\.\. A shiny
rock Jane found in her backyard!

One of the employees gives a lazy wave.

Jane:
It's a really cool rock!

The manager turns back to the crowd.

Manager:
Now, let me demonstrate the problem.

She begins folding the messy pile of clothes
next to her.

Manager:
We've been cleaning ever since the power
came back on.

She finishes folding and stacks the clothes in
a neat pile on the nearest display.

Manager:
And yet-
\>What's that over there?!

Everyone turns as she points off to the side.

Spirit:
Aha!\.\. Exactly as planned!

The spirit knocks over the pile of clothes, then
leaps through the ceiling and vanishes.

As everyone else looks at the clothes, your
whole party turns to .

:
What?\|
Why are you are staring at me?!

Kaede:
Hast thou a sister perhaps?\.\. A twin?

:
Are there MORE of you?!

She suddenly looks excited.

Do the others have "robots" too?

:
No! There isn't anyone in the world, under or
over, who could match my genius!

After all, what even is their plan?\!
Mildly inconvenience a few humans?\!
I could come up with better plans in my sleep!
passages.content_zh:
你走進一家異常繁忙的商店。

經理：
大家！請！安靜點！

現在，正如我所說，我們準備好了
獎勵任何能弄清楚如何做的人
讓商店*保持*乾淨！

錢！ \。 \。免費商品！ \.\.一個閃亮的
簡在她的後院發現了石頭！

一名員工懶洋洋地揮了揮手。

簡：
這真是一塊很酷的石頭！

經理轉身面向人群。

經理：
現在，讓我來示範一下這個問題。

她開始疊那一堆凌亂的衣服
在她旁邊。

經理：
自從停電以來我們一直在清潔
回來了。

她折疊完衣服，把衣服疊好。
最近的顯示器上整齊地堆疊著。

經理：
然而——
\>那邊是什麼？ ！

當她指向一邊時，每個人都轉過身來。

精神：
啊哈！ \.\.完全按照計畫進行！

精靈打翻了一堆衣服，然後
跳過天花板並消失。

當其他人都在看衣服時，你的
全黨轉向。

:
什麼？ \|
為什麼盯著我看？ ！

楓：
也許你有一個妹妹？ \.\.雙胞胎？

:
你們還有更多嗎？

她突然顯得很興奮。

其他人也有「機器人」嗎？

：
不！世界上沒有任何人，在或之下
完了，誰能比得上我的天才！

畢竟，他們的計畫到底是什麼？ \！
給一些人帶來輕微的不便？ \！
我可以在睡夢中想出更好的計畫！

passages.name: Floor 1 ARG — Rage spirit — p1
passages.content:
Angry Ghost:
Augh! I can't believe I missed today's sales!

Being dead is so AGGRAVATING!
passages.content_zh:
憤怒的幽靈：
啊啊！我不敢相信我錯過了今天的促銷！

死了真是太讓人傷心了！

passages.name: Floor 1 ARG — p1
passages.content:
Sleepy Ghost:
What? \|
Am I supposed to be haunting something?
passages.content_zh:
瞌睡鬼：
什麼？ \|
我是不是該被什麼事情困擾？

passages.name: Floor 1 ARG — p1
passages.content:
Jealous Ghost:
Why do they get to shop, huh?\.
Why shouldn't I get to go shopping too? \.
Why should they get all the deals?
passages.content_zh:
嫉妒鬼：
他們為什麼要去購物，對吧？
為什麼我不應該也去購物？ \.
為什麼他們應該獲得所有優惠？

passages.name: Floor 1 ARG — Old intro
passages.content:
:
Hey, how does your door opener work?

Probably Evil Woman:
It's a robot.

:
Could you explain that more? What's a robot?\.
What operating principles does it use? \.
What's its power source?

Probably Evil Woman:
It-

:
Is it an armored living creature, or something
like a golem? Does it eat?

Probably Evil Woman:
It's a robot! It's a machine that moves and
does things! None of that other stuff is
important!

She paused for a moment, then smiles.

Probably Evil Woman:
Look, it needs to eat the lightning. You can get
it started on the top floor.

Do that and I'll be happy to show you how it
works up close and personal.
passages.content_zh:
:
嘿，你的開門器是如何運作的？

可能是邪惡的女人：
這是一個機器人。

:
你能解釋一下嗎？什麼是機器人？ \.
它採用什麼工作原理？ \.
它的動力來源是什麼？

可能是邪惡的女人：
它——

:
難道是鎧甲生物，還是什麼？
像傀儡一樣？牠吃東西嗎？

可能是邪惡的女人：
這是一個機器人！這是一台可以移動的機器
做事！其他的東西都不是
重要！

她停頓了一會兒，然後笑了。

可能是邪惡的女人：
看，它需要吃掉閃電。你可以獲得
它從頂樓開始。

這樣做，我很樂意向您展示如何做到這一點
近距離、個人化的工作。

passages.content:
No response.\!
Looks like the power is still out.

The call button flickers for a moment, then

It must need more power than you can
provide.

沒有反應。 \!
看來還是沒電了。

通話按鈕閃爍了一下，然後
褪色。
它必須比你需要更多的力量
提供。

I know we're supposed to be vengeful, but
I've never been able to get into the whole
venging thing.

Can I interest you in some deals instead?

我知道我們應該報仇，但是

我可以讓您對一些交易感興趣嗎？

passages.name: Floor 1 ARG — Ghost boss fight — p2
passages.content:
About To Betray You:
Thank you so much for your help hero. Now,
it is time for your reward.

Her human form shimmers and fades.

Pride Spirit:
All this time, and you never even had a clue!\!
Do you simpletons have the barest hint of an
idea of what is going to happen to you now?

Kaede gives her a bored look.

Kaede:
Now that we've turned on the power, you shall
attempt to destroy us with yon golem.

She starts counting off on her fingers.

Kaede:
Thou are the one who led the escape of the
spirits from yon underworld.

Thou plots to overthrow the Goddess Hadea
and steal her power.

Thou art so bad at command that thy own
armies barred thy way, forcing you to seek
our aid.

Thou hast the acting ability of a stunned
patridge, and the intellect of a particularly
dim trout.

Have I missed aught of the truth?

:
I think that's everything.  Though you should
have called us simpletons more.

Pride Spirit:
You forgot one thing! \!
The part where I \{KILL YOU!!

Pride Spirit:
No! I was so close!\!
Ultimate power was within my reach!

Fine.\! Fine! \!
You may have defeated me.\!
You may have somehow seen through my
disguise.

You may have the ridiculous stroke of luck
that let you beat my robot.\!
But I will have the last laugh!

It will drain me for centuries, but I curse you!\!
May you rot in agony forevermore!

System Message:
Please hold while we load the automated
cursing algorithms.\!
This will be fun.

\>Stats halved\.

\>\^Generating Curse:

\>The Jigglies\.

\>\^Generating Curse:
\>Your curse here!\.

\>\^Generating Curse:
\>
passages.content_zh:
關於背叛你：
非常感謝英雄的幫助。現在，
現在是你獲得獎勵的時候了。

她的人類形態閃爍著光芒，然後逐漸消失。

驕傲精神：
一直以來，你甚至都沒有任何線索！ \！
你們這些傻瓜有沒有一點點的跡象？
你知道現在會發生什麼事嗎？

枫一脸无聊地看着她。

楓：
現在我們已經打開電源了，你應該
試著用傀儡來摧毀我們。

她开始用手指数数。

楓：
你是帶領眾人逃亡的人
来自地下世界的灵魂。

你密謀推翻女神哈迪亞
並竊取她的力量。

你太不善於指揮，以至於你自己的
軍隊擋住了你的路，迫使你去找
我們的援助。

你有驚呆的演技
帕特里奇，以及一个特别的智力
昏暗的鱒魚。

我是否錯過了一些真相？

:
我想這就是全部了。  雖然你應該
更多地稱我們為傻瓜。

驕傲精神：
你忘了一件事！ \！
我\{殺了你！ ！

驕傲精神：
不！我如此接近！ \！
终极力量触手可及！

美好的。 \！美好的！ \！
你可能已经打败了我。 \!
你可能已經看穿了我的
偽裝。

你可能会遇到可笑的好运
让你打败我的机器人。 \！
但我一定会笑到最后！

它會耗盡我幾個世紀的時間，但我詛咒你！ \！
愿你永远在痛苦中腐烂！

我们正在加载自动加载程序，请稍候
詛咒算法。 \!
這會很有趣。

Store swimsuit acquired!

商店泳衣入手！

passages.name: Tailor Real — Rose and Lily — p1
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[5]We have a very important date coming
up tomorrow.
\C[30]Everything needs to be perfect.

\C[5]And so we want to look our best!
\C[30]But... \C[0]*She gestures at the nectar
running down both their bodies*
\C[30]We'd ruin all our favorite outfits.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]And this *has* to go perfectly.
\C[5]The conversation is going to be hard
enough!

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[5]We don't want to have to worry about our
appearance too.

\C[30]You look great Lily, we look great, but
we want to maybe try to look a little more
normal?

*Lily blushes dark green*
\C[5]We'd like to have the relationship talk
first and save the nudist talk for later.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
(Together)\C[30]But \C[5]that \C[30]means \C[5]clothes!

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]We've already tried everything we own.
\C[5]It was horrible! The mess! The laundry!

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Can you make something for us?
\C[5]Or suggest something?

\C[5]Can you recommend something?
\C[30]Or make something?

Tailor:
To start, what is that liquid like?

With their permission, he takes a little. He rubs
it thoughtfully between his fingers.

Tailor:
You're right, this would make an absolute
mess with most fabrics.

We should be able to start you with some
swimsuits.  Those will still get wet, but they
should bear it a lot better.

Over the long term, I could probably do
something with some raincoat material. Real
waterproof stuff, that is.

And something you can still go wild with:
accessorize!

We've got some very cute hats. Plus you should
be able to do all sorts of things with hair clips
and ribbons.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
(Together)\C[30]Thank \C[5]you!

They lean forward and give him a massive
hug, planting a kiss on either side of his head.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]This will make everything so much easier.
\C[5]Only one thing to worry about!

\C
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[5]我們有一個非常重要的日期即將到來
明天起來。
\C[30]一切都需要完美。

\C[5]所以我們希望展現最好的一面！
\C[30]但是... \C[0]*她指著花蜜
跑下他們的身體*
\C[30]我們會毀掉所有我們最喜歡的衣服。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]這*必須*完美地進行。
\C[5]談話會很困難
夠了！

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[5]我們不想擔心我們的
外觀也。

\C[30]你看起來很棒莉莉，我們看起來很棒，但是
我們想嘗試多看一點
正常嗎？

*莉莉臉紅深綠色*
\C[5]我們想談關係
首先，把裸體主義者的話題留到以後再說。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
（合）\C[30]但是\C[5]那\C[30]意味著\C[5]衣服！

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]我們已經嘗試了我們所擁有的一切。
\C[5]太可怕了！混亂！洗衣服！

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]你能為我們做些什麼嗎？
\C[5]或建議什麼？

\C[5]你能推薦一些東西嗎？
\C[30]或做點什麼？

裁縫：
首先，這種液體是什麼樣的呢？

在他們的允許下，他拿了一點。他擦
它在他的手指間若有所思。

裁縫：
你是對的，這絕對是
與大多數織物混在一起。

我們應該能夠為您提供一些幫助
泳衣。  那些仍然會被弄濕，但它們
應該能承受得更好。

從長遠來看，我可能會做
一些帶有雨衣材料的東西。真實
防水的東西，就是這樣。

還有一些你仍然可以瘋狂的東西：
配件！

我們有一些非常可愛的帽子。另外你應該
能夠用髮夾做各種各樣的事情
和絲帶。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
（合）\C[30]謝謝\C[5]你！

他們向前傾身，給了他一個巨大的
擁抱，在他頭的兩側印下一個吻。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]這將使一切變得更加容易。
\C[5]只有一件事需要擔心！

\C

passages.name: Tailor Real — Tailor — p1
passages.content:
Tailor:
Hmmm...
It's a good thing I enjoy a challenge.
passages.content_zh:
裁縫：
嗯...
我喜歡挑戰，這是一件好事。

passages.name: Tailor Real — Tailor — p2
passages.content:
Tailor:
It's a shame the department store isn't open
yet, but at least I've got some orders to take
up my time.
passages.content_zh:
裁縫：
可惜百貨公司沒開門
還沒有，但至少我還有一些指令要執行
我的時間。

passages.name: Tailor Real
passages.content: Dapper!

passages.name: Tailor Real
passages.content:
A glamorous winter coat, perfect for a night
out on the town.
passages.content_zh:
迷人的冬季外套，非常適合夜晚
出城了。

passages.name: Tailor Real
passages.content: A stunning red dress.
passages.content_zh: 一襲紅色連身裙，令人驚艷。

passages.name: Tailor Real
passages.content:
Looks suitable for casual wear, but still has
a very classy feel to it.
passages.content_zh:
看起來適合休閒裝，但還是有
一種非常優雅的感覺。

passages.name: Tailor Real
passages.content:
Rough wearing clothes for outdoor exploration.
Though they still look well-tailored and
fashionable.
passages.content_zh:
戶外探險時穿著粗糙的衣服。
儘管它們看起來仍然剪裁精良，
時尚。

passages.name: Tailor Real
passages.content:
Entirely filled with green suits. Who is this for,
the Riddler?
passages.content_zh:
完全裝滿了綠色套裝。這是給誰的，
謎語人？

passages.name: Tailor Real
passages.content:
An assortment of outfits, all of them classy
and well-made.
passages.content_zh:
各種服裝，都很優雅
並且做工精良。

passages.name: Tailor ARG
passages.content:
Rough wearing clothes for outdoor exploration.
Though they still look well-tailored and
fasionable.
passages.content_zh:
戶外探險時穿著粗糙的衣服。
儘管它們看起來仍然剪裁精良，
時尚的。

passages.name: Tailor ARG — Spider
passages.content:
Spider Woman:
Look at those hands.

The man sews threads like a master! A
symphony of string spread across the fabric!

Ah, I just love to watch him work his magic.
passages.content_zh:
蜘蛛女：
看看那雙手。

這個人縫線就像大師一樣！一個
弦樂在織物上展開！

啊，我就是喜歡看他施展魔法。

passages.name: Floor 3 real — SocraticMachine — p3
passages.content:
Player BirbcraticMachine:
This is amazing!\!
I can fly!

Player BirbcraticMachine:
Though my face itches and I'm not sure how
to safely scratch it.
passages.content_zh:
玩家 BirbcraticMachine：
這太棒了！ \!
我能飛！

玩家 BirbcraticMachine：
雖然我的臉很癢，但我不知道該怎麼辦
安全地刮擦它。

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Clerk — p1
passages.content:
Sleeping Clerk:
\.\.Just five more minutes...

Clerk:
I wasn't sleeping! I'm working hard!

Oh, you're not my manager.
passages.content_zh:
睡覺的職員：
\.\.再過五分鐘...

職員：
我沒有睡覺！我正在努力工作！

哦，你不是我的經理。

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Clerk — p2
passages.content:
Sleeping Clerk:
\.\.I'll start cleaning soon...
\.\.Just five more minutes...

Clerk:
I'm awake! I'm awake!\!
Time to clean!

She runs off into the store.
passages.content_zh:
睡覺的職員：
\.\.我很快就會開始打掃......
\.\.再過五分鐘...

職員：
我醒了！我醒了！ \!
是時候清潔了！

她跑進商店。

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Elevator — p3
passages.content:
The doors slide open, revealing the elevator
is packed solid, floor to ceiling, with furniture.

Looks like you won't be riding it today.
passages.content_zh:
門滑開，露出電梯
從地板到天花板都很堅固，配有家具。

看來你今天不會再騎了。

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Pet clerk 2 — p2
passages.content:
Sleeping Clerk:
\.\.I'll start cleaning soon...
\.\.Just five more minutes...

Clerk:
I'm really awake this time!\!
Time to clean!

She runs off into the store.
passages.content_zh:
睡覺的職員：
\.\.我很快就會開始打掃......
\.\.再過五分鐘...

職員：
這次我真的醒了！ \!
是時候清潔了！

她跑進商店。

passages.name: Floor 3 real
passages.content:
The rug here looks pretty comfortable. Take
a quick nap?

System Message:
Good night.

HP/MP restored!
passages.content_zh:
這裡的地毯看起來很舒服。採取
睡一會兒？

系統訊息：
晚安。

HP/MP恢復！

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Red Lever — p1
passages.content: The lever is off. Turn it on?
passages.content_zh: 控制桿已關閉。打開它嗎？

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Red Lever — p2
passages.content: The lever is on. Turn it off?
passages.content_zh: 控制桿已開啟。關掉它嗎？

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Red Button — p1
passages.content: The button is off. Turn it on?
passages.content_zh: 按鈕關閉。打開它嗎？

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Red Button — p2
passages.content: The button is on. Turn it off?
passages.content_zh: 按鈕已開啟。關掉它嗎？

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Red switch — p1
passages.content: The switch is off. Turn it on?
passages.content_zh: 開關關閉。打開它嗎？

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Red switch — p2
passages.content: The switch is on. Turn it off?
passages.content_zh: 開關已開啟。關掉它嗎？

passages.name: Floor 3 real — Poker prelude — p1
passages.content:
You hear muffled voices to the south.

Aha! Full house! Let that blow your mind!

I lose again! \! I'll win next time, just you wait.
And then I'll show you all.
passages.content_zh:
你聽到南邊傳來低沉的聲音。

啊哈！客滿！讓這讓你大吃一驚！

我又輸了！ \！下次我一定會贏，你等著。
然後我會向大家展示。

passages.name: Coffee shop ARG — Sleepy ghost — p1
passages.content:
Sleepy Ghost:
Iced caffe mocha... \.\.
Venti...\.\.
Two extra shots...
passages.content_zh:
瞌睡鬼：
冰咖啡摩卡...\.\.
文蒂...\.\.
多拍兩張...

passages.name: Coffee shop ARG — Ghosts and Brad — p1
passages.content:
Spirit 1:
I miss the days I could drink coffee...

Spirit 2:
I don't. I prefer tea.
passages.content_zh:
精神1：
好懷念那些可以喝咖啡的日子

精神2：
我不知道。我比較喜歡喝茶。

passages.name: Coffee shop ARG — Alraune
passages.content:
She's holding a cup of coffee and staring at
the sweeteners.

Garden Volunteer:
Hmm... don't really feel like sugar today...\!
Artificial sweeteners taste weird...\!
Honey in coffee is weirder...

She reaches down and tries a bit of her nectar.

Garden Volunteer:
Mmmm!

She dumps a handful in her coffee and takes
a happy sip.

Garden Volunteer:
This is delicious!
passages.content_zh:
她拿著一杯咖啡，凝視著
甜味劑。

花園志工：
嗯...今天不太想吃糖...\！
人造甜味劑味道很奇怪......\！
咖啡裡加蜂蜜更奇怪…

她彎下身子嘗試了一點花蜜。

花園志工：
嗯嗯！

她往咖啡裡倒了一把，然後喝了
幸福地喝了一口。

花園志工：
這真好吃！

passages.name: Coffee shop ARG — Escaped cat — p2
passages.content:
Barista Daryl:
Yeah, that cat just showed up recently. But
they look so comfy, I don't want to disturb
them!

You give Felix a call.

Shelter Head Felix:
Hello Coffee Bean.\!
I hope you know this misbehavior is going
in your permanent record.

You're lucky you didn't get roasted and
brewed!

Daryl gets a sudden thoughtful look.

Barista Joel:
No.

Barista Daryl:
What?

Barista Joel:
Whatever drink idea you had about brewing
cats, we are *not* serving it.

Barista Daryl:
Aww....

Meanwhile Felix has gotten Coffee Bean into
a cat carrier.

Shelter Head Felix:
Thank you!\!
That's \v[143] out of 3 cats rescued!
passages.content_zh:
咖啡師達裡爾：
是的，那隻貓最近才出現。但是
他們看起來很舒服，我不想打擾
他們！

你打電話給菲利克斯。

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
你好咖啡豆。 \！
我希望你知道這種不當行為將會發生
在你的永久記錄中。

你很幸運沒有被烤
釀造！

達裡爾突然露出若有所思的表情。

咖啡師喬爾：
不。

咖啡師達裡爾：
什麼？

咖啡師喬爾：
無論您對釀造飲料有什麼想法
貓，我們*不*提供它。

咖啡師達裡爾：
哇....

與此同時，菲利克斯已經把咖啡豆放進去
貓載體。

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
謝謝！ \!
獲救的 3 隻貓中有 \v[143] 隻！

passages.name: Street ARG — p1
passages.content:
Hungry Ghost:
I miss popcorn...
passages.content_zh:
餓鬼：
我想念爆米花...

passages.name: Street ARG — p1
passages.content:
Hungry Ghost:
Mmmm, coffee.
Lattes...
Muffins...
passages.content_zh:
餓鬼：
嗯，咖啡。
拿鐵咖啡...
鬆餅...

passages.name: Street ARG — p1
passages.content:
Spirit:
No wait, I don't have pockets. \.\.
Or hands.

Maybe I'll just sneak on.

Spirit:
I don't suppose I could borrow bus fare?
passages.content_zh:
精神：
等等，我沒有口袋。 \.\.
或者手。

也許我會偷偷溜走。

精神：
我想我不能藉公車費吧？

passages.name: Street ARG — p1
passages.content:
The spirit is staring at an empty parked car.

Spirit:
Hey buddy, can you give me a lift?
passages.content_zh:
靈魂盯著一輛停著的空車。

精神：
嘿，夥計，你能載我一程嗎？

passages.name: Pet shelter ARG
passages.content:
Shelter Head Felix:
I guess if you really have to get a dog, you
can go to the other side of the counter.

But wouldn't you rather have a cat?

Volunteer Felix:
Welcome to the pet shelter!

Let me know if you're interested in meeting
our cats!

A cat is one of the most affectionate pets you
can get, and it knows how to take care of
itself.
passages.content_zh:
庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
我想如果你真的必須養一隻狗，你
可以走到櫃檯的另一邊。

但你不想養隻貓嗎？

志工菲利克斯：
歡迎來到寵物收容所！

如果您有興趣見面請告訴我
我們的貓！

貓是你最愛的寵物之一
可以獲得，而且它知道如何照顧
本身。

passages.name: Pet shelter ARG — Wish autoplay — p1
passages.content:
A few minutes ago...

Shelter Head Felix:
...And her vaccination record is with the rest
of the paperwork.

I recommend keeping her in one room for a
while, let her get used to you and the house.\!
Once she's more comfortable you can let her
out to explore.

New Pet Owner:
Thank you so much!\!
From both of us!

Shelter Head Felix:
It's the least we can do!\!
And I'm happy she's found such a good
owner!

New Pet Owner:
It's thanks to you matching us up so well!\!
I wish you two could help everyone find their
partners too!

Magic flies everywhere as the dogs jump at
Arcadia's minion.
passages.content_zh:
幾分鐘前...

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
....她的疫苗記錄與其他人一樣
的文書工作。

我建議讓她在一個房間裡待一段時間
一會兒，讓她習慣你和這房子。 \！
一旦她感覺更舒服了，你就可以讓她
出去探索。

新寵物主人：
非常感謝！ \!
來自我們倆！

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
這是我們至少能做的！ \!
我很高興她找到了這麼好的一個
主人！

新寵物主人：
多虧你讓我們如此般配！ \!
我希望你們兩個能幫助每個人找到他們的
夥伴也是！

當狗們跳躍時，魔法無處不在
阿卡迪亞的部下。

passages.name: Police Station ARG — p1
passages.content:
Spirit:
Being imprisoned for eternity in a hellish
underworld must violate some kind of law.

I hope the police have jurisdiction.
passages.content_zh:
精神：
被永遠囚禁在地獄般的地方
黑社會必須違反某種法律。

希望警方有管轄權。

passages.name: Police Station ARG — p1
passages.content:
Angry Ghost:
First I get all the other ghosts arrested.

Then \{I \{RULE!
passages.content_zh:
憤怒的幽靈：
首先我逮捕了所有其他鬼魂。

然後\{我\{規則！

passages.name: Coffee bathrooms
passages.content:
You stare at the urinal.\!
You're not sure this really works anymore.
passages.content_zh:
你盯著小便鬥。 \！
你不確定這是否真的有效。

passages.name: Coffee bathrooms
passages.content:
It's a little cabinet full of supplies.

Looks like some kind of cylinder? And some
sort of soft rectangle? Both of them packaged
up.

You're not sure what they're for.
passages.content_zh:
這是一個小櫃子，裡面裝滿了用品。

看起來像某種圓柱體？還有一些
某種軟矩形？兩個都打包了
起來。

你不確定它們的用途。

passages.name: Coffee bathrooms — Door — p2
passages.content:
System Message:
Employees must wash hands after using the
restroom.
passages.content_zh:
系統訊息：
員工使用後必須洗手
洗手間。

passages.name: Coffee bathrooms — Door — p3
passages.content:
Arcadia:
Not washing your hands?!\!
That's disgusting!\!
You're disgusting!
passages.content_zh:
阿卡迪亞：
不洗手？ ！ \！
太噁心了！ \!
你真令人噁心！

passages.name: Coffee bathrooms
passages.content: Much better.
passages.content_zh: 好多了。

passages.name: Coffee bathrooms — p1
passages.content:
You wash your hands.

System Message:
Hygiene is important.
passages.content_zh:
你洗手。

系統訊息：
衛生很重要。

passages.name: Coffee bathrooms — p2
passages.content: You wash your hands.
passages.content_zh: 你洗手。

passages.name: Coffee bathrooms ARG — p1
passages.content:
Ghost:
Didn't anyone teach you to knock?!
passages.content_zh:
幽靈：
沒人教你敲門嗎？

passages.name: Floor 2 ARG — Shirt statue — p1
passages.content:
There's no response.

You'll need to free the others before you can
help this poor man.

The potion runs off uselessly.\!
It looks like a potion isn't enough to cure
what's wrong here.

You dust off the petrified customer and give
them a quick polish.\!
If you have to be a statue, you might as well
look your best!
passages.content_zh:
沒有回應。

你需要先釋放其他人，然後才能進行
幫助這個可憐的人。

藥水毫無用處地流掉了。 \!
看來一劑藥水還不足以治愈
這裡出了什麼問題。

你把嚇呆的顧客撣去灰塵，然後給
他們快速拋光。 \！
如果你必須成為一座雕像，你也可以
展現你最好的一面！

passages.name: Floor 2 ARG — Shirt statue — p2
passages.content:
...\!
...\!
...\!
...\.meow\....

You put the shirt on the statue.

Hair practically explodes out of the customer's
head as stone turns back into flesh.

You hear sputtering as she paws at the
suddenly much longer hair covering her face.

Customer:
What?\.\. What?!\!
Where did-?!\! How did-?!?!

She suddenly calms down, pulling her hair
out of her face with the ease of long practice.

Customer:
Argh!

First that stupid alarm makes me rush out of
the changing rooms without my clothes, then
my hair tie vanishes!

I don't care anymore about evacuating! \!
I'm going to go find my pants!

She stalks off to the south.

The potion runs off uselessly.\!
It looks like a potion isn't enough to cure
what's wrong here.

You dust off the petrified customer and give
them a quick polish.\!
If you have to be a statue, you might as well
look your best!
passages.content_zh:
...\!
...\!
...\!
...\.喵\....

你把襯衫放在雕像上。

顧客的頭髮幾乎要爆炸了
石頭般的頭又變成肉了。

當她用爪子抓東西時，你會聽到濺水聲
突然長長的頭髮遮住了她的臉。

客戶：
什麼？ \.\.什麼？ ！ \！
哪裡-？ ！ \！怎麼-？ ！ ？ ！

她突然平靜下來，揪著頭髮
經過長時間的練習，她的臉上露出了輕鬆的表情。

客戶：
啊！

首先那個愚蠢的警報讓我衝出去
更衣室沒有我的衣服，然後
我的髮帶消失了！

我不再關心撤離了！ \！
我要去找我的褲子了！

她大步向南走去。

藥水毫無用處地流掉了。 \!
看來一劑藥水還不足以治愈
這裡出了什麼問題。

你把嚇呆的顧客撣去灰塵，然後給
他們快速拋光。 \！
如果你必須成為一座雕像，你也可以
展現你最好的一面！

passages.name: Floor 2 ARG — Clothing pile 2 — p1
passages.content:
A pile of clothing.\!
Must have been left behind when everyone
evacuated.

You smooth the wrinkles out of the clothes
and hang them back up on the racks.

Looks like someone left $50 in a pocket!
Nice!
passages.content_zh:
一堆衣服。 \！
當每個人都被拋在後面時
疏散。

你撫平衣服上的皺紋
並將它們掛回架子上。

看起來有人在口袋裡留下了 50 美元！
好的！

passages.name: Floor 2 ARG — Apron statue — p1
passages.content:
Petrified Customer:
I had just found something white...\!
But now everything's grey...

You place the item on the statue.

A ghost leaps out of nowhere and snatches it!\!
The ghost runs off into the floor.
That must not have been the right item.

You tie the apron onto the petrified man.

Customer:
What- what happened?

She looks around frantically.

Something happened! I-\. something feels
wrong!

She looks down at herself.

Customer: I-\! I!\!
*She blushes*
I can't believe I went out in this!

I can't believe I forgot to change back after
this morning...\!
I save it for special occasions.

A ghost leaps out of nowhere and snatches it!\!
The ghost runs off into the floor.
That must not have been the right item.

A ghost leaps out of nowhere and snatches it!\!
The ghost runs off into the floor.
That must not have been the right item.

A ghost leaps out of nowhere and snatches it!\!
The ghost runs off into the floor.
That must not have been the right item.

A ghost leaps out of nowhere and snatches it!\!
The ghost runs off into the floor.
That must not have been the right item.

Another envy spirit springs out of hiding to the
south. \!
That must be the last one! Catch it!

The potion runs off uselessly.\!
It looks like a potion isn't enough to cure
what's wrong here.

You dust off the petrified customer and give
them a quick polish.\!
If you have to be a statue, you might as well
look your best!
passages.content_zh:
嚇呆的顧客：
我剛剛發現了一些白色的東西......\！
但現在一切都是灰色的......

您將物品放在雕像上。

一個鬼魂不知從哪裡跳出來，把它搶走了！ \！
鬼魂跑到地板上。
那肯定不是正確的項目。

你把圍裙繫在嚇呆了的男人身上。

客戶：
發生了什麼事？

她瘋狂地環顧四周。

有事發生了！我-\。有什麼感覺
錯了！

她低頭看著自己。

顧客：我-\！我！ \！
*她臉紅了*
我不敢相信我竟然穿著這樣的衣服出門！

我不敢相信我忘記改回來了
今天早上...\！
我把它留到特殊場合。

一個鬼魂不知從哪裡跳出來，把它搶走了！ \！
鬼魂跑到地板上。
那肯定不是正確的項目。

一個鬼魂不知從哪裡跳出來，把它搶走了！ \！
鬼魂跑到地板上。
那肯定不是正確的項目。

另一個嫉妒的靈魂從隱藏的地方跳出來

那一定是最後一張了！抓住它！

藥水毫無用處地流掉了。 \!
看來一劑藥水還不足以治愈
這裡出了什麼問題。

你把嚇呆的顧客撣去灰塵，然後給
他們快速拋光。 \！
如果你必須成為一座雕像，你也可以
展現你最好的一面！

passages.name: Floor 2 Real — Apron statue — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
I can't believe I just wore this out in public.

*She looks around*
But no one seems to mind...

...Though I wish I knew what happened to my
button.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我不敢相信我剛剛在公共場合穿了這件衣服。

*她環顧四周*
但似乎沒有人介意...

……雖然我希望我知道我的發生了什麼事
按鈕。

passages.name: Floor 2 Real — Ghost Mastermind — p1
passages.content: Your glasses turn on with a click.
passages.content_zh: 單擊一下即可打開您的眼鏡。

passages.name: Floor 2 Real — Tie statue — p1
passages.content:
Petrified Customer:
If I hadn't needed...\!
A tie for the wedding...\!
I'd be fine...

You place the item on the statue.

A ghost leaps out of nowhere and snatches it!\!
The ghost runs off into the floor.
That must not have been the right item.

A ghost leaps out of nowhere and snatches it!\!
The ghost runs off into the floor.
That must not have been the right item.

A ghost leaps out of nowhere and snatches it!\!
The ghost runs off into the floor.
That must not have been the right item.

A ghost leaps out of nowhere and snatches it!\!
The ghost runs off into the floor.
That must not have been the right item.

You tie the tie around the statue's neck.

Customer:
What was I...?\.\.
The wedding!\!

I needed a tie for the wedding!

She looks franctically around.

I know I had it somewhere...

She starts patting her body, checking her
pockets.\! Her sides.\! Her back.

A look of realization flashes across her face
and she reaches down into her massive
cleavage.

Here we are!

Though is anyone going to be able to see it?

A ghost leaps out of nowhere and snatches it!\!
The ghost runs off into the floor.
That must not have been the right item.

Another envy spirit springs out of hiding to the
south. \!
That must be the last one! Catch it!

The potion runs off uselessly.\!
It looks like a potion isn't enough to cure
what's wrong here.

You dust off the petrified customer and give
them a quick polish.\!
If you have to be a statue, you might as well
look your best!
passages.content_zh:
嚇呆的顧客：
如果我不需要...\！
婚禮用的領帶...\！
我會沒事的...

您將物品放在雕像上。

一個鬼魂不知從哪裡跳出來，把它搶走了！ \！
鬼魂跑到地板上。
那肯定不是正確的項目。

一個鬼魂不知從哪裡跳出來，把它搶走了！ \！
鬼魂跑到地板上。
那肯定不是正確的項目。

一個鬼魂不知從哪裡跳出來，把它搶走了！ \！
鬼魂跑到地板上。
那肯定不是正確的項目。

一個鬼魂不知從哪裡跳出來，把它搶走了！ \！
鬼魂跑到地板上。
那肯定不是正確的項目。

你把領帶綁在雕像的脖子上。

客戶：
我是什麼…？ \.\.
婚禮！ \！

我的婚禮需要一條領帶！

她瘋狂地環顧四周。

我知道我在某個地方有過它...

她開始拍打她的身體，檢查她
口袋。 \！她的兩側。 \！她的背影。

她的臉上閃過一絲恍然大悟的表情
她把手伸進她巨大的
分裂。

我們到了！

但有人能看到它嗎？

一個鬼魂不知從哪裡跳出來，把它搶走了！ \！
鬼魂跑到地板上。
那肯定不是正確的項目。

另一個嫉妒的靈魂從隱藏的地方跳出來
南邊。 \！
那一定是最後一張了！抓住它！

藥水毫無用處地流掉了。 \!
看來一劑藥水還不足以治愈
這裡出了什麼問題。

你把嚇呆的顧客撣去灰塵，然後給
他們快速拋光。 \！
如果你必須成為一座雕像，你也可以
展現你最好的一面！

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Sleeper — p1
passages.content:
Sleeping Employee:
\.\.Just five more minutes...

She just rolls over and goes back to sleep.

Sleeping Employee:
Nope...\!
Not this time...
passages.content_zh:
睡覺的員工：
\.\.再過五分鐘...

她只是翻了個身，又繼續睡了。

睡覺的員工：
不……\！
這次不是...

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Sleeper — p3
passages.content:
The store employee has set up all the heat
lamps in the store to point at her.

Ssssussssan:
Mmmm, so comfy...
passages.content_zh:
店裡的工作人員已經把所有的暖氣都調好了
店裡的燈指向她。

蘇蘇蘇桑：
嗯嗯，好舒服…

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Coworker — p1
passages.content:
The employee is shaking her sleeping
coworker.

Employee:
Come on Susan, wake up!\!
The snakes have escaped and you're the only
one who knows how to handle them!

She shakes her coworker.\!
Who just keeps on sleeping.

Employee:
Aaaugh!

Employee:
This is bad!

I mean, the snakes are harmless. But our
manager is going to kill us!\!
We've had so many problems that everything
needs to be *perfect*.

She looks back to her coworker.

Employee:
And she's already on thin ice.

They keep her around because she's so good
with the animals, but if she keeps sleeping
through everything...

Employee:
This calls for drastic measures.\!
Normal coffee doesn't work. We need some
kind of super coffee.

Could you go to the coffeeshop down the
street and see if they can make anything?\!
I need to stay here and keep an eye out for
our manager.

And don't mind the snakes.  They're harmless,
really!
passages.content_zh:
員工正在搖晃她的睡眠
同事。

員工：
蘇珊，醒醒吧！ \!
蛇逃走了，你是唯一的
一個知道如何處理它們的人！

她搖晃她的同事。 \!
誰只是繼續睡。

員工：
啊啊！

員工：
這很糟糕！

我的意思是，蛇是無害的。但我們的
經理要殺了我們！ \！
我們遇到了太多的問題，以至於一切都
需要*完美*。

她回頭看向她的同事。

員工：
而她已經如履薄冰了。

他們把她留在身邊因為她太棒了
和動物在一起，但如果她繼續睡覺
透過一切...

員工：
這需要採取嚴厲措施。 \!
普通咖啡沒有作用。我們需要一些
一種超級咖啡。

你能去下面的咖啡店嗎
街上看看他們能不能做點什麼？ \！
我需要留在這裡並留意
我們的經理。

別介意蛇。  它們是無害的，
真的！

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Coworker — p2
passages.content:
Employee:
Have you checked at the coffeeshop yet?\!
The guy there makes all sorts of weird drinks,
I'm sure he can think of something!
passages.content_zh:
員工：
你去咖啡店檢查了嗎？ \!
那裡的人製作各種奇怪的飲料
我相信他一定能想到什麼！

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Coworker — p3
passages.content:
Employee:
You have it? Great!

With the ease of someone who has had to do
this way too many times, she pours it into the
mouth of her sleeping coworker.

Employee:
Are you sure that was-\.\.\.\^

Susan:
\{I HAVE NEVER BEEN
THIS AWAKE!

Susan:
\{WHAT'S WRONG,
WHAT'S WRONG?!?!?!?!

Employee:
\^I-\.

Susan:
TELL ME LATER, I'M GOING FOR A RUN!!!!

You can see her zooming through the rest of
the floor.

Susan:
OH HI SNAKEY!

Gathering snakes as she goes.

Susan:
ANOTHER FRIEND!

Until all you can see is a giant ball of happy
snakes, still dashing around.

Susan:
SNAKEY CUDDLES!

And then she trips.\!
Onto what sounds like an armful of suddenly
very unhappy snakes.

Susan:
AH! BITEY FRIENDS! BITEY FRIENDS!
passages.content_zh:
員工：
你有嗎？偉大的！

與必須做的人一樣輕鬆
這樣的次數太多了，她把它倒進
她熟睡的同事的嘴。

員工：
你確定那是-\.\.\.\^

蘇珊：
\{我從來沒有去過
這覺醒了！

蘇珊：
\{出了什麼問題，
怎麼了？ ！ ？ ！ ？ ！ ？ ！

員工：
\^我-\。

蘇珊：
稍後告訴我，我要去跑步！ ！ ！ ！

你可以看到她在其餘部分中放大
地板。

蘇珊：
喔嗨，蛇！

她一邊走一邊收集蛇。

蘇珊：
另一位朋友！

直到你看到的只是一個巨大的快樂球
蛇，依然在亂竄。

蘇珊：
蛇的擁抱！

然後她絆倒了。 \！
突然間，聽起來像是一抱
非常不高興的蛇。

蘇珊：
啊！咬朋友！咬朋友！

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Coworker — p4
passages.content:
Employee:
I wish I could say this was unusual for her...

She's lucky she's so good with the animals.
passages.content_zh:
員工：
我希望我能說這對她來說很不尋常......

她很幸運，她和動物相處得很好。

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Snake — p1
passages.content:
The employee runs up and pushes you away.

Employee:
No!\!
Stay away from them!

Employee:
What are you doing?!\!
Those snakes are harmless!\!
Stay away from them!
passages.content_zh:
員工跑過來把你推開。

員工：
不！ \！
離他們遠一點！

員工：
你在做什麼？ ！ \！
那些蛇是無害的！ \！
離他們遠一點！

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — p2
passages.content:
You gingerly approach the pile of twitching
snakes.\!
There's one especially large tail sticking out
that you're a little worried about.

If the tail is that large, how huge must the
snake be? Is it dangerous?

Suddenly, a figure bursts out of the pile.

Ssssussssan:
I'M OKAY!

Ah. That explains that.
passages.content_zh:
你小心翼翼地靠近那堆抽搐的東西
蛇。 \!
一條特別大的尾巴伸出來
你有點擔心。

如果尾巴那麼大，那它得有多大？
蛇是？危險嗎？

突然，一道人影從人群中衝了出來。

蘇蘇蘇桑：
我沒事！

啊。這就解釋了這一點。

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — p3
passages.content:
The previously sleeping employee is going
around soothing snakes and putting them back
in their cages, still slightly too fast and too
loud.

Ssssussssan:
WOW! What was IN that?!?!
passages.content_zh:
之前睡覺的員工要走了
安撫蛇並將其放回原處
在他們的籠子裡，仍然有點太快太
大聲。

蘇蘇蘇桑：
哇！那裡面是什麼？ ！ ？ ！

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Employee after — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
I don't know, the snakes are cool...\!
But the rabbits are really cute...

Are you sure it's a bad idea to get both? They
could play together!

Employee:
Sir, I'd really advise just getting one as
your first pet.

A pet is a lot of work to care for, and it's best
to start with one.

Customer:
That makes sense. I think a bunny, then?\!
Or no, a snake?\!
Or...

Employee:
Are you sure you don't want to hold one of
them? That might help you decide.

Customer:
No, no, I would hate to introduce myself to
them and then leave them behind!
It would be cruel!

Employee:
Well, is there anything else I can do to help
you choose?

Customer:
Hmmm...

Customer:
Oh, I know!

He turns to you.

Customer:
Which do you like more? Snakes or rabbits?

Customer:
Well, there we go!\!
I would like to be introduced to your politest
snake, please.

The clerk vanishes for a moment, then comes
back with a small pink snake.

Employee:
I'd like you to meet one of our best-behaved
young corn snakes.\!
She's a real cutie!

She holds the snake out to him.

Employee:
Here, she loves having her head scratched.

The customer gives a tentative scratch to the
top of the snake's head.

The snake leans into it, seeming to enjoy it
more and more as the nails on her head
grow out into inch-long claws.

Customer:
Aww, she really does!

He doesn't seem to notice as pink scales begin
to spread down his fingers from the point of
contact.

Employee:
Here, trying holding her.
Just hold out your hands.

The snake immediately starts twining around
the customer's fingers.\!
Both hands are now developing a coat of pink
scales, even as they slim down.

Employee:
She likes to sit on shoulders, too.
Give it a try!

Using his significantly more delicate arms,
the customer transfers the snake up to his
shoulders.

The pink scales have spread all the way up
to the middle of his upper arms, giving the
look of long elegant gloves.

Customer:
Wow, she really is affectionate!

As soon as the snake reaches her new per
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我不知道，蛇很酷......\！
不過兔子真的很可愛...

你確定兩者都買是個壞主意嗎？他們
可以一起玩！

員工：
先生，我真的建議買一個
你的第一隻寵物。

照顧寵物是一項繁重的工作，但最好
從一個開始。

客戶：
這是有道理的。我想是兔子吧？ \!
或者不，一條蛇？ \！
或者...

員工：
您確定不想持有其中一個嗎
他們？這可能會幫助你做出決定。

客戶：
不，不，我不想向大家介紹自己
然後把他們拋在身後！
這太殘酷了吧！

員工：
嗯，還有什麼我可以幫忙的嗎
你選擇？

客戶：
嗯...

客戶：
哦，我知道！

他轉向你。

客戶：
你比較喜歡哪一個？蛇還是兔子？

客戶：
好吧，讓我們開始吧！ \！
我想被介紹給您最有禮貌的人
蛇，請。

店員消失了一會兒，然後出現了
後面有一條粉紅色的小蛇。

員工：
我想讓你見見我們中表現最好的一位
年輕的玉米蛇。 \!
她真是個可愛的人！

她把蛇遞給他。

員工：
在這裡，她喜歡被抓頭。

客戶試探性地刮了一下
蛇的頭頂。

蛇靠在裡面，似乎很享受
越來越像她頭上的指甲
長成一吋長的爪子。

客戶：
哇哦，她真的這麼做了！

他似乎沒有註意到粉紅色的鱗片開始出現
從點向下展開他的手指
聯繫。

員工：
在這裡，試著抱住她。
只要伸出你的雙手。

蛇立即開始纏繞
顧客的手指。 \!
雙手現在都長出了一層粉紅色的皮毛
鱗片，即使它們變薄了。

員工：
她也喜歡坐在肩膀上。
嘗試一下！

用他明顯更纖細的手臂，
顧客將蛇轉移到他的位置
肩膀。

粉紅色的鱗片已經蔓延開來
到他的上臂中部，給予
看起來優雅的長手套。

客戶：
哇，她真是太貼心了！

一旦蛇到達她的新位置

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Employee after — p3
passages.content:
// Pet status:
0 - unchosen
1 - Snake
2 - Rabbit

Employee:
Now, she can get by with a heat lamp from our
store. You might want to look into getting a
heated blanket for yourself.

I know Susan swears by them.

Employee:
It's always so nice to see someone preparing
for their first experience with a pet!
passages.content_zh:
// 寵物狀態:
0 - 未選擇
1 - 蛇
2 - 兔子

員工：
現在，她可以用我們的加熱燈度過難關
商店。您可能想考慮獲得
給自己加熱毯子。

我知道蘇珊對他們發誓。

員工：
看到有人做好準備總是很高興
這是他們第一次與寵物相處的經驗！

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Employee after — p4
passages.content:
// Pet status:
0 - unchosen
1 - Snake
2 - Rabbit

Employee:
Remember, a hay-based diet is best. Though
we offer a range of treats if you want to try
them.

And you might enjoy chewing on some of our
chew toys to keep your teeth under control.
passages.content_zh:
// 寵物狀態:
0 - 未選擇
1 - 蛇
2 - 兔子

員工：
請記住，以乾草為主的飲食是最好的。雖然
如果您想嘗試，我們提供一系列美食
他們。

您可能會喜歡咀嚼我們的一些
咀嚼玩具以控制牙齒。

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Uncertain customer — p3
passages.content:
Customer:
Okay, so I should be buying pinky mice for her
until she gets a little larger.

How about me? Should I be trying to eat mice
too?
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
好吧，所以我應該買小指老鼠
直到她變大一點。

我呢？我應該嘗試吃老鼠嗎
也是？

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Uncertain customer — p4
passages.content:
Customer:
Rabbits like to eat *what*?!

You know what, I think I'm just going to try
going vegetarian instead.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
兔子喜歡吃*什麼*？ ！

你知道嗎，我想我只是想嘗試一下
改為素食。

passages.name: Floor 3 Real after — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
In what has become a surprisingly familiar
event, an animal control officer is lying here
groaning.

Animal Control:
Why did it have to be snakes...

You use another potion.

Animal Control:
Huh, no idea what just happened.

She shrugs.\!
It takes a while for the jiggling that follows to
die down.

Animal Control:
Got bit by some snakes? And then maybe
there was some clothing or something?

She shrugs again, then slithers off upstairs.
passages.content_zh:
在這已經變得出奇地熟悉的情況下
事件中，一名動物管制官員躺在這裡
呻吟。

動物管制：
為什麼一定是蛇...

你用另一種藥水。

動物管制：
呵呵，我不知道剛剛發生了什麼事。

她聳聳肩。 \!
接下來的晃動需要一段時間
消亡。

動物管制：
被蛇咬了？然後也許
有些衣服什麼的嗎？

她再次聳聳肩，然後溜上樓。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real — p1
passages.content: Coffee was found!
passages.content_zh: 咖啡被發現了！

passages.name: Floor 4 Real — p1
passages.content: Healing Sandwich was found!
passages.content_zh: 治癒三明治被發現了！

passages.name: Floor 4 Real — Stairs up — p1
Floor 4 Real — Vending machine
passages.content:
You scan through the vending machine's
offerings.
passages.content_zh:
您掃描自動販賣機的
供品。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real
passages.content: Unfortunately it looks like the door is blocked.
passages.content_zh: 不幸的是，門似乎被堵住了。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real
passages.content:
Adult Toys and Games

Unfortunately it looks like the door is blocked.
passages.content_zh:
成人玩具和遊戲

不幸的是，門似乎被堵住了。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real — p1
passages.content: 200\G were found!

passages.name: Floor 5 ARG — Ghost Mastermind — p1
passages.content:
Soon, soon. \!
And these fools don't even realize what's
waiting for them.
passages.content_zh:
很快，很快。 \！
這些傻瓜甚至不知道是什麼
等待著他們。

passages.name: Floor 5 ARG — Autorun event — p1
passages.content:
You arrive on the fourth floor.

It's eerily quiet. \!
Especially after the chaos of the previous
floors.

At This Point You're Playing Along Out Of Pity:
Finally!

At This Point You're Playing Along Out Of Pity:
No offence, but you're \{\.SO \.SLOW.

The breaker box is at the other end of the
floor.\!
Flip the breaker, and everything will be fixed
forever.

At This Point You're Playing Along Out Of Pity:
What are you waiting for?\!
Do your job!
passages.content_zh:
你到達四樓。

安靜得出奇。 \！
尤其是在經歷了之前的混亂之後
地板。

此時你出於憐憫而配合：
終於！

此時你出於憐憫而配合：
無意冒犯，但你\{\.SO \.SLOW。

斷路器盒位於電源的另一端
地板。 \!
翻轉斷路器，一切都會修復
永遠。

\c[3]守護靈1：

\c[2]守護靈2：
不可能！

\c[3]守護靈1：
不可能！

\c[2]守護靈2：

\c[3]守護靈1：
我們將遵守諾言。

烈酒：\>
\c[3]錯誤！
\C[2]對！ \<

\c[2]懲罰總是有的！

你的屁股！

\c[2]守護靈2：

兄弟！ \！他們沒有屁股可言！

\c[3]守護靈1：
太糟糕了！

\c[2]守護靈2：

\c[3]守護靈1：

您感覺您的乳房慢慢縮小！ \！
呃，慢慢洩氣。

什麼？ ！

\c[3]守護靈1：

如果有錢的話我會更高興

passages.name: Floor 3 ARG — Poker game — p1
passages.content:
Join the poker game?

You sit down for a few hands of poker.

It's a tough fought hand, but you manage to

Gained $200!

Envy Spirit:
Come back! I'll show you!

The cards just aren't going your way.  It's not

Lost $50!

Greed Spirit:
Come back when you have enough cash!

You sit down to play.\!
Everything goes your way. It's like the cards

It isn't long before you've cleaned the spirits

Gained $1000!
Gained raw mana!

Greed Spirit:
No! My beautiful money!

Envy Spirit:
I can't believe you did so well.\!
I hate you!\! Hate hate hate!

Back to Monopoly then?

passages.content:
\{\{\{\C[3]HALT!

\c[2]Guard Spirit 1:
We're not required to have a loophole, honest.

\c[3]Guard Spirit 1:
I like big butts and I CANNOT LIE!\!
\c[3]My brother likes big butts and CANNOT
TELL THE TRUTH!

\c[3]And we...\! uh...\!
\{WOW.

\c[2]Guard Spirit 2:
That's not the biggest butt I've ever seen!\!
Not the sexiest, juiciest butt.

\c[3]Guard Spirit 1:
...you can pass.

\c[2]Guard Spirit 2:
False!

\c[3]Guard Spirit 1:
\c[3]To pass, you must solve our CUNNING
RIDDLE!

\c[2]Guard Spirit 2:
Don't worry, it is extremely EASY and SAFE!

\c[3]Guard Spirit 1:
There are SIX controls here, two switches,
two buttons and two levers!

\c[2]Guard Spirit 2:
MORE THAN ONE arraignment will let you pass!

\c[3]GS1: Here are YOUR CLUES!\!
\c[2]GS2: Only ONE green control is on!
\c[3]GS1: And ONE switch!

\c[2]GS2: The RED LEVER is on!
\c[3]GS1: In total, THREE buttons and switches
are on!

\c[2]GS2: And finally, there is only ONE red
control on!
\c[3]GS1: Now we will LAUGH as you fail to
solve our riddle!

\{\c[2]AHA\c[3]HA\c[2]HA\c[3]HA\c[2]HA\c[3]HA\c[2]HA\c[3]HA\c[2]HA\c[3]HA!!!!
passages.content_zh:
\{\{\{\C[3]停下來！

\C[3]守護神：
停下來，做好準備！

\C[2]守護靈2：
雖然這不是必要的！

\C[3]守護靈1：
與我們的同事不同，我們有職業道德！

\C[2]守護靈2：
通常！

\c[3]守護靈1：
如果這一層沒有其他人會停下來
你，我們會！ \！
除非你能解開我們的謎題。

\c[2]守護靈1：
老實說，我們不需要有漏洞。

\c[3]守護靈1：
我喜歡大屁股，我不能說謊！ \！
\c[3]我哥哥喜歡大屁股但不能
說實話！

\c[3]而我們...\!呃...\！
\{哇。

\c[2]守護靈2：
這不是我見過的最大的屁股！ \！
不是最性感、最多汁的屁股。

\c[3]守護靈1：
……你可以通過。

\c[2]守護靈2：
錯誤！

\c[3]守護靈1：
\c[3]要通過，你必須解決我們的狡猾
謎語！

\c[2]守護靈2：
別擔心，這非常簡單且安全！

\c[3]守護靈1：
這裡有六個控制器，兩個開關，
兩個按鈕和兩個控制桿！

\c[2]守護靈2：
不只一次提審就能讓你通過！

\c[3]GS1：這是你的線索！ \！
\c[2]GS2：只有一個綠色控制開啟！
\c[3]GS1：還有一個開關！

\c[2]GS2：紅色控制桿已開啟！
\c[3]GS1：總共三個按鈕和開關
已開啟！

\c[2]GS2：最後，只有一個紅色
控制開啟！
\c[3]GS1：現在我們會笑，因為你失敗了
解開我們的謎題！

\{\c[2]AHA\c[3]HA\c[2]HA\c[3]HA\c[2]HA\c[3]HA\c[2]HA\c[3]HA\c[2]HA\c[3]HA！ ！ ！

passages.name: Floor 3 ARG — Gregory scene trigger — p1
passages.content:
You see SocraticMachine and a very excited
bird talking.

Bird:
Coo! Coo!\!
You have passed the three Spirit Trials! The
time has come to grant you the Power of Bird.

Bird:
Hold your arms out and repeat after me.\!
Coo. Coo. Peep peep tweet.

Player SocraticMachine:
Coo coo? Peep peep tweet?

Bird:
No!\! No, you do the chant with a sparrow
accent like that and who knows what could
happen!

Try it again!\!
Coo. Coo. Peep peep tweet.

Player SocraticMachine:
Coo. coo. Peep peep. Tweet!

Bird:
What are you, a pelican?\!
But you're closer. One more time.\!
Coo. Coo. Peep peep tweet.

Player SocraticMachine:
Coo. coo. Peep peep tweet.

Bird:
That's better! Keep that up and I can almost
guarantee the Power of Bird will leave you
with all your limbs!

Player SocraticMachine:
What was-\.\^

Bird:
No time now, hurry along!\!
The Spirit Orb isn't going to retrieve itself from
the rafters!

Both:
Tweet tweet chirp!

Bird:
That's it!\! Now flap your arms, bob your head!

Both:
Tweet peep chirp peep chirp!\!
Coo chirp chirp tweet!

Player BirbcraticMachine:
Did it- it worked!

The bird looks her up and down.

Bird:
Four limbs, wings, I'd call that a success.\!
And like I said, almost *no* chance that you'd
turn into a chicken. Or explode.

Or turn into an egg. Or, and I don't know why
this keeps happening, grow massive thighs.

Gregory is ignoring the bird in favor of
examining her new body. \!
She gives an experimental flap of her wings,
lifting her briefly into the air.

Player BirbcraticMachine:
I can fly!\!
I have to make a post about this.

She paws at her pants pocket with one of her
wings.

Player BirbcraticMachine:
...This may take some thought.
passages.content_zh:
你看到蘇格拉底機器並且非常興奮
鳥說話。

鳥：
咕咕！咕咕！ \！
你已經通過三道魂試了！的
是時候賦予你鳥之力了。

鳥：
伸出你的雙臂，跟著我重複。 \！
咕咕。咕咕。窺視推特。

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
咕咕？窺視推特？

鳥：
不！ \！不，你用麻雀唱誦
像那樣的口音誰知道會發生什麼
發生！

再試一次！ \!
咕咕。咕咕。窺視推特。

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
咕咕。咕咕。窺視窺視。鳴叫！

鳥：
你是什​​麼，鵜鶘？ \！
但你更接近。再一次。 \！
咕咕。咕咕。窺視推特。

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
咕咕。咕咕。窺視推特。

鳥：
這樣更好！堅持下去，我幾乎可以
保證鳥的力量會離開你
用你所有的四肢！

玩家蘇格拉底機器：
什麼是-\.\^

鳥：
現在沒時間了，快點吧！ \!
靈珠不會自行恢復
椽子！

兩者：
推特嘰嘰喳喳！

鳥：
就是這樣！ \!現在拍動你的手臂，搖頭！

兩者：
鳴叫 嘰嘰喳喳 嘰嘰喳喳！ \！
嘰嘰喳喳嘰嘰喳喳！

玩家 BirbcraticMachine：
做到了——成功了！

那隻鳥上下打量著她。

鳥：
四肢，翅膀，我認為這是成功的。 \！
就像我說的，你幾乎*沒有*機會
變成一隻雞。或者爆炸。

或變成雞蛋。或者，我不知道為什麼
這種情況不斷發生，長出粗壯的大腿。

格雷戈里忽略了那隻鳥，而選擇了
檢查她的新身體。 \！
她實驗性地拍打翅膀，
將她短暫地舉到空中。

玩家 BirbcraticMachine：
我會飛！ \!
我必須就此發表一篇文章。

她用一隻爪子抓著褲子口袋
翅膀。

玩家 BirbcraticMachine：
……這可能需要一些思考。

passages.name: Floor 3 ARG — Ghost Mastermind — p1
passages.content:
Almost Certainly Evil Woman:
Ugh.

Almost Certainly Evil Woman:
This floor is infested with sloth spirits.

They're even more useless than the envy
spirits on the last floor.

And look at this laziness!

Almost Certainly Evil Woman:
Sleeping on the job.\!
In any proper world, the penalty for this would
be DEATH!

Kaede:
Death for sleeping on the job?

\>Kaede:
\>Death for sleeping on the job?\<
I can see it.\!
What penalty would thoust impose for littering?

Barely Even Hiding It Anymore:
Oh, death, definitely.

Kaede:
Mopery?

How Is She So Bad At This?:
Death!

Kaede:
Lese Majeste?

How Does She Not Realize We Know?
Oh, death is too good for them.\!
Double-death!

She nods happily to herself while Kaede tries
not to laugh.

Elina:
Excuse me!

\>Elina:
\>Excuse me!\<
Are the sloth spirits dangerous?

At This Point You're Playing Along Out Of Pity:
Not unless you wake them up. And *nothing*
wakes a sloth spirit up.\!
This floor should be a casual stroll to the stairs.

At This Point You're Playing Along Out Of Pity:
Let's get going! We've wasted enough time!\!
Uh, great hero.
passages.content_zh:
幾乎肯定是邪惡的女人：
呃。

幾乎肯定是邪惡的女人：
這層樓充滿了樹懶精魂。

它們比嫉妒更無用
最後一層的精神。

看看這懶惰！

幾乎肯定是邪惡的女人：
工作時睡覺。 \!
在任何適當的世界中，對此的懲罰將是
是死亡！

楓：
上班睡覺會死？

\>楓：
\>工作時睡覺會死？ \<
我可以看到它。 \!
亂丟垃圾會受到什麼處罰？

幾乎不再隱藏它：
哦，死亡，絕對是。

楓：
莫佩里？

她怎麼這麼不擅長？ ：
死！

楓：
冒犯陛下？

她怎麼不知道我們知道？
哦，死亡對他們來說太好了。 \！
雙死！

當楓嘗試時，她高興地對自己點頭
不要笑。

埃琳娜：
對不起！

\>埃琳娜：
\>對不起！ \<
樹懶精靈危險嗎？

此時你出於憐憫而配合：
除非你叫醒他們，否則不會。並且*什麼都沒有*
喚醒樹懶的靈魂。 \！
這一層應該是休閒漫步的樓梯。

此時你出於憐憫而配合：
我們出發吧！我們已經浪費了足夠的時間了！ \！
嗯，偉大的英雄。

passages.name: Floor 3 ARG — Elina later — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
It just sits there and sleeps.\!
What's the *point*?!
passages.content_zh:
\n[2]:
它只是坐在那裡睡覺。 \！
這*重點*是什麼？ ！

passages.name: Floor 3 ARG — Kaede later — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
Ah, fish. A glorious part of the everlasting
bounty of nature.

Also delicious.
passages.content_zh:
楓：
啊，魚。永恆的榮耀部分
大自然的恩賜。

也很好吃。

passages.name: Floor 3 ARG — Next pride spirit — p2
passages.content:
The same spirit from before is standing in
front of a sleeping clerk.

Spirit:
(They're here!)

Spirit:
Mwahahaha! Prepare yourself, human for the
next stage of my-

She glances over at you.

Spirit:
Incredibly CLEVER, *amazing*, INTELLIGENT
plan!

Spirit:
Soon! Soon you will have your world shaken
to its core!

The spirit leaps over to a shelf and flings the
contents onto the ground.

Spirit:
Do you see?\!
Your whole system, your whole way of life,
depends on neatness! Organization!

You fools thought that this store would always
be clean! That you could simply frolick through
the aisles, browsing for toys and fify-percent-
off clearance merchandise!

While now, the floor, the floor is not clean!

She pauses dramatically, glancing back at
you to be sure you're watching.

Spirit:
How does it feel, to have the very bedrock
beneath your way of life stripped away?

Such a simple flaw, yet it took a genius like
me to realize!

What if the floor was not clean? What if you
could no longer reach the shelves?\!
Cower in terror, as your entire way of life
disintegrates around you!

Ahahahahaha!\!
\{AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

Still cackling madly, the spirit leaps through
the ceiling again and disappears.

Kaede:
Verily, she doth have thine manner of speech
perfect.\!
And thine manner of plans.

:
Argh, that imbecile!\!
What is the point?!

She gets nothing from this!\!
There is no reason to have a plan if it has no
goal!

I can't let her make a mockery of pride spirits
like this.
We are putting a stop to it!

She heads towards the stairs.
passages.content_zh:
與之前相同的精神仍然存在
面前是個熟睡的店員。

精神：
（他們來了！）

精神：
哇哈哈！人類，做好準備
我的下一階段-

她看了你一眼。

精神：
令人難以置信的聰明，*驚人*，聰明
計劃！

精神：
很快！很快你的世界就會震動
其核心！

靈魂跳到架子上並扔掉了
內容物掉到地上。

精神：
你看到了嗎？ \!
你的整個系統，你的整個生活方式，
取決於整潔！組織！

你們這些傻瓜以為這家店永遠都會
乾淨點！你可以簡單地嬉戲
走道，瀏覽玩具和 fify-percent-
清倉商品！

而現在，地板、地板不乾淨！

Is there something else I can help you with?

PA Meredith:
Terra Games does not admit liability in the

for *anything* that happened.

That you accepted, in a legally binding manner,
any consequences of using this experimental
technology.

computer.

of

我要去找我的姊妹們了再次感謝英雄！

passages.name: Hadea room ARG — Hadea — p1
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
Thank you once again for vanquishing that
foul device!

Perhaps when you return someday I will be
able to repay you for your great service.
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞女神：
再次感謝你戰勝了它
犯規裝置！

也許有一天你回來時我會
能夠報答您的優質服務。

passages.name: Hadea room ARG — Hadea — p3
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
Welcome .

Now that I am free, there are several things
I can do to assist you.

I have sent my spirits out to monitor your
progress.  Speak to me for a summary of
how much of the new goddess's power you
have drained.

I am also looking for raw mana.  I could give
you some of the wealth that flows from my
domain in return.

What would you like?

She closes her eyes and listens.

Goddess Hadea:
My spirits report that you have gotten this new
goddess to upgrade areas [...] times.

You've baited her into changing [...] people.

Overall, I would say you've weakened her
defenses by [...] thaums.\!
Much work remains to be done.

Goddess Hadea:
I can offer you $1000 for each raw mana.\!
How much would you like to sell?

Goddess Hadea:
You don't have that much!\!
Come back to me when you have a real offer!

Goddess Hadea:
Done!\!
Come back if you have any more raw mana
to get rid of, Hero!

Goddess Hadea:
Our unwelcome neighbor upstairs has sealed
off her domain.\!

If you can make her expend her power on
the town, it should weaken the seal.

Then you charge up, do your hero thing, and
everything's great!

She's already made some modifications to
the town, but you need to bait her into making
more.  There are a few different methods.

You can bring about individual changes to
people.

You can also get her to upgrade entire areas,
changing the people and objects within.\!
This is a bigger expenditure of power, probably
about twice as much as changing a person.

You could also try to find more of our trapped
sisters.  That won't drain the dark goddess's
power, but will give us more power to break
the seal.

I've sent my spirits out to scout the town.
They'll report any changes you accomplish.
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞女神：
歡迎。

現在我有空了，有幾件事
我可以幫你。

我已經派出我的靈魂來監視你
進步。  跟我談談總結
新女神的力量你有多少
已經排幹。

我也在尋找原始法力。  我可以給
你是我的一些財富
域作為回報。

你要什麼？

她閉上眼睛傾聽。

哈迪亞女神：
我的靈魂報告說你已經得到了這個新的
女神升級區域[...]次。

你引誘她去改變[...]人。

總的來說，我想說你削弱了她
[...] thaums 的防禦。 \！
還有很多工作要做。

哈迪亞女神：
我可以為您提供每個原始法力 1000 美元的價格。 \！
您想賣多少錢？

哈迪亞女神：
你沒有那麼多！ \!
當你有真正的報價時再回來找我！

哈迪亞女神：
完成！ \!
如果你還有更多原始法力就回來吧
擺脫吧，英雄！

哈迪亞女神：
我們樓上不受歡迎的鄰居已經封鎖了
離開她的領域。 \！

如果你能讓她發揮她的力量
城鎮的話，應該會削弱封印。

然後你充電，做你的英雄事，然後
一切都很棒！

她已經做了一些修改
鎮上，但你需要引誘她
更多。  有幾種不同的方法。

您可以對以下內容進行個別更改
人們。

你還可以讓她升級整個區域，
改變裡面的人和物。 \！
這可能是更大的電力消耗
大約是改變一個人的兩倍。

你也可以嘗試尋找更多被困的人
姐妹們。  這不會耗盡黑暗女神的能量
力量，但會給我們更多的力量來打破
印章。

我已經派出我的靈魂去偵察這個城鎮了。
他們會報告您完成的任何更改。

passages.content:

I guess we can use all the help we can get.\!

我想我們可以利用我們所能得到的所有幫助。 \！

passages.name: Hadea room ARG — p1
passages.content:
Spirit:
All bow before the beauty of Hadea!

(Hey, this is better than going back to the

(She even shares her snacks with us

所有人都向哈迪亞的美麗致敬！
