passages.name: Programmers real — Bulletin board
passages.content:
The bulletin board is filled with memos and
notifications. \!
Pretty boring stuff.

A reminder that the new health plan still has
a copay...\!
Notes that a plumber has been called for the
weird smell in the first floor womens' restroom...

A reminder that the new dress code is going
to be enforced in the next few days...\!
...And that it includes a minimum cup size
requirement?
passages.content_zh:
佈告欄上寫滿了備忘錄和
通知。 \！
很無聊的東西。

提醒一下，新的健康計畫仍然有
共付額...\！
注意到一名水管工已被要求
一樓女廁所有奇怪的味道

提醒您新的服裝規範即將實施
將在未來幾天內強制執行...\！
…並且它包括最小罩杯尺寸
要求？

passages.name: Programmers real — Programmer fight — p1
passages.content:
\C[2]Programmer Harold:
Welcome, welcome. You must be the beta
tester we've heard so much about.\!
I'm Harold, and this is Luke.

\C[5]Programmer Luke:
Hi!\!
I worked on the physics engine for the game!

\C[5]If you've noticed how your breasts just
keep jiggling, that was my idea.

\C[2]Programmer Harold:
And I've developed most of the game
mechanics.

\C[2]Now, we are here to fight if necessary,
but that doesn't have to happen.\!
We'd like to offer you a job instead, doing QA
and bugtesting.

\C[2]You've shown an impressive ability to find
bugs in our game. Why, we've gotten two new
bugs alone from your battle with Meredith!

\C[5]Programmer Luke:
It's an important job!

\C[5]This release almost had a misplaced
decimal in the physics engine.\!
QA testers are why your boobs don't slap
you in the face every time you take a step!

She glances down at your chest.

\C[5]Programmer Luke:
Bet you're glad we caught that one!

\C[2]Programmer Harold:
Now, I know your first impulse is probably to
refuse. But let me tell you a little more about
the job before you do.

\C[2]This is a much better deal than Meredith
offered you. \!
Your encounter with her impressed us that
much.

\C[2]For starters, you'd be getting paid the
same as any of the programmers. Which is
much higher than industry standard for your
role.

\C[5]Programmer Luke:
401K matching up to 15%!

\C[2]Programmer Harold:
And the health benefits are the best you'll
find anywhere.

Luke bounces excitedly on her toes.

\C[5]Programmer Luke:
They're literal, actual magic!

\C[2]Programmer Harold:
Take me. I was sixty-five years old. Had a list
of health conditions the length of my tail.\!
And now look at me!

She raises herself up on her tail and spreads
out her arms to give you a good look at her.

\C[2]Programmer Harold:
I have the body of a twenty-year-old!

\C[2]I've never felt better in my *life*.\!
And I don't even know if I can age anymore!

\C[5]Programmer Luke:
And I have so much more energy now!

\C[5]I us
passages.content_zh:
\C[2]程式設計師哈羅德：
歡迎，歡迎。你一定是測試版
我們聽過很多測試儀。 \！
我是哈羅德，這是盧克。

\C[5]程式設計師路克：
嗨！ \！
我負責遊戲的物理引擎！

\C[5]如果您注意到您的乳房如何
繼續搖晃，這是我的主意。

\C[2]程式設計師哈羅德：
我開發了大部分遊戲
機械師。

\C[2]現在，如果有必要，我們會在這裡戰鬥，
但這不一定會發生。 \!
我們想為您提供一份從事品質檢查的工作
和錯誤測試。

\C[2]你展現了令人印象深刻的尋找能力
我們遊戲中的錯誤。為什麼，我們有了兩個新的
與梅雷迪絲的戰鬥中只留下錯誤！

\C[5]程式設計師路克：
這是一項重要的工作！

\C[5]這個版本幾乎有一個放錯地方的
物理引擎中的十進制。 \!
QA 測試人員是你胸部不拍打的原因
每次你踏出一步都會面對你！

她低頭看著你的胸部。

\C[5]程式設計師路克：
我打賭你很高興我們抓住了那個！

\C[2]程式設計師哈羅德：
現在，我知道你的第一個衝動可能是
拒絕。但讓我告訴你更多關於
在你做之前的工作。

\C[2]這比梅雷迪思好得多
提供給你。 \！
你和她的相遇給我們留下了深刻的印象
很多。

\C[2]對於初學者來說，您將獲得以下報酬
和任何程式設計師一樣。這是
遠高於您的業界標準
角色。

\C[5]程式設計師路克：
401K匹配率高達15%！

\C[2]程式設計師哈羅德：
對健康的好處是最好的
到處找。

路克興奮地踮起腳尖彈跳。

\C[5]程式設計師路克：
它們是字面上的、真正的魔法！

\C[2]程式設計師哈羅德：
帶我去吧我當時六十五歲。有一個清單
健康狀況取決於我尾巴的長度。 \！
現在看看我！

她用尾巴撐起身體並展開
伸出雙臂讓你好好看看她。

\C[2]程式設計師哈羅德：
我有二十歲的身體！

\C[2]我的*生活*中從未感覺如此好過。 \！
我甚至不知道我是否還能變老！

\C[5]程式設計師路克：
我現在有更多的精力了！

\C[5]我我們

passages.name: Programmers real — Snake programmer 2 — p2
passages.content:
\C[2]Programmer Harold:
Ready?

\C[5]Programmer Luke:
I guess we overlooked the synergies that a
casual player could luck into.

\C[2]Programmer Harold:
You mean we lost.

\C[5]Programmer Luke:
We lost *this time*. But I'm sure I could take
them next time!

\C[2]Programmer Harold:
We lost, so we're letting you move on.\!
And Luke is going to be filing some bug
reports.
passages.content_zh:
\C[2]程式設計師哈羅德：
準備好了嗎？

\C[5]程式設計師路克：
我想我們忽視了協同作用
休閒玩家可能會幸運地進入。

\C[2]程式設計師哈羅德：
你的意思是我們輸了。

\C[5]程式設計師路克：
我們*這次*輸了。但我確信我可以接受
他們下次！

\C[2]程式設計師哈羅德：
我們輸了，所以我們讓你繼續前進。 \!
盧克將提交一些錯誤
報告。

passages.name: Programmers real — Wolf programmer 2 — p2
passages.content:
Programmer Luke:
Next time.\. I'll get you next time!

\}After I patch out all your abilities.
passages.content_zh:
程式設計師盧克：
下次。 \.下次我來找你！

\}在我修補了你所有的能力之後。

passages.name: Programmers real — Snake programmer 2 — p2
passages.content:
Programmer Harold:
Well that was a good example of why someone
should spend less time running and more time
*reviewing their code*.

She gives Luke a very pointed look.
passages.content_zh:
程式設計師哈羅德：
嗯，這是一個很好的例子，說明為什麼有人
應該花更少的時間跑步，多一些時間
*審查他們的程式碼*。

她非常尖銳地看了盧克一眼。

passages.name: Manager real — Door — p1
passages.content: The door to the CEO's office.
passages.content_zh: 總裁辦公室門口。

passages.name: Manager real — Autoplay event — p1
passages.content:
Manager:
So you're the playtester I've heard so much
about!

The one who's shaking up the company!

Here, I know you're busy, fighting your way
towards an epic confrontation with Mr. Magnus,
but I'd really appreciate if you could take a
moment to chat.

Let's step into my office.

Her massive breasts swing wildly as she turns
around and begins jiggling off down the hall.

One of her breasts swings a little too far to
the side, knocking one of the potted plants
down as she tries to squeeze between them.

Juding from the dirt all over the carpet, this
must be a common occurance.

On the other hand, your chest is so big it's
not even worth trying to dodge the plants.\!
You leave them on their sides, like every other
set you've walked past.

You can empathize.\!
Your breasts are just as huge, and you've
already knocked over a few plants on your
way here.

Manager:
*Nervous laugh*
These old halls seem narrower these days.

She pauses for a moment at her office door.\!
Standing behind her, you can still see the sides
of her immense chest, wider than the door.

She carefully angles herself to push one
breast through.\!
Then steps through, turns, and pulls the other
breast in.

She waits while you do the same.

Manager:
Please, have a seat!

She rests her breasts on the table, then
realizes it completely blocks your view of
each other.

She turns a little to the side, resting them in
her lap.

Manager:
Welcome!

She manages to maneuver around both of
your sets of massive breasts to shake your
hand.

She shakes your hand.

Manager Anthony:
I'm Anthony Braston, one of the most senior
managers here at Terra Games.

I noticed you staring at my chest earlier.\!
Do you like it? It's part of our recent office
beautification campaign.

We want to give the staff a more attractive and
exciting experience!

She looks down at her massive cleavage
and smiles.

Now, I didn't need to go this far, but these
babies just show how excited I am to be at
Terra Games! How much we're overtu
passages.content_zh:
經理：
所以你就是我聽過很多次的遊戲測試員
關於！

那個讓公司震動的人！

在這裡，我知道你很忙，正在努力奮鬥
與馬格努斯先生進行史詩般的對抗，
但如果你能接受的話我真的很感激
聊天的時刻。

讓我們走進我的辦公室吧。

當她轉身時，她巨大的乳房瘋狂地擺動
繞了一圈，開始沿著大廳搖搖晃晃地走下去。

她的一個乳房擺動得有點過分
側面，敲了一盆盆栽
當她試圖擠在他們中間時，她倒下了。

從地毯上滿是污垢來看，這
一定是常見現象。

另一方面，你的胸部太大了
甚至不值得嘗試躲避植物。 \！
你讓他們像其他人一樣側躺著
設定你走過的地方。

你可以感同身受。 \!
你的胸部同樣巨大，而且你
已經打翻了你身上的一些植物
就在這裡。

經理：
*緊張的笑聲*
如今，這些古老的大廳似乎更狹窄了。

她在辦公室門口停了一會兒。 \！
站在她身後，依然可以看到側面
她巨大的胸膛，比門還寬。

她小心翼翼地調整自己的角度去推一個
乳房穿過。 \！
然後跨過去，轉身，拉另一個
乳房進去。

當你做同樣的事情時，她會等待。

經理：
請坐！

她把乳房放在桌子上，然後
意識到它完全擋住了你的視線
彼此。

她稍微轉向一邊，讓他們休息
她的腿。

經理：
歡迎！

她設法繞過這兩個
你那一對巨大的乳房來震動你
手。

她與你握手。

安東尼經理：
我是安東尼·布拉斯頓，最資深的人之一
Terra Games 的經理們。

我注意到你早些時候盯著我的胸部。 \！
你喜歡它？這是我們最近辦公室的一部分
美化活動。

我們希望為員工提供更具吸引力和
令人興奮的經驗！

她低頭看著自己巨大的乳溝
和微笑。

現在，我不需要走這麼遠，但是這些
寶貝們只是表現出我有多興奮
泰拉遊戲！我們有多少overtu

passages.name: Manager real — Manager 2 — p2
passages.content:
Manager Anthony:
I just want to say again that I'm sorry we
couldn't come to an agreement, and I wish you
the best in your future pursuits.

Also, I apologize for the massive beating I'm
about to administer.

\C[27]Magical manager powers, activate!
\C[5]Combat form!

She goes through an entire transformation
sequence, floating, glowing lights, and all.\!
And a surprising amount of nudity.

Manager Anthony:
In the name of Terra Games, I will punish you!

Your final attack knocks her back into her
original form.

She falls to the ground, hands flying to her
groin.

Manager Anthony:
My-\. You-\. How?!?!

She glowers.

Manager Anthony:
I am going to find out who put that in the code
and make them *suffer*.

You clear your throat.

Manager Anthony:
Oh, yes, right!\!
Go on ahead.

Just...\!
If you do manage to defeat Mr. Magnus and
take over the company...

Consider keeping him on?\!
He's done so much! I don't know how this
company would even function without him
anymore!
passages.content_zh:
安東尼經理：
我只想再說一遍，對不起，我們
無法達成協議，我希望你
在你未來的追求中最好的。

另外，我為我遭受的大規模毆打表示歉意
即將管理。

\C[27]神奇管理者力量，啟動！

她經歷了徹底的轉變
序列、浮動、發光的燈光等等。 \！
還有數量驚人的裸體。

安東尼經理：
以Terra Games的名義，我會懲罰你！

你的最後一次攻擊將她擊回原處
原始形式。

她倒在地上，雙手飛向她
腹股溝。

安東尼經理：
我的-\.你-\。如何？ ！ ？ ！

她怒視著。

安東尼經理：
我要找出是誰把它寫進程式碼裡的

你清清喉嚨。

安東尼經理：
哦，對了，沒錯！ \!
繼續前進。

只是...\！
如果你成功擊敗了馬格努斯先生並且

考慮讓他留下來嗎？ \!
他已經做了這麼多了！我不知道這是怎麼回事
即使沒有他，公司也能正常運作
不再了！

passages.name: CEO Real — Autoplay event — p1
passages.content:
Richard Magnus, CEO:
You're here!

He makes a awkward attempt to push some
of the mess underneath the table.

Richard Magnus, CEO:
I,\. uh,\. didn't expect you this soon.

He shoves the mess around a little more,
before giving up.

Richard Magnus, CEO:
Now, where were we?

Richard Magnus, CEO:
Please, call me Dick.\!
But yes, I am the ruler of this company!

You must get something amazing for beating
him, right?

Richard Magnus, CEO:
Yes, *if* you beat me.\! You may have
defeated all of my min-\. employees, but you
stand no chance against me!

I am the master of forces beyond your meager
comprehension!\!
Wizard!\! Magus!\! And-

He pulls a set of index cards out of his robe.

Right-Thinking Master of Paradigm Shifting!

Know that to go against me is to risk your
very existence!

He suddenly switches to a much more
ingratiating tone.

But we don't have to be enemies, .\!
Here, come walk with me for a moment.

Richard Magnus, CEO:
Here, here we have the core of the Better
Earth engine.\!
Isn't it beautiful?

The perfect fusion of technology and magic.

It could make your dreams come true.\!
*Any* of your dreams.\!
Wouldn't you like a chance to work with that?

I've been impressed by your success in getting
this far.

Really, that's the sort of can-do spirit we could
use more of at this company.\!
So I've got an offer for you.

He takes a step backwards and poses
dramatically.\!
Lightning crackles behind him.

JOIN ME!\!
And we shall rule this company together as
CEO and CEO'S MINION!

No, wait, that wasn't how I was supposed to
put it...

The index cards come out again.

JOIN ME!\!
And we shall rule this company together as
CEO and SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT!

And this isn't any ordinary job.\!
You've proven yourself worthy, coming this
far.

Join me, and I will also take you as my
apprentice.\!
You won't just get to help run this company.
You'll also get to learn magic.

To learn the skills to pull the stars from the
sky and to weave the very fabric of reality in
passages.content_zh:
理查德·馬格努斯，執行長：
你來了！

他笨拙地試圖推動一些人

我，\.呃，\.沒想到你這麼快。

現在，我們在哪裡？

來，跟我走一會兒吧。

在這裡，這裡我們有更好的核心
地球引擎。 \!
是不是很漂亮？

科技與魔法的完美融合。

*任何*你的夢想。 \!
您不想有機會參與其中嗎？

你的成功讓我印象深刻
到目前為止。

真的，這就是我們可以做到的那種進取精神
在這家公司使用更多。 \！
所以我給你提供了一份報價。

他後退一步擺出姿勢
戲劇性地。 \！
閃電在他身後劈啪作響。

加入我！ \!
我們將共同統治這家公司
首席執行官和首席執行官的小小兵！

不，等等，這不是我該做的
把它...

索引卡又出來了。

加入我！ \!
我們將共同統治這家公司
執行長兼高級副總裁！

這不是普通的工作。 \！
你已經證明了自己的價值，來吧
遠。

加入我吧，我也會把你當我的
學徒.\!
您不僅會幫助經營這家公司。
你還可以學習魔法。

學習從星星拉星星的技能
天空並編織現實的結構

 rejoined your party!

Now there is a woman truly blessed by the

I regret having to fight one who so clearly

abundant.

楓：

我很遺憾必須與一個如此清楚的人戰鬥

豐富。

passages.content:
:

master and claim his power?

:
I...\.\. I didn't think I'd ever feel any respect
for you...

:
Ugh, nevermind.\!
Excuses are for weaklings.

:
Maybe...\. maybe I can actually learn
something here.

：

：

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 5 — Flower seller — p1
passages.content:
It's always nice to just sit and enjoy the park.

Everything looks so much better. Volunteer
day really helped!

Why, that wouldn't happen to be one of
Daisy's milkshakes you've got there, would it?

Could I, uh, give it a taste?
No one makes milkshakes like Daisy does.

You hand over the milkshake.

He takes a long drink.

He takes another long drink. \.

You blink. It almost looks like his wrinkles
are starting to fade.

Community Volunteer:
Ah, that's the stuff.

Another drink.\. His skin is definitely smoothing
itself out, like time is running backwards. And
he seems to be leaning less on his cane.

You know, I used to help out with the farm,
before these old bones stopped being able to
handle it.

He takes a big stretch. There's a series of
loud popping noises, and when he relaxes
he's easily standing straight.
He props his cane up on one shoulder.

Daisy made these back then too. Best things
I ever tasted.

He's standing straight now, but he's still just
as short as when he was hunched over his
cane. In fact, you think you see him dropping
another inch or two as you watch.

His skin has finished smoothing out to a
healthy young texture, seeming to suck
his beard back into his face as it goes.

I've missed it, since I moved out to the front.
Don't want to just stop by and ask for one if
I'm not helping.

His face has rounded, any hard lines smoothed
away.  Meanwhile his clothing has started to
shift around his body, tightening up to reveal
slim but fit curves.

But my old bones just won't take the farm
work anymore.

His cane is changing too, growing longer. The
end shifts to a silvery color then expands,
splitting into four tines and leaving him holding
a pitchfork.

His clothes have also finished changing, leaving
him wearing a set of cow-patterned overalls.
With a slight *pop* a straw hat appears over
his head and drifts down to a perfect landing.

It's too bad, I used to love working with the
cows.

Always liked spending time around them.

His hair has
passages.content_zh:
坐下來欣賞公園總是很美好的。

一切看起來都好多了。志工
一天真的很有幫助！

為什麼，那不會是其中之一
你那裡有黛西奶昔，是嗎？

我可以，呃，嚐嚐嗎？
沒有人像黛西那樣製作奶昔。

你把奶昔遞過來。

他喝了一大口。

他又喝了一大口。 \.

你眨眼。幾乎看起來像他的皺紋
開始褪色。

社區志工：
啊，就是這個東西。

再來一杯。 \.他的皮膚絕對光滑
自己出去了，就像時間倒流一樣。並且
他似乎不再那麼倚著拐杖了。

你知道嗎 我以前在農場幫忙
在這些老骨頭失去能力之前
處理它。

他舒了一口氣。有一系列的
巨大的爆裂聲，當他放鬆時
他很容易站直。
他把拐杖撐在一側肩膀上。

黛西當時也做了這些事。最好的事情
我曾經嚐過。

他現在站直了，但他仍然只是
就像他彎腰駝背時一樣短
甘蔗。事實上，你認為你看到他摔倒了
當你觀看時，再增加一兩英寸。

他的皮膚已經變得光滑了
健康年輕的質感，看起來很吸
當它消失時，他的鬍子又回到了臉上。

自從我搬到前面後，我就錯過了。
不想只是停下來索取一個如果
我不幫忙。

他的臉變圓了，所有的硬紋都變得平滑了
離開。  同時，他的衣服也開始改變
在他的身體周圍移動，收緊以揭示
苗條但貼合曲線。

但我的老骨頭就是不肯佔領農場
不再工作了。

他的手杖也發生了變化，變得更長了。的
末端變成銀色然後膨脹，
分裂成四個尖齒並讓他握住
乾草叉。

他的衣服也換好了，離開了
他穿著一套牛紋工裝褲。
隨著輕微的「啪」的一聲，一頂草帽出現了
他的頭飄落，完美著陸。

太糟糕了，我以前很喜歡和
乳牛。

總是喜歡和他們在一起。

他的頭髮有

\>我從來沒有感覺離你這麼近！

他們笑到最後一點就崩潰了
同步性。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 5 — Ant picnicker — p1
passages.content:
This picnicker is scanning the ground with a
flyswatter held ready. He's eating with his
other hand.

Picnicker:
Ha!

He smashes the flyswatter down on his
blanket.

Picnicker:
I love having picnics out here, but I hate the
ants.

He swats another ant.

The whole blanket is covered in dead and
dying ants.\!
You feel kind of bad for them.

You dump a potion on the pile of dying ants.

Picnicker:
\^Hey, what are you-\.\.\.

All the ants on the blanket start moving.\!
Angrily.

They swarm the man.

Picnicker:
Aaaaaaaa!

Picnicker:
Get them ooooooooffffffffffffff!!

The ants twitch a little.\!
Poor ants.\!
Pants.
passages.content_zh:
這個野餐者正在用掃描器掃描地面
蒼蠅拍已準備就緒。他和他一起吃飯
另一隻手。

野餐者：
哈！

他把蒼蠅拍砸在他的身上
毯子。

野餐者：
我喜歡在這裡野餐，但我討厭
螞蟻。

他又拍打了另一隻螞蟻。

整條毯子都被死氣沉沉的覆蓋著
垂死的螞蟻。 \!
你為他們感到有點難過。

你把藥水倒在一堆垂死的螞蟻上。

野餐者：
\^嘿，你在做什麼-\.\.\.

毯子上的所有螞蟻都開始移動。 \！
憤怒地。

他們蜂擁而至。

野餐者：
啊啊啊啊！

野餐者：
得到他們 oooooooffffffffffffff!!

螞蟻們有點抽搐。 \!
可憐的螞蟻。 \!
褲子。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 5 — Ant picnicker — p3
passages.content:
A very changed picnicker is sitting here,
glumly eating a sandwich.\!
An identical sandwich on the ground next to
her is being swarmed by ants.

Picnicker:
After some very pointed arguments, the ants
and I have come to an agreement.

She sighs and takes another bite of her
sandwich.

I guess they do say, if you can't beat them,
join them.
passages.content_zh:
一個變化很大的野餐者坐在這裡，
悶悶不樂地吃著三明治。 \！
旁邊地上有一個一模一樣的三明治
她正被螞蟻包圍。

野餐者：
經過一些非常尖銳的爭論後，螞蟻們
我已經達成協議了。

她嘆了口氣，又咬了一口
三明治。

我猜他們確實說過，如果你不能打敗他們，
加入他們。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 5 — Lunch
passages.content:
This is an amazingly tasty-looking picnic lunch.\!
Try a bite?

As delicious as the food was, you're full now.

Wow, this is delicious!\!
It fills you with strength and energy!

Max HP +100!

Picnicker:
Hey, hands off my lunch!

What are you, an ant?

You leave the food alone.\!
That flyswatter looks like it would hurt.
passages.content_zh:
這是一頓看起來非常美味的野餐午餐。 \！
咬一口試試？

儘管食物很美味，但你現在已經吃飽了。

哇，這個真好吃！ \!
它讓你充滿力量和能量！

最大生命值+100！

野餐者：
嘿，別管我的午餐了！

你是什​​麼，一隻螞蟻？

你別管食物了。 \!
那蒼蠅拍看起來會很痛。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 5
passages.content: A mostly finished picnic lunch.
passages.content_zh: 野餐午餐基本完成。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 5 — Escaped cat — p1
passages.content:
The cat is chewing happily on the potted
plants.
passages.content_zh:
貓咪正在開心地咀嚼盆栽
植物。

passages.name: Park Entrance Real 5 — Escaped cat — p2
passages.content:
The cat is chewing happily on the potted
plants.

You give Felix a call.

Shelter Head Felix:
Come on,  your Most Royal Highness.\!
Let's get you back to your rightful domain.\!
Yes, there's a good girl...

He scoops the cat up and puts her in a carrier,
then turns to you.

Thank you!\!
That's \v[143] out of 3 cats rescued!
passages.content_zh:
貓咪正在開心地咀嚼盆栽
植物。

你打電話給菲利克斯。

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
來吧，太子殿下。 \!
讓我們帶您回到您的合法網域。 \!
是的，有一個好女孩…

他把貓抱起來，放進籠子裡，
然後轉向你。

謝謝你！ \！
獲救的 3 隻貓中有 \v[143] 隻！

passages.name: Floor 2 real
passages.content:
Frustrated Employee:
We finally managed to move all the displays
back into place, but the clothes just won't
stay off the floor!
passages.content_zh:
沮喪的員工：
我們終於成功地移動了所有的顯示器
放回原位，但衣服卻放不回原位
遠離地板！

passages.name: Bank real
passages.content:
The table has a stack of informative
pamphlets.

Determining Your Financial Health:
How To Shove A Financial Thermometer Up
Your Financial Rectum!
passages.content_zh:
桌子上有一堆訊息
小冊子。

確定您的財務健康狀況：
如何提高金融溫度計
你的直腸！

passages.name: Bank real
passages.content:
The table has a stack of informative
pamphlets.

Organs: Lazy Slackers, Or Squishy
Goldmines?
passages.content_zh:
桌子上有一堆訊息
小冊子。

器官：懶惰的懶鬼，還是軟軟的
金礦？

passages.name: Bank real
passages.content:
The table has a stack of informative
pamphlets.

Nontraditional Debt Financing:
Making Your Firstborn Work For You!
passages.content_zh:
桌子上有一堆訊息
小冊子。

非傳統債務融資：
讓你的長子為你工作！

passages.name: Bank real — Maniacal teller
passages.content:
Teller:
Yes, give me your money, your precious
precious money!

She cackles maniacally and caresses her
cash register.
passages.content_zh:
出納員：
是的，給我你的錢，你的寶貝
寶貴的錢！

她瘋狂地咯咯笑並愛撫她
收銀機。

passages.name: Bank real — Regular teller
passages.content:
Teller:
What?\!
No, she's always like that.

She took this job in hopes of swimming in a
pile of money.
passages.content_zh:
出納員：
什麼？ \！
不，她總是這樣。

她接受這份工作是希望能夠在水中游泳
一堆錢。

passages.name: Bank real — Escaped dog — p1
passages.content:
The dog has dragged a pamphlet out of the
pile and is eagerly sniffing it.

Investing Is For Losers!\!
Give All Your Money To Dogs!

She looks up eagerly at you.
passages.content_zh:
狗狗從屋內拖出一本小冊子
一堆並急切地嗅著它。

投資是為失敗者準備的！ \!
把你所有的錢都給狗！

她抬頭熱切地看著你。

passages.name: Bank real — Escaped dog — p2
passages.content:
The dog has dragged a pamphlet out of the
pile and is eagerly sniffing it.

Investing Is For Losers!\!
Give All Your Money To Dogs!

She looks up eagerly at you.

You give Doug a call.

Shelter Head Doug:
Now Marcy, we've discussed this.\!
Dogs have historically been very bad at
predicting market shifts!

Here, come back to the shelter and I'll give
you some treat dividends.

\v[144] out of 3 dogs rescued!
passages.content_zh:
狗狗從屋內拖出一本小冊子
一堆並急切地嗅著它。

投資是為失敗者準備的！ \!
把你所有的錢都給狗！

她抬頭熱切地看著你。

你打電話給道格。

庇護所負責人道格：
現在，瑪西，我們已經討論過這件事了。 \！
狗在歷史上一直非常不擅長
預測市場變化！

來吧，回到避難所，我會給
你有些對待股息。

\v[144] 三隻狗獲救！

passages.name: Garden 1 real — Rose and Lily — p1
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]I didn't realize how *much* work this
is going to take.
\C[5]How did it get this bad?!

\C[30]We're going to need some help. Lots of
help.

Lily notices you.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[5]Hey look, help!\!
\C[30]Please tell us you're here to help.

Both:
\C[30]Thank \C[5]you.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]I'm not even sure where to start.
\C[5]Well, there's certainly a lot of weeds to
pull!

\C[30]If you could bring us ten weeds for the
compost pile...
\C[5]Just wander into the tall grass until you
run into some weeds!
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]我沒有意識到這有多*有效*
將會採取。
\C[5]怎麼會變得這麼糟？ ！

\C[30]我們需要一些幫助。很多
幫助。

莉莉注意到你了。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[5]嘿看，救命！ \!
\C[30]請告訴我們您是來幫忙的。

兩者：
\C[30]謝謝\C[5]你。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]我甚至不知道從哪裡開始。
\C[5]嗯，肯定有很多雜草
拉！

\C[30]如果你能為我們帶來十株雜草
堆肥堆...
\C[5]就漫步到高高的草叢中，直到你
遇到一些雜草！

passages.name: Garden 1 real — Rose and Lily — p2
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Thanks again for helping.
\C[5]Just let us know when you've got ten
weeds!

Turn in ten weeds?

Both:
\C[30]Thank \C[5]you!

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]It's a start.
\C[5]It's a start!

\C[30]Please, take this with our thanks.
\C[5]There are still a few flowers left!

Gained pretty flower!

You decide to hold on to them for now.\!
Way to hoard all the weed, man!
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]再次感謝您的幫忙。
\C[5]當你有十個時請告訴我們
雜草！

交十棵雜草？

兩者：
\C[30]謝謝\C[5]你！

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]這是一個開始。
\C[5]這是一個開始！

\C[30]請收下我們的謝意。
\C[5]還剩下幾朵花！

收穫了美麗的花朵！

你決定暫時保留它們。 \！
囤積所有雜草的方法，夥計！

passages.name: Garden 1 real — Rose and Lily — p3
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[5]Thanks again for helping!
\C[30]Please come back tomorrow if you want
to continue.
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[5]再次感謝您的幫忙！
\C[30]如果你願意的話請明天回來
繼續。

passages.name: Church real — Priest cosplay — p1
passages.content:
This man is preaching from the pulpit in a
deep, resonant voice.

Preacher:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,\.\. consectetur
adipiscing elit,\.\. sed do eiusmod tempor
incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Preacher:
Cast in the name of God, ye not guilty...

Preacher:
Unknown to Death, nor known to Life.\!
Yet, these hands will never hold anything.\!
So I pray...

Preacher:
Estne volumen in toga,\.\.
an solum tibi libet me videre

Preacher:
A still more glorious dawn awaits...

Preacher:
Vita! \!
Mortis! \!
Careo!
passages.content_zh:
這個人正在講台上講道
低沉、洪亮的聲音。

傳道者：
Lorem ipsum dolor sat amet，\.\.康克泰圖爾
adipiscing elit，\.\. sed 執行 eiusmod tempor
incididunt ut laboure et dolore Magna aliqua。

傳道者：
以上帝之名，你們無罪…

傳道者：
死亡未知，生命未知。 \！
然而，這雙手永遠無法握住任何東西。 \！
所以我祈禱...

傳道者：
長袍中的 Estne 卷，\.\.
an solum tibi libet me videre

傳道者：
更加輝煌的黎明正在等待著…

傳道者：
維塔！ \！
死了！ \！
卡雷奧！

passages.name: Church real — Priest cosplay — p2
passages.content:
This man is preaching from the pulpit in a
deep, resonant voice.

Preacher:
Repent! Repent, lest ye fail to repent!\|
No, that doesn't quite work.

He switches to a more maniacal tone.

Preacher:
Rejoice! For soon our dark god will rise from
the depths and mildly irritate the living!

Preacher:
No, that's no good either.

His voice becomes calm and soothing.

Preacher:
For the world is a blessed place, full of\. uh\.\.
puppies, and\. uh\.\. puppies who have
stubbed their toesies?

Preacher:
This just isn't working!
passages.content_zh:
這個人正在講台上講道
低沉、洪亮的聲音。

傳道者：
悔改吧！悔改吧，免得你們不悔改！ \|
不，這不太管用。

他的語氣變得更加瘋狂。

傳道者：
慶幸吧！很快我們的黑暗之神就會從
深處並輕微刺激生者！

傳道者：
不，那也不好。

他的聲音變得平靜而舒緩。

傳道者：
因為世界是一個幸福的地方，充滿了\。呃\.\.
小狗，和\.呃\.\.小狗誰有
踢傷了他們的腳趾？

傳道者：
這根本不行！

passages.name: Church real — Priest cosplay — p3
passages.content:
Preacher:
I'm trying to come up with some new
sermons.\!
I just can't decide what direction to take them!
passages.content_zh:
傳道者：
我正在嘗試想出一些新的
佈道。 \！
我就是無法決定帶他們去哪個方向！

passages.name: Church real — Priest cosplay — p5
passages.content:
Preacher:
Hah, yes, want to hear my new material?

I figure, all the generic sermons I was giving
have gotten old. I should take it in a new
direction, do some worldbuilding, build up a
consistent mythos.

Now, you know, there always seems to be
generically good gods, so why not mix it up
a bit?

Seems like it would be fun to preach like I was
following a dark goddess instead.\!
Not like murderous or anything, but a little
dark, a little edgy.

He pulls a pair of fake horns out of his bag
and puts them on, then strikes a pose.

Yes, a goddess cruelly maligned by those who
know not the important work she does!\!
I am here to spread the name of-

Hmmm, what *is* a good name?\!
Darkness, darkness\..\..\..\..\..
Eh, let's just go with something easy.
Noctis?

He nods to himself, as his horns grow out a
little, curling around his face.\!
You notice that the strap between them seems
to have disappeared.

Of course, I'm a true cleric of Noctis.\!
And how better to show that than with some
religious clothing?

He pulls out a nun's headdress and puts it on,
not noticing the long black locks that
immediately spill out from underneath.

Note to self: keep looking for something more
appropriate.

He pulls out a holy symbol and clasps it
between her new breasts.\!
She continues in a deep sultry voice.

And I am so excited to spread the goddess's
word to a new group of believers!

She looks up at you with joy as a tail snakes
its way out of the back of her new habit.

Won't you stay and listen to the good word?
passages.content_zh:
傳道者：
哈，是的，想聽我的新材料嗎？

我想，我所做的所有通用佈道
已經變老了。我應該把它換成新的
方向，做一些世界建設，建立一個
一致的神話。

現在，你知道，似乎總是有
一般都是好神，所以為什麼不把它們混合起來
一點？

看來像我一樣講道會很有趣
而是跟隨黑暗女神。 \！
不像殺人甚麼的，但有一點
黑暗，有點前衛。

他從包包裡拿出一對假牛角
然後穿上它們，然後擺出一個姿勢。

是的，一位被那些人殘酷誹謗的女神
不知道她所做的重要工作！ \！
我來這裡是為了傳播-

嗯，什麼是好名字？ \！
黑暗，黑暗\..\..\..\..\..
呃，讓我們做一些簡單的事情。
諾克提斯？

當他的角長出時，他對自己點點頭
小小的，捲曲在他的臉上。 \！
你注意到它們之間的帶子似乎
消失了。

當然，我是諾克提斯真正的牧師。 \！
與某些人相比，如何更好地展示這一點
宗教服裝？

他拿出一個修女的頭飾戴上，
沒有註意到那長長的黑髮
立即從下面溢出。

自我提醒：不斷尋找更多東西
適當的。

他拿出一個聖徽並握緊
在她的新乳房之間。 \！
她用低沉性感的聲音繼續說。

我很高興能夠傳播女神的
向一群新信徒說的話！

她像一條尾巴蛇一樣高興地抬頭看著你
這是她擺脫新習慣的方法。

你不留下來聽聽好話嗎？

passages.name: Church real — Priest cosplay — p6
passages.content:
Preacher:
Hah, yes, want to hear my new material?

I figure, all the generic sermons I was giving
have gotten old. I should take it in a new
direction, do some worldbuilding, build up a
consistent mythos.

He pulls a blue bishop's hat out of his bag and
puts it on, not noticing his hair start to
lengthen.

I figure to start off, let's say that I'm following,
oh, your generic fantasy goddess of light.

He thinks for a minute, as his growing hair
slowly shades towards pink.

What's a good generic name?\!
Light, light\..\..\..\..
Let's go with Lumina.

And I-

He picks up a flimsy looking plastic staff from
where it was leaning against the altar.

-Am her bishop!

He waves it around, not noticing as it starts to
shift to real wood and metal.\!
The hand holding it begins to slim down as
well.

I still need to put together more of the
costume-

His voice is rising in pitch as he speaks, as
his face begins to soften.

-But I've got a good start!

He pulls a blue shawl out of his bag and throws
it around his shoulders.

It settles inward much more than it seems it
should, molding itself around a slimmer body
and breasts that weren't there a moment ago.

She doesn't seem to notice as a short skirt
drops out of the bottom, swinging around
significantly slimmer legs.

Yes, I think this will do well!
passages.content_zh:
傳道者：
哈，是的，想聽我的新材料嗎？

我想，我所做的所有通用佈道
已經變老了。我應該把它換成新的
方向，做一些世界建設，建立一個
一致的神話。

他從包包裡拿出一頂藍色主教帽，
戴上它，沒有註意到他的頭髮開始
延長。

我想開始，假設我正在跟隨，
哦，你普通的幻想光明女神。

他想了一會兒，隨著他的頭髮不斷長出
慢慢變成粉紅色。

什麼是好的通用名稱？ \!
輕，輕\..\..\..\..
讓我們和盧米娜一起去吧。

而我——

他從手中拿起一根看上去脆弱的塑膠杖。
它靠在祭壇上。

-是她的主教！

他揮舞著它，沒有註意到它開始移動
轉向實木和金屬。 \！
握著它的手開始變得纖細
好吧。

我還需要整理更多
服裝-

他說話時聲音越來越高
他的臉色開始變得柔和。

-但我已經有一個好的開始了！

他從包包裡拿出一條藍色的披肩丟到
它繞在他的肩膀上。

它比看起來更內在地安定下來
應該圍繞著更苗條的身體塑造自己
和剛才還不存在的乳房。

她似乎沒有註意到她是短裙
從底部掉落，左右搖擺
腿部明顯纖細。

是的，我認為這會做得很好！

passages.name: Church real — Priest cosplay — p7
passages.content:
Preacher:
Remember, Noctis loves you, like she loves
everyone!\!
So make sure to treat each other with respect!

Otherwise she'll rise from her long slumber to
devour your soul!
passages.content_zh:
傳道者：
請記住，Noctis 愛你，就像她愛你一樣
大家！ \！
所以一定要互相尊重！

否則她就會從漫長的沉睡中醒來
吞噬你的灵魂！

passages.name: Church real — Priest cosplay — p8
passages.content:
Preacher:
Dearest Lumina, grant us your light!

Preacher:
No, that one's a bit too generic...
passages.content_zh:
傳道者：
最親愛的盧米娜，請賜給我們祢的光！

傳道者：
不，這個有點太籠統了…

passages.name: Church real
passages.content:
Listener:
I know this isn't a real church.\!
And he's not a priest, he's just really into
cosplay.

But it's so relaxing to just sit here and listen
to him talk.
passages.content_zh:
聽眾：
我知道這不是真正的教堂。 \！
他不是牧師，他只是真的很喜歡
角色扮演。

但坐在這裡聆聽真是太放鬆了
跟他說話。

passages.name: Church real — Sleeper — p1
passages.content:
She's taking a nap on one of the benches.

Sleepy Person:
Augh!

I'm sorry God! I'm sorry!\!
I won't sleep in church again!

She looks down at herself.

Sleepy Devil:
Oh no! Were my clothes sleeping too?\!
Why did they have to die?

She takes another look.\!
She hefts her expanded breasts.
Her tiny wings flutter thoughtfully.

Sleepy Devil:
Though I guess it isn't all bad.\!
I'm getting very mixed messages here God!
passages.content_zh:
她正在其中一張長椅上小憩。

困倦的人：
啊啊！

我對不起上帝！對不起！ \！
我不會再睡在教堂裡了！

她低頭看著自己。

瞌睡惡魔：
哦不！我的衣服也睡了嗎？ \!
為什麼他們必須死？

她又看了一眼。 \！
她挺起她豐滿的乳房。
她的小翅膀若有所思地拍著。

瞌睡惡魔：
雖然我想這也不全然是壞事。 \!
我在這裡收到的訊息非常複雜，上帝！

passages.name: Church real — Sleeper — p2
passages.content:
She's taking a nap on one of the benches.

Sleepy Person:
Augh!

I'm sorry God! I'm sorry!\!
I won't sleep in church again!

She looks down at herself.

Sleepy Angel:
Though, uh\..\..\..\..
Now I've got nice tits and wings?

Am I *supposed* to be sleeping in church?
passages.content_zh:
她正在其中一張長椅上小憩。

困倦的人：
啊啊！

我對不起上帝！對不起！ \！
我不會再睡在教堂裡了！

她低頭看著自己。

瞌睡天使：
不過，呃\..\..\..\..
現在我有了漂亮的乳房和翅膀了嗎？

我「應該」睡在教堂裡嗎？

passages.name: Church real — Sleeper — p3
passages.content:
Sleepy Devil:
I got zapped and my clothes destroyed but
also some sweet boobs.

Was I sleeping too much?\!
Too little?\!
Does God want me to be naked?

If I go to sleep again can I get even bigger
boobs?

Sunday school never prepared me for this
kind of theological question!
passages.content_zh:
瞌睡惡魔：
我被擊中了，我的衣服也被毀了，但是
還有一些甜美的胸部。

是不是我睡太多了？ \!
太少了？ \!
神要我赤身裸體嗎？

如果我再去睡覺我可以變得更大嗎
胸部？

主日學從來沒有讓我為此做好準備
一種神學問題！

passages.name: Church real — Sleeper — p4
passages.content:
Sleepy Angel:
So I've been given a divine mission to tell
people to sleep in church?
I guess?

So, uh, yeah. Sleep through boring sermons.
God commands it.
passages.content_zh:
瞌睡天使：
所以我被賦予了神聖的使命去講述
人們睡在教堂裡嗎？
我猜？

所以，呃，是的。聽完無聊的講道就睡著了。
神命令它。

passages.name: Church ARG — Priest cosplay — p2
passages.content:
This man is preaching from the pulpit in a
deep, resonant voice.

Preacher:
Repent! Repent, lest ye fail to repent!

Devil:
Ugh, who cares about all that morality stuff?\!
Spice it up a bit!\!
Go dark, go edgy!

The preacher clears his throat and switches
to a maniacal tone.

Preacher:
Rejoice! For soon our dark god will rise from
the depths and mildly irritate the living!

Angel:
Human, I bring you enlightenment.\!
Preach not of fear and rage, preach of the
joys of this world!

The preacher switches to a calm and soothing
tone.

Preacher:
For the world is a blessed place, full of\. uh\.\.
puppies, and\. uh\.\. puppies who have
stubbed their toesies?

The devil raises an eyebrow at the angel.

Devil:
Puppies?\!
Seriously?

Why not just feed them some honey, it can't
get any more disgustingly sugary.

Angel:
You should not cast the first stone when your
house is made entirely of glass.

You should also cover thy nudity more often.\!
Please, it is the wish of all of your neighbors.\!
Your house is made of glass.

The devil rolls her eyes.

Devil:
Of *course* you're arguing for pants again.

She leans forward, presenting her substantial
bust to the angel.

Devil:
Is my body tempting you to sin, hmm?\!
Getting a little hot under the collar there,
Miss Goody-Two-Boobs?

The two of them continue to bicker.\!
The preacher, oblivious, sighs and puts his
head in his hands.

Preacher:
This just isn't working!
passages.content_zh:
這個人正在講台上講道
低沉、洪亮的聲音。

傳道者：
悔改吧！你們要悔改，免得你們不悔改！

惡魔：
呃，誰關心那些道德問題？ \！
稍微調味一下！ \!
變得黑暗，變得急躁！

傳教士清了清嗓子，然後換了台
以瘋狂的語氣。

傳道者：
慶幸吧！很快我們的黑暗之神就會從
深處並輕微刺激生者！

天使：
人類，我帶給你啟示。 \！
不要宣講恐懼和憤怒，宣揚
這世界的歡樂！

傳道者語氣平靜舒緩
語氣。

傳道者：
因為世界是一個幸福的地方，充滿了\。呃\.\.
小狗，和\.呃\.\.小狗誰有
踢傷了他們的腳趾？

魔鬼對天使揚起了一邊眉毛。

惡魔：
小狗？ \!
嚴重地？

為什麼不直接給他們吃點蜂蜜呢，那不行
變得更加令人噁心的含糖量。

天使：
當你
房子完全由玻璃製成。

你也應該經常遮蓋你的裸體。 \！
拜託，這是所有鄰居的心願。 \！
你的房子是玻璃做的。

惡魔翻白眼。

惡魔：
當然，你又在爭論褲子了。

她身體前傾，展現她的豐碩身材
半身像天使。

惡魔：
我的身體在誘惑你犯罪嗎？嗯？ \！
領子下面有點熱，
古迪小姐——兩個胸部？

兩人繼續鬥嘴。 \!
傳教士渾然不覺，嘆了口氣，把他的
頭在他手中。

傳道者：
這根本不行！

passages.name: Church ARG — Devil — p2
passages.content:
Devil:
-And I say good is *boring*! He needs to spice
things up!

Angel:
Truly, a frog in a well has no idea of the sea.\!
You may not be able to understand the appeal
of good, but it is simple for any human.

You are not dealing with this now. The two of
them continue arguing as you pretend you
didn't see anything.

Angel:
He can see us?

Angel:
She can see us?

The devil cracks her knuckles eagerly.

Devil:
Interferring in divine business? Oh, this is
going to be such a smiting.

Angel:
Wait, forestall thy wrath!

Can you not see, this is a blessing from the
heavens themselves!\!
Just when our innate natures have put us
forever at odds, a mortal has been sent to us!

As one blessed with the divine gift of free will,
they may freely choose where we cannot.

Devil:
Oh no, not this again!\!
I keep telling you, we have free will!\!
Everyone has free will!

No matter how often you say it, it is not your
"innate nature" to keep stealing my food from
the breakroom fridge!

The angel sniffs.

Angel:
I cannot help that I am called upon to rob
Darkness of the fruits of its actions wherever
I may find them.

Devil:
Ugh, fine, we'll use the stupid mortal just so
I can get away from you.

They both turn towards you.

Angel:
Human, please, grant us your insight.\!
Is it not better for this man to speak of the
love each human may have for another?

To speak of joy, and kindness, and
compassion?

The devil rolls her eyes.

Devil:
Or do you find that as boring as everyone
else is going to?

Come on, this guy should be trying to make
this place *cool*.\!
Blood!\.\. Death!\.\. Drugs!

She smiles and leans forward so you have a
better view of her cleavage.

Devil:
The love one human can have *with* another.\!
Or many others.\!
Many hot, eager others.

Angel:
Objection!\!
I must object!

You have deployed your wiles upon the
mortal!\!
The agreement is firm! Wiles are forbidden!

The devil slowly sucks on her finger, never
breaking eye contact with you.

Devil:
Hey, breaking promi
passages.content_zh:
惡魔：
-我說好的就是*無聊*！他需要調味
事情發生了！

天使：
真是井底之蛙不知大海啊！
您可能無法理解上訴
很好，但這對任何人來說都很簡單。

你現在不處理這個。兩個
當你假裝你時他們繼續爭論
沒有看到任何東西。

天使：
他能看見我們嗎？

天使：
她能看見我們嗎？

惡魔急切地敲響了指關節。

惡魔：
干涉神事？哦，這是
將會是這樣的打擊。

天使：
等等，阻止你的憤怒！

難道你看不到嗎，這是來自上天的祝福
天堂本身！ \！
正當我們的本性讓我們
永遠的矛盾，一個凡人被派到我們這裡來了！

作為一個被賦予自由意志的神聖禮物的人，
他們可以自由選擇我們不能選擇的地方。

惡魔：
喔不，別再這樣了！ \！
我一直告訴你，我們有自由意志！ \！
每個人都有自由意志！

無論你說多少次，這都不是你的
「與生俱來的本性」不斷地偷我的食物
休息室的冰箱！

天使嗅了嗅。

天使：
我情不自禁地被要求去搶劫
無論何處，其行動的果實都是黑暗的
我可能會找到他們。

惡魔：
呃，好吧，我們就用這個愚蠢的凡人吧
我可以遠離你。

他們都轉向你。

天使：
人類，請賜予我們您的洞察力。 \！
這個人說出來不是更好嗎？
每個人可能對另一個人有愛嗎？

談論歡樂、仁慈和
同情心？

惡魔翻白眼。

惡魔：
還是你跟大家一樣覺得無聊
不然會去嗎？

來吧，這傢伙應該試著讓
這個地方*酷*。 \！
血！ \。 \。死亡！ \。 \。毒品！

她微笑著並向前傾，這樣你就有了
更好地看到她的乳溝。

惡魔：
一個人可以與另一個人擁有的愛。 \！
或許多其他人。 \！
許多熱心、熱切的人。

天使：
反對！ \!
我必須反對！

你已將你的詭計施展於
凡人！ \！
協議很堅定！威爾斯被禁止！

惡魔慢慢地吸吮著她的手指，從來沒有
中斷與你的目光接觸。

惡魔：
嘿，打破承諾

passages.name: Church ARG — Devil — p3
passages.content:
Devil:
Haha, yes!

Let me tell you, you are *not* going to regret
this.

This is gonna be a hell of a good time!
passages.content_zh:
惡魔：
哈哈，是的！

讓我告訴你，你*不會*會後悔
這個。

這將會是一段非常美好的時光！

passages.name: Church ARG — Devil — p4
passages.content:
Devil:
Seriously?\!
You chose her over *this*?

She motions to herself.

Devil:
It's cause of her whole tits-out look, isn't it.\!
Maybe I should lose the top as well...
passages.content_zh:
惡魔：
認真的嗎？ \!
你選擇了她而不是*這個*？

她向自己示意。

惡魔：
這就是她整個乳頭外露的原因，不是嗎？ \！
也許我也應該失去頂部......

passages.name: Church ARG — Angel — p3
passages.content:
Angel:
It is always a sorrow to see another fall to
the shallow temptations of Darkness.

There is little I may do here. But I shall take
this as a push to keep striving to fight the Dark
wherever I may.

Devil:
Keep your hands off my food!
passages.content_zh:
天使：
看到另一個人跌倒總是令人悲傷
黑暗的淺薄誘惑。

我在這裡無能為力。但我會採取
這是繼續努力對抗黑暗的動力
無論我在哪裡。

惡魔：
別把手放在我的食物上！

passages.name: Church ARG — Angel — p4
passages.content:
Angel:
It is such a glorious thing to see another find
the Light.
passages.content_zh:
天使：
看到另一個發現真是一件光榮的事情
聖光。

passages.name: Bank ARG — p1
passages.content:
Greed Spirit:
Yes, give me your money, your precious
previous money!

The spirit cackles maniacally.
passages.content_zh:
貪婪精神：
是的，給我你的錢，你的寶貝
以前的錢！

靈魂瘋狂地咯咯笑。

passages.name: Bank ARG — Autoplay event — p1
passages.content:
Shortly before...

Teller 1:
Ugh, this is so *boring*.\!
When do I get to swim in a pile of money?!

Teller 2:
I've been telling you since you joined, that's
not something employees like us get to do.

Maybe the manager could, but they're never
going to let us into the vault.

Teller 1:
(This isn't what I wished for.)

Fairy:
Yay?

Teller 1:
(If I was in charge, I would be rolling in
money.)\!
(I would have a hoard!)

Fairy:
Yay!

Fairy:
Yaaaaay!!!

Manager:
Good news everyone!

He waves a printout.

Manager:
Corporate says we're all getting raises!\!
New job titles too.

Teller 2:
Oh wow!

Manager:
Yes,\. let's see,\. you are now...

He scans through the printout.

Manager:
\C[5]A day-shift knight...

Manager:
\C[31]And you are...\!
An assistant dragon...

Manager:
\C[27]And I am now Vice Princess.

Manager:
\C[27]Odd, but if it comes with a raise...

Teller 2:
Hahahahaha!\!
Yes! \c[10]\{YES!
passages.content_zh:
不久前...

出納員 1：
呃，這太*無聊*了。 \!
我什麼時候才能在一堆錢裡游泳？

櫃員2：
自從你加入我就一直告訴你，那就是
這不是像我們這樣的員工可以做的事情。

也許經理可以，但他們永遠不會
讓我們進入金庫。

出納員 1：
（這不是我所希望的。）

仙女：
是啊？

出納員 1：
（如果我負責的話，我會滾過來
錢。 ）\！
（我會有一個囤積的！）

仙女：
耶！

仙女：
啊啊啊！ ！ ！

經理：
大家好消息！

他揮舞著一份印刷品。

經理：
公司說我們都加薪了！ \！
還有新的職稱。

櫃員2：
哦哇！

經理：
是的，\.讓我們來看看，\。你現在...

他瀏覽了列印輸出。

經理：
\C[5]白班騎士...

經理：
\C[31]而你是...\！
輔助龍...

經理：
\C[27]而我現在是副公主。

經理：
\C[27]很奇怪，但如果加薪的話...

櫃員2：
哈哈哈哈！ \!
是的！ \c[10]\{是的！

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 5 — Escaped cat — p1
passages.content: The cat is chewing on the priestess's shoe.
passages.content_zh: 貓正在咀嚼女祭司的鞋子。

passages.name: Park Entrance ARG 5 — Escaped cat — p2
passages.content:
The cat is chewing on the priestess's shoe.

Junior Priestess:
Yes kitty, this shoe is also bounty granted by
the great lady of blossoming herself!

Truly, Florauna is the most beautiful and
generous of all goddesses!

The cat gives a thoughtful meow.

You give Felix a call.

Shelter Head Felix:
Come on,  your Most Royal Highness.\!
Let's get you back to your rightful domain.\!
Yes, there's a good girl...

He scoops the cat up and puts her in a carrier,
then turns to you.

Thank you!\!
That's \v[143] out of 3 cats rescued!
passages.content_zh:
貓正在咀嚼女祭司的鞋子。

初級女祭司：
是的，小貓，這雙鞋也是由
綻放自己的偉大女士！

確實，Florauna 是最美的
所有女神都慷慨！

貓若有所思地喵了一聲。

你打電話給菲利克斯。

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
來吧，太子殿下。 \!
讓我們帶您回到您的合法網域。 \!
是的，有一個好女孩…

他把貓抱起來，放進籠子裡，
然後轉向你。

謝謝你！ \！
獲救的 3 隻貓中有 \v[143] 隻！

passages.name: Garden 1 ARG — Rose and Lily — p2
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Thanks again for helping.
\C[5]Just let us know when you're done!

Turn in ten weeds?

Both:
\C[30]Thank \C[5]you!

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]It's a start.
\C[5]It's a start!

\C[30]Please, take this with our thanks.
\C[5]There are still a few flowers left!

Gained pretty flower!

You decide to hold on to them for now.\!
Way to hoard all the weed, man!
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]再次感謝您的幫忙。
\C[5]完成後請告訴我們！

交十棵雜草？

兩者：
\C[30]謝謝\C[5]你！

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]這是一個開始。
\C[5]這是一個開始！

\C[30]請收下我們的謝意。
\C[5]還剩下幾朵花！

收穫了美麗的花朵！

你決定暫時保留它們。 \！
囤積所有雜草的方法，夥計！

passages.name: Garden 1 ARG — Candy — p1
passages.content:
Something flies out of the barrel into your
inventory.

Received one rare candy!
passages.content_zh:
有東西從桶子裡飛到你的身上
庫存。

收到一顆稀有糖果！

passages.name: Garden 2 real — Rose and Lily
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[5]Okay, now what?!
\C[30]Hmm, let me think.
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[5]好吧，現在怎麼辦？ ！
\C[30]嗯，讓我想想。

passages.name: Garden final real?
passages.content: Formal Garden
passages.content_zh: 規則式花園

passages.name: Floor 2 ARG — New pride spirit — p1
passages.content:
The spirit is giggling quietly to herself.

Spirit:
Mwahahaha.\.\.\.
What should my next scheme be?

Kaede:
Halt varlet!

The spirit gasps.

Spirit:
My first nemesis!\!
I must be doing this right!

:
This isn't a nemesis, you blithering idiot!\!
You are a mild inconvenience and barely worth
a moment of our time!

The spirit looks discouraged.

Spirit:
Are you sure? I'm-

Spirit:
Wait.

Spirit:
Are you...?

Spirit:
Oh Hadea, you ARE!

The spirit lets out an *incredibly* high pitched
squeal.  You think you hear glass shatter
somewhere in the background.

Spirit:
It's YOU!!!!\!
I want you to know, I am *such* a fan.

I have read your book *so* many times.\!
"Why Are You Idiots Following Me Around And
Writing Down Everything I Say" has been how
I built my LIFE!

:
What.

Spirit:
Come on, get it together, get it together.\!
Don't make this weird.

I'm just meeting my IDOL, why would that be
weird?!

:
Where are you going-

Spirit:
No, no, I can *do* this.\!
I've just got to impress her.\!

Impress the greatest spirit *in the
Underworld*, Hadea help me.

:
You could impress me by GETTING BACK
HERE!

The spirit doesn't even seem to hear her.

Spirit:
How?! How do I even do this?!\!
.\.\..\.\..\.\.What would she do?

Spirit:
She would have a plot!\!
A scheme!\!
*She* wouldn't let this stop her!

The spirit whirls around.

Spirit:
Aha!\!
You petty fools could never hope to stop me!\!
This is all exactly as planned!

Now, tremble as I put the next step of my
*extremely* cunning plan into action!

She vanishes through the ceiling.

:
\^I-\.\.\.

Spirit:
Let me stress, this is an amazingly, absurdly,
IMPRESSIVELY cunning plan!

You fools have no idea!

She vanishes through the ceiling again.

:
What just \{HAPPENED?!

Kaede is practically falling over with laughter.

Kaede:
It seems thou hast a fan!\!
Perhaps an even more doughty schemer than
thyself!

:
You wrote a book?

:
What? No!\!
I have no idea what any of this is about!!!

She s
passages.content_zh:
靈魂正在悄悄地自言自語。

精神：
哇哈哈哈哈.\.\.\.
我的下一個計劃應該是什麼？

楓：
停下來！

精神喘息。

精神：
我的第一個剋星！ \!
我一定做對了！

:
這不是剋星，你這個胡言亂語的白痴！ \！
你是一個輕微的不便，幾乎不值得
我們的時刻！

精神看起來很沮喪。

精神：
你確定嗎？我是——

精神：
等等。

精神：
你是……嗎？

精神：
喔哈迪亞，你就是！

靈魂發出*令人難以置信的*高音調
尖叫。  你認為你聽到玻璃破碎的聲音
在背景的某個地方。

精神：
是你！ ！ ！ ！ \！
我想讓你知道，我是*這樣的*粉絲。

我已經讀過你的書*很多次了。 \！
「你們這些白痴為什麼跟著我
寫下我所說的一切”
我建立了我的生活！

：
什麼。

精神：
來吧，一起來，一起來。 \!
別讓這件事變得奇怪。

我才剛見到我的偶像，為什麼會這樣
奇怪？ ！

:
你要去哪裡-

精神：
不，不，我可以*做*這個。 \！
我必須給她留下深刻的印象。 \!

打動最偉大的精神*
地獄*，哈迪亞幫助我。

:
你可以透過「回來」給我留下深刻的印象
在這裡！

靈魂似乎根本沒有聽到她的聲音。

精神：
怎麼辦？ ！我該怎麼辦？ ！ \！
.\.\..\.\..\.\.她會怎麼做？

精神：
她會有陰謀！ \！
一個計劃！ \!
*她*不會讓這阻止她！

靈氣旋轉。

精神：
啊哈！ \！
你們這些小傻瓜根本不可能阻止我！ \！
這一切都完全按照計劃進行！

現在，當我邁出下一步時，我會顫抖
*極其*狡猾的計劃付諸行動！

她消失在天花板中。

:
\^我-\.\.\.

精神：
讓我強調一下，這是一個令人驚訝的、荒謬的、
狡猾的計劃令人印象深刻！

你們這些傻瓜根本不知道！

她再次消失在天花板。

:
剛剛發生了什麼事？ ！

楓幾乎笑倒了。

楓：
看來你有粉絲了！ \!
也許是比他更勇敢的陰謀家
你自己！

:
你寫了一本書？

：
什麼？不！ \！
我不知道這是關於什麼的！

她是

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After
passages.content:
VR Tennis Controller!
For all your tennis needs!
passages.content_zh:
VR網球控制器！
滿足您所有的網球需求！

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After
passages.content:
Sport grab bag!
Try a new sports today!
passages.content_zh:
運動包！
今天試試一項新運動！

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After — Messy toys — p1
passages.content:
You pick up the toys.

But as soon as you turn your back, they're
back on the floor.
passages.content_zh:
你拿起玩具。

但只要你轉身，他們就會
回到地板上。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After — Clerk
passages.content:
Store Clerk:
The, uh, "adult" toys section isn't available
yet.\!
Got to clean the rest of the store first.
passages.content_zh:
店員：
呃，「成人」玩具部分不可用
還沒有。 \!
我得先把店裡的其他地方打掃乾淨。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After
passages.content:
Model sets and action figures.\!
Tools for various hobbies and crafts.
passages.content_zh:
模型套裝和動作人偶。 \!
適合各種嗜好和手工藝的工具。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After
passages.content:
All the toys you'd need for a pretend kitchen
or restuarant.
passages.content_zh:
假裝廚房所需的所有玩具
或餐廳。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After
passages.content:
PLAY AREA
         Try before you buy!
passages.content_zh:
遊樂區
         購買前先試用！

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After — Sign
passages.content:
\{Toys and Games\}
For young and old!
passages.content_zh:
\{玩具與遊戲\}
適合年輕人和老年人！

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After
passages.content:
CRAFTS
MODELS
HOBBIES
passages.content_zh:
手工藝品
型號
興趣嗜好

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After
passages.content:
SPORTS EQUIPMENT
SPORTS GAMES
SPORTS EVERYTHING ELSE
passages.content_zh:
運動器材
體育遊戲
運動其他一切

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After
passages.content:
PRETEND KITCHEN
PRETEND RESTAURANT
PRETEND FORENSIC ACCOUNTANT
passages.content_zh:
假裝廚房
假裝餐廳
假裝法務會計師

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After
passages.content:
STUFFED ANIMALS AND DOLLS
DOLL HOUSES
DOLL FURNITURE
CREEPY POSSESSED DOLLS
passages.content_zh:
毛絨動物和玩偶
娃娃屋
娃娃家具
令人毛骨悚然的著魔娃娃

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After — Pride spirit — p2
passages.content:
The recently possessed tennis racket is still
lying here.

:
Really, a tennis racket?\!
No wonder she was such a feeble opponent!

She gives it a contemptuous kick.\!
Except when her foot touches the racket, it
sticks.

There's a flash of light, and
suddenly looks different.

And then reverts to her previous appearance.

Tennis racket acquired!\!
 unlocked the Tennis Warrior class!
passages.content_zh:
最近擁有的網球拍還在
躺在這裡。

:
真的，網球拍？ \！
難怪她會是個如此弱小的對手！

她輕蔑地踢了它一腳。 \！
除了當她的腳接觸球拍時，
棍子。

有一道閃光，然後
突然看起來不一樣了。

然後又恢復到之前的樣子。

網球拍已獲得！ \！
 解鎖網球戰士職業！

passages.name: Floor 4 ARG After
passages.content:
SPORTS EQUIPMENT
SPORTS GAMES
SPORTS EVERYTHING ELSE
BOSS ENCOUNTERS
passages.content_zh:
運動器材
體育遊戲
運動其他一切
遭遇BOSS

passages.name: Floor 4 ARG After — Pride spirit — p2
passages.content:
Spirit:
Okay, okay, what am I going to do next.

Spirit:
It's got to be impressive.\!
Clever.\!
Earthshaking.

Spirit:
Think!\!
I can't screw this up!

Spirit:
Throw more stuff on the floor?

Spirit:
Throw *lots* more stuff on the floor?

Spirit:
\^Maybe-\.\.

Spirit:
\}She's here!

Spirit:
Mwahahaha!\!
You are here just in time to witness the final
step in my master plan!

Cower as I-

:
Stop it!

:
Let me explain to you in *excrutiating* detail
why your plan is idiotic, your methods inane,
and you should feel bad!

Spirit:
\^I-\.\.

:
What are you even doing here?!\!
A plan begins and ends with its goal! Its
purpose!

Are you just trying to scare some humans?\!
That doesn't take a plan, just a white sheet
and some spooky noises!

Spirit:
\^But-\.\.

:
Did you want to dirty up the floor?\!
Why?\!
Who cares?!

If you don't have a reason to scheme, why
bother?!\!
That will never show your greatness!

Spirit:
Well-\.\. Hmm.

The spirit looks thoughtful.

:
And even if all you wanted to do was terrify
humans, you're failing at that!

Oh no, you made them have to pick up some
clothes. How *terrifying*.

A rage spirit is more terrifying than that, and
they're mindless brutes!\!
Take some pride in yourself!

And furthermore-\.\.\.
Are you-\.\.\.
Is that a notepad?!

Spirit:
Oh yes!\!
I want to get every word of your wisdom
down!

I'll go study it so I can make you proud!\!
Just wait until next time!

:
That's another thing!\!
"Next time"?

Are you just going to give up like that?!\!
Folding so easily is just another sign of a weak
mind!

I fight to the bitter end for my schemes!

Kaede:
\^Perhaps thou shouldst not encourage her to-\.\.\.

Spirit:
Oh, okay!\!
I can do that!

The spirit jumps over to a nearby rack of
sports equipment.\!
A tennis racket rises into the air and begins
to glow.

Spirit:
Cower! Cower before me!

The tennis racket the spirit was possessing
falls to the ground with a clatter.\!
Defeated, the spirit begins to slowl
passages.content_zh:
精神：
好吧好吧，我接下來要做什麼。

精神：
一定會讓人印象深刻。 \!
聰明的。 \！
驚天動地。

精神：
想想吧！ \!
我不能把這件事搞砸！

精神：
往地上丟更多東西？

精神：
在地板上丟*很多*更多的東西？

精神：
\^也許-\.\.

精神：
\}她來了！

精神：
哇哈哈！ \!
你來的正是時候見證決賽
踏入我的整體計劃！

像我一樣畏縮——

:
停下來！

:
讓我向您詳細解釋一下*令人難以忍受的*
為什麼你的計劃是愚蠢的，你的方法是愚蠢的，
你應該感覺很糟！

精神：
\^我-\.\.

:
你還在這裡做什麼？ ！ \！
計劃以目標開始和結束！其
目的！

你只是想嚇唬一些人嗎？ \！
這不需要計劃，只需要一張白紙
還有一些怪異的聲音！

精神：
\^但是-\.\.

:
你想弄髒地板嗎？ \!
為什麼？ \！
誰在乎？ ！

如果你沒有理由去策劃，為什麼
打擾？ ！ \！
那永遠不會顯示你的偉大！

精神：
嗯-\.\.唔。

精神看起來若有所思。

:
即使你想做的只是嚇唬
人類，你們在這方面很失敗！

哦不，你讓他們不得不撿一些
衣服。多麼*可怕*。

狂怒之靈比這更可怕，而且
他們是沒有頭腦的畜生！ \！
為自己感到驕傲吧！

而且-\.\.\.
你是-\。 \。 \。
這是記事本嗎？ ！

精神：
哦，是的！ \！
我想得到你智慧的每一句話
下來！

我會去學習它，這樣我就能讓你感到驕傲！ \！
就等下次吧！

:
那是另一回事了！ \!
「下次」？

難道就這樣放棄嗎？ ！ \！
如此輕易棄牌只是弱者的另一個跡象
介意！

我為我的陰謀奮鬥到底！

楓：
\^也許你不應該鼓勵她-\.\.\.

精神：
哦，好吧！ \！
我做得到！

靈魂跳到附近的架子上
運動器材。 \!
網球拍升到空中並開始
發光。

精神：
畏縮！在我面前畏縮！

靈魂所擁有的網球拍
啪嗒一聲掉到地上。 \！
失敗了，精神開始遲緩

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
The customer is running through the store,
her massive unrestrained breasts quaking
with every step.

Customer:
Oh my god! This shirt even makes it feel like
I've finally grown real boobs!

You hear an employee shout from across the
floor.

Employee:
Ma'am! No running in the store!

Customer:
No! You can't stop me!\!
I'm going to pretend I'm not flat for as long
as possible!
passages.content_zh:
顧客在商店裡跑來跑去，
她巨大的、不受約束的乳房在顫抖
每一步。

客戶：
天哪！這件襯衫甚至讓人感覺
我終於長出真正的胸部了！

你聽到員工從對面喊叫
地板。

員工：
女士！店裡禁止跑步！

客戶：
不！你阻止不了我！ \!
我會假裝自己不平坦那麼久
盡可能！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
There are so many things here that look like
they should fit. What's the catch?
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
這裡有很多東西看起來像
它們應該合適。有什麼問題嗎？

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
I'm telling you, this fit when I put it on!

The shirt suddenly flies open.\!
A button bounces off the clerk's completely
unamused face.

Employee:
Ma'am, I'm afraid I'm going to have to ask
you to pay for that.\!
Full price.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我告訴你，我穿上的時候就很合身！

襯衫突然飛開。 \！
按鈕完全從店員的按鈕上彈開
不高興的臉。

員工：
女士 恐怕我得問一下
你要為此付出代價。 \！
全價。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Employee:
I have been hit in the face by more buttons
than I can count today.

Why has *everyone* decided to force
themselves into shirts that are way too tight?!
passages.content_zh:
員工：
我被更多的按鈕擊中了臉
比我今天能數的還要多。

為什麼*每個人*都決定強迫
自己穿太緊的襯衫？ ！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
I know this fit when I put it on...

She tugs fruitlessly at her skirt.

Customer:
What happened?
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
當我穿上它的時候我就知道這個適合...

她徒勞地拉著裙子。

客戶：
發生了什麼事？

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
The customer is checking herself out in the
mirror.

Customer:
Huh, something looks different about me.

She poses.

I'm not sure what.\!
But I think I *like* it.
passages.content_zh:
顧客正在檢視自己
鏡子。

客戶：
呵呵，我好像有些不一樣了。

她擺出姿勢。

我不確定是什麼。 \!
但我想我“喜歡”它。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
The last two tops I've tried were too small to
get the discount.

This time I'm wearing the biggest size I can
find. That'll have to work!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我試過的最後兩件上衣太小了
得到折扣。

這次我穿的是最大的尺碼
找到。那一定行得通！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Employee:
Everyone goes in carrying clothes that should
fit, but everyone comes out wearing things
that are too small.

Are they swapping clothes in there?
passages.content_zh:
員工：
Everyone goes in carrying clothes that should
fit, but everyone comes out wearing things
那些太小了。

Are they swapping clothes in there?

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Cashier 1
passages.content:
Employee:
I have never seen so many customers be
*this* wrong about what fits them.

Have they never had to shop for themselves
before?
passages.content_zh:
員工：
我從來沒有見過這麼多顧客
*這個*關於什麼適合他們的問題是錯誤的。

他們從來不需要自己購物嗎
之前？

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
I swear these fit when I tried them on...
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我發誓，當我試穿它們時，它們很合身…

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
I don't care if it doesn't fit!\!
I've never had a shirt give me cleavage
before!

This is worth every penny!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我不在乎它是否不合適！ \！
我從來沒有穿過一件襯衫讓我露出乳溝
之前！

這每一分錢都是值得的！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p1
passages.content:
The woman is sorting through racks of jackets.

Customer:
I've figured it out.\!
They're making the clothes shrink when we
wear them, or something.

But jackets, jackets don't care about size.\!
I can just wear it open if I have to.

She puts on one of the jackets.

90% off, here I come!
passages.content_zh:
那位女士正在整理架子上的夾克。

客戶：
我已經弄清楚了。 \!
當我們這樣做的時候，他們讓衣服縮水了
戴上它們，或什麼的。

但是夾克，夾克不在乎尺寸。 \！
如果有必要的話我可以把它打開。

她穿上其中一件夾克。

90折，我來了！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
It still fits!

She struggles to pull the jacket down a little
more over her chest.

I don't care if it's shrunk a little!\!
It's still good enough!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
還是很合適的！

她費力地把夾克拉下來一點
更多在她的胸前。

我不在乎它是否縮小了一點！ \！
還是夠好了！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Employee:
So many people wearing tops that barely
close.\!
Or skirts six inches too short.

It's making me feel like my clothes are too
small too.
passages.content_zh:
員工：
很多人只穿上衣
關閉。 \!
或者裙子太短六吋。

這讓我覺得我的衣服也很
也小。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
Okay! Time to pay and-

There's a sudden creaking noise from her
shirt.

Customer:
Uh...

There's a loud *snap* as her shirt rips open.

Customer:
...\!Maybe I'm not ready to leave yet.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
好的！付款時間和-

她突然發出嘎吱嘎吱的聲音
襯衫。

客戶：
呃...

當她的襯衫撕開時，發出一聲「啪」的一聲巨響。

客戶：
...\！也許我還沒準備好離開。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
Uh-oh.\!
I hope I'm not going to have to pay for that.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
呃哦。 \!
我希望我不必為此付出代價。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
Too small?\!
Darling, this is exactly how a women should
look!

Strong.\!
Confident.\!
Secure in her appearance, and wanting
everyone to know it!

If anything, *your* clothes are too big!

Employee:
...\!You're still paying full price.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
太小了？ \!
親愛的，這才是女人該有的樣子
看！

強的。 \！
自信的。 \！
對自己的外表很安全，想要
大家都知道吧！

如果有的話，*你的*衣服太大了！

員工：
...\！您仍需支付全額。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Employee:
Customers that argue about price get a
whipping!

You hear a shout from across the room.

Manager:
\}No whipping customers!

Employee:
Employees that give bad commands get a
whipping!

Manager:
\}Just put the whip down already!
passages.content_zh:
員工：
爭論價格的顧客可以獲得
鞭打！

你聽到房間另一邊傳來喊叫聲。

經理：
\}禁止鞭打顾客！

員工：
發出錯誤命令的員工會受到懲罰
鞭打！

經理：
\}把鞭子放下吧！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
Looking good girl!

She blows herself a kiss.

Customer:
That's the kind of look I like!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
看起來不錯的女孩！

她給自己一個飛吻。

客戶：
這就是我喜歡的樣子！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p1
passages.content:
Arrogant Customer:
This bra is the wrong size. Get me another
one, the right size this time!

Employee:
Fine, Ma'am.
passages.content_zh:
傲慢的顧客：
這件胸罩尺寸不對。給我另一個
一、這次尺寸合適！

員工：
好的，女士。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p2
passages.content:
Arrogant Customer:
Really, they just don't make employees here
like they used to!
passages.content_zh:
傲慢的顧客：
真的，他們只是不在這裡僱用員工
就像他們以前那樣！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p3
passages.content:
Arrogant Customer:
This one doesn't fit either!\!
Bring me one that's the *correct* size!

Employee:
\^Ma'am, I believe that is-\.\.

Arrogant Customer:
I know my sizes!\.\. Go!
passages.content_zh:
傲慢的顧客：
這個也不適合！ \!
給我一個*正確的*尺寸！

員工：
\^女士，我相信那是-\.\.

傲慢的顧客：
我知道我的尺寸！ \.\.去！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p4
passages.content:
Arrogant Customer:
The nerve, trying to tell me what my sizes
are!\!
I have always been a c-cup and nothing else!
passages.content_zh:
傲慢的顧客：
神經，試圖告訴我我的尺碼
是！ \！
我一直都是c罩杯，沒有別的！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p5
passages.content:
Arrogant Customer:
I can't even get this on! What were you
thinking?!

She pulls again on the bra, but can't even get
it to the base of her breasts.

Employee:
Ma'am, perhaps a larger size?

Arrogant Customer:
Excuse me, have you heard of the customer
is always right?

And one of the many, many things I am right
about is my sizing!

If you would just-

She makes another futile attempt to fit even
a fraction of her chest into the cups.

This can't possibly be a C-cup, bring me the
right size and everything will be fine!

Employee:
Fine.

She stomps out of the room.
passages.content_zh:
傲慢的顧客：
我連這個都接不上！你是什​​麼
思考？ ！

她再次拉起胸罩，但還是沒能脫下來
它一直到她的乳房底部。

員工：
女士，可以大一點嗎？

傲慢的顧客：
打擾一下，您聽過這位顧客嗎？
總是對的嗎？

我是對的許多很多事情之一
大約是我的尺寸！

如果你願意——

她再次徒勞地嘗試適應
她胸部的一小部分進入罩杯。

這不可能是C罩杯，給我拿來
尺寸合適，一切都會好起來的！

員工：
很好。

她跺著腳走出房間。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p6
passages.content:
She makes another futile attempt to fit even
a fraction of her chest into the cups.

Arrogant Customer:
Do they even teach employees to read tags
anymore?!
passages.content_zh:
她再次徒勞地嘗試適應
她胸部的一小部分進入罩杯。

傲慢的顧客：
他們甚至教員工閱讀標籤嗎
不再了嗎？ ！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p7
passages.content:
The employee hands the customer another
bra.\!
She takes one look at it and starts shaking her
head.

Arrogant Customer:
No no no!

She holds it up in front of her.

Arrogant Customer:
Does this look like it could *possibly* fit me?!

Employee:
\^But you asked for-\.\.\.

Arrogant Customer:
Just go away!

I shall be writing a bad review, and then I
shall take my business elsewhere!

She pulls a phone out.

Employee:
I-

Arrogant Customer:
Are you still here?!\!
I said to leave!
passages.content_zh:
員工又遞給顧客另一份
胸罩。 \!
她看了一眼就開始搖晃她
頭。

傲慢的顧客：
不不不！

她把它舉在面前。

傲慢的顧客：
這看起來*可能*適合我嗎？ ！

員工：
\^但是你要求-\.\.\.

傲慢的顧客：
走開吧！

我會寫一篇負評，然後我
將把我的生意轉移到別處！

她拿出手機。

員工：
我-

傲慢的顧客：
你還在嗎？ ！ \！
我說走吧！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p8
passages.content:
She holds up the bra in front of her again.

Arrogant Customer:
Look at this.\!
What was that imbecile thinking?!

There's no way something this small could
be a C-cup!
passages.content_zh:
她再次將胸罩舉到面前。

傲慢的顧客：
看看這個。 \!
這是什麼愚蠢的想法？ ！

這麼小的東西不可能
成為C罩杯！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Fitting room employee — p5
passages.content:
Arrogant Customer:
I can't even get this on! What were you
thinking?!

She pulls again on the bra, but can't even get
it to the base of her breasts.

Employee:
Ma'am, perhaps a larger size?

Arrogant Customer:
Excuse me, have you heard of the customer
is always right?

And one of the many, many things I am right
about is my sizing!

If you would just-

She makes another futile attempt to fit even
a fraction of her chest into the cups.

Just bring me the right size, everything would
be fine!

Employee:
Fine.

She stomps out of the room.
passages.content_zh:
傲慢的顧客：
我連這個都接不上！你是什​​麼
思考？ ！

她再次拉起胸罩，但還是沒能脫下來
它一直到她的乳房底部。

員工：
女士，可以大一點嗎？

傲慢的顧客：
打擾一下，您聽過這位顧客嗎？
總是對的嗎？

我是對的許多很多事情之一
大約是我的尺寸！

如果你願意——

她再次徒勞地嘗試適應
她胸部的一小部分進入罩杯。

只要給我合適的尺寸，一切都會
沒事！

員工：
很好。

她跺著腳走出房間。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Searching fitting room employee — p2
passages.content:
The employee is going through the bras.

Employee:
I know what I'm doing.

She picks one out and heads back to the
fitting rooms.
passages.content_zh:
這名員工正在檢查胸罩。

員工：
我知道我在做什麼。

她挑選了一個然後返回
試衣間。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Searching fitting room employee — p4
passages.content:
The same employee is looking through the
bras again.

Employee:
\}Stupid customer. I hope she never finds a
bra that fits ever again.

\}I hope she blows up like a blimp until
nothing ever fits her.

She grabs one and heads back to the
fitting rooms.
passages.content_zh:
同一個員工正在查看
再次胸罩。

員工：
\}愚蠢的顧客。我希望她永遠找不到
再次合身的胸罩。

\}我希望她能像飛艇一樣爆炸，直到
沒有什麼適合她。

她抓起一個，然後返回
試衣間。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Searching fitting room employee — p6
passages.content:
The same employee is looking through the
bras again.

Employee:
\}I can't believe she thinks she's a C cup.

\}We don't have bras her size.\!
No one has bras her size.\!
Serves her right.

She grabs one of the bras.

Employee:
Guess this is no worse than any other.
passages.content_zh:
同一個員工正在查看
再次胸罩。

員工：
\}我不敢相信她認為自己是 C 罩杯。

\}我們沒有她尺寸的胸罩。 \！
沒有人擁有她尺寸的胸罩。 \！
這是她的權利。

她抓起其中一件胸罩。

員工：
我想這並不比其他的更糟。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — p2
passages.content:
The employee from before is here, angrily
folding clothing.

Employee:
"Why can't you follow instructions," she says.\!
I brought her what she asked for every time!

Not my fault she has no idea how bra sizes
work.

She folds clothes for a little bit.

Employee:
Why is she even here?!\!
If she wants something that fits, she should
be looking at the bedsheets!
passages.content_zh:
之前的員工來了，憤怒地
折疊衣服。

員工：
「為什麼你不能遵循指示呢？」她說。 \！
每次她要的東西我都帶給她！

不是我的錯，她不知道胸罩尺寸是多少
工作。

她疊了一會兒衣服。

員工：
她為什麼在這裡？ ！ \！
如果她想要合適的東西，她應該
看床單！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
I came here because milady asked me to get
a spare maid uniform.

...I don't think my old one is going to fit
anymore.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我來這裡是因為夫人讓我去
備用女僕制服。

……我認為我的舊款不適合
不再了。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Customer:
Come on!\!
Stupid shirt!

You fit before I started trying on clothes!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
來吧！ \!
愚蠢的襯衫！

在我開始試衣服之前你就合身了！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after
passages.content:
Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
No time for playing in weird metal boxes, nya!

After a moment's wait, the elevator arrives on
your floor.
passages.content_zh:
愛與正義的可愛精神：
沒時間在奇怪的金屬盒子裡玩，哎呀！

等了一會兒，電梯就到了
你的樓層。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control boss — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control Boss:
Shhhh, I've got her cornered but I'm going to
need more men to make the catch.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制主管：
噓，我已經把她逼到牆角了，但我會
需要更多的人來捕捉。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control boss — p2
passages.content:
Animal Control Boss:
Alright men! We have our target cornered!

This time we are ready! \!
We are prepared!\!
We are-

One of the officers looks behind their boss,
then raises a hand.\!
The boss sighes.

Animal Control Boss:
And she just ran away, didn't she.

Animal Control:
Sir!\!
Straight up the stairs sir!

Animal Control Boss:
Of course she did.\!
Well, she's still trapped.

We'll corner the two of them on the roof if
we have to!

Jones! Get in touch with HQ!\!
Call *everyone* in.\!
We're ending this!

They all run up the stairs.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Oh nyo, again?\!
We...\! We should follow them.

She gives a tired 'nya', then heads up the
stairs.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制主管：
好吧，夥計們！我們的目標已被逼入絕境！

這次我們準備好了！ \！
我們準備好了！ \!
我們是——

一名警官看著老闆的身後，
然後舉起手。 \!
老闆嘆了口氣。

動物管制主管：
然後她就逃跑了，不是嗎？

動物管制：
先生！ \!
先生，直接上樓梯吧！

動物管制主管：
她當然做到了。 \!
好吧，她還是被困住了。

如果的話我們就把他們兩個逼到屋頂上
我們必須這樣做！

瓊斯！與總部聯繫！ \!
叫*每個人*進來。 \!
我們要結束這一切了！

他們都跑上樓梯。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
噢，又來了？ \！
我們...\！我們應該跟隨他們。

她疲倦地「nya」了一聲，然後抬頭
樓梯。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Snake customer — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
What is with this day?!

First a snake upstairs bites me, and now
nothing fits?!

She maks another fruitless attempt to tug her
vest over her swollen breasts.

Customer:
Maybe I should just go home and brumate
until things are better.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
這日子是怎麼回事？ ！

先是樓上的蛇咬了我，現在
什麼都不適合？ ！

她再次嘗試拉她，但沒有成功。
背心蓋在她腫脹的乳房上。

客戶：
也許我應該回家好好休息一下
直到情況好轉。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Doug — p1
passages.content:
Doug is curled up on a pile of pants,
occasionally running her claws through them.
passages.content_zh:
道格蜷縮在一堆褲子上，
偶爾她的爪子會穿過它們。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control 3 after — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
Just give the word chief!\!
Even a giant robot can't stand up to *this*
much elegance.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
只要說出「酋長」這個字就可以了！ \！
即使是巨型機器人也無法承受*這個*
非常優雅。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control 1 after — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
As the chief always said, duty before shirts!

Well, he never said that, but I'm certain he
would.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
正如酋長常說的，責任優先！

好吧，他從來沒有這麼說過，但我確信他
會的。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control 4 after — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
Ready!\!
There's no way she's getting past me!

Animal Control:
There's no way anyone's getting past me.\!
Sorry everyone...
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
準備好了！ \!
她根本就不可能超越我！

動物管制：
沒有人能超越我。 \!
對不起大家...

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control 5 after — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
Ready and waiting sir!\!
And after this, permission to go shopping
please?
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
準備好了，等待先生！ \!
在此之後，允許去購物
請問？

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control 2 after — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
Armed and ready!

She kisses her biceps.

Animal Control:
No animal's escaping these guns!
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
全副武裝，準備就緒！

她親吻她的二頭肌。

動物管制：
沒有動物能逃脫這些槍！

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Magical love spirit — p1
passages.content:
Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Five more minutes.

\v[23] more hurt warriors.
passages.content_zh:
愛與正義的可愛精神：
還有五分鐘。

\v[23]更多受傷的戰士。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control 3 — p1
passages.content:
The officer is lying in a rack of formal
dresses.

Animal Control:
I knew we should have made a better plan!

Intelligence.\!
Foresight.\!
Elegance!

Those are our advantages over the animals.

He winces in pain.

This wasn't elegant at all!

Animal Control:
Elegance, we need more elegance...

He continues muttering to himself as you use
the potion, even as he starts to glow.

Dresses rise up around him, wrapping him
in a cocoon of silk and delicate fabric.

Throughout it all his muttering continues,
steadily rising in pitch.

Animal Control:
Yes...\!
Beauty...\!
Grace...\!

A moment more, and then the cocoon
collapses.

Animal Control:
Ah, now this is elegance!

Time to get back to work!\!
This time it will go *much* better.

She wobbles off to meet the boss, unsteady
on her new heels.\! Within a few steps her gait
smoothes out and she's soon moving easily
and, indeed, elegantly.

That's the last of them. You should go talk
to the animal control boss again.
passages.content_zh:
這名軍官躺在正式的架子上
連身裙。

動物管制：
我知道我們應該制定更好的計劃！

智力。 \！
有遠見。 \!
優雅！

這些都是我們相對於動物的優勢。

他痛苦地皺起眉頭。

這一點都不優雅！

動物管制：
優雅，我們需要更多的優雅…

當你使用時，他繼續自言自語
藥水，即使他開始發光。

裙子在他周圍升起，包裹著他
在絲綢和精緻織物的繭中。

自始至終，他都在嘀咕著：
音調穩步上升。

動物管制：
是的...\！
美麗...\！
優雅...\！

再等一會兒，然後就結繭了
崩潰了。

動物管制：
啊，這就是優雅！

是時候回去工作了！ \!
這次會「好很多」。

她搖搖晃晃地去見老闆，搖搖晃晃
穿上她的新高跟鞋。 \！幾步之內她的步態
變得平滑，她很快就能輕鬆移動
而且確實很優雅。

這是他們中的最後一個。你應該去談談
再次向動物控制老闆求助。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Police 5 — p1
passages.content:
The officer is lounging on some fallen clothes.

Animal Control:
Nope, I'm on my break.\!
Though I hope nothing's broken...

He springs to his feet.

Animal Control:
Suddenly, energy!

He stretches.

A button goes flying from her suddenly
overstrained clothes.

Animal Control:
Huh, *that's* new.

Animal Control:
Oh well, it's something for when I'm off duty!\!
No time for it now!

She rushes off to join the chief.

That's the last of them. You should go talk
to the animal control boss again.
passages.content_zh:
這名警官懶洋洋地躺在一些掉落的衣服上。

動物管制：
不，我正在休息。 \!
雖然我希望一切都沒有壞掉...

他跳了起來。

動物管制：
頓時，能量來了！

他伸展身體。

一顆紐帶突然從她身上飛走
過度勞累的衣服。

動物管制：
嗯，*那是*新的。

動物管制：
哦，好吧，這是我下班時的事情！ \！
現在沒時間了！

她趕緊跑去會見首領。

這是他們中的最後一個。你應該去談談
再次向動物控制老闆求助。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control 1 — p1
passages.content:
The animal control officer is lying groaning
in a pile of clothes.

Animal Control:
Ow.

Animal Control:
I'm\..\..\.. feeling better?

He grabs a nearby clothes rack to help
himself up.

Unfortunately he grabs the wrong part and
pull it down on him, vanishing under a pile
of shirts.

Animal Control:
Agh, how-

The pile shakes as the officer wrestles with
the clothes.

And then the pile starts...\!
Growing larger?

Yes, you're definitely seeing it start to mound
up.

It swells.\!
And swells.\!
Until a surprisingly blonde head pokes out of
the top.

They drag themselves the rest of the way
out of the pile.

Animal Control:
...What's the biggest size this place carries?

Animal Control:
...I probably shouldn't be clothes shopping on
duty anyway.\!
I hope chief lets me leave early.

She heads off to the chief, tugging
ineffectually at her shirt as she goes.

That's the last of them. You should go talk
to the animal control boss again.
passages.content_zh:
動物管理官員躺在地上呻吟
在一堆衣服裡。

動物管制：
噢。

動物管制：
我\..\..\..感覺好些了嗎？

他抓起附近的一個衣架來幫忙
他自己起來了。

不幸的是他抓住了錯誤的部分並且
把它拉到他身上，消失在一堆下面
襯衫。

動物管制：
啊啊，怎麼——

當警官與他摔角時，那堆東西開始搖晃
衣服。

然後一堆開始......\！
越來越大？

是的，你肯定會看到它開始堆積
起來。

它膨脹了。 \!
並膨脹。 \!
直到一個令人驚訝的金髮頭從裡面探出
頂部。

他們拖著自己走完剩下的路
從堆裡出來。

動物管制：
……這個地方最大的尺寸是多少？

動物管制：
……我可能不該買衣服
無論如何，職責。 \！
希望領導讓我早點走。

她向酋長走去，拉著
她邊走邊徒勞地拉著襯衫。

這是他們中的最後一個。你應該去談談
再次向動物控制老闆求助。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control 4 — p1
passages.content:
The animal control officer is sitting on a pile
of clothes rubbing his leg.

Animal Control:
Ow.

You administer a potion.

Animal Control:
Was that...\.\. supposed to do something?

Huh.\!
You try another one.

And another.

Animal Control:
Look, what are you-

There's an incredibly bright flash.

His chest explodes forward, ripping his clothes
into tiny shreds.\!
Clothes fly up to cover him like they were
magnetized.

\n[2]:
Fascinating, a delayed reaction. It seems to
have enhanced the effects.

Animal Control:
...I guess I'd better get back to work.\!
At least I can block a lot of space like this.

She heads off to the chief, jiggling and
wobbling and occasionally knocking over
clothing displays.

That's the last of them. You should go talk
to the animal control boss again.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制官員坐在一堆東西上
衣服摩擦他的腿。

動物管制：
噢。

你服用一劑藥水。

動物管制：
那是……\.\.應該做點什麼嗎？

呵呵。 \!
你試試另一種。

還有另一個。

動物管制：
看看，你是什麼——

出現了令人難以置信的明亮閃光。

他的胸部向前爆炸，撕裂了他的衣服
變成小碎片。 \!
衣服像原來一樣飛起來蓋住他
磁化了。

\n[2]:
令人著迷，反應遲緩。看來
都增強了效果。

動物管制：
……我想我最好回去工作了。 \！
至少我可以這樣擋住很多空間。

她搖搖晃晃地走向酋長
搖搖晃晃，偶爾會翻倒
服裝展示。

這是他們中的最後一個。你應該去談談
再次向動物控制老闆求助。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Rampage - clothes 2 — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
What hit me...

The officer holds up a hand when you
approach with a potion.

Animal Control:
Wait, stop.\!
I've been watching.\!
I get how this goes.

You nod and start to put the potion away.

Animal Control:
No, wait!
Don't-

He winces and rubs his leg.

Animal Control:
Don't leave me hurt like this.\!
It's just...

Animal Control:
I'm sitting in what, the petite section?\!
"For the extra tiny and weak"?\!
Yeah, no thanks.

Just, give me a minute.

He limps across the aisle, groaning the whole
way.

Animal Control:
Come on, there's no way I want to stay hurt
like this.

Animal Control:
Yeah, here we go, Big and Bulky department.\!
Just what I want.\!
I'm gonna be HUGE.

You hand over the potion.\!
He chugs it.

There is a brief silence.\!
There is a loud ripping noise.

A sudden surge of muscles tears out through
his clothes and rips parts of them to shreds.

Animal Control:
Ah yeah, look at these babies.

She kisses her arms.

That's the stuff!

Animal Control:
Now let's get back to catching that cat.\!
No animal's gonna be able to escape
me now!

She heads off.

That's the last of them. You should go talk
to the animal control boss again.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
What hit me...

当你时，官员会举起一只手
用藥水接近。

動物管制：
Wait, stop.\!
我一直在看。 \!
I get how this goes.

你点点头，开始收起药水。

動物管制：
不，等等！
別-

他皱起眉头，揉着腿。

動物管制：
不要让我这样受伤。 \!
這只是...

動物管制：
我坐在什么，娇小的区域？ \！
“对于特别弱小”？ \！
是的，不用了，謝謝。

只是，請給我一分鐘。

他一跛一跛地穿過走道，整個人都在呻吟
方式。

動物管制：
来吧，我不想继续受伤
像這樣。

動物管制：
是的，我們開始了，又大又笨重的部門。 \！
Just what I want.\!
我會變得巨大。

你把藥水交出來。 \!
他咕咕地喝著。

一陣短暫的沉默。 \!
有很大的撕裂聲。

突然爆发的肌肉撕裂
他的衣服并将其部分撕成碎片。

動物管制：
啊，是的，看看这些婴儿。

她親吻她的手臂。

That's the stuff!

動物管制：
现在让我们继续抓那只猫。 \！
沒有動物能夠逃脫
我現在！

她走開了。

這是他們中的最後一個。你應該去談談
再次向動物控制老闆求助。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Exercise clothes
passages.content:
Customer:
I wanted to get new exercise clothes since the
gym reopened, but none of these seem to
quite fit.

I love how it looks with my hair though.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
從那時起我就想買新的運動服
健身房重新開放，但這些似乎都沒有
很合適。

不過我喜歡它和我頭髮的搭配。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Robot — p1
passages.content:
The mecha lies crumpled and smoking against
the wall, throwing off the occasional spark.

The machine twitches as you pour power into
it, but it looks like it's too damaged to move
again.

Eh, might as well give it a try.

Robot?:
SYSTEMS\..\..\.. REBOOTING\..\..\..\!
DAMAGE FLAGS CLEARING\..\..\..
PROCESSING\..\..\..\..\..

CANNONS\..\..\.. NOT FOUND.\!
MISSILES\..\..\.. NOT FOUND.\!
NEW DATABASE DISCOVERED:\!
LOOKING SEXY.
passages.content_zh:
机甲皱巴巴地躺着，冒着烟
墙上，偶尔会发出火花。

當你注入能量時機器會抽搐
是的，但看起來損壞得太嚴重，無法移動
再次。

嗯，不妨尝试一下。

機器人？ ：
系統\..\..\.. 重新啟動\..\..\..\！
损坏标志清除\..\..\..
處理\..\..\..\..\..

大砲\..\..\..未找到。 \！
導彈\..\..\..未找到。 \！
發現新資料庫：\!
看起來很性感。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Robot — p2
passages.content:
Robot?:
ERROR: PREVIOUS PROTOCOL: VIOLENCE
NOT FOUND.

SEARCHING FOR NEW PROTOCOL\..\..\..\..\..\..

NEW PROTOCOL FOUND.\!
ENACTING PROTOCOL: FASHION.
passages.content_zh:
機器人？ ：
ERROR: PREVIOUS PROTOCOL: VIOLENCE
未找到。

SEARCHING FOR NEW PROTOCOL\..\..\..\..\..\..

发现新协议。 \!
ENACTING PROTOCOL: FASHION.

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Animal control shopping
passages.content:
Animal Control:
I'm so glad we got off early so I can find a
shirt that fits.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
我很高興我們早點出發，這樣我就可以找到一個
合身的衬衫。

passages.name: Floor 2 real 2 after — Sale customer
passages.content:
Customer:
Why is nothing fitting?!

She holds another too-small bra up to her
massive breasts, then hisses with displeasure.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
Why is nothing fitting?!

她拿著另一個太小的胸罩
巨大的乳房，然後發出不滿的嘶嘶聲。

passages.name: Tailor Real — Seats — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
I love this outfit!

Though, uh...

She glances down at her straining shirt

It could use some adjustments.\!
And repairs.\!
A lot of repairs.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我喜歡這身衣服！

雖然，呃...

她低頭看了一眼她繃緊的襯衫

它可能需要一些調整。 \!
並進行維修。 \!
大量維修。

passages.name: Tailor Real
passages.content:
A glamorous winter coat, perfect for a night
out on the town.

It's made out of some familiar-looking wool.
passages.content_zh:
迷人的冬季外套，非常適合夜晚
出城了。

它是用一些看起來很熟悉的羊毛製成的。

passages.name: Tailor Real
passages.content:
A stunning red dress.

The sleeves have been made much wider,
and the back has been modified to provide
space for a large stinger.
passages.content_zh:
一襲紅色連身裙，令人驚艷。

袖子變得更寬了，
背面经过修改以提供
为大毒刺提供空间。

passages.name: Tailor Real
passages.content:
Looks suitable for casual wear, but still has
a very classy feel to it.

It's been modified to fit an *extremely* large
bust.\!
Two beachballs have been stuffed into it to
model it properly.
passages.content_zh:
看起來適合休閒裝，但還是有
一種非常優雅的感覺。

它已被修改以适应*非常*大的
bust.\!
里面塞了两个沙滩球
model it properly.

passages.name: Tailor Real — Tailor — p1
passages.content:
// Initial

Tailor:
I can feel it...\!
Lots of customers coming soon!
passages.content_zh:
// 初始值

裁縫：
我能感覺到...\！
大量顧客即將到來！

passages.name: Tailor Real — Tailor — p2
passages.content:
// Rose and Lily event

Tailor:
Hmmm... \!
I've never done much work with waterproof

passages.content_zh:
// 玫瑰和百合事件

裁縫：
嗯……\！
我從來沒有做過太多防水方面的工作

passages.name: Tailor Real — Tailor — p3
passages.content:

Let's see, I'll need to expand the sleeves for

Maybe something backless will help with the

// 憤怒的蜜蜂

裁縫：
讓我們看看，我需要把袖子放寬

也許露背的東西會有所幫助

passages.name: Tailor Real — Tailor — p4
passages.content:
// Sale women

Tailor:
I heard the sale upstairs was attracting a lot

Did no one buy the correct size?!
passages.content_zh:
// 銷售女性

裁縫：
聽說樓上的促銷很吸引人
生意，但我沒想到會有這麼多
人需要調整！

沒有人買正確的尺寸嗎？

passages.name: Tailor Real — Tailor — p5
passages.content:
// Snake underwear

Tailor:
You know, at first I was worried I wouldn't
be able to come up with designs for her.

Fortunately, the internet came through.

I was able to find a staggering number of
ideas for,\! what was the term they used,\!
"snussy".
passages.content_zh:
// 蛇形內衣

裁縫：
你知道，一開始我擔心我不會
能夠為她想出設計。

幸運的是，網路通了。

我找到了數量驚人的
的想法，\!他們用的術語是什麼，\！
「鼻煙」。

passages.content:
// Knight

Tailor:

passages.content_zh:
// 騎士

裁縫：
嗯，是的，我認識一些鐵匠，他們會

passages.content:
// Sheep

He rubs a little of the customer's arm fur

Tailor:
Oh, this is *amazing* quality wool.\!
Could use a little more care, I can

But I think we can do some *excellent* work

passages.content_zh:
// 羊

他擦了擦顧客手臂上的一點皮毛

裁縫：
哦，這是*驚人的*優質羊毛。 \！
可以多加小心一點，我可以
給你推薦一款洗潔精。

但我认为我们可以做一些*出色的*工作

passages.name: Tailor Real — Tailor — p8
passages.content:
// Exercise

Tailor:
Hmm...\!
I might be able to do something with some

passages.content_zh:
// 練習

嗯...\！
我也許可以和一些人一起做點什麼
鋼纜...

passages.name: Tailor Real — Tailor — p9
passages.content:
// Cowgirl new wardrobe

Here it is!\!
Fashionable cow print!
passages.content_zh:
// 女牛仔的新衣櫥

裁縫：
就是這裡！ \!
時尚牛印花！

Work is nice, but it's also nice to take a break
now and then.
passages.content_zh:
// 預設裁縫

工作是美好的，但休息一下也很好
