passages.name: Tailor Real — Above tailor — p2
passages.content:
// Rose and Lily event override. Should always be rightmost event
page.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[5]We have a very important date coming
up tomorrow.
\C[30]Everything needs to be perfect.

\C[5]And so we want to look our best!
\C[30]But... \C[0]*She gestures at the nectar
running down both their bodies*
\C[30]We'd ruin all our favorite outfits.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]And this *has* to go perfectly.
\C[5]The conversation is going to be hard
enough!

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[5]We don't want to have to worry about our
appearance too.

\C[30]You look great Lily, we look great, but
we want to maybe try to look a little more
normal?

*Lily blushes dark green*
\C[5]We'd like to have the relationship talk
first and save the nudist talk for later.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
(Together)\C[30]But \C[5]that \C[30]means \C[5]clothes!

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]We've already tried everything we own.
\C[5]It was horrible! The mess! The laundry!

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Can you make something for us?
\C[5]Or suggest something?

\C[5]Can you recommend something?
\C[30]Or make something?

Tailor:
To start, what is that liquid like?

With their permission, he takes a little. He rubs
it thoughtfully between his fingers.

Tailor:
You're right, this would make an absolute
mess of most fabrics.

We should be able to start you with some
swimsuits.  Those will still get wet, but they
should bear it a lot better.

Over the long term, I could probably do
something with some raincoat material. Real
waterproof stuff, that is.

And something you can still go wild with:
accessorize!

We've got some very cute hats. Plus you should
be able to do all sorts of things with hair clips
and ribbons.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
(Together)\C[30]Thank \C[5]you!

They lean forward and give him a massive
hug, planting a kiss on either side of his head.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]This will
passages.content_zh:
// 玫瑰和百合事件覆蓋。應該總是最右邊的事件
頁。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[5]我們有一個非常重要的日期即將到來
明天起來。
\C[30]一切都需要完美。

\C[5]所以我們希望展現最好的一面！
\C[30]但是... \C[0]*她指著花蜜
跑下他們的身體*
\C[30]我們會毀掉所有我們最喜歡的衣服。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]這*必須*完美地進行。
\C[5]談話會很困難
夠了！

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[5]我們不想擔心我們的
外觀也。

\C[30]你看起來很棒莉莉，我們看起來很棒，但是
我們想嘗試多看一點
正常嗎？

*莉莉臉紅深綠色*
\C[5]我們想談關係
首先，把裸體主義者的話題留到以後再說。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
（合）\C[30]但是\C[5]那\C[30]意味著\C[5]衣服！

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]我們已經嘗試了我們所擁有的一切。
\C[5]太可怕了！混亂！洗衣服！

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]你能為我們做些什麼嗎？
\C[5]或建議什麼？

\C[5]你能推薦一些東西嗎？
\C[30]或做點什麼？

裁縫：
首先，這種液體是什麼樣的呢？

在他們的允許下，他拿了一點。他擦
它在他的手指間若有所思。

裁縫：
你是對的，這絕對是
大多數織物都亂七八糟。

我們應該能夠為您提供一些幫助
泳衣。  那些仍然會被弄濕，但它們
應該能承受得更好。

從長遠來看，我可能會做
一些帶有雨衣材料的東西。真實
防水的東西，就是這樣。

還有一些你仍然可以瘋狂的東西：
配件！

我們有一些非常可愛的帽子。另外你應該
能夠用髮夾做各種各樣的事情
和絲帶。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
（合）\C[30]謝謝\C[5]你！

他們向前傾身，給了他一個巨大的
擁抱，在他頭的兩側印下一個吻。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]這將

passages.content:

蛇顧客：
當這第一次發生時，我不知道如何

他甚至讓它變得性感！

Day Shift Knight:
You know, armor is surprisingly comfy.\!
But it would be nice to have a few more sets.

You know, something more stylish.\!
Another set that's more everyday, this one is

Maybe a night armor for sleeping, and a cozy

白班騎士：

你知道，更時尚的東西。 \！
另一套比較日常，這套是

她低頭看了一眼她繃緊的胸甲。

多一點喘息的空間可能會更好

Farm Volunteer:
You know, I've got all this wool I'm making

She gestures at her arms and legs.

Might as well make my own clothes!

Or at least get them made.

Do you think you'd be able to help me put

passages.content_zh:
農場志工：
你知道，我正在製作所有這些羊毛

她指著自己的手臂和腿。

我想，嘿，不使用它真是浪費。 \！
還不如自己做衣服呢！

或至少把它們製作出來。

你認為你能幫我把
一起做某事？

passages.name: Tailor Real — Above tailor — p8
passages.content:
Store Customer:
I'm all ready to exercise again now that

...But the new sports bra I got here isn't

How much can you reinforce it?
passages.content_zh:
店舖顧客：
我已經準備好再次鍛鍊了

....但是我這裡買的新運動胸罩不是
相當做得足夠了。 \！
你能強化到什麼程度呢？

passages.name: Tailor Real — Above tailor — p9
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
I love it!\!
Now do the rest of my wardrobe!
passages.content_zh:
農場志工：
我喜歡它！ \！
現在就開始整理我衣櫃裡剩下的東西吧！

passages.name: Tailor Real — Seats — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
...Do you think he can make shirts less

passages.content_zh:
客戶：
……你覺得他可以少穿襯衫嗎
也透明？

passages.name: Tailor Real — Seats — p2
passages.content:
She's talking softly to herself.

Customer:
Just...\!
Don't breathe too hard.

You can do this.

Shallow breaths.

This is your last shirt, you don't want to lose
any more buttons.

Just shallow breaths until you can get some
repairs.
passages.content_zh:
她輕聲自言自語。

客戶：
只是...\！
呼吸不要太用力。

你可以這樣做。

淺淺的呼吸。

這是你的最後一件襯衫，你不想失去
還有更多按鈕。

只是淺呼吸，直到你能得到一些
修理。

passages.name: Tailor Real — Seats — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
Hmm.

If I breathe deeply enough, do you think I
can get a button all the way across the room?

I'm getting this shirt repaired anyway, may
as well have some fun!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
嗯。

如果我呼吸夠深，你認為我
可以在整個房間找到一個按鈕嗎？

無論如何，我要把這件襯衫修好，可以嗎？
以及玩得開心！

passages.name: Tailor Real — Line — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
This was supposed to be such a cute outfit!\!
Nice slim lines!

What happened?!

Customer:
I hope he can help...
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
這本來應該是一件非常可愛的衣服！ \！
線條優美纖細！

發生了什麼事？ ！

客戶：
我希望他能幫忙...

passages.name: Tailor Real — Line — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
Pfft, imagine wearing something with
*buttons*.\!
Amateurs.

No, you want something stylish like this.

She stretches happily, thrusting her massive
chest forward.

Lots of slack, lots of room for adjustment,
and it looks great!

No, this outfit is perfect.\!
I'm just here to see if he can patch a hole
in my favorite pants.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
噗，想像一下穿些東西
*按鈕*.\!
業餘愛好者。

不，你想要這樣時尚的東西。

她高興地伸展身體，推著她巨大的
胸部向前。

寬鬆度大，調整空間大，
看起來很棒！

不，這套衣服很完美。 \!
我只是來看看他是否能修補一個漏洞
穿著我最喜歡的褲子。

passages.name: Tailor Real — Hiding — p2
passages.content:
A customer is hiding behind one of the
dress dummies.

Customer:
Isn't he available yet?!

She peeks out.

Oh, why did this have to be the day he's so
busy!?\!
I'm having a clothing emergency here!

She pulls herself back behind the display.
passages.content_zh:
一位顾客躲在其中一个后面
穿著假人。

客戶：
他還來不及嗎？ ！

她向外張望。

噢，为什么他一定要在这一天
忙！ ？ \！
我这里有一件衣服紧急情况！

她把自己拉回到显示器后面。

passages.name: Tailor Real — Line — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
No, no, respecting the line is important.

I'll just keep standing here like this, I guess.

(Why did it have to be so busy today?)
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
不不不，尊重路線很重要。

我想我會一直這樣站在這裡。

（今天怎麼這麼忙？）

passages.name: Tailor Real — Line — p2
passages.content:
She's examining herself in a mirror.

Customer:
So,\! uh,\! how much can tailors repair?
passages.content_zh:
她正在照鏡子檢查自己。

客戶：
所以，\!呃，\！裁縫店能修多少錢？

passages.name: Tailor Real — Line — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
Ah!

You dodge as a flying button nearly hits you
in the eye.\!
It joins piles of lost buttons littered all over
the floor.

Customer:
Sorry! So sorry!

She tries to cover up.

Customer:
(If only my bra hadn't burst too on the way
over!)
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
啊！

當飛行按鈕差點擊中你時你躲開了
在眼睛裡。 \！
它與散落各處的成堆失落的紐扣相連
地板。

客戶：
抱歉！非常抱歉！

她試圖掩蓋。

客戶：
（如果我的胸罩在路上沒有爆掉就好了
結束了！ ）

passages.name: Tailor Real — Finished — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
This guy does amazing work!

My shirt completely tore itself apart!\!
My favorite shirt!

And look! He made it wearable again!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
這傢伙做得很好！

我的襯衫完全撕裂了！ \！
我最喜歡的襯衫！

看！他又讓它變得可穿戴了！

passages.name: Tailor Real — Finished — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
What a miracle worker!

I don't know how he did it, but he added so
much space in the chest to this!\!
It fits like a glove!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
多麼神奇的創造者！

我不知道他是怎麼做到的，但他補充道
胸部空間很大！ \！
它像手套一樣合身！

passages.name: Tailor Real — Loom — p2
passages.content:
Several bolts of brightly dyed wool sit next
to a spinning wheel.
passages.content_zh:
旁邊放著幾匹顏色鮮豔的羊毛
到紡車。

passages.name: Tailor Real — Anvil — p2
passages.content:
An anvil. A small stack of papers next to it
are filled with armor designs.
passages.content_zh:
一個鐵砧。旁邊有一小疊文件
充滿了裝甲設計。

passages.name: Tailor ARG — Spider — p2
passages.content:
Spider Woman:
I wouldn't mind getting her in my web♥
passages.content_zh:
蜘蛛女：
我不介意让她进入我的网♥

passages.name: Tailor ARG — Spider — p3
passages.content:
Spider Woman:
He spins a cocoon of thread around
those orbs better than any spider could.

Ah, I just love to watch him work his magic.
passages.content_zh:
蜘蛛女：
他用線紡成繭
這些球比任何蜘蛛都好。

啊，我就是喜歡看他施展魔法。

passages.name: Tailor ARG — Spider — p4
passages.content:
Spider Woman:
Such creativity! Such adaptability!\!
I wonder what he could make for me ♥
passages.content_zh:
蜘蛛女：
這麼有創意！如此的適應性！ \！
我想知道他能為我做什麼♥

passages.name: Tailor ARG — Spider — p5
passages.content:
Spider Woman:
Metal too?\!
Does his skill know no bounds?
passages.content_zh:
蜘蛛女：
金屬也是？ \!
難道他的技藝是無止境的嗎？

passages.name: Floor 2 ARG 2 after — Animal control boss — p2
passages.content:
Animal Control Boss:
Alright men! We have our target cornered!

This time we are ready! \!
We are prepared!\!
We are-

One of the officers looks behind their boss,
then raises a hand.\!
The boss sighs.

Animal Control Boss:
And she just ran away, didn't she.

Animal Control:
Sir!\!
Straight up the stairs sir!

Animal Control Boss:
Of course she did.\!
Well, she's still trapped.

We'll corner the two of them on the roof if
we have to!

Jones! Get in touch with HQ!\!
Call *everyone* in.\!
We're ending this!

They all run up the stairs.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Oh nyo, again?\!
We...\! We should follow them.

She gives a tired 'nya', then heads up the
stairs.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制主管：
好吧，夥計們！我們的目標已被逼入絕境！

這次我們準備好了！ \！
我們準備好了！ \!
我們是——

一名警官看著老闆的身後，
然後舉起手。 \!
老闆嘆了口氣。

動物管制主管：
然後她就逃跑了，不是嗎？

動物管制：
先生！ \!
先生，直接上樓梯吧！

動物管制主管：
她當然做到了。 \!
好吧，她還是被困住了。

如果的話我們就把他們兩個逼到屋頂上
我們必須這樣做！

瓊斯！與總部聯繫！ \!
叫*每個人*進來。 \!
我們要結束這一切了！

他們都跑上樓梯。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
噢，又來了？ \！
我們...\！我們應該跟隨他們。

她疲倦地「nya」了一聲，然後抬頭
樓梯。

passages.name: Floor 2 ARG 2 after — Rampage - clothes 2 — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
What hit me...

The officer holds up a hand when you
approach with a potion.

Animal Control:
Wait, stop.\!
I've been watching.\!
I get how this goes.

You nod and start to put the potion away.

Animal Control:
No, wait!
Don't-

He winces and rubs his leg.

Animal Control:
Don't leave me hurt like this.\!
It's just...

Animal Control:
I'm sitting in what, the petite section?\!
"For the extra tiny and weak"?\!
Yeah, no thanks.

Just, give me a minute.

He limps across the aisle, groaning the whole
way.

Animal Control:
Come on, there's no way I want to stay hurt
like this.

Animal Control:
Yeah, here we go, Big and Bulky department.\!
Just what I'm looking for.\!
I'm gonna be HUGE.

You hand over the potion.\!
He chugs it.

There is a brief silence.\!
There is a loud ripping noise.

A sudden surge of muscles tears out through
his clothes and rips parts of them to shreds.

Animal Control:
Ah yeah, look at these babies.

She kisses her arms.

That's the stuff!

Animal Control:
Now let's get back to catching that cat.\!
No animal's gonna be able to escape
me now!

She heads off.

That's the last of them. You should go talk
to the animal control boss again.
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
是什麼擊中了我...

當你時，官員會舉起一隻手
用藥水接近。

動物管制：
等等，停下來。 \!
我一直在看。 \!
我明白這是怎麼回事。

你點點頭，開始收起藥水。

動物管制：
不，等等！
別-

他皺起眉頭，揉著腿。

動物管制：
不要讓我這樣受傷。 \!
這只是...

動物管制：
我坐在什麼，嬌小的區域？ \！
“對於特別弱小”？ \！
是的，不用了，謝謝。

只是，請給我一分鐘。

他一跛一跛地穿過走道，整個人都在呻吟
方式。

動物管制：
來吧，我不想繼續受傷
像這樣。

動物管制：
是的，我們開始了，又大又笨重的部門。 \！
正是我正在尋找的。 \!
我會變得巨大。

你把藥水交出來。 \!
他咕咕地喝著。

一陣短暫的沉默。 \!
有很大的撕裂聲。

突然爆發的肌肉撕裂
他的衣服並將其部分撕成碎片。

動物管制：
啊，是的，看看這些嬰兒。

她親吻她的手臂。

就是這樣的東西！

動物管制：
現在讓我們繼續抓那隻貓。 \！
沒有動物能夠逃脫
我現在！

她走開了。

這是他們中的最後一個。你應該去談談
再次向動物控制老闆求助。

passages.name: Floor 2 ARG 2 after — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
Once more, you arrive to find the boss of
animal control lying groaning on the floor.

Animal Control Boss:
Urgh...

The lovely spirit hikes in, grumbling.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
I'm here *pant*, I'm here nya.

I sensed *anyather* group of poor warriors
in need of love and justice!

And I totally can do this, nya.\!
Just,\.\. just give me a moment to catch my
breath.

She leans on her knees for a moment,
breathing heavily.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Is this normal?\!
Are things always this busy?

\n[2]:
You get used to it eventually!

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Okay, here's the plan, nya.

I've got maybe one more Magical Lovely Love
Power in me.\!
It should be enough to heal this poor warrior.

Then you go heal the other five I sense, while
I go around the corner and take a *nap*.

For love and justice.

She starts to lead you through the dance,
then frowns.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
I'm... nyat sure how much power I can put
into this.\!
You're going to need to get closer.

You inch forward.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
No, no, closer, nya!\!
Right up against the poor warrior!

You move forward again.

She motions you to continue.

Again.\!
And again.

Until you're practically shoving your chest
in the chief's face.\!
Thankfully they still seem too out of it to
notice.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Let's go, nya!

She leads you through the dance again.\!
It's harder this time, having to be careful to
not step on the chief, or slap him in the face
with your jiggling boobs.

She leads you through the dance again.\!
It's harder this time, having to be careful to
not step on the chief.

But finally...

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Magical Lovely *pant* Love Power!

She throws out her hands, then collapses with
a groan.

You throw your hands out.\!
A wave of power washes out of you.

And this time goes barely six inches.\!
Still, that's enough to work.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Be healed!

Several but
passages.content_zh:
再一次，你到達找到老闆
動物管制中心躺在地板上呻吟。

動物管制主管：
呃…

可愛的精靈爬了進來，咕噥著。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
我在這裡*喘氣*，我在這裡nya。

我感覺到*任何*一群可憐的戰士
需要愛和正義！

我完全可以做到這一點，nya。 \！
只是，\。 \。給我一點時間來抓住我的
呼吸。

她靠在膝上片刻，
呼吸粗重。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
這樣正常嗎？ \!
事情總是這麼忙嗎？

\n[2]:
你最終會習慣的！

愛與正義的可愛精神：
好吧，這就是計劃，nya。

我也許還有一份神奇的可愛的愛
力量在我體內。 \!
應該足以治癒這個可憐的戰士了。

然後你去治愈另外五個我感覺到的同時
我繞過街角，小睡了一會兒。

為了愛和正義。

她開始帶領你跳舞，
然後皺起眉頭。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
我……很確定我能投入多少力量
進入這個。 \!
你需要靠近一點。

你向前一英寸。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
不，不，再近一點，喵！ \！
對抗可憐的戰士！

你又向前邁進了。

她示意你繼續。

再次。 \！
又來了。

直到你幾乎挺起胸膛
當著酋長的面。 \！
值得慶幸的是，他們似乎仍然太不適應了
注意。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
我們走吧，nya！

她再次帶領你跳完舞。 \！
這次比較難，必須小心
不可以踩酋長，也不可以打他的臉
和你晃動的胸部。

她再次帶領你跳完舞。 \！
這次比較難，必須小心
不踩酋長。

但最後...

愛與正義的可愛精神：
神奇可愛*褲子*愛的力量！

她伸出雙手，然後倒在地上
一聲呻吟。

你把手伸出來。 \!
一股力量從你身上沖走。

這次僅僅只有六吋。 \！
不過，這已經足夠工作了。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
痊癒吧！

幾個但是

passages.name: Floor 2 ARG 2 after — Magical love spirit — p1
passages.content:
The lovely spirit is curled up here.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Five more minutes.

\v[23] more hurt warriors.
passages.content_zh:
可愛的精靈就蜷縮在這裡。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
還有五分鐘。

\v[23]更多受傷的戰士。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After 2 — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
An animal control officer lies on the ground
groaning, covered in mecha action figures.

You apply the potion.

A single click comes from the pile.

Then more, and more, as if something is
assembling itself.

And then the whole pile stands up.

Animal Control:
Huh.\!
Well, at least I'm armed for any situation now.

She experimentally tenses certain muscles.
Foam darts fly out of her guns.

Animal Control:
...Or maybe not.

She shrugs, then clomps off upstairs.
passages.content_zh:
一名動物管制官員躺在地上
呻吟聲，被機甲動作人偶覆蓋。

你塗上藥水。

一堆咔噠聲傳來。

然後越來越多，好像有什麼東西
自行組裝。

然後整堆東西都站起來了。

動物管制：
呵呵。 \!
好吧，至少我現在已經做好了應對任何情況的準備。

她實驗性地拉緊某些肌肉。
泡沫飛鏢從她的槍中飛出。

動物管制：
……或者也許不是。

她聳聳肩，然後以沉重的步伐上樓了。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After 2 — Kyle — p1
passages.content:
Kyle:
They said yes!\!
I can't believe they said yes!

Kyle:
Rose and Lily...\!
I'm so happy!\!
I want to celebrate!

And that means presents. Presents to show
everyone just how much they mean to me.

But I can't get Rose and Lily another present,
we just got them one.

I- I don't want to come off as weird. Or too
clingy.

But Darren! He's been there for me through
so much!\!
He deserves a present too!

Kyle:
That's what I'm here for!\!
He loves his model kits.

Cars, spaceships, whatever.\!
But what he really loves is robots. \!
I thought he had everything, but this place
has a dozen things I've never seen before.

He picks a box off the shelf.

Kyle:
Look at this!\!
It's not just a robot, it moves! It lights up!

Kyle:
He's going to love this so much!

He happily walks out.
passages.content_zh:
凱爾：
他們說是的！ \！
我不敢相信他們說是！

凱爾：
蘿絲和莉莉…\！
我太高興了！ \！
我想慶祝一下！

這意味著禮物。展示的禮物
每個人都知道他們對我有多重要。

但我不能再給羅絲和莉莉送禮物了
我們剛剛得到了他們的一個。

我——我不想顯得很奇怪。或者也是
黏人的。

但是達倫！他一直在我身邊
這麼多！ \！
他也值得一份禮物！

凱爾：
這就是我來這裡的目的！ \！
他喜歡他的模型套件。

汽車、太空船等等。 \！
但他真正喜歡的是機器人。 \！
我以為他擁有一切，但這個地方
有十幾個我從未見過的東西。

他從架子上拿起一個盒子。

凱爾：
看看這個！ \!
它不只是一個機器人，它還會移動！它亮了！

凱爾：
他一定會非常喜歡這個！

他高興地走了出去。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After 2
passages.content: Adult Toys and Games
passages.content_zh: 成人玩具和遊戲

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After 2 — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
As you enter the floor you see Kyle and
Darren looking at a battery display.

Kyle:
You said there was something here you
thought I'd like?

Darren:
Yeah.

He picks up one of the larger batteries and
holds it out to her.\!
She takes it.

Kyle:
Batteries for a robot...\!
It makes sense these might do something
for me?

Like how Rose and Lily have really gotten
into compost.

She turns it around in her hands.

Kyle:
But how to use it?

She stares at it for a moment.

Kyle:
Electricity is kind of robot food, right?

She licks the end.

Kyle:
Huh.\!
Weird, but not too bad?

Darren mumbles something.

Kyle:
What was that?

Darren:
I, uh, think there's a better way to use it.

Kyle:
Huh?

Darren:
Well, there's these icons...

He turns around and searches through
another display.\|
He picks up a toy.

Darren:
See here?

He holds it out to her.

Darren:
There's some little symbols showing you
what types of batteries to use, where to place
them, all that.

Kyle:
Ok, so?

Darren blushes.

Kyle:
Wait.\!
Wait.

She grabs his shoulders and stares into his
eyes.

Kyle:
Darren, where did you see these symbols?

You didn't...

Darren coughs awkwardly.

Darren:
Yeah.\!
While I was \}eating you out\{...

Darren:
\}Right above...

Kyle stares down at herself.

They both look back at the battery display.

Darren:
It said one D-cell...

Kyle:
Well...

She grabs a pack of batteries and Darren's
arm.\!
And blushes a pale blue.

Kyle:
Come on.\!
\}If I'm getting the D then you're going to be
the one putting it in me.

They head off to the register.
passages.content_zh:
當你進入樓層時，你會看到凱爾和
達倫看著電池顯示器。

凱爾：
你說這裡有東西
我想我願意嗎？

達倫：
是的。

他拿起一顆較大的電池，然後
把它遞給她。 \！
她接受了。

凱爾：
機器人電池...\!
這是有道理的，這些可能會做一些事情
對我來說？

就像羅絲和莉莉真正得到的那樣
進入堆肥。

她把它在手裡轉了轉。

凱爾：
但如何使用呢？

她盯著它看了一會兒。

凱爾：
電是一種機器人食物，對嗎？

她舔了舔末端。

凱爾：
呵呵。 \!
很奇怪，但也不算太糟？

達倫咕噥著什麼。

凱爾：
那是什麼？

達倫：
我，呃，認為有更好的方法來使用它。

凱爾：
啊？

達倫：
嗯，有這些圖示...

他轉身尋找
另一個顯示器。 \|
他拿起一個玩具。

達倫：
看到這裡了嗎？

他把它遞給她。

達倫：
有一些小符號告訴你
使用什麼類型的電池，放置在哪裡
他們，所有這些。

凱爾：
好吧，那麼？

達倫臉紅了。

凱爾：
等等。 \!
等待。

她抓住他的肩膀，凝視著他
眼睛。

凱爾：
達倫，你在哪裡看到這些符號的？

你沒有...

達倫尷尬地咳了一聲。

達倫：
是啊。 \!
當我\}出去吃你的時候\{...

達倫：
\}就在上面...

凱爾低頭看著自己。

他們都回頭看向電池顯示器。

達倫：
上面說一個D細胞...

凱爾：
嗯...

她抓起一包電池和達倫的
手臂。 \!
並呈現淡藍色的臉紅。

凱爾：
來吧。 \!
\}如果我得到 D 那麼你就會
那個把它放進我體內的人。

他們前往收銀台。

passages.name: Floor 4 Real After 2 — Clerk
passages.content:
Store Employee:
You know what, I'm keeping the adult section
closed for now.

I don't want anyone wearing anything there
up to the register, and I *definitely* don't
want them to try to show me that it fits.
passages.content_zh:
店員：
你知道嗎，我保留成人部分
暫時關閉。

我不希望任何人在那裡穿著任何東西
到登記處，我*絕對*不
希望他們嘗試向我展示它是否合適。

passages.name: Floor 5 Real after
passages.content: \{Furniture and Housewares
passages.content_zh: \{家具和家庭用品

passages.name: Floor 5 Real after — Cashier — p1
passages.content:
Store Employee:
I'm just glad it's been quiet up here.

All the customers are down at the clothing
sale.
passages.content_zh:
店員：
我很高興這裡一直很安靜。

所有的顧客都在看衣服
銷售。

passages.name: Floor 5 Real after — Cashier — p2
passages.content:
Store Employee:
Can I help you?

You open your mouth to reply.\!
And then realize that you have no way to
phrase your request in a remotely sane
manner.

You're looking for a magic extension to your
apartment, one that doesn't take up any
space.

Except most people probably can't even see
it, much less interact with it.\!
And you're here because a character in a
video game suggested it.

That is a long chain of ridiculous-sounding
assertions. \!
You do your best.

Store Employee:
\..\..\..So you're looking for magic space in
a box.

Something that works without construction,
without even touching your neighbors.

Just, *poof* and your apartment is bigger?\!
That's really what you're looking for?

Reluctantly you nod.

Store Employee:
\..\..\..We just got in a shipment.

None of us have been able to make it do
anything, but it sounds like that's also what
you're looking for?

// Set to 2 if the player buys the upgrade, 1 if they don't.

// Check if they bought more than one, refund if so.

They reach under the counter for your order,
then pause.

Store Employee:
Sorry, it looks like, somehow, we've only got
one left.\!
I'll give you back the rest of your money.

Store Employee:
We've been getting a lot of weird stuff in,
we might have more things like that if you
check back later.
passages.content_zh:
店員：
我可以幫你嗎？

你張開嘴來回答。 \!
然後意識到你沒有辦法
用一種遠程理智的方式表達你的請求
方式。

您正在尋找一個神奇的擴展您的
公寓，一間不佔用任何空間的公寓
空間。

除了大多數人可能看不到
它，更不用說與它互動了。 \！
你來這裡是因為一個角色
視頻遊戲建議了它。

這是一長串聽起來很可笑的鏈條
斷言。 \！
你盡力而為。

店員：
\..\..\..所以你正在尋找魔法空間
一個盒子。

無需建造即可工作的東西，
甚至不碰你的鄰居。

只是，*噗*，你的公寓更大了？ \！
這真的是您要找的嗎？

你無奈地點點頭。

店員：
\..\..\..我們剛剛收到一批貨。

我們都沒能做到
任何事情，但聽起來這也是
你在找什麼？

// 如果玩家購買升級則設定為 2，如果不購買則設定為 1。

// 檢查他們是否購買了不只一件，如果是則退款。

他們把手伸到櫃檯下面拿你點的菜，
然後暫停。

店員：
抱歉，不知何故，我們似乎只有
還剩一張。 \!
我會把剩下的錢還給你。

店員：
我們收到了很多奇怪的東西
如果你的話我們可能會有更多類似的事情
請稍後再回來查看。

passages.name: Floor 5 Real after — Cashier — p3
passages.content:
Store Employee:
Welcome back.

// Set to 2 if the player buys the upgrade, 1 if they don't.

Store Employee:
We've been getting a lot of weird stuff in,
we might have more things like that if you
check back later.
passages.content_zh:
店員：
歡迎回來。

// 如果玩家購買升級則設定為 2，如果不購買則設定為 1。

店員：
我們收到了很多奇怪的東西
如果你的話我們可能會有更多類似的事情
請稍後再回來查看。

passages.name: Floor 5 Real after — Cashier — p4
passages.content:
Store Employee:
Any luck with that apartment thing?

We've been getting a lot of weird stuff in,
we might have more things like that if you
check back later.
passages.content_zh:
店員：
公寓那件事有運氣嗎？

我們收到了很多奇怪的東西
如果你的話我們可能會有更多類似的事情
請稍後再回來查看。

passages.name: Floor 5 Real after — Cashier — p5
passages.content:
Store Employee:
Hey, we just got in a new shipment of things.

They check a list.

Store Employee:
"*Poof* And Then There's Computers"?\!
Is this like a brand name or something?

Buy *Poof* And Then There's Computers
for 500 gold?

As soon as you buy the item it disappears with
a *poof*.

As advertised.

You guess there must be computers now?

Store Employee:
Doesn't look like you have enough money.
passages.content_zh:
店員：
嘿，我們剛剛收到一批新東西。

他們檢查一份清單。

店員：
「*噗*然後就有了電腦」？ \！
這是一個品牌名稱還是什麼？

買*噗*然後就有電腦了
500金幣？

一旦你購買了該物品，它就會消失
一*噗*。

正如廣告所宣傳的。

你猜現在一定有電腦了吧？

店員：
看來你錢不夠啊

passages.name: Floor 5 Real after
passages.content: Authorized Personnel Only
passages.content_zh: 僅限授權人員

passages.name: Floor 5 Real after — Animal control — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
Couch\..\..\.. too\..\..\.. comfy\..\..\..
No\..\..\.. energy\..\..\.. to move\..\..\..

Potion!

Animal Control:
Hydration\..\..\.. refreshed\..\..\..
Energy\..\..\.. growing\..\..\..
Motivation\..\..\.. restored!

Animal Control:
Hey, thanks!

She heads off upstairs.\!
...Then comes back and starts dragging the
couch with her.

Animal Control:
It's just too comfy!

passages.name: Roof — Carol and Honey event trigger — p1
passages.content:
You see Carol and Honey up ahead, sitting
on the edge of the roof holding hands.

Honey:
You were right, this is a great view.

She trails off uncertainly.

Carol:
Is zzzomething wrong?

Honey:
It's just.\..\..\..\..\..

She pauses, then blurts it out.

Honey:
How are you not *terrified*?!

Carol:
What?

Honey:
That all of this is going to go away!

She gestures wildly at everything.

Honey:
Look, we flew up here, and that was amazing!\!
But you should know how impossible that is!

When this all happened-

She gestures at herself.

Honey:
I was convinced it was all a dream!

At any moment I might wake up and be back
in my drab grey life.

But then things continued, and then I met you-

She glances up at Carol.

Honey:
And I started to think that maybe it wasn't.

But it's been so good-\.\.
You've been so good-\.\.
That now I'm terrified it is a dream!

That these things can't happen for real.\!
That it is impossible to fly!

That any moment I could wake up back as my
old dull self, back in my drab grey life...

She starts to sniffle.

Honey:
And, and, never have met you...\!
Never ever meet you again...

She's sobbing now, as Carol pulls her into a
hug.

Carol:
Oh Honey...\!
Honey Honey Honey...

Carol:
(Think Carol, think!)\!
(What would a beeologist zzay?)\!
(What would a bee zzzay?!)

Carol takes a deep breath.

Carol:
I can't guarantee this izzn't a dream.\!
Not even the beezz can tell for zzure.

But you know what I can guarantee?\!
That thizz will be a dream to *remember*.

She waves a hand out towards the city.

Carol:
Zzat we are going to do zzo much, be zzo
great, that it will burn itself into your brain!

Maybe you will wake up and everything will be
back to before!

But we are going to have such a good time
that you'll zztill have zzomething to carry you
forwardzz!

Honey's sobs slow as she looks up at Carol
with dawning hope.

Honey:
Really?

Carol pulls her into a tight hug, bringing their
faces close together.

Carol:
Yezzz!

We can only do what we c
passages.content_zh:
你看到卡羅爾和哈妮坐在前面
在屋頂的邊緣，手牽手。

親愛的：
你說得對，這景色真美。

她的聲音變得不確定。

卡羅爾：
zzz有什麼問題嗎？

親愛的：
只是.\..\..\..\..\..

她停頓了一下，然後脫口而出。

親愛的：
你怎麼不*害怕*？ ！

卡羅爾：
什麼？

親愛的：
這一切都會消失！

她對一切都做出瘋狂的手勢。

親愛的：
看，我們飛到了這裡，太棒了！ \!
但你應該知道這是多麼不可能！

當這一切發生時——

她指著自己。

親愛的：
我確信這一切都是一場夢！

我隨時都可能醒來並回來
在我單調灰色的生活中。

但後來事情繼續發生，然後我遇見了你——

她抬頭看了一眼卡蘿。

親愛的：
我開始想也許事實並非如此。

但它已經很好了-\.\.
你真是太好了-\.\.
現在我很害怕這是一個夢！

這些事情不可能真正發生。 \！
那是不可能飛的！

任何時候我都可以醒來，成為我的
遲鈍的老自己，回到我單調灰色的生活…

她開始抽鼻子。

親愛的：
還有，還有，從來沒有見過你…\！
再也見不到你了...

當卡蘿把她拉進一個房間時，她現在正在抽泣。
擁抱。

卡羅爾：
哦親愛的...\！
親愛的親愛的親愛的...

卡羅爾：
（想想卡羅爾，想想！）\！
（蜜蜂學家札伊會怎樣？）！
（蜜蜂會叫什麼？！）

卡羅爾深吸一口氣。

卡羅爾：
我不能保證這不是夢。 \!
連 beezz 也分不清 zzure。

但你知道我能保證什麼嗎？ \！
那種興奮將是一個值得「記住」的夢想。

她向這座城市揮了揮手。

卡羅爾：
Zzat 我們要做很多 zzo，be zzo
太棒了，它會在你的大腦中燃燒！

也許你會醒來，一切都會好起來
回到以前！

但我們將會度過一段美好的時光
你將會有東西來支撐你
前進！

哈尼抬頭看著卡羅爾，慢慢地抽泣起來
帶著曙光的希望。

親愛的：
真的嗎？

卡蘿將她緊緊地抱在懷裡，帶著他們的
臉靠得很近。

卡羅爾：
耶茲！

我們只能做我們能做的事

passages.name: Roof — Carol and Honey event trigger — p2
passages.content:
Honey still looks a little sad, but she's smiling
up at Carol as the beegirl paints images of
elaborate dates.

Carol:
-and that's when we jump out of the zzkydiving
plane. We fly down, enjoying the view, and
when we land the fireworkzz go off...

You figure you shouldn't interrupt.
passages.content_zh:
親愛的看起來仍然有點悲傷，但她在微笑
當蜂女畫出圖像時，卡羅爾抬頭
詳細的日期。

卡羅爾：
-那就是我們跳出 zzkydiving 的時候
飛機。我們飛下來，欣賞風景，然後
當我們著陸時，煙火就響起了…

你認為你不應該打擾。

passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Wow, this is really\..\..\..
\C[5]Not as bad as we thought!

\C[30]We're going to need to figure out who
has the keys to the garden gates, of course.
\C[5]But a little weed pulling, some mowing,
and we'll be ready to replant!

Lily notices you.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[5]Here to help?
\C[30]Welcome!

Both:
\C[30]Thank \C[5]you!

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Today we're just taking stock and
cleaning up a little.
\C[5]Would you mind pulling some weeds?

\C[30]They're growing everywhere.
\C[5]Five should be enough for now!
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]哇，這真是\..\..\..
\C[5]沒有我們想像的那麼糟！

\C[30]我們需要找出誰
當然，有花園大門的鑰匙。
\C[5]但是拔一點雜草，割一些草，
我們就準備好重新種植了！

莉莉注意到你了。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[5]來幫忙嗎？
\C[30]歡迎！

兩者：
\C[30]謝謝\C[5]你！

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]今天我們只是盤點一下
清理一下。
\C[5]你介意拔一些雜草嗎？

\C[30]它們到處生長。
\C[5]現在五個應該就夠了！

passages.name: Garden 1 real — Rose and Lily — p2
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Thanks again for helping.
\C[5]Just let us know when you've got five
weeds!

Turn in five weeds?

Both:
\C[30]Thank \C[5]you!

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]It's a start.
\C[5]It's a start!

\C[30]Next is to get some grasscutting
services in, and then we can start planting!

\C[30]Please, take this with our thanks.
\C[5]There are still a few flowers left!

Gained pretty flower!

You decide to hold on to them for now.\!
Way to hoard all the weed, man!
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]再次感謝您的幫忙。
\C[5]當你有五個時請告訴我們
雜草！

上交五棵雜草？

兩者：
\C[30]謝謝\C[5]你！

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]這是一個開始。
\C[5]這是一個開始！

\C[30]下一步是割草
服務進去了，然後我們就可以開始種植了！

\C[30]請收下我們的謝意。
\C[5]還剩下幾朵花！

收穫了美麗的花朵！

你決定暫時保留它們。 \！
囤積所有雜草的方法，夥計！

passages.content:

passages.content:

Both:
Thanks again for helping!
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：

兩者：
再次感謝您的幫忙！

passages.name: Garden 1 ARG — Autoplay event
passages.content:
Last night...

Tim:
It's gone!\!
Carl, it's all gone!

Carl:
What?!

Carl:
No way!\!
Someone took all our weeds?!

Tim:
They're all gone!\!
All of them!

And we never even got a chance to figure out
which kind of weed is the good kind!

Carl:
Why would someone DO that?!

Tim:
I dunno man.\!
I dunno.

Carl:
I wish\..\..\..
I wish\..\..\..

I wish this garden was ours! To do as we
wanted!

Tim:
Yeah! And that we could grow as much weeds
as we wanted!

Carl:
Yeah!

Tim:
...Uh, what was that noise?
passages.content_zh:
昨晚...

提姆：
不見了！ \!
卡爾，一切都過去了！

卡爾：
什麼？ ！

卡爾：
沒辦法！ \!
有人拿走了我們所有的雜草？ ！

提姆：
他們都走了！ \！
他們全部！

而我們甚至沒有機會去弄清楚
什麼樣的雜草才是好雜草！

卡爾：
為什麼有人要這樣做？

提姆：
我不知道夥計。 \！
我不知道。

卡爾：
我希望\..\..\..
我希望\..\..\..

我希望這個花園是我們的！像我們一樣做
想要！

提姆：
是啊！我們可以種植盡可能多的雜草
如我們所願！

卡爾：
是啊！

提姆：
……呃，那是什麼聲音？

Reading and waiting sir!\!

passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
閱讀並等待先生！ \！
在此之後，允許去購物
請問？

passages.name: Roof ARG — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control:
I don't know what to do here, we don't handle
horses!
passages.content_zh:
動物管制：
我不知道在這裡做什麼，我們不處理
馬！

passages.name: Roof ARG — p1
passages.content:
The animal control officer is trying to ward
off an overly affectionate cow.\!
She keeps pushing it back as it tries to give
her big enthusiastic licks.

Animal Control:
Back, back!\!
I think I preferred the headbuts!
passages.content_zh:
動物管制官員正在努力保護
擺脫一頭過於深情的牛。 \！
當它試圖給予時，她不斷地推回它
她熱情的大舔。

動物管制：
回來，回來！ \！
我想我更喜歡頭撞！

passages.name: Roof ARG — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
Animal Control Boss:
Alright men! Form up!

Now men, you are here because-

Someone raises a hand.

Animal Control Boss:
Yes?

Animal Control:
Sir!\!
Should you really be calling us men? I mean,
look at us!

There's a thoughtful murmur as everyone
looks around.

Animal Control Boss:
Of course! I don't call you men because you
have the BODY of men but because you have
the HEART of men, the SOUL of-

Another hand goes up.

Animal Control Boss:
Yes?

Animal Control:
Sir! I'm pretty sure I don't have the heart
*or* soul of a man!

Animal Control:
I don't think I do either?

Animal Control:
(I've got your boyfriend's heart and soul!)

Animal Control:
(Shush. Also, no you don't.)

Animal Control Boss:
Huh.\!
Well then, what do you want to be called?

The animal control officers huddle up.

Animal controllers?

Too long. Recruits?

I've been here way too long for that. Should
we just go with "women"?

I'm not sure I'm one of those *either*...

Maybe boss should call *us* sir for a change!

What about officers?

Huh, I like that one.

Yeah, at least I'm pretty sure I'm one of those.

They turn back to their boss.

Animal Control:
Sir!\!
(Ma'am?)\!
We'd like to be called officers, sir!

Animal Control Boss:
Noted officer!

Now officers, to get back to our mission, we
are here to put an end to this chaos!\!
Behind me are our two targets, trapped!

They cannot escape anymore!\!
Steal your hearts, officiers, for we shall...

She continues her rousing speech as the lovely
spirit turns to you.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Oh no!\!
Nyo!

They-\. they can't do this again!\!
I can't bear another round of healing!

She chases her tails for a moment in worry.

Oh, we have to stop them nya!

She focuses, breathing heavily.

Slowly, as she builds more and more energy,
an image begins to waver into view between
the shelter heads and animal control, visible
even without your glasses.

Lovely Spirit of Love and Justice:
Please!\!
You can't do this, nya!

I can't take it anymyore!
passages.content_zh:
動物管制主管：
好吧，夥計們！形成！

現在，夥計們，你們在這裡是因為——

有人舉手。

動物管制主管：
是嗎？

動物管制：
先生！ \!
你真的應該稱我們為男人嗎？我的意思是，
看看我們！

每個人都發出若有所思的低語
環顧四周。

動物管制主管：
當然！我不稱你們為男人，因為你們
擁有男人的身體，但因為你有
男人的心，男人的靈魂—

另一隻手也舉了起來。

動物管制主管：
是嗎？

動物管制：
先生！我很確定我沒有那個心
*或*一個人的靈魂！

動物管制：
我想我也不會吧？

動物管制：
（我已經得到你男朋友的心和靈魂了！）

動物管制：
（噓。另外，不，你不知道。）

動物管制主管：
呵呵。 \!
那麼，你想被稱為什麼？

動物管理官員擠在一起。

動物管制者？

太長了。新兵？

我已經在這裡待太久了。應該
我們只是跟「女人」一起去嗎？

我不確定我是其中之一*或*...

也許老闆應該打電話給*我們*先生來改變一下！

官員們呢？

呵呵，我喜歡那個。

是的，至少我很確定我是其中之一。

他們轉向他們的老闆。

動物管制：
先生！ \!
（女士？）\！
我們希望被稱為軍官，先生！

動物管制主管：
著名軍官！

現在，軍官們，為了回到我們的使命，我們
我們來這裡是為了結束這種混亂！ \！
我身後是我們的兩個目標，被困住了！

他們已經逃不掉了！ \!
偷走你們的心，軍官們，因為我們將...

她繼續她激動人心的演講，飾演可愛的
精神轉向你。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
哦不！ \！
喲！

他們-\。他們不能再這樣做了！ \！
我無法再承受新一輪的治療！

她擔心地追著尾巴。

哦，我們必須阻止他們呀！

她集中註意力，呼吸粗重。

慢慢地，隨著她的能量越來越多，
影像開始在之間晃動進入視野
庇護所負責人和動物管制中心，可見
即使沒有戴眼鏡。

愛與正義的可愛精神：
請！ \！
你不能這樣做，喵！

我再也受不了了！

passages.name: Bank 2 real
passages.content:
The table has a stack of informative
pamphlets.

Giving All Your Money To A Dragon:
The Bold New Investment Strategy!
passages.content_zh:
桌子上有一堆訊息
小冊子。

把你所有的錢都給龍：
大膽的新投資策略！

passages.name: Bank 2 real
passages.content: TREASURY

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Dragon fight — p1
passages.content:
Assistant Dragon:
Hahaha! Yes!

Gold! Finally, gold!

This is exactly what I wanted!

She flops onto the pile of gold and starts
wriggling happily.

Vice Princess:
You monster!\!
You won't get away with this!

You'll be sorry when my knight finally arrives
to rescue me!

Assistant Dragon:
Your knight has abandoned you!\!
And now the gold is all mine!

She picks up a handful of coins and happily
pours them on herself.

Vice Princess:
You say that, but lo! Is that my knight I hear
approaching?

They both turn to you.

Assistant Dragon:
Who the heck is that?

Vice Princess:
A savior!

Please, gracious lady, please! Won't you save me from
this hideous beast?

Please, noble sir, please! Won't you save me from
this hideous beast?

Before you can get a word out, the dragon
jumps at you.

Assistant Dragon:
Fools! You have no chance!

Defeated, the assistant dragon stumbles
backwards.

Assistant Dragon:
Ugh...

The cell in the back unlocks.

Vice Princess:
That was good for a first try!

She pulls a clipboard out from somewhere
in her dress.

Vice Princess:
Now, I took a few notes.\!
Let's review.

She looks up from the clipboard.

Vice Princess:
Now, before we start, I want to let you know
that it's always difficult to take on new job
responsibilities.

Especially when they've been sprung on you
as suddenly as this one.

And "be a menacing monster" is defintely an
unusual task to be assigned by corporate.\!
So I really appreciate the enthusiasm with
which you've approached it.

She looks back to her clipboard.

With that said, I do think you need to add a
bit more rage to your presentation. More
roaring and general monsterness would really
help sell the whole dragon act.

She scans down the clipboard.

Let's see, that was the main point...

I'll need to check in at the front to see why
Kacie never showed up...

I'm glad we finally got you the chance to "swim
in a pile of gold", I know that's been your
professional development goal for the past
several years...

She looks
passages.content_zh:
輔助龍：
哈哈哈！是的！

金子！最後，黃金！

這正是我想要的！

她撲倒在金子堆上並開始
快樂地扭動著。

副公主：
你這個怪物！ \!
你不會逃脫這個懲罰的！

當我的騎士終於到來時你會後悔的
來救我！

輔助龍：
你的騎士拋棄你了！ \！
現在金子都是我的了！

她高興地拿起一把硬幣
把它們倒在自己身上。

副公主：
你這麼說，但是瞧！我聽到的是我的騎士嗎
接近？

他們都轉向你。

輔助龍：
那到底是誰？

副公主：
救世主！

拜託了，善良的女士，拜託了！難道你不救我脫離
這可怕的野獸？

拜託了，尊貴的先生，拜託了！難道你不救我脫離
這可怕的野獸？

還沒等你開口說話，龍
向你跳來。

輔助龍：
傻瓜！你沒有機會！

敗了，副龍絆倒
向後。

輔助龍：
呃...

後面的牢房解鎖。

副公主：
這對於第一次嘗試來說很好！

她從某處拿出一個剪貼板
在她的衣服裡。

副公主：
現在，我做了一些筆記。 \！
我們來回顧一下。

她從剪貼板上抬起頭。

副公主：
現在，在我們開始之前，我想讓你知道
接受新工作總是很困難
責任。

尤其是當它們撲向你時
就像這一次一樣突然。

而「成為一個來勢洶洶的怪物」絕對是個
公司分配的不尋常任務。 \!
所以我真的很感激大家的熱情
你已經接近它了。

她回頭看著她的剪貼板。

話雖如此，我確實認為你需要添加一個
對你的演講更加憤怒。更多
咆哮和一般的怪物真的會
幫忙推銷整個龍的行為。

她掃視剪貼簿。

讓我們看看，這就是重點...

我需要去前台登記一下，看看為什麼
凱西始終沒有出現…

我很高興我們終於給你機會“游泳”
在一堆金子裡”，我知道那是你的
過去的職涯發展目標
幾年...

她看起來

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Dragon fight — p3
passages.content:
You walk in to see the employees lounging on
piles of gold and chatting.

Day-Shift Knight:
It's okay Liz, I'm sure there are plenty of
knights out there who would love to fight a
powerful, attractive dragon like you.

Assistant Dragon:
Easy for you to say.\!
Where do I even start looking?

The knight thinks for a moment.

Day-Shift Knight:
Have you considered online dating?/!
Or maybe a ren faire?

Assistant Dragon:
Huh.

She pulls out her phone and starts doing some
searches.

While she searches, the knight is shifting
uncomfortably on her pile of gold.

Day-Shift Knight:
How are you so comfortable, anyway?\!
I think this gold pile is one of the worst things
I've ever sat on!

She shifts again.\!
The pile collapses, sending her sliding to the
floor in a wave of coins.

Day-Shift Knight:
Ugh.

Assistant Dragon:
Hmm, how to explain it...

She shifts around on her pile of gold, somehow
not dislodging a single coin.

Assistant Dragon:
Here, let's try this.

She picks up a single coin and hands it to
the knight.

Here, hold this in your hands and close your
eyes.

Now, focus on the coin.\!
Feel how it slowly warms in your hands?

As it warms, feel how it feels less and less
foreign.\!
It is accepting your warmth, and your hands
are accepting it.

Feel how your flesh molds itself to the coin.\!
Feel how the coin molds itself to you.

You and the coin are one.\!
You give yourself to it, and it gives itself to
you.\!
This is how a hoard is made.

You see the knight's hands glow faintly gold
for a moment.

Assistant Dragon:
Good, good!\!
Now, to make things comfortable, just do that
with the rest of your pile.

The knight puts her hands down on the pile
around her.

Assistant Dragon:
Yes...

Focus...

Let the gold speak to you...

You see the pile of gold start to glow.

Let yourself speak to\..\..\..
Uh\..\..\..

The glow transfers to the knight's ass.\!
And it,\. slowly but steadily,\. begins to grow.\.\.
Gradually lifting her up off the pile.

Day-Shift Knight:
I
passages.content_zh:
你走進去就會看到員工們懶洋洋地躺著
成堆的金子和聊天。

白班騎士：
没关系，LZ，我相信还有很多
那些愿意战斗的骑士
像你一樣強大、有吸引力的龍。

輔助龍：
你說起來容易。 \!
我該從哪裡開始尋找呢？

騎士想了一會兒。

白班騎士：
你考虑过网上约会吗？ /!
或者也許是仁慈？

輔助龍：
呵呵。

她拿出手机开始做一些事情
搜尋。

當她搜尋時，騎士正在移動
不舒服地躺在她的金子堆上。

白班騎士：
无论如何，你怎么这么舒服？ \！
我认为这金堆是最糟糕的事情之一
我曾經坐過！

她又變了。 \!
堆倒塌了，让她滑到了
地板上有一波硬币。

白班騎士：
呃。

輔助龍：
嗯，怎麼解釋呢...

她在她的金堆上移动，不知何故
沒有讓一枚硬幣脫落。

輔助龍：
來，我們試試這個。

她捡起一枚硬币，递给
騎士。

在这里，将其握在手中并合上
眼睛。

現在，關注硬幣。 \！
感受到它在你手中慢慢變暖嗎？

隨著天氣變暖，感受越來越少的感覺
外國的。 \!
它接受你的溫暖，接受你的雙手
正在接受它。

感受你的肉體如何將自己塑造成硬幣。 \！
感受一下硬幣是如何為你塑造的。

你和硬幣是一體的。 \!
你把自己奉獻給它，它也奉獻自己
你.\!
寶藏就是這樣製作的。

你看到騎士的手發出淡淡的金色光芒
一會兒。

輔助龍：
好啊好啊！ ！ \!
現在，為了讓事情變得舒適，就這樣做
和你剩下的一堆。

騎士把手放在堆上
她周圍。

輔助龍：
是的...

重點...

讓金子來跟你說話吧

你看到那堆金子開始發光。

让自己与\..\..\.. 交谈
呃\..\..\..

光芒轉移到騎士的屁股。 \！
還有它，\.緩慢而穩定地，\.開始生長。 \.\.
漸漸地把她從堆裡抬起來。

白班騎士：
我

passages.name: Bank 2 real
passages.content:
The table has a stack of informative
pamphlets.

Gold, Not Virgins:
A Guide To Demanding Tribute
passages.content_zh:
桌子上有一堆訊息
小冊子。

黃金，不是處女：
致敬指南

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Knight — p1
passages.content:
Teller:
Welcome!\!
If you'd like to make deposits or open an
account, I can help you with that.

If you'd like to be menaced by a dragon, my
associate in the back can assist.
passages.content_zh:
出納員：
歡迎光臨！ \!
如果您想存款或開立
帳戶，我可以幫助您。

如果你想受到龍的威脅，我的
後面的同事可以幫忙。

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Knight conversation — p1
passages.content:
The teller(?) is staring off at something in the
back of the building.

You cough.

Teller:
Sorry, didn't see you!\!
We're dealing with the weirdest set of
promotions I've ever heard of.

I\.\. think?\.\. I can still help you if you want
to do some banking?

My job responsibilities have apparently been
expanded to include "rescuing fair maidens
from durance vile" and "smiting the wicked",
but they do *not* pay me enough for that.

If you need anything else, you're going to
have to...

She glances back,

Well, see if you can get the manager to take
a break from all that.

You indicate you don't need anything.

Teller:
That's probably for the best.

She goes back to staring towards the back
of the room.
passages.content_zh:
出納員（？）正盯著房間裡的東西
建築物的後面。

你咳嗽。

出納員：
抱歉，沒看到你！ \!
我們正在處理最奇怪的一組
我聽過的促銷活動。

我\。 \。思考？ \。 \。如果你願意的話我仍然可以幫助你
做一些銀行業務？

我的工作職責顯然是
擴大到包括“拯救美麗少女”
來自杜蘭斯·維爾”和“打擊惡人”，
但他們並沒有付我足夠的錢。

如果你還需要什麼，你可以
必須...

她回頭看了一眼，

好吧，看看能不能讓經理接受
擺脫這一切。

你表明你不需要任何東西。

出納員：
這可能是最好的。

她又繼續盯著後面
房間的。

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Knight conversation — p2
passages.content:
Teller:
Maybe I should be questing for a new job...
passages.content_zh:
出納員：
也許我應該找一份新工作...

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Knight conversation — p3
passages.content:
The teller is grumbling to herself.

(I can't believe that rescuing princesses is
going to go on my performance evaluation...)

She notices you and puts on a fake smile.

Teller:
Welcome!\!
If you're here to make a deposit or
withdrawal, I can help you here.

If you're interested in inquiring about a loan
or being menaced by a dragon, please head
to the back.
passages.content_zh:
櫃員正在自言自語。

（我不敢相信拯救公主是
將繼續我的績效評估...）

她注意到你並露出假笑。

出納員：
歡迎光臨！ \!
如果您是來存款或
取款，我可以在這裡幫助你。

如果您有興趣諮詢貸款
或受到龍的威脅，請前往
到後面。

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Knight conversation — p4
passages.content:
The dragongirl is sitting at the front desk
today, idly flipping through a paperback.\!
She appears to be taking notes?

She jerks it under the counter as soon as
she notices you, but you still get a glimpse
of a knight showing a ridiculous amount of
cleavage riding a dragon.

You have just enough time to read the title
"Knight Laying Strategies" on her notes before
she hides those too.

She gives a nervous laugh.

Assistant Dragon:
Aha, ha, hi.\!
I'm working the front desk today.

And that's all I'm doing.\!
Working.

She leans in.

Assistant Dragon:
(Please don't tell Kacie what I'm looking into.)
(I'll give you a discount on your next dose of
draconic power.)

(It'll save you money! Any dragon would love
that!)

Assistant Dragon:
...1%?

At your unamused look, she grits her teeth.

Assistant Dragon:
2%?\!
Okay, okay, I can go as high as 5%! But no
more!

The gold calls out to me! I can't abandon it!\!
I'll give you your next upgrade for $1900
and not a penny less!

Pay 1900 BE Bucks to the dragon?

She takes a deep breath, then breathes a
stream of fire over you.

You feel your connection to dragonhood
deepen, but it does not disturb your current
TF.

You hear the sound of gold raining down in
the back room.\!
As well as a surprised shriek.

The dragongirl once more beams with joy at
her changes.

Assistant Dragon:
Ah, now we're getting somewhere.

But I can feel there's so much farther I could
go!

She looks wistfully towards the back room.

Assistant Dragon:
Just a little longer until I can go meet the new
gold...

Assistant Dragon:
I guess being amazing isn't for everyone.\!
Come back if you change your mind!

Unfortunately, you don't have enough money.
passages.content_zh:
龍女坐在前台
今天，閒著沒事翻一本平裝書。 \！
她好像在做筆記？

她一到櫃檯下面就把它猛拉起來
她注意到了你，但你仍然瞥見了
一個騎士表現出荒謬的數量
乳溝騎龍。

您有足夠的時間閱讀標題
她之前的筆記上的《騎士鋪設策略》
她也隱藏了那些。

她緊張地笑了笑。

輔助龍：
啊哈，哈，嗨。 \!
我今天在前台工作。

這就是我所做的一切。 \!
在職的。

她傾身過來。

輔助龍：
（請不要告訴凱西我正在調查什麼。）
（我會給你下一次劑量的折扣
龍之力。 ）

（這會幫你省錢！任何龍都會喜歡
那個！ ）

輔助龍：
....1%？

看著你不高興的樣子，她咬牙切齒。

輔助龍：
2%？ \!
好吧好吧，我可以高達5%！但沒有
更多！

黃金在召喚我！我不能放棄它！ \!
我將為您提供下次升等服務，價格為 1900 美元
而且一分錢也沒少！

給龍付1900 BE Bucks？

她深吸了一口氣，然後又吸了一口氣
火流在你身上。

你感覺到你與龍的聯繫
加深，但不會打擾你現在的
TF。

你聽到金色雨點般的聲音
後面的房間。 \！

本季的成長超過了所有
記錄！

業務擴展率為百分之千！

她的整個身體隨著她的動作繃緊
手變得更加瘋狂。

然後他們僵住了，她的背拱起
高興地尖叫。

副公主：
我們正在實現完整的市場
滲透！

她倒在地上，呼吸
重重。

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Princess — p7
passages.content:
The princess/manager is still breathing hard,
hugging her massive breasts to herself with
a look of contentment on her face.

Vice Princess:
Ah...\!
This is the glow of a well-done financial
report.

She gives her nipples a happy tweak.

Vice Princess:
I can't wait until next quarter.
passages.content_zh:
公主/經理還在喘著氣，
擁抱她巨大的乳房
她臉上露出滿足的表情。

副公主：
啊...\！
這是一個出色的財務的光輝
報告。

她快樂地扭捏著乳頭。

副公主：
我等不及下個季度了。

passages.name: Bank 2 real
passages.content: PRINCESS'S ROOM
passages.content_zh: 公主的房間

passages.name: Bank 2 real
passages.content:
The table has a few advertising flyers on it.

We Protect Your Money Like A Dragon Would
Her Hoard!

(Except we let you take it back out.)

\}(Probably.)

A sticky note on it reads "the new ad
campaign still needs work."
passages.content_zh:
桌子上有一些廣告傳單。

我們像龍一樣保護您的資金
她的寶藏！

（除非我們讓你把它拿回來。）

\}（可能吧。）

上面有一張便利貼，上面寫著「新廣告
競選活動仍需努力。 」

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Knight final — p1
passages.content:
The knight is still exploring her enhanced body.

Day Shift Knight:
Wow, if all this was just from this one pile of
gold...

Now I see why dragons hoard it.
passages.content_zh:
騎士仍在探索她強化後的身體。

白班騎士：
哇，如果這一切只是來自這一堆就好了
金...

現在我明白為什麼龍會囤積它了。

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Intro event trigger — p1
passages.content:
The knight/teller seems distracted again when
you walk up to the desk.

Assistant Dragon:
Come oooooooonnnnnn!\!
You're a knight! I'm a dragon!
We're supposed to fight!

Day Shift Knight:
This is a *bank*.\.\.
We're *tellers*.

I don't care what kind of new titles we've
gotten, I'm not fighting you!

Assistant Dragon:
I'm reporting this to the manager!

She grumpily stomps off to the back room.

The knight turns back to you.

Day Shift Knight:
I'm sorry, was there anything I could help
you with?
passages.content_zh:
當騎士/出納員似乎再次心煩意亂時
你走到辦公桌前。

輔助龍：
來吧 oooooooonnnnnnn！ \！
你是騎士！我是龍！
我們應該戰鬥！

白班騎士：
這是一家*銀行*。 \.\。
我們是*櫃員*。

我不在乎我們有什麼樣的新標題
明白了，我不跟你鬥了！

輔助龍：
我要向經理報告此事！

她悶悶不樂地跺著腳走進裡屋。

騎士轉身面向你。

白班騎士：
抱歉，有什麼我可以幫忙的嗎
你與?

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Intro event trigger — p2
passages.content:
Assistant Dragon:
Hey Kacie, look at me!

She brings her arms together, pushing her
chest out towards the knight.

Assistant Dragon:
Look at how big I'm getting, swollen on the
piles of my ill-gotten gains!

Why, if only there was someone, some noble
fighter out there who could defeat me and
free the back office from my tyranny...

The knight sighs.

Day-Shift Knight:
Still no.

Assistant Dragon:
Oh come on!

She stomps a clawed foot, leaving gouges in
the floor.

I've talked with Princess Manager and she
says "rescuing poor maidens such as herself
is one of a knight's most essential duties!"

The knight rolls her eyes.

Day-Shift Knight:
Then get her to come out here and say that
herself.

Assistant Dragon:
...I can't.

She refuses to come out of that cell she built.\!
Says "a princess could not possibly rescue
*herself* from durance vile!"

Day-Shift Knight:
What are you two even doing back there?\!
No, nevermind, I don't want to know.

Just...\!
Just go back to whatever you're supposed to
be doing and let me do my job.

You're holding up the customers.

She turns back to you as the dragon sulks
off to the back room.

Day Shift Knight:
I'm sorry, was there anything I could help
you with?
passages.content_zh:
輔助龍：
嘿凱西，看著我！

她雙手併攏，推著她
向騎士挺胸。

輔助龍：
看看我長多大了，腫起來了
我的不義之財成堆！

為什麼，要是有一個人，某個高貴的人就好了
那裡有能打敗我的戰士
將後台辦公室從我的暴政中解放出來...

騎士嘆了口氣。

白班騎士：
還是不行。

輔助龍：
哦來吧！

她用爪子踩了腳，在腳上留下了傷痕
地板。

我和公主經理談過，她
說「拯救像她這樣的可憐的少女
是騎士最重要的職責之一！ 」

騎士翻白眼。

白班騎士：
然後讓她出來告訴我
她自己。

輔助龍：
……我不能。

她拒絕走出她建造的牢房。 \！
說「公主不可能拯救
*她自己*來自杜蘭斯邪惡！ 」

白班騎士：
你們兩個在後面做什麼？ \！
不，沒關係，我不想知道。

只是...\！
回去做你該做的事吧
讓我做我的工作。

你耽誤了顧客。

當龍生悶氣時，她轉身面向你
到後面的房間去。

白班騎士：
抱歉，有什麼我可以幫忙的嗎
你與?

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Intro event trigger — p3
passages.content:
You step up to the counter just in time to see
a struggling princess being carried out of the
back room by the dragongirl.

Vice Princess:
Unhand me, you knave!\!
Dragons are not supposed to rescue
princesses!

Much less in such a, such an *undignified*
manner!

The dragongirl plops her down next to the
desk.

Assistant Dragon:
I just need you to tell Kacie to do her job!\!
Make her fight me!

The princess sniffs and takes some time to
straighten her clothes.

Vice Princess:
I guess I might as well.  My domain has
already been invaded, I should not waste the
trip.

She pulls a book out from somewhere in her
skirts and places it on the table.

Vice Princess:
Now, pay close attention.

The new employee handbook clearly states
that knights have several important job
responsibilities, chief among them to fight
dragons and rescue princesses.

I know you're still getting used to your new
position, but this is a major portion of your
job duties that you are neglecting!

And that has consequences! Why, if you keep
this up, possible punishments include...

She opens the book and starts leafing through
it.

Vice Princess:
Include...

She starts flipping pages faster.

Vice Princess:
Uh...

She pauses and reads something closely.\!
Then blushes.

Vice Princess:
Oh my.

Day-Shift Knight:
Huh?

The knight flips the book over to her side of
the counter and takes a look at it.

Day-Shift Knight:
What *is* this??

She looks at the cover.

Day-Shift Knight:
"Flames of Desire: A story of a knight with one
mission - to *lay* the dragon."

"Three-time winner of the Monsterfuckers
Choice Awards"??

Assistant Dragon:
Oh! Uh...

She laughs nervously.

Assistant Dragon:
So that's where it went...

Assistant Dragon:
\}If you don't want to fight, there's other things
we could try too...

She laughs nervously again.

Assistant Dragon:
Maybe I'll just get headed back...

She grabs the book and turns to head back.\!
Then pauses.

Assistant Dragon:
\}Just, think about it.\!
There's al
passages.content_zh:
你走到櫃檯前正好看到
掙扎中的公主被抬出
龍女的後屋。

副公主：
放開我，你這個無賴！ \！
龍不應該拯救
公主們！

更不用說這樣一個“有損尊嚴的”
方式！

龍女把她撲通撲通地倒在了旁邊
辦公桌。

輔助龍：
我只需要你告訴凱西要做好她的工作！ \！
讓她跟我打架吧！

公主吸了吸鼻子，花了一些時間
整理她的衣服。

副公主：
我想我也可以。  我的網域有
已經被入侵了，我不該浪費
旅行。

她從體內某處抽出一本書
裙子並把它放在桌子上。

副公主：
現在，請密切注意。

新進員工手冊明確規定
騎士有幾項重要的工作
責任，其中最主要的是戰鬥
龍並拯救公主。

我知道你還在適應你的新事物
位置，但這是你的主要部分
你所忽視的工作職責！

這會產生後果！為什麼，如果你繼續
就此而言，可能的懲罰包括…

她打開書並開始翻閱
它。

副公主：
包括...

她開始更快地翻頁。

副公主：
呃...

她停下來仔細讀了一些東西。 \！
然後臉紅了。

副公主：
天哪。

白班騎士：
啊？

騎士把書翻到她身邊
櫃檯並看了一下。

白班騎士：
這*是什麼*？ ？

她看著封面。

白班騎士：
《慾望之火：一個騎士與一個人的故事》
使命——*安放*龍。 」

「Monsterfuckers 三屆冠軍
選擇獎”??

輔助龍：
哦！呃...

她緊張地笑起來。

輔助龍：
所以這就是它去的地方......

輔助龍：
\}如果你不想打架，還有其他事情
我們也可以嘗試...

她又緊張地笑了。

輔助龍：
也許我會回去...

她抓起書，轉身往回走。 \！
然後暫停。

輔助龍：
\}只是，想想。 \！
還有

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Intro event trigger — p5
passages.content:
You see the dragon and princess approach
from the back room just as you reach the
counter.

Assistant Dragon:
Rar!\.\. I am a horrible dragon, here to steal
all your maidens!

She breathes a stream of fire into the air.

Vice Princess:
Oh no, a horrible dragon, here to steal all us
maidens!

They both glance at the knight.

Assistant Dragon:
I am so glad that no one will stop my horrible
deeds!

She breathes another stream of fire into
the air.

Vice Princess:
If only someone would stop her horrible
deeds!

Day Shift Knight:
You know, you're going to set off the
sprinklers if you keep doing that.

Assistant Dragon:
Come on!

She stomps her foot furiously.\.\.
The resulting boobquake nearly pops her out
of her skimpy white top.

The princess manager leans forward as the
dragon tucks herself back in to her clothing.

Vice Princess:
Kacie, I just don't understand.\!
Look at what you're missing out on!\.\. This is
a foe any knight would love to fight!

She's strong!

The dragon flexes.

Fiery!

The dragon checks for sprinklers overhead,
then blows out a much more subdued tongue
of flame.

And has a simply *massive* asset portfolio!

The dragon leans forward, giving a view of
her massive, head-burying cleavage.

Vice Princess:
I'm disappointed to see an employee with as
much potential as you not jumping on this
opportunity!

Day Shift Knight:
How did this get even weirder.

She turns to the dragon.

Day Shift Knight:
Look, Liz, I get where you're coming from.

There comes a time in a woman's life where
her body starts to change, to blossom, and
it becomes really easy to get swept up in all
the feelings that come with that.

It's natural!

She turns to the princess.

And there comes a time in every manager's
life when\..\..\..
Actually, I have *no* idea what your deal is.

And I don't want to!

She turns back to the dragon.

Day Shift Knight:
Liz, I understand where you're coming from,
and I'm honored, really.\!
To ask me to be the first knight you fight!

I respect
passages.content_zh:
你看到龍和公主走近
當你到達後面的房間時
櫃檯。

輔助龍：
拉！ \.\.我是一隻可怕的龍，來這裡偷竊
你們所有的少女！

她向空氣中噴出一股火流。

副公主：
喔不，一條可怕的龍，來這裡要偷走我們所有人
少女們！

兩人同時看了騎士一眼。

輔助龍：
我很高興沒有人能阻止我的可怕
事蹟！

她又噴出一股火流
空氣。

副公主：
要是有人能阻止她的可怕就好了
事蹟！

白班騎士：
你知道，你將會引發
灑水裝置，如果你繼續這樣做的話。

輔助龍：
來吧！

她猛烈地跺著腳......
由此產生的胸部震動幾乎讓她崩潰
她那件輕薄的白色上衣。

公主經理身體前傾
龍把自己塞回衣服裡。

副公主：
凱西，我就是不懂。 \！
看看你錯過了什麼！ \.\.這是
任何騎士都願意與之戰鬥的敵人！

她很強！

龍彎曲。

火熱！

龍檢查頭頂是否有灑水裝置，
然後吹出更加柔和的舌頭
的火焰。

並且擁有一個簡單的「海量」資產組合！

龍身向前傾，眺望
她巨大的、埋頭的乳溝

副公主：
我很失望地看到一名員工
潛力很大，因為你不跳這個
機會！

白班騎士：
這怎麼變得更奇怪了。

她轉向龍。

白班騎士：
聽著，莉茲，我明白你來自哪裡。

女人一生總有那麼一個時刻
她的身體開始改變，綻放，
很容易被一切捲入
隨之而來的感受。

這是自然的！

她轉向公主。

每個經理都會遇到這樣的時刻
生活當\..\..\..
事實上，我*不*知道你的交易是什麼。

我不想！

她轉身面向龍。

白班騎士：
LZ，我明白你來自哪裡，
我真的很榮幸。 \！
讓我成為你們第一場戰鬥的騎士！

我尊重

passages.name: Bank 2 real — p1
passages.content:
You see a bunch of books half-buried in a pile
of gold.

"Flames of Desire"\!
"Laying the Dragon"\!
"Pounded By The Knight (And I'm A Dragon)
(And She's A Lady Knight)"

Assistant Dragon:
Hey!\!
Don't touch those!
passages.content_zh:
你看到一堆半埋在一堆的書
黃金。

《慾望之火》！
《臥龍》！
「被騎士重擊（我是龍）
（她是女騎士）”

輔助龍：
嘿！ \！
別碰那些！

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Escaped dog — p1
passages.content:
The dog is digging eagerly in the pile of gold.

Assistant Dragon:
Hey!\!
Stop that!

The dog happily ignores her.
passages.content_zh:
狗正在金子堆裡急切地挖著。

輔助龍：
嘿！ \！
別這樣！

狗高興地不理她。

passages.name: Bank 2 real — Escaped dog — p2
passages.content:
The dog is digging eagerly in the pile of gold.

Assistant Dragon:
Hey!\!
Stop that!

The dog happily ignores her.

You give Doug a call.

Shelter Head Doug:
Come on Marcy, drop the nice dragon's gold.\!
There's a good girl.

\v[144] out of 3 dogs rescued!
passages.content_zh:
狗正在金子堆裡急切地挖著。

輔助龍：
嘿！ \！
別這樣！

狗高興地不理她。

你打電話給道格。

庇護所負責人道格：
來吧，瑪西，丟下漂亮的龍金。 \！
有一個很好的女孩。

\v[144] 三隻狗獲救！

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
Shelter Head Felix:
That's all of the cats! Thank you!

Shelter Head Doug:
And all of the dogs!

Shelter Head Doug:
It's so nice to see them all back and happy.\!
Look at how much fun they're having playing
with people!

As you watch, you notice a faint glow starting
to rise from the animals.

More and more light pours off them, until
the room is drowned out in the brillance.

Then the light concentrates itself into two
figures.

Shelter Head Doug:
I heard the rumors...\!
But I never thought...

Shelter Head Doug:
The Goodest Boy...

Shelter Head Felix:
Look at those perfect ears...\!
That perfect tail...

Shelter Head Felix:
How can such a wonderful kitty exist...

They each reach out a trembling hand.

The animals lean into their hands, allowing
themselves to be pet for a few wonderful
seconds.

Then they both look up to the shelter heads,
as they begin to glow once more.

Shelter Head Doug:
Aww, do whatever you need. I can't say no
to such a good boy.

Shelter Head Felix:
Go ahead kitty, I'm ready.

They leap.

Shelter Head Doug:
\..\..\..\..\..What?!?!

Shelter Head Felix:
How DARE.

She leaps on her fellow shelter head, tugging
at her new ears.

Shelter Head Felix:
Those should be mine!\!
You don't deserve to be a kitty!

Doug is returning the favor, pawing at Felix's
new tail.

Shelter Head Doug:
Deserve?!\!
You're not nearly good enough to be a dog!\!
I'm the good one!

They continue tugging and slapping at each
other for a few minutes.\!
It's honestly one of the most ineffectual fights
you've ever seen.

Finally, exhausted, they pull apart.

Both:
\{\{HMPH!

They stalk away from each other.
passages.content_zh:
庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
這就是所有的貓了！謝謝你！

庇護所負責人道格：
還有所有的狗！

庇護所負責人道格：
很高興看到他們都回來了並且很高興。 \！
看看他們玩得多開心
與人！

當你觀察時，你會注意到微弱的光芒開始出現
從動物中崛起。

越來越多的光從他們身上傾瀉而出，直到
房間被光輝淹沒了。

然後光線集中成兩個部分
數字。

庇護所負責人道格：
我聽到謠言了...\！
但我從來沒想過...

庇護所負責人道格：
最優秀的男孩...

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
看看那些完美的耳朵...\！
那完美的尾巴...

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
怎麼會有這麼可愛的小貓呢…

他們各自伸出了顫抖的手。

動物們靠在他們的手中，讓
自己去寵幾個精彩
秒。

然後他們都抬頭看向避難所的負責人，
當它們再次開始發光時。

庇護所負責人道格：
哇，做你需要做的事。我不能說不
對於這樣一個好孩子。

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
來吧，小貓，我已經準備好了。

他們跳躍。

庇護所負責人道格：
\..\..\..\..\..什麼？ ！ ？ ！

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
多麼敢。

她跳到她同伴庇護所的頭上，拉扯著
在她的新耳朵裡。

庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
那些應該是我的吧！ \!
你不配當小貓！

道格正在回報他，用爪子抓著菲利克斯的
新尾巴。

庇護所負責人道格：
應得的？ ！ \！
你連當狗的資格都沒有！ \!
我就是那個好人！

他們繼續拉扯並拍打每個人
其他幾分鐘。 \!
老實說，這是最無效的戰鬥之一
你曾經見過。

最後，他們精疲力竭，分開了。

兩者：
\{\{哼！

他們互相遠離。

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — Cat Lover — p1
passages.content:
Shelter Head Doug:
I can't believe it!\!
Those poor puppies.\!
Lost!

Shelter Head Felix:
It's okay.\!
Someone will find them.

Shelter Head Doug:
Lost dogs!\!
After the fright yesterday, three of our puppies
ran away and still haven't come back!

Those poor puppers...

Felix gives him a look.

Shelter Head Doug:
...Three cats too.

Shelter Head Felix:
Would you mind keeping an eye out? If you
see any of them, just give us a call.

Shelter Head Doug:
Now, Daisy has always been way too into
trash.  She's probably sniffing around the
nearest source of it.

Shelter Head Felix:
Coffee Bean loves people. She's probably
somewhere with a lot of traffic.

Shelter Head Doug:
I'm not sure where Daisy might have run to.
Her favorite toy was is a big chewy $100 bill,
though.

Shelter Head Felix:
Rip Van Winkle is such a sleepy cat.\!
I'm kind of surprised she woke up enough to
run off, honestly.

She's probably off taking a nap somewhere.

Oh, and Her Highness Princess Squeakers
Von Meowsburg The Third absolutely loves to
chew on plants.\!
She's probably somewhere with a ton of them.

Shelter Head Doug:
Oh, and John Romero has always had an
interest in video game development!\!
Such a silly puppy.

Shelter Head Felix:
Thanks for keeping an eye out!

那些可憐的小狗。 \!
丟失的！

馮·繆斯堡三世絕對喜歡

missing cats.\!
You've found \v[143] out of 3.

Coffee Bean is probably somewhere a lot of

Rip Van Winkle is back in her usual spot.

Rip Van Winkle is probably napping
somewhere.\!
She likes to sleep with people, if that helps.

Thank you for finding Her Highness Princess
Squeakers Von Meowsburg The Third!

Her Highness Princess Squeakers
Von Meowsburg The Third is probably off
eating plants.\!
She's a bit of a menace, honestly.

咖啡豆回來了，跟人們一起玩！

她喜歡和人一起睡覺，如果這有幫助的話。

感謝您找到公主殿下

斯奎克公主殿下
馮·莫斯堡第三號可能已經關閉

老實說，她有點威脅。

passages.content:
Shelter Head Doug:
I can't believe it!\!
Those poor puppies.\!
Lost!

Shelter Head Felix:
It's okay.\!
Someone will find them.

Lost dogs!\!
After the fright yesterday, three of our puppies
ran away and still haven't come back!

Those poor puppers...

Felix gives him a look.

Shelter Head Doug:
...Three cats too.

Shelter Head Felix:
Would you mind keeping an eye out? If you
see any of them, just give us a call.

Shelter Head Doug:
Now, Daisy has always been way too into
trash.  She's probably sniffing around the
nearest source of it.

Shelter Head Felix:
Coffee Bean loves people. She's probably
somewhere with a lot of traffic.

Shelter Head Doug:
I'm not sure where Marcy might have run to.
Her favorite toy was is a big chewy $100 bill,
though.

Shelter Head Felix:
Rip Van Winkle is such a sleepy cat.\!
I'm kind of surprised she woke up enough to
run off, honestly.

She's probably off taking a nap somewhere.

Oh, and Her Highness Princess Squeakers
Von Meowsburg The Third absolutely loves to
chew on plants.\!
She's probably somewhere with a ton of them.

Shelter Head Doug:
Oh, and John Romero has always had an
interest in video game development!\!
Such a silly puppy.

Shelter Head Felix:
Thanks for keeping an eye out!

passages.content: \{That night...
passages.content_zh: \ {那天晚上...

Visitor:

訪客：
哎呀，誰是一隻可愛的小狗啊！

Visitor:

Visitor:
Three cute puppers! Even better!

訪客：
兩隻可愛的小狗！太幸運了！

她停下來，摸摸她的新耳朵和尾巴。

訪客：
三隻可愛的小狗！甚至更好！

passages.content:
Visitor:
We're all good girls here! Such good girls!

She and the dogs all wag their tails.
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
我們這裡都是好女孩！這麼好的女孩子啊！

她和狗都搖尾巴。

passages.content:
Cat:
Nyaaa~~ :3

passages.content_zh:
貓：
呀呀~~:3

……那不是喵叫。貓其實只是
說“nya”。

passages.content:
Cat?:
Hello, nyaa!\!
I'm a magical love heart <3 spirit guide!

I heard the cries of the poor kitties and
puppies here! Your pure and overwhelming
love for them has let me appear to help!

You trade a confused glance with the rest of
your party.

/n[2]:
Do you mean those two?\!
/n[10] doesn't even have a pet...

Magical Love Heart <3 Spirit Guide:
Hmm...

Magical Love Heart <3 Spirit Guide:
Their pure and overwhelming love for pets
has let me appear to help!

Go! Rescue the poor things!\!
I will send the spirits to show you where they
hide!
passages.content_zh:
貓？ ：
你好，nyaa！ \！
我是神奇的愛心<3精神導師！

小狗在這裡！你的純粹和壓倒性

嗯...

去！拯救可憐的東西！ \！
我會派出靈魂來告訴你他們在哪裡
隱藏！

魔法愛心<3精神指南：
還有這麼可愛的小狗小貓
英雄，誰需要你的幫忙！

passages.content:
Visitor:
I'd like to play with a cat.\!
I guess I'll just have to wait.\!
I thought they'd have more...

He stares forlornly at the cat toy he's holding.
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
我想和貓一起玩。 \!
我想我只能等了。 \!
我以為他們會有更多...

他淒涼地盯著手上的貓玩具。

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — Cat guy — p2
passages.content:
Visitor:
Come on kitty, look at the toy!\!
Look at the sparkly toy!

He waves it around.\!
The cat seems aggresively uninterested.

Visitor:
Come on, look at...\.\. the...

He stares at the twitching toy, utterly fascinated.

Then tentatively reaches out and bats it.
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
來吧，小貓，看玩具！ \!
看看閃閃發光的玩具！

他揮舞著它。 \！
這隻貓似乎完全不感興趣。

訪客：
來吧，看看...\.\.該...

他盯著那個抽搐的玩具，完全著迷了。

然後試探性地伸出手來擊打它。

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — Cat guy — p3
passages.content:
Visitor:
Ha!\!
Look at the toy!

She bats it back and forth, entranced by its
movement.

Visitor:
You're missing out kitty!
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
哈！ \!
看玩具！

她來回拍打它，被它迷住了
運動。

訪客：
你錯過了小貓！

passages.content:
Visitor:
Who's a kitty?\!
You're a kitty!
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
誰是小貓？ \!
你是一隻小貓！

Visitor:

Visitor:

我們是小貓！

Visitor:

我以為周圍會有更多的貓......

passages.content:
Visitor:
Hooray!\!

passages.content_zh:
訪客：
萬歲！ \！
小貓們來了！

Visitor:
Yes, yes, we all know it's a puppy!\!
We know it's cute!\!
Give someone else a turn!

訪客：
是的，是的，我們都知道這是一隻小狗！ \！
我們知道它很可愛！ \！
給別人一個機會吧！

passages.content:
Visitor:
Ugh, and now she gets *two* dogs?\!
Life isn't fair!

She angrily pulls out her phone to wait.
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
呃，現在她有*兩隻*狗了？ \！
生活不公平！

她憤怒地拿出手機等待。

passages.content:
She's muttering angrily to herself.

Visitor:
Came all this way for dogs and someone's

She's looking up cute dog pictures while she
waits.
passages.content_zh:
她憤怒地自言自語。

訪客：
千里迢迢趕來是為了狗和某人

她一邊查找可愛的小狗照片，一邊
等待。

passages.content:
Visitor:
Okay, where are all the pets?!
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
好吧，所有的寵物都在哪裡？

passages.content:
Visitor:
Hey there girl, do you like chin scratches?

Visitor:
You do!
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
嘿，女孩，你喜歡刮傷下巴嗎？

訪客：
你做的！

passages.content:
Visitor:
Hey girl, can you wag that tail for me?

Visitor:
Ah yeah, there's a good girl.

訪客：
嘿，女孩，你能幫我搖一下尾巴嗎？

訪客：
啊，是啊，有一個好女孩。

passages.content:
Visitor:
Who is a good girl.  You're a good girl.

Visitor:
You're a good girl too kitty, don't feel left
out.

Visitor:
Aw, don't worry, I'll pay attention to you too.

Visitor:
No really, I can pet both of you.

Visitor:
Really, just calm down!

The shelter visitor starts to shift as he turns
back and forth between the two animals.

Catdoggirl:
Ugh, I feel dizzy.

She looks down at herself.

Dogcatgirl:
And confused.
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
誰是個好女孩。  你是個好女孩。

訪客：
你也是個好女孩，別覺得被拋棄
出來。

訪客：
嗯，放心吧，我也會關注你的。

訪客：
不，真的，我可以寵愛你們兩個。

訪客：
真的，冷靜一下！

庇護所訪客轉身時開始移動
在兩隻動物之間來回。

貓狗女孩：
呃，我覺得頭暈。

她低頭看著自己。

狗貓女孩：
和困惑。

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — p5
passages.content:
Catdoggirl:
...Huh.
passages.content_zh:
貓狗女孩：
……嗯。

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — p1
passages.content:
She dejectedly rolls the ball around.

Visitor:
This would be a lot more fun with a dog...
passages.content_zh:
她沮喪地把球滾來滾去。

訪客：
如果有狗的話會更有趣...

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — p2
passages.content:
Visitor:
This is so much fun!

Both her and the dog's tails are wagging
rapidly.
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
這太有趣了！

她和狗的尾巴都在搖
迅速。

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — Gregory — p1
passages.content:
Player \v[23]:
I am here to support a local business, of
course.

I am reliably informed that these pets could
use more human interaction, and I will step
up to provide it.
passages.content_zh:
玩家\v[23]：
我來這裡是為了支持一家當地企業
當然。

我被可靠地告知這些寵物可以
使用更多的人際互動，我會踏出一步
來提供它。

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — Gregory — p2
passages.content:
Gregory has bent down and is letting the cat
sniff their hand.

Player \v[23]:
Hmmm...

Quite a satisfying purr.  Very resonant.

Fur is soft, luxurious, and obviously well cared
for. Quite a diligent kitty.

And one cannot help but mention the
overwhelming cuteness.

Truly, a ten out of ten kitty.

The cat purrs happily and rubs herself against
Gregory.

There's a flash of light as Gregory's form
shifts.\!
They look down at themself.

Player \v[23]:
Ah, exciting.\!
This deserves some... evaluation.
passages.content_zh:
格雷戈里彎下腰，讓貓
聞他們的手。

玩家\v[23]：
嗯...

真是令人滿足的咕嚕聲。  非常有共鳴。

皮毛柔軟、奢華，顯然經過精心護理
為.真是一隻勤奮的小貓。

人們不能不提到
壓倒性的可愛。

確實，十分之十的小貓。

貓咪高興地發出咕嚕聲，並在身上蹭來蹭去
格雷戈里.

一道閃光變成了格雷戈里的身影
轉變。 \!
他們低頭看著自己。

玩家\v[23]：
啊，令人興奮。 \!
這值得一些……評價。

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — Gregory — p3
passages.content:
Gregory is feeling over her new ears.

Player \v[23]:
Yes, these are also quite soft and decadent.\!
A good rating so far.
passages.content_zh:
格雷戈里摸著她的新耳朵。

玩家\v[23]：
是的，這些也相當柔軟和頹廢。 \！
到目前為止評價不錯。

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — Doug after
passages.content:
Shelter Head Doug:
I hate this! I hate everything about this!

Why am I a cat?!\!
Why do I have these stupid ears and tail?!

And what's up with this stupid dress?!?!

Shelter Head Doug:
I can't believe Felix stole being a dog from me!

They are the Worst Girl!
passages.content_zh:
庇護所負責人道格：
我討厭這個！我討厭這一切！

為什麼我是貓？ ！ \！
為什麼我有這些愚蠢的耳朵和尾巴？ ！

這件愚蠢的衣服是怎麼回事？ ！ ？ ！

庇護所負責人道格：
我不敢相信菲利克斯偷走了我的狗狗身分！

她們是最壞的女孩！

passages.name: Pet shelter 3 — Felix after
passages.content:
Shelter Head Felix:
I can't believe it!\!
I could be napping in sunbeams and playing
with toy mice!

And instead I've got this stupid waggy tail!

She yanks on it.

Why?!\!
How could Doug betray me like this?!?!
passages.content_zh:
庇護所負責人菲利克斯：
我簡直不敢相信！ \!
我可以在陽光下打盹並玩耍
與玩具老鼠！

相反，我有這條愚蠢的搖尾巴！

她猛拉它。

為什麼？ ！ \！
道格怎麼可以這樣背叛我？ ！ ？ ！
