That was sick dude!

They high-five.

Goddess Fittina:
Sorry bro, but not even I can bulk you out
there anymore.

All I can do is give you this high five for
getting so swole!

Goddess Fittina:
Got it dude!

She runs you through a series of exercises.\!
Eyebrow lifts.\!
Jaw flexes.\!
Cheek puffs.

It feels like your face has gotten less delicate.

Goddess Fittina:
Sorry bro, but not even I can bulk you out
there anymore.

All I can do is give you this high five for
getting so swole!

Goddess Fittina:
Let's go!

She runs you through about a million pushups.\!
It leaves your arms and hands looking a lot
bulkier.

Goddess Fittina:
Sorry bro, but you don't have any flab there.
Good job, but there's nothing to work off!

Goddess Fittina:
Got it dude!

She runs you through like a million bar
presses.\!
It really does seem to have burned some of
the jiggle off your chest!

Goddess Fittina:
Sorry bro, but not even I can bulk you out
there anymore.

All I can do is give you this high five for
getting so swole!

Goddess Fittina:
Got it dude!

She run
passages.content_zh:
女神菲蒂娜：
嘿兄弟，再次感謝您幫助我。 \!
這真是兄弟之舉！

作為感謝，我想給你一些個人的
教練在膨脹！

你聽到一聲驚喜的喘息聲
哈娜。

兄弟你想要什麼都可以。 \!
你是否在任何地方累積了過多的鬆弛？ \！
手臂有點太細了？ \!
我們可以照顧它！

你需要大量原始法力才能真正獲得
結果，兄弟。 \！
一定要吃補品！

和菲蒂娜一起訓練？

女神菲蒂娜：
對不起，兄弟，但你那裡沒有任何鬆弛。
幹得好，但沒有什麼可做的！

守護者哈娜：
.\..\..\.夥計，你有沒有考慮過
理髮？

女神菲蒂娜：
這就是我們要做的！ \!
你見過的最誇張的髮型！

她拔出一把巨大的、十英尺長的劍。 \！
太重了，她的腳明顯陷進去了
地面。

在你抗議之前，她已經搖擺了。

並且頭髮飄落到地上。

哈娜鼓掌。

守護者哈娜：
夥計！ \.女神！ \。
那是有病的傢伙！

他們舉手擊五。

女神菲蒂娜：
對不起兄弟，但即使我也無法讓你強大起來
不再在那裡了。

我所能做的就是給你這個高五分
變得如此臃腫！

女神菲蒂娜：
明白了，夥計！

她引導您完成一系列練習。 \！
眉毛抬起來。 \!
下巴彎曲。 \!
臉頰鼓起。

感覺你的臉變得不那麼精緻了。

女神菲蒂娜：
對不起兄弟，但即使我也無法讓你強大起來
不再在那裡了。

我所能做的就是給你這個高五分
變得如此臃腫！

女神菲蒂娜：
我們走吧！

她帶你做大約一百萬個伏地挺身。 \！
它讓你的手臂和手看起來很漂亮
體積更大。

女神菲蒂娜：
對不起，兄弟，但你那裡沒有任何鬆弛。
幹得好，但沒有什麼可做的！

女神菲蒂娜：
明白了，夥計！

她像一百萬條酒吧一樣帶你穿過
按下。 \!
它確實似乎燒毀了一些
你胸口的顫動！

女神菲蒂娜：
對不起兄弟，但即使我也無法讓你強大起來
不再在那裡了。

我所能做的就是給你這個高五分
變得如此臃腫！

女神菲蒂娜：
明白了，夥計！

她跑

passages.name: Fittina room ARG
passages.content:
An unedited copy of the sacred exercises
is hanging on the wall.

Someone has added a message in huge
letters at the bottom.

Message:
\{INFINITY = 100

Hana notices you looking at it.

Guardian Hana:
Like it dude?
We totally crushed math!
passages.content_zh:
神聖練習的未經編輯的副本
掛在牆上。

有人添加了一條巨大的訊息
底部的字母。

留言：
\{無窮大 = 100

哈娜注意到你在看它。

守護者哈娜：
喜歡嗎老兄？
我們完全碾壓了數學！

passages.name: Garden 2 real — Rose and Lily — p1
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]We were almost ready to replant...
\C[5]What happened?!

\C[30]I've never seen any plant this invasive.
\C[5]This all grew up overnight!

\C[30]If you could head out there and start
pulling weeds...
\C[5]We've got some volunteers already, but
we can use all the help we can get!
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]我們幾乎準備好重新種植...
\C[5]發生了什麼事？ ！

\C[30]我從未見過如此具有侵略性的植物。
\C[5]這一切都是一夕之間長大的！

\C[30]如果你能出去並開始
拔雜草...
\C[5]我們已經有一些志工了，但是
我們可以使用我們能得到的所有幫助！

passages.name: Garden 2 real — Rose and Lily — p2
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Suddenly a lot of the weeds died...
\C[5]We should be able to get through the
rest pretty quickly now!

\C[30]Thanks for your help!
\C[5]Thanks for your help!

\C[5]And if you run into any of the other
volunteers, give them our thanks too!
\C[30]They all left when we weren't looking...
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]突然間，很多雜草都死了…
\C[5]我們應該能夠渡過難關
現在就快點休息吧！

\C[30]感謝您的幫忙！
\C[5]感謝您的幫忙！

\C[5]如果你遇到任何其他
志工們，也向他們表達感謝！
\C[30]當我們不注意時他們都離開了...

passages.name: Garden 2 real — p1
passages.content:
Garden Volunteer:
Hah! This is nothing!

Just give me an hour or two and-

Thorny vines suddenly lash out from the
depths of the hedge and drag him out of sight.
passages.content_zh:
花園志工：
哈！這沒什麼！

只要給我一兩個小時然後-

荊棘藤蔓突然從洞中伸出
樹籬深處，把他拖到看不見的地方。

passages.name: Garden 2 real — p1
passages.content:
The volunteer is huddled in a corner.

Garden Volunteer:
Oh god, don't let them get me!

I'm sorry!\!
I'm sorry I pulled the weeds!\!
I'm sorry I ever started gardening!

A group of vines yanks him into the hedge.
passages.content_zh:
志工蜷縮在角落。

花園志工：
天哪，別讓他們抓到我！

對不起！ \！
對不起，我拔了雜草！ \！
我很抱歉我開始園藝了！

一群藤蔓把他拉進了樹籬。

passages.name: Garden 2 real — Plant boss — p1
passages.content:
An especially large tangle of vines lies here,
swaying back and forth.

As you get close, a massive fanged head pulls
itself out of the ground and attacks!

As you strike the final blow, the plant shrivels
away, leaving only a few sparkling pieces of
raw mana and a single flower.

Around you the vines and thorns grow still.
There's a faint patter of plants raining to the
ground as many of them crumble apart
entirely.

You hear the faint sound of cursing to the east.

They're going after our weeds *again*?!?!
passages.content_zh:
這裡有一片特別大的藤蔓，
來回搖晃。

當你靠近時，一個巨大的尖牙頭會拉動
自己從地下出來並攻擊！

當你發出最後一擊時，植物就會枯萎
只剩下一些閃閃發光的碎片
原始法力和一朵花。

你周圍的藤蔓和荊棘仍然生長。
隱約傳來植物雨點般的聲音
地面，因為其中許多都崩潰了
完全。

你聽到東方傳來微弱的咒罵聲。

他們*再次*追捕我們的雜草？ ！ ？ ！

passages.name: Garden 2 real — Plant boss — p2
passages.content: Nothing remains except a few brittle vines.
passages.content_zh: 除了幾根脆弱的藤蔓外，什麼都沒有留下。

passages.name: Garden 2 real — p1
passages.content:
You step into an even more overgrown section
of the gardens.
Vines coat the walls around you, arching
overhead to almost blot out the sky above.

You can see twitching and rustling in the vines
out of the corner of your eye as you walk
through.

At the far end of the corridor lies an especially
active tangle of vines.
passages.content_zh:
你走進了一個更雜草叢生的區域
花園的。
藤蔓覆蓋在你周圍的牆壁上，呈現拱形
幾乎遮蓋了上方的天空。

你可以看到藤蔓的抽動和沙沙聲
當你走路的時候，你的眼角余光
通過。

在走廊的盡頭有一個特別的
活躍的藤蔓纏結。

passages.name: Garden 2 ARG — Rose and Lily — p2
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Suddenly a lot of the weeds died...
\C[5]Tomorrow we should be able to get
through the rest!

\C[30]Thanks for your help!
\C[5]And come back tomorrow if you want
to keep helping!

\C[5]And if you run into any of the other
volunteers, give them our thanks too!
\C[30]They all left when we weren't looking...
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]突然間，很多雜草都死了…
\C[5]明天我們應該要能夠得到
通過其餘的！

\C[30]感謝您的幫忙！
\C[5]如果你願意的話明天再來
繼續提供協助！

\C[5]如果你遇到任何其他
志工們，也向他們表達感謝！
\C[30]當我們不注意時他們都離開了...

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Rose and Lily — p1
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Welcome back.
\C[5]We're so glad to see you!

\C[30]For some reason no one from yesterday
came back...
\C[5]So we can really use your help!

\C[30]We've already started cleaning up all
of this mess.
\C[5]AGAIN.

\C[30]Could you take a look around and see
if any of the weeds have started to come back?
\C[5]And take a look at the French Garden
gate too!
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]歡迎回來。
\C[5]我們很高興見到你！

\C[30]因為某些原因昨天沒有人
回來了...
\C[5]所以我們真的需要你的幫忙！

\C[30]我們已經開始清理所有
這個爛攤子。
\C[5]再一次。

\C[30]你能四處看看嗎
是否有雜草開始捲土重來？
\C[5]看看法國花園
門也！

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Rose and Lily — p2
passages.content:
Rose is looking stressed.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]What happened?
When did our lives get this weird?

Lily just gestures at their enormous plant
bottom half.\!
The nectar pool they're standing in.\!
Their nudity.

\C[5]\..\..\..When all this happened?

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]...Right.\!
It just feels so natural, being together with you
like this, I forgot.

\C[5]Awwwww.

They share a hug.\!
Then Rose sighs and looks around.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Well, I guess it's time to get this all
cleaned up AGAIN.
passages.content_zh:
羅斯看起來壓力很大。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]發生了什麼事？
我們的生活什麼時候變得這麼奇怪了？

莉莉只是指著他們巨大的植物
下半部。 \!
他們所站立的花蜜池。 \！
他們的裸體。

\C[5]\..\..\..這一切是什麼時候發生的？

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]...對。 \！
和你在一起感覺很自然
就這樣，我忘記了。

\C[5]啊wwwwww。

他們互相擁抱。 \!
然後羅斯嘆了口氣，環顧四周。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]好吧，我想是時候得到這一切了
再次清理乾淨。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Rose and Lily — p3
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Thanks.
\C[5]They should be better after a little rooted
rest!

\C[30]I think that's good enough for the day.
We'll deal with all of this...\.\. this...\.\.
whatever tomorrow.\!
I need a break first.

\C[5]Thanks again for all your help!\!
Take this!

Gained Pretty Flower!
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]謝謝。
\C[5]紮根後應該會更好
休息吧！

\C[30]我認為這一天已經足夠了。
我們將處理所有這些......\.\.這...\。 \。
明天不管怎樣。 \!
我需要先休息一下。

\C[5]再次感謝您的幫忙！ \!
拿著這個！

收穫了美麗的花朵！

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Rose and Lily — p4
passages.content:
Rose and Lily are chatting.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Okay, yes, I know that things are weird.
But when did they get *WEIRD*?
passages.content_zh:
羅絲和莉莉正在聊天。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]好吧，是的，我知道事情很奇怪。
但他們什麼時候變得*奇怪*了？

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Rose and Lily — p5
passages.content:
\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Welcome back!
\C[5]Everyone is feeling much better!

\C[30]Now we just need to get into the rest of
the garden.
\C[5]We'll let you know if we have any ideas!
passages.content_zh:
\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]歡迎回來！
\C[5]每個人都感覺好多了！

\C[30]現在我們只需要進入其餘部分
花園。
\C[5]如果我們有任何想法，我們會讓您知道！

passages.name: Garden 3 real — p1
passages.content:
You are headed towards the gate when you
hear sudden maniacal laughter.

You take a careful step back as Rose and Lily
come walking up next to you.

Rose and Lily:
Oh great.
What is it now?!

Alraune:
Haha!\!
You fools!\!
Foolish fools!

:
(I don't know who this is but I like their style.)

Alraune:
How dare you infringe upon our domain?\!
Scurrying forth once again to pillage our
fields and destroy our work!

Well we will tolerate it no longer!

Now you fools will face our wrath! You will
regret ever crossing the Evening Timrose!

She poses dramatically.

Carl:
And Carl!

Evening Timrose:
(Carl, you were supposed to come up with a
cool flower name!)

(You're embarrassing us in front of our
nemeses!)

Carl:
(I'm sorry Tim!)\!
(I don't know flower names!)\!
(This didn't come with a manual!)

Timrose sighs.

Evening Timrose:
(That's fair.)\!
(It's fine. This is fine.)\!
(I'll work with it.)

(Just remember, we're bad. We're mad.)
(We're intimidating!)

They turn back to you.

Evening Timrose:
Yes, you will fear the wrath of the deadly duo!\!
The Evening Timrose and Carl!

...\!
Carlrose?\!
Carlnation?

And The Very Intimidating Carl!

Carl waves.

Timrose makes a gesture and the gates begin
to grind slowly open.

Evening Timrose:
So many of you little rats came creeping
around our garden yesterday.\!
Chewing at our plants, biting at our toes.

We know just what to do with rats!

A few of you escaped, but we caught the rest.\!
And now we've made them into something
stronger!\!
Something better!

Something that will spell your doom!

She laughs maniacally as figures start to
shamble out from the mass of thorns beneath
her.

Zombies?:
Augh...\.\.
Ugh...

Evening Timrose:
Go my minions! Feast upon the intruders!

You fools can spend your last moments
regretting you ever crossed the Evening
Timrose!

Carl:
And Carl!

Evening Timrose:
Carlip?\!
Car-dandelion-l?

Regardless, farewell!\!
For now and forever!

The two of them head bac
passages.content_zh:
當您正朝大門走去時
聽到突然的瘋狂笑聲。

作為羅絲和莉莉，你小心地後退一步
走到你旁邊。

玫瑰與莉莉：
哦，太棒了。
現在是什麼情況？ ！

阿爾勞恩：
哈哈！ \!
你們這些傻瓜！ \!
愚蠢的傻瓜們！

:
（我不知道這是誰，但我喜歡他們的風格。）

阿爾勞恩：
你怎麼敢侵犯我們的網域？ \!
再次狂奔去掠奪我們的
田地並破壞我們的工作！

好吧，我們不會再容忍了！

現在你們這些傻瓜將面臨我們的憤怒！你會
後悔穿越了黃昏蒂姆羅斯！

她擺出戲劇性的姿勢。

卡爾：
還有卡爾！

晚上蒂姆羅斯：
（卡爾，你應該想出一個
很酷的花名！ ）

（你讓我們在我們的面前感到尷尬
宿敵！ ）

卡爾：
（我很抱歉蒂姆！）\！
（我不知道花名！）\！
（這沒有附帶手冊！）

蒂姆羅斯嘆了口氣。

晚上蒂姆羅斯：
（這很公平。）\！
（沒關係。這很好。）\！
（我會用它。）

（請記住，我們很糟糕。我們很生氣。）
（我們很嚇人！）

他們轉向你。

晚上蒂姆羅斯：
是的，你會害怕這對致命二人組的憤怒！ \！
晚上 蒂姆羅斯和卡爾！

...\!
卡爾羅斯？ \!
康乃馨？

還有非常令人生畏的卡爾！

卡爾揮手。

蒂姆羅斯做了個手勢，大門開始了
慢慢磨開。

晚上蒂姆羅斯：
你們這麼多小老鼠爬過來了
昨天在我們的花園周圍。 \！
咀嚼我們的植物，咬我們的腳趾。

我們知道如何對付老鼠！

你們中的一些人逃脫了，但我們抓住了其餘的人。 \！
現在我們把它們變成了某些東西
更強！ \！
更好的東西！

一些會帶給你厄運的東西！

當數字開始出現時，她瘋狂地大笑
從下面的荊棘叢中蹣跚而出
她。

殭屍？ ：
啊...\.\.
呃...

晚上蒂姆羅斯：
走吧，我的小小兵！盡情享用入侵者！

你們這些傻瓜可以度過最後的時光
後悔你曾經跨過黃昏
提姆羅斯！

卡爾：
還有卡爾！

晚上蒂姆羅斯：
卡利普？ \！
卡蒲公英-l？

不管怎樣，再見！ \!
從現在到永遠！

兩人回程

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Water — p1
passages.content:
A bit of water has collected nearby, making
this patch of soil nice and moist.

A little sign sits next to the partially-shaded
spot.

Sign:
Certified climate zone 3!

Plant the flower girl following you here?

Zombie?:
Ah\..\..\..\..\..
I can really taste the climate zone 3-ness...

She settles into the ground with a soft sigh of
contentment.

She plants herself in the earth.\!
Then drags herself out with a groan.

Zombie?:
Too\..\..\.. wet..\..\..

Zombie?:
Not\..\..\.. Enough\..\..\.. Sun...

With that, all the new plantgirls are settled into
place.\!
You should probably tell Rose and Lily.
passages.content_zh:
附近累積了一些水，使得
這塊土壤又好又濕。

部分陰影旁有一個小標誌
現貨。

標誌：
經過認證的氣候區 3！

把跟著你的花姑娘種在這裡？

殭屍？ ：
啊\..\..\..\..\..
我真的能嚐到第三區氣候的滋味…

她輕輕地嘆了口氣，坐到了地上
滿足。

她把自己種在土裡。 \！
然後呻吟著拖著身子往外走。

殭屍？ ：
太\..\..\..濕了..\..\..

殭屍？ ：
不夠\..\..\.. 夠了\..\..\.. 太陽...

至此，所有新的植物女孩都安頓下來了
地點。 \!
你也許應該告訴羅絲和莉莉。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Water — p2
passages.content: She appears to be sleeping.
passages.content_zh: 她似乎正在睡覺。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Water — p3
passages.content:
Garden Volunteer:
Hah! Drinking water through your mouth is for
losers!

She closes her mouth for a moment.

Huh, I don't think I need to breath anymore
either.

I think I can have some fun with this.
passages.content_zh:
花園志工：
哈！透過嘴巴喝水是為了
失敗者！

她閉嘴了一會兒。

嗯，我想我不再需要呼吸了
要么。

我想我可以從中得到一些樂趣。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Good soil — p1
passages.content:
Pulling up the thornbushes has exposed a patch
of dark fertile-looking soil.

Plant the flower girl following you here?

Zombie?:
Ah\..\..\..\..\..
Soil...

She relaxes, roots digging into the ground
below.

She plants herself in the earth.\!
Then drags herself out with a groan.

Zombie?:
Too\..\..\.. dark..\..\..

Zombie?:
Climate\..\..\.. zone\..\..\.. 2.5\..\..\..\.
At best\..\..\..

With that, all the new plantgirls are settled into
place.\!
You should probably tell Rose and Lily.
passages.content_zh:
拔掉荊棘叢露出了一塊
看起來很肥沃的深色土壤。

把跟著你的花姑娘種在這裡？

殭屍？ ：
啊\..\..\..\..\..
土壤...

她放鬆下來，樹根扎入地下
下面。

她把自己種在土裡。 \！
然後呻吟著拖著身子往外走。

殭屍？ ：
太\..\..\..黑暗..\..\..

殭屍？ ：
氣候\..\..\..區\..\..\.. 2.5\..\..\..\.
最多\..\..\..

至此，所有新的植物女孩都安頓下來了
地點。 \!
你也許應該告訴羅絲和莉莉。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Good soil — p2
passages.content:
She's snoring gently.\!
You can see her roots slowly working their
way deeper into the soil.
passages.content_zh:
她在輕輕地打鼾。 \!
你可以看到她的根慢慢地發揮作用
深入土壤。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Good soil — p3
passages.content:
The soil here still looks very rich and moist.\!
Anything planted here would grow well.

Would you like to plant-\.\.\^

The seed you've been carrying since Dick
exploded practically leaps out of your pocket
and into the soil.
passages.content_zh:
這裡的土壤看起來仍然很肥沃、濕潤。 \！
在這裡種植的任何東西都會生長得很好。

你想種植-\.\.\^

自從迪克以來你就一直帶著的種子
爆炸幾乎從你的口袋裡跳出來
並進入土壤。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Sunlight — p1
passages.content:
The sun seems to be shining especially
brightly in this spot.

Plant the flower girl following you here?

Zombie?:
Ah\..\..\..\..\..
Praise the sun...

She spreads out all her leaves and petals to
face the sun and closes her eyes.

She plants herself in the earth.\!
Then drags herself out with a groan.

Zombie?:
Too\..\..\.. wet..\..\..

Zombie?:
Climate\..\..\.. zone\..\..\.. 2.5\..\..\..\.
At best\..\..\..

With that, all the new plantgirls are settled into
place.\!
You should probably tell Rose and Lily.
passages.content_zh:
陽光似乎特別燦爛
明亮地在這個地方。

把跟著你的花姑娘種在這裡？

殭屍？ ：
啊\..\..\..\..\..
讚美太陽...

她展開所有的葉子和花瓣
面對太陽，閉上眼睛。

她把自己種在土裡。 \！
然後呻吟著拖著身子往外走。

殭屍？ ：
太\..\..\..濕了..\..\..

殭屍？ ：
氣候\..\..\..區\..\..\.. 2.5\..\..\..\.
最多\..\..\..

至此，所有新的植物女孩都安頓下來了
地點。 \!
你也許應該告訴羅絲和莉莉。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Sunlight — p2
passages.content:
She's turned her face to the sunlight and
fallen asleep.
passages.content_zh:
她把臉轉向陽光
睡著了。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Sunlight — p3
passages.content:
Garden Volunteer:
I never thought I could feel hungry for
sunlight.

She turns her face to the sky.

It's delicious.
passages.content_zh:
花園志工：
我從沒想過我會感到飢餓
陽光。

她把臉轉向天空。

很好吃。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Zombie water — p1
passages.content:
The flower girl stumbles towards you, arms
outstretched.

Alraune:
Water...\!
Pools of water...

Preferably in climate zone three...

I also do best in partial shade...

Have her follow you?

She starts stumbling along behind you.

You already have someone following you!
passages.content_zh:
花童跌跌撞撞地向你走來，手臂
伸展。

阿爾勞恩：
水...\！
水池的水...

最好在氣候區三...

我在部分陰影下也表現最好...

她有跟著你嗎？

她開始跌跌撞撞地跟在你後面。

你已經有人關注你了！

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Zombie water — p2
passages.content:
The flower girl stumbles towards you, arms
outstretched.

Alraune:
Water...\!
Pools of water...

Preferably in climate zone three...

I also do best in partial shade...

Have her stop following you?

She goes back to wandering aimlessly.
passages.content_zh:
花童跌跌撞撞地向你走來，手臂
伸展。

阿爾勞恩：
水...\！
水池的水...

最好在氣候區三...

我在部分陰影下也表現最好...

讓她停止跟蹤你嗎？

她又開始漫無目的地閒逛。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Zombie soil — p1
passages.content:
The flower girl stumbles towards you, arms
outstretched.

Alraune:
Drains\..\..\..

Well-drained soil...\!
Rich soil...

Have her follow you?

She starts stumbling along behind you.

You already have someone following you!
passages.content_zh:
花童跌跌撞撞地向你走來，手臂
伸展。

阿爾勞恩：
排水管\..\..\..

排水良好的土壤...\！
肥沃的土壤...

她有跟著你嗎？

她開始跌跌撞撞地跟在你後面。

你已經有人關注你了！

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Zombie soil — p2
passages.content:
The flower girl stumbles towards you, arms
outstretched.

Alraune:
Drains\..\..\..

Well-drained soil...\!
Rich soil...

Have her stop following you?

She goes back to wandering aimlessly.
passages.content_zh:
花童跌跌撞撞地向你走來，手臂
伸展。

阿爾勞恩：
排水管\..\..\..

排水良好的土壤...\！
肥沃的土壤...

讓她停止跟蹤你嗎？

她又開始漫無目的地閒逛。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Zombie sunlight — p1
passages.content:
The flower girl stumbles towards you, arms
outstretched.

Alraune:
Light...\!
Sunlight...

Have her follow you?

She starts stumbling along behind you.

You already have someone following you!
passages.content_zh:
花童跌跌撞撞地向你走來，手臂
伸展。

阿爾勞恩：
光...\！
陽光...

她有跟著你嗎？

她開始跌跌撞撞地跟在你後面。

你已經有人關注你了！

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Zombie sunlight — p2
passages.content:
The flower girl stumbles towards you, arms
outstretched.

Alraune:
Light...\!
Sunlight...

Have her stop following you?

She goes back to wandering aimlessly.
passages.content_zh:
花童跌跌撞撞地向你走來，手臂
伸展。

阿爾勞恩：
光...\！
陽光...

讓她停止跟蹤你嗎？

她又開始漫無目的地閒逛。

passages.name: Garden 3 real — Soil alraune after — p2
passages.content:
Garden Volunteer:
Huh.\!
Dirt has a flavor.

A good flavor!

She licks her lips as her roots dig around
beneath her.
passages.content_zh:
花園志工：
呵呵。 \!
泥土有味道。

好一個味道！

當她的根在周圍挖掘時，她舔著嘴唇
在她下面。

passages.name: Garden 3 ARG — Autorun event — p1
passages.content:
You walk in on a conversation.

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]Should we even be trying to fix up the
garden, if they can just mess it up again?

\C[30]Maybe there's a reason the garden was
abandoned...

\C[5]Come on Rose! We can't just give up!\!
This garden belongs to the park!\.\. To the
public!

\C[5]We can't just let some randos claim it
for themselves!\!
I say we keep fixing it, and they'll be the ones
to break first!

There is scattered applause from the other
volunteers.

\C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[5]We will not be driven out!\!
We will not be uprooted!

\C[5]It is here that we will plant our flag, and here
that we will flag our plants!

Other Alraune:
Yeah!

One of the other volunteers raises their hand.

Park Volunteer:
Are we all supposed to start making plant puns
now, or...?

\C[30]Rose\C[0] and \C[5]Lily\C[0]:
\C[30]I find that they just happen.
\C[5]Just roll with it!
passages.content_zh:
你介入一場談話。

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]我們是否應該嘗試修復
花園，他們能不能再把它弄亂？

\C[30]也許花園是有原因的
被遺棄...

\C[5]來吧，羅斯！我們不能就這樣放棄！ \！
這個花園屬於公園！ \.\.至
公開！

\C[5]我們不能讓一些隨機者聲稱它
為了自己！ \！
我說我們會繼續修復它，他們就是那個
先破！

其他人零星地鼓掌
志工。

\C[5]莉莉\C[0]:
\C[5]我們不會被趕出去！ \!
我們不會被連根拔起！

\C[5]我們將在這裡插上我們的旗幟，在這裡
我們將標記我們的植物！

其他阿爾勞恩：
是啊！

其他一名志願者舉起了手。

公園志工：
我們都應該開始製作植物雙關語嗎
現在，或者…？

\C[30]玫瑰\C[0]和\C[5]莉莉\C[0]：
\C[30]我發現它們就這樣發生了。
\C[5]隨它滾吧！

passages.name: Field ARG — Thirsty Player — p4
passages.content:
Tennis Player:
It's always nice to find something new you
love, but it's even better to share it with your
friends!
passages.content_zh:
網球運動員：
找到新的東西總是很高興
愛，但更好的是與你的人分享
朋友們！

passages.name: Locker room 2 — Boulder
passages.content: You don't want to cut in line.
passages.content_zh: 你不想插隊。

passages.name: Locker room 2 — Leg day lamia — p1
passages.content:
She's wincing as she changes clothes.

Sore Gym Member:
Ugh, leg day, leg day, leg day.

She rubs her legs and winces again.

Sore Gym Member:
Why do I keep doing this to myself?
passages.content_zh:
她換衣服時皺起了眉頭。

疼痛健身房會員：
呃，腿部日，腿部日，腿部日。

她揉了揉腿，再次皺起眉頭。

疼痛健身房會員：
為什麼我總是這樣對待自己？

passages.name: Locker room 2 — Leg day lamia — p2
passages.content:
Sore Gym Member:
Ah, that was a good workout.

She notices you looking at her snake half.

Sore Gym Member:
This? I got it at the department store.

\}Kind of accidentally, but still.

It's great! No leg day ever again!
passages.content_zh:
疼痛健身房會員：
啊，這是一次很好的鍛鍊。

她注意到你看著她的蛇的一半。

疼痛健身房會員：
這個？我是在百貨公司買的。

\}有點意外，但還是如此。

這很棒！再也沒有腿部日了！

passages.name: Locker room 2 — Glutes other
passages.content:
Concerned Gym Member:
I know you love it, but seriously, another
yoga class?!

Bootylicious Gym Member:
Hey, this beautiful ass isn't going to maintain
itself!

The black-haired woman slaps her own ass
with a huge smile.

Bootylicious Gym Member:
\}...I think.
passages.content_zh:
關心的健身房會員：
我知道你喜歡它，但說真的，另一個
瑜珈課？ ！

Bootylicious 健身房會員：
嘿，這美麗的屁股不會維持下去了
本身！

黑髮女子打自己的屁股
帶著燦爛的笑容。

Bootylicious 健身房會員：
\}...我想。

passages.name: Locker room 2
passages.content:
No thanks.\!
Now that you're done with the trials, you're
not going to risk seeing what going in there
might do to you.

You head into the changing room and wait.\!
Nothing happens.

Looks like the only changing you'll be doing
today is the boring clothes kind.
passages.content_zh:
不，謝謝。 \！
現在你已經完成了試驗，你
不會冒險看看裡面發生了什麼
可能對你有用。

你走進更衣室並等待。 \!
什麼也沒發生。

看起來這是你要做的唯一改變
今天是無聊的衣服類型。

passages.name: Locker room 2 — Boulder
passages.content:
You get in line behind the last boulder.

After a few minutes, you come to your senses
and decide to use any other stall.
passages.content_zh:
你在最後一塊巨石後面排隊。

幾分鐘後，你回過神來
並決定使用任何其他攤位。

passages.name: Pool ARG old
passages.content: HOT TUB

passages.name: Pool ARG old
passages.content: WADING POOL

passages.name: Miku Apartment
passages.content: Lots of figurines, all of the same character.
passages.content_zh: 人物很多，個性都一樣。

passages.name: Miku Apartment — p1
passages.content:
You awaken very slowly.

Ugh, you do not feel well.

Were you drinking last night? This feels like a
full-body hangover.\!
You don't remember drinking, but why else
would you feel this way?

You reluctantly open your eyes.

.\..\..\..\..\..\..
This isn't your apartment.

You stumble as you get out of bed.\!
Everything just feels *off* for a moment.
passages.content_zh:
你醒來的速度非常緩慢。

呃，你覺得不舒服。

昨晚你喝酒了嗎？這感覺就像一個
全身宿醉。 \!
你不記得喝酒了，但為什麼呢？
你會有這樣的感覺嗎？

你不情願地睜開眼睛。

.\..\..\..\..\..\..
這不是你的公寓。

當你起床時你絆倒了。 \!
一切都在一瞬間感覺「不對勁」。

passages.name: Miku Apartment
passages.content: A few dresses are hung up on the wall.
passages.content_zh: 牆上掛著幾件衣服。

passages.name: Miku Apartment
passages.content: Full of girly clothes.
passages.content_zh: 滿滿都是少女感的衣服。

passages.name: Apartment 1 — Computer
passages.content:
You log onto the local forum.

You check out the top few threads.

Miku392:
Did the forum get hacked or something?\!
Everyone's username has changed to
Miku!

Miku57:
Could this be a prank by the mods?

Miku824:
If it is, no one told me about it.

Miku27:
Hey, you're not a mod, I'm a mod!

Miku69:
Well I'm a mod at least and I can't access
anything.

Miku151:
Heh, nice.

Miku69:
Is this really the time?

Miku437:
Just woke up like this!\!
No seriously, this is what I look like now.\!
WTF is happening?

Miku827:
"One morning, as Gregor Samsa was waking
up from anxious dreams, he discovered that
he had been changed into a cute idol."

Could be worse!

Miku213:
Hey, the same thing happened to me!

But check it out, look, it kept all my gains!\!
Girl abs!

Miku17:
Whoa, you could grate cheese on those
things!

Miku97:
Hey, my clothes changed too!\!
This is awesome!

Miku17:
Yeah, this sort of thing happens. I've been a
cowgirl since Thursday.\!
Horns, boobs, the whole package.

Though I woke up today with a few changes
too.\!
I say just relax and enjoy it!

Kaede:
So we art not the only ones afflicted by this
dreadful curse.\!
'Tis a blight on the whole region!

'Tis more support for this being a dream.\!
A pleasant one to many, methinks.

Though I dost imagine it must be a nightmare
to some.
passages.content_zh:
您登入本地論壇。

您查看了最上面的幾條線索。

未來392：
論壇被駭了還是怎麼的？ \!
每個人的用戶名都更改為
米庫！

初音未來57：
這會不會是mod們的惡作劇？

初音824：
如果是的話，沒有人告訴我這件事。

未來27：
嘿，你不是模組，我是模組！

初音未來69：
好吧，至少我是 mod，但我無法訪問
任何東西。

初音未來151：
呵呵，不錯。

初音未來69：
這真的是時候嗎？

初音437：
剛睡醒就這樣！ \!
不認真的，這就是我現在的樣子。 \！
WTF 正在發生嗎？

初音827：
「有一天早上，當格雷戈爾·薩姆沙醒來時
從焦慮的夢中醒來，他發現
他變成了一個可愛的偶像。 」

可能會更糟！

初音未來213：
嘿嘿，同樣的事情也發生在我身上了！

但仔細一看，你看，它保留了我所有的收穫！ \！
腹肌少女！

初音未來17：
哇，你可以在上面磨起司
東西！

初音97：
嘿嘿，我的衣服也換了！ \!
這太棒了！

初音未來17：
是的，這種事時有發生。我曾經是一個
從星期四開始的女牛仔。 \！
角，胸部，整個包裹。

雖然我今天醒來時發生了一些變化
也是。 \!
我說放鬆並享受吧！

楓：
所以我們並不是唯一受此困擾的人
可怕的詛咒。 \！
這對整個地區來說都是一個災難！

'這是對夢想的更多支持。 \！
我認為，一對多是令人愉快的。

雖然我確實認為這一定是一場惡夢
對某些人來說。

passages.name: Apartment 1 — Exit — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
Let us tally forth Hero! Yon dreamer awaits!

Truly, thou are blessed by the gods themselves
to have me at your side.

Imagine if it were either of the others who
found thyselves here. How lost thou would
be!

Without mine divine prowess, mine puissiant
knowledge, thou wouldst not even know where
to begin to search!

I must admit to some small measure of
anticipation of their faces, when we rescue
them from this durance vile.

Perhaps we shall chance upon them alongst
our way, and see what aid we may render.

She nods happily.

Kaede:
Now, onward!

As you step outside, Kaede sniffs the air.

Kaede:
Yes, yes, the scent of humans lies thick
amongst the breeze.

'Tis odd, it seems it ist the same smell in
different trails. Methinks that many hast fallen
afoul of this base trickery.

She sniffs again.

Kaede:
Many of them art bound in that direction.\!
Onwards!

She follows whatever trail she has found.

As you begin to draw close to a nearby park,
she turns to you.

Kaede:
Now hero, mortals may sense that that thou
current state is not quite real, much as thee
managed.

It means that they mightest find themselves
emboldened to act out those things they
wouldst never dare do underneath the sun's
bright gaze.

Gird thy loins with the strongest of steels, hero,
for we must be prepared to witness the worst
depravities mortal minds could conceive.

But we shall wade through them, no matter
long,\.\. or hard,\.\. or wet they may be! For
that is the price we pay for a better tomorrow!
passages.content_zh:
楓：
讓我們來統計一下英雄吧！夢想家正在等待！

確實，你受到諸神本身的祝福
讓我在你身邊。

想像一下如果是其他人中的任何一個
發現自己在這裡。你會多麼迷失
是！

沒有我的神力，我的力量
知識，你甚至不知道在哪裡
開始尋找吧！

我必須承認有一些小措施
當我們救援時，期待他們的臉
他們從這種惡毒的杜蘭斯。

也許我們會偶然遇見他們
我們的方式，看看我們可以提供什麼援助。

她高興地點點頭。

楓：
現在，前進！

當你走出去時，楓嗅了嗅空氣。

楓：
是的，是的，人類的氣味很濃
微風之中。

很奇怪，似乎是同一種氣味
不同的路徑。我想很多人已經倒下了
觸犯了這種卑鄙的伎倆。

她又吸了吸鼻子。

楓：
他們中的許多人都朝著那個方向發展。 \！
繼續！

她會追蹤她發現的任何蹤跡。

當您開始靠近附近的公園時，
她轉向你。

楓：
現在英雄，凡人可能會感覺到你
目前的狀態並不完全真實，就像你一樣
管理。

這意味著他們可能會發現自己
他們有勇氣去實踐那些事情
永遠不敢在陽光下做
明亮的目光。

用最堅固的鋼鐵束緊你的腰，英雄，
因為我們必須做好見證最壞情況的準備
凡人心靈所能想像的墮落。

但無論如何，我們都會涉水穿過它們
長，\.\.或硬，\.\.或它們可能是濕的！對於
這就是我們為了更美好的明天所付出的代價！

passages.name: Apartment 1 — Exit — p2
passages.content:
Kaede:
Come, let us venture forth!
passages.content_zh:
楓：
來吧，讓我們一起冒險吧！

passages.name: Apartment 1 — Bed
passages.content: It's too early to go to bed.
passages.content_zh: 時間太早了，該睡覺了。

passages.name: Apartment 1
passages.content:
You turn on the TV to the news.

NewsMiku:
And that was Miku, with word from the Miku on
the street.

Now we go to Miku for the weather.

Just normal news, looks like.
passages.content_zh:
你打開電視看新聞。

新聞初音未來：
那是 Miku，來自 Miku 的訊息
街道。

現在我們去 Miku 看看天氣。

看起來只是普通新聞。

passages.name: Apartment 1
passages.content:
The clothing here is all a lot more feminine
than you remember.

Kaede:
Hero, I hadst not realized thou hadst changed
thy style.

Thou hast been listening to the great goddess
Florauna after all!
passages.content_zh:
這裡的服裝都更女性化
比你記得的還要多。

楓：
英雄，我沒有意識到你已經改變了
你的風格。

你一直在聽偉大女神的講話
畢竟弗洛勞納！

passages.name: Apartment 1
passages.content:
You're pretty sure these aren't yours?

Though you would look pretty cute in them.
passages.content_zh:
你確定這些不是你的？

雖然你穿著它們看起來很可愛。

passages.name: Apartment 1 — Kaede — p1
passages.content:
...There's someone asleep in your bedroom
door.

???????:
Augh\..\..\..\..
What varlet hast set up a drum inside mine
head?

She climbs to her feet.

????:
Hero? Art thou the reason for the incessant
furor within mine pate?

Tis not fair that I shouldst have such a
pounding within mine head without the
memories of the revel that must have
preceded it!

Kaede?:
Of course hero!\!
Hast thou lost thy wits, to not recognize thy
closest companion?

Kaede?:
Methinks the answer to that is somewhere
between yes and no.

She licks a finger and feels the air.

Yes, not quite real, but speedily approaching.\!
Methinks this is yon dark goddess building a
change.

A dream that shall soon become real.

Though if this be a dream, odds must be a
dreamer.\!
The center of this world, the source of this
change.

If we perchance find that soul, we mightst be
able to avert yon changes.

She looks down at herself.

Of course, I have no need to wait uponst
another to free me from this form.

Canst thou believe that goddess ist foolish
enough to believe she couldst trap a
venerable master of forms such as I in an
unwanted shape?!

Kaede:
Now, give me but a moment to reclaim my
form, then we shall go see what spike we might
put in this scoundrel's plans!

She focuses.

Nothing changes.

Kaede:
This doth be a most pussiant curse indeed.\!
But worry not, I shalt prevail!

She focuses again.

Her brow furrows as she concentrates harder
and harder.

You can see the strain building in her body as
every muscle tenses.

Until finally...

A pair of fox ears pop out of the top of her
head.

She dusts off her hands happily.

Kaede:
Ha, the varlet should have known no form
could holdst me for long!

She brushes a lock of teal hair away from
her eyes.

'Tis truly a regret that thou dost not possess
my own control of mine form.

She brushes the teal hair away again.

Though that would make thy journey so much
less interesting!\!

Her bangs flop in front of her eyes once more.

One who\..\..\.. cha
passages.content_zh:
……有人在你的臥室裡睡著了
門。

??????：
啊\..\..\..\..
哪個混蛋在我的礦坑裡放了一個鼓
頭？

她站了起來。

？ ？ ？ ：
英雄？你是永不停歇的原因嗎
我的頭腦裡憤怒嗎？

我應該有這樣一個，這不公平
在我的腦中撞擊而沒有
狂歡的回憶一定有
在它之前！

楓？ ：
當然是英雄！ \!
你是否失去了理智，不認識自己了？
最親密的伴侶？

楓？ ：
我認為答案就在某個地方
介於是和否之間。

她舔了舔手指，感受空氣。

是的，不太真實，但正在迅速接近。 \！
我想這是黑暗女神正在建造一座
改變。

一個很快就會成為現實的夢想。

雖然如果這是一個夢，那麼可能性一定很大
夢想家。 \!
這個世界的中心，這個世界的源頭
改變。

如果我們有機會找到那個靈魂，我們可能會
能夠避免你的變化。

她低頭看著自己。

當然，我不需要等待
另一個讓我擺脫這種形式的。

你能相信女神是愚蠢的嗎
足以相信她能困住一個
像我這樣的可敬的形式大師
不需要的形狀？ ！

楓：
現在，請給我一點時間來收回我的
形式，然後我們就去看看我們可能會出現什麼尖峰
把這個無賴的計畫放進去！

她集中註意力。

沒有任何改變。

楓：
這確實是一個最頑固的詛咒。 \！
但不用擔心，我一定會贏！

她再次集中註意力。

她的眉頭皺起，注意力更加集中
而且更難。

你可以看到她體內的壓力逐漸增加
每塊肌肉都緊張。

直到最後...

一對狐狸耳朵從她的頭頂突出
頭。

她高興地撣掉手上的灰塵。

楓：
哈，這個混蛋應該不知道任何形式
可以讓我堅持很久！

她撥開一綹青色頭髮
她的眼睛。

沒有擁有真是一種遺憾
我自己控制自己的形式。

她再次拂開青色的頭髮。

儘管這會讓你的旅程變得如此充實
不太有趣！ \！

她的瀏海再次垂到眼前。

一\..\..\.. 查

passages.name: Apartment 1 — p1
passages.content:
You awaken very slowly.

For a brief instant, you feel odd.

But it passes.

Though something still feels off.

Groggily, you get to your feet, struggling
against a feeling that the world just isn't quite
real right now.

Your glasses don't seem to be working quite
right either.

At least this can't get weirder than your last
few days have been?\.\. Probably?
passages.content_zh:
你醒來的速度非常緩慢。

有那麼一瞬間，你覺得很奇怪。

但它過去了。

雖然還是覺得有些不對勁。

你搖搖晃晃地站起來，掙扎著
反對一種世界並不完全的感覺
現在是真的。

你的眼鏡似乎不太好用
也對。

至少這不會比你上次的更奇怪
已經幾天了？ \.\.大概？

passages.name: Apartment 1 — Old text — p1
passages.content:
...There's someone asleep in your bedroom
door.

???????:
Augh\..\..\..\..
What varlet hast set up a drum inside mine
head?

She climbs to her feet.

???????:
You there!\!
Art thou the knave who hast struck me down
and stolen away mine companions?

Thou shouldst make thy peace with thine gods
if so, for thou faces the chosen of a goddess
herself!

She climbs to her feet, ready to fight.

Kaede?:
How dost thou know mine name, stranger?

She looks around, then examines you closely.

Kaede?:
We art still in the hero's apartment...\!
And thou dost have a heroic mien...

Kaede?:
Why, ist that you ?

Kaede?:
Why, that is quite the fetching form thou hast
taken.

Though I must admit I find thy previous form
more pleasing to the eye.

Kaede?:
Methinks the answer to that is somewhere
between yes and no.

She licks a finger and feels the air.

Yes, not quite real, but speedily approaching.\!
Methinks this is yon dark goddess building a
change.

A dream that shall soon become real.

Of course, I have no need to wait upon her
pleasure.

'Tis foolish indeed to think that she could trap
a venerable master of forms such as I in an
unwanted shape!

She pauses and looks you up and down.

Kaede:
Though you shalt have to fend for yourself,
hero.

Why, even if I couldst shift thy form, wouldst
be a crime to make you any less fetching!

Kaede:
Now, give me but a moment to reclaim my
form, then we shall go see what spike we might
put in this scoundrel's plans!

She focuses.

Kaede:
This doth be a most pussiant curse indeed.\!
But worry not, I shalt prevail!

She focuses again.

Her brow furrows as she focuses harder and
harder.

You can see the strain building in her body as
every muscle tenses.

Until finally...

A pair of fox ears pop out of the top of her
head.

She dusts off her hands happily.

Kaede:
Ha, the varlet should have known no form
could holdst me for long!

She brushes a lock of teal hair away from
her eyes.

'Tis truly a regret that thou dost not possess
my own c
passages.content_zh:
……有人在你的臥室裡睡著了
門。

??????：
啊\..\..\..\..
哪個混蛋在我的礦坑裡放了一個鼓
頭？

她站了起來。

？ ？ ？ ？ ？ ？ ？ ：
你在那裡！ \！
你就是那個打倒我的惡棍嗎
還偷走了我的同伴？

你應該與你的神和好
如果是這樣的話，因為你面對的是女神的選民
她自己！

她站起來，準備戰鬥。

楓？ ：
你怎麼知道我的名字，陌生人？

她環顧四周，然後仔細地審視你。

楓？ ：
我們還在英雄的公寓裡…\！
而且你還有一種英雄氣概…

楓？ ：
為什麼，是你嗎？

楓？ ：
哎呀，你的造型真是太迷人了
採取。

雖然我必須承認我找到了你以前的樣子
更順眼。

楓？ ：
我認為答案就在某個地方
介於是和否之間。

她舔了舔手指，感受空氣。

是的，不太真實，但正在迅速接近。 \！
我想這是黑暗女神正在建造一座
改變。

一個很快就會成為現實的夢想。

當然，我沒必要伺候她
高興。

認為她可以誘捕她確實是愚蠢的
一位德高望重的形式大師，例如我在
不需要的形狀！

她停下來，上下打量你。

楓：
雖然你必須自己照顧自己，
英雄。

為什麼，即使我可以改變你的形態，
讓你不再那麼迷人就是犯罪！

楓：
現在，請給我一點時間來收回我的
形式，然後我們就去看看我們可能會出現什麼尖峰
把這個無賴的計畫放進去！

她集中註意力。

楓：
這確實是一個最頑固的詛咒。 \！
但不用擔心，我一定會贏！

她再次集中註意力。

當她更加集中註意力時，她皺起了眉頭
更難。

你可以看到她體內的壓力逐漸增加
每塊肌肉都緊張。

直到最後...

一對狐狸耳朵從她的頭頂突出
頭。

她高興地撣掉手上的灰塵。

楓：
哈，這個混蛋應該不知道任何形式
可以讓我堅持很久！

她撥開一綹青色頭髮
她的眼睛。

沒有擁有真是一種遺憾
我自己的c

passages.name: Apartment 1 — Old text — p3
passages.content:
You awaken very slowly.

Ugh, you do not feel well.

Were you drinking last night? This feels like a
full-body hangover.\!
You don't remember drinking, but why else
would you feel this way?

You reluctantly open your eyes.

You stumble as you get out of bed.\!
Everything just feels *off* for a moment.

Yup, you're looking different again. Should
probably go check that out.\!
At least you're quickly feeling better.
passages.content_zh:
你醒來的速度非常緩慢。

呃，你覺得不舒服。

昨晚你喝酒了嗎？這感覺就像一個
全身宿醉。 \!
你不記得喝酒了，但為什麼呢？
你會有這樣的感覺嗎？

你不情願地睜開眼睛。

當你起床時你絆倒了。 \!
一切都在一瞬間感覺「不對勁」。

是的，你看起來又不一樣了。應該
也許去檢查一下。 \！
至少你很快就會感覺好一點。

passages.name: Apartment 1 — ARG trigger
passages.content:
Your glasses do nothing. Terra Games
probably forgot to program them to work in
dreams.

You'd file a bug report, but the beta is officially
over.
passages.content_zh:
你的眼鏡沒有任何作用。泰拉遊戲
可能忘記對它們進行編程以使其工作
夢想。

你會提交一份錯誤報告，但測試版已經正式發布
結束了。

passages.name: Store — Angry clothes — p1
passages.content:
Miku:
No no no!

Nothing here is good!

She rips the clothing she's holding in half
and throws it on one of the piles around her.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
不不不！

這裡沒有什麼是好的！

她把手裡的衣服撕成兩半
然後把它扔到她周圍的一堆堆上。

passages.name: Store — Old Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
As you approach the next location, Kaede
once more halts you.

Kaede:
Now remembereth Hero, thou might be
exposed to the wildest excesses of man once
we happen upon another crowd of mortals.

Thy kin may sense that they lie in a state much
like a dream, and dreams bear no
consequences for aught mortals might do.

Who knows what debauched acts might be
performed? What dark fantasies might find the
light of day?

She shivers with anticipation as you open the
door.

Miku:
Ooo, how does this one look on me?

Employee Miku:
It looks fine.

Miku:
Hmm, I'm not sure...\!
Next!

Other Miku:
Hmm, I wonder how that would look on me...

Employee Miku:
The same?

Miku:
How about this one?\!
I love all the themed accessories you have!

Employee Miku:
Fine. It's fine.

Other Miku:
How would I look in that one?

Employee Miku:
The same.

Miku:
I'm trying a swimsuit this time!\!
A little more daring than I'd usually like, but
why not!

Employee Miku:
Sure. Great. Whatever.

Other Miku:
Huh, do you think *that* would look good
on me?

Employee Miku:
Yes!\!
You two look identical!

Everything she's wearing would look the
same on you!

Other Miku:
...Are you sure?
passages.content_zh:
當你接近下一個地點時，楓
再一次阻止你。

楓：
現在記住英雄，你可能是
曾經暴露於人類最瘋狂的暴行之中
我們碰巧遇到了另一群凡人。

你的親屬可能會感覺到他們處於一種非常糟糕的狀態
就像一場夢，而夢沒有任何意義
對凡人可能造成的後果。

誰知道會是什麼樣的放蕩行為
執行？黑暗的幻想可能會發現什麼
天光？

當你打開門時，她因期待而顫抖
門。

米庫：
哦哦，這個人看我怎麼樣？

員工美九：
看起來不錯。

米庫：
嗯，我不確定...\！
下一個！

其他初音未來：
嗯，我想知道這對我來說會是什麼樣子...

員工美九：
一樣嗎？

米庫：
這個怎麼樣？ \!
我喜歡你所有的主題配件！

員工美九：
很好。沒關係。

其他初音未來：
我穿上那件會是什麼樣子？

員工美九：
一樣的。

米庫：
這次我要試泳衣！ \!
比我平常想要的更大膽一些，但是
為什麼不呢！

員工美九：
當然。偉大的。任何。

其他初音未來：
嗯，你認為*那*看起來不錯嗎
在我身上？

員工美九：
是的！ \!
你們兩個看起來一模一樣！

她穿的所有東西看起來都是
你也一樣！

其他初音未來：
……你確定嗎？

passages.name: Store
passages.content:
Poster:
Feeling bored?\!
Tired?\!
Squamous?

Why not take a trip with the Dreamlands
Travel Agency!

Now offering luxury trips to Lost Carcosa!

Kaede tries to cover up the poster.

Kaede:
Beware Hero! 'Tis not for the mortal mind
to contemplate!

She takes another look at the poster.

Besides, Lost Carcosa hast become much too
touristy in recent times.
passages.content_zh:
海報：
感覺無聊？ \!
疲勞的？ \！
鱗狀？

何不跟夢想國度去旅行
旅行社！

現在提供前往失落卡爾科薩的豪華旅行！

楓試圖掩蓋海報。

楓：
當心英雄！這不適合凡人的頭腦
思考一下！

她又看了一眼海報。

此外，Lost Carcosa 也變得太多了
最近一段時間旅遊旺盛。

passages.name: Store — Miku employee
passages.content:
Employee Miku:
This is one of those nightmares.\!
Where I'm stuck at work and all the customers
are horrible.

...

At least they're all kind of hot.

Employee Miku:
Anyway, is there anything I can help
you find cutie?

She thinks for a moment.

Employee Miku:
Paint, paint...

Ah yes, follow me!

She leads you to another part of the store.

Employee Miku:
Sorry for all the mess, it's been so weird here
since everything turned into a nonsense
dreamscape!

She giggles.

Employee Miku:
Anyway, here we are!\!
Paint!

Now, there was something about it...\!
Some new corporate policy...

Oh right, you have to fight a vicious beast
for it!\!
Really, it's not the weirdest promotion
corporate has had us do.

Employee Miku:
By fighting this beast you waive all liability for
injuries from fighting this beast!\!
Havefunbye!

Employee Miku:
We hope you have enjoyed this stunning
victory and/or slow and humiliating death!

She leads you back to the main part of the
store.

Employee Miku:
Sure!

Employee Miku:
I'll be honest, I have no idea how I just did
that.

Employee Miku:
Let me know if you need anything!

Employee Miku:
Sorry, daring battles to the death are limited
to one per customer.

Employee Miku:
Sure!

Employee Miku:
I'll be honest, I have no idea how I just did
that.

Employee Miku:
Let me know if you need anything!

Employee Miku:
Sure!

Employee Miku:
I'll be honest, I have no idea how I just did
that.

Employee Miku:
Let me know if you need anything!
passages.content_zh:
員工美九：
這是那些噩夢之一。 \！
我和所有顧客都被困在工作中
太可怕了。

…

至少他們都很熱。

員工美九：
不管怎樣，有什麼我可以幫忙的嗎
你找到小可愛了嗎？

她想了一會兒。

員工美九：
油漆，油漆…

啊，是的，跟我來！

她帶你到商店的另一個地方。

員工美九：
抱歉搞得一團糟，這裡太奇怪了
既然一切都變成了無稽之談
夢境！

她咯咯地笑。

員工美九：
無論如何，我們來了！ \!
畫！

現在，有一些關於它的事情......\！
一些新的公司政策...

喔對了，你必須和兇猛的野獸戰鬥
為了它！ \！
真的，這不是最奇怪的促銷
公司已經讓我們這麼做了。

員工美九：

Be not shocked by all of the

你不明白她的問題是什麼。

// 如果 A 打開，則不使用預設回應。

你看看鏡子裡的自己。 \!
嘿嘿，看起來還蠻不錯的！

甚至化了點妝也能起到偽裝的作用
提供一些色彩！

楓：
能不能別再這樣笑了？

// 如果 A 打開，則不使用預設回應。

你有點顫抖。 \!
你以為你撿到的服裝
會更溫暖。

乍一看，也許不是。

但這裡真正重要的是你有
刀。 \！
很多很多的刀。

獲得太多的刀了！

// 如果 A 打開，則不使用預設回應。

天堂般的合唱在你周圍奏響

passages.name: Store — p1
passages.content:
A pile of shredded clothing.

The clothing dissolves into a cloud of angry
mist!

The clothing dissolves into a massive cloud
of angry mist!

You clean up the scraps of torn clothing.

Hey, there was something buried in the pile!

Pink paint acquired!
passages.content_zh:
一堆破爛的衣服。

衣服溶解成一團憤怒的雲
霧！

衣服溶解成一朵巨大的雲
憤怒的霧氣！

你清理破爛的衣服碎片。

嘿，堆裡埋著什麼東西！

粉紅色油漆已獲得！

passages.name: Store — p1
passages.content:
There's one outfit remaining on the rack.\!
Though it's too big.

Busty Mikuniform acquired!
passages.content_zh:
架子上還剩下一件衣服。 \!
雖然它太大了。

巨乳三國服入手！

passages.name: Store — p2
passages.content: Only shredded clothing remains on the rack.
passages.content_zh: 架子上只剩下撕碎的衣服。

passages.name: Store — Slim mikuniform — p1
passages.content:
There's one outfit remaining on the rack.\!
Though it's too small.

Slim Mikuniform acquired!
passages.content_zh:
架子上還剩下一件衣服。 \!
雖然它太小了。

修身三國服入手！

passages.name: Store — Slim mikuniform — p1
passages.content:
There's one outfit remaining on the rack.\!
It's just right!

Medium Mikuniform acquired!
passages.content_zh:
架子上還剩下一件衣服。 \!
剛剛好！

中米國服獲得！

passages.name: Store — Third intro scene — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
Hero, wait, take not another step!

Kaede:
Hero, these errant buffoons hast given me
an idea!

Miku:
Hey, screw you!

Kaede:
Those varlets outside swarmed in numbers
too high for even our doughty party to ward
off.

So if we canst not beat the Miku, we shall
become the Miku!

This merchant seemst to stock many a good.
Surely we might craft a most cunning disguise
for you!

Kaede:
Well-

She pauses.

Opens her mouth.

Reconsiders.

Frowns.

Kaede:
Trust me when I say hero that thou dost not
wish to know.

Kaede:
'Tis a cunning plan indeed, is it not?

If thou truly dost not know any of mine tales,
we shalt have to make new ones!

Kaede:
But hero, there ist no other choice!

Kaede:
Now let us see what treasures this merchant
holds.\!
Methinks three items shall suffice.

She walks off into the store.
passages.content_zh:
楓：
英雄，等等，不要再踏出一步！

楓：
英雄，這些錯誤的小丑給了我
一個想法！

米庫：
嘿，操你！

楓：
外面那些混混蜂擁而至
太高了，連我們強壯的一方都無法保護
關閉。

所以如果我們不能打敗Miku，我們就
成為Miku！

這個商人似乎存有很多好東西。
我們當然可以設計出最狡猾的偽裝
為了你！

楓：
嗯-

她停了下來。

張開嘴。

重新考慮一下。

皺起眉頭。

楓：
相信我，當我說英雄時，你不會
希望知道。

楓：
這確實是一個狡猾的計劃，不是嗎？

如果你真的不知道我的故事，
我們必須製作新的！

楓：
但英雄，別無選擇！

楓：
現在讓我們來看看這位商人到底珍藏著什麼
成立。 \!
我認為三項就足夠了。

她走進商店。

passages.name: Store — Old Kaede — p1
passages.content:
Kaede has cornered a set of Mikus and is
interrogating them.

Kaede:
What dost thou even think thee art doing?!\!
You couldst be doing anything! Why this?!

Miku:
I could never fit into a size zero like this! I'm
enjoying it while I can!

Miku:
Are you kidding? No consequences!\!
I'm trying on everything in the store!

And I'm not even going to put it on the rack
for reshelving afterwards!

She runs off into the store laughing.

Kaede:
Well? And what is thy absurd reason?

The final Miku blushes.

Miku:
\}I'm just enjoying being pretty...

Kaede throws up her hands.

Kaede:
Fine! Whatever!

She turns back to you.

Kaede:
Meet me back at the exit when thou art done
with this nonsense, Hero.

Mine senses tell me of another place to search.

She heads back to the front of the store.
passages.content_zh:
楓已經壟斷了一組 Mikus，並且正在
審問他們。

楓：
你以為你在做什麼？ ！ \！
你可以做任何事！為什麼會這樣呢？ ！

米庫：
我永遠無法適應這樣的零號！我是
盡我所能享受它！

米庫：
你在開玩笑嗎？沒有任何後果！ \！
店裡的東西我都試了！

我什至不會把它放在架子上
以便事後重新上架！

她笑著跑進商店。

楓：
嗯？你的荒謬理由是什麼？

最後的Miku臉紅了。

米庫：
\}我只是享受美麗的感覺...

楓舉起雙手。

楓：
好吧！任何！

她轉身面向你。

楓：
完成後在出口處與我會面
胡言亂語，英雄。

我的感覺告訴我還有另一個地方可以搜尋。

她回到商店前面。

passages.name: Store — Old Kaede — p2
passages.content:
Kaede pinches her nose tiredly.

Kaede:
Truly, I canst not tell if the fault lies in thee or
if thy world has grown so tight that *this*
feels like freedom.
passages.content_zh:
楓疲倦地捏著鼻子。

楓：
說實話，我分不清到底是你的錯還是
如果你的世界變得如此緊密以至於*這個*
感覺就像自由。

passages.name: Park — Autoplay event — p1
passages.content:
Indeed, as you enter the park you see off in
the distance a pile of teal-haired bodies.

Kaede:
See?

She licks her lips.

Kaede:
'Tis been barely a nonce and already a great
mass of mortals has come together to indulge
all of their basest impulses!

Kaede:
We should get closer.

Purely to check whether the dreamer we
seek lies amongst them, of course!

You approach.

As you get closer, you start to be able to make
out the noises coming from the\..\..\..
surprisingly clothed pile?

Miku:
-You're right, hugs *are* amazing.\!
I don't know why I ever let society's standards
of masculinity keep me from doing this!

The Miku holding her pats her gently on the
back as she starts to cry.

Miku:
And crying! It feels so good to not be holding
my emotions!\!
Why didn't I do this earlier?!

From what you can hear, similar conversations
are going on all over, as well as a lot of hugs
and cuddling.

It's surprisingly platonic, given everything
Kaede was saying.

Kaede:
Where's the orgy?!\!
There was supposed to be an earthshattering
orgy!

One of the Mikus looks up in irritation, a few
tears on her face.

Miku:
We can have empty sex *anytime*! I've never
had a chance for emotional processing like this!

There's a chorus of agreement from all around.

Kaede wanders back to you, looking stunned.

Kaede:
I thought I was prepared to see the deepest,
darkest desires of humanity.

But I was *not* prepared for *this*!!

Kaede:
Still, needs must.\!
I shall check if any of this aberrant crowd art
the dreamer.

But I believe we shalt need to explore the
next grouping of dream energy I dost sense,
on the far side of this glade.

She heads off through the crowd.
passages.content_zh:
事實上，當你進入公園時，你會看到
遠處是一堆青色頭髮的屍體。

楓：
看到了嗎？

她舔了舔嘴唇。

楓：
這只是一次偶然，但已經是一次偉大的
大量凡人聚集在一起沉迷
他們所有的卑鄙衝動！

楓：
我們應該靠近一點。

純粹是為了檢查做夢者是否我們
當然是在他們中間尋找謊言！

你靠近。

當你越來越接近時，你開始能夠
消除來自\..\..\..的噪音
令人驚訝的是衣服堆？

米庫：
-你是對的，擁抱*太*棒了。 \！
我不知道為什麼我要讓社會的標準
男子氣概阻止我這樣做！

抱著她的 Miku 輕輕地拍著她的臉
當她開始哭泣時回來了。

米庫：
還哭了！不被握著的感覺真好
我的情緒！ \！
我為什麼不早點這樣做？

據你所聽到的，類似的對話
到處都在發生，還有很多擁抱
和擁抱。

考慮到一切，這是令人驚訝的柏拉圖式
凱德說。

楓：
狂歡在哪裡？ ！ \！
本來應該有驚天動地的
狂歡！

其中一位米庫斯惱怒地抬起頭，幾個
她臉上掛著淚水。

米庫：
我們*隨時*都可以進行空虛的性愛！我從來沒有
有機會這樣處理情感！

各方一致同意。

楓走回你身邊，看起來很震驚。

楓：
我以為我已經準備好看到最深處
人類最黑暗的慾望。

但我*沒有*為此做好準備！

楓：
儘管如此，仍然需要。 \！
我會檢查是否有任何異常的人群藝術
夢想家。

但我相信我們需要探索
我感覺到的下一組夢想能量，
在這片空地的另一邊。

她從人群中走開。

passages.name: Park
passages.content:
Miku:
No, no, this is all wrong!\!
I'm supposed to be a miko, not a Miku!

Oh Florauna, why have you set me this trial?
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
不，不，這都是錯的！ \！
我應該是巫女，不是初音未來！

噢，Florauna，你為什麼要給我這個考驗？

passages.name: Park
passages.content:
The two Mikus are leaning into each other in
a hug.

Miku 1:
This is so nice...

Miku 2:
Yeah...

Miku 1:
And I don't want to fuck you!

Miku 2:
I know!\!
Who would have though that just touching could
feel so good?

And not, like, sexy touching!

Miku 1:
I just, never had anything like this before.\!
Thank you so much for this!

Miku 2:
Hey dude, I'm just learning it too.\!
Thank you!

They both sigh happily and cuddle a little
closer.
passages.content_zh:
兩個 Miku 互相靠在一起
一個擁抱。

初音未來1：
這真是太好了...

初音未來2：
是啊...

初音未來1：
我不想操你！

初音未來2：
我知道！ \!
誰會想到只要碰觸就能
感覺這麼好？

而且不是性感的觸摸！

初音未來1：
我只是，以前從來沒有過這樣的事。 \！
非常感謝您！

初音未來2：
嘿老兄，我也剛學。 \!
謝謝你！

他們倆都幸福地嘆了口氣，輕輕地擁抱在一起
更近了。

passages.name: Park
passages.content:
Miku 1:
Huh.

Miku 2:
Yeah.

Miku 1:
So I spent my whole life trying to be all buff
and manly, and for what?

They all look down at themselves.

Miku 3:
Yeah, doesn't seem to be much point in that
now.

Miku 2:
Yeah...\!
I'd be getting angry if anyone said it before,
but now...?
passages.content_zh:
初音未來1：
呵呵。

初音未來2：
是的。

初音未來1：
所以我一生都在努力讓自己變得更美麗
又有男子氣概，又為了什麼？

他們都瞧不起自己。

初音未來3：
是的，這似乎沒有什麼意義
現在。

初音未來2：
是啊...\！
如果以前有人這麼說我會生氣
但現在...？

passages.name: Park
passages.content:
Miku 1:
You know, I never really let myself think about
it before, but being cute is kind of fun?

Miku 2:
Yeah! Yeah!

She jumps up and down excitedly.

Miku 2:
Look at me! I'm bubbly!
passages.content_zh:
初音未來1：
你知道，我從來沒有真正讓自己思考過
以前是這樣，但是可愛也是一種樂趣？

初音未來2：
是啊！是的！

她興奮地跳上跳下。

初音未來2：
看著我！我很泡泡！

passages.name: Park — Kaede 2
passages.content:
Kaede:
Come hero, the dreamer awaits!

Head out?

Kaede:
Simply speak the word when ready!
passages.content_zh:
楓：
英雄來吧，夢想家等待著！

出去嗎？

楓：
準備好後只需說出這個字即可！

passages.name: Park
passages.content:
Miku:
I'm an idol now. I want to sing!\!
But a singer needs a stage...

Miku:
You know, I bet we could do something with
these tables...
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我現在是偶像了。我想唱歌！ \!
但歌手需要舞台...

米庫：
你知道，我打賭我們可以做些什麼
這些桌子...

passages.name: Park — Feral warning — p1
passages.content:
As you start to walk away, one of the members
of the cuddlepile calls out to you.

Miku:
Oh, watch out for the feral Mikus!

Another Miku:
They're animals that got changed too! They
really don't seem to be happy about it.

Yet Another Miku:
No, they're people whose minds couldn't bear
the majesty of being Miku!

This Is Certainly A Lot Of Mikus:
Or they're just LARPing!

Maybe The First Miku:
Why would they be LARPing?!\!
Animals make the most sense!

They devolve into friendly bickering.

Kaede:
...\!
Well. It seems we have another reason to
find this dreamer posthaste.
passages.content_zh:
當你開始走開時，其中一位成員
擁抱堆的人在呼喚你。

米庫：
哦，小心狂野的米庫斯！

另一個 Miku：
它們也是變了的動物！他們
似乎真的對此不太高興。

另一個 Miku：
不，他們是心靈無法承受的人
Miku 的威嚴！

這肯定是很多 Mikus：
或者他們只是 LARPing！

也許是第一個 Miku：
他們為什麼要 LARPing？ ！ \！
動物最有道理！

他們演變成友好的爭吵。

楓：
...\!
出色地。看來我們還有另一個理由
趕緊找到這個夢想家。

passages.name: Park 2
passages.content:
Miku 1:
One, two, and, lift!

They start carrying the table over to the
growing stage.
passages.content_zh:
初音未來1：
一，二，然後，舉起！

他們開始把桌子搬到
成長期。

passages.name: Park 2 — Singer
passages.content: She's singing a series of warmups.
passages.content_zh: 她正在唱一系列的熱身曲。

passages.name: Park
passages.content:
Miku:
It's so weird having a different perspective
like this...
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
擁有不同的視角真是太奇怪了
像這樣...

passages.name: Park — Autoplay event — p1
passages.content:
Indeed, as you enter the park you can see
teal-haired bodies paired off in twos and the
occasional three.

Kaede:
See?

She licks her lips.

Kaede:
'Tis been barely a nonce and already a great
mass of mortals has come together to indulge
all of their basest impulses!

Kaede:
We should get closer.

Purely to check whether the dreamer we
seek lies amongst them, of course!

As you get closer, you start to be able to make
out the noises coming from the\..\..\..
surprisingly clothed groups?

Miku:
-You're right, hugs *are* amazing.\!
I don't know why I ever let society's standards
of masculinity keep me from doing this!

The Miku holding her pats her gently on the
back as she starts to cry.

Miku:
And crying! It feels so good to not be holding
my emotions!\!
Why didn't I do this earlier?!

It's surprisingly platonic, given everything
Kaede was saying.

Kaede:
Where's the orgy?!\!
There was supposed to be an earthshattering
orgy!

One of the Mikus looks up in irritation, a few
tears on her face.

Miku:
We can have empty sex *anytime*! I've never
had a chance for emotional processing like this!

There's a chorus of agreement from all around.

Kaede wanders back to you, looking stunned.

Kaede:
I thought I was prepared to see the deepest,
darkest desires of humanity.

But I was *not* prepared for *this*!!

Kaede:
Still, needs must.\!
I shall check if any of this aberrant crowd art
the dreamer.

But I believe we shalt need to explore the
next grouping of dream energy I dost sense,
on the far side of this glade.

She heads off through the crowd.

她從人群中走開。

passages.name: Park
passages.content:
Miku:
I'm suddenly rethinking, like, every encounter
I've ever had.

Why was I so caught up in looking strong?
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我突然開始重新思考 每一次的相遇
我曾經有過。

為什麼我如此著迷於看起來堅強？

passages.name: Park
passages.content:
The two Mikus are leaning into each other in
a hug.

Miku 1:
This is so nice...

Miku 2:
Yeah...

Miku 1:
And I don't want to fuck you!

Miku 2:
I know!\!
Who would have though that just touching could
feel so good?

And not, like, sexy touching!

Miku 1:
I just, never had anything like this before.\!
Thank you so much for this!

Miku 2:
Hey dude, I'm just learning it too.\!
Thank you!

They both sigh happily and cuddle a little
closer.\!
You get the feeling that somewhere Kaede is
screaming.

兩個 Miku 互相靠在一起
一個擁抱。

初音未來1：
這真是太好了...

初音未來2：
是啊...

初音未來1：
我不想操你！

初音未來2：
我知道！ \!
誰會想到只要碰觸就能
感覺這麼好？

而且不是性感的觸摸！

初音未來1：
我只是，以前從來沒有過這樣的事。 \！
非常感謝您！

初音未來2：
嘿老兄，我也剛學。 \!
謝謝你！

他們倆都幸福地嘆了口氣，輕輕地擁抱在一起
更近一點。 \!
你會感覺到楓在某個地方
尖叫。

passages.name: Park
passages.content:
Miku 1:
You know, I never really let myself think about
it before, but being cute is kind of fun?

Miku 2:
Yeah! Yeah!

Miku 2:
Look at me! I'm bubbly!
passages.content_zh:
初音未來1：
你知道，我從來沒有真正讓自己思考過
以前是這樣，但是可愛也是一種樂趣？

初音未來2：
是啊！是的！

初音未來2：
看著我！我很泡泡！

passages.name: Park — Kaede 2
passages.content:
Kaede:
Ugh.\!
Are you ready to leave this ridiculous display
of mortal foolery, Hero?

Head out?

A few minutes later...

The bushes rustle.

Miku:
Strange.

She sniffs the air.

Miku:
Something\..\..\..\..\..\..
Not-Miku?

Miku:
Not-Miku!\!
Not-Miku bad!

Miku:
Tell Queen!\!
We hunt!

Kaede:
Simply speak the word when ready!
passages.content_zh:
楓：
呃。 \!
你準備好離開這個荒謬的展示了嗎
英雄，是凡人的愚蠢嗎？

出去嗎？

幾分鐘後…

灌木叢沙沙作響。

米庫：
奇怪。

她嗅了嗅空氣。

米庫：
東西\..\..\..\..\..\..
不是初音未來？

米庫：
不是 Miku！ \！
不是 Miku 壞！

米庫：
告訴女王！ \!
我們打獵！

楓：
準備好後只需說出這個字即可！

passages.name: Park — Gregor
passages.content:
Miku:
You know, I would say that this is my favorite
part of this game.

Being in a new body, trying out the new
sensations and perspective.\!
It's an extraordinary experience.

Probably Gregor:
It's too bad the game will still be over when
I wake up.  Maybe I can replay it.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
你知道，我會說這是我最喜歡的
這個遊戲的一部分。

進入新的身體，嘗試新的事物
感覺和觀點。 \！
這是一次非凡的經驗。

可能是格雷戈爾：
可惜比賽還是結束了
我醒了。  也許我可以重播它。

passages.name: Park
passages.content:
Miku 1:
Man, boobs are kind of great actually?

Miku 2:
I know!\!
That's what I keep telling everyone!

...Though they could be bigger.
passages.content_zh:
初音未來1：
兄弟，胸部真的很棒嗎？

初音未來2：
我知道！ \!
這也是我一直跟大家說的！

....雖然它們可以更大。

passages.name: Street — p1
passages.content:
The paper just says
\{\{\{NEWS???

Below it is a picture of Miku shrugging.
passages.content_zh:
論文只是說
\{\{\{新聞？ ？ ？

下面是 Miku 聳肩的照片。

passages.name: Street — p2
passages.content:
The paper just says
\{\{\{NEWS!

Below it is a picture of Miku giving a
thumbs-up.
passages.content_zh:
論文只是說
\{\{\{新聞！

以下是 Miku 給予的照片
豎起大拇指。

passages.name: Street — p3
passages.content:
\{\{MIKU IS WATCHING

Below the text is an image of Miku glaring at
you.
passages.content_zh:
\{\{MIKU 正在觀看

文字下方是 Miku 怒視的圖像
你。

passages.name: Street — Kaede conversation — p1
passages.content:
Kaede turns to you as you walk.

Kaede:
Ah, Hero, it seems there ist a silver lining in
the midst of this nightmare.

The two of us hast not had the chance prior
to forge bonds of kinship together.\!
To share our boasts and great deeds, as
warriors must.

Why, dear  tries, but she lacks the
true heart of a warrior that we both
share.

And the less spoken of that benighted ghost
the better.

Truly, chancing upon myself was an act of
divine providence!

But as I have spoken first, let me start the
first tale.\!
Not one of my greatest deeds, but one that I
remember fondly.

As you walk, she begins to recount fighting
and flirting her way through an entire city of
ogres.

Does this mean ogres are a thing now?
passages.content_zh:
當你走路時，楓轉向你。

楓：
啊，英雄，看來還有一線希望
在這場惡夢之中。

我們兩個之前沒有機會
結下血緣紐帶。 \!
分享我們的誇耀和偉大事蹟，
戰士必須的。

為什麼，親愛的嘗試，但她缺乏
我們都擁有一顆真正的戰士之心
分享。

而較少提及的那個愚昧的鬼魂
越好。

確實，碰見自己是一種行為
天意！

但正如我首先所說的，讓我開始
第一個故事。 \!
這不是我最偉大的事蹟之一，而是我所做的
深情地記得。

當你走路時，她開始講述戰鬥的經過
並在整個城市調情
食人魔。

這是否意味著食人魔現在已經成為一種存在了？

passages.name: Street — Kaede conversation — p2
passages.content:
Kaede finally finishes her story as you walk
through the city streets.

Kaede:
...And then I toldst the man that it wast not
the sword I had meant, but the thrust was
still just as true!

She laughs.

Kaede:
But Hero, I have not given thee a chance to
partake!

That wast mine favorite story of my deeds,
now your turn hast come!\!
Thou shouldst also have a turn for the telling
of deeds!

So tell me, what ist your favorite tale of mine
endeavors?

Kaede smiles at you.

Kaede:
Why yes Hero! Though thou art capable of
great things, we both know that thou art early
in thy tale.

Thou hast not fought great foes when I wast
not by thy side.

I do not wish to make thee feel downtrodden
by trying to compare thy meager deeds to a
legend that spans the ages!

So let thee present deeds of equal worth! My
deeds!

She pauses as you do not answer.

Kaede:
Do not worry! Any of my tales art sufficient!\!
I am curious to see which have spread the
most since I last roamed the world!

She scowls at you.

Kaede:
Hero, thy jests do not comport with the honor
I havest given thee.

She laughs.

Kaede:
Why Hero, that is all of them!

She laughs.

Kaede:
Truly, thou dost make the silliest of jests!

She pauses and takes a closer look at you.

Kaede:
By the goddess, dost thou truly not know any
of mine tales?

She shakes her head.

Kaede:
Hero, ignorance ist one thing, but this is
simply *uncultured*!

Hast thou been a hermit, to lack all knowledge
that even the tiniest babe should know?

She shakes her head again and continues
walking.

We shall have to see what must be done to
bring thee up to the level expected of one of
my party!
passages.content_zh:
當你行走時，楓終於講完了她的故事
穿過城市的街道。

楓：
……然後我告訴那個人這不是
我本來指的是劍，但推力是
還是一樣真實！

她笑了。

楓：
但是英雄，我沒有給你機會
參加！

這是我最喜歡的關於我的事蹟的故事，
現在輪到你了！ \!
你也應該有機會講述
的行為！

所以告訴我，你最喜歡我的故事是什麼
努力？

凱德對你微笑。

楓：
為什麼是英雄！雖然你有能力
很棒的事情，我們都知道你很早
在你的故事裡。

當我衰弱時，你還沒有與強大的敵人戰鬥過
不在你身邊。

我不想讓你感到受壓迫
試圖將你微不足道的行為與
跨越千古的傳奇！

因此，讓你展現同等價值的事蹟吧！我的
事蹟！

由於你沒有回答，她停了下來。

楓：
別擔心！我的任何故事都夠了！ \！
我很好奇到底是哪些人傳播了
自從我上次環遊世界以來最多！

她對你怒目而視。

楓：
英雄，你的玩笑與榮譽不相稱
我已經給你了。

她笑了。

楓：
為什麼是英雄，這就是他們的全部！

她笑了。

楓：
確實，你開的玩笑確實是最愚蠢的！

她停了下來，仔細地看著你。

楓：
女神發誓，你真的什麼都不知道嗎？
我的故事？

她搖搖頭。

楓：
英雄，無知是一回事，但這是
簡直*沒文化*！

你是隱士嗎，缺乏所有知識
即使是最小的嬰兒也應該知道嗎？

她再次搖搖頭，繼續說道
步行。

我們必須看看必須採取什麼措施
使您達到其中之一的預期水平
我的派對！

passages.name: Street — Kaede conversation — p3
passages.content:
Kaede has been telling you stories of "mine
exploits" as you walk.

They're\..\..\..\..\!
Well, about what you'd expect from Terra
Games' writing.

Pretty bland.\!
Lots of gratuitous nudity, but somehow never
enough sex to get censored.

A frankly excessive amount of
microtransactions.

A few are better, the ones she's decided to,
in her own words, "sexy it upst a nonce."

She's in the middle of one such story, which
seems to be very similar to the last game
Terra Games released, when she suddenly
pauses.

Kaede:
Does thou hear that, Hero?

You shrug.\!
Nothing stands out to you.

Kaede:
It's some kind of call...

Kaede:
Miku mi?

Miku:
Miku-mi!

Miku:
Miku-mi!

Mikus:
Miku-mi!

Feral Miku:
Not-Mikus found!

Feral Miku:
Not-Mikus bad!

Feral Mikus:
WE HUNT!

Kaede:
Hero, I suggest that, in this situation, it
might prevail upon us-

You take off running.

Kaede:
Yes. That.

She sprints after you.

A moment later, the Mikus follow.

A few blocks down, you manage to break
sight just long enough to duck into a
department store.

Hopefully this one is less haunted than the
last one.
passages.content_zh:
楓一直在跟大家講“我的故事”
當你走路時，功績」。

他們是\..\..\..\..\！
好吧，關於你對 Terra 的期望
遊戲寫作。

相當平淡。 \!
很多無緣無故的裸體，但不知何故從來沒有
足夠的性行為受到檢討。

坦白說，數量過多
微交易。

有一些更好，她決定的那些，
用她自己的話來說，「性感一下子就來了。 」

她正在經歷一個這樣的故事，
似乎和上一場比賽很相似
Terra Games 發布了，當她突然
停頓。

楓：
你聽到了嗎，英雄？

你聳聳肩。 \!
沒有什麼對你來說很突出。

楓：
這是某種召喚…

楓：
米庫米？

米庫：
米庫米！

米庫：
米庫米！

米庫斯：
米庫米！

野性初音：
不是米庫斯發現的！

野性初音：
不是 Mikus 壞！

野性米庫斯：
我們狩獵！

楓：
大俠，我建議，在這種情況下，
可能會說服我們——

你開始跑步。

楓：
是的。那。

她追趕你。

過了一會兒，米庫們也跟著走了。

幾個街區下來，你設法打破
視線夠長，可以躲進
百貨公司。

希望這比那個更不鬧鬼
最後一張。

passages.name: Department store outside — Autoplay
passages.content:
Feral Miku:
Found!

Feral Miku:
Not-Miku?\!
Or Good-Miku?

She shoves her face close to you and takes
a long sniff.

Feral Miku:
Hmm...

Feral Miku:
Hmm...

Feral Miku:
Hmm!!

Feral Miku:
Is good-Miku!

Feral Miku:
Odd Miku...\!
Variant Miku...

But still good-Miku!

Other Mikus:
\{GOOD-MIKU!

Kaede:
(, our plan hast worked!)

Feral Miku:
But this Miku...

Feral Miku:
Fox Miku?

Feral Miku:
Festival Miku?

Kaede:
I dost assure you, we art as Miku as any of
thee.

Feral Miku:
Medieval fox Miku?!

She stomps a foot on the ground angrily.

Feral Miku:
Not canon!\!
Bad waifu!

Bad-Miku!!!!

The surrounding crowd shouts in anger.

Miku crowd:
\{Bad-Miku!!!

Take to Queen!

They leap on Kaede and tie her up.

You follow as they begin to drag her down
the street.

Kaede:
\}Do not worry hero! This is but a small bump
upon our path!

One of the Mikus approaches you.

Miku:
Welcome Miku.\!
New Miku friend.

She nods.

Kaede:
\}We shall overcome these trials! \!
And arise once more!

Kaede:
\}Yes hero, befriend them!\!
Seduce them!

\}Take heed, thou canst coitus thy way out
of any problem!

Miku:
Good.\!
More good Miku always good.

Kaede:
\}Yes hero, wield thy silver tongue!\!
They shall falter before the force of thy
cunning linguism!

The Miku gives a determined shake of the
head.

Miku:
No!\!
Bad Miku not allowed!

Go to Queen!\!
Go to bad Miku jail!

The Miku jumps happily.

Miku:
Yes!\!
New friend!

Kaede:
\}Good work hero, learn their ways!\!
Become a part of yon group!

You mirror their reactions.

Miku:
Yay!\!
New friend!

Kaede:
\}And then!\!
Seduction!

The Miku holds out a pair of shiny stones.

Miku:
For new friend!\!
Membership bonus!\!
Miku fan club!

2x raw mana acquired!

Satisfied, she returns to the Miku horde.

Feral Miku:
Not-Miku!\!
Very Not-Miku!

Feral Miku:
Almost-Miku...\!
Like-Miku...

But Not-Miku!

Kaede:
Mayhaps we should havt considered our
disguise more carefully.

Other Mikus:
\{NOT-MIKU!

Catch!
passages.content_zh:
野性初音：
找到了！

野性初音：
不是 Miku？ \!
還是好初音？

她把臉湊近你並接受
長長地吸了一口氣。

野性初音：
嗯...

野性初音：
嗯...

野性初音：
嗯！ ！

野性初音：
是好-Miku！

野性初音：
