變種米庫...

但還是很好-Miku！

其他米庫斯：
\{好未來！

楓：
（，我們的計劃成功了！）

野性初音：
但是這個美九…

野性初音：
狐狸米庫？

野性初音：
祭典未來？

楓：
我向你保證，我們和 Miku 一樣
你。

野性初音：
中世紀的狐狸未來？ ！

她生氣地一腳踩在地上。

野性初音：
不是佳能！ \！
壞傢伙！

壞米庫！ ！ ！

周圍的人群憤怒的叫喊著。

初音未來族群：
\{壞未來！ ！ ！

帶到女王身邊！

他們跳到楓身上並將她綁起來。

當他們開始拖累她時你跟著
街道。

楓：
\}英雄別擔心！這只是一個小顛簸
在我們的道路上！

其中一位米庫斯接近你。

米庫：
歡迎米庫。 \!
新米庫朋友。

她點點頭。

楓：
\}我們一定會克服這些考驗！ \！
並再次崛起！

楓：
\}是的，英雄，與他們交朋友！ \！
勾引他們！

\}小心，你可以透過性交來擺脫困境
任何問題！

米庫：
好。 \!
更好的 Miku 總是好的。

楓：
\}是的，英雄，發揮你的巧舌如簧！ \！
他們將在你的力量面前動搖
狡猾的語言學！

Miku 堅定地搖晃著
頭。

米庫：
不！ \！
不允許壞未來！

去女王那裡！ \!
去壞初音監獄吧！

Miku高興地跳了起來。

米庫：
是的！ \!
新朋友！

楓：
\}幹得好英雄，學習他們的方法！ \！
成為yon集團的一員！

你反映了他們的反應。

米庫：
耶！ \！
新朋友！

楓：
\}然後！ \!
誘惑！

Miku 拿出一對閃亮的石頭。

米庫：
對於新朋友！ \！
會員獎金！ \!
Miku粉絲俱樂部！

獲得 2 倍原始法力！

她滿意地回到了 Miku 部落。

野性初音：
不是 Miku！ \！
非常不-Miku！

野性初音：
幾乎——初音未來...\！
就像 Miku...

但不是－初音未來！

楓：
也許我們應該考慮我們的
偽裝得更加仔細。

其他米庫斯：
\{不是初音未來！

抓住！

passages.name: Pride area — Pride initial scene — p1
passages.content:
You eventually arrive at your destination.

Head Miku?:
Prepare yourselves!\!
Door entry test number 5, ready!

Probably Head Miku:
Everyone else, prepare as well!

Your Healthtsune Miku Plan will cover injuries,
but there's no reason to be foolish fools
about it!

Probably Head Miku:
Penetration team, axes!

Assembled Mikus:
Axes!

Monitor Miku:
No effect Queen!

Queen Miku, You Guess:
Fire!

Assembled Mikus:
Fire!

Monitor Miku:
No effect Queen!

Queen Miku, You Guess:
...Knock politely?

Monitor Miku:
No effect Queen!

Pentration Miku:
I knocked too hard and my hand kind of hurts
now.

Monitor Miku:
Almost no effect Queen!

Queen Miku:
And this is why we have safety protocols!\!
Fine, fine, everyone take a break.

We'll recommence with the next round of
testing in two hours, as scheduled.

She fixes the last Test Miku with a glare.

And you!\!
Get some gloves or something!

The lead Miku turns down to face you.

Queen Miku:
And now what do *you* want?

Miku Guard:
Queen!\!
Bad Mikus!\!
Judgement!

Queen Miku:
\}Fires below, they've found some more poor
idiots...

She looks you over.

Queen Miku:
Yes, fine, they can go in Bad Miku Jail.

She rolls her eyes and continues.

Where they will be cared for to the best of
our abilities, until the day we can finally
persuade you \}foolish\{ Mikus that they
should go free.

Kaede struggles against her bonds.

Kaede:
Thou churl! Thou varlet!\!
We shall not go quietly!

Kaede steps forward.

Kaede:
Thou churl! Thou varlet!\!
We shall not go quietly!

And then is pulled back by her guards.

Queen Miku:
...That stupid, stupid dialect.

Queen Miku:
Kaede?

She laughs.

Queen \n[4]:
And the hero!

Queen \n[4]:
That is you, \n[10], correct?

Queen \n[4]:
How did you end up looking so foolish?

Queen \n[4]:
...This was fuzzbrain's idea, wasn't it.

Kaede:
Thou shouldst know that a disguise wast an
excellent idea!

A stroke of genius, if I might sound mine own
horn!

...Also yon hero chose it herself.

Pride laughs and looks bac
passages.content_zh:
您最終到達目的地。

頭米庫？ ：
做好準備！ \!
5 號門禁測試，準備就緒！

大概是頭未來：
其他人也做好準備吧！

您的 Healthtsune Miku 計劃將承保受傷、
但沒有理由成為愚蠢的傻瓜
關於它！

大概是頭未來：
突防隊，斧頭！

組裝好的米庫斯：
斧頭！

監視未來：
沒有效果女王！

未來女王，你猜：
火！

組裝好的米庫斯：
火！

監視未來：
沒有效果女王！

未來女王，你猜：
……禮貌地敲門？

監視未來：
沒有效果女王！

滲透初音未來：
我敲得太用力了，我的手有點痛
現在。

監視未來：
幾乎沒有效果女王！

米庫女王：
這就是我們制定安全協議的原因！ \！
好了好了，大家休息一下。

我們將重新開始下一輪
按照計劃，兩個小時內進行測試。

她瞪著最後的試煉未來。

你呢！ \！
戴上手套什麼的！

主角 Miku 轉身面向你。

米庫女王：
現在*你*想要什麼？

米庫守衛：
女王！ \!
壞米庫斯！ \！
判斷！

米庫女王：
\}下面著火了，他們發現了一些更窮的人
白痴...

她打量著你。

米庫女王：
是的，好吧，他們可以去巴德米庫監獄。

她翻了個白眼，繼續說。

他們將在那裡得到最好的照顧
我們的能力，直到有一天我們終於可以
說服你\}愚蠢的\{Mikus，他們
應該自由。

楓努力掙脫束縛。

楓：
你這個混蛋！你這個混蛋！ \！
我們不會安靜地走！

凱德向前邁出一步。

楓：
你這個混蛋！你這個混蛋！ \！
我們不會安靜地走！

然後被她的守衛拉了回來。

米庫女王：
……那種愚蠢、愚蠢的方言。

米庫女王：
楓？

她笑了。

女王\n[4]:
還有英雄！

女王\n[4]:
那是你，\n[10]，對嗎？

女王\n[4]:
你怎麼看起來這麼愚蠢？

女王\n[4]:
……這是fuzzbrain的主意，不是嗎？

楓：
你應該知道偽裝是浪費時間
好主意！

天才之舉，如果我可以說是我自己的
喇叭！

……也是英雄自己選擇的。

驕傲笑著回頭看

passages.name: Pride area — Miku bystander — p1
passages.content:
Miku:
Oh hey, are you here for a turn at the guard
rotation?

None of us really like the jail, but the ferals
Freak. Out. if we don't watch it.

(I can see you're variants, but just stay out
sight of their camp and you should be good.
None of us are going to tell.)

Anyway, I don't remember seeing you on the
schedule, but you're welcome to switch in.

Kaede:
There ist a schedule?

Miku:
Oh, of course!\!
\n[4] put it together.

You must not have been around here long if
you're not aware of that.

She's responsible for pretty much everything
here!

The guard rotations, the food distribution,
putting the shelters together...

She starts ticking things off on her fingers.

The scouting parties, the investigative
committees, the orgy protocols...

Kaede:
Though canst not be serious.

Miku:
Oh yeah!\!
We wouldn't have anything without her!

Kaede:
Are thou telling me that the lackwit is
responsible for all *this*??

\n[4]:
I organized a breakout from the underworld
itself!\!
Did you think I was an idiot?!

\n[4]:
Such. A. Joy. To be back with you two again.\!
\}Stupid curse.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
喔嘿，你是來這裡輪流看守的嗎
旋轉？

我們誰都不喜歡監獄，但野人
怪胎。出去。如果我們不看的話。

（我可以看出你們是變種，但請遠離
看到他們的營地，你應該會很好。
我們誰也不會告訴。 ）

無論如何，我不記得在網路上見過你
時間表，但歡迎您切換。

楓：
有時間表嗎？

米庫：
哦，當然！ \!
\n[4] 把它放在一起。

如果你在這裡待的時間不長
你不知道這一點。

她負責幾乎所有事情
在這裡！

警衛輪調、食物分配、
將避難所放在一起...

她開始在手指上打勾。

偵察隊、調查隊
委員會、狂歡協議…

楓：
雖然不可能不嚴重。

米庫：
噢耶！ \!
沒有她我們就什麼都沒有！

楓：
你在告訴我那個弱者是
負責這一切*？ ？

\n[4]:
我組織了一次從地下世界的突圍
本身！ \！
你以為我是白痴嗎？ ！

\n[4]:
這樣的。 A、喬伊。再次回到你們兩個身邊。 \!
\}愚蠢的詛咒。

passages.name: Pride area — Miku bystander — p2
passages.content:
Miku:
So, uh, you're not here to take a guard shift
then?
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
所以，呃，你不是來值班的
然後呢？

passages.name: Pride area — Jail door
passages.content: Probably best not to tempt fate.
passages.content_zh: 也許最好不要誘惑命運。

passages.name: Pride area — Pride escape reaction — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
Now that we hast made our escape, that
rogue's downfall shall be next...

Miku \n[4]:
So, here we are.

Kaede:
Thou cullionly barber-monger!

Miku \n[4]:
I knew you'd escape.\!
I'm not mad, just disappointed.

Disappointed that THE FOOLS I TOLD TO
GUARD THE PRISON ARE SO INCOMPETENT!

Guard Miku:
\}Sorry!

Miku \n[4]:
Goddess, it's almost enough to make me wish
for the spirits instead...

Kaede steps forward threateningly.

Kaede:
So ist this where thou triest to throw us back
in durience vile? Ist thou prepared to be
beaten into clamorous whining once more?

\n[4] laughs bitterly.

Miku \n[4]:
Hah!\!
No, I've seen how that turns out.

I can learn from my mistakes.\!
Unlike some people, *I* don't have fuzz for
brains.

And why not hang around and see what
happens?

I've got the next five sessions of door testing
scheduled, and the camp council should be
able to handle things for the moment.

The source of this searingly idiotic dream is
in that castle. We just need to find a way in.

Maybe the great power of the Hero will be
able to figure out something I couldn't!

She clasps her hands in front of her
sarcastically and gives you big fake puppy
dog eyes.

Please, Hero, work your magic.

Kaede:
Hmph!

Kaede:
Know that we shalt have our eyes on you,
varlet!

\n[4] rolls her eyes.

Miku \n[4]:
Sure, sure, I'm terrified.

\n[4] rejoined your party!
passages.content_zh:
楓：
既然我們已經逃脫了
接下來就是盜賊的覆滅了…

初音未來\n[4]:
所以，我們到了。

楓：
你這個卑鄙的理髮販！

初音未來\n[4]:
我就知道你會逃跑。 \!
我沒有生氣，只是失望。

對我告訴的傻瓜感到失望
看守監獄的人太無能了！

守衛美九：
\}抱歉！

初音未來\n[4]:
女神，已經足夠滿足我的願望了
而是為了靈魂...

楓威脅地向前走去。

楓：
這就是你試圖把我們扔回去的地方
在邪惡的情況下？你準備好了嗎
再次被打得大聲抱怨？

\n[4]苦笑。

初音未來\n[4]:
哈！ \！
不，我已經看到了結果。

我可以從錯誤中學習。 \!
與某些人不同，*我*沒有毛茸茸的感覺
大腦。

為什麼不閒晃看看有什麼
發生？

我已經進行了接下來的五次門測試
已安排好，營地理事會應
能夠處理暫時的事情。

這個愚蠢的夢想的根源是
在那座城堡裡。我們只需要找到一條進去的路。

也許英雄的強大力量會是
能夠弄清楚一些我無法弄清楚的事情！

她雙手緊握在身前
諷刺地給你一隻大假小狗
狗眼。

英雄，請施展你的魔法吧。

楓：
哼！

楓：
知道我們會注視著你，
瓦萊特！

\n[4]翻白眼。

初音未來\n[4]:
當然，當然，我很害怕。

\n[4]重新加入了你的隊伍！

passages.name: Pride area — Escape route
passages.content:
You just escaped, you don't want to go back
in just yet.
passages.content_zh:
你剛剛逃了出來，你不想再回去了
就在剛剛。

passages.name: Pride area — Discarded door opening things — p2
passages.content:
Miku:
I can't believe it!\!
A real performance!

Finally all my practice will pay off!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我簡直不敢相信！ \!
真實的表演！

終於我所有的練習都會得到回報！

passages.name: Pride area — Discarded door opening things — p2
passages.content:
Miku:
I can't say I approve of this diversion of effort
from making the camp a better place to live.

Still, \n[4] hasn't led us wrong yet.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
I can't say I approve of this diversion of effort
讓營地成為一個更好的居住地。

儘管如此，\n[4] 還沒有讓我們犯錯。

passages.name: Pride area — Sign
passages.content:
Take note:
A door needs a key.
But what is a key?

Can it cut like a knife?
Or lay like a sheet?
Perhaps you should search the middle sea.

\n[4]:
If you want to try singing to the door, go talk
to the professor at Mikuniversity to get a
song.
passages.content_zh:
請注意：
一扇門需要一把鑰匙。
但什麼是鑰匙呢？

能像刀一樣切嗎？
還是像床單一樣躺著？
也許你應該去尋找中海。

\n[4]:
如果你想嘗試對著門口唱歌，那就去說話吧
向米庫大學的教授尋求協助
歌曲。

passages.name: Pride area — Talking Miku guard and director — p3
passages.content:
Director:
Okay, now take the measurements we're
going to need for the stage!

And has anyone talked to Micatering?

Director Miku:
\{\{OH HEY-

She pauses and lowers the megaphone.

Director:
We've almost got everything set up!\!
Are you ready for the show to begin?

Director:
Come back when you're ready!
passages.content_zh:
導演：
好的，現在進行測量
需要舞台！

有沒有人跟 MiCater 談過？

米庫導演：
\{\{哦嘿-

她停了下來，降低了擴音器。

導演：
我們幾乎已經把一切都準備好了！ \!
你準備好演出開始了嗎？

導演：
準備好後就回來吧！

passages.name: Pride area — Entry Miku 1 — p3
passages.content:
Miku:
As if a door would care about politeness.

But on the other hand I never thought I'd
wake up as a fictional female idol, so what
do I know.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
就好像一扇門會關心禮貌一樣。

但另一方面我從沒想過我會
一覺醒來變成了虛構的女偶像那又怎樣
我知道嗎？

passages.name: Pride area — Entry Miku 2 — p3
passages.content:
Usher Miku:
Welcome, \.\.uh,\.\. door. Thank you for
attending our performance.

Can I offer you a program?\!
Any help finding your seat?

Miku:
Really?\!
This is what you're doing?

Usher Miku:
\}Shhh! Not in front of the door!

The door needs to approve of the
performance, so I'm doing my best to make
it as great an experience as possible!

Usher Miku:
Would you care to use the bathroom before
the start of the show?
passages.content_zh:
亞瑟·米庫：
歡迎，\.\.呃，\.\.門。謝謝你
參加我們的表演。

我可以為您提供一個程式嗎？ \!
有幫助找到座位嗎？

米庫：
真的嗎？ \!
這就是你在做什麼？

亞瑟·米庫：
\}噓！不是在門前！

門需要批准
表現，所以我正在盡我最大的努力
這是一次盡可能棒的體驗！

亞瑟·米庫：
你介意之前先去一下衛浴嗎
節目開始？

passages.name: Pride area — Castle door 2 — p2
passages.content:
You inspect the castle gate.

Miku \n[4]:
So this is *obviously* the center of the dream.

Kaede:
Yes, quite.

Miku \n[4]:
But nothing we've tried has even scratched
the door.

We've tried everything:\!
Axes...\!
Fire...\!
Clubs...

Pushing *and* pulling...\!
Politeness...\!
Extremely harsh words...

Nothing has worked!

I've got a blast Miku working on putting
together some explosives.\!
Maybe *that* will get through this thing.

Kaede:
Hast thou consulted that note over yonder?

Miku:
This note?

Miku:
It reads:

Take note:
A door needs a key.
What is a key?

Can it cut like a knife?
Or lay like a sheet?
Perhaps you should search the middle sea.

Kaede:
Hmmmst...\!
A note, a key...

Miku \n[4]:
What, you think that a castle would just put
the secret to opening its doors outside, for
any invader to see?

She rolls her eyes.

Miku \n[4]:
That is a *blisteringly* foolish idea.\!
I think we all just got a little dumber just from
hearing it.

Kaede raises an eyebrow.

Kaede:
Methinks thou dost not truly comprehend the
workings of thy world.

'Tis known that the winds of fate around a Hero
wilst tug the world into more convenient
shapes, challenges for the Hero to prove their
worth against again and again.

Such convenience ist no more odd than much
of what we have seen.

Miku \n[4]:
Sure!\!
Fine!\!
Whatever!

It's no dumber than anything else you do!

Your two party members continue to bicker
while you take a look at the riddle.

Take note:
A door needs a key.
What is a key?

Can it cut like a knife?
Or lay like a sheet?
Perhaps you should search the middle sea.

Note...\!
Key...\!
Sharp or flat...\!
Idols...

Kaede:
Why Hero, I dost believe thou hast hit upon
it!

\n[4] rubs her forehead tiredly.

Miku \n[4]:
Oh.\!
Great.

Kaede:
But what song wouldst be best? Dost this form
have some song aboutst it?

Miku \n[4]:
Quite a few, from what I understand.\!
I believe the professor at Mikuniversity has a
book of them.

That would be the way to test your stupid,
stupid theo
passages.content_zh:
你檢查城堡大門。

初音未來\n[4]:
所以這「顯然」是夢想的中心。

楓：
是的，相當。

初音未來\n[4]:
但我們嘗試過的任何方法都沒有刮傷
門。

我們已經嘗試了一切：\!
斧頭...\！
火...\！
俱樂部...

推*和*拉...\！
禮貌...\！
言語極其嚴厲...

什麼都沒起作用！

Miku 的推桿工作讓我玩得很開心
一起一些炸藥。 \！
也許*那個*會度過這件事。

楓：
你查閱過那邊那張紙條了嗎？

米庫：
這張紙條？

米庫：
上面寫著：

請注意：
一扇門需要一把鑰匙。
什麼是鑰匙？

能像刀一樣切嗎？
還是像床單一樣躺著？
也許你應該去尋找中海。

楓：
嗯...\！
一張紙條、一把鑰匙…

初音未來\n[4]:
什麼，你認為一座城堡就可以放
向外開門的秘密
有入侵者看到嗎？

她翻白眼。

初音未來\n[4]:
這是一個*極其*愚蠢的想法。 \！
我想我們都變得有點愚蠢了
聽到它。

楓揚起一邊眉毛。

楓：
我想你並沒有真正理解
你的世界的運作方式。

眾所周知，命運之風圍繞著英雄
將使世界變得更加便捷
形狀，英雄證明自己的挑戰
值得一再反對。

這種便利並不奇怪
我們所看到的。

初音未來\n[4]:
當然！ \!
美好的！ \！
任何！

這並不比你做的其他事情更愚蠢！

你們兩個黨員繼續爭吵
當你看謎語時。

請注意：
一扇門需要一把鑰匙。
什麼是鑰匙？

能像刀一樣切嗎？
還是像床單一樣躺著？
也許你應該去尋找中海。

筆記...\！
鑰匙...\！
尖銳或平坦...\！
偶像...

楓：
為什麼英雄，我相信你已經偶然發現了
它！

\n[4]疲倦地揉著額頭。

初音未來\n[4]:
哦。 \!
偉大的。

楓：
但哪首歌最好聽呢？填寫此表格
有一些關於它的歌嗎？

初音未來\n[4]:
據我了解，不少。 \!
我相信米庫大學的教授有一個
他們的書。

這就是考驗你愚蠢程度的方法
愚蠢的理論

passages.name: Pride area — Castle door 2 — p3
passages.content:
The gate remains solidly shut.

\n[4]:
If you want to try singing to the door, go talk
to the professor at Mikuniversity to get a
song.
passages.content_zh:
大門仍然緊閉。

\n[4]:
如果你想嘗試對著門口唱歌，那就去說話吧
向米庫大學的教授尋求協助
歌曲。

passages.name: Pride area — Castle door 2 — p4
passages.content:
You walk up to the gate.

Kaede:
So, it seemst that we art fully equipped.\!
We havest a gate-

She nods towards the castle.

A songbook.

\n[4] rolls her eyes.

Miku \n[4]:
Check.

Kaede:
Andst a singer!

Kaede:
...We dost have a singer, correct?

\n[4], wouldst thou care to finally
contribute to our trials?

\n[4]:
Oh Hells no.\!
My administration has consistently prioritized
infrastructure and development over the arts.

To be seen singing would invalidate all my
campaign promises!

Kaede:
Well I shall not be the one to caterwaul like a
common jongleur!\!
'Tis far below mine dignity!

\n[4]:
You were the one who came up with this
genius idea, you can be the one to implement
it!

They start bickering.

Kaede:
Truly Hero? Oh \n[10], what hast I
done to cause this betrayal?

She sighs.

But let it not be said that the Great Goddess's
companion couldst not step up when her aid
was required.

Givest me that songbook, knave!

She takes a deep breath...

And sings!

It's\..\..\..\.. okay.\!
The way she mangles the lyrics to fit her
preferred way of speaking does not do it any
favors.

Nothing really scans or follows a good rhythm.

But you'd say it's better than at least 90% of
the sonic attacks you've taken since you
started playing this game.

\n[4]:
Fine.\!
Fine!

What's another indignity?!

She slams open the book and starts singing.

It's\..\..\..\.. okay.\!
You're pretty sure she opened to the second
page of a song.

And she's barely bothering to sing, more just
reading the lyrics in a monotone.

\n[4]:
Finally something useful!

Kaede:
The Hero \n[10] comes through again!

You take the songbook and turn towards the
door.\!
And start to sing.

This is actually kind of fun.\!
There are some bright spots to this whole
dream thing!

Though you don't really have an idea if you're
doing it well.

It's at least enough for the stone on the front
of the gate to flicker alight.

For a moment.\!
And then it fades.

\n[4]:
See!\!
I told you it was a foolish idea!

Kaede:
A
passages.content_zh:
你走到門口。

楓：
如此看來，我們已經裝備齊全了！ \!
我們有一扇門——

她朝城堡點點頭。

一本歌集。

\n[4]翻白眼。

初音未來\n[4]:
檢查。

楓：
而且是歌手！

楓：
……我們確實有歌手，對嗎？

\n[4]，你願意最後嗎
為我們的試驗做出貢獻？

\n[4]:
哦，天哪，不。 \！
我的政府一貫優先考慮
基礎設施和發展高於藝術。

被看見唱歌會讓我的一切失效
競選承諾！

楓：
好吧，我不會像一個人那樣喋喋不休
普通的jongleur！ \！
這遠低於我的尊嚴！

\n[4]:
你是想出這個主意的人
天才的想法，你可以成為實施的人
它！

他們開始爭吵。

楓：
真正的英雄？哦\n[10]，我有什麼
造成這種背叛的原因是什麼？

她嘆了口氣。

但不要說，偉大的女神
當她的援助時，同伴無法站出來
被要求。

把那本歌集給我，無賴！

她深吸了一口氣…

並唱歌！

沒關係。 \！
她修改歌詞以適應她的方式
首選的說話方式沒有任何作用
的恩惠。

沒有什麼能真正掃描或遵循良好的節奏。

但你會說它比至少 90% 的要好
自您以來所遭受的聲波攻擊
開始玩這個遊戲。

\n[4]:
好吧。 \!
美好的！

還有什麼侮辱？ ！

她猛地打開書，開始唱歌。

沒關係。 \！
你很確定她打開了第二個
一首歌的頁面。

她幾乎懶得唱歌，更多的是
單調地讀歌詞。

\n[4]:
終於有有用的東西了！

楓：
英雄\n[10]再次出現！

你拿起歌本，轉向
門。 \!
並開始唱歌。

這實際上很有趣。 \!
整體上有一些亮點
夢想的事！

雖然你並不真正知道你是否
做得好。

至少前面的石頭夠了
門的閃爍亮起。

一會兒。 \!
然後它就消失了。

\n[4]:
看吧！ \!
我告訴過你這是一個愚蠢的想法！

楓：
一個

passages.name: Pride area — Castle door 2 — p5
passages.content:
The door remains stubbornly closed.\!
You never realized doors had such picky
taste in music.
passages.content_zh:
門仍然死死地關著。 \!
你從來沒有意識到門有這麼挑剔
音樂品味。

passages.name: Pride area — Monitor Miku — p3
passages.content:
Miku:
Singing to the door...\!
We haven't tried that one yet!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
對著門唱歌...\！
我們還沒有嘗試過那個！

passages.name: Pride area — Monitor Miku — p4
passages.content:
Miku:
Test 47: singing to the door, but competently!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
測試47：對著門唱歌，但很熟練！

passages.name: Pride area — Sign
passages.content:
RESIDENTIAL DISTRICT\!
North: Block A
South: Block B
passages.content_zh:
住宅區\！
北：A座
南：B座

passages.name: Pride area — Planning committee
passages.content:
Miku:
Welcome new Mikus!

If you're interested in helping
Bannerbreakfast grow, have you considered
joining the planning committee?

We're in charge of mandates to keep everyone
on the right track.

She looks at you.

As long as you have some idea what a
community actually *needs*.

She sniffs.

Some Mikus just want the camp to be full
of clowns and candy instead of *useful*
things.

Can you imagine?\!
There were people who thought our first
priority should be putting on a musical show!

I'm glad I haven't seen *them* around
recently.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
歡迎新米庫斯！

如果您有興趣提供協助
橫幅早餐成長，你有考慮過嗎
加入規劃委員會？

我們負責讓每個人都留下來
在正確的軌道上。

她看著你。

只要您知道什麼是
社區實際上*需要*。

她吸了吸鼻子。

有些米庫只希望營地滿員
小丑和糖果而不是*有用*
的事情。

你能想像嗎？ \!
有人認為我們的第一個
首要任務應該是上演音樂劇！

我很高興我沒有看到*他們*
最近。

passages.name: Pride area — Sign
passages.content:
ORGY DISTRICT

Remember, keep everything healthy, happy,
and Hatsune Miku!

Kaede:
Oh thank the goddess, finally we hast found
some *normal* people.
passages.content_zh:
狂歡區

記住，保持一切健康，快樂，
還有初音未來！

楓：
感謝女神，終於找到了
一些「正常」的人。

passages.name: Pride area — Sign
passages.content:
Someone has scrawled this sign in huge
crude letters

\{\{GOOD MIKU ZONE

You can hear faint cries of "Miku good!"
and "Miku-mi!" from within.
passages.content_zh:
有人在這個牌子上寫下了巨大的字跡
粗糙的字母

\{\{好未來區

你可以聽到微弱的「Miku好！」的叫聲。
和“米庫米！”從內部。

passages.name: Pride area — Sign
passages.content: CAFETERIA

passages.name: Pride area — Cafeteria Miku — p1
passages.content:
Miku:
I don't know what it is, but those statues
really tie the cafeteria together.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我不知道那是什麼，但那些雕像
真正將自助餐廳連結在一起。

passages.name: Pride area — Cafeteria Miku — p2
passages.content:
You approach the eating Miku.

Miku:
You're looking for Miku?

Oh no, she's not here.

\n[4]:
Of course she isn't.

Miku:
When she tells Miku she's going to get food,
what she *usually* means is that she's
sneaking off to the orgy district.

Eating out, she calls it.

Kaede:
Ooo, now this ist a most welcome
development!

It seems \n[10] that our path ist clear.\!
For the greater good.

Miku:
The orgy district is to the north, you can't
miss it!\!
Just follow all the, uh, moaning.
passages.content_zh:
你接近正在吃東西的 Miku。

米庫：
你在找 Miku 嗎？

喔不，她不在這裡。

\n[4]:
她當然不是。

米庫：
當她告訴 Miku 她要去取食物時，
她*通常*的意思是她
偷偷溜到狂歡區。

她稱之為外出用餐。

楓：
噢，現在這是最受歡迎的
發展！

看來\n[10]我們的道路是暢通的。 \!
為了更大的利益。

米庫：
狂歡區在北邊，你不能
懷念它！ \！
只要跟著所有的，呃，呻吟聲。

passages.name: Pride area — Cafeteria Miku — p3
passages.content:
Miku:
Have you found Miku yet?\!
Remember, she's in the orgy district to the
north!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
你找到 Miku 了嗎？ \!
請記住，她在狂歡區
北！

passages.name: Pride area — Welcome Miku conversation — p1
passages.content:
Miku:
Greetings Miku!\!
Are you a new arrival?

You nod.

Well, let me be the first to welcome you to
Bannerbreakfast!\!
A place for everyMiku to shelter while we
figure out what's going on.

We're still building out, but there's plenty to
do and help with!

We've got the residential district, there are
many Miku scavenging supplies, the
cafeteria is to the south if you're feeling
hungry...

Of course, there are the various planning
committees which are guiding development,
though you may want to wait until you're a
little more familiar with the camp.

We're putting together fields to make sure
this is a sustainable Miku community, and a
lecture series to share everyone's
knowledge.

And of course our finest Mindkus are working
on getting into the castle to the north, which
seems to be the source of all this.

Feel free to wander around! I'm sure you'll
find some way to contribute!

Kaede:
Art thou telling me thou built this entire camp?

'Tis only been a few hours since we woke
into this dream!\!
Surely thou simply found it thusly!

Miku:
Oh no, we've put the whole thing together
ourselves!

It's amazing what you can accomplish with
the right organization!\!
You might get to meet our leader, \n[4],
if you've got something to contribute!

She's amazing, I don't know where we'd
be without her.

Kaede:
Hmmph.\!
'Tis nonsense!

Miku \n[4]:
Just keep saying that fuzzbrain, maybe
someday it'll be true.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
問候米庫！ \！
你是新來的嗎？

你點點頭。

好吧，讓我第一個歡迎你
橫幅早餐！ \！
為每個 Miku 提供庇護的地方
弄清楚發生了什麼事。

我們仍在建設中，但還有很多工作要做
做並幫忙！

我們有住宅區，有
許多 Miku 拾荒用品，
如果你覺得自助餐廳在南邊
餓了…

當然還有各種規劃
指導發展的委員會，
儘管你可能想等到你成為
對營地比較熟悉一點。

我們正在將字段放在一起以確保
這是一個可持續發展的 Miku 社區，
系列講座與大家分享
知識。

當然，我們最好的 Mindkus 正在工作
進入北邊的城堡後，
似乎是這一切的根源。

隨意逛逛吧！我相信你會
找一些方式來做出貢獻！

楓：
你是在告訴我整個營地都是你建造的嗎？

我們醒來才過了幾個小時
進入這個夢想！ \！
你一定就是這樣發現的！

米庫：
喔不，我們已經把所有的東西放在一起了
我們自己！

您可以完成的事情令人驚奇
正確的組織！ \！
你可能會見到我們的領導，\n[4]，
如果你有什麼可以貢獻的！

她太棒了，我不知道我們會去哪裡
沒有她。

楓：
哼。 \!
這是胡說八道！

初音未來\n[4]:
繼續說那個模糊大腦，也許
總有一天這會是真的。

passages.name: Pride area — Welcome Miku conversation — p2
passages.content:
Miku:
Welcome again!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
歡迎再次光臨！

passages.name: Pride area
passages.content:
You don't really want to spend more time
with the feral Mikus.
passages.content_zh:
你真的不想花更多時間
與野性的米庫斯。

passages.name: Pride area — Statue
passages.content:
This is a granite statue of Hatsune Miku by
Hatsune Miku.\!
On the object is an image of Hatsune Miku.

The image relates to the founding of
Bannerbreakfast by Hatsune Miku in <NaN>.\!
All craftsmikuship is of the highest quality.
passages.content_zh:
這是初音未來的花崗岩雕像
初音未來。 \!
該物體上有初音未來的影像。

該圖像與成立有關
初音未來的橫幅早餐 <NaN>.\!
所有手工藝mikuship 都是最高品質的。

passages.name: Pride area — Statue
passages.content:
This is a granite statue of Hatsune Miku by
Hatsune Miku.\!
Hatsune Miku is singing.\!
All craftsmikuship is of the highest quality.
passages.content_zh:
這是初音未來的花崗岩雕像
初音未來。 \!
初音未來正在唱歌。 \!
所有手工藝mikuship 都是最高品質的。

passages.name: Pride area — Statue
passages.content:
This is a granite statue of Hatsune Miku by
Hatsune Miku.\!
It menaces with spikes of green hair.
passages.content_zh:
這是初音未來的花崗岩雕像
初音未來。 \!
它長著綠色的毛髮，充滿威脅。

passages.name: Pride area — Statue
passages.content:
This is a granite statue of Hatsune Miku by
Hatsune Miku.\!
On the object is an image of Hatsune Miku
creating a statue of Hatsune Miku.

The image relates to the creation of a statue
of Hatsune Miku by Hatsune Miku in <NaN>.\!
All craftsmikuship is of the highest quality.
passages.content_zh:
這是初音未來的花崗岩雕像
初音未來。 \!
物體上有初音未來的影像
創造初音未來的雕像。

該圖像與雕像的創作有關
初音未來 (Hatsune Miku) 的 <NaN>.\!
所有手工藝mikuship 都是最高品質的。

passages.name: Pride area — Sign
passages.content:
STORAGE

Please submit all requests for supplies to the
Miquartermaster.
passages.content_zh:
儲存

請將所有物資請求提交至
軍需官。

passages.name: Pride area — Mikuniversity sign
passages.content:
Welcome to Mikuniversity!\!
Handy classes for Miku, by Miku, about Miku!
passages.content_zh:
歡迎來到米庫大學！ \!
Miku 的便利課程，由 Miku 製作，關於 Miku！

passages.name: Pride area
passages.content:
A pile of clothes and other belongings, left
behind when entering the tent.
passages.content_zh:
留下一堆衣服和其他物品
進入帳篷時在後面。

passages.name: Pride area — Lecture Miku — p1
passages.content:
Miku:
Who's ready to learn with Miku?

She poses.

Miku:
After we finalize the catalogue, finish the
syllabus, process enrollment, and pass
accreditation.

Miku \n[4]:
I've already done the paperwork to get us
recognized by the Department of Education!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
誰準備好和 Miku 一起學習了？

她擺出姿勢。

米庫：
當我們最終確定目錄後，完成
課程大綱、流程註冊和通過
認可。

初音未來\n[4]:
我已經完成了我們的文書工作
教育部認可！

passages.name: Pride area — Lecture Miku — p2
passages.content:
Miku:
Who's ready to learn with Miku?

She poses.

You raise your hand.

Miku:
Yes!\!
You there!

Miku:
Ah yes, part of the Mikibrary!

(We don't have many volumes yet, so we
are always taking donations.)

But yes! Just let me get that for you!

Miku:
Let's see, let's see...

M for Miku...

Miku:
Oh dear.

Miku:
I'm afraid we've loaned that one out.\!
But don't worry! This is why we keep a
checkout log!

Just give me a moment and we can find
exactly who has it!

She begins shuffling through papers on her
desk.

Kaede:
See? The world ist molding itself into a classic
trial!

Now the hero shalt show wit and charm ast
they cajole others to find the object of thine
quest!

Pride just sighs tiredly.

Miku:
Ah yes, here we go!\!
According to the log, the book was checked
out to...

Miku.

Miku:
I don't know what I expected.

Still!\!
If I remember correctly, this Miku was one
of the stonecarvers!

Wanted to have some engravings about
songs or something of the sort.

You should be able to check the crafting
district!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
誰準備好和 Miku 一起學習了？

她擺出姿勢。

你舉手。

米庫：
是的！ \!
你在那裡！

米庫：
啊，是的，Mikibrary 的一部分！

（我們還沒有很多卷，所以我們
總是接受捐款。 ）

但是是的！讓我幫您拿一下吧！

米庫：
讓我們看看，讓我們看看...

M 代表 Miku...

米庫：
哦，親愛的。

米庫：
恐怕我們已經把那個借出去了。 \！
但別擔心！這就是為什麼我們保留一個
結帳日誌！

只要給我一點時間，我們就能找到
到底是誰擁有它！

她開始翻閱身上的文件
辦公桌。

楓：
看到了嗎？世界正在將自己塑造成經典
審判！

現在英雄就要展現智慧和魅力了
他們哄騙別人找到你的對象
追求！

驕傲只是疲倦地嘆了口氣。

米庫：
啊，是的，我們開始了！ \！
根據日誌，這本書被檢查了
出去到...

米庫。

米庫：
我不知道我期待什麼。

仍然！ \！
如果我沒記錯的話，這個Miku就是其中之一
石雕師的！

想要一些關於的雕刻
歌曲或類似的東西。

你應該能夠檢查製作
區！

passages.name: Pride area — Lecture Miku — p3
passages.content:
Miku:
Good luck with your search!

And if you could, please remind them that
we do need to have the book returned when
finished?
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
祝您搜尋順利！

如果可以的話，請提醒他們
我們確實需要歸還這本書
完成了嗎？

passages.name: Pride area — Lecture Miku — p4
passages.content:
Miku:
Ah, I see you found Miku!\!
Enjoy the songbook!

I believe you were going to sing to the
castle gate, correct?
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
啊，我看到你找到 Miku了！ \！
欣賞歌本吧！

我相信你會唱歌給
城堡大門，對嗎？

passages.name: Pride area
passages.content:
Lectures and courses coming soon!

Currently planned:\!
Miku 101: How To Miku\!
A Brief History of Miku\!
Personalizing Your Miku Look

Who *Are* You People: Early Attempts At
Telling Mikus Apart\!
How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Enjoy
The Miku

Miku! Miku-Mi!\!
Orgy Techniques and Basic Etiquette
passages.content_zh:
講座和課程即將推出！

目前計劃：\!
Miku 101：如何Miku\！
Miku 簡史\!
個性化你的 Miku 造型

你們是誰：早期嘗試
與米庫斯分開\!
我如何學會停止擔憂並享受
初音未來

米庫！米庫米！ \！
狂歡技巧和基本禮儀

passages.name: Pride area — Class Mikus
passages.content:
Miku:
So what are you looking forward to the most?

Miku:
Telling Mikus apart!\!
I mistook Miku for Miku a bit ago, and it was
*so* embarrassing.

Miku:
No!\!
I hope Miku wasn't there?

Miku:
I have no idea!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
那你最期待什麼？

米庫：
區分 Mikus！ \!
之前我把 Miku 誤認為是 Miku，原來是這樣
*太*尷尬了。

米庫：
不！ \！
我希望 Miku 不在場？

米庫：
我不知道！

passages.name: Pride area — Class Mikus
passages.content:
Miku:
So what are you looking forward to the most?

Miku:
Oh, Miku 101.

I mean, I'm Miku, but am I *Miku*?\!
Know what I mean?

They all nod.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
那你最期待什麼？

米庫：
哦，初音101。

我的意思是，我是 Miku，但我是 *Miku* 嗎？ \!
知道我的意思嗎？

他們都點頭。

passages.name: Pride area — Class Mikus
passages.content:
Miku:
So what are you looking forward to the most?

Miku:
I just want to know where she got those
glasses.\!
So cute!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
那你最期待什麼？

米庫：
我只是想知道她從哪裡得到這些
眼鏡。 \!
太可愛了！

passages.name: Pride area
passages.content:
West: Camp Bannerbreakfast\!
South: Road (not much)\!
North: Castle That Probably Contains The
Solution To Everything If We Could Get Inside
passages.content_zh:
西：旗幟營早餐\！
南：路（不多）\！
北部：可能包含的城堡
如果我們能進去，一切問題都會解決

passages.name: Pride area — Storage Mikus
passages.content:
Miku:
How are you doing today?

Miku:
Oh, wonderful.\!
I admired a splendid statue today!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
你今天過得怎麼樣？

米庫：
哦，太棒了。 \！
今天我欣赏了一尊精美的雕像！

passages.name: Pride area — Street Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
There's a lot less traffic ever since we all
found ourselves in a weird dreamscape.

But occasionally a Mikaravan will come by.\!
Or someone in a Micar.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
自從我們都來之後，交通就少了很多
發現自己處於一個奇怪的夢境。

但偶爾會有 Mikaravan 過來。 \！
或是開著 Micar 的人。

passages.name: Pride area — Orgy
passages.content: You take a peek inside the tent.
passages.content_zh: 你往帳篷裡看了一眼。

passages.name: Pride area — Lever sign
passages.content:
\{\{   DO NOT TOUCH

Miku \n[4]:
I wish I could remember what any of those
do...
passages.content_zh:
\{\{ 請勿觸碰

初音未來\n[4]:
我希望我能記住其中的任何一個
做...

passages.name: Pride area — Catsune Miku
passages.content:
Catsune Miku:
Awww, who's a kitty!

Catsune Miku:
I don't know where these cats all came from,
but they're too cute to get rid of!

Catsune Miku:
Such a kitty!
passages.content_zh:
倉音未來：
哇哦，誰是小貓啊！

倉音未來：
我不知道這些貓是從哪裡來的
但它們太可愛了，捨不得丟掉！

倉音未來：
真是一隻小貓啊！

passages.name: Pride area — Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
Yeah, we've made a pretty good camp.\!
But I can't help but feel some lava would
improve things.

Miku \n[4]:
Why do people keep suggesting that?!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
是的，我們已經建立了一個非常好的營地。 \！
但我忍不住覺得有些熔岩會
改善事情。

初音未來\n[4]:
為什麼人們總是這樣建議？ ！

passages.name: Pride area — Cafeteria Miku — p1
passages.content:
Miku:
I just keep wondering what's in that castle
to the north.

I bet it's full of fun!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我只是想知道那個城堡裡有什麼
向北。

我敢打賭它充滿樂趣！

passages.name: Pride area — Cafeteria Miku — p2
passages.content:
Miku:
You're looking for Miku?

Do you mean her?

She points at the Miku on the other side of
the cafeteria.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
你在找 Miku 嗎？

你是說她嗎？

她指著另一邊的Miku
自助餐廳。

passages.name: Pride area — Password Miku — p1
passages.content:
Miku:
Password?

Miku:
No entry without the password.

Kaede:
Hero, perhaps there is a resistance to the
tyrant crushing these folk!

'Tis traditional to hide in forests such as these
to plot the overthrow of evil!\!
Oh, I hope we are able to meet such doughty
folk!

Miku \n[4]:
I'm right here you know.

Kaede:
Yes, 'twould be lovely to see a villain meet
their rightful end!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
密碼？

米庫：
沒有密碼就不能進入。

楓：
英雄，也許有一種抵抗
暴君壓垮這些人！

躲在這樣的森林裡是傳統做法
陰謀推翻邪惡！ \！
哦，希望我們能遇到這樣的強者
夥計們！

初音未來\n[4]:
我就在這裡你知道的。

楓：
是的，很高興看到惡棍相遇
他們應得的結局！

passages.name: Pride area — Password Miku — p2
passages.content:
Miku:
Password?

Miku:
Nope.

You look confusedly at \n[4].

Miku \n[4]:
That was, frankly, pathetic.\!
You've got to use the right tone of voice.\!
And pose!

Just go forward and...

Miku~~♥!

You turn back to the guard.

M-Miku~?

Miku:
Better.\!
But still no.

Miku \n[4]:
Here I thought a Hero would be able to maybe
show some passion.

She takes a mocking tone.

Ist not a hero equal to all tasks before them,
even cuteness?

Try it again!\!
But good this time!

Kaede:
(Thou seemst to be enjoying this a near
unseemly amount.)

Miku \n[4]:
(Don't act like you don't also enjoy making
the Hero do stupid things.)

Kaede:
(...For once thou hast a point.)

Miku \n[4]:
And remember to smile!

You focus.\!
Dig down deep into your heart.\!
And pull out all the energy you can.

Miku~~♥!

Huh, where did *that* come from?

Miku:
Password\..\..\..\..\..\.. accepted.

Miku:
Though it could have used more pep.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
密碼？

米庫：
不。

你困惑地看著\n[4]。

初音未來\n[4]:
坦白說，這太可悲了。 \！
你必須使用正確的語氣。 \!
並擺出姿勢！

只要繼續前進，然後...

美九~~♥！

你轉身面對守衛。

M、未來～？

米庫：
更好。 \!
但還是沒有。

初音未來\n[4]:
在這裡我想英雄也許能夠
表現出一些熱情。

她帶著嘲諷的語氣。

難道英雄不就可以完成眼前的所有任務嗎？
甚至可愛？

再試一次！ \!
不過這次很好！

楓：
（你似乎很享受這附近
數量不合時宜。 ）

初音未來\n[4]:
（不要表現得好像你也不喜歡製作
英雄做了愚蠢的事。 ）

楓：
（……這次你說得有道理。）

初音未來\n[4]:
並記得微笑！

你集中註意力。 \!
深入你的內心深處。 \!
並竭盡全力。

美九~~♥！

呃，*那個*是從哪裡來的？

米庫：
密碼\..\..\..\..\..\.. 已接受。

米庫：
雖然它可以使用更多的活力。

passages.name: Pride area — Recording Miku after intro — p2
passages.content:
Miku:
I keep track of the test ideas and results.\!
We're doing well! Only 57% foolish ideas!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我追蹤測試想法和結果。 \！
我們做得很好！只有57%的想法是愚蠢的！

passages.name: Pride area — Sign
passages.content:
CRAFTSMIKU DISTRICT

Please excuse the dust! Miku at work!
passages.content_zh:
手工藝品米庫區

請原諒灰塵！米庫上班啦！

passages.name: Pride area — Boom Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
Explosives!\!
I'm sure if I could just get these explosives
working, we could get into that castle!

Hehehehehe...

Miku \n[4]:
Currently scheduled as tests 47-53, if the
materials are ready in time!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
炸藥！ \！
我確定我是否能得到這些炸藥
工作了，我們就可以進入那座城堡了！

呵呵呵呵呵...

初音未來\n[4]:
目前安排為測試 47-53，如果
材料及時準備好！

passages.name: Pride area — Stonemiku — p1
passages.content:
Miku:
Another masterpiece, if I do say so myself!

Miku \n[4]:
Everyone loves the statues.\!
Morale is also an important part of a
community!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
如果我自己這麼說的話，又是一部傑作！

初音未來\n[4]:
每個人都喜歡這些雕像。 \！
士氣也是一個重要的組成部分
社區！

passages.name: Pride area — Stonemiku — p2
passages.content:
Miku:
Another masterpiece, if I do say so myself!

Miku:
Ah yes, of course!

Miku:
Miku!\!
Miku!

Miku:
Hmm, my assistant Miku was studying it.\!
Where could they have gone...\!
They're always getting such strange moods.

Oh, I know! They're probably off getting a
meal, it's about that time.

Check the dining hall!\!
And make sure to marvel at the statues
while you're there!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
如果我自己這麼說的話，又是一部傑作！

米庫：
啊，是的，當然！

米庫：
米庫！ \！
米庫！

米庫：
嗯，我的助手 Miku 正在研究它。 \！
他們到底去哪裡了…\！
他們總是有這樣奇怪的情緒。

哦，我知道！他們可能會得到一個
吃飯了，差不多就是這個時候了。

檢查食堂！ \！
一定要驚嘆這些雕像
當你在那裡的時候！

passages.name: Pride area — Stonemiku — p3
passages.content:
Miku:
Check the dining hall!\!
And make sure to marvel at the statues
while you're there!

Miku \n[4]:
Everyone loves the statues.\!
Morale is also an important part of a
community!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
檢查食堂！ \！
一定要驚嘆這些雕像
當你在那裡的時候！

初音未來\n[4]:
每個人都喜歡這些雕像。 \！
士氣也是一個重要的組成部分
社區！

passages.name: Pride area — Statue
passages.content:
This is a granite statue of Hatsune Miku by
Hatsune Miku.\!
It is decorated with detached sleeves of
cloth.

On the statue is an image of Hatsune Miku
making a statue with an image of Hatsune
Miku.

It refers to the creation of a statue with an
image of Hatsune Miku.
passages.content_zh:
這是初音未來的花崗岩雕像
初音未來。 \!
它飾有獨立的袖子
布。

雕像上有初音未來的影像
製作帶有初音形象的雕像
米庫。

它指的是創作具有
初音未來的形象。

passages.name: Pride area — Farm Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
I'm trying to get a farm up and running so
we have a reliable source of food.

No one will be happy if we have to start eating
the cats.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我正在努力建立並經營一個農場
我們有可靠的食物來源。

如果我們必須開始吃飯，沒有人會高興
貓們。

passages.name: Pride area — Nature Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
It's so much nicer out here with no cars
running!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
沒有汽車的這裡好多了
跑！

passages.name: Pride area — Nameplate
passages.content:
There's a little nameplate on the desk.

               DR MIKU
MA (Miku of Arts), MBA (Miku of Business
Administration), PHD (Doctor of Hatsune
Philosophy)
passages.content_zh:
桌子上有一個小銘牌。

               初音博士
MA（藝術 Miku）、MBA（商業 Miku）
管理），PHD（初音博士
哲學）

passages.name: Pride area — Orgy district intro — p1
passages.content:
As you enter the district, Kaede speaks up.

Kaede:
Good hero, dost thou remember mine words
about the debauchery we might discover?

It seems that we have at last found those who
have a *normal* reaction to such a dream as
this!

Kaede:
'Twill be a pleasure to make our way through
this trial!

Miku \n[4]:
What trial.

Everyone leaves their stuff outside the tent.\!
We can just go through it!

Kaede:
And deny the hero their chance to prove
their mettle?

She licks her lips.

Kaede:
Why, 'twould be a violation of a Hero's honor
to pass up a challenge!

No matter the trial, no matter how hard\.\.,
or soft\.\., or wet it may be!

Miku \n[4]:
Okay, so we know what the horny furbrain
wants, but are you just going along with
this?

Look, the book is just sitting there!\!
We could be done with this!\!
Right now!

Investigate the orgy district?

Really, how could you pass up an orgy district?\!
Might as well give your new equipment a real
test drive!

And wow, it sure does get some use.

In pairs.

Solo testing.

However many people *this* was.

Some indeterminate amount of time later you
stagger out of the tents, weak in the knees
and aching pleasantly.

Fortunately, the book is still there.

You pick up the book and head back to the
gate.

Miku \n[4]:
*Thank* you.

Kaede:
Hmmph.\!
I suppose if the Hero choses so then we
cannot but obey.

But it is *most* unbecoming of a Hero to
pass up such a trial, \n[10].

You pick up the book and head back to the
gate.
passages.content_zh:
當你進入該地區時，楓開口說話了。

楓：
好英雄，你還記得我的話嗎
關於我們可能發現的放蕩行為？

看來我們終於找到那些
對這樣的夢有「正常」反應
這個！

楓：
“我們很高興能夠通過
這次審判！

初音未來\n[4]:
什麼審判。

每個人都把東西留在帳篷外。 \！
我們只要經歷一下就可以了！

楓：
並剝奪英雄證明的機會
他們的勇氣？

她舔了舔嘴唇。

楓：
為什麼，這會侵犯英雄的榮譽
放棄挑戰！

無論審判，無論多麼艱難\.\.，
或軟\.\.，或可能是濕的！

初音未來\n[4]:
好吧，我們知道角質毛腦是什麼了
想要，但你只是跟著
這個？

看，書就放在那裡！ \！
我們就可以完成這個了！ \！
現在！

調查狂歡區？

真的，你怎麼能錯過狂歡區呢？ \！
不妨給你的新裝備一個真正的
試駕！

哇，它確實有用。

成雙成對。

單獨測試。

不管*這*有多少人。

一段不確定的時間後你
搖搖晃晃地走出帳篷，膝蓋發軟
且疼痛愉快。

幸運的是，這本書還在。

你拿起書然後回到
門。

初音未來\n[4]:
*謝謝*你。

楓：
哼。 \!
我想如果英雄選擇那我們
不能不服從。

但這是「最」不適合英雄的
放棄這樣的嘗試，\n[10]。

你拿起書然後回到
門。

passages.name: Pride area — Password Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
Barely passable, but that's enough to get you
in.\!
For now.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
勉強及格，但足以讓你
在.\!
目前。

passages.name: Pride area — Sign
passages.content: COSTUMES AND PROPS
passages.content_zh: 服裝和道具

passages.name: Pride area
passages.content: ORCHESTRA

passages.name: Pride area — Director — p1
passages.content:
You approach the Miku.

Director Miku:
You're getting out of sync with each other!\!
Keep in step, keep in tune!

Director Miku:
\{\{WHAT DO YOU-

She pauses and lowers the megaphone.

What do you want?

You explain that you want to put on a big
performance in front of the castle doors.

Director Miku:
Hmm, yes, we've been looking for a reason
to put on a show!

Now, the rest of the camp has *extremely
short-sightedly* voted to prioritize boring
things like food and shelter, so we'll need to
take a few steps to prepare.

It'll be simple really.

We'll need something to distract the guards,
we'll need to recruit performers, and we'll
need supplies for the show.

Now, distracting the guards will be easy.\!
We've got a ingenious plan involving the
clever use of leeks.

Now, we haven't been able to find any leeks,
but the propmaster has cooked up a perfect
replacement with some reeds, green paint,
and artificial leek flavor.

First, someone will need to go harvest the
reeds.\!
We found a lake with them, but it's overrun
with *extremely* angry frogs.

Very bitey, according to the scouts.

So we'll need someone strong to fight their
way through and get the reeds.

The artificial leek flavor is much simpler.\!
There's a company developing it right here
in town!

Though we accidentally triggered a lockdown
of the building when we tried to scout it out.

But we found the security company with the
override switch!

Which we also managed to get locked down.

And the building that has the override for
*that* building.

But we've managed to find the unguarded
lockdown override override override!

Once you hit that you'll just need to fight your
way through each building's robot security
force to hit the next switch.

Now, the green paint is where things start
to get complicated-

Miku \n[4]:
That is more than enough of that.\!
What if I told you this had the backing of Pride
and the rest of the camp?

Director Miku:
Oh.\!
Huh.\!
Well.

That would make things a *lot* easie
passages.content_zh:
你接近 Miku。

米庫導演：
你們彼此不同步了！ \!
保持步調一致，保持一致！

米庫導演：
\{\{你做什麼-

她停了下來，降低了擴音器。

你想要什麼？

你解釋說你想穿一件大衣服
城堡門前的表演。

米庫導演：
嗯，是的，我們一直在尋找一個理由
表演一下！

現在，營地的其他人已經*非常
目光短淺*投票優先考慮無聊
食物和住所之類的東西，所以我們需要
採取一些步驟來準備。

真的會很簡單。

我們需要一些東西來分散警衛的注意力
我們需要招募表演者，我們會
需要演出用品。

現在，分散守衛的注意力將會很容易。 \！
我們有一個巧妙的計劃
巧妙利用韭菜。

現在我們已經找不到韭菜了
但道具師已經炮製了一個完美的
更換一些蘆葦，綠色油漆，
和人造韭菜味。

首先，需要有人去收割
蘆葦。 \!
我們和他們一起找到了一個湖，但它已經被淹沒了
和*極度*憤怒的青蛙。

據球探稱，非常咬人。

所以我們需要一個強大的人來對抗他們
穿過並獲得蘆葦。

人造韭菜口味就簡單多了。 \!
這裡有一家公司正在開發它
在城裡！

雖然我們不小心觸發了封鎖
當我們試圖偵察這棟建築時。

但我們找到了保全公司
超越開關！

我們也設法將其鎖定。

以及具有超控權的建築物
*那*棟大樓。

但我們設法找到了無人看守的人
鎖定覆蓋覆蓋覆蓋！

一旦你擊中了它，你只需要戰鬥你的
通過每棟大樓的機器人安檢
強制按下下一個開關。

現在，綠色油漆是一切的開始
變得複雜-

初音未來\n[4]:
這已經足夠了。 \！
如果我告訴你這得到了驕傲組織的支持怎麼辦
營地的其他人呢？

米庫導演：
哦。 \!
呵呵。 \!
出色地。

這會讓事情變得*很多*容易

passages.name: Pride area — Conductor
passages.content:
Miku:
That's it!\!
Now the next piece!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
就是這樣！ \!
現在下一塊！

passages.name: Pride area — Orchestra Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
My favorite bit is when the music goes du-DUH,
and then I go da-DA-da!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我最喜歡的是當音樂響起時，
然後我就去噠噠噠！

passages.name: Pride area — Orchestra Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
I hope I can still play the violin like this when
I wake up!

I have no idea what I'm doing!\!
But it seems to be working!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我希望以後我還能這樣拉小提琴
我醒了！

我不知道我在做什麼！ \!
但它似乎正在發揮作用！

passages.name: Pride area — Orchestra Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
And then Miku comes in on the drums!!!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
然後 Miku 敲鼓登場！ ！ ！

passages.name: Pride area — Miku singer
passages.content:
Miku is singing.

Miku:
Oh the blissful time communing with my muse!\!
Would that it would come again!
passages.content_zh:
米庫在唱歌。

米庫：
哦，與我的繆斯交流的幸福時光！ \！
但願它能再來一次！

passages.name: Pride area — Miku singer
passages.content:
Miku is singing.

Miku:
We've only managed to find one microphone,
so we all have to take turns.
passages.content_zh:
米庫在唱歌。

米庫：
我們只找到了一個麥克風，
所以我們都必須輪流。

passages.name: Pride area — Miku singer
passages.content:
Miku is singing.

Miku:
Ugh, I can't believe Miku keeps hogging the
mic like that.

Pick shorter songs!\!
I want to sing!
passages.content_zh:
米庫在唱歌。

米庫：
呃，我不敢相信 Miku 一直霸占著
像這樣的麥克風。

選擇較短的歌曲！ \!
我想唱歌！

passages.name: Pride area — Miku singer
passages.content:
Miku is singing.

Miku:
What do I want to sing?\!
Something sad?\!
Something fast?

So many choices and not enough time!
passages.content_zh:
米庫在唱歌。

米庫：
我想唱什麼？ \!
有什麼悲傷的事嗎？ \!
有什麼快的？

選擇太多，時間卻不夠！

passages.name: Pride area — Miku singer
passages.content:
Miku is singing.

Miku:
Hmmph, I should get more time to sing.\!
They're just jealous I was winning the fistfight
over it.
passages.content_zh:
米庫在唱歌。

米庫：
哼，我應該有更多的時間去唱歌。 \！
他們只是嫉妒我贏得了拳擊比賽
超過它。

passages.name: Pride area — Miku singer
passages.content:
Miku is singing.

Miku:
Come on!\!
Isn't it my turn yet?
passages.content_zh:
米庫在唱歌。

米庫：
來吧！ \!
還沒輪到我嗎？

passages.name: Pride area — Ref Miku
passages.content:
I'm here timing the songs to make sure
everyone gets the same amount of singing
time.

Hopefully this'll prevent *another* brawl over
the mic.

\}I don't understand how Pride manages to
do this for the whole camp...
passages.content_zh:
我在這裡為歌曲計時以確保
每個人都得到相同數量的歌唱
時間。

希望這能防止「另一次」爭吵
麥克風。

\}我不明白驕傲是如何做到的
為整個營地做這個…

passages.name: Pride area — Sign
passages.content:
OPEN MIC

No hogging the mic!\!
We WILL revoke your singing priviledges!\!
This means you, Miku!
passages.content_zh:
開放式麥克風

請勿霸佔麥克風！ \!
我們將取消祢的歌唱特權！ \！
這意味著你，Miku！

passages.name: Pride area — Sign
passages.content:
Experimental Leek Prototypes\!
EXTREMELY HAZARDOUS, DO NOT APPROACH
passages.content_zh:
實驗韭蔥原型\!
極度危險，請勿接近

passages.name: Pride area — Costume Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
I think I've put together a pretty good
costume!

Miku scoffs.

Yeah, but modern stuff is so much better.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我想我已經整理了一個相當不錯的
服裝！

美九嘲笑道。

是的，但是現代的東西好多了。

passages.name: Pride area
passages.content:
Miku:
The stage needs to go here...\!
We just need to get a lumberMiku to cut these
down and then we'll have materials too...
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
舞台需要到這裡...\！
我們只需要找個木材 Miku 來切割這些
下來然後我們也會有材料...

passages.name: Pride area — Hodded figure — p1
passages.content:
Someone is watching the castle through the
trees.

Cloaked Figure:
Hmm, yes, I see...

Cloaked Figure:
Ugh, pests.

There is a bright flash, and when it fades
the figure is gone.
passages.content_zh:
有人透過窗戶觀察城堡
樹。

披風人物：
嗯，是的，我明白了...

披風人物：
呃，害蟲。

有一道明亮的閃光，當它消失時
人影不見了。

passages.name: Pride area — Mikibrary
passages.content: Filled with miscellaneous books.
passages.content_zh: 堆滿了各種各樣的書籍。

passages.name: Pride area — Well
passages.content:
Hmm...\!
It looks like this camp is doing well.
passages.content_zh:
唔...\！
看來這個訓練營做得很好。

passages.name: Pride area — Bulletin board
passages.content:
WELCOME TO THE DRAMA DISTRICT
Where your creativity can shine!

Rule 1: Do not talk about the drama district.
Rule 2: Be yourself!

Someone has scratched out "Be yourself!" and
replaced it with "Be Miku!"
passages.content_zh:
歡迎來到戲劇區
在這裡你的創造力可以大放異彩！

規則一：不要談戲劇區。
規則2：做你自己！

有人劃掉了“做你自己！”和
替換為“Be Miku！”

passages.name: Pride area — Microphone
passages.content:
The instant you begin to even get close to
the microphone, every Miku in line whips
their head around to glare at you.

You've felt less bloodlust from most of the
monsters you've fought.\!
You back away slowly.
passages.content_zh:
當你開始接近的那一刻
麥克風，每個 Miku 都在排隊
他們轉頭怒視你。

大多數情況下你的嗜血慾望有所減弱
與你戰鬥過的怪物。 \!
你慢慢後退。

passages.name: Pride area — Salesmiku
passages.content:
Miku:
Are you traders?\!
We have plenty of Michandise to sell!

We also tried to capture some rare beasts,
but none of the cats cooperated.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
你們是交易員嗎？ \!
我們有大量商品可供出售！

我們也嘗試捕捉一些稀有的野獸，
但沒有一隻貓配合。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Miku Guard
passages.content:
Miku Guard:
Welcome to the...

She glances at the row of signs.

The place where we put the weird Mikus.
passages.content_zh:
米庫守衛：
歡迎來到...

她看了一眼那排標誌。

我們放置奇怪的米庫斯的地方。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Sign
passages.content:
FREAKUS

The sign has been crossed out.\!
A little note says "Too mean."
passages.content_zh:
怪胎

該標誌已被劃掉。 \!
一張小紙條上寫著“太卑鄙了。”

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Sign
passages.content:
THINK ABOUT WHAT YOU'VE DONE

The sign has been crossed out.\!
A little note says "Too vague."
passages.content_zh:
想想你做了什麼

該標誌已被劃掉。 \!
一張小紙條上寫著「太模糊了」。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Sign
passages.content:
JUST, INADEQUATE MIKUS. \!
         NOT GOOD AT ALL\!
          TOTAL RUBBISH

The sign has been crossed out.\!
A little note says "Too long. Also a little mean."
passages.content_zh:
只是，不夠格的米庫斯。 \！
         一點都不好\！
          完全是垃圾

該標誌已被劃掉。 \!
一張小紙條上寫著“太長了。也有點刻薄。”

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Sign
passages.content:
BAD MIKU! BAD!

The sign has been crossed out.\!
A little note says "Can we stop it with the
cavewoman roleplay already?"
passages.content_zh:
壞未來！壞的！

該標誌已被劃掉。 \!
一張小紙條上寫著「我們可以用
已經開始穴居女角色扮演了嗎？ 」

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Sign
passages.content:
DEFECTIVE MIKU STORAGE DEPARTMENT

The sign has been crossed out.\!
A little note says "Too technical."
passages.content_zh:
MIKU 儲存部有缺陷

該標誌已被劃掉。 \!
一張小紙條上寫著「技術性太強」。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Sign
passages.content:
BAD MIKU TIME-OUT

The sign has been crossed out.\!
A little note says "We are not a daycare."
passages.content_zh:
壞未來超時

該標誌已被劃掉。 \!
一張小紙條上寫著「我們不是日間照顧中心」。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Mooku
passages.content:
Mooku:
Could this be moooore of a pain?

She moos sadly.

Her companion glares down at her own chest.

Miniku:
It could be worse.\!
\}Why does she get the huge cow tits...
passages.content_zh:
莫庫：
這會很痛嗎？

她悲傷地呻吟著。

她的同伴低頭怒視著自己的胸部。

迷你庫：
情況可能會更糟。 \!
\}為什麼她會有巨大的乳牛...

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Maleku
passages.content:
Manku:
Hey babe, how's it going?

He takes a swig of beer, then belches.

Wanna kill some time together?
passages.content_zh:
曼庫：
嘿寶貝，怎麼樣？

他喝了一大口啤酒，然後打了個嗝。

想一起消磨時間嗎？

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Mineku
passages.content:
Mineku:
Yes, yes, I have a way out.

But beware! I have mined, but 'tis possible to
mine too greedily, and too deep.\!
My tunnels are not for the faint of heart!

Knowing this, are you prepared to brave my
tunnel?

Kaede:
We art prepared for any challenges!\!
No foe shall turn us from our path!

Mineku:
Then you may enter!\!
But beware!

You move forward.\!
Three steps later, you're through the wall and
outside.

Kaede:
...\!
I suppose they only said they *might* dig too
deep.

Mineku:
Come back when you are prepared!
passages.content_zh:
峰久：
是的，是的，我有退路。

但要小心！我已經開採過，但有可能
我的太貪心了，也太深了。 \！
我的隧道不適合膽小的人！

知道了這一點，你準備好勇敢面對我了嗎？
隧道？

楓：
我們已做好迎接任何挑戰的準備！ \！
沒有任何敵人可以使我們偏離我們的道路！

峰久：
然後就可以進入了！ \!
但要小心！

你繼續前進。 \!
三步後，你就穿過牆了
外面。

楓：
...\!
我想他們只是說他們「可能」也挖
深。

峰久：
當你準備好了就回來吧！

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Millku
passages.content:
Milku:
Why won't it stop?!
passages.content_zh:
米爾庫：
怎麼還不停？ ！

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Elf Miku
passages.content:
Magicku:
This prison is stupid, but even I have to admit
that things would be worse if that Miku
hadn't stepped up and organized things.

Got everyone pulling together, and working
to figure out what caused all this.

It's just too bad that some of the people seem
so determined to pull in opposite directions.

You ask about escaping.

Magicku:
Ask around. I think there are some people
working on it.
passages.content_zh:
魔法庫：
這個監獄很愚蠢，但連我都不得不承認
如果 Miku 的話事情會更糟
沒有站出來組織事情。

讓大家齊心協力，共同努力
找出造成這一切的原因。

可惜有些人看起來
所以決心往相反的方向拉。

你問的是逃跑。

魔法庫：
四處詢問。我認為有一些人
正在努力。

passages.name: Bad Miku area
passages.content:
Mightyku:
RAAAAAHHHH!\!
I'M GOING TO BUST OUT OF HERE!\!
JUST YOU WAIT!

Guard:
Don't make me come in there!

Mightyku:
\}I'll be good.
passages.content_zh:
強大的庫：
啊啊啊啊！ \!
我要離開這裡！ \！
就等你了！

守衛：
別讓我進來！

強大的庫：
\}我會很好的。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Dio
passages.content:
Miku?:
Haha!\!
You thought it was Miku!\!
But it was me, Dio!

Guard:
We know!\!
That's the only thing you ever say!
passages.content_zh:
米庫？ ：
哈哈！ \!
你以為是 Miku！ \！
但那是我，迪奧！

守衛：
我們知道！ \！
這是你唯一說過的話！

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Dark Miku
passages.content:
Megalomaniku:
Hahaha, and so the ranks of the deviant army
swell again!

Welcome, welcome. Feel free to walk around
and meet your comrades!

She glances over at the guard and lowers
her voice.

And if you can't wait to strike against the foe,
Mineku is working on a Secret Project.

Guard:
Are you plotting over there?\!
Plotting is strictly forbidden!

Megalomaniku:
No, of course not!\!
We're just whispering because we're
embarassed by how much we love \n[4]!

She gives you an exaggerated wink.
passages.content_zh:
梅加洛馬尼庫：
哈哈哈，還有異類大軍的隊伍
再次膨脹！

歡迎，歡迎。隨意逛逛
並認識你的戰友！

她瞥了一眼守衛，然後放下身子
她的聲音。

如果你迫不及待想打擊敵人，
Mineku 正在開發一個秘密項目。

守衛：
你在那邊密謀嗎？ \!
嚴禁偷拍！

梅加洛馬尼庫：
不，當然不是！ \！
我們只是竊竊私語，因為我們
為我們有多愛而感到尷尬\n[4]！

她誇張地對你眨眼。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — MissingKu — p1
passages.content:
Mienaiku:
Shhh! Don't let them know I'm here!\!
I'm hiding!

I'll give you this shiny rock if you keep it a
secret!

Raw mana acquired!
passages.content_zh:
美奈久：
噓！別讓他們知道我在這裡！ \!
我躲起來了！

如果你保留這塊閃亮的石頭，我就把它給你
秘密！

獲得原始法力！

passages.name: Bad Miku area — MissingKu — p2
passages.content:
Mienaiku:
Shhh!\!
You promised!
passages.content_zh:
美奈久：
噓！ \!
你答應過的！

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Autoplay intro — p1
passages.content:
The door clangs shut behind you as the Mikus
throw you in.

Megalomaniku:
Welcome! Welcome to the Army of Deviants!

I know you must be sad at being here, but do
not despair!

As our numbers swell, those fools outside will
only spell their doom!\!
Soon we shall rise up and mmm mmmph
mppt mpph!

Her words cut off as her companion walks up
and shoves her hands over the speaker's
mouth.

Magicku:
Yeah, yeah, whatever.\!
What my reality-challenged friend is trying to
say is that we're the Island of Misfit Mikus.

This is where they shove those of us they
don't think are "Miku" enough, whatever that
nonsense means.

Guard:
Maybe you would know if you'd EVER BEEN TO
MIKU PRACTICE!

Magicku:
THERE IS NO MIKU PRACTICE!

Anyway, make yourself comfortable.\!
I know there are some people trying to
convince the head Miku Pride that this is a
stupid idea.

Those weird cavewomen RPers are pretty
hard in favor of it, unfortunately.
passages.content_zh:
當米庫斯 (Mikus) 時，門在你身後叮噹關上
把你丟進去。

梅加洛馬尼庫：
歡迎！歡迎來到異端大軍！

我知道你在這裡一定很難過，但是
不要絕望！

當我們的人數膨脹時，外面的那些傻瓜就會
只能拼出他們的厄運！ \！
很快我們就會站起來，嗯嗯嗯
mppt 英哩/小時！

當她的同伴走上來時，她的話被打斷了
並將她的手推到說話者的手上
嘴。

魔法庫：
是啊，是啊，無論如何。 \!
我的現實挑戰的朋友正在嘗試做什麼
據說我們是不合時宜的米庫斯島。

這就是他們把我們這些人推到的地方
不管怎樣，我認為「Miku」還不夠
廢話的意思。

守衛：
也許你會知道如果你曾經去過
初音 練習！

魔法庫：
沒有 MIKU 練習！

不管怎樣，讓自己舒服一點。 \!
我知道有些人試圖
讓 Miku Pride 團長相信這是一個
愚蠢的想法。

那些奇怪的穴居女 RPers 很漂亮
不幸的是，很難支持它。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Massiveku
passages.content:
Massiveku:
Hehe...\!
Squish!

She giggles drunkenly.

Kaede:
Alas, the lass hath grown most besotted with
her assets.

'Tis a condition I hast seen many a time on
those granted a particularly large portion
of Florauna's divine blessing.

Massiveku:
Boobs <3
passages.content_zh:
馬塞維庫：
呵呵...\!
壓扁！

她醉醺醺地咯咯笑。

楓：
唉，這女孩已經變得最著迷了
她的資產。

這種情況我已經見過很多次了
那些獲得特別大份額的人
弗洛勞納的神聖祝福。

馬塞維庫：
胸部 <3

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Maleku — p1
passages.content:
Maleku:
I have no idea what's going on.\!
At all.
passages.content_zh:
馬萊庫：
我不知道發生了什麼事。 \!
完全沒有。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Guard conversation
passages.content:
Guard Miku:
I've always dreamed of guarding prison cells!

Miku Guard:
I don't know why.\!
I wish the dreams would stop.\!
But nothing's worked!

Miku Guard:
But at least there's *something* familiar in
this weird dream.
passages.content_zh:
守衛美九：
我一直夢想著看守牢房！

米庫守衛：
我不知道為什麼。 \!
我希望夢想能夠停止。 \！
但沒有任何效果！

米庫守衛：
但至少有一些熟悉的東西
這個奇怪的夢。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Mimicku
passages.content:
Mimicku:
Rar!

Surprise!\!
It's a mimic, not a chest!

Though can I really call myself a mimic?\!
All of us here are Mikus, so *all of us* are
imitating someone else.

Are they mimics too?\!
Am I a double mimic?\!
What does it all mean?!

No time to attack you, I'm going to need to
think about my place in the world.

She slams the chest shut.

Kaede:
'Tis the most philosophical mimic I hast ever
encountered.\!
Oftentimes they art more... bitey.
passages.content_zh:
米米庫：
拉！

驚喜！ \！
這是模仿品，不是胸部！

但我真的可以稱自己為模仿者嗎？ \！
我們這裡的所有人都是 Mikus，所以*我們所有人*都是
模仿別人。

他們也是模仿者嗎？ \!
我是雙重模仿者嗎？ \!
這一切意味著什麼？

沒時間攻擊你，我需要
想想我在世界上的位置。

她砰地關上箱子。

楓：
這是我所經歷過的最有哲理的模仿
遇到了。 \!
通常他們的藝術更加……咬人。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Miniku
passages.content:
Wyrmku:
I hate it!\!
I'm a dragon! I'm not supposed to be this
tiny and cute!
passages.content_zh:
維爾姆庫：
我討厭它！ \！
我是龍！我不應該是這個
又小又可愛！

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Dentist
passages.content:
Dentist:
Hi, I'm a dentist.

Really not sure how I got here.
passages.content_zh:
牙醫：
嗨，我是一名牙醫。

真的不知道我是怎麼來到這裡的。

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Miku dentist
passages.content:
Dentist Miku:
I'm not sure how I got here either.\!
But somehow I feel a weird sense of
satisfaction at being a dentist?
passages.content_zh:
牙醫 Miku：
我也不知道我是怎麼來到這裡的。 \!
但不知怎的，我有種奇怪的感覺
作為牙醫的滿意度？

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Sign
passages.content:
JAIL FOR BAD MIKUS\!
(Name is currently being workshopped.)
passages.content_zh:
壞米庫斯入獄\！
（目前正在討論名稱。）

passages.name: Bad Miku area — Bucket
passages.content: Full of milk.
passages.content_zh: 滿滿的都是奶。

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Elina initial — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
...And when I woke up I had this!

She holds out...\.\. probably a microphone.\!
That's what it looks like underneath, but its
covered in so much sparkles and glitter and
ribbons that it's hard to make out.

\n[2]:
And it lets me do this!

She holds it up.

A swirl of colored lights surrounds her and
obscures her form.

\n[2]:
Magical Idol Power activate~!

Magical Idol Wand acquired!

Magical Idol class unlocked!

\n[2]:
Did you wake up with anything?

\n[4]:
Nothing but my usual seething hatred for
the world.

\n[2]:
What about this?

She holds out a much plainer looking
microphone.

\n[4]:
...Where did you find that.

\n[2]:
Oh, it was just under the couch.

\n[4]:
And?

\n[2]:
Inside a sealed box?

\n[4]:
Keep going.

\n[2]:
Inside another box, chained shut.

\n[4] just raises an eyebrow.

\n[2]:
Locked with three different padlocks.\!
With a sign on it saying "Do not open! Rabid
tiger inside!"

\n[4] sighs.

\n[2]:
Look, you can't have something like that and
expect me to *not* want to look inside!

She hands over the microphone.

\n[4] glares at her through the entire
transformation sequence that follows.

Boring Normal Microphone reluctantly
acquired!

Boring Normal Idol class even more
reluctantly unlocked!

\n[4] stomps off.
passages.content_zh:
\n[2]:
……當我醒來時，我得到了這個！

她堅持著…\.\。可能是麥克風。 \!
這就是下面的樣子，但它
覆蓋著如此多的火花和閃光，
很難辨認的絲帶。

\n[2]:
它讓我可以做到這一點！

她舉起它。

一道彩色光的漩渦圍繞著她
模糊了她的形體。

\n[2]:
魔偶之力發動~！

獲得魔法偶像魔杖！

魔法偶像等級解鎖！

\n[2]:
你醒來有什麼事情嗎？

\n[4]:
除了我一貫的強烈仇恨之外什麼也沒有
世界。

\n[2]:
這又如何呢？

她的外表更加樸素
麥克風。

\n[4]:
……你從哪裡找到的。

\n[2]:
哦，它就在沙發底下。

\n[4]:
還有？

\n[2]:
裝在密封的盒子裡？

\n[4]:
繼續。

\n[2]:
在另一個盒子裡，用鍊子鎖著。

\n[4]只是揚起了眉毛。

\n[2]:
用三種不同的掛鎖鎖住。 \！
上面寫著“請勿打開！狂犬病”
裡面有老虎！ 」

\n[4]嘆了口氣。

\n[2]:
聽著，你不能擁有這樣的東西
希望我*不想*想看裡面！

她遞出麥克風。

\n[4] 全程怒視著她
接下來的轉換順序。

無奈地無聊普通麥克風
獲得了！

普通偶像課更無聊
無奈解鎖！

\n[4]跺腳。

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride initial — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
...And when I woke up I had this!

She holds out...\.\. probably a microphone.\!
That's what it looks like underneath, but its
covered in so much sparkles and glitter and
ribbons that it's hard to make out.

\n[2]:
And it lets me do this!

She holds it up.

A swirl of colored lights surrounds her and
obscures her form.

\n[2]:
Magical Idol Power activate~!

Magical Idol Wand acquired!

Magical Idol class unlocked!

\n[2]:
Did you wake up with anything?

\n[4]:
Nothing but my usual seething hatred for
everything here.

\n[2]:
What about this?

She holds out a much plainer looking
microphone.

\n[4]:
...Where did you find that.

\n[2]:
Oh, it was just under the couch.

\n[4]:
And?

\n[2]:
Inside a sealed box?

\n[4]:
Keep going.

\n[2]:
Inside another box, chained shut.

\n[4] just raises an eyebrow.

\n[2]:
Locked with three different padlocks.\!
With a sign on it saying "Do not open! Rabid
tiger inside!"

\n[4] sighs.

\n[2]:
Look, you can't have something like that and
expect me to *not* want to look inside!

She hands over the microphone.

\n[4] glares at her through the entire
transformation sequence that follows.

Boring Normal Microphone reluctantly
acquired!

Boring Normal Idol class even more
reluctantly unlocked!

/n[4] stomps off.
passages.content_zh:
\n[2]:
……當我醒來時，我得到了這個！

她堅持著…\.\。可能是麥克風。 \!
這就是下面的樣子，但它
覆蓋著如此多的火花和閃光，
很難辨認的絲帶。

\n[2]:
它讓我可以做到這一點！

她舉起它。

一道彩色光的漩渦圍繞著她
模糊了她的形體。

\n[2]:
魔偶之力發動~！

獲得魔法偶像魔杖！

魔法偶像等級解鎖！

\n[2]:
你醒來有什麼事情嗎？

\n[4]:

passages.content:

Kaede:

Warm mist gently wafts between the soft grass,

You all stare for a moment in wonder.

Kaede:
Come all, 'tis not an experience to be taken

To the bath!

The water, to sooth aches and pains of body

spirit!

She raises a bottle.

Kaede:
And no carouse wouldst be complete without
the libations!

Let us toast ourselves, our heroics, and the

\n[4]:

She walks to the other side of the pool,

Kaede:
Come fine Hero \n[10], 'tis
plenty of room!

The hot water is looking pretty incredible.\!
Your apartment doesn't even have a tub; it's
been forever since you've

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride bath — p1

\n[4] is staring into her bottle.

\n[4] is staring into her bottle.

\n[4]:
They're all fools.\!
Foolish fools.\!
The most foolish.

The goddesses...

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride bath — p3
passages.content:
\n[4] is ranting drunkenly.

\n[4]:
You don't get it!

She grabs at \n[2].

\n[4]:
It's all so-\. *hic*\. pointless!\!
Me, you, everything!\!
All for nothing!

She finishes her bottle and tosses it to the
side.

\n[2] pats her gently on the back.

\n[2]:
There, there.\!
Sometimes things go wrong.\!
Something can still be salvaged.

I don't think the alcohol is doing you any good
right now though.\!
Maybe you've had enough to drink?

\n[4]:
You've had enough to drink!

She grabs \n[2]'s bottle and chugs it.

\n[2]:
That's not...\!
Look, everything will look better if you get
some sleep and sober up.

Let's get you to bed, okay?

\n[4] squints at her.

\n[4]:
\n[2], yer always so nice...\!
You should stop that.\!
Never got anyone anywhere.

She giggles drunkenly.

\n[4]:
It's foolish, but yer such a good friend.\!
Kind of friend.\!
Friendquaintance.

She slumps against \n[2].

\n[4]:
And what does friendship even mean, when
it's all been written for you?!

Nothing.\!
Nothing earned.\!
Pointless.

She makes a grab for another bottle, but
\n[2] pulls it out of her reach.

\n[4]:
No!\!
Booze!\!
Booze is my only friend!

She flails uselessly for a moment, too drunk

Finally she slumps down, defeated.\!
\n[2] gently rubs her back.

\n[2]:
Look, let's get you to bed.\!
Everything will look better tomorrow.

She starts to help the stumbling \n[4]
out of the room.\!
As she passes, she glances at you.

\n[2]:
You might want to finish up soon too.\!
Try... try not to follow her example?

She continues on.\!
You can still hear their voices as they leave.

\n[4]:
Time to sleep on the floor again.\!
Like a loser.\!
Just what I deserve.

\n[2]:
It's okay, you can have the couch tonight.

\n[4]'s voice brightens.

\n[4]:
Decadent luxury!

Then falls.

\n[4]:
That I never earned.\!
So much for pride...

Their voices fade into the distance.
passages.content_zh:
\n[4] 醉醺醺地咆哮。

\n[4]:
你不明白！

\n[4]:
一切都是這樣—\。 *嗝*\。無意義！ \！

\n[2]輕輕拍拍她的背。

Kaede:

Do you accept her offer?

Kaede licks her lips.

Kaede:
Ah, thou shalt not regret this \n[10].\!
I hast desired this since I first laid eyes upon

And thy ever more comely form hast been

Now lay back and let a master work.

You lean back against the wall of the pool,

of you, and tentatively spread your legs.

You lean back against the wall of the pool
and tentatively spread your legs.

Kaede kisses you, the faintest ghost brush of

seeking tongue, before diving down.

The first gentle touches are hard to tell from

But the gentle brushes, the featherlight

And only builds from there.

But the hands and lips of your new lover stay

Pleasure surges through you, unfamiliar

You moan and twist and strain for more,
carried up to the very peak of pleasure and
held there for an unmeasurable, excruciating,

英雄。

達到快樂的頂峰
在那裡被關押了一段不可估量的、令人難以忍受的、

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Pride — p1
passages.content:
:
...Still worth it.\!
Did you see the look on fuzzbrain's face?!

You did.\!
But anyway, \n[4] seemed really bitter during
the dream, is she okay?

:
Am I doing okay?\!
Am I doing okay?!

Everything I ever planned for has been
snatched from my grasp!

I've been tied eternally to a gaggle of fools,
dragged around to be just another pawn in
the game of the goddesses!

Of *course* I'm not okay!

You wince.

You let her know that honestly, it was never
your intention for her to get forced into your
party.\!
You're sorry it's been so bad for her.

Though you have no idea how you could
even begin to release her.

\..\..\..\..\..And you're a little worried she'd just
go straight back to trying to overthrow the
goddesses if you did.

You still need their help.

:
Yeah.

She gives a bitter laugh.

\n[4]:
Yes, joining your party was never my intention
either.

Though you probably prefer it to being my
humiliated stepping stools to ascension, as I
was planning.

\}Literal stepping stools, it would have been
so sweet.

And I would be vastly better than the gold-
addled idiot currently running the underworld.

She shakes her head, then pulls herself
together a little.

\n[4]:
Still...\!
I guess...

There exist possible worlds where things could
have been at least infinitesimally worse.\!
Like if I was bound to fuzzbrain instead.

\n[4]:
Though I guess you're not the *worst* I could
have been tied to.

You're actually-\!
surprisingly-\!
*very* surprisingly-

not completely horrible.

I could be bound to much worse situations.

You're actually kind of a decent person?

She sighs.

\n[4]:
And honestly, it’s not like it’s really your fault.\!
If you weren’t the hero, some other chump
would be doing it.

The goddesses needed a tool to play their
games.

Speaking of games...

Does she know she's in one?

She's got to know, right?

No, she probably doesn't.\!
How would she?

You should tell her.\!
You really should tell her.

Oh god, this is going to be so
passages.content_zh:

……還是值得的。 \!
你看到Fuzzbrain臉上的表情了嗎？

你做到了。 \!
但無論如何，\n[4] 期間看起來真的很痛苦
夢，她還好嗎？

:
我還好嗎？ \!
我還好嗎？ ！

我所計劃的一切都已實現
從我手中奪走！

我永遠與一群傻瓜綁在一起，
被拖來拖去，成為另一個棋子
女神的遊戲！

當然*我不好！

你皺起了眉頭。

你讓她知道說實話，從來沒有
你想讓她被迫進入你的意圖
派對。 \！
你很抱歉這對她來說太糟糕了。

雖然你不知道如何才能
甚至開始釋放她。

\..\..\..\..\..你有點擔心她會
直接回去試圖推翻
女神們，如果你這樣做的話。

你仍然需要他們的幫助。

：
是的。

她苦笑一聲。

\n[4]:
是的，加入你們的派對從來都不是我的本意

雖然你可能更喜歡它而不是我的
羞辱的踏腳凳，以提升，因為我
正在計劃。

\}字面上的踏腳凳，本來就是

我會比黃金好得多-
現在運作黑社會的傻瓜。

她搖搖頭，然後振作起來
在一起一點。

\n[4]:
還是……\！
我猜...

存在著事物可能存在的可能世界

就像我注定要被毛茸茸的大腦取代一樣。

\n[4]:
雖然我猜你不是我能想到的「最糟糕」的人
已被束縛。

你實際上是—\!
出奇-\！
*非常*令人驚訝-

並不完全可怕。

我可能會遇到更糟糕的情況。

你其實是個正派的人嗎？

她嘆了口氣。

\n[4]:

如果你不是英雄，那就是其他笨蛋

女神們需要一個工具來發揮她們的作用

她會怎樣？

你應該告訴她。 \!
你真的應該告訴她。

天哪，事情會是這樣

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Blocker
passages.content:
The stream stretches off into the forest,
swiftly vanishing into the mist that rises from
the steaming water.

Wandering blindly into that strikes you as the
sort of thing every fairy tale has ever warned
you about.
passages.content_zh:
小溪一直延伸到森林裡，
迅速消失在升起的霧氣中
熱氣騰騰的水。

盲目地徘徊在你的印像中
每個童話故事都警告過的事情
你關於.

passages.name: Apartment 2 ARG — Kaede after Miku — p1
passages.content:
This seems oddly familiar.

Kaede:
Ugh\..\..\..\..\..\..
I had the most horrible dream\..\..\..

Kaede:
And you were there...

And you were there...

And you were there...

\n[4]:
Not a dream, furbrain!\!
How does it feel to be the most worthless
member of the team!

\n[2]:
Now, surely she-

\n[4]:
I'll sum it up for you and the idiot!\!
Now, how long would you say you were
holding off the dark goddess?

\n[2]:
It couldn't have been more than a few hours.

...Honestly, it's very sad how she kept falling
for "hey look, a happy human!"...

\n[4]:
Right!\!
So you: Foiled an evil goddess's plans for
hours.

Me: set up a whole encampment, gathered
and organized all the people and resources
to get inside, and was well on my way to
joining you.

And tails-for-brains here: come on, tell us
what you did.

Kaede sniffs.

Kaede:
I most doughtily led the hero to join the fight,
and then cunningly solved the dire riddle
which had vexed thee far past thy-

\n[4]:
Right! Fuzzbrain somehow took hours to find
the GIANT MAGICAL CASTLE in the MIDDLE
OF THE CITY, then read a sign!

Wait...\!
They were all in the dream with you.

Do they sleep?\!
Where do they sleep?

\n[4]:
The darkness of night cloaks my schemes
from the eyes of fools.

I would have to have brains made of fuzz to
waste that time sleeping!

Kaede:
Sleep is a mortal weakness. Mine body is
sustained by the Great Goddess's grace, and
needs naught else!

\n[4]:
...Perfectly fine, happy schemes.\!
That you don't have to worry about.

\n[2]:
We play rock-paper-scissors to see who gets
the couch.\!
Losers sleep on the floor.

Kaede:
Truly, dost thou have no comprehension of
preserving a sense of mystique? Of allure?!

\n[4]:
Hah!\!
Those are the words of a loser who's never
gotten the couch!

Kaede:
Hold thy tongue, knave!\!
As if thou hast done much better!

\n[4]:
The night I slept on the couch was the best
sleep I ever had.\!
Gazing down at you struggling on the floor.

\n[2] whispers to you.

\n[2]:
(They are both so,
passages.content_zh:
這似乎有些奇怪的熟悉。

楓：
呃\..\..\..\..\..\..
我做了一個最可怕的夢\..\..\..

楓：
而你當時也在場...

而你當時也在場...

而你當時也在場...

\n[4]:
不是夢，毛腦！ \！
成為最不值錢的人是什麼感覺
團隊成員！

\n[2]:
現在，她肯定——

\n[4]:
我來給你和白痴總結一下！ \!
現在，你會說你有多長
抵擋黑暗女神？

\n[2]:
不可能超過幾個小時。

……老實說，她一直跌倒真是令人難過
因為「嘿，看，一個快樂的人！」...

\n[4]:
對！ \！
所以你：挫敗了邪惡女神的計劃
小時。

我：紮營，集合
並組織了所有的人力和資源
進去，我正在去的路上
加入你。

這裡是尾巴換大腦：來吧，告訴我們
你做了什麼。

凱德吸了吸鼻子。

楓：
我最勇敢地帶領英雄加入戰鬥，
然後巧妙地解決了可怕的謎題
這讓你煩惱得遠遠超過你的——

\n[4]:
對了！ Fuzzbrain 花了好幾個小時才找到
中間巨大的魔法城堡
城市，然後讀一個標誌！

等待...\！
他們都在夢裡和你在一起。

他們睡覺嗎？ \!
他們睡哪裡？

\n[4]:
黑夜掩蓋了我的計劃
從愚人的眼中。

我必須有由絨毛製成的大腦才能
浪費時間睡！

楓：
睡眠是致命的弱點。我的身體是
因偉大女神的恩典而得以維持，
不需要別的！

\n[4]:
……完美、愉快的計劃。 \！
您不必擔心。

\n[2]:
我們玩石頭剪刀布，看看誰能得到

失敗者睡在地板上。

楓：
說實話，你不明白嗎？
保持神秘感？有誘惑力？ ！

\n[4]:
哈！ \！
這是一個從來沒有失敗過的失敗者的話。
得到了沙發！

楓：
管住你的舌頭，無賴！ \！
好像你做得更好了！

\n[4]:
我睡在沙發上的那個夜晚是最美好的
我曾經睡過。 \！
低頭看著你在地板上掙扎。

\n[2] 對你低語。

\n[2]:
（他們兩個都是這樣，

passages.content:
You don't want to leave the hotspring while
