我希望有人打電話來
他們自己是世界上最偉大的人
難免會低頭。

尼爾：
是的，這確實是一種令人印象深刻的傲慢，
不是嗎？

\n[4]:
夠了！ \!
你們這些傻瓜到底做了什麼好事？ ！

芬恩聳聳肩。

芬恩：
我的意思是，我們嘗試過。 \！
我們嘗試鑄造 NFT，但它只是\..\..\..
失敗了。

尼爾：
他們發霉了！

芬恩：
我們一直在嘗試，但就是沒有成功。 \!
然後我們注意到了蘑菇。

尼爾：
然後我們注意到了胸部。 \！
我們*在那之後*看到了蘑菇。

芬恩：
我認為繼續下去是個壞主意，但是
*有人*一直在嘗試。

尼爾：
我是 tr

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Pickles
passages.content:
A little sign declares the vat to be
"EXPERIMENTAL PICKLES"

Note:
Third batch to dissolve into weird black sludge.\!
Sell as fertilizer?
passages.content_zh:
一個小標誌表明該缸是
“實驗泡菜”

注意：
第三批溶解成奇怪的黑色污泥。 \！
當肥料賣？

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Pickles
passages.content:
A little sign declares the vat to be
"EXPERIMENTAL PICKLES"

Note:
Too many security flaws.\!
Switch to safetensors?
passages.content_zh:
一個小標誌表明該缸是
“實驗泡菜”

注意：
太多的安全漏洞。 \!
切換到安全張量？

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Pickles
passages.content:
A little sign declares the vat to be
"EXPERIMENTAL PICKLES"

Note:
Somehow less pickled than before I put it in
the brine.

Can you get arrested for breaking the laws
of thermodynamics?
passages.content_zh:
一個小標誌表明該缸是
“實驗泡菜”

注意：
不知怎的，比我放進去之前醃得少了
鹽水。

觸犯法律會被逮捕嗎
熱力學的？

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Pickles
passages.content:
A little sign declares the vat to be
"EXPERIMENTAL PICKLES"

Note:
Tastes like crap.
passages.content_zh:
一個小標誌表明該缸是
“實驗泡菜”

注意：
嘗起來像垃圾。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Pickles
passages.content:
A little sign declares the vat to be
"EXPERIMENTAL PICKLES"

Note:
Attempted to spherify. Failed.\!
Tie-in Pickleballs will have to wait.
passages.content_zh:
一個小標誌表明該缸是
“實驗泡菜”

注意：
嘗試球化。失敗的。 \！
搭配匹克球將不得不等待。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Pickles
passages.content:
A little sign declares the vat to be
"EXPERIMENTAL PICKLES"

Note:
Needs more salt.\!
And less botulism.
passages.content_zh:
一個小標誌表明該缸是
“實驗泡菜”

注意：
需要更多的鹽。 \!
肉毒桿菌中毒也較少。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Pickles
passages.content:
A little sign declares the vat to be
"EXPERIMENTAL PICKLES"

Note:
Summons up an odd sense of ennui.
passages.content_zh:
一個小標誌表明該缸是
“實驗泡菜”

注意：
喚起一種奇怪的倦怠感。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Table
passages.content:
Surprisingly fungus free.\!
Apparently they at least managed to produce
a Non-Fungible Table.
passages.content_zh:
令人驚訝的是沒有真菌。 \！
顯然他們至少設法生產了
不可替代的表。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Blockchain
passages.content:
Toy cubes, many of them glued together.\!
Someone has left a note.

Note:
Okay, yes, your blockchain does use much
less power.  But how are you going to connect
it to the internet?
passages.content_zh:
玩具立方體，其中許多粘在一起。 \！
有人留下了一張紙條。

注意：
好吧，是的，你的區塊鏈確實用了很多
功率較小。  但你要如何連接
到網路上嗎？

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Blockchain
passages.content:
Toy cubes, many of them stuck together.\!
Someone has glued an ethernet port to one
end.

A note says VERSION 2.
passages.content_zh:
玩具立方體，其中許多粘在一起。 \！
有人將乙太網路連接埠黏在一個連接埠上
結束。

註記上寫著「版本 2」。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment
passages.content:
A note on the pillow says NFT TESTBED.

A picture of an ape has been tucked into the
covers.
passages.content_zh:
枕頭上的一張紙條上寫著「NFT TESTBED」。

一張猿猴的照片被塞進了
覆蓋。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment
passages.content:
You start to move closer to inspect the
furniture, but then decide to table the motion.
passages.content_zh:
你開始靠近檢查
家具，但隨後決定擱置該動議。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Sink
passages.content: You ever get that sinking feeling?
passages.content_zh: 你有過那種下沉的感覺嗎？

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p1
passages.content:
You dig through the disgusting, mushroom-
infested cabinet.

700 BE bucks found!
passages.content_zh:
你挖開噁心的蘑菇——
被感染的櫃子。

找到 700 BE 美元！

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p2
passages.content:
You dig through the disgusting, mushroom-
infested cabinet.

You only find regrets.
passages.content_zh:
你挖開噁心的蘑菇——
被感染的櫃子。

你只會發現遺憾。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p1
passages.content: 700 BE bucks found!
passages.content_zh: 找到 700 BE 美元！

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p1
passages.content: Filled with packs of instant ramen and chips.
passages.content_zh: 裡面裝滿了泡麵和薯條。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment
passages.content:
Filled with chains.\!
Kinky.
passages.content_zh:
充滿了鎖鏈。 \！
淫。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — p1
passages.content:
A note on the drawers says "FUNGIBLE?"

It's filled with arcade tokens.

You spot something shiny half-buried in the
drawer.

Raw mana found!
passages.content_zh:
抽屜上的一張紙條上寫著“可替代？”

它充滿了街機代幣。

你發現有東西半埋在裡面閃閃發亮
抽屜。

發現原始法力！

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — p2
passages.content:
A note on the drawers says "FUNGIBLE?"

It's filled with arcade tokens.
passages.content_zh:
抽屜上的一張紙條上寫著“可替代？”

它充滿了街機代幣。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p1
passages.content:
Filled with old, decaying T-shirts.

Against your better judgement, you pick out
the least disgusting one and take it with you.

Decayed T-Shirt obtained!
passages.content_zh:
裡面堆滿了破舊的T卹。

根據你更好的判斷，你選擇
最不噁心的一個並隨身攜帶。

獲得腐爛的 T 卹！

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p2
passages.content:
All of the remaining shirts are too disgusting
to wear.
passages.content_zh:
剩下的襯衫都太噁心了
穿。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p1
passages.content:
Piled high with rotten and crumbling clothing.

You spot a surprisingly untouched pair of
pants and take them.\!
Guess they were non-fungible.

NFTrousers acquired!
passages.content_zh:
堆滿了腐爛、破碎的衣服。

你發現了一雙令人驚訝的未曾動過的
褲子並拿走它們。 \！
我猜它們是不可替代的。

NFTrousers 被收購！

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p2
passages.content:
There's no way you're going through that
disgusting pile of cloth again.
passages.content_zh:
你不可能經歷這些
又是一堆噁心的布。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p1
passages.content:
You dig through the disgusting, mushroom-
infested cabinet.

300 BE bucks found!
passages.content_zh:
你挖開噁心的蘑菇——
被感染的櫃子。

找到 300 BE 美元！

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Dispel herb — p1
passages.content:
There's something growing in the bucket.

Dispel Herb found!
passages.content_zh:
桶子裡有東西在生長。

發現驅散藥草！

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Dispel herb — p2
passages.content: The bucket is empty.
passages.content_zh: 桶子是空的。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p1
passages.content:
You dig through the disgusting, mushroom-
infested cabinet.

It's mostly full of empty bottles and discarded
wrappers, but you manage to find something.

Full potion found!
passages.content_zh:
你挖開噁心的蘑菇——
被感染的櫃子。

裡面大部分都是被丟棄的空瓶子
包裝紙，但你設法找到一些東西。

找到完整的藥水了！

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p1
passages.content:
You dig through the disgusting, mushroom-
infested cabinet.

It's mostly full of empty bottles and discarded
wrappers, but you manage to find something.

Healing Sandwich found!
passages.content_zh:
你挖開噁心的蘑菇——
被感染的櫃子。

裡面大部分都是被丟棄的空瓶子
包裝紙，但你設法找到一些東西。

治癒三明治找到了！

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Treasure — p2
passages.content:
You dig through the disgusting, mushroom-
infested cabinet.

You find only regrets.
passages.content_zh:
你挖開噁心的蘑菇——
被感染的櫃子。

你發現的只是遺憾。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment
passages.content:
You're not sure what used to be stored in
this box, but it stinks.
passages.content_zh:
您不確定以前儲存了什麼
這個盒子，但是很臭。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment
passages.content:
\n[4]:
Believe me, I also want to wash my hands of
this complete nonsense.

She sighs.

But we should *probably* actually help
extricate these fools from their foolishness.
passages.content_zh:
\n[4]:
相信我，我也想洗手
這完全是胡說八道。

她嘆了口氣。

但我们“可能”应该真正提供帮助
把這些傻瓜從他們的愚蠢中解救出來。

passages.name: Fungi'd Apartment — Healing
passages.content:
This mushroom glows with a strange energy.

Party fully healed!
passages.content_zh:
這種蘑菇散發著奇怪的能量。

Party fully healed!

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Merchandise vendor
passages.content:
Park Volunteer:
Welcome to the farmers' market!\!
Would you like any Garden Park Merchandise?
passages.content_zh:
公園志工：
歡迎來到農夫市集！ \!
您想要花園公園商品嗎？

passages.name: Farmer's Market
passages.content:
WELCOME TO THE FARMERS MARKET\!
             Open everyday!
passages.content_zh:
歡迎來到農夫市集\！
             每天營業！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Veggie stall
passages.content:
Park Volunteer:
I'm so glad the farmers market is open again!\!
Would you like any of our fresh vegetables?
passages.content_zh:
公園志工：
我很高興農夫市集再次開放！ \！
您想要我們的新鮮蔬菜嗎？

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Fruit stall — p1
passages.content:
Park Volunteer:
Interested in any fruit?\!
Fresh from the orchard!
passages.content_zh:
公園志工：
對什麼水果有興趣？ \!
剛從果園拿出來的！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Fruit stall — p2
passages.content:
Red Fairy:
Hi! Hi!\!
I know you've missed it!

The rush of battle!\!
The thrill of danger!\!
Well I can make it happen. For just a small
fee, you can fight fruit all you want!

Yellow Fairy:
Red, why would someone pay to have their
face bitten off by fruit?

Red Fairy:
I've learned to not ask questions I don't want
to know the answer to!

So, Hero, how about it?\!
$400 to fight any fruit of your choice!

Fight some fruit for $400?

Red Fairy:
No money no weird obsession with fruit!

Red Fairy:
No money no weird obsession with fruit!

Red Fairy:
No money no weird obsession with fruit!
passages.content_zh:
紅仙子：
嗨！你好！ \！
我知道你已經錯過了！

戰鬥的急速！ \！
危險的快感！ \！
好吧，我可以讓它發生。只是為了一個小
費，你可以隨心所欲地打水果！

黃仙女：
紅色，為什麼有人要花錢買他們的
臉被水果咬掉了？

紅仙子：
我學會了不問不想問的問題
就知道答案了！

那麼，英雄，怎麼樣？ \!
400 美元即可與您選擇的任何水果進行戰鬥！

400塊拼點水果？

紅仙子：
沒有錢就沒有對水果的奇怪迷戀！

紅仙子：
沒有錢就沒有對水果的奇怪迷戀！

紅仙子：
沒有錢就沒有對水果的奇怪迷戀！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Fruit Fairy 2
passages.content:
Fairy:
Welcome to our stall!
passages.content_zh:
仙女：
歡迎來到我們的攤位！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Milk seller
passages.content:
Farm Volunteer:
The cows are producing again! Can I interest
you in some fresh dairy?
passages.content_zh:
農場志工：
乳牛又開始生產了！我可以感興趣嗎
你喝點新鮮乳製品嗎？

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Tennis NPC 1
passages.content:
Customer:
-and I'm actually looking forward to their
next game.

Somehow the tennis team has gotten really
good!

Other Customer:
Not just good, somehow they've gotten really
hot!

...Were they always playing women's tennis?
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
-我其實很期待他們的
下一場比賽。

不知何故，網球隊真的變得
好！

其他客戶：
不只是好，不知怎的，他們真的得到了
熱！

……他們一直打女子網球嗎？

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Fortune teller — p1
passages.content:
Fortune Teller:
Welcome child.  Have you come to hear the
wisdom of the spirits?

The world is full of mysterious forces, but
through the cards we may make the unknown
clear.

For a mere $100 I can give you a glimpse of
your future and the paths you must take.

Pay $100 for a tarot reading?

Fortune Teller:
Excellent my dear, excellent.\!
Here, sit down and let the cards reveal their
secrets to you.

Fortune Teller:
First we will consider your past.

We will draw three cards that sum up what has
brought you here, the things that have made
you and the things that you still have to
resolve.

She draws a card.

Fortune Teller:
Ah, Death. \!
The unlearned take this as a terrible sign.

But do not be concerned!\!
The Death arcana does not stand for what you
think.


It does not mean mortality, it means
*transformation*.

It is the ending of some of what you were, in
order to make way for a new you.

In the past position it suggests that you have
been through some abrupt and surprising
change, but one that makes room for growth
and renewal.

Of course, it will also depend on what else the
cards have to tell us. Let us look at the next
part of your past.

She draws another card.

Fortune Teller:
Ah, the Lovers. It seems there is a connection
to another that is still troubling you.

There is someone trying to form a connection
with you who has not succeeded, either
because of you or because of them.

Later cards should tell us how you might
build the connection, or cut them off entirely.

The Lovers can also represent the process of
getting clear on your values and beliefs.

Taken with Death, perhaps there was an
unexpected change in your past and you are
still figuring out how you feel about it.

The third card of your past should make
things more clear.

She draws another card.

Fortune Teller:
The\..\..\.. Lovers?\!
There shouldn't be another of these in the
deck.

But sometimes things get mixed up, let me
draw again.

She draws another card.

Fort
passages.content_zh:
算命先生：
歡迎孩子。  你是來聽的嗎
靈魂的智慧？

這個世界充滿了神秘的力量，但是
透過卡片我們可以創造未知的事物
清楚。

只需 100 美元，我就能讓您一睹為快
你的未來和你必須走的路。

花 100 美元看塔羅牌？

算命先生：
太棒了，親愛的，太棒了。 \！
在這裡，坐下來，讓卡片揭示它們的
秘密給你。

算命先生：
首先我們會考慮你的過去。

我們將抽三張牌來總結所發生的事情
把你帶到這裡，那些創造的事物
你和你還要做的事情
解決。

她抽了一張牌。

算命先生：
啊，死亡。 \！
無知的人認為這是一個可怕的徵兆。

但不用擔心！ \！
死亡奧秘不代表你的意思
想想。


這並不意味著死亡，而是意味著
*轉變*。

這是你曾經的一些事情的終結
為了給一個新的你讓路。

在過去的位置中，它表明您已經
經歷了一些突然和令人驚訝的事情
改變，但會為成長留出空間
和更新。

當然，這還取決於其他什麼
卡片必須告訴我們。讓我們看下一個
你過去的一部分。

她又抽了一張牌。

算命先生：
啊，戀人們。似乎有聯繫
給另一個仍然困擾你的人。

有人試圖建立聯繫
和還沒成功的你一起
因為你或因為他們。

稍後的卡片應該會告訴我們你會如何
建立連接，或完全切斷它們。

戀人也可以代表這個過程
明確你的價值觀和信念。

與死亡一起，也許有一個
你的過去發生了意想不到的變化，你現在
仍在弄清楚你對此有何感受。

你過去的第三張牌應該是
事情更清楚了。

她又抽了一張牌。

算命先生：
\..\..\.. 戀人？ \！
中不應該再有這些
甲板。

但有時事情會變得混亂，讓我
再畫一次。

她又抽了一張牌。

堡

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Fortune teller — p2
passages.content:
Huh, looks like the fortune teller left behind
some of her tarot cards.
passages.content_zh:
呵呵，看來是算命師留下來的
她的一些塔羅牌。

passages.name: Farmer's Market
passages.content:
The crystal ball is still here, alone and
abandoned.

Dim visions swirl within the crystal ball.

Oh wait, it's sitting on a little screen.
passages.content_zh:
水晶球還在這裡，獨自一人
被遺棄了。

水晶球內有昏暗的景象旋轉。

喔等等，它位於一個小螢幕上。

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Milk NPC — p1
passages.content:
Customer:
Sigh...\!
They used to sell delicious milk here.

I guess the farm's having troubles...
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
嘆息...\！
他們以前在這裡賣美味的牛奶。

估計農場有麻煩了

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Milk NPC — p2
passages.content:
Customer:
They're finally selling milk again!

He looks down at the bottle in his hand.

Customer:
I've been looking forward to this so much.

He takes a long drink.

Customer:
This is so good?!?!?!?!

Customer:
It's even better than I remember!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
終於又開始賣牛奶了！

他低頭看著手中的瓶子。

客戶：
我對此非常期待。

他喝了一大口。

客戶：
這太好了？ ！ ？ ！ ？ ！ ？ ！

客戶：
比我記憶中的還要好！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Milk NPC — p3
passages.content:
Customer:
I just can't get enough of this milk!

I should tell my friends!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
我就是喝不夠這牛奶！

我應該告訴我的朋友！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Shelter volunteer — p1
passages.content:
Pet Shelter Volunteer:
Welcome!\!
These are just a few of the lovely companions
we have available for adoption at the shelter!
passages.content_zh:
寵物收容所志工：
歡迎光臨！ \!
這些只是一些可愛的同伴
我們可以在收容所收養！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Dog customer
passages.content:
Customer:
This cinnamon tea is amazing!\!
Have you tried it?
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
這肉桂茶太棒了！ \！
你嘗試過嗎？

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Cat merchant
passages.content:
Shelter Volunteer:
Welcome!\!
All proceeds go to the animal shelter!

I recommend the catnip tea for cat lovers and
the spice tea for dog lovers!

Shelter Volunteer:
Sorry, you don't have enough money!

The tea is delicious!

You feel briefly itchy, as your ears gain a point
and your tail thins down and stretches out.

You feel briefly itchy as your ears gain a point.

Sticks suddenly seem a lot less interesting.\!
You could really go for batting around a mouse,
and maybe licking your butt.

You feel the catnip speaking to something
deep within you.\!
As if a switch in your soul has just changed
from "dog" to "cat".

Something about the catnip is just wonderful
to you.\!
So calming, so soothing...

Shelter Volunteer:
Sorry, you don't have enough money!

Mmm, the spice tea is wonderful!\!
The best part is chewing on the cinnamon
stick they included.

You pant a little, as your ears flop out and
your tail gets a lot more fluffy.

You pant a little in excitement as your ears
flop out.

The catnip tea is smelling a lot more boring
now.\!
You'd rather go for a walk.\!
Ooo, and maybe chase some squirrels!

Your tail wags eagerly at the thought.

Something about it really makes you want to
chew more sticks.\!
And maybe shoes.\!
Ooo, and chase sticks too!

You feel something shift within your soul.\!
As if a switch deep within you has just
changed from "cat" to "dog".

Sticks are wonderful, aren't they?\!
Yeah!\!
You could chew on this thing forever!

Shelter Volunteer:
Just let me know if you want anything!
passages.content_zh:
庇護所志工：
歡迎光臨！ \!
所有收益都捐獻給動物收容所！

我向愛貓人士推薦貓薄荷茶
愛狗人士的香料茶！

庇護所志工：
抱歉，你的錢不夠！

茶很好吃！

當您的耳朵達到一定程度時，您會感到短暫的搔癢
你的尾巴變細並伸展。

當您的耳朵達到某個點時，您會感到短暫的發癢。

棍子突然顯得沒那麼有趣了。 \！
你真的可以去圍著老鼠打球，
也許還會舔你的屁股。

你感覺到貓薄荷在對某件事說話
在你內心深處。 \!
彷彿你靈魂的開關剛剛改變
從“狗”到“貓”。

貓薄荷的某些東西真是太棒了
給你。 \！
如此平靜，如此舒緩…

庇護所志工：
抱歉，你的錢不夠！

嗯，香料茶太棒了！ \！
最好的部分是咀嚼肉桂
堅持他們包括在內。

當你的耳朵垂下來時，你有點氣喘吁籲
你的尾巴會變得更加蓬鬆。

你的耳朵興奮得有點喘氣
失敗了。

貓薄荷茶聞起來更無聊了
現在。 \!
你寧願去散步。 \!
噢，也許還可以追一些松鼠！

一想到這裡，你的尾巴就會急切地搖動。

它的某些東西確實讓你想要
多嚼幾根棍子。 \！
也許還有鞋子。 \！
哦，還有追逐棒！

你感覺到你的靈魂裡有什麼東西改變了。 \！
彷彿你內心深處的一個開關剛剛
從「貓」變成了「狗」。

棍子很棒，不是嗎？ \！
是的！ \！
你可以永遠咀嚼這個東西！

庇護所志工：
如果您想要什麼，請告訴我！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Customer
passages.content:
Customer:
It's such a nice day to be outside!
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
這是在外面度過的美好一天！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Customer
passages.content:
Customer:
It's so small.\!
I hope they open more stalls soon...
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
這麼小啊。 \!
希望他們能盡快開更多攤位...

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Customer
passages.content:
Customer:
It's nice to be outside, even if they don't have
much to buy yet.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
即使他們沒有，在外面也很好
還有很多東西要買。

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Watermelon customer
passages.content:
Customer:
...Maybe I should have bought apples instead.
passages.content_zh:
客戶：
……也許我應該買蘋果。

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Voice - Neil
passages.content:
Neil:
Things are going awesome! No complaints.\!
Everyone *loves* the truffles.

And the wild experimental lesbian sex is
great!

I just wish Finn would get out more.\!
She says clothes "feel too weird on her
mycelia."
passages.content_zh:
尼爾：
事情進展得很順利！沒有抱怨。 \！
每個人都「喜歡」松露。

狂野的實驗女同性戀是
太棒了！

我只是希望芬恩能多出去走走。 \！
她說衣服“穿在她身上太奇怪了”
菌絲體。 」

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Miku 1
passages.content: She's singing along with her partner.
passages.content_zh: 她正在和她的搭檔一起唱歌。

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Miku 2
passages.content:
Miku:
-And remember to stop by our sponsor, the
department store downtown!\!
Become a big star like me~ ☆

She's singing along with her partner.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
-並記得拜訪我們的贊助商，
市中心的百貨公司！ \！
成為跟我一樣的大明星吧~☆

她正在和她的搭檔一起唱歌。

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Audience — p1
passages.content:
Visitor:
I remember when they used to have
performances here.

Maybe someday...
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
我記得他們以前有過
在這裡表演。

也許有一天...

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Audience — p2
passages.content:
Visitor:
I'm so glad the performances are back!

It's a little odd that they all look the same,
but who am I to argue with a gimmick.
passages.content_zh:
訪客：
我很高興表演回來了！

有點奇怪，他們看起來都一樣
但我有什麼資格去爭論一個噱頭。

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Audience Miku
passages.content:
Miku:
Woo! Go Miku!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
哇！去米庫吧！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Audience
passages.content:
Audience:
I'm so much more stylish since I starting
shopping with their sponser!
passages.content_zh:
觀眾：
自從開始以來我變得更加時尚
與他們的贊助商一起購物！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Fortune teller 2 — p1
passages.content:
The shopkeeper calls over from her stall.

Farm Volunteer:
Are you okay?\!
You tripped straight into the crate of
watermelons.

Fortune Teller:
What?\!
What?!

Farm Volunteer:
.\..\..\..\..You know what, I'm not going to
charge you for those.

You, uh, seem to have enough to deal with.

The fortune teller pulls herself to her feet.

Fortune Teller:
I'm getting out of here before I get involved
in *more* absolute mystical bullshit.

(Stupid little haunted towns, it's always
something...)

She jiggles angrily away.
passages.content_zh:
店主從她的攤位上打電話。

農場志工：
你還好嗎？ \!
你直接絆倒在箱子裡
西瓜。

算命先生：
什麼？ \！
什麼？ ！

農場志工：
.\..\..\..\..你知道嗎，我不會
向您收取這些費用。

你，呃，似乎有足夠的事情要處理。

算命先生站了起來。

算命先生：
在我介入之前我要離開這裡
在*更多*絕對神秘的廢話中。

（愚蠢的鬧鬼小鎮，總是
某事...）

她憤怒地搖搖晃晃地走開。

passages.name: Farmer's Market — p1
passages.content: Raw Mana was found!
passages.content_zh: 原始法力被發現！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Arcade owner — p1
passages.content:
Arcade Owner:
I've got a few old arcade games I liked to set
up at the farmers' market.

Thought this would be a great chance to
dust them off.

But dagnabbit, the dang things are all on the
fritz!

You look like you know computers, could you
take a look at the things?
passages.content_zh:
遊樂場擁有者：
我有一些我喜歡設定的舊街機遊戲
到了農夫市集。

認為這將是一個很好的機會
撣掉它們的灰塵。

但是該死的，該死的東西都在
弗里茲！

你看起來好像懂電腦，可以嗎
看看東西？

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Arcade owner — p2
passages.content:
Arcade Owner:
I can't believe how much better the place is
working now!
passages.content_zh:
遊樂場擁有者：
我不敢相信這個地方有多好
現在正在工作！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — p1
passages.content:
A dusty old tent.\!
The entrance is blocked.
passages.content_zh:
一個佈滿灰塵的舊帳篷。 \！
入口被封鎖。

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Bowsette
passages.content:
Shopper:
Do you think they have spicy peppers?\!
I've been craving...\. fire recently.

Other Shopper:
Oh, their ghost peppers are *so good*.

She licks her lips with a much-too-long
tongue.
passages.content_zh:
購物者：
你認為他們有辣辣椒嗎？ \！
我一直渴望...\.最近火了。

其他購物者：
哦，他們的鬼椒*太好吃了*。

她用太長的舌頭舔著嘴唇
舌頭。

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Ghost shopper
passages.content:
Shopper:
Do you think they have spicy peppers?\!
I've been craving...\. fire recently.

Other Shopper:
Oh, their ghost peppers are *so good*.

She licks her lips with a much-too-long
tongue.

Other Shopper:
Made me feel like a new person!
passages.content_zh:
購物者：
你認為他們有辣辣椒嗎？ \！
我一直渴望...\.最近火了。

其他購物者：
哦，他們的鬼椒*太好吃了*。

她用太長的舌頭舔著嘴唇
舌頭。

其他購物者：
讓我感覺像換了個人一樣！

passages.name: Farmer's Market — Dancer
passages.content:
Dancer (Rank J):
I love this music!
passages.content_zh:
舞者（J級）：
我喜歡這個音樂！

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad — p1
passages.content:
Player Brad:
Bro, you were totally right.\!
Bigger is *always* better.

But I was thinking, what do I do to get bigger?\!
Where do I go?

Then I realized.\!
Gains! I'm talking about gains!

I'm so glad this place is open again bro, it's
got the best weights.

Here, c'mon, there's one station open. Spot
me on the breast press!

You follow Brad over to the weightlifting
bench, standing behind it ready to grab the
bar if necessary.

You have to rest your massive chest on top of
the bar to get close enough, but you don't
think Brad minds.

Not that you can see her face with your
ridiculous chest pillows lying between you.

Player Brad:
Okay, here we go.

She grabs the bar and sets herself.

Player Brad:
And...

She heaves the weights off the bench with
one practiced motion.\!
And is barely able to slow them as they drop,
squeezing her breasts out heavily to the sides.

Player Brad:
Grmph\..\..\..\..\!
Urg\..\..\..\..\!
A\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.A\.A\.A\.A\.A\.AARg!

Struggling, panting and sweating, she\. ever\. so\.
slowly\.\. inches the weights back up.

Bit\.\.\.
By bit\.\.\.
By bit

Until she finally gets them back on the stand,
arms shaking like mad.

She clings to the bar, great heaving breaths
causing her chest to shake and quiver in her
overstretched shirt.

Player Brad:
I'm fine.\!
I'm fine.

She pants heavily.

Player Brad:
C'mon Brad.\!
This is an easy weight.\!
I've done this tons of times.

You gotta keep going!\!
Just a few more!\!
For the gains!

She keeps trying to pysch herself up, clutching
the bar, redfaced and panting.

Player Brad:
Just a little more energy.\!
Get the energy.\!
For the boobs!
passages.content_zh:
球員布拉德：
兄弟，你說得完全正確。 \!
越大*總是*比較好。

但我在想，我該怎麼做才能變得更大？ ！
我該去哪裡？

然後我意識到。 \！
收穫！我說的是收穫！

我很高興這個地方又開業了，兄弟
得到了最好的權重。

來吧，有一站開放了。現貨
我按胸！

你跟著布萊德去舉重
長凳，站在它後面準備抓住
如果需要的話酒吧。

你必須把你巨大的胸部放在上面
酒吧足夠接近，但你沒有
布拉德認為。

並不是說你可以用你的眼睛看到她的臉
你們之間躺著可笑的胸枕。

球員布拉德：
好的，我們開始吧。

她抓起橫桿，擺好姿勢。

球員布拉德：
還有...

她把重物從長凳上舉起來
一個練習動作。 \！
當它們下降時幾乎無法減慢它們的速度，
用力將她的乳房向兩側擠壓。

球員布拉德：
咕嚕\..\..\..\..\！
呃\..\..\..\..\！
A\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.a\.\.A\.A\.A\.A\.A\.AARg！

她掙扎著，氣喘吁籲，滿頭大汗。曾經\。所以\。
慢慢地\.\.英吋重量回升。

少量\。 \。 \。
按位\.\.\.
按位

直到她最終讓他們回到看台上
手臂瘋狂地顫抖。

她緊緊抓住吧台，呼吸劇烈起伏
導致她的胸部顫抖
過度拉伸的襯衫。

球員布拉德：
我很好。 \!
我很好。

她氣喘吁籲。

球員布拉德：
來吧布拉德。 \!
這是一個簡單的重量。 \！
我已經做過很多次了。

你一定要繼續走下去！ \!
再多幾個就好了！ \!
為了利益！

她一直試著讓自己振作起來，緊緊抓住
酒吧里，紅著臉，氣喘吁籲。

球員布拉德：
只要再多一點能量就可以了。 \!
獲取能量。 \!
為了胸部！

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
He's too busy lifting weights to talk.

Not too busy to grunt though.

You've never heard such a scornful grunt.
passages.content_zh:
他正忙著舉重，沒時間說話。

不過還不算太忙，沒時間咕噥。

你從來沒有聽過如此輕蔑的咕噥聲。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
The tits: bigger.\!
The grunt: still scornful.
passages.content_zh:
乳房：更大。 \!
咕嚕聲：仍然輕蔑。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
This is how...

He grunts, shoving the weights up to full
extension in a burst of effort.

Weightlifter:
A real man lifts!
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
這是如何...

他咕噥著，把配重推到最大
一陣努力地延伸。

舉重運動員：
真正的男人舉起來！

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
This is how...

She carefully lowers the weights down.

Weightlifter:
A real man-

She stops in surprise as something gets in the
way.

Weightlifter:
-Lifts????
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
這是如何...

她小心翼翼地放下重物。

舉重運動員：
一個真正的男人——

當有東西進入時，她驚訝地停了下來
方式。

舉重運動員：
-電梯？ ？ ？

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
You sure you're in the right place?\!
This is a room for *serious* weightlifters.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
您確定您來對地方了嗎？ \!
這是一個專為「認真的」舉重運動員準備的房間。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Heh, check out the wimp over there trying
to lift.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
嘿，看看那邊的懦夫嘗試
舉起。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p3
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Why's\..\..\.. everything\..\..\.. hard??

But can't\..\..\.. stop lifting!\!
Can't become the wimp!

She barely struggles through another rep.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
為什麼\..\..\.. 一切\..\..\.. 很難？

但不能\..\..\..停止舉升！ \！
不能成為懦夫！

她勉強完成了另一次代表。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
He's listening to headphones and doesn't
notice you.
passages.content_zh:
他正在聽耳機，但沒有
注意到你了。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
She's listening to headphones and doesn't
notice anything.
passages.content_zh:
她正在聽耳機，但沒有
注意任何事情。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Going\..\..\.. for\..\..\.. a new\..\..\.. record...

He heaves the weight up.

Weightlifter:
Hah! Four hundred pounds!
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
去\..\..\.. 尋找\..\..\.. 一個新的\..\..\.. 記錄...

他把重物舉起。

舉重運動員：
哈！四百英鎊！

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Hah! A new record!

She carefully starts to lower the weight.

But drops it from a few inches up.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
哈！新紀錄！

她小心翼翼地開始減輕體重。

但它會從幾英寸高的地方掉下來。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Finally decided to talk to the top dog here?

I've got the biggest muscles, I lift the biggest
weights, and-

He smirks at you.

Weightlifter:
I've got the biggest something else, if you
know what I mean.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
終於決定跟這裡的老闆談了嗎？

我擁有最大的肌肉，我舉起最大的肌肉
重量，以及-

他對你傻笑。

舉重運動員：
我還有最重要的東西，如果你
知道我的意思。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
She's staring at everyone else's chests out
of the corner of her eye.

Weightlifter:
Hmph!\!
Still top dog!\!
Still the biggest!
passages.content_zh:
她盯著別人的胸部
她的眼角。

舉重運動員：
哼！ \!
仍然是頂級狗！ \！
還是最大的！

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
He's doing arm curls.

Weightlifter:
One, two, three, four...
passages.content_zh:
他正在做臂彎舉。

舉重運動員：
一、二、三、四…

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
She's doing arm curls.

Weightlifter:
One, two, three, four...

Weightlifter:
What are you staring at?
passages.content_zh:
她正在做臂彎舉。

舉重運動員：
一、二、三、四…

舉重運動員：
你在看什麼？

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Hey, they store the girly weights down the
hall.

You should go check those out.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
嘿，他們把少女的體重儲存在
大廳。

你應該去檢查一下。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Doesn't that chick over there know there's
other rooms for people who aren't serious
about their workout?
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
那邊那個小妞不知道那裡有嗎
其他房間適合不認真的人
關於他們的運動？

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p3
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
See\..\..\..\..\!
This\..\..\.. is what a *real*\..\..\.. workout\..\..\..
looks like\..\..\..

She pants heavily.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
He's working the weight machine hard.

Weightlifter:
I appreciate how serious these guys are, but...

He looks around, then whispers to you.

Weightlifter:
(It really gets pretty toxic in here sometimes.)
passages.content_zh:
他正在努力鍛鍊舉重機。

舉重運動員：
我很欣賞這些人的認真態度，但是…

他環顧四周，然後對你低聲說。

舉重運動員：
（有時這裡真的有毒。）

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Sometimes keeping in shape is such a
massive pain in the ass.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
有時候保持身材就是這樣
屁股劇烈疼痛。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Form is so important on these things to not
strain something.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
形式對這些事情來說是如此重要，以至於不能
拉緊一些東西。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
And there we go!\!
Another perfect set of reps.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
我們開始了！ \!
另一套完美的代表。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Call me a bit of an ass, but I think that they
should leave the weight room to the
*serious* weightlifters.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
你可以說我有點混蛋，但我認為他們
應該把舉重室留給
*認真的*舉重運動員。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Call me-\.\.\. *huff*-\.\.\. a bit of an ass, but-\.\.\.
*pant* \.\.\. I think they should leave the weight
room to the-\.\.\. *gasp*\.\.\. _serious_ weightlifters.

Weightlifter:
.......\!
(Did I set the weight too high?)
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
叫我-\.\.\. *气愤*-\.\.\.有点混蛋，但是-\.\.\.
*喘氣* \.\.\.我認為他們應該留下體重
房間到-\.\.\. *喘氣*\。 \。 \。 _嚴肅的_舉重運動員。

舉重運動員：
....\！
（是不是我把權重設得太高了？）

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
98...\!
99...\!
100!

She smiles at you.

Weightlifter:
There's nothing like a good workout, right?
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
98...\!
99...\!
100！

她對你微笑。

舉重運動員：
There's nothing like a good workout, right?

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Oni
passages.content:
Oni:
Yes!\! Yes!!!\!
LIFT HEAVY THINGS!!!!!!

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Oni — p1
passages.content:
Oni:
Are you here to GET SWOLE?????
passages.content_zh:
鬼：
你來這裡是為了獲得SWOLE嗎？

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Oni — p2
passages.content:
Oni:
An unorthodox type of swole...\!
BUT I APPROVE!
passages.content_zh:
鬼：
一種非正統的 swell...\!
但我同意！

passages.name: Weight room - brad — p1
passages.content: Raw Mana x2 was found!
passages.content_zh: 發現原始法力 x2！

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Weight obstacle — p1
passages.content:
A dumbbell lies here, blocking the way
forward.

You pick it up and move it out of the way.

You tug and strain, but the weight refuses
to move.

You try to pretend like no one in the room is
laughing at you.

Emotional damage taken!

If only you were stronger...

Weightlifter:
Hey, watch out, stepping on dumbbells is
dangerous.

A weight turns under your foot!

You barely manage to keep your balance.

Weightlifter:
Just move the stupid thing!

He pulls the weight away.

You trip and slam your head into the ground.

If only you were more agile...
passages.content_zh:
A dumbbell lies here, blocking the way
向前。

You pick it up and move it out of the way.

你用力拉扯，但重量卻拒絕了
移動。

You try to pretend like no one in the room is
laughing at you.

Emotional damage taken!

If only you were stronger...

舉重運動員：
Hey, watch out, stepping on dumbbells is
危險的。

A weight turns under your foot!

You barely manage to keep your balance.

舉重運動員：
只要移動那個愚蠢的東西！

他把重量拉開。

你絆倒了，頭撞到了地上。

如果你再敏捷一點就好了…

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad lifting — p1
passages.content:
Weightlifter:
Get out of here if you're not here to lift.
passages.content_zh:
舉重運動員：
如果你不來舉重，就離開這裡。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad lifting — p3
passages.content:
Brad is still lying here, panting and sweating.

Player Brad:
You can do it.\!
Just, get the energy.\!
Just a few more reps.

She strains at the bar for a moment.
It starts to rise, ever so slowly\..\..\..\..\..
Then drops back to the rack after barely half
an inch.

She slumps back down.

Player Brad:
Whoa!

She lifts the bar and does a smooth pushup,
bouncing it off her boobs at the bottom.

Player Brad:
I dunno what you did, but thanks bro!

She does a few more reps, quickly and
easily.

Player Brad:
Time to get those gains!

...\!
Is weightlifting supposed to make her glow
like that?

She starts to crackle with electricity, growing
with each movement, until lightning arcs from
her and hits you right in the chest!

But you have no time to focus on the warmth
it leaves behind, Brad is continuing to charge.

Electricity arcs across the room.

And again.

And again.

Smiling happily, Brad does one last rep and
racks the bar.

Player Brad:
Now that's a workout!

Around her the room has fallen into a
(literally) shocked silence.

The only sound is the ripping noise as her poor
shirt finally gives up.

Player Brad:
No thanks bro, now's not the time to hydrate.
passages.content_zh:
布萊德還躺在這裡，氣喘吁籲，大汗淋漓。

球員布拉德：
你可以做到的。 \!
只是，獲取能量。 \！
只需多做幾次即可。

她在酒吧緊張了一會兒。
它開始上升，非常緩慢\..\..\..\..\..
不到一半後就落回架上
一吋。

她又跌倒了。

球員布拉德：
哇！

她舉起槓鈴，做了一個平穩的伏地挺身，
將其從底部的胸部彈起。

球員布拉德：
不知道你做了什麼，但謝謝兄弟！

她又快速又重複地做了幾次
很容易。

球員布拉德：
是時候獲得這些收益了！

...\!
舉重能讓她容光煥發嗎
就這樣？

她開始隨著電流劈啪作響，成長
隨著每一個動作，直到閃電從
她並擊中你的胸部！

但你沒有時間去關注溫暖
它落後了，布拉德繼續衝鋒。

電弧穿過房間。

又來了。

又來了。

布拉德開心地微笑著，做了最後一次動作
把酒吧架起來。

球員布拉德：
現在這是一個鍛鍊！

她周圍的房間陷入了困境
（字面意思）震驚的沉默。

唯一的聲音是撕裂的聲音，因為她可憐
襯衫終於放棄了。

球員布拉德：
不，謝謝兄弟，現在不是補水的時候。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad lifting — p4
passages.content:
Player Brad:
Thanks for the help bro!

She smiles down at herself.

Player Brad:
Did you see my shirt burst?\!
That was awesome!

I gotta figure out what I'm gonna try next.

Can't weightlift two days in a row, you gotta
mix up your training for best gains.
passages.content_zh:
球員布拉德：
謝謝兄弟的幫忙！

她低頭對自己微笑。

球員布拉德：
你看到我的襯衫爆了嗎？ \！
太棒了！

我得弄清楚接下來我要嘗試什麼。

不能連續兩天舉重，你必須
混合訓練以獲得最佳效果。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad lifting — p5
passages.content:
Looks like there's finally a weightlifting station
free. You could probably get in a few reps.\!
Give it a try?

You load a few weights on the bar and lie
back.

A quick heave pulls the bar off the rack, then
smoothly down and up.\|
Then another rep.

Yeah, you hit just the sweet spot on the
weight. Bar goes up, bar goes down, and
you're getting that pleasant burn of effort
in your arms and your chest.

Especially in your chest, actually.

It's a very familiar warmth.\!
You're not even surprised when you start to
feel a little more resistance against your chest
at the bottom of your lift.

Warmth and tingling, now.\!
And is your chest shaking a little bit more
with each movement?

...Right, this was the weight bench Brad
used.\!
You probably should have seen this coming.

The thing is, you're only halfway through your
set.\!
Do you keep going?

Of course you keep going, this is just another
type of gains.\!
And you have to finish the whole set, you need
that power!

So you keep pumping the weights, even as you
seen your chest jiggle more and more in the
bottom of your vision.

That was a good workout!\!
ATK +5!

Nope, you are done with this!\!
You rack the bar and get out.

You still got some gains, even if you ended
early.\!
ATK +2!

You decide exercise can wait.
passages.content_zh:
看來終於有舉重站了
免費。你也許可以做幾次。 \!
嘗試一下嗎？

你在槓上放幾個重物然後躺下
回來。

快速一舉將槓鈴從架上拉下來，然後
順利地上下。 \|
然後是另一個代表。

是的，你正好擊中了最佳點
重量。條形上升，條形下降，且
你會得到令人愉快的努力燃燒
在你的手臂和胸部。

實際上，尤其是在你的胸部。

這是一種非常熟悉的溫暖。 \!
當你開始時你甚至不會感到驚訝
感覺胸部受到更多阻力
在電梯底部。

溫暖和刺痛，現在。 \！
你的胸口是否顫抖得更厲害了一點
每個動作？

……對了，這是舉重凳布拉德
使用過。 \!
您可能應該預見到這一點。

問題是，你的人生才剛完成一半
設定。 \!
你繼續嗎？

當然，你繼續前進，這只是另一個
收益類型。 \!
而且你必須完成整套，你需要
那個力量！

所以你繼續舉重，即使你
看到你的胸部越來越搖晃
你視野的底部。

這是一次很好的鍛鍊！ \!
攻擊力+5！

不，你已經完成了！ \!
你拉起吧台然後出去。

即使你結束了，你仍然得到了一些收穫
早啊。 \!
攻擊力+2！

你決定鍛鍊可以等待。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Brad lifting — p6
passages.content:
She's pumping the bar up and down, breasts
shaking wildly as she does.

Weightlifter:
Hah!\!
This is the perfect weight set!

Look at me! I'm getting so pumped up!

Your eyes may be fooling you, but you could
swear her breasts are slowly swelling as she
goes...

Weightlifter:
Back off!\!
I'm getting all the gains here!

You get the feeling you won't be getting to
lift weights here anytime soon.
passages.content_zh:
她上下晃動槓鈴，乳房
像她一樣劇烈顫抖。

舉重運動員：
哈！ \！
這是完美的重量組！

看著我！我真是太興奮了！

你的眼睛可能會欺騙你，但你可以
發誓她的乳房正在慢慢腫脹
goes...

舉重運動員：
Back off!\!
所有的收穫我都在這裡得到！

你有一種你無法到達的感覺
很快就可以在這裡舉重。

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p1
passages.content:
His shirt says "DO YOU EVEN LIFT?"

He grunts at you.

He doesn't seem interested in talking to
someone who doesn't lift.
passages.content_zh:
他的襯衫上寫著“你還舉重嗎？”

他對著你咕噥。

He doesn't seem interested in talking to
someone who doesn't lift.

passages.name: Weight room - brad — Gym bro — p2
passages.content:
Her DO YOU EVEN LIFT? shirt is looking a lot
different now.\!
And doing a lot more lifting.
passages.content_zh:
你還舉起她嗎？襯衫看起來很多
現在不同了。 \!
並做更多的舉重工作。

passages.name: Yoga room — Sleeping
passages.content:
Huh, this is an interesting pose. It's hard to
tell what she might be stretching, though it
does look very relaxing.

Instructor:
STAND TO ATTENTION, WARRIOR!

Instructor:
Jane!\!
We've discussed this!\!
Napping in class is unacceptable!
passages.content_zh:
呵呵，這個姿勢很有趣。很難
告訴她她可能在伸展什麼，儘管它
看起來確實很放鬆。

導師：
請注意，戰士！

導師：
簡！ \！
我們已經討論過了！ \!
上課打瞌睡是不可接受的！

passages.name: Yoga room — Instructor — p1
passages.content:
Instructor:
A new recruit?!\!
WELCOME TO YOGA CLASS.

Instructor:
FREE EXERCISE, CLASS!\!
Choose a pose and stick to it!

Instructor:
You're in luck!\!
Today we have an open mat for trying out THE
BEST EXERCISE POSSIBLE!

Strength!\!
Flexibility!\!
YOU WILL BE SWOL.

Instructor:
And not just that, yoga is also an exercise of
DEEP SPIRTUALITY.

We're not just stretching, we're CHANNELING
THE ENERGY OF THE WORLD.

...Feels like we've been channeling a lot more
of that energy recently, for some reason.

But REGARDLESS.\!
Look around. See what everyone is doing.
FIND THE EXERCISE THAT SPEAKS MOST TO
YOU.

Then go to your mat and we will DO YOGA.

Your glasses click on.

Kaede:
Well.\!
'Tis a bit unorthodox, but any form of power
might aid us 'gainst the dark goddess.
passages.content_zh:
導師：
新招募的？ ！ \！
歡迎來到瑜珈課。

導師：
免費練習，上課！ \!
選擇一個姿勢並堅持下去！

導師：
你很幸運！ \！
今天我們有一個開放的墊子來嘗試
最好的鍛鍊可能！

力量！ \！
靈活性！ \！
你會變得很優秀。

導師：
不僅如此，瑜珈還是一種鍛鍊身體的運動
深刻的靈性。

我們不只是伸展，我們是引導
世界的能量。

……感覺我們已經進行了更多的引導
由於某種原因，最近這種能量。

但無論如何。 \！
環顧四周。看看每個人都在做什麼。
找出最能說明問題的練習
你。

然後走到你的墊子上，我們將做瑜伽。

您的眼鏡會發出咔嗒聲。

楓：
好吧。 \!
這有點不正統，但任何形式的權力
可能會幫助我們「戰勝黑暗女神」。

passages.name: Yoga room — Instructor — p2
passages.content:
Instructor:
Talk to everyone!\!
SEE THE WONDERS THAT YOGA HAS TO
SHOW.

Then go to the empty mat when you want to
try one out!
passages.content_zh:
導師：
和大家聊聊！ \!
见证瑜伽的奇迹
展示。

然後當你想要的時候走到空墊子上
嘗試一下！

passages.name: Yoga room — Instructor — p3
passages.content:
Instructor:
Welcome back!\!
We don't have any empty mats today, but
you're welcome to watch!
passages.content_zh:
導師：
Welcome back!\!
今天我们没有空垫子，但是
you're welcome to watch!

passages.name: Yoga room — Cat pose
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
Yes... right... there...

She drops out of her pose as she notices you
watching.

Yoga Student:
What. What are you looking at?

She licks the back of one hand and starts
using it to brush back her hair.

Yoga Student:
My cat pose is very elegant, but that's no
reason to stare.

Instructor:
WHO IS A KITTY.

Kaede:
I seest little use in this one.

\n[2]:
Though you would look cute with cat ears!

\n[2]:
Especially when you can have cat ears
whenever you want!
passages.content_zh:
瑜珈學員：
是的……對……那裡……

當她注意到你時，她會放棄原來的姿勢
觀看。

瑜珈學員：
什麼。你在看什麼？

她舔了舔一隻手背並開始
用它把頭髮往後梳。

瑜珈學員：
我的貓式很優雅，但那不是
凝視的理由。

導師：
誰是小貓。

楓：
我認為這個沒什麼用處。

\n[2]:
雖然你戴上貓耳朵會顯得很可愛！

\n[2]:
尤其是當你有貓耳的時候
只要你願意！

passages.name: Yoga room — Cow pose
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
There's something just so relaxing about cow
pose.

She moos softly in contentment.

Kaede:
Ah, a mighty form indeed! Like the minotaurs
of old!\!
A strong choice indeed Hero \n[10]!
passages.content_zh:
瑜珈學員：
牛有一种令人放松的感觉
姿勢。

她心满意足地轻声哞哞叫。

楓：
啊，确实是一个强大的形态！就像牛头怪一样
舊的！ \！
确实是英雄的有力选择\n[10]！

passages.name: Yoga room — Jacko pose
passages.content:
Instructor:
THE CLASSIC-\!
I... don't recognize that pose.

Dalia! Are you memeing again?\!
No memeing in class!
passages.content_zh:
導師：
經典-\!
I... don't recognize that pose.

達莉亞！你又發表情包了嗎？ \!
上課不准發表情包！

passages.name: Yoga room — Empty mat — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
Hero \n[10]! It dost seem that there art a few
poses that might help us with our trials.

I wouldst say that the noble cow pose and the
hottest of yoga stood far above the rest.\!
Which wouldst thou choose?

You get down on your hands and knees and
arch your back.

Instructor:
Yes!\!
You have assumed the pose, recruit!

As you settle in, you can feel yourself relax.\!
Your muscles start to stretch.\!
Your\..\..\..\.. chest start to tingle?

Ah, that was relaxing!

Mmmmm, yes.

You bite your lip and squeeze your arms
together, making sure to push your chest at
the instructor.

You bend down for a big stretch, making sure
to give your classmates a wonderful view of
your ass.

Then sit down and spread your legs *super*
wide to the room, giving them all an inviting
smile.

That really does warm you up!

A portion of that heat seems to settle
permanently between your legs.

Yeah, no.\!
You can see where this is going and you
refuse.

Instead you get the instructor to run you
through some boring regular stretches and
exercises.

AGI +2!
ATK +2!

You don't feel like you've yogot a yogreat
idea yet. Better keep looking.

// Also mountain pose?
passages.content_zh:
楓：
英雄\n[10]！似乎確實有一些藝術
可能有助於我們進行試驗的姿勢。

我想說高貴的牛姿勢和
最熱門的瑜伽遠高於其他瑜伽。 \！
你會選擇哪一個？

你雙手雙膝跪下，
拱起你的背部。

導師：
是的！ \!
你已經擺好了姿勢，招募！

當您安頓下來時，您會感到自己放鬆了。 \！
你的肌肉開始伸展。 \!
你的\..\..\..\..胸口開始刺痛？

啊，那真是放鬆啊！

嗯嗯，是的。

你咬住嘴唇，捏緊雙臂
一起，確保將胸部推至
導師。

你彎下腰做一個大伸展運動，確保
給你的同學一個美妙的景色
你的屁股。

然後坐下來並張開雙腿*超級*
寬闊的房間，給他們所有人一個誘人的
微笑。

這真的能讓你暖和起來！

一部分熱量似乎已經消退
永久地夾在雙腿之間。

是的，不。 \!
你可以看到事情的進展，然後你
拒絕。

相反，你讓教練指導你
透過一些無聊的常規伸展運動
練習。

AGI+2！
攻擊力+2！

你不覺得自己喝了酸奶
想法還沒有。最好繼續尋找。

// 還有山式？

passages.name: Yoga room — Empty mat — p2
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
I'm a good yoga student!

She wags her tail happily.

Instructor:
Tiffany!\!
It's DOWNWARDS-FACING dog!

Stop looking up!
passages.content_zh:
瑜珈學員：
I'm a good yoga student!

她高興地搖著尾巴。

導師：
Tiffany!\!
這是面朝下的狗！

Stop looking up!

passages.name: Yoga room — Warrior pose
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
Know that it is an honor for a peasant such as
yourself to cast eyes upon my reverse warrior
pose.

She sniffs.

Yoga Student:
Perhaps one day you too might attain such
elegance.

Kaede:
She truly ist the opposite of a warrior.\!
I think this shalt be a pass, hero.

\n[4]:
\}And we don't need two people who talk like
that.
passages.content_zh:
瑜珈學員：
Know that it is an honor for a peasant such as
亲自将目光投向我的逆向战士
姿勢。

她吸了吸鼻子。

瑜珈學員：
也许有一天你也能达到这样的境界
優雅。

楓：

passages.name: Yoga room — Mountain pose
passages.content:
Yoga Student:
Behold the majesty of my mountain pose.\!

GROW HEAVY THINGS!

Kaede:

Kaede:

And most comfortable.\!
And sexy.

And-

She shakes her head.

Kaede:

'Twould be a fine form to take, most pleasing

But methinks it shouldst wait until the trial

...Perhaps we might return then.

自從我

passages.name: Beach — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
You're blinded by sunlight as you walk through
the door.

But you can hear the cries of gulls.\!
Feel sand shift under your feet.\!
Smell the salt in the air.

Wherever you are, it's definitely a beach.

Kaede squints at something out in the water.

Kaede:
Dost mine eyes deceive me?!

Kaede:
It canst not be!

Kaede:
Yet it is!

Kaede:
Hero! Dost thou remember how I gave mine
word to show you the wonder and glory of
the goddesses?

Well behold! If mine vision does speak truly,
then before us lies the great temple once
built to honor all the goddesses, in all their
magnificence!

You squint.\!
There does seem to be something out in the
water.

The tops of a few towers barely poke up
above the waves.

Kaede:
Why, it was thought forever lost!\!
Foul knavery from enemies of all that is good
sunk it beneath the waves.

Kaede:
Or wert it an argument between the
goddesses that had an unfortunate victim?

Kaede:
Or the great Boobpocalypse of '47?

It matters not! All that is important is how
blessed we art to find it!

'Tis where the greatest minds of the ages
gathered to offer their praise and gratitude
towards our divine protectors.

The art...\!
The tales...\!
The blessed artifacts...

All wonders that couldst never even be
imagined by those foolish mountebanks that
thou believes stand above us all.

Come, if the sights to be seen dost not
convince thee of the truth of the great
goddesses' existence then thou art deaf,
blind and dumb!

Kaede:
Ah, it has been many an age since I last
feasted mine gaze upon such beauty.\!
Let us make haste! 'Tis but a walk away!

She strides forward, vanishing underwater.

\n[2]:
We get to see ancient artifacts?\!
Forgotten lore?\!
Aquatic wildlife?!?!

Come on \n[10], let's go!

She submerges.

\n[4] shares a look with you.

\n[4]:
Maybe something there will help fuzzbrain see
reason.\!
\}I knew telling her was going to be a pain.

She sighs.

\n[4]:
No way out but forward, I guess.

She walks out into the ocean.

Well.\!
You watch

感受腳下的沙子移動。 \！

楓瞇著眼睛看著水中的東西。

難道是我的眼睛欺騙了我？ ！

英雄！你還記得我是如何給我的

瞧瞧！如果我的願景確實如此，

水。

為什麼，它被認為永遠丟失了！ \！

楓：
或者這是一場爭論
那些不幸遇難的女神？

楓：
還是 47 年偉大的 Boobpocalypse？

沒關係！重要的是如何

這是歷代最偉大思想家的所在
聚集在一起表達他們的讚美和感激
朝向我們神聖的保護者。

藝術...\！
故事...\！
受祝福的神器...

所有不可能存在的奇蹟
那些愚蠢的江湖騙子所想像的
你相信自己高於我們所有人。

來吧，如果看不到的風景
使你相信偉大的真理
女神的存在那麼你就聾了，
又瞎又啞！

楓：
啊，距離上次已經過去很多年了
如此美麗的景色讓我大飽眼福。 \！
讓我們抓緊時間吧！只需步行即可到達！

\n[2]:

出色地。 \！
你看

passages.content:
Kaede:
Worry not about the goddesses.\!
I shalt ensure they art informed of our plans.\!
\..\..\..and the truth of the world.

I find myself in much need of rest.

不用擔心女神們。 \!
我將確保他們了解我們的計劃。 \！
\..\..\..以及世界的真理。

passages.name: Beach — Florauna — p1
passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
Oh hero, I so look forward to seeing what

You can tell so much about a person from

or sexy? What colors are you going to choose?

What have you brought me?

// 1 = generic, 3 = micro, 4 = trunks, 5 = store

Florauna frowns down at the swimsuit.

Goddess Florauna:
Ugh.

She looks back up at you.

Goddess Florauna:
No no darling, it's all fine!\!
It's just...\.\. did you *have* to go for

She sighs.

Goddess Florauna:
No, no, I'm sure it's fine.\!
We all have our own sense of style.

And some people will cling to theirs even when
an actual goddess tells them it's too boring.

She forces a smile onto her face.

Goddess Florauna:
Regardless, you have brought me a swimsuit

Goddess Florauna:
Ooo, what a daring little number!\!
Hero, I never knew you had it in you!

She raises up the tiny scraps of cloth.

They burst into a spray of light, drifting out
over the beach to the east.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh darling, I can't wait to see what this seed
will grow!

Florauna glances at your chest.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh, now this is a statement.

Daring!\!
Sexy!\!
Transgressive!

Darling, I just love it!

Florauna nods knowingly.

Goddess Florauna:
Ah, darling hero, still trying to cling on to

She dramatically presses her hand to her
chest.

Goddess Florauna:
Far be it from me to interfere!\!
All things will blossom in time.

She raises up the swimtrunks.

They burst into a spray of light, drifting out
over the beach to the east.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh darling, I can't wait to see what this seed
will grow!

Goddess Florauna:
Ooo, Hero \n[10], such a fascinating
choice!

It looks normal, but there's something about

She raises up the swimsuit.

Brighter.

And brighter.

And then the light all focuses on *you*.

Sudden massive pleasure burns in your chest.

You collapse forward with a moan, too

passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
Darling Hero! I'm so impressed you
completed all our tasks!

The time has come to answer your prayers!

The other goddesses gather around Florauna.

Goddess Florauna:
Dearly beloved, we are gathered here to
witness the union of a hero and a blessing.

Such a union is a joyous thing, a cause for
great celebration...

As Florauna continues to praise the
"new pairing", a thought occurs to you.

You lean over to Kaede.

Florauna is really getting into her speech. But
even if she's describing this ritual as a "sacred

right?

Kaede chuckles.

Kaede:
Nay Hero \n[10], 'tis but a portion of our
Lady's grace.

She merely enjoys a touch of ceremony from
time to time.

And truly, is it not a fine chance to rest for a
nonce?

We hast spent so much time rushing hither
and yon, and I canst see how much wear it
hast put on thee and thy companions!

We shalt fight all the harder if we but take a
moment to relax.\!
Breathe.\!
Pause and count our blessings.

She looks over at Florauna.

Kaede:
...One.

She gives a satisfied nod.

Kaede:
That truly was refreshing!

Florauna seems to come to the end of this
part of her speech.\!
She raises her hands.

Goddess Florauna:
Sisters!\!
The time for judgement has come!

Please, grant me thy wisdom. Is this mortal

Goddess Hadea:
The mortal has completed my task.

I couldn't have done better myself. They'll go
far with that sort of business sense.

And shown themselves to be utter morons
when it comes to business.\!
That's still better than most heroes can
manage.

They're...

She shrugs.

Goddess Hadea:
Okay?\!
I'm just saying, we don't pick heroes for their
brains.

They are worthy.

Goddess Fittina:
They totally did what I asked!

They proved themselves full of heart!\!
And chest!

They didn't win, but there's always next time
dude!

Totally worthy!

// 1 = generic, 3 = micro, 4 = trunks, 5 = store

Goddess Florauna:

Well...

Godd

英雄\n[10]，你必須與
精神！

並將它們服務於凡人以換取
貨幣。

尋後宮白髮女子
海灘，遠離大海。

passages.name: Beach — Hadea — p2
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
Hero \n[10], I sensed that you have spent
your time communing with the spirits!

A decent job, though somewhat unsanitary.\!
But at least your customers had a happy
ending!

I can see that my sister of blossoming has
found her place in your heart.

Which is fine, sure, but she has her *own*
task. She shouldn't interfere in mine!

She scowls at Kaede.

Goddess Hadea:
You're a bad influence.

Kaede scoffs.

Kaede:
'Tis not mine fault that the glories of vastness
wert so self-evidently true to the hero.

I'm sure your customers will enjoy their new
forms.\!
Normal humans can be so boring, I agree.

Goddess Hadea:
You have proven yourself worthy of my
blessing.

Speak to Florauna and we can finally get this
ritual over with.

But my sisters' tasks still remain before we
can be bothered to grant you passage beneath
the waves.
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞女神：
英雄\n[10]，我感覺到你已經花了
你與靈魂交流的時間！

一份體面的工作，雖然有點不衛生。 \!
但至少你的顧客過得很開心
結束！

我看我的朵朵姐姐已經
找到她在你心中的位置。

當然，這很好，但她有她的*自己的*
任務。她不該干涉我的事！

她皺起眉頭看著凱德。

哈迪亞女神：
你是一個壞影響。

凱德嘲笑道。

楓：
廣闊的榮耀並不是我的錯
對英雄來說是如此不言而喻的真實。

我相信您的客戶會喜歡他們的新產品
形式。 \!
正常人可能會很無聊，我同意。

哈迪亞女神：
你已經證明了自己配得上我
祝福。

與 Florauna 交談，我們終於可以得到這個
儀式結束了。

但姊妹們的任務仍擺在我們面前
不厭其煩地允許您通過下面的通道
海浪。

passages.name: Beach — Hadea — p3
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
Good job \n[10], you've completed my
task and the others.

Go talk to Florauna to get the ritual started
and we can all get on with our lives.

Goddess Hadea:
Good job with the spirits.\!
Ah, I love to see a business taking off.
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞女神：
幹得好\n[10]，你已經完成了我的任務
任務和其他。

去和 Florauna 交談以開始儀式
我們都可以繼續我們的生活。

哈迪亞女神：
幹得好，精神好。 \！
啊，我喜歡看到企業起飛。

passages.name: Beach — Hadea — p4
passages.content:
Goddess Hadea:
Underwater is like a stupider, less interesting
underworld.

Enjoy I guess.

\n[4]:
At least fish should be less frustrating than
trying to organize spirits...
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞女神：
水下就像一個更愚蠢、更無趣的地方
黑社會。

我猜享受吧。

\n[4]:
至少魚應該不要那麼令人沮喪
試圖組織精神...

passages.name: Beach — Fittina — p1
passages.content:
Goddess Fittina:
Dude, have you communed with volleyball
yet?

It's just a bit to the south!
passages.content_zh:
女神菲蒂娜：
老兄，你和排球有過交流嗎？
還沒有？

就在南邊一點點！

passages.name: Beach — Fittina — p2
passages.content:
Goddess Fittina:
Awesome job dude, that's the sort of spirit I
love to see!

Goddess Fittina:
Don't worry about losing dude, that's just how
it goes sometimes!

Just do a few reps of that every day and I'm
sure you'll be winning in no time!

Oh, and Florauna's been working on that
whole ritual thing for you dude.\!
Go check it out!
passages.content_zh:
女神菲蒂娜：
太棒了，夥計，這就是我的精神
喜歡看！

女神菲蒂娜：
別擔心失去老兄，就是這樣
有時會發生！

每天重複幾次就可以了
相信您很快就會獲勝！

哦，Florauna 一直在研究這個
整個儀式都為你夥計。 \！
去看看吧！

passages.name: Beach — Fittina — p3
passages.content:
Goddess Fittina:
Dude, swimming is a great workout!\!
Enjoy!
passages.content_zh:
女神菲蒂娜：
夥計，游泳是一項很棒的運動！ \！
享受！

passages.name: Beach — Opening soon sign
passages.content: OPENING SOON
passages.content_zh: 即將開業

passages.name: Beach — Sign
passages.content: Changing room

passages.name: Beach — Trash pile — p1
passages.content:
A bunch of trash has washed up onto this
secluded beach.

This trash pile is mostly old weathered clothes.
They practically disintegrate in your hands.

One little piece still seems useable.

Scrap of fabric found!

You're able to tie your collected fabric together
with the floss to make something that'll just
barely cover a person.

Micromicrobikini acquired!
passages.content_zh:
一堆垃圾被沖到了這裡
僻靜的海灘。

這堆垃圾大多是破舊的衣服。
它們實際上會在你手中分解。

一小塊看起來還是有用的。

發現布料碎片！

您可以將收集到的布料綁在一起
用牙線來做一些東西
勉強覆蓋一個人。

微微比基尼已獲得！

passages.name: Beach — Hole digger — p1
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Digging a hole\!
Digging a hole\!
Dig dig dig!
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
挖個坑\!
挖個坑\!
挖挖挖挖！

passages.name: Beach — Hole digger — p4
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
I can't see my hole anymore!
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
我再也看不到我的洞了！

passages.name: Beach — Fabric scrap — p1
passages.content:
Huh, looks like someone got a bit of their
swimsuit caught on this rock.

Scrap of fabric acquired!

You're able to tie your collected fabric together
with the floss to make something that'll just
barely cover a person.

Micromicrobikini acquired!
passages.content_zh:
呵呵，看來有人得到了一點
泳衣被這塊岩石卡住了。

已收購布料碎片！

您可以將收集到的布料綁在一起
用牙線來做一些東西
勉強覆蓋一個人。

微微比基尼已獲得！

passages.name: Beach — Trash pile — p1
passages.content:
A bunch of trash has washed up onto this
secluded beach.

You clean up the trash.\!
Looks like there was something underneath.

Raw mana found!
passages.content_zh:
一堆垃圾被沖到了這裡
僻靜的海灘。

你清理垃圾。 \!
看起來下面有東西。

發現原始法力！

passages.name: Beach — Trash pile — p1
passages.content:
A bunch of trash has washed up onto this
secluded beach.

You clean up the trash.\!
This pile was mostly clothing. You're able to
find a few bucks in the pockets.

500 BE bucks found!
passages.content_zh:
一堆垃圾被沖到了這裡
僻靜的海灘。

你清理垃圾。 \!
這堆東西主要是衣服。你能夠
在口袋裡找到幾塊錢。

找到 500 BE 美元！

passages.name: Beach — Trash pile — p1
passages.content:
A bunch of trash has washed up onto this
secluded beach.

You clean up the trash.\!
Just some old chunks of sea-polished glass,
nothing interesting.
passages.content_zh:
一堆垃圾被沖到了這裡
僻靜的海灘。

你清理垃圾。 \!
只是一些經過海拋光的舊玻璃塊，
沒什麼有趣的。

passages.name: Beach — Trash pile — p1
passages.content:
A bunch of trash has washed up onto this
secluded beach.

You clean up the trash.\!
You hoped there would be a message in the
bottle, but no, it's just junk.
passages.content_zh:
一堆垃圾被沖到了這裡
僻靜的海灘。

你清理垃圾。 \!
您希望郵件中會有一則訊息
瓶子，但不，它只是垃圾。

passages.name: Beach — Trash pile — p1
passages.content:
A bunch of trash has washed up onto this
secluded beach.

You clean up the old bottle.\!
Oh hey, a message inside!

Well, money.\!
You're not sure what sort of message that's
supposed to send but you guess you're okay
with it.

200 BE bucks found!
passages.content_zh:
一堆垃圾被沖到了這裡
僻靜的海灘。

你清理舊瓶子。 \！
喔嘿，裡面有一條訊息！

好吧，錢。 \！
您不確定這是什麼類型的消息
應該發送，但你猜你沒事
與它。

找到 200 BE 美元！

passages.name: Beach — p1
passages.content: Rare candy was found!
passages.content_zh: 發現了稀有糖果！

passages.name: Beach — p1
passages.content: 300\G were found!
passages.content_zh: 發現了300\G！

passages.name: Beach — Anime guy 1
passages.content:
Beachgoer 1:
This is great! We're finally getting to the beach
episode!\!
I can't wait to see all the skimpy swimsuits.

Beachgoer 2:
Come on, this is real life. It's getting weird
how you keep acting like we're in an anime.

His friend gives him a look.

Beachgoer 2:
What?

Beachgoer 1:
Dude, were you paying attention at all on the
walk here?

When we passed Hatsune Miku talking to a
cowgirl?\!
Not the yeehaw kind, the busty horned kind.

Beachgoer 2:
Still-

Beachgoer 1:
Or Todd?\!
Remember Todd?\!
Ran into him yesterday, now he has cat ears?

Beachgoer 1:
And boobs.

Beachgoer 1:
*Huge* boobs.

Beachgoer 2:
...What usually happens in a beach episode?
passages.content_zh:
海灘遊客 1：
這太棒了！我們終於到了海灘
情節！ \！
我迫不及待地想看看那些暴露的泳衣。

海灘遊客 2：
來吧，這就是現實生活。事情變得奇怪了
你怎麼總是表現得像我們在動漫裡一樣。

他的朋友看了他一眼。

海灘遊客 2：
什麼？

海灘遊客 1：
老兄，你有沒有註意過
步行到這裡？

當我們經過初音未來和一個正在說話的人時
女牛仔？ \！
不是野豬那種，而是有角的那種。

海灘遊客 2：
還是——

海灘遊客 1：
還是托德？ \!
還記得托德嗎？ \!
昨天碰到他了，現在長貓耳朵了？

海灘遊客 1：
還有胸部。

海灘遊客 1：
*巨大的*胸部。

海灘遊客 2：
....海灘情節中通常會發生什麼？

passages.name: Beach — Lifeguard — p1
passages.content:
Lifeguard:
A lifeguard's job is never done.

We're in some weird aberrant beach, but
someone's still got to make sure no one
drowns.
passages.content_zh:
救生員：
救生員的工作永遠沒有完成。

我們在一些奇怪的異常海灘上，但是
仍然需要有人確保沒有人
淹死了。

passages.name: Beach — Lifeguard — p2
passages.content:
Lifeguard:
So this happened.

I'd go get a shirt but people are paying so
much more attention to me now.

She turns to the water and cups her hands
around her mouth.

Lifeguard:
Hey you! Watch out for those rocks!
passages.content_zh:
救生員：
所以這件事發生了。

我想去買一件襯衫，但人們付的錢太多了
現在對我更加關注。

她轉向水，雙手捧成杯狀
她的嘴周圍。

救生員：
嘿你！小心那些岩石！

passages.name: Beach — Lifeguard — p3
passages.content:
Lifeguard:
A lifeguard's job is never done.

We're in some weird aberrant beach, but
someone's still got to make sure no one
drowns.

This lifeguard post is just so poorly stocked,
I wish that I at least had a couple floatation
devices.

His shirt suddenly bursts open.

Lifeguard:
Ah?!

She stares down at herself.

Lifeguard:
...\!
Not what I meant but I can work with this.
passages.content_zh:
救生員：
救生員的工作永遠沒有完成。

我們在一些奇怪的異常海灘上，但是
仍然需要有人確保沒有人
淹死了。

這個救生員職位的庫存實在太少了
我希望我至少有幾次漂浮
設備。

他的襯衫突然裂開。

救生員：
啊？ ！

她低頭看著自己。

救生員：
...\！
不是我的意思，但我可以處理這個。

passages.name: Beach — Lifeguard — p4
passages.content:
Lifeguard:
A lifeguard's job is never done.\!
I'd go get a new shirt but I'm sure *someone*
is going to start drowning if I do.
passages.content_zh:
救生員：
救生員的工作永無止境。 \!
我會去買一件新襯衫，但我確信*有人*
如果我這樣做的話就會開始溺水。

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Finally, a beach trip I don't have to travel
for!
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
終於來一次不用旅行的海灘旅行
為了！

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer — p1
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
I love the beach but I hate putting on
sunscreen.

He sighs and starts rubbing it into his arm.

Beachgoer:
Still, I fry like an egg, so I have to.\!
\}Wish it didn't take so long.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
我喜歡海灘，但我討厭穿衣服
防曬霜。

他嘆了口氣，開始把它揉進自己的手臂裡。

海灘愛好者：
儘管如此，我還是像煎蛋一樣煎，所以我必須這麼做。 \！
\}希望不要花那麼久。

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer — p2
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
I love the beach but I hate putting on
sunscreen.

He sighs and starts rubbing it into his arm.

Beachgoer:
Still, I fry like an egg, so I have to.\!
\}Wish it didn't take so long.

Beachgoer:
And my chest is\.- mmm\. weirdly sensitive
today, too.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
我喜歡海灘，但我討厭穿衣服
防曬霜。

他嘆了口氣，開始把它揉進自己的手臂裡。

海灘愛好者：
儘管如此，我還是像煎蛋一樣煎，所以我必須這麼做。 \！
\}希望不要花那麼久。

海灘愛好者：
我的胸部是\.-嗯\。異常敏感
今天也一樣。

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer — p3
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
I love the beach but I hate putting on
sunscreen.

He sighs and starts rubbing it into his arm.

Beachgoer:
Still, I fry like an egg, so I have to.\!
\}Wish it didn't take so long.

Beachgoer:
And my chest is weirdly sensitive today, too.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
我喜歡海灘，但我討厭穿衣服
防曬霜。

他嘆了口氣，開始把它揉進自己的手臂裡。

海灘愛好者：
儘管如此，我還是像煎蛋一樣煎，所以我必須這麼做。 \！
\}希望不要花那麼久。

海灘愛好者：
今天我的胸部也異常敏感。

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer — p4
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
I love the beach but I hate putting on
sunscreen.\!
It feels nasty and it takes forever.

And something is just weird today.

I've been putting more and more on my
chest but there's always more skin to cover!

Is this a nightmare?!
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
我喜歡海灘，但我討厭穿衣服
防曬霜。 \!
這感覺很糟糕，而且需要永遠。

今天有些事情很奇怪。

我已經在我的身上投入了越來越多的東西
胸部，但總是有更多的皮膚需要覆蓋！

這是一場惡夢嗎？ ！

passages.name: Beach — Bikini top
passages.content:
Looks like someone has decided to get rid of
her tanlines.
passages.content_zh:
看來有人已經決定要擺脫
她的曬黑皮膚。

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer — p1
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Okay, yes, a mysteriously appearing beach
could be the start of a horror movie.

But it's too nice to leave!

...Suddenly I understand why there are so
many victims in those movies.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
好吧，是的，一個神秘出現的海灘
可能是恐怖電影的開始。

但離開也太好了！

……突然間我明白為什麼會有這麼多
那些電影裡有很多受害者。

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer — p2
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Okay, yes, a mysteriously appearing beach
could be the start of a horror movie.

But it's too nice to leave!

At least I wore a modest swimsuit, it's always
the hot girl who dies in those movies.

Beachgoer:
...what?\!
What's that look for?
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
好吧，是的，一個神秘出現的海灘
可能是恐怖電影的開始。

但離開也太好了！

至少我穿著樸素的泳衣，總是這樣
那些電影中死去的辣妹。

海灘愛好者：
……什麼？ \！
那是在尋找什麼？

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer
passages.content: She's napping on her towel.
passages.content_zh: 她正在毛巾上打盹。

passages.name: Beach — Sandcastle people
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Look at this place, it's perfect!\!
We're going to build the biggest sandcastle ever!
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
看看這個地方，太完美了！ \!
我們要建造有史以來最大的沙堡！

passages.name: Beach — Sandcastle people
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Hmm, the test blocks seem to be holding
together well.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
嗯，測試塊似乎保持住了
在一起很好。

passages.name: Beach — Sandcastle people
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
First step of sandcastle building: diggy hole.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
建造沙堡的第一步：挖洞。

passages.name: Beach — Sandcastle people
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Hmm, should we go for the classic sandcastle
shape? Or would a pyramid hold together
better?
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
嗯，我們該去經典的沙堡嗎
形狀？或是金字塔會連在一起嗎
更好嗎？

passages.name: Beach — Sandcastle people
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
We should probably be trying to plan out this
sandcastle, but right now I'm just enjoying
making blocks.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
我們可能應該嘗試計劃一下
沙堡，但現在我只是享受
製作塊。

passages.name: Beach — Treasure — p1
passages.content:
You see something glimmering at the bottom
of the hole.

Raw mana found!
passages.content_zh:
你看到底部有東西在閃閃發光
洞的。

發現原始法力！

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer
passages.content:
Miku:
This is weird, right?\!
A whole beach appearing out of nowhere,
*inside* the gym?

I know everyone's scale for what's weird has
been thrown off recently, but I'm pretty sure
this is still weird.

Beachgoer Oni:
I dunno, if I can turn into this from lifting
enough I really don't know what's weird
anymore.
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
這很奇怪，對吧？ \!
整個海灘憑空出現，
*在健身房*裡面？

我知道每個人對奇怪事物的認知程度都有
最近被拋棄了，但我很確定
這還是很奇怪。

海灘愛好者奧尼：
我不知道，如果我能從舉重變成這樣
夠了我真的不知道有什麼奇怪的
不再了。

passages.name: Beach — Doggirl
passages.content:
Doggirl:
You have got to try digging in the sand!
This is so satisfying!
passages.content_zh:
狗娘：
你必須嘗試挖沙子！
這真是太滿足了！

passages.name: Beach — Catgirl
passages.content:
Catgirl:
I'll pass, something about digging in sand
just feels... unclean to me.\!
\}Like playing in the toilet.
passages.content_zh:
貓女：
我會過去，關於挖沙的事情
只是覺得……對我來說不乾淨。 \！
\}就像在廁所裡玩一樣。

passages.name: Beach — Swimmer
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
The water is so nice. I'll take this over the
pool any day.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
水真好。我會接過這個
任何一天都可以游泳池。

passages.name: Beach — Swimmer
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Uh, do you think magic beaches have sharks?
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
呃，你認為神奇的海灘上有鯊魚嗎？

passages.name: Beach — Swimmer
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Careful around the rocks. I saw someone
farther out almost lose her swimsuit when she
got caught on one.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
小心岩石周圍。我看到有人
更遠的地方，當她差點失去泳衣時
被一個抓住了。

passages.name: Beach — Curious person — p1
passages.content:
Curious Beachgoer:
We're trying to figure out what's going on.\!
Is this a real beach somewhere?
We have to be *somewhere*, right?
passages.content_zh:
好奇的海灘遊客：
我們正試圖弄清楚發生了什麼事。 \!
這是某個地方真正的海灘嗎？
我們必須在*某個地方*，對吧？

passages.name: Beach — Curious person — p2
passages.content:
Curious Beachgoer:
We're trying to figure out what's going on.\!
Is this a real beach somewhere?
We have to be *somewhere*, right?

Curious Beachgoer:
Also where did this bikini come from?

Curious Beachgoer:
Also where did these boobs come from?

Curious Beachgoer:
Also where did these boobs come from?
passages.content_zh:
好奇的海灘遊客：
我們正試圖弄清楚發生了什麼事。 \!
這是某個地方真正的海灘嗎？
我們必須在*某個地方*，對吧？

好奇的海灘遊客：
還有這隻比基尼是哪來的？

好奇的海灘遊客：
還有這些胸部是從哪裡來的？

好奇的海灘遊客：
還有這些胸部是從哪裡來的？

passages.name: Beach
passages.content:
Curious Beachgoer:
The sun looks like it's in the same place as
outside.\!
Same time zone?
passages.content_zh:
好奇的海灘遊客：
太陽看起來和太陽在同一個地方
外面。 \!
同一時區？

passages.name: Beach — Curious beachgoer
passages.content:
Curious Beachgoer:
I'm sure there's some way to identify where
sand comes from, but it just looks like sand
to me.

She gathers some into a bag.

Maybe I can find someone to ask.
passages.content_zh:
好奇的海灘遊客：
我確信有某種方法可以識別位置
沙子是從哪裡來的，但它只是看起來像沙子
對我來說。

她把一些收集起來裝進袋子裡。

也許我可以找人問問。

passages.name: Beach — Curious beachgoer
passages.content:
Curious Beachgoer:
Our city is nowhere near the ocean, where did
this all come from?

Somehow I doubt it was littering.
passages.content_zh:
好奇的海灘遊客：
我們的城市離海不遠，哪來的
這一切從何而來？

不知怎的，我懷疑這是亂丟垃圾。

passages.name: Beach — Curious person
passages.content:
Curious Beachgoer:
The weirdest thing here is that the
temperature *isn't* the same as outside.\!
It's not hotter, either.

It's the same temperature as inside the gym.

Are we still inside somehow?
passages.content_zh:
好奇的海灘遊客：
這裡最奇怪的事情是
溫度*與室外*不*相同。 \！
也沒有更熱。

和健身房的溫度一樣。

我們還在裡面嗎？

passages.name: Beach — Cowgirl
passages.content:
Cowgirl:
I don't know what's been giving me stiff
shoulders recently, but I feel so much better
in the water!
passages.content_zh:
女牛仔：
我不知道是什麼讓我感到僵硬
最近肩膀有點痛，但我感覺好多了
在水裡！

passages.name: Beach — Referee — p1
passages.content:
Referee:
Hey, we've been looking for one more person
for volleyball. You interested?

Referee:
Excellent! Let's get started!

Referee:
Come back if you change your mind!
passages.content_zh:
裁判員：
嘿，我們一直在尋找另一個人
對於排球。你有興趣嗎？

裁判員：
太棒了！讓我們開始吧！

裁判員：
如果你改變主意就回來吧！

passages.name: Beach — Referee — p3
passages.content:
Referee:
I think that was the most unorthodox
volleyball strategy I've ever seen, but it did
win you the game.

Congrats!

You've got a weirdly sexy talent for volleyball.

Referee:
Tough luck on the court, but that's how
volleyball goes sometimes.\!
The beach is a harsh mistress.
passages.content_zh:
裁判員：
我認為這是最非正統的
我見過的排球策略，但確實如此
為你贏得比賽。

恭喜！

你在排球方面有著異常性感的天賦。

裁判員：
在球場上運氣不好，但就是這樣
排球有時會進行。 \！
海灘是一位嚴厲的女主人。

passages.name: Beach — Spectator — p1
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
This is the best place to watch the games.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
這裡是觀看比賽的最佳地點。

passages.name: Beach — Spectator — p2
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
That was an amazing game!

My favorite part was when your breasts got
bigger.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
那真是一場精彩的比賽！

我最喜歡的部分是當你的乳房變得
更大。

passages.name: Beach — Bikini top — p1
passages.content:
The sunbather has set her bikini top off to the
side.\!
She doesn't seem to be watching it.

Take bikini top?

Bikini top acquired!

Now you have a full bikini!

You leave her alone.
passages.content_zh:
日光浴者把她的比基尼上衣脫到了
邊.\!
她好像沒在看。

穿比基尼上衣？

比基尼上衣入手了！

現在您擁有了全套比基尼！

你別管她了。

passages.name: Beach — Embarrassed swimmer — p1
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
What a lovely day this is in the ocean!\!
I'm just enjoying staying here.

Yes, just standing deep in the ocean and
never leaving.\!
For absolutely no reason!

She laughs nervously.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
這是在海洋中多麼美好的一天！ \！
我只是很享受住在這裡。

是的，只是站在海洋深處
永不離開。 \!
絕對沒有任何理由！

她緊張地笑起來。

passages.name: Beach — Bikini bottom — p1
passages.content:
Huh, there's a bikini bottom floating in the
water here. Wonder where that could have
come from.

Bikini bottom acquired!

Now you have a full bikini!
passages.content_zh:
呃，有一個比基尼泳褲漂浮在水中
水在這裡。想知道哪裡可以有
來自。

比基尼下裝已獲得！

現在您擁有了全套比基尼！

passages.name: Beach — Bartendertender — p1
passages.content:
A woman is pacing back and forth nervously.

Woman:
Where are they, where are they...\!
Come on, time is money!

She notices you.

Woman:
Please tell me you're the temporary bartender.

Woman:
Great!

She immediately starts pulling you towards
the bar.

Woman:
Hurry up, time is money!
We need to get this place opened as fast as
possible.

Everyone loves booze on the beach, but we
have no idea how long this place is going to
stick around.

So we've got to start serving NOW.\!
Hurry up, to the bar!

Woman:
They'd better show up soon.
passages.content_zh:
一個女人緊張地來回踱步。

女：
他們在哪裡，他們在哪裡......\！
來吧，時間就是金錢！

她注意到你了。

女：
請告訴我你是臨時調酒師。

女：
太棒了！

她立刻開始拉你走向
酒吧。

女：
快點吧，時間就是金錢！
我們需要盡快開放這個地方
可能的。

每個人都喜歡在海灘上喝酒，但我們
不知道這個地方會持續多久
留下來。

所以我們現在就開始服務。 \！
快點，去酒吧吧！

女：
他們最好盡快出現。

passages.name: Beach — Bartendertender — p2
passages.content:
She's taking notes.

Bartendertender:
Traffic was pretty good...\!
We may need to stock up on more drink
supplies for tomorrow...
passages.content_zh:
她正在做筆記。

調酒師：
交通還不錯...\！
我們可能需要儲備更多飲料
明天的物資...

passages.name: Beach
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Digging means finding a lot of buried junk.\!
Feel free to look through it.
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
挖掘意味著發現大量被埋藏的垃圾。 \！
請隨意瀏覽一下。

passages.name: Beach — Junk — p1
passages.content:
You sift through the pile of sandy junk.\!
Most of it is worthless, but there's one piece
of cloth that still looks useable.

Scrap of fabric found!

You're able to tie your collected fabric together
with the floss to make something that'll just
barely cover a person.

Micromicrobikini acquired!
passages.content_zh:
你在一堆沙質垃圾中篩選。 \！
大部分都毫無價值，但也有一塊
看起來仍然可以使用的布料。

發現布料碎片！

您可以將收集到的布料綁在一起
用牙線來做一些東西
勉強覆蓋一個人。

微微比基尼已獲得！

passages.name: Beach — Junk — p2
passages.content: The pile just has useless junk.
passages.content_zh: 這堆東西只是無用的垃圾。

passages.name: Beach — Oni — p1
passages.content:
Oni:
Are you ready for some *SPORT*?!?!
passages.content_zh:
鬼：
你準備好參加*運動*了嗎？ ！ ？ ！

passages.name: Beach — Oni — p2
passages.content:
Oni:
Awesome moves dude!\!
Now *that* was a beach body!

Oni:
Better luck next time dude!
passages.content_zh:
鬼：
帥哥的動作真棒！ \!
現在*那*是一個海灘身體！

鬼：
下次祝你好運，夥計！

passages.name: Beach — Beachgoer
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Having a picnic table here is just asking to get
hit by a volleyball.

Who even designed this magically appearing
mysterious beach?!
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
在這裡擁有一張野餐桌只是要求得到
被排球擊中。

誰甚至設計了這個神奇的外觀
神秘海灘？ ！

passages.name: Beach
passages.content: A... campfire?

passages.name: Beach — Debug Tree
passages.content: Get your volley on.
passages.content_zh: 開始你的截擊吧。

passages.name: Beach — p1
passages.content:
She's reading a book.\!
It looks like a romance novel.
passages.content_zh:
她正在讀書。 \!
看起來像言情小說。

passages.name: Beach — p2
passages.content:
She's reading a book.\!
It's mostly complaints about stupid default
choices.
passages.content_zh:
她正在讀書。 \!
主要是對愚蠢的預設行為的抱怨
選擇。

passages.name: Beach — p3
passages.content:
She's reading.\!
It's a book about recycling old clothes.\!
But in a sexy way.
passages.content_zh:
她正在讀書。 \!
這是一本關於回收舊衣服的書。 \！
但以一種性感的方式。

passages.name: Beach — p4
passages.content:
She's reading.

It's a history book about famous coverups.
passages.content_zh:
她正在讀書。

這是一本關於著名掩蓋事件的歷史書。

passages.name: Beach — p5
passages.content:
She's reading.\!
It's a book of back strengthening exercises.
passages.content_zh:
她正在讀書。 \!
這是一本背部強化練習的書。

passages.name: Beach — Tanner — p1
passages.content:
The man keeps sneaking glances at the women
around him.

Man:
\}Ooo, nice chest on that one...

He hurriedly looks away as one of the women
glares at him.

Man:
Haha, totally working on my tan!
passages.content_zh:
男人總是偷偷看女人
他周圍。

男士：
\}哦，那個胸部真漂亮...

他連忙移開視線，發現自己是其中一名女子。
怒視著他。

男士：
哈哈，我正在努力曬黑！

passages.name: Beach — Tanner — p2
passages.content:
The man who was previously perving on the
surrounding women is staring down at
themselves.

Beachgoer:
Oh.\!
Uh, maybe I'll stare at these instead.\!
\}Less glares that way.
passages.content_zh:
那個先前痴迷於
周圍的女人都低頭看著
他們自己。

海灘愛好者：
哦。 \!
呃，也許我會盯著這些看。 \！
\}這樣就可以減少眩光。

passages.name: Beach — Beach Miku — p1
passages.content:
Miku:
I call dibs on being Beach Miku!

Beach Miku:
I call dibs on being Beach Miku!

A lot of us are looking for ways to stand out
and this is going to be mine.

She closes her eyes and concentrates.

Her eyes suddenly fly open.

Miku:
I hear it!\!
It's so beautiful!
passages.content_zh:
米庫：
我有權利成為海灘初音！

海灘初音：
我有權利成為海灘初音！

我們很多人都在尋找脫穎而出的方法
這將是我的。

她閉上眼睛，集中註意力。

她的眼睛突然睜開。

米庫：
我聽到了！ \!
真是太美了！

passages.name: Beach — Beach Miku — p2
passages.content:
Beach Miku:
This is great! I've got my own Miku style now!
passages.content_zh:
海灘初音：
這太棒了！我現在有了自己的 Miku 風格！

passages.name: Beach — Bubbles — p1
passages.content:
The water bubbles faintly.

You plunge underwater.
passages.content_zh:
水輕輕地冒著氣泡。

你潛入水下。

passages.name: Beach — Bubbles — p2
passages.content: The water bubbles faintly.
passages.content_zh: 水輕輕地冒著氣泡。

passages.name: Beach
passages.content:
Curious Beachgoer:
There is life in the water!\!
It's just a really weird mix.

Like half of it would be invasive around us?
passages.content_zh:
好奇的海灘遊客：
水裡有生命！ \!
這真是一個非常奇怪的組合。

好像有一半會侵入我們周圍？

passages.name: Beach — Bends diver
passages.content:
Surprised Diver:
I surfaced a little fast but how did this
happen?!\!
\}I used to be an A-cup...
passages.content_zh:
驚訝的潛水員：
我浮現得有點快，但是這是怎麼做到的
發生？ ！ \！
\}我曾經是A罩杯...

passages.name: Beach — Merchant
passages.content:
Beachgoer:
Can I interest you in some refreshments?
passages.content_zh:
海灘愛好者：
我可以給你一些茶點嗎？

passages.name: Beach — Merchant
passages.content:
Volunteer:
Want to commemorate your visit to the
Mystery Beach with some souveniers?
All money goes to the community center!
passages.content_zh:
志工：
想要紀念您的訪問
神秘海灘有一些紀念品嗎？
所有的錢都捐給社區中心！

passages.name: Beach bar — Drink
passages.content:
SEX ON THE BEACH
   "A classic. For those who want to know
            exactly what they're getting."
         Keywords: Spicy, warming, literal

Serve Sex On The Beach?

// 1 = Sex on the Beach, 2 = Beachball, 3 = Wild Side

You pour a Sex on the Beach.
passages.content_zh:
海灘上的性愛
   「經典。對於那些想知道的人
            這正是他們所得到的。 」
         關鍵字：辣、溫、字面意思

在海灘上提供性服務？

// 1 = 海灘性愛，2 = 沙灘球，3 = 狂野一面

你在海灘上做愛。

passages.name: Beach bar — Pink Beachball
passages.content:
PINK BEACHBALL
 "Bubbly and sweet, for those who want to feel
                         the same."
         Keywords: Bubbly, bouncy, happy

Serve a Pink Beachball?

// 1 = Sex on the Beach, 2 = Beachball, 3 = Wild Side

You pour a Pink Beachball.
passages.content_zh:
粉紅色沙灘球
 「對於那些想要感受的人來說，充滿氣泡和甜蜜
                         一樣的。 」
         關鍵字：活潑、活潑、快樂

供應粉紅色沙灘球？

// 1 = 海灘性愛，2 = 沙灘球，3 = 狂野一面

你倒了一個粉紅沙灘球。

passages.name: Beach bar — Drink
passages.content:
WILD SIDE
      "What monster lurks within your skin?"

         Keywords: Strong, bitter, mature

Serve a Wild Side?

// 1 = Sex on the Beach, 2 = Beachball, 3 = Wild Side

You take a Wild Side.
passages.content_zh:
狂野的一面
      “你的皮膚裡潛伏著什麼怪物？”

         關鍵字：堅強、苦澀、成熟

服務狂野一方？

// 1 = 海灘性愛，2 = 沙灘球，3 = 狂野一面

你採取狂野的一面。

passages.name: Beach bar — Spirits — p1
passages.content:
The box is labeled "Spirits", but there doesn't
seem to be anything inside.
passages.content_zh:
盒子上寫著“烈酒”，但沒有
裡面好像有東西。

passages.name: Beach bar — Spirits — p2
passages.content:
The box is labeled "Spirits".

Gluttony Spirit:
I'm just here to watch!
passages.content_zh:
盒子上貼著「烈酒」的標籤。

暴食精神：
我只是來圍觀的！

passages.name: Beach bar — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
Bartendertender:
Good, good, the customers should be lining
up soon.

We've got three sample drinks prepared here.
Just serve whatever seems best, they're all
the same price. What matters is sales!

...Though I guess you'll get better tips if you
serve them something they actually like.

She rolls her eyes.

Ugh, customers, so opinionated.

I'm going to go try to drum up some
business. Good luck!

She leaves.

A few moments later your first customer
walks up to the bar.\!
Right, let's get started.

Time to mix drinks and change bodies.\!
Err, lives.
passages.content_zh:
調酒師：
好好好，顧客應該都在排隊
很快就起來了。

我們這裡準備了三種飲料樣品。
只提供看起來最好的東西，它們都是
相同的價格。重要的是銷量！

……雖然我猜你會得到更好的提示，如果你
為他們提供他們真正喜歡的東西。

她翻白眼。

呃，顧客們，太固執己見了。

我要去嘗試鼓點一些
業務。祝你好運！

她離開了。

幾分鐘後，您的第一位顧客
走到酒吧。 \!
好的，讓我們開始吧。

是時候混合飲料和改變身體了。 \！
呃，活著。

passages.name: Beach bar — Customer — p1
passages.content:
Weirdly, your first customer is wearing a suit.\!
Not a swimsuit, a full formal suit and tie.

He regards you with a sneer.

Customer:
Living down to all the stereotypes of a beach
bar I see.

He looks back to you.

Customer:
Gerome Devillers. Food and drink critic.\!
I'm here to sample your piddly little beach
hut.

He leans forward.

Now, I can tell you're a bartender like I'm a
mime, so I'll tell you how this is going to go.
Don't worry, I'll use simple words.

You are going to get me a drink. It's going to
be something strong. Something dark. Not
one of your piddly little beach cocktails,
stuffed with too much sugar to taste anything.

In return I'll try to conceal my disappointment
when you utterly fail to make something
remotely palateable. But who knows, for once
someone might manage to surprise me.

So go on, hurry up. Show me that you can
serve something more than just sickly sweet
tourist slop.
passages.content_zh:
奇怪的是，你的第一個顧客穿著西裝。 \！
不是泳衣，而是全套正式西裝和領帶。

他用冷笑的眼神看著你。

客戶：
遵循海灘的所有刻板印象
酒吧我明白了。

他回頭看著你。

客戶：
傑羅姆·德維爾斯.食品和飲料評論家。 \!
我來這裡是為了品嚐你那小小的海灘
小屋。

他身體前傾。

現在，我可以告訴你，你是一名調酒師，就像我是一名調酒師一樣
啞劇，所以我會告訴你這將如何進行。
別擔心，我會用簡單的話。

你要請我喝一杯。它將
成為堅強的東西。有什麼黑暗的東西。不
你的一杯小海灘雞尾酒，
塞滿了太多的糖，什麼味道都沒有。

作為回報，我會盡力掩飾我的失望
