泳褲獲得！

passages.name: Hidden tent — Magic circle
passages.content:
\n[2]:
I *know* there are less creepy ways to make
magic lights.
passages.content_zh:
\n[2]:
我*知道*有一些不那麼令人毛骨悚然的方法可以製作
魔法燈。

passages.name: Hidden tent — Notes
passages.content:
Someone has been scribbling notes.

...and those fools said there were no
shortcuts. The power is just *there*, waiting
to be claimed. The only question is how to
get to the core...
passages.content_zh:
有人在寫筆記。

……那些傻瓜說沒有
快捷方式。電源就在“那裡”，等待著
被認領。唯一的問題是如何
到達核心...

passages.name: Tile puzzle after
passages.content:
Man:
So majestic...
passages.content_zh:
男士：
如此雄偉...

passages.name: Tile puzzle after
passages.content:
Man:
Huh, I don't remember this being here before.

Oddly compelling though.
passages.content_zh:
男士：
呃，我不記得以前有過這個。

但奇怪的是引人注目。

passages.name: Tile puzzle after
passages.content:
Woman:
Look at these muscles!

She rubs her cheek against the floor.

Oh! I wish they were real!
passages.content_zh:
女：
看看這些肌肉！

她用臉頰摩擦地板。

哦！我希望它們是真的！

passages.name: Tile puzzle after
passages.content:
Man:
These glutes!\!
I've never seen such perfection...
passages.content_zh:
男士：
這些臀肌！ \！
我從未見過如此完美的...

passages.name: Tile puzzle after
passages.content:
Exercising Man:
I've got to do more reps!\!
Maybe it'll let me get closer to that perfection!
passages.content_zh:
運動的男人：
我必須做更多次數！ \！
也許它會讓我更接近完美！

passages.name: Tile puzzle after
passages.content:
Gym Miku:
Such elegance! Such grace!
passages.content_zh:
健身房初音：
如此優雅！如此恩典！

passages.name: Tile puzzle after — Hana
passages.content:
Guardian Hana:
Hey dude, this really caught my best side,
don't you think?
passages.content_zh:
守護者哈娜：
嘿夥計，這確實抓住了我最好的一面，
你不覺得嗎？

passages.name: Arcade
passages.content:
Someone's scribbled an L over the G so it
reads "LAME CENTER".
passages.content_zh:
有人在 G 上潦草地寫了一個 L，所以它
寫著「蹩腳的中心」。

passages.name: Arcade
passages.content:
ALERT: These games are stupid and you
should go outside and play cool ARG games.
passages.content_zh:
警告：這些遊戲很愚蠢，你
應該出去玩一些很酷的 ARG 遊戲。

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
New! Exciting! Fun! Come play-

The screen fizzes out into static for a moment,
then returns.

WHY ARE YOU LOOKING AT OTHER GAMES.

Kaede:
Free of evil.
passages.content_zh:
新的！令人興奮！樂趣！來玩吧——

螢幕暫時靜止，
然後返回。

您為什麼要看其他遊戲。

楓：
遠離邪惡。

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
New! Exciting! Fun! Come play-

The screen fizzes out into static for a moment,
then returns.

THIS IS A STUPID BORING GAME AND YOU
SHOULDN'T PLAY IT.

Kaede:
Free of evil.
passages.content_zh:
新的！令人興奮！樂趣！來玩吧——

螢幕暫時靜止，
然後返回。

這是一個愚蠢無聊的遊戲，而你
不應該玩它。

楓：
遠離邪惡。

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
The screen just shows a picture of Arcadia
scowling at you.

Her eyes follow you around the room.

Kaede:
Though her glare be malicious indeed no other
darkness remains.
passages.content_zh:
螢幕上只顯示阿卡迪亞的圖片
皺著眉頭看著你。

她的目光跟著你在房間裡轉一圈。

楓：
雖然她的目光確實是惡意的
黑暗依然存在。

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
The screen just shows a picture of Arcadia
scowling at you.

Her eyes follow you around the room.

Kaede:
Yon cabinet remains virgin and undefiled.
passages.content_zh:
螢幕上只顯示阿卡迪亞的圖片
皺著眉頭看著你。

她的目光跟著你在房間裡轉一圈。

楓：
永內閣保持著處女地和未受玷污的狀態。

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
The awesome action packed-

The screen fizzes out into static for a moment,
then returns.

GAME THAT WON'T MAKE YOU HAPPY.

Kaede:
Perhaps, but it shalt not make her happy
either.\!
No evil.
passages.content_zh:
精彩的動作場面——

螢幕暫時靜止，
然後返回。

不會讓你開心的遊戲。

楓：
也許吧，但這不會讓她高興
要么。 \!
無惡。

passages.name: Arcade
passages.content:
ALERT: DUMB PEOPLE ARE PLAYING STUPID
GAMES INSTEAD OF THE ONE *GOOD* GAME
THEY KNOW ABOUT.
passages.content_zh:
警告：愚蠢的人在裝傻
遊戲而不是一款「好」遊戲
他們知道。

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
High speed twitch gameplay-

The screen fizzes out into static for a moment,
then returns.

DUMB BLOCKS FALLING AND NOT EVEN IN
A SEXY WAY.

Kaede:
Not a trace of evil 'pon this contraption.
passages.content_zh:
高速抽搐遊戲-

螢幕暫時靜止，
然後返回。

啞塊掉下來，甚至沒有進去
性感的方式。

楓：
這個裝置上沒有一絲邪惡的痕跡。

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
High speed twitch gameplay-

The screen fizzes out into static for a moment,
then returns.

ZERO PERCENT BOOBS.\!
STUPID STUPID STUPID.

Kaede:
'Tis as lacking in darkness as it be in ladyflesh.
passages.content_zh:
高速抽搐遊戲-

螢幕暫時靜止，
然後返回。

胸部比例為零。 \！
愚蠢的愚蠢的愚蠢的。

楓：
就像淑女身上缺乏黑暗一樣。

passages.name: Arcade — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
Nothing looks off when you enter the arcade.

This...\!
This just looks like a normal game of Tetris.

A little old, but still in good condition and
running fine.

You hit the start button.

Game Cabinet:
Welcome to-

An image suddenly appears on the screen.

Goddess Arcadia:
\{\{\{YOU.

How dare you.

I'm doing everything I can to make you and
every other human happy, slaving away to
make sure the world is just perfect, and you're
PLAYING OTHER GAMES?!?!

She sniffs, lip quivering.

Goddess Arcadia:
I'm trying so hard! And you're not even
paying attention???

She pulls herself back up, glaring.

Goddess Arcadia:
Well it won't work!

Part of making you happy is keeping you from
being distracted by dumb unsexy boring
games that can't even talk.\!
There's nothing for you here!

Hmph!

That's fine.\!
This is fine.

You really aren't craving tetris so much that
you'd anger a dark goddess for it.

So how about everyone just turn around and
leave and it'll all be good-

Kaede:
Aha! It seems yon dark goddess thinks she
might make a japery of us!\!
Pull the wool uponst our eyes!

\n[4]:
What are you *talking about*, furbrain?!

Kaede:
Canst thou not see?
Her cunning and vile plan?

Kaede:
Oh Hero \n[10], not even thou hast
managed to divine it?

'Tis truly a blessing of the Goddesses
themselves that I art here to avert disaster!

Kaede:
Hero, think! What ist the root of all our woes?\!
A video game!

The dark goddess sprang from such a shell,
ripe with malice and scheming!

She gestures widely to the building around
you.

Kaede:
And nowst we come to a place full of the
vile things.

If a single game, unguided, canst hatch a new
dark goddess, what might a brace of them do
when she ist left free to work her evil ways
upon them?

Already each of these hutches mightest hold
a dozen eggs of dark potential, fertilized by
her evil scheming!

Arcadia sputters.

Goddess Arcadia:
You're implying I did *WHAT*?!\!
With these inferior-

Kaede:
Thou putest up a fine facade indeed
passages.content_zh:
當你進入遊樂場時，一切看起來都沒有什麼不同。

這...\！
這看起來就像一個普通的俄羅斯方塊遊戲。

有點舊，但狀態還不錯
運作良好。

你按下了開始按鈕。

遊戲櫃：
歡迎來到-

螢幕上突然出現了一幅影像。

阿卡迪亞女神：
\{\{\{你。

你怎麼敢。

我正在盡一切努力讓你和
每個其他人都快樂，努力工作
確保世界是完美的，而你
玩其他遊戲？ ！ ？ ！

她吸了吸鼻子，嘴唇顫抖著。

阿卡迪亞女神：
我好努力啊！而你甚至不是
關注？ ？ ？

她把自己拉了回來，怒目而視。

阿卡迪亞女神：
好吧，這行不通！

讓你快樂的一部分就是讓你遠離
被愚蠢的、不性感的、無聊的事情分散注意力
甚至不能說話的遊戲。 \!
這裡沒有什麼適合你的！

哼！

沒關係。 \！
這很好。

你真的沒有那麼渴望俄羅斯方塊
你會因此而激怒黑暗女神。

那麼大家轉過身去怎麼樣呢？
離開，一切都會好的-

楓：
啊哈！看來黑暗女神認為她
可能會讓我們笑話！ \！
欺騙我們的眼睛！

\n[4]:
你*在說什麼*，毛腦？ ！

楓：
你看不見嗎？
她的狡猾而卑鄙的計劃？

楓：
哦英雄\n[10]，連你也沒有
成功占卜了嗎？

這確實是女神們的祝福
自己說我來這裡是為了避免災難！

楓：
英雄，想想吧！我們所有苦難的根源是什麼？ \！
一個視頻遊戲！

黑暗女神從這樣的貝殼中誕生，
充滿惡意和陰謀！

她用手指著周圍的建築物
你。

楓：
現在我們來到了一個充滿了
卑鄙的事情。

如果一個遊戲，在沒有指導的情況下，能夠孵化出一個新的
黑暗女神，她們兩個能做什麼
當她可以自由地從事她的邪惡活動時
在他們身上？

這些小屋中的每一個都可能容納
十幾個具有暗潛力的卵子，受精於
她的陰謀詭計！

阿卡迪亞氣急敗壞。

阿卡迪亞女神：
你是在暗示我做了*什麼*？ ！ \！
有了這些劣等——

楓：
你確實裝出了漂亮的外表

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
The screen just shows a picture of Arcadia
scowling at you.

Her eyes follow you around the room.

Kaede:
The dark goddess hast truly hidden her
schemes well, I sense naught present.
passages.content_zh:
螢幕上只顯示阿卡迪亞的圖片
皺著眉頭看著你。

她的目光跟著你在房間裡轉一圈。

楓：
黑暗女神真的把她隱藏起來了

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
Fight! Fight! Fighting-

The screen fizzes out into static for a moment,
then returns.

OKAY THIS ONE HAS SOME BOOBS BUT IT'S
STILL NOT NEARLY ENOUGH.

Kaede:
Dost this hint that she hast hidden her
darkness within a more boobful container?\!
'Tis not here.
passages.content_zh:
鬥爭！鬥爭！戰鬥-

螢幕暫時靜止，
然後返回。

好吧，這個有一些胸部，但它是

楓：
這是否暗示她已經隱藏了她

不在這裡。

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
Are you ready to race-

The screen fizzes out into static for a moment,
then returns.

CARS AREN'T SEXY EITHER.\!
OKAY SOME PEOPLE SEEM TO HAVE A WEIRD
THING ABOUT THEM BUT IT'S STILL NOT AS
GOOD AS SEX.

Kaede:
'Tis apparent yon goddess dost not desire
such conveyances either.\!
No darkness here.
passages.content_zh:
你準備好參加比賽了嗎——

螢幕暫時靜止，
然後返回。

汽車也不性感。 \！
好吧，有些人似乎有一個奇怪的
關於他們的事情，但它仍然不是那樣
和性一樣好。

楓：
顯然女神並不希望
也有這樣的交通工具。 \！
這裡沒有黑暗。

passages.name: Arcade — Prize machine
passages.content:
It's a prize machine!\!
Thank goodness it takes BE Bucks, you were
worried you'd have to play a ton of minigames
to get anything.
passages.content_zh:
這是一台獎品機！ \！
謝天謝地，這需要雄鹿隊，你是
擔心你必須玩很多小遊戲
得到任何東西。

passages.name: Arcade — Game cabinet
passages.content:
The screen just shows a picture of Arcadia
scowling at you.

Her eyes follow you around the room.

Kaede:
Nothing here.\!
We art so close to the end, where else might
the goddess have hidden her schemes?
passages.content_zh:
螢幕上只顯示阿卡迪亞的圖片
皺著眉頭看著你。

她的目光跟著你在房間裡轉一圈。

楓：
這裡什麼都沒有。 \!
我們的藝術如此接近終點，還有什麼地方可以
女神隱藏了她的陰謀嗎？

passages.name: Arcade — UFO Catcher
passages.content:
Oh hey, a UFO catcher!\!
Give it a try?

You catch a whole bunch of aliens!

These things are never worth it.
passages.content_zh:
哦嘿，UFO 捕手！ \！
嘗試一下嗎？

你抓住了一大群外星人！

這些事情永遠不值得。

passages.name: Arcade — Arcadia confrontation
passages.content:
Goddess Arcadia:
Hmph!

Goddess Arcadia:
All this and you still came here?\!
How could you be so inconsiderate!!

Kaede:
As if we would let such a varlet as thyself go
unopposed!

Thou darkest plans for yonder encampment

We shalt never let thee grow a crop of fellow
darkling spirits to futher trouble the world!

Goddess Arcadia:
...What?

Kaede:
Act not as thou dost not knoweth all of which
I speak!

Though the seed here may be base, we all
hast seen that thou canst still make it sprout
into diabolic pussiance! Thy japery helps thee
naught!

Goddess Arcadia:
No, seriously, what?

\n[4] sighs.

\n[4]:
Fuzzbrain here thinks you're having sex with
these machines or something to make a bunch
of tiny dark goddesses.

Goddess Arcadia:
You-\!
I-

Doing what?!\!
With- with these inferior-

She goes red.

Goddess Arcadia:
\{I'm not tagged for breeding
fetish!!!!

\n[4] shrugs.

\n[4]:
Yeah, that's the sort of foolish "insight" you'll
get from fuzzbrain.

Kaede:
Cease thy attempt to ply thy wiles!\!
Thine scheme is as clear as the sky before
our eyes!

\n[4]:
We're inside idiot!

Kaede:
And yet I knowest the sky exists, as clearly
as yon darkest of goddess's schemes lie
revealed before me!

Goddess Arcadia:
What is WRONG with you people?!

Hmm, Arcadia is starting to get really worked
up. \!
That's- that's probably not a good thing.

\n[2]:
\{\{EVERYONE SHUT UP!

\n[2]:
No.

\n[2]:
No.

Goddess Arcadia:
Yes?

\n[2] wiggles her hand.

\n[2]:
Maybe.

She pauses.

\n[2]:
Look, you're angry that we might want to try
other games when you're right here, right?

Goddess Arcadia:
And when you haven't even let me prove I'm
the best!

Arcadia huffs.

Goddess Arcadia:
You're lucky all I've done is shut down these
inferior things.

She narrows her eyes at Kaede and \n[4].

Goddess Arcadia:
For now.

\n[2] pats her on the back.

\n[2]:
That makes sense!\!
It's completely valid, really.

She sighs theatrically.

\n[2]:
But I hate to tell you that it's
counterproductive
passages.content_zh:
阿卡迪亞女神：
哼！

阿卡迪亞女神：
經歷了這一切，你還來這裡？ \!
你怎麼可以這麼不體貼！ ！

楓：
就好像我們會放走你這樣的混蛋
無人反對！

你對那邊的營地有最黑暗的計劃
藝術挫敗了！ \！
我們永遠不會讓你種植同胞的農作物

阿卡迪亞女神：
……什麼？

楓：
不要表現出你不知道這一切
我說話！

儘管這裡的種子可能很基礎，但我們都
我發現你還能讓它發芽
陷入惡魔般的惡習！你的賈布可以幫助你
沒有！

阿卡迪亞女神：
不，說真的，什麼？

\n[4]嘆了口氣。

\n[4]:
Fuzzbrain 認為你正在與

阿卡迪亞女神：
你——\!
我-

做什麼？ ！ \！
和——和這些劣等——

她臉紅了。

阿卡迪亞女神：
\{我沒有被標記為繁殖
戀物癖！ ！ ！

\n[4]聳聳肩。

\n[4]:
是的，這就是你會得到的那種愚蠢的“洞察力”

楓：
停止你的詭計吧！ \！
你的計劃就像之前的天空一樣清晰
我們的眼睛！

\n[4]:
我們是個白痴！

楓：
但我知道天空存在，一清二楚
正如女神最黑暗的計劃所謊言的那樣
展現在我面前！

阿卡迪亞女神：
你們怎麼了？ ！

嗯，阿卡迪亞開始真正開始工作了
起來。 \！
那——這可能不是什麼好事。

\n[2]:
\{\{大家都閉嘴！

\n[2]:
不。

\n[2]:
不。

阿卡迪亞女神：
是嗎？

\n[2] 擺動她的手。

\n[2]:
也許吧。

她停了下來。

\n[2]:
聽著，你因為我們想嘗試而生氣

阿卡迪亞女神：
當你甚至沒有讓我證明我是
最好的！

阿卡迪亞哼了一聲。

阿卡迪亞女神：
你很幸運我所做的就是關閉這些
低劣的東西。

她瞇起眼睛看著楓和\n[4]。

阿卡迪亞女神：
現在。

\n[2]拍拍她的背。

\n[2]:
說得有道理！ \!

但我不想告訴你這是
適得其反

passages.name: Arcade
passages.content:
There's nothing left here but static and a
deep sense of disgust.

The machine spits sparks at Kaede as she
tries to inspect it.

Kaede:
'Tis a doughty attempt, but mine senses art
undeterred! 'Tis no dark influence upon this
machine.
passages.content_zh:
這裡只剩下靜態和
深深的厭惡感。

機器向楓吐出火花，因為她

這是一次勇敢的嘗試，但我的感覺是藝術

機。

passages.name: Arcade — Arcadia confrontation 2
passages.content:
There's a crack of thunder as you step out
into the final room of the arcade.

Goddess Arcadia:
Despite everything, you've still come!

I warned you! I told you there was nothing
here for you! And yet-

Kaede steps up behind you while Arcadia is
talking.

Kaede:
Note howst yon goddess held her peace til we
began to approach yonder game?\!
The last we hast not checked?

Methinks we have found the seed of her
dark plan.\!
Holdest her gaze, I shalt sneak like the wind
itself.

She slips away.

Goddess Arcadia:
-and you're here anyway?!\!
Am I going to have to beat it into your head
how much cooler I am?!

Well I've prepared something much sexier
than-

Kaede:
Zounds!

Kaede:
Villain, thy scheme ist foiled.\!
Didst thou thinkest thou wert clever?

Thy schemes wert as transparent as the
finest glass!

She scoffs.

Kaede:
Thou thought we wouldst not notice that there
were but one game thou didst appear to
defend?

That we wouldst not see thy desperation to
ward us 'way from here?\!
This game must be the one thou hast
beseeded!

She turns to the game.

Kaede:
And now we shalt-\!
We shalt-

Kaede:
We...

Kaede:
How?!

How hast thou hidden all signs of thy
fornication?!?!\!
\}(Doing it in the butt?)

I canst not find even a single speck of thy
prurient taint!

The goddess's lip quivers.

Goddess Arcadia:
\{WAAAHHHHH!

And then she bursts out into tears.

Goddess Arcadia:
Why do you all hate me so much?!

Goddess Arcadia:
You keep looking for one of these stupid
games to replace me!

Goddess Arcadia:
And you want to have sex with it!

She keeps crying.

Kaede:
And I dost not-

Kaede:
Hmm...

Kaede:
HMMM!

You all collectively decide to ignore that.

\n[2] sighs.

\n[2]:
Look, it's okay.\!
We don't hate you.\!
None of us are trying to replace you.

\n[4]:
Well if given the chance I would be a fool
*not* to seize power...

She trails off as \n[2] glares at her.

\n[2]:
*None of us* are trying to replace you.

Sometimes people have bad ideas and you
go along with them out o
passages.content_zh:
當你走出去的時候，有一聲雷響
進入遊戲廳的最後一個房間。

阿卡迪亞女神：
儘管發生了一切，你還是來了！

我警告過你！我告訴過你什麼都沒有
在這裡為你服務！然而——

當阿卡迪亞在時，楓走到你身後
說話。

楓：
注意女神如何保持沉默直到我們
開始接近那邊的遊戲了？ \！
最後我們還沒檢查過嗎？

我想我們已經找到她的種子
黑暗計劃。 \!
抓住她的目光，我將像風一樣潛行
本身。

她溜走了。

阿卡迪亞女神：
-你還是在這裡嗎？ ！ \！
我是否必須將它打入你的腦海
我有多酷？

好吧，我準備了一些更性感的東西
比-

楓：
響！

楓：
惡棍，你的陰謀落空了。 \!
你以為你很聰明嗎？

你的計劃和
最好的玻璃！

她嗤之以鼻。

楓：
你以為我們不會注意到那裡
你似乎只是參加了一場比賽
捍衛？

我們不會看到你的絕望
保護我們遠離這裡？ \！
這款遊戲一定是你所擁有的
被播種了！

她轉向遊戲。

楓：
現在我們要—\！
我們應該——

楓：
我們...

楓：
怎麼辦？ ！

你如何隱藏你的所有跡象
淫亂？ ！ ？ ！ \！
\}（在屁股上做？）

我甚至找不到你的一絲一毫
淫蕩的污點！

女神的嘴唇顫抖著。

阿卡迪亞女神：
\{哇啊啊啊啊！

然後她淚流滿面。

阿卡迪亞女神：
為什麼你們都這麼恨我？ ！

阿卡迪亞女神：
你一直在尋找這些愚蠢的人之一
遊戲來代替我！

阿卡迪亞女神：
你想和它發生性關係！

她一直在哭。

楓：
我不-

楓：
嗯...

楓：
嗯！

你們集體決定忽略這一點。

\n[2]嘆了口氣。

\n[2]:
看看，沒事的。 \!
我們不恨你。 \!
我們沒有人試圖取代你。

\n[4]:
好吧，如果有機會我會是個傻瓜
*不是*奪取權力......

\n[2] 瞪著她，她的聲音逐漸減弱。

\n[2]:
*我們*都沒有試圖取代你。

有時人們有壞主意，而你
跟他們一起出去吧o

passages.name: Arcade
passages.content:
The vending machine spits out a free bottle
of soda! Score!
Party healed!
passages.content_zh:
自動販賣機吐出一瓶免費的瓶子
蘇打水！分數！
黨痊癒了！

passages.name: Arcade After — Combat
passages.content:
The game cabinet screams at you.

\{DO YOU WANT TO BE
PUNCHED IN THE FACE?!?!

Pay 200 BE Bucks to be, uh, punched in the
face?

You don't have enough.\!
You guess you'll just have to punch yourself
in the face.

That seems like something you can get for
free, really.
passages.content_zh:
遊戲櫃對你尖叫。

\{你想成為
脸上被打了一拳？ ！ ？ ！

付 200 BE 美元，呃，被打一拳
臉？

你還不夠。 \!
你猜你只好打自己一拳
在臉上。

這似乎是你可以得到的東西
免費，真的。

passages.name: Arcade After — Mario kart player — p1
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
It's so great to get to play arcade Mario Kart
again!

His character on screen suddenly spins out.

Arcade Customer:
\c[27]Oh cool, I didn't know Moomoo Farm had
cow hazards!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
能夠玩街機瑪利歐賽車真是太棒了
又來了！

他在螢幕上的角色突然旋轉。

街機客戶：
\c[27]喔酷，我不知道 Moomoo 農場有
牛的危險！

passages.name: Arcade After — Mario kart player — p2
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
\c[27]Did I unlock something secret?\!
The game keeps mooing at me!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
\c[27]我解開了什麼秘密嗎？ \!
遊戲一直在跟我發出嗚嗚聲！

passages.name: Arcade After — Mario Kart player — p1
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Oh cool, they've got a motorcycle simulator
for Mario Kart!

Game:
3...\|
2...\|
1...\|\^

Go!

Arcade Customer:
\c[27]Wow, this thing is intense!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
哦，太酷了，他們有摩托車模擬器
馬裡奧賽車！

遊戲：
3...\|
2...\|
1...\|\^

走吧！

街機客戶：
\c[27]哇，這件事太激烈了！

passages.name: Arcade After — Mario Kart player — p2
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
\c[27]This feels like riding a real motorcycle!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
\c[27]這感覺就像騎真正的摩托車！

passages.name: Arcade After — Customer
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Huh, was Sonic's motto always "gotta grow
fast?"
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
嗯，索尼克的座右銘總是“必須成長”
快嗎？ 」

passages.name: Arcade After — Sign
passages.content: THE BEST GAME
passages.content_zh: 最好的遊戲

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Hey, I got something from the UFO catcher!

Her friend scoffs.

Other Customer:
Those things are such a ripoff.

Impossible to get anything, and even if you
do it's cheap crap that's going to fall apart
in a week.

His friend looks down at herself.

Arcade Customer:
Uh, I think this one may be different...
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
嘿，我從 UFO 捕手那裡得到了一些東西！

她的朋友嘲笑道。

其他客戶：
那些東西簡直就是騙人的。

不可能得到任何東西，即使你
這是會崩潰的廉價廢話嗎
一周內。

他的朋友低頭看著自己。

街機客戶：
呃，我想這個可能會有所不同...

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
I've never heard of this "Best Earth" game,
but the arcade has like a million of it!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
我從來沒有聽過這個「最佳地球」遊戲
但街機裡大約有一百萬個！

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
This "Best Earth" game seems to be about
convincing the idiot main character that it's
a great game.

A bit meta for my tastes, but it's oddly
compelling.

Goddess Arcadia:
Thanks!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
這個「最好的地球」遊戲似乎是關於
讓白痴主角相信這是
一場很棒的比賽。

有點符合我的口味，但很奇怪
引人注目的。

阿卡迪亞女神：
謝謝！

passages.name: Arcade After — Idiot player — p1
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Man, the main character of this game is such
an idiot.

Who wouldn't be happy with magic and sexy
girls everywhere?\!
So dumb.

// TF goes here.

Goddess Arcadia:
They really are!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
哥們，這遊戲的主角是這樣的
一個白痴。

誰會不喜歡魔法和性感呢
到處都是女孩？ \！
太蠢了。

// TF 放在這裡。

阿卡迪亞女神：
他們確實是！

passages.name: Arcade After — Idiot player — p2
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
...

...The main character of this game is still an
idiot for not enjoying boobs and cute girls
everywhere.

\}I'll just enjoy it more if I can find a shirt
that fits.
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
…

……這個遊戲的主角仍然是
白癡不喜歡胸部和可愛的女孩
無處不在。

\}如果我能找到一件襯衫，我會更喜歡它
很合適。

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
She squints at the title screen.

Arcade Customer:
"Based on a soon-to-be-true story"?
passages.content_zh:
她瞇著眼睛看著標題畫面。

街機客戶：
「基於一個即將成為真實的故事」？

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
What's up with this weird fox character?\!
Who would write a character to be *this*
stupid?

She just tried to seduce a brick!\!
Twice!

\n[4]:
Hah, yes!\!
I'm glad to see someone finally fed up enough
with fuzzbrain to tell it like it is!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
這個奇怪的狐狸角色是怎麼回事？ \!
誰會寫一個字元*這個*
愚蠢？

她只是想勾引一塊磚頭！ \！
兩次！

\n[4]:
哈，是的！ \!
我很高興看到有人終於受夠了
用 fuzzbrain 來告訴它原本的樣子吧！

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Did they make an erogame into a cart racer??\!
...So much jiggling.
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
他們是否將 erogame 製作成了賽車手？ ？ \！
……晃動得厲害。

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Super Ero Boob Racer 5!\!
Now with 273% more bouncing!
passages.content_zh:
超 Ero Boob Racer 5!\!
現在彈跳增加了 273%！

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer 1:
So I found one of the farm animals in the
maze and another in the orchard, but where
are the other two?

Arcade Customer 2:
There's another one in the maze and one
in the entrance screen to the park, I think.
passages.content_zh:
商場客戶 1：
所以我發現了其中一隻農場動物
迷宮和果園裡的另一個，但在哪裡
另外兩個是嗎？

街機客戶 2：
迷宮裡還有另外一個，還有一個
我想是在公園入口處的螢幕上。

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Aww, I just feel bad for this Arcadia character.\!
She needs a hug!

Goddess Arcadia:
I don't need your pity!\!
\}(...thanks.)
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
哇哦，我只是為這個阿卡迪亞角色感到難過。 \！
她需要一個擁抱！

阿卡迪亞女神：
我不需要祢的憐憫！ \！
\}（...謝謝。）

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer (Rank A):
This is such a weird dancing game. Instead
of ranking you from F to S it starts at A and
counts down the alphabet.

No idea where it stops. I'm not very good at
it but Tyrone over there's gotten to rank W
and it just kept going.

It even lets you restart from your last rank
so you don't have to play the whole beginning
again!
passages.content_zh:
街機顧客（A 級）：
這是一個非常奇怪的舞蹈遊戲。相反
從 F 到 S 的排名是從 A 開始的
倒數字母表。

不知道它停在哪裡。我不太擅長
但那邊的蒂龍已經排到W
它就這樣繼續下去。

它甚至可以讓你從上一個等級重新開始
所以你不必玩整個開頭
又來了！

passages.name: Arcade After — Dancer
passages.content:
Dancer:
It keeps getting harder as you go up rank,
but I'm not sure how!

Game:
Rank up!\.
E rank acheived!\.
Keep bouncing!

She bites back a moan as a ripple passes
though her form, leaving her just a bit
curvier.
passages.content_zh:
舞者：
隨著等級的提升，難度會越來越大
但我不知道該怎麼辦！

遊戲：
排名上升！ \.
獲得E級！ \.
繼續彈跳！

當漣漪襲來時，她強忍著一聲呻吟
儘管她的形式，只剩下一點
曲線優美。

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Wait, the last missing pet is in my apartment?\!
How did it even get there?
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
等等，最後一隻失蹤的寵物在我的公寓裡？ \！
它是怎麼到達那裡的？

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
This is awesome! I've never played an arcade
game that lets me make my character's
boobs this big!

Arcade Customer:
That's... not usually a feature of arcade games
at all, now that I think about it.

Goddess Arcadia:
Just another way I'm the best!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
這太棒了！我從來沒有玩過街機
可以讓我製作角色的遊戲
胸部這麼大！

街機客戶：
這…通常不是街機遊戲的功能
無論如何，現在我想起來了。

阿卡迪亞女神：
從另一個角度來說我是最棒的！

passages.name: Arcade After — Best Earth Game
passages.content:
\{BEST EARTH\!
\}The best game you'll ever play!\!
How you wish the world could be!

\}Or else.
passages.content_zh:
\{最好的地球\!
\}你玩過的最好的遊戲！ \!
你多麼希望世界可以是這樣啊！

\}否則。

passages.name: Arcade After — Bowsette
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Whoa, if you get through the first three worlds
fast enough you unlock a Mario sex scene!

...Nintendo has really gone places, huh?\!
\}And when did Mario get so hot?
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
哇哦，如果你能闖過前三個世界
速度夠快，您就可以解鎖馬裡奧性愛場景！

……任天堂真的已經走了很多地方，對吧？ \！
\}馬裡奧什麼時候變得這麼紅了？

passages.name: Arcade After — Bowsette
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Whoa, if you get through the first three worlds
fast enough you unlock a Mario sex scene!

...Nintendo has really gone places, huh?
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
哇哦，如果你能闖過前三個世界
速度夠快，您就可以解鎖馬裡奧性愛場景！

……任天堂真的已經取得了很大的進步，對吧？

passages.name: Arcade After — Bowsette — p1
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Finally, my turn!

Onscreen Bowser jumps into a question box.\!
A crown flies out and lands on his head.

Arcade Customer:
Yeah! Here we go!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
終於輪到我了！

螢幕上的鮑澤跳進了一個問題框。 \!
一頂王冠飛出，落在了他的頭上。

街機客戶：
是啊！開始了！

passages.name: Arcade After — Bowsette — p2
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Oh man, this game is amazing!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
天哪，這個遊戲太棒了！

passages.name: Arcade After — Tyrone
passages.content:
Tyrone (Rank W):
Hey there. I'm just taking a break, and then
it's back to the grind.

We all wanna see what happens if we get
past rank Z!
passages.content_zh:
泰隆（W級）：
嘿那裡。我只是休息一下，然後
又回到了苦差事。

我們都想看看如果我們得到了會發生什麼
過去的Z級！

passages.name: Arcade After — Dancer
passages.content:
Dancer (Rank D):
This is so great!\!
I've been able to find every single song I can
think of on here!

How did they even manage that?
passages.content_zh:
舞者（D級）：
這太棒了！ \!
我已經能找到我能找到的每一首歌了
想到這裡了！

他們是怎麼做到的？

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
She's practicing to the music.

Dancer (Rank T):
And jump\. and spin\.\. and hop\. and jump...
passages.content_zh:
她正在跟著音樂練習。

舞者（T級）：
並跳躍\.並旋轉\.\.並跳\。然後跳...

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
I've never seen a pole-based rythm game
before!

Dance Machine:
1080 Spin + Primo Grind + Kickflip + Sultry
Look!!!

\{\{C-\.C-\.C-\.COMBO!!!

Go for the high score!

Arcade Customer:
It's got an interesting scoring system too!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
我從未見過基於桿的節奏遊戲
之前！

舞蹈機：
1080 旋轉 + Primo Grind + Kickflip + Sultry
看！

\{\{C-\.C-\.C-\.COMBO!!!

爭取高分吧！

街機客戶：
它還有一個有趣的評分系統！

passages.name: Arcade After — p1
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Okay, so I realized this game was set in our
town.

I found my house.\!
I found myself inside.

Now I'm going to give myself a delicious
milkshake.

Arcade Customer:
Haha, look at this!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
好吧，所以我意識到這個遊戲是在我們的
鎮。

我找到我的房子了。 \!
我發現自己在裡面。

現在我要給自己一個美味
奶昔。

街機客戶：
哈哈，看看這個！

passages.name: Arcade After — p2
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Oh, this is so my game of the year.
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
哦，這真是我的年度最佳遊戲。

passages.name: Arcade After —
passages.content:
Dancer Miku (Rank G):
I'm going for an M for Miku!
passages.content_zh:
舞者 Miku（G 級）：
我要為 Miku 選 M！

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Dancer (Rank U):
Hah! The high score will be mine!

Chest Squeeze + Twerking is a broken
combo!
passages.content_zh:
舞者（U級）：
哈！高分將是我的！

胸部擠壓+電臀舞是個壞習慣
組合！

passages.name: Arcade After — Cat dancer
passages.content:
Dancer (Rank F):
I've been feeling so much more flexible
recently!\!
Maybe it was that catnip tea!
passages.content_zh:
舞者（F級）：
我感覺更靈活
最近！ \！
也許是貓薄荷茶！

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Dancer (Rank H):
There's something soothing about this.

Arcade Machine:
\{SUPER COMBO!!!!!

Dancer (Rank H):
...Except when it does that.
passages.content_zh:
舞者（H級）：
這裡有一些令人安慰的東西。

街機：
\{超級組合!!!!!

舞者（H級）：
....除非它這樣做。

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Dancer (Rank V):
Flexibility is the real key to a high score!

If you're not doing the splits then you're not
even trying!
passages.content_zh:
舞者（V級）：
靈活性是獲得高分的真正關鍵！

如果你不做劈叉，那麼你就不是
甚至嘗試！

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Dancer (Rank O):
Upside down tricks are high risk, high reward.\!
Easy to fall, but racks up points like nothing
else!

So much higher skill than spamming a
broken combo!
passages.content_zh:
舞者（O級）：
顛倒技巧高風險、高報酬。 \!
容易跌倒，但累積分數卻無異於事無鉅細
否則！

比垃圾郵件高得多的技能
破組合！

passages.name: Arcade After — Dancer
passages.content:
Dancer (Rank G):
Those three guys are always competing for
high scores.
Kind of juvenile if you ask me.

Dancer (Rank V):
That's because you always lose!

Dancer (Rank G):
Shut up!
passages.content_zh:
舞者（G級）：
這三個傢伙總是在競爭
高分。
如果你問我的話，我覺得我還很年輕。

舞者（V級）：
那是因為你總是會輸！

舞者（G級）：
閉嘴！

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
I found a secret character!\!
I've never heard of a Mario game with this
many secrets!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
我發現了一個秘密角色！ \!
我從來沒有聽說過有這樣的馬裡奧遊戲
很多秘密！

passages.name: Arcade After — Bowsette
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Come on, hurry up!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
來吧，快點！

passages.name: Arcade After — Bowsette
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
I have to play a Bowsette game.\!
Even if it's some cheap knockoff.

It must be a cheap knockoff, right?
I can't imagine how else it would exist.
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
我必須玩 Bowsette 遊戲。 \！
即使是一些廉價的仿製品。

一定是廉價仿製品吧？
我無法想像它還會如何存在。

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content: Full of stuffed UFOs.
passages.content_zh: 充滿了 UFO 標本。

passages.name: Arcade After — Alien
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
I can't believe I managed to get something
from the UFO catcher!\!
Was this one easier than usual?

It's really cool too, let me show you!

She fishes around in her cleavage.

She tries again.

Arcade Customer:
I think I lost it somewhere in there...
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
我不敢相信我成功得到了一些東西
來自 UFO 捕手！ \！
這次比平常容易嗎？

這也真的很酷，讓我來跟你展示一下！

她在乳溝裡摸索著。

她再試一次。

街機客戶：
我想我把它丟在某個地方了...

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
It's full of little green... people.\!
Not men.\!
*Very* clearly not men.
passages.content_zh:
裡面全是綠色的小...人。 \！
不是男人。 \!
*非常*顯然不是男人。

passages.name: Arcade After — Goblin — p1
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Don't disturb me, I've almost got it.

Almost.\..\..

Just a little bit more.\..\..

Got it!

Arcade Customer:
Hey! Why did it suddenly get harder to see
inside!?
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
別打擾我，我已經快明白了。

差不多了。 \..\..

再多一點點就好了。 \..\..

明白了！

街機客戶：
嘿！為什麼突然變得越來越難看
裡面！ ？

passages.name: Arcade After — Goblin — p2
passages.content:
She's standing on her tiptoes to see inside.

Arcade Customer:
Hmmph, I bet I got the best one.
passages.content_zh:
她踮起腳尖想看看裡面。

街機客戶：
嗯，我打賭我得到了最好的一個。

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
These games have the *cutest* prizes!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
這些遊戲有*最可愛的*獎品！

passages.name: Arcade After — Goblin
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Huh, this is a new look on me.\!
I think I like it.
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
呵呵，這對我來說是一個新的面貌。 \!
我想我喜歡它。

passages.name: Arcade After — Dancer
passages.content:
Dancer:
For some reason it gets harder to read the
arrows at higher ranks!
passages.content_zh:
舞者：
由於某種原因，閱讀起來變得更加困難
箭頭指向更高的等級！

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
She's craning her neck to try to watch the
games.

Arcade Customer:
I want to play but I also want to watch!\!
Why can't this line be shorter?
passages.content_zh:
她伸長脖子試圖觀看
遊戲。

街機客戶：
我想玩，但我也想看！ \!
為什麼這條線不能再短一點呢？

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
You peek inside the bathroom.

Arcade Customer:
Mmmm...\!
Oh Bowser, you've been such a naughty girl...

Time for-\. ooo!\. your punishment...
passages.content_zh:
你往浴室裡看去。

街機客戶：
嗯...\！
噢，鮑澤，你真是個淘氣的女孩…

時間為-\。噢！ \.你的懲罰...

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
You peek inside the bathroom.

Arcade Customer:
Oh-\.\. oh-\!
Ah!

She tugs on her nipple piercings.

I-\!
I love the accessories that came with my green
alien...\!
M\.m\.m\.m\.MM\.MM\.m\.m\.m\.MMM\.MM!!
passages.content_zh:
你往浴室裡看去。

街機客戶：
噢-\.\.哦-\！
啊!

她拉扯乳頭穿孔。

我-\！
我喜歡我的綠色附帶的配件
外星人...\！
M\.m\.m\.m\.MM\.MM\.m\.m\.m\.MMM\.MM！ ！

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Dancer (Rank D):
Oohhhhh...\!
Why is everyone taking so long in there?!

I-\. mmmm!\. can't wait much longer!
passages.content_zh:
舞者（D級）：
噢噢噢...\!
為什麼大家都待這麼久？ ！

我-\。嗯嗯！ \.不能再等了！

passages.name: Arcade After — Sign
passages.content: BATHROOMS

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
I can't believe they made a Bowsette game!\!
I've never heard of this before!

...How did these people not get murdered by
Nintendo?
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
我不敢相信他們製作了 Bowsette 遊戲！ \！
我以前從未聽說過這個！

……這些人怎麼沒被殺呢？
任天堂？

passages.name: Arcade After — Dancer
passages.content:
Dancer (Rank I):
How does it know what rank to restart at,
anyway?

We're not entering our names or anything.\!
Some kind of biometrics?
passages.content_zh:
舞者（一級）：
它如何知道以什麼等級重新啟動，
無論如何？

我們不會輸入我們的名字或任何東西。 \！
某種生物辨識技術？

passages.name: Arcade After — Dancer
passages.content:
Dancer Cowgirl (Rank L):
\}\C[10]ERROR!! RANK/SIZE MISMATCH!!\C[0]\{
I don't know why everyone says this game
gets harder as your rank goes up.

I'm not seeing any difference at all!
passages.content_zh:
舞者女牛仔（L級）：
\}\C[10]錯誤！ ！排名/大小不符！ ！ \C[0]\{
不知道為什麼大家都說這個遊戲
隨著你的等級上升，變得更加困難。

我根本沒有看到任何區別！

passages.name: Arcade After — Dead cabinet — p1
passages.content:
Huh, this arcade cabinet isn't working.

The game flickers on.

Goddess Arcadia:
Thanks for fixing that!

Raw mana received!
passages.content_zh:
呃，這個街機櫃不能用了。

遊戲開始閃爍。

阿卡迪亞女神：
感謝您解決這個問題！

原始法力已收到！

passages.name: Arcade After — Bowsette
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Is anyone else having a sudden weird urge to
kidnap princesses?

\}...Or fuck a plumber?
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
有沒有其他人突然有一種奇怪的衝動
綁架公主？

\} ...或他媽的水管工？

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Arcade Customer:
Aagh!\!
I want to play again, but I should let the people
who haven't play first!

Why must I be so bound by SOCIAL
CONVENTION and BASIC POLITENESS!
passages.content_zh:
街機客戶：
啊啊！ \！
我想再玩一次，但我應該讓人們
誰還沒玩過呢！

為什麼我必須受到社交的束縛
慣例和基本禮貌！

passages.name: Arcade After — Dead cabinet — p1
passages.content:
Huh, this arcade cabinet isn't working.

The game flickers on.

Then arcs to a nearby player.
passages.content_zh:
呃，這個街機櫃不能用了。

遊戲開始閃爍。

然後向附近的玩家發出弧線。

passages.name: Arcade After — Dead cabinet — p2
passages.content: It seems to be working normally now.
passages.content_zh: 現在似乎工作正常。

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
\n[4]:
Now this is the sort of genius writing I like to
see!
passages.content_zh:
\n[4]:
這就是我喜歡的天才寫作
瞧！

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Kaede is looking thoughtfully at the machine.

Kaede:
Hmm...\!
'Twould be different, but probably wouldst
not be *good*...
passages.content_zh:
楓若有所思地看著機器。

楓：
嗯...\！
'會有所不同，但可能會
不是*好*...

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
\n[2]:
This is all fascinating!

...What do you think she'd do if we got her
even angrier?
passages.content_zh:
\n[2]:
這一切都令人著迷！

……如果我們抓住她，你認為她會做什麼
更生氣？

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Good old Mario Kart.\!
...Was Yoshi always wearing a bikini?
passages.content_zh:
好老的馬裡奧賽車。 \！
……耀西一直都穿著比基尼嗎？

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
An old Sonic game.\!
Though there's a lot more jiggling when they
run than you remember.
passages.content_zh:
一款老索尼克遊戲。 \!
儘管當它們出現時會有更多的抖動
跑得比你記憶中的還要快。

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
Bowsette is jumping, blowing fire, and bouncing
all over the place.
passages.content_zh:
Bowsette 跳躍、噴火、彈跳
到處都是。

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
They're rushing through the game super fast.\!
...Did Bowsette just bounce out of her top
and have to fix it?
passages.content_zh:
他們在遊戲中的衝刺速度非常快。 \！
...Bowsette 剛從她的上衣中彈起來嗎？
並必須修復它？

passages.name: Arcade After
passages.content:
You've never heard of this game "Bounce
Bounce Revolution".
passages.content_zh:
你從來沒有聽說過這個遊戲“彈跳”
彈跳革命」。

passages.name: Entrance — Exit
passages.content: Ascend to the surface?
passages.content_zh: 上升到表面？

passages.name: Entrance — p1
passages.content: Antidote was found!
passages.content_zh: 解藥找到了！

passages.name: Entrance — p1
passages.content: Jellyfish Charm was found!
passages.content_zh: 發現水母咒！

passages.name: Entrance — p1
passages.content:
Two seashells and some string found!\!
Improvised bikini acquired!
passages.content_zh:
發現了兩個貝殼和一些繩子！ \！
簡易比基尼獲得！

passages.name: Entrance — p1
passages.content:
\n[2]:
This is amazing!

\n[2]:
Just look at it all!

\n[2]:
The plants, the water, the shells...\!
We're in a completely different ecosystem!

So few people actually get to see under the
waves like this.\!
And here we are, able to look through it as
much as we want!

Isn't this amazing \n[10]?

\n[2]:
It really is!

\n[2]:
Fine, just...\.\. give me a moment to look
around.

And look at this!

She gestures to a large fish swimming nearby.

\n[2]:
It's not even scared of us!

She moves a little closer.

\n[2]:
\..\..\..I'm pretty sure those aren't supposed
to be here.

Kaede:
Quite.\!
Methinks our path to yonder temple wilst not
be as smooth as one had hoped.
passages.content_zh:
\n[2]:
這太棒了！

\n[2]:
看看這一切吧！

\n[2]:
植物、水、貝殼......\！
我們處於一個完全不同的生態系統！

真正看得到底下的人太少了
像這樣的波浪。 \!
在這裡，我們能夠將其視為
正如我們所願！

這不是很神奇\n[10]嗎？

\n[2]:
確實是這樣！

\n[2]:
好吧，只是...\.\.給我一點時間看看
周圍。

看看這個！

她指著附近遊動的一條大魚。

\n[2]:
它根本不怕我們！

她靠近了一點。

\n[2]:
\..\..\..我很確定這些不應該
來到這裡。

楓：
相當。 \!
我想我們去那邊寺廟的路不會
一切都如人們所希望的那樣順利。

passages.name: Entrance — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
This time you can immediately tell something
is different.

The water seems to pull back from you
slightly, even pulling itself out of your clothes. \!
You can still feel that it's wet on your skin,
but none of that wetness gets on you.

It makes you feel a lot safer taking a breath.\!
And thankfully nothing enters your mouth
but air.

The others are already waiting for you.

Kaede:
'Tis a relief to see thee join us unmoistened,
fair \n[10]!

\n[4] scoffs.

\n[4]:
We would have been down here so much
earlier if someone could just get over their
stupid breathing habit.

Kaede rolls her eyes.

Kaede:
Canst thou not ever restrain thy viperous
tongue?

The goddesses themselves descended to
grant our will and all thou canst do is complain
they didst not take a faster tempo!

\n[4]:
Have you SEEN the goddesses?!\!
Of course I'm going to complain about their-

\n[2]:
Kaede!\!
How,\. uh\., about these ruins?

\n[2]:
They're in pretty bad shape. Are you sure
there's anything left?

Kaede:
As sure as the goddesses art merciful!

We sawest the sanctuary with our own eyes
from yonder shore, we know it still stands.\!
And it wert always the place most cradled in
the goddesses' arms.

If it stands, the great works secreted within
stand too.\!
There art no time like the present to observe
such wonders!

She strides off.

\n[4]:
\..\..\..\..\..\..Fine.

She follows.
passages.content_zh:
這次你可以立即說一些事情
是不同的。

水似乎從你身上退了回來
輕微地，甚至將其從衣服中拉出來。 \！
你仍然可以感覺到它在你的皮膚上是濕的，
但這些濕氣不會沾到你身上。

它讓你呼吸時感覺更安全。 \！
值得慶幸的是，沒有任何東西進入你的嘴裡
但空氣。

其他人已經在等你了。

楓：
看到你毫髮無傷地加入我們真是一種解脫，
公平\n[10]！

\n[4] 嘲笑。

\n[4]:
我們會經常來這裡
如果有人能早點克服他們的
愚蠢的呼吸習慣。

凱德翻白眼。

楓：
難道你不能永遠克制你的惡毒嗎？
舌頭？

女神們親自降臨到
遵從我們的意願，你所能做的就是抱怨
他們沒有採取更快的節奏！

\n[4]:
你見過女神嗎？ ！ \！
我當然要抱怨他們——

\n[2]:
楓！ \！
如何，\。呃\.，關於這些廢墟？

\n[2]:
他們的狀態相當糟糕。你確定嗎
還有什麼東西嗎？

楓：
就像女神們一樣仁慈！

我們親眼目睹了聖所
從彼岸，我們知道它仍然矗立著。 \！
它總是最受人喜愛的地方
女神的手臂。

如果它成立，裡面隱藏著偉大的作品
也站起來。 \!
沒有比現在更值得觀察的時間了
真是奇蹟啊！

她大步走開。

\n[4]:
\..\..\..\..\..\..好的。

她跟著。

passages.name: Entrance — Swim point — p2
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
That was amazing!\!
The goddesses truly smile upon you!

Kaede:
Thank you, we art truly glad to have aided
thee in thy time of need.

But I find myself in sore need of mine bed.\!
Wouldst thou mind leading us back to thy
village?

A long road lies ahead of us before we might
make it back to the surface.

Head Priestess:
I can, but...\!

Kaede:
But what?\!
Is there still aught amiss?

If not, the sooner we turn our steps towards
home the sooner completed.

Head Priestess:
I understand, but...\!
If you want to go back why not just swim
there?

She swims up high enough to easily clear
rocks around you, then back down.

\n[4]:
\{WE COULD HAVE DONE THAT
THE WHOLE TIME?!?!?!

You swim back to the entrance to the sound
of \n[4]'s grumbles.
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
太棒了！ \!
女神們真的對你微笑！

楓：
謝謝，我們真的很高興能提供協助
在你需要的時候。

但我發現自己非常需要我的床。 \！
你介意帶我們回到你的身邊嗎？
村莊？

在我們實現目標之前，還有很長的路要走
使其回到表面。

女祭司長：
我可以，但是...\！

楓：
但什麼？ \！
難道還有什麼問題嗎？

如果沒有，我們越早轉向
回家越早完成。

女祭司長：
我明白，但是…\！
如果你想回去為什麼不去游泳
在那裡？

她游得夠高，可以輕鬆清除
在你周圍晃動，然後後退。

\n[4]:
\{我們本來可以這麼做的
一直以來？ ！ ？ ！ ？ ！

你遊回聲音的入口
\n[4] 的抱怨聲。

passages.name: Entrance — Swim point — p3
passages.content:
Swim to...

Swimming is stupid and you'd rather walk.
Really.
passages.content_zh:
游到...

游泳是愚蠢的，你寧願走路。
真的。

passages.name: Entrance — Mermaid after
passages.content:
Florauna Devotee:
It's so good to be able to get out and gather
again!

She scrapes some of the algae off the wall.

Florauna Devotee:
Mmm, this is so delicious, we've all missed
this.

Florauna Devotee:
...Unless this is the poisonous algae?\!
It's been a while...

She shrugs and keeps harvesting it.
passages.content_zh:
弗羅納信徒：
能夠出去聚會真是太好了
又來了！

她刮掉牆上的一些藻類。

弗羅納信徒：
嗯，這太好吃了，我們都錯過了
這個。

弗羅納信徒：
……除非這是毒藻？ \！
已經有一段時間了...

她聳聳肩，繼續收穫。

passages.name: Entrance
passages.content:
Mermaid Guard:
I'm prepared to fight off any threats!
passages.content_zh:
人魚守衛：
我已經準備好對抗任何威脅！

passages.name: Entrance
passages.content:
Mermaid Guard:
We're ever vigilant!\!
...But it's good that the attacks have fallen
off so we *can* go outside.
passages.content_zh:
人魚守衛：
我們時時保持警惕！ \!
……但是攻擊減少了是件好事
關閉所以我們*可以*出去。

passages.name: Real — Marine Biologist — p1
passages.content:
Marine Biologist:
Ugh, this place is swarming with invasive
species.

This ecosystem is, to use the scientific term,
totally fucked.

He shrugs.

Marine Biologist:
There are many benefits to being a marine
biologist.
passages.content_zh:
海洋生物學家：
呃，這個地方充滿了入侵者
種。

用科學術語來說，這個生態系統是
徹底完蛋了。

他聳聳肩。

海洋生物學家：
成為海軍有很多好處
生物學家。

passages.name: Real — Marine Biologist — p2
passages.content:
Marine Biologist:
The ecosystem here is improving!

I should look at this more closely, the
literature doesn't have many examples of
spontaneous ecosystem unfuckery.
passages.content_zh:
海洋生物學家：
這裡的生態系統正在改善！

我應該更仔細地看看這個
文獻中沒有太多例子
自發的生態系。

passages.name: Real — Raw mana — p1
passages.content:
Something is sparkling among the rocks.

Raw mana acquired!
passages.content_zh:
岩石間有東西在閃閃發光。

獲得原始法力！

passages.name: Real — Underwater — p1
passages.content:
A box must have fallen off a passing ship.\!
Looks like it contains a shipment of\..\..\.. sexy
underwear?

You're able to salvage a single pair.

Trash panties acquired!
passages.content_zh:
一定有一個盒子從經過的船上掉下來。 \！
看起來裡面有一批\..\..\.. 性感的
內衣？

你可以搶救一對。

垃圾內褲收購了！

passages.name: Real — Underwater — p2
passages.content:
The box is empty of everything except tiny
scraps of sexy, sexy fabric.
passages.content_zh:
盒子裡什麼都空了，除了一個小東西
性感的、性感的布料碎片。

passages.name: Real — Raw mana — p1
passages.content:
There's something hidden in this seashell.

A crab!
Ow, pinchy!

But behind the crab is a shiny rock!

Raw mana acquired!
passages.content_zh:
這個貝殼裡藏著一些東西。

一隻螃蟹！
哎呀，捏！

但螃蟹的後面是一塊閃亮的岩石！

獲得原始法力！

passages.name: Real — Raw mana — p2
passages.content:
There's nothing left here but an angry
crustacean.

It's better left alone, you really don't want to
catch crabs.
passages.content_zh:
這裡除了憤怒什麼都沒有留下
甲殼類動物。

最好別管，你真的不想
抓螃蟹。

passages.name: ARG 2 — p1
passages.content: Pearl Pendant was found!
passages.content_zh: 珍珠吊墜被發現了！

passages.name: ARG 2 — Coral — p1
passages.content:
An odd outcropping of coral.\!
It crumbles into glittery dust when you touch
it.

Glittery Powder acquired!
passages.content_zh:
奇怪的珊瑚露頭。 \！
當你觸摸它時它會碎成閃閃發光的灰塵
它。

亮粉粉已入手！

passages.name: ARG 2 — p2
passages.content:
Kaede gasps.

Kaede:
Yonder statue...\!
Canst it be?

Kaede:
Two vast and legless cheeks of stone
lie on the sand...

Kaede:
Why hero, this must be the monument to
Ozymandass, Queen of Queens!

We shouldst see if aught remains of her
fabled booty!
passages.content_zh:
凱德喘息著。

楓：
那邊的雕像...\！
可以嗎？

楓：
兩個巨大的、沒有腿的石頭臉頰
躺在沙上...

楓：
為什麼英雄，這一定是紀念碑
奧茲曼達斯，女王中的女王！

我們應該看看她是否還剩下什麼
傳說中的戰利品！

passages.name: ARG 2
passages.content:
A broken pillar of rock lies in a crater in the
sand.
passages.content_zh:
一根破碎的石柱躺在火山口中
沙子。

passages.name: ARG 2
passages.content:
Two vast and legless cheeks of stone
lie in the sand.\!
On the pedestal these words appear:

My name is Ozymandass, Queen of Queens!\!
Look on my twerks, ye curvy, and despair!

Nothing beside remains.\!
Round the decay of that colossal ass,
boundless and bare, the lone and level sands
stretch far away.
passages.content_zh:
兩個巨大的、沒有腿的石頭臉頰
躺在沙子裡。 \!
基座上寫著這樣的字：

我的名字是奧茲曼達斯，女王中的女王！ \！
看看我的電臀舞，你們曲線優美，絕望！

除此之外什麼都沒有留下。 \!
在那頭巨大的驢子腐爛的周圍，
無邊無際，孤獨平坦的沙地
伸展到很遠的地方。

passages.name: ARG 2 — p1
passages.content:
A queen's cosmetics found!\!
...\.Which have decayed into some glittery
powder.\!
Still might be useable.

Glittery Powder found!
passages.content_zh:
發現了女王的化妝品！ \！
...\.已經腐爛成一些閃閃發光的東西
粉。 \!
還是可以用的。

發現金蔥粉​​了！

passages.name: ARG 2 — p1
passages.content:
A queen's jewels found!

Well, one jewel.

Well, a rock, but at least it's a shiny rock.

Kaede:
The treasures of the ancients may be\..\..\..
less grand than one pictures.

Raw Mana found!
passages.content_zh:
發現了女王的珠寶！

嗯，一顆寶石。

好吧，一塊石頭，但至少它是一塊閃亮的石頭。

楓：
古人的寶藏可能是\..\..\..
沒有一張照片那麼宏偉。

發現原始法力！

passages.name: ARG 2 — p1
passages.content:
The chest contains the overflowing treasury
of the queen!\!
Wealth beyond imagination!

Unfortunately there has been a *lot* of
inflation since the legendary days of the
ancients.

1000\G were found!
passages.content_zh:
寶箱裡藏著滿溢的寶庫
女王的！ \！
財富超乎想像！

不幸的是，已經有很多
自傳奇時代以來的通貨膨脹
古人。

已找到 1000\G！

passages.name: ARG 2 — p1
passages.content: Booty Shorts was found!
passages.content_zh: 戰利品短褲被發現了！

passages.name: Mermaid encounter — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
Your party members chat while you continue
to walk through the ruins.

\n[2]:
I'm worried, maids are a very bad sign for
the health of an area.

They tend to clean out the ecosystem.

Kaede:
I think that mightest be not the most urgent
thing here, though it does pain me to know
the temple grounds art ailing.

\n[4]:
The most important thing here is that this
place was designed by a moron!

We keep walking and we're just getting
farther from the stupid temple!

Kaede:
Thou canst not blame the wear of time's
vagaries upon the blessed designer of our
temple!

\n[4]:
I'll blame any vagaries I want!\!
You're the one who's been here, get us to the
stupid sanctuary already!

Kaede:
Though I art truly touched by thy faith in
mine wit, this be nothing like the place I
once knew so well.

In this case I believe we shouldst do what
canst solve any conundrum: beseech the
goddesses for a sign.

\n[4] rolls her eyes.

\n[4]:
Are you really-

A scream rings out to the west.

Kaede:
I believe that be our sign!\!
Away!

She runs off.

You burst past another set of ruined pillars to
find a mermaid surrounded by monsters.

Kaede:
Fear not fair maiden! Thy salvation ist at
hand!

Mermaid:
Aaaagh! Stupid stupid creatures!

She beats her hands against the dissolving
remains of the monsters.

Mermaid:
I almost made it back safe!

Kaede:
Calm thyself, fair mermaiden. Thou hast
nothing to fear under our aegis.

The mermaid gives the creatures one last
flail, then turns towards you and tries to
pretend nothing happened.

Mermaid:
Oh, um, hi!
Thanks for the help!

These stupid stupid creatures keep attacking
us every time we try to gather food!\!
Stupid!

\n[2]:
Aha! I knew they were a warning sign!

Kaede:
Tell me fair mermaiden, hast thou a place to
shelter?

'Twould be ignoble of us to not escort thou
back when thou be in such trouble.

Mermaid:
Oh, yes, of course!\!
Thanks!

It's just over here!

As she leads you away Kaede moves up next
to you. She stares at your guide.

Kaede:
Behold
passages.content_zh:
當您繼續時，您的隊友會聊天
穿過廢墟。

\n[2]:
我擔心，女傭對我來說是個非常不好的兆頭
一個地區的健康狀況。

他們傾向於清理生態系統。

楓：
我認為這可能不是最緊急的
事情就在這裡，雖然知道這讓我很痛苦
寺廟庭院藝術狀況不佳。

\n[4]:
這裡最重要的是這個
這個地方是白痴設計的！

我們繼續前行，我們才剛到達
離愚蠢的寺廟遠一點！

楓：
你不能怪時間的磨損
我們受祝福的設計師的變幻莫測
寺廟！

\n[4]:
我會責怪任何我想要的變幻莫測！
你就是來過這裡的人，帶我們去
愚蠢的庇護所已經！

楓：
雖然我真的被你的信念所感動
我的智慧，這和我住的地方完全不一樣
曾經如此了解。

在這種情況下我認為我們應該做什麼
能解決任何難題：懇求
女神為標誌。

\n[4]翻白眼。

\n[4]:
你真的是——

西邊傳來一聲慘叫。

楓：
我相信那是我們的標誌！ \！
離開！

她跑開了。

你衝過另一組毀壞的柱子
找到一條被怪物包圍的美人魚。

楓：
美麗少女不要害怕！你的救贖在於
手！

美人魚：
啊啊啊！愚蠢的愚蠢的生物！

她用手拍打著溶解的物質
怪物的遺骸。

美人魚：
我差點就安全回來了！

楓：
冷靜點，美麗的美人魚。你有
在我們的庇護下，沒有什麼可怕的。

美人魚給了這些生物最後一次
連枷，然後轉向你並試圖
假裝什麼都沒發生。

美人魚：
哦，嗯，嗨！
感謝您的幫忙！

這些愚蠢的生物不斷進攻
每次我們嘗試收集食物時！ \！
愚蠢的！

\n[2]:
啊哈！我知道它們是一個警訊！

楓：
告訴我美麗的美人魚，你有地方嗎
庇護所？

如果我們不護送你，那就太不光彩了
當你遇到這樣的麻煩時回來。

美人魚：
哦，是的，當然！ \！
謝謝！

就在這裡！

當她帶你離開時，楓接下來上前
給你。她盯著你的導遊。

楓：
看哪

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Armor
passages.content:
A mermaid is hammering a seashell on an
anvil.\!
It doesn't seem to be doing much.

Mermaid:
What can I do you for?
passages.content_zh:
美人魚正在敲打貝殼
鐵砧。 \！
似乎並沒有做太多事情。

美人魚：
我能為你做什麼？

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Weapon mermaid
passages.content:
Mermaid:
The finest of weapons.
passages.content_zh:
美人魚：
最好的武器。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Elina
passages.content:
\n[2]:
How do you work metal, when you're
underwater and can't use magic?

Blacksmith Mermaid:
Magic.

\n[2]:
Magic?

The mermaid nods.

Blacksmith Mermaid:
Magic.

\n[2]:
\..\..\..\..\..
*Fascinating*.
passages.content_zh:
\n[2]:
當你
在水下不能使用魔法？

鐵匠美人魚：
魔法。

\n[2]:
魔法？

美人魚點點頭。

鐵匠美人魚：
魔法。

\n[2]:
\..\..\..\..\..
*迷人*。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Farmer Mermaid
passages.content:
Florauna Follower:
I grow seaweed to help feed the village!

She clasps her hands in front of her hefty
chest.

Florauna Follower:
May Florauna bless our crop like she blesses
our village!
passages.content_zh:
芙羅娜追隨者：
我種植海藻來幫助養活村莊！

她雙手緊握在身前
胸部。

芙羅娜追隨者：
願弗洛勞娜像她一樣祝福我們的莊稼
我們的村莊！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Farmer Mermaid — p1
passages.content:
Florauna Follower:
It's so hard to keep all these new creatures
out of the seaweed.

I just want to help it blossom like Florauna
would want!
passages.content_zh:
芙羅娜追隨者：
保留這些新生物太難了
從海藻中出來。

我只想幫助它像 Florauna 一樣綻放
會想要！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Farmer Mermaid — p2
passages.content:
Mermaid:
Those creatures have been staying away
ever since I built a fake human to scare them!

I'm modeling it after you, you've beaten so
many of them that I'm sure they're scared of
you.

She eyes your ridiculously curvy body.

Mermaid:
\..\..\..I'm going to need a lot more padding.
passages.content_zh:
美人魚：
那些生物已經遠離了
自從我造了一個假人來嚇唬他們以來！

我正在模仿你，你已經打敗了
我確信他們中的許多人都害怕
你。

她注視著你那可笑的曲線身材。

美人魚：
\..\..\..我需要更多的填充。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard — p1
passages.content:
Mermaid Guard:
It's just getting more and more dangerous
out there.
passages.content_zh:
人魚守衛：
它只是變得越來越危險
在那裡。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard — p2
passages.content:
Mermaid Guard:
We've been able to send out harvesting
parties again.\!
Things are really looking up.
passages.content_zh:
人魚守衛：
我們已經能夠發出收穫
再次聚會。 \！
事情確實正在好轉。

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
Full of water.\!
Somehow.
passages.content_zh:
滿水了。 \!
不知何故。

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
The mermaids are all watching the blacksmith
work.

Mermaid 1:
-and so blacksmithing is definitely of Hadea.
It's a business, how could it be otherwise?

Mermaid 2:
But it's all about lifting heavy things!\!
Look at how swole she is, it must be of Fittina!

Mermaid 1:
But the *goal* of it isn't muscles, it's to make
money. That's all about Hadea!

Mermaid 3:
Wait, if a blacksmith might be Hadea or Fittina,
what about an armorer?

The other two mermaids shudder.

Mermaid 2:
We do *not* talk about armor.

Mermaid 1:
That involves style too!\!
It's not worth arguing about *three* godesses.
passages.content_zh:
美人魚們都在看鐵匠
工作。

美人魚1：
——所以鐵匠絕對是哈迪亞的。
這是生意，不然怎麼可能？

美人魚2：
但這都是為了舉起重物！ \！
看看她胖很多，一定是菲蒂娜的！

美人魚1：
但它的「目標」不是肌肉，而是讓
錢。這就是哈迪亞的全部！

美人魚3：
等等，如果鐵匠可能是哈迪亞或菲蒂娜，
那麼軍械師呢？

另外兩條美人魚全身顫抖。

美人魚2：
我們*不*談論盔甲。

美人魚1：
這也涉及風格！ \！
不值得爭論「三個」女神。

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content: She's floating above the bed as she sleeps.
passages.content_zh: 她睡覺時漂浮在床上方。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid stones — p1
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
What do you mean we need to replace the
entrance rock again?!

Fittina says to *lift* heavy things, not *throw*
heavy things!
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
您的意思是我們需要更換
入口再次搖滾？ ！

菲蒂娜說要“舉起”重物，而不是“扔”
重的東西！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid stones — p2
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
I'm so glad the monster attacks are dying
down.

Maybe now I'll be able to make something
*besides* entrance rocks.\!
\}Overeager muscleheads.
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
我很高興怪物攻擊正在消失
下來。

也許現在我可以做點什麼
*此外*入口岩石。 \！
\}過於熱切的肌肉頭。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee:
Now remember girls, we're adapting the
sacred gospels to help the village!

Repeat after me:\!
Stab light- to medium-weight things!

Other Guards:
STAB LIGHT- TO MEDIUM-WEIGHT THINGS!
passages.content_zh:
菲蒂娜信徒：
現在記住女孩們，我們正在調整
神聖的福音來幫助村莊！

跟著我重複：\!
刺穿輕到中等重量的物體！

其他守衛：
刺穿輕型至中等重量的物體！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee:
Someday I'll build up to stabbing heavy things!
passages.content_zh:
菲蒂娜信徒：
總有一天我會練就刺重的東西！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee:
I've been trying to stab the seaweed in the
farm to practice fighting kelp but the farmers
complain when I do.

Is this a weird Florauna thing?
passages.content_zh:
菲蒂娜信徒：
我一直在嘗試刺穿海藻
農場練習鬥海帶但農民
當我這樣做時抱怨。

這是弗洛勞納的奇怪事嗎？

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee:
Yes, I understand that we need to stab things
to protect the town, but where's the artistry?
The heart?

The SWOLE???
passages.content_zh:
菲蒂娜信徒：
是的，我明白我們需要刺傷東西
保護小鎮，但藝術性在哪裡？
心臟？

斯沃勒？ ？ ？

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermayor — p1
passages.content:
Mermayor:
Fittina lies closest to my heart.\!
For the heaviest thing to carry...

She holds a hand to her chest.

Mermayor:
Is the hopes and safety of your people.
passages.content_zh:
人魚市長：
菲蒂娜最貼近我的心。 \！
對於攜帶最重的東西...

她一隻手放在胸前。

人魚市長：
是你們人民的希望和安全。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermayor — p2
passages.content:
Mermayor:
Thank you so much for the help!\!
You've made the weight of my responsibilities
to my people much easier to bear.

Mermayor:
Actually, how would Fittina feel about that?\!
It's making my heavier thing lighter...

But I don't think she'd want us to starve, she
preaches how important proper nutrition is for
building bulk!

...Maybe I should leave this to the priestesses.
passages.content_zh:
人魚市長：
非常感謝您的幫忙！ \!
你已經承擔了我的責任
對我的人民來說更容易承受。

人魚市長：
事實上，菲蒂娜對此有何感想？ \！
它讓我的重物變得更輕...

但我不認為她希望我們挨餓，她
宣講適當的營養對於
建築散裝！

……也許我應該把這個留給女祭司們。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant
passages.content:
Hadea Devotee:
Welcome, welcome!\!
You've come to the right place for quality and
low low prices!

She holds up a pair of seashells.

Are you looking for the new summer styles?

She holds up another pair of nearly identical
seashells.

Or are you looking for something more
classic?
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞奉獻者：
歡迎，歡迎！ \！
您來對地方了，追求品質和品質
價格低低！

她舉起一對貝殼。

您在尋找夏季新款式嗎？

她舉起另一雙幾乎一模一樣的
貝殼。

或者您正在尋找更多東西
經典？

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Shopper
passages.content:
Florauna Devotee:
Time for a new style!
passages.content_zh:
弗羅納信徒：
是時候換一種新風格了！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Shopper
passages.content:
Florauna Devotee:
I don't know, starfish always chafe for me...
passages.content_zh:
弗羅納信徒：
我不知道，海星總是讓我煩惱...

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant
passages.content:
Hadea Devotee:
I'm selling exotic surface fashions!\!
Try something you've never tried before-

Hadea Devotee:
Oh.\!
Surfacers.\!
Hm.

She gives you a considering look.

Hadea Devotee:
Looking for a taste of home? Something
familiar and reliable?
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞奉獻者：
我正在銷售異國情調的表面時裝！ \！
嘗試一些你以前從未嘗試過的事情——

哈迪亞奉獻者：
哦。 \!
表面處理劑。 \!
嗯。

她給你一個若有所思的表情。

哈迪亞奉獻者：
尋找家的味道嗎？某件事
熟悉且可靠？

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant — p1
passages.content:
Hadea Devotee:
Fish on a stick!\!
Get your fish on a stick!

They're like fish, but also on a stick!
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞奉獻者：
魚在棍子上！ \！
把你的魚掛在棍子上！

它們就像魚，但也掛在棍子上！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant — p2
passages.content:
Hadea Devotee:
Shark on a stick!\!
Get your shark on a stick!

It's like shark, but also on a stick!
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞奉獻者：
棍上的鯊魚！ \！
把你的鯊魚綁在棍子上！

它就像鯊魚，但也是在棍子上！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Earth devotee
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
When times are tough I like to remind myself
of the Goddess Earth's profound words:

"Press A to turn on and off your ARG glasses.
It may reveal new things about your
surroundings!"
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
當困難的時候我喜歡提醒自己
大地女神深刻的話語：

「按 A 開啟和關閉您的 ARG 眼鏡。
它可能會揭示有關您的新事物
周圍環境！ 」

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Bookkeeper — p1
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
Oh, this is no good.

She's doing what you'd call pacing in
someone with legs, staring at surprisingly
intact paper.

Earth Devotee:
With gathering expeditions getting more and
more dangerous our food stores are only
going down.

What to do, what to do...
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
哦，這可不好。

她正在做你所說的踱步
有人有腿，驚訝地盯著
完好無損的紙。

地球奉獻者：
隨著採集探險活動越來越多
我們的食品店更危險
下降。

怎麼辦，怎麼辦…

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Bookkeeper — p2
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
The numbers are working out so much better
now.

Though we wouldn't mind if you came back
and killed another giant shark for us in,
say, four to six months?
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
數字效果好多了
現在。

雖然我們不介意你回來
並為我們殺死了另一條巨型鯊魚，
比如說四到六個月？

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Florana devotee — p1
passages.content:
Florauna Devotee:
If only the sanctuary hadn't been taken over
by monsters, we could beseech the goddesses
for aid!
passages.content_zh:
弗羅納信徒：
如果庇護所沒有被佔領就好了
透過怪物，我們可以祈求女神
尋求援助！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Florana devotee — p2
passages.content:
Florauna Devotee:
Glory to the goddesses, for sending us aid
in our darkest hour!
passages.content_zh:
弗羅納信徒：
榮耀歸於女神，感謝她們為我們提供了援助
在我們最黑暗的時刻！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid — p1
passages.content:
Mermaid:
They may have come for our food, but I'll
defend our water supply with my life!

\n[4]:
...\!
But...\!
You're surrounded by...

\n[4]:
Oh nevermind, I can tell this is going to be
foolish.
passages.content_zh:
美人魚：
他們可能是來吃我們的食物的，但我會
用我的生命保衛我們的水源！

\n[4]:
...\!
但...\！
你被包圍...

\n[4]:
哦，沒關係，我知道這將會是
愚蠢的。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid — p2
passages.content:
Mermaid:
Aha!\!
I was able to keep our water safe just long
enough!
passages.content_zh:
美人魚：
啊哈！ \！
我能夠長期確保我們的水源安全
夠了！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Bed
passages.content: Huh, waterbeds.
passages.content_zh: 呵呵，水床。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant
passages.content:
Hadea Devotee:
Would you care to stay the night?\!
Premium waterbeds for only 50 BE Bucks!

Go to sleep?

Hadea Devotee:
You don't have enough! Come back when you
have money!

Kaede:
Ah, she truly dost follow the goddess's
teachings.

Hadea Devotee:
You'll be back!\!
Everyone sleeps!
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞奉獻者：
你願意留下來過夜嗎？ \!
優質水床只要 50 BE 美元！

睡覺？

哈迪亞奉獻者：
你還不夠！當你回來的時候
有錢！

楓：
啊，果然是追隨女神的
教誨。

哈迪亞奉獻者：
你會回來的！ \!
大家都睡了！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard — p1
passages.content:
Mermaid Guard:
Seasons ago the mermaids lived in harmony.
Then, everything changed when those weird
creatures attacked.
passages.content_zh:
人魚守衛：
幾個季節以前，美人魚和諧相處。
然後，當那些奇怪的事情發生時，一切都改變了
生物受到攻擊。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard — p2
passages.content:
Mermaid Guard:
Seasons ago the mermaids lived in harmony.
Then, everything changed when those weird
creatures attacked.

But I believe you can save the mermaids.
passages.content_zh:
人魚守衛：
幾個季節以前，美人魚和諧相處。
然後，當那些奇怪的事情發生時，一切都改變了
生物受到攻擊。

但我相信你能拯救美人魚。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard — p1
passages.content:
Mermaid Guard:
Thanks for helping out.
passages.content_zh:
人魚守衛：
感謝您的協助。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard — p2
passages.content:
Mermaid Guard:
Attacks have really gone down since you
took care of that monster.\!
Our thanks.
passages.content_zh:
人魚守衛：
自從你出現以來，攻擊確實下降了
照顧了那個怪物。 \！
我們的感謝。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard — p1
passages.content:
Mermaid Guard:
Don't worry, nothing's managed to get through
our guard yet.

\}If only we had more food...
passages.content_zh:
人魚守衛：
別擔心，什麼都沒有成功
我們的守衛還沒有。

\}如果我們有更多食物就好了…

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid guard — p2
passages.content:
Mermaid Guard:
Don't worry, nothing's managed to get through
our guard yet.

\}Though I'm getting a little sick of shark...
passages.content_zh:
人魚守衛：
別擔心，什麼都沒有成功
我們的守衛還沒有。

\}雖然我有點厭倦鯊魚了...

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermayor trigger — p1
passages.content:
Mermayor:
Oh praise be, praise be! I was so worried
when I heard Mermary was late getting back.

I wish we didn't have to send out gatherers
like her, but those creatures out there are
keeping us from so much of our food!

We can often sneak past them, but I worry
every time. You have my gratitude and the
whole village's for saving her!\!
Oh, you must truly be sent by the goddesses!

Kaede:
Pardon, but which goddesses does thou refer
to?

Mermayor:
Do you not know of the Divine Sisters?

Florauna, whose heart ever blossoms with
kindness and love.\!
Hadea, who grants us a properly compensated
fraction of all the wealth of the world.

Fittina, who teaches us to bear our burdens
and opens the stuck jar lids of our hearts.\!
And Earth, whose wisdom grants us a tutorial
for our lives.

Kaede:
I dost know them well!

She gives the rest of you a significant look.

Kaede:
How wonderful it is to see that even those who
dwell far from the surface canst see the self-
evident truth of their glory!

Mermayor:
Oh yes, we've honored the goddesses ever
since that long ago day when we first
discovered their temple.

And since then we've lived by their ways and
been amply rewarded for our faith!

Kaede:
So their temple lies near?\!
Please, say that thou knows a way within!

Mermayor:
Oh yes, how could we live without a way to
see the glories within that connect us to the
goddesses?

\..\..\..\..Except.

Kaede:
Prithee, what troubles thee?

Mermayor:
Oh, if only you had come a few weeks ago!\!
You've seen the horrible creatures outside,
the ones that infest everywhere?

They're just the hangers-on of a horrible
horrible monster!

It tore through all our defenses and settled
down in the most holy inner sanctum!

We've had to block off the tunnel to keep it
from getting in here.\!
I hated to do it, but the risks to everyone were
just too high!

Kaede:
Such horrors! Mine heart bleeds for thy plight!

Mermayor:
Still, please, let us give you what hospitality
we can!

It's the least we c
passages.content_zh:
人魚市長：
哦，讚美吧，讚美吧！我很擔心
當我聽說梅瑪麗回來晚了。

我希望我們不必派出採集者
像她一樣，但是外面的那些生物
讓我們遠離這麼多的食物！

我們常常可以偷偷溜過去，但我擔心
每次。你有我的感激之情和
全村人都來救她！ \！
哦，你果然是女神派來的！

楓：
抱歉，你指的是哪位女神？
到？

人魚市長：
你不知道神姊妹嗎？

Florauna，她的心永遠綻放
善良和愛。 \！
哈迪亞，給予我們適當的補償
世界財富的一小部分。

菲蒂娜，教我們承擔自己的重擔
並打開我們心中卡住的罐蓋。 \！
還有地球，它的智慧為我們提供了教程
為了我們的生活。

楓：
我確實很了解他們！

她給了你們其他人一個意味深長的眼神。

楓：
看到即使是那些
遠離表面才能看到自我
他們的榮耀顯而易見！

人魚市長：
哦，是的，我們曾經尊敬過女神
自從很久以前我們第一次的那一天起
發現了他們的寺廟。

從那時起我們就按照他們的方式生活
我們的信仰得到了豐厚的回報！

楓：
那麼他們的寺廟就在附近？ \！
請說你知道其中的一條路！

人魚市長：
哦，是的，如果沒有辦法我們怎麼能生活
看到內在的榮耀，將我們與世界連結起來
女神？

\..\..\..\..除了。

楓：
請問，有什麼煩惱嗎？

人魚市長：
哦，如果你幾週前來就好了！ \！
你看過外面可怕的生物，
那些到處感染的病毒？

他們只是一個可怕的人的依附者
可怕的怪物！

它撕裂了我們所有的防禦並安定下來
就在最神聖的內殿之中！

我們不得不封鎖隧道才能保留它
從進入這裡開始。 \!
我討厭這樣做，但每個人都面臨風險
太高了！

楓：
真是太恐怖了！我的心為你的困境而流血！

人魚市長：
不過，請讓我們給您怎樣的款待
我們可以！

這是我們至少可以做到的

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
Mermaid:
Thank you so much for your help!\!
I need to drop off this food, but make yourself
at home!

She swims off into the cavern.
passages.content_zh:
美人魚：
非常感謝您的幫忙！ \!
我需要把這些食物丟掉，但是你自己做吧
在家裡！

她遊進洞穴。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Earth devotee — p1
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
Did you know?

If your food supply gets taken out by
invasive species your whole town may starve!
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
你知道嗎？

如果您的食物供應被耗盡
入侵物種可能會讓你的整個城鎮挨餓！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Earth devotee — p2
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
Did you know?

Eating the flesh of your enemies is a delicious
way to destress!
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
你知道嗎？

吃敵人的肉是一種美味
減壓方式！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Earth devotee
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
When times are tough I like to remind myself
of the Goddess Earth's profound words:

"Expand your chest to breathe in! Contract it
to breathe out!"
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
當困難的時候我喜歡提醒自己
大地女神深刻的話語：

「擴張你的胸部來吸氣！收縮它
呼吸！ 」

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
Hadea Devotee:
...Increase the price another 40%?\!
Don't mind if I do...
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞奉獻者：
……價格再漲40%？ \!
別介意我這樣做...

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee:
...\!
...\!
...

LIFT HEAVY THINGS!
passages.content_zh:
菲蒂娜信徒：
...\!
...\!
…

舉起重物！

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
...what did you idiots do now...
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
……你們這些白痴現在做了什麼…

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Stalagmite top — p1
passages.content:
There's a sign on the rock pillar.

TEMPLE CLOSED BECAUSE OF MONSTER\!
SERIOUSLY, DON'T GO THERE
passages.content_zh:
石柱上有一個標誌。

寺廟因怪物而關閉！
說真的，不要去那裡

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Stalagmite top — p2
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
Are you ready to go to the inner sanctum?

She leads you through a series of tunnels.
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
你準備好去內殿了嗎？

她帶領你穿過一系列隧道。

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
Fittina Priestess:
Welcome to the shrine of Fittina!\!
Here we honor the goddess's great
commandment.

MOVE HEAVY THINGS!
passages.content_zh:
菲蒂娜女祭司：
歡迎來到菲蒂娜神社！ \！
在這裡我們致敬女神的偉大
誡命。

移動重物！

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee:
LIFT HEAVY THINGS!
passages.content_zh:
菲蒂娜信徒：
舉起重物！

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee:
PUSH HEAVY THINGS!
passages.content_zh:
菲蒂娜信徒：
推重物！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Lift mermaid
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee 1:
LIFT HEAVY THINGS!

Fittina Devotee 2:
PUSH HEAVY THINGS!

Fittina Devotee 1:
LIFT HEAVY THINGS!

Fittina Devotee 2:
PUSH HEAVY THINGS!

Kaede:
Ah yes, the Liftists and the Pushites have
ever feuded within the cult.
passages.content_zh:
Fittina 奉獻者 1：
舉起重物！

Fittina 奉獻 2：
推重物！

Fittina 奉獻者 1：
舉起重物！

Fittina 奉獻 2：
推重物！

楓：
啊，是的，Liftists 和 Pushites 已經
在邪教內部曾經有過爭鬥。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Push mermaid
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee 1:
LIFT HEAVY THINGS!

Fittina Devotee 2:
PUSH HEAVY THINGS!

Fittina Devotee 1:
LIFT HEAVY THINGS!

Fittina Devotee 2:
PUSH HEAVY THINGS!

Kaede:
Ah yes, 'tis always been the doctrinal conflict
of those who follow Fittina.
passages.content_zh:
Fittina 奉獻者 1：
舉起重物！

Fittina 奉獻 2：
推重物！

Fittina 奉獻者 1：
舉起重物！

Fittina 奉獻 2：
推重物！

楓：
啊，是的，這一直是教義衝突
關注 Fittina 的人。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Maze reset
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee:
Have you tried the push maze? It's great,
isn't it!

She looks at you with big eyes.

Fittina Devotee:
Please tell me you need it reset. Please.

Reset boulder positions?

Fittina Devotee:
Hooray!\!
PUSH HEAVY THINGS!

She shoves all the boulders back to their
starting locations.

Fittina Devotee:
Soon though, right?
passages.content_zh:
菲蒂娜信徒：
你嘗試過推迷宮嗎？太棒了，
不是嗎！

她用大眼睛看著你。

菲蒂娜信徒：
請告訴我您需要重置。請。

重置巨石位置？

菲蒂娜信徒：
萬歲！ \！
推重物！

她把所有的巨石推回原處
起始地點。

菲蒂娜信徒：
不過很快，對吧？

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant
passages.content:
Hadea Priestess:
Here we worship Hadea, she who rules over
all wealth both above and below the surface.

And you can too for a reasonable fee!
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞女祭司：
在這裡我們崇拜哈迪亞，她是統治者
表面以上和以下的所有財富。

您也可以支付合理的費用！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant
passages.content:
Hadea Priestess:
It's 25 bucks to swim in the gold pile.

Kaede:
Perhaps we might save such pursuits for
another time?\!
\}'Tis never as fun as thou expects...
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞女祭司：
在金堆裡游泳要花25美元。

楓：
也許我們可以把這樣的追求留到
下次？ \！
\}這從來沒有你想像的那麼有趣...

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant — p1
passages.content:
Hadea Priestess:
Friend, you look like you're having a hard
time.

Like things have been changing recently and
it's leaving you behind. \!
Like life has been beating you up and pushing
you around.

I'm here to help.\!
One of the greatest sources of stress in life
is worrying about the things we don't have
control over.

But if you're able to let go of some of that
worry, if you're able to build a sense of
acceptance, it can help you to deal with it
all.

And that's what I can help you with!\!
...for three hundred bucks.

Purchase a calming sense of acceptance for
300 BE Bucks?

Hadea Priestess:
Friend, I'm here to help with the things in life
we can't change.

But first there are some things you do have
the power to address!

Like getting more money. Come back when
you have enough.

Calming sense of acceptance acquired!

Hadea Priestess:
I hope that helps.

Hadea Priestess:
The first step in getting better is always
deciding we want to change.

I hope you reach that point someday.\!
\}Cheapskate.
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞女祭司：
朋友，你看起來很難受
時間。

就像最近事情發生了變化
它把你拋在了後面。 \！
就像生活一直在毆打你並推動你
你周圍。

我是來幫忙的。 \!
生活中最大的壓力來源之一
擔心我們沒有的東西
控制。

但如果你能夠放棄其中的一些
擔心，如果你能夠建立一種感覺
接受，它可以幫助你處理它
所有。

這就是我可以幫助你的！ \!
……三百塊。

購買一種平靜的接受感
300 是雄鹿？

哈迪亞女祭司：
朋友，我來這裡是為了幫助解決生活中的事情
我們無法改變。

但首先你有一些東西
解決的權力！

喜歡得到更多的錢。什麼時候回來
你已經夠了。

獲得平靜的接受感！

哈迪亞女祭司：
我希望這有幫助。

哈迪亞女祭司：
變得更好的第一步永遠是
決定我們想要改變。

我希望有一天你能達到這一點。 \!
\}小氣鬼。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant — p2
passages.content:
Hadea Devotee:
Remember the three steps to less stress:

1. Figure out what you do and do not control.\!
2. Let go of the need to change what cannot
be controlled.\!
3. Give me all your money.
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞奉獻者：
記住減輕壓力的三個步驟：

1. 弄清楚你能做什麼和不能控制什麼。 \!
2. 放棄改變無法改變的事情
被控制。 \!
3. 把你所有的錢都給我。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant
passages.content:
Hadea Priestess:
Absolutions, get your absolutions here!\!
Forgiveness for all the horrible things you
may or may not have done!

She notices you.

Hadea Priestess:
Greetings, can I interest you in divine
forgiveness?

Fifty percent more forgiven than the leading
goddess!

Purchase absolution?

Hadea Priestess:
I forgive you for not having enough to pay me.\!
But can you forgive yourself?

Hadea Priestess:
Do you sometimes think bad things about
people, or have the urge to do horrible things?

And you worry that makes you a bad person
even if you would never act on them?

She pats you on the shoulder.

Don't worry. Everyone gets that sort of thought
sometimes. It's just part of being mermaid.\!
Er, human.

What really matters, and the only thing
people will see, are your actions. And actions
are what make the world around us.

If everyone in the world had horrible thoughts
but only did good actions we would be living in
a paradise. Especially compared to the reverse.

If you do good things then you are a good
person, period.

She gives you another shoulder pat.

Hadea Priestess:
I hope that helps.

Hadea Priestess:
I forgive you for not having enough to pay me.\!
But can you forgive yourself?

She slips the money into her satchel.

Hadea Priestess:
Forgiven.\!
This time.

Hadea Priestess:
I forgive you for not having enough to pay me.\!
But can you forgive yourself?

She sucks in a breath through her teeth.

Hadea Priestess:
Oof, that's an intense one.

Are you asking this because you *did* kick
a puppy or because you want to or...

You know what, nevermind. I'm not paid to ask
questions, I just grant absolution.

She solemnly touches you on the head.

Hadea Priestess:
Forgiveness granted.\!
\}Please don't make me regret this.

Hadea Priestess:
Forgiveness for not recognizing a good deal
comes for free.

It's its own punishment, really.
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞女祭司：
赦免，在這裡得到你的赦免！ \！
寬恕你所有的可怕的事情
可能做了也可能沒有！

她注意到你了。

哈迪亞女祭司：
你好，我可以讓你對神聖有興趣嗎？
寬恕？

比領先產品的寬容度高出百分之五十
女神！

購買赦免？

哈迪亞女祭司：
我原諒你沒有足夠的錢付我。 \!
但你能原諒自己嗎？

哈迪亞女祭司：
你有時會想一些不好的事情嗎
人，或有做可怕事情的衝動？

你擔心這會讓你成為一個壞人
即使你永遠不會對它們採取行動？

她拍拍你的肩膀。

不用擔心。每個人都會有這樣的想法
有時。這只是美人魚的一部分。 \！
呃，人類。

真正重要且唯一的事情
人們會看到的，是你的行動。和行動
是我們周圍世界的組成部分。

如果世界上每個人都有可怕的想法
但只有做好事我們才會活在其中
一個天堂。尤其是與相反的情況相比。

如果你做了好事，那麼你就是個好人
人，時期。

她又拍拍你的肩膀。

哈迪亞女祭司：
我希望這有幫助。

哈迪亞女祭司：
我原諒你沒有足夠的錢付我。 \!
但你能原諒自己嗎？

她把錢塞進書包裡。

哈迪亞女祭司：
原諒。 \!
這次。

哈迪亞女祭司：
我原諒你沒有足夠的錢付我。 \!
但你能原諒自己嗎？

她從牙齒裡吸了一口氣。

哈迪亞女祭司：
噢，那是一場激烈的比賽。

你問這個是因為你「確實」踢了
一隻小狗或因為你想要或...

你知道嗎，沒關係。我沒有付錢去問
問題，我只給予赦免。

她鄭重地撫摸你的頭。

哈迪亞女祭司：
獲得寬恕。 \!
\}請不要讓我後悔。

哈迪亞女祭司：
原諒沒有認識到一筆好交易
免費提供。

這確實是對自己的懲罰。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Merchant
passages.content:
Hadea Devotee:
We knew Hadea loved gold but we didn't used
to know what it *was*.

Then we found a bunch in a shipwreck.\!
Truly, the Golden Goddess smiles upon us!
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞奉獻者：
我們知道哈迪亞喜歡黃金，但我們沒有使用
知道它*是什麼*。

然後我們在沉船中發現了一堆。 \！
真的，金色女神正在向我們微笑！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — n n n n n n n n n
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
When times are tough I like to remind myself
of the Goddess Earth's profound words:

"Press 's' to use field skills! Maybe you'll find
something!"

Earth Devotee:
Sorry, the goddess also tells us not to enable
infinite item bugs!

Earth Devotee:
Good job!

Raw mana acquired!
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
當困難的時候我喜歡提醒自己
大地女神深刻的話語：

「按's'使用野外技能！也許你會發現
有什麼東西！ 」

地球奉獻者：
抱歉，女神也告訴我們不要啟用
無限物品錯誤！

地球奉獻者：
幹得好！

獲得原始法力！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Earth devotee
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
Be careful about going outside!\!
You may be devoured by monsters!
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
出門要小心！ \!
你可能會被怪物吞噬！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Earth devotee
passages.content:
Earth Priestess:
Talk to followers of the Goddess Earth to
receive useful tips.

Like talking to followers of the Goddess Earth!
passages.content_zh:
大地女祭司：
與大地女神的追隨者交談
獲得有用的提示。

就像和大地女神的追隨者交談一樣！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Earth devotee
passages.content:
Earth Devotee:
Press the 'z' key to talk to people!

...Like you're doing now.\!
Which means you must already know this.

Oops.
passages.content_zh:
地球奉獻者：
按“z”鍵與人交談！

……就像你現在所做的那樣。 \！
這意味著您必須已經知道這一點。

哎呀。

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
"Game Mechanics for Dummies.\!
Just, Absolute Morons.\!
Staggeringly Dim Incompetents."
passages.content_zh:
「傻瓜遊戲機制。\!
只是，絕對的白痴。 \！
令人震驚的昏暗無能。 」

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Plants
passages.content: It's plastic.
passages.content_zh: 它是塑膠的。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Farmer Mermaid
passages.content:
Florauna Priestess:
Here we worship our Great Lady of Growing,
the Blossom of our Hearts, the great goddess
Florauna.

Kaede:
Amen.
passages.content_zh:
芙羅娜女祭司：
在這裡我們敬拜我們偉大的成長女士，
我們心中的花朵，偉大的女神
弗洛勞納。

楓：
阿門。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — p1
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
You must be the pilgrims from the surface!\!
I'm so excited to meet you!

We always knew there must be other followers
of the goddesses out there somewhere.\!
Someone had to build the grand temple!

Priestesses have argued for years over who
else might share our love of the Divine Four.\!
Who could have put their devotion to ink and
chisel as they must.

Surfacers?\!
A lost underwater civilizatiion?\!
The goddesses themselves, descending to
share their ways with the world?

If you truly are our fellow believers, the
answer has come at last!\!
\}And Sister Tethys is going to win the entire
pot.

Head Priestess:
It's tragic that you've come just as the
treasures of the inner sanctum are lost to us!

But please, come, we have done our absolute
best to reproduce them.

You step up to the mural painted across the
rear of the chamber.

Head Priestess:
We would never claim to reach the heights of
the temple's divine work, but I do think I can
say we've made a close second.

Behold its glory!

The priestess stares at the mural with starry
eyes.

Head Priestess:
It's always such a joy to see the visages of
the goddesses once more.

Truly, this is the best work our crafters have
ever done!

\n[4]:
Hah!\!
I have to tell you, this art is *everything* I
could have hoped for.

Kaede:
I\..\..\.. truly must give mine respect to the
effort thy artisans must have put in such a
work.

It be truly\..\..\.. unique\..\..\.. in all mine
experiences of the goddesses.

Head Priestess:
That means so much to hear from you!

I knew that this was the pinnacle of our
efforts, but to hear it stands up to the surface
world as well?

Our artists will be ecstatic!

\n[4]:
Do they have souvenirs?\!
Posters?

I want to treasure this moment forever!

\n[2]:
Kaede...\!
Perhaps this will help convince you of what
we've been talking about?

You can see that this fits with everything we've
been saying, right?

Kaede:
Nay!\!
I ken well thy meaning, but this be mere wind
before the rock
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
你們一定是來自地表的朝聖者！ \！
我很高興見到你！

我們一直都知道一定還有其他追蹤者
某處的女神。 \！
必須有人建造這座宏偉的寺廟！

女祭司們多年來一直在爭論誰
否則可能會分享我們對神聖四人組的熱愛。 \！
誰能把自己對水墨的熱愛
鑿子，因為他們必須。

地表者？ \!
失落的水下文明？ \！
女神們降臨到
與世界分享他們的方式？

如果你真的是我們的信徒同工，
答案終於來了！ \!
\}特塞斯修女將贏得整場比賽
鍋。

女祭司長：
悲劇的是你來的正是
我們失去了內殿的寶藏！

但拜託，來吧，我們已經盡了最大努力
最好重現它們。

你走到對面畫的壁畫前
房間的後部。

女祭司長：
我們永遠不會聲稱達到了高度
寺廟的神聖傑作，但我確實認為我可以
說我們已經拿到第二名了。

可見其榮耀！

女祭司滿眼星星地盯著壁畫
眼睛。

女祭司長：
看到他們的臉總是那麼令人高興
女神們再一次。

確實，這是我們工匠最好的作品
曾經做過！

\n[4]:
哈！ \！
我必須告訴你，這門藝術就是我的*一切*
本來可以希望的。

楓：
我\..\..\..確實必須尊重
你的工匠一定付出了這樣的努力
工作。

它確實是\..\..\.. 在我的所有作品中都是獨一無二的\..\..\..
女神們的經驗。

女祭司長：
收到您的來信意義重大！

我知道這是我們的巔峰
努力，但聽到它是表面的
世界也是如此？

我們的藝術家將會欣喜若狂！

\n[4]:
他們有紀念品嗎？ \!
海報？

我想永遠珍惜這一刻！

\n[2]:
楓...\!
也許這會幫助你相信
我們一直在談？

你可以看到這與我們所擁有的一切都相符
一直在說，對吧？

楓：
不！ \！
我明白你的意思，但這只是風
在岩石之前

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Artist Mermaid — p1
passages.content:
Artist:
I am seeking the next great work to honor
the great goddess Florauna.

Now breasts, breasts are nice.\!
They comfort us when the world is hard and
cold.

They remind us of the ever-burgeoning
blessings of the Goddess.

I could never make a work to honor her
without the plush orbs she so favors!\!
But my spirit, it calls for something more.

Another symbol of growth, of soft and curvy
blossoming. \!
One to stand beside breasts and lift our praise
to ever greater heights!

I am searching for a muse.\!
A beauty to open my eyes to new avenues
of blooming.

If only I could find her!

She looks at you and her eyes fly wide.\!
They flick to your massive chest.\!
Your wobbling ass.\!
Back to your chest.

Then linger on your swollen rear.

Artist:
Yes! This is it!

She darts behind you and spreads her arms
as far as they will go around your mammoth
rear.

Artist:
These glorious orbs!\!
Soft yet firm, the hint of hidden muscle that
no breast can show!

A perfect balance of front and back!\!
A glorious symmetry that only heightens the
awe at the goddess's works!
You! You are my muse!\!

The art I shall make of you will put the world
to shame!

She digs in a bag by her side.

Artist:
What tribute could possibly be enough?

Here!\!
Gold!\.\. Jewels!

1000 BE Bucks acquired!
Raw mana acquired!

Artist:
I cannot thank you enough!\!
I must make art!

She darts off into the village, shouting as she
goes.\!
...After taking one last squeeze of your ass.

Artist:
Such bountiful globes! Such glorious spheres!

She looks you up and down.

Artist:
Ah, if I was but content to work in the classic
style, I would make a masterpiece of your
chest.

You are truly blessed by the goddess!

Yet somehow you lack a sense of\., hmm\.,
balance.\!
I need more!\!
There must be more beyond mere chests!

She looks you up and down.

Artist:
Oh, there is certainly something about you.

You see her eyes flick to your swollen rear.

Artist:
Some exotic charm, it is hard to put into
words.

She stare
passages.content_zh:
藝術家：
我正在尋找下一個偉大的作品來表彰
偉大的女神弗洛勞娜。

現在的乳房，乳房很好。 \！
當世界艱難時，他們安慰我們
冷。

它們讓我們想起了不斷發展的
女神的祝福。

我永遠無法創作一部作品來紀念她
沒有她如此喜歡的毛絨球體！ \！
但我的精神，它需要更多的東西。

成長、柔軟和曲線的另一個象徵
開花。 \！
一個站在乳房旁邊並舉起我們的讚美的人
達到更高的高度！

我正在尋找繆斯。 \!
美麗讓我開闊了視野
盛開的。

如果我能找到她就好了！

她看著你，眼睛睜得大大的。 \！
它們彈向你巨大的胸膛。 \！
你那搖搖晃晃的屁股。 \!
回到你的胸口。

然後停留在腫脹的臀部。

藝術家：
是的！就是這樣！

她衝到你身後並張開雙臂
只要他們能繞過你的猛獁象
後方。

藝術家：
這些光榮的球體！ \！
柔軟而堅韌，隱密的肌肉暗示
沒有乳房可以顯示！

前後的完美平衡！ \!
光榮的對稱性只會增強
驚嘆女神的作品！
你！你是我的繆斯！ \!

我將用你創造的藝術將使世界
恥辱！

她掏出身邊的一個袋子。

藝術家：
什麼樣的貢品才夠呢？

這裡！ \！
金子！ \。 \。珠寶！

獲得 1000 BE 雄鹿！
獲得原始法力！

藝術家：
我對你感激不盡！ \！
我一定要創作藝術！

她一邊喊一邊衝進村子。
去。 \!
……最後一次擠壓你的屁股之後。

藝術家：
如此豐富的地球儀！多麼輝煌的球體啊！

她上下打量著你。

藝術家：
啊，如果我只滿足於經典作品就好了
風格，我會為你製作一個傑作
胸部。

你真是受到女神的眷顧了！

但不知怎的，你缺乏一種感覺\.，嗯\.，
平衡。 \!
我需要更多！ \！
除了箱子之外，一定還有更多東西！

她上下打量著你。

藝術家：
哦，你身上確實有一些東西。

你看到她的目光掃向你腫脹的臀部。

藝術家：
有些異域風情，讓人難以投入
的話。

她凝視著

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Pirate
passages.content:
Florauna Priestess:
You there!\!
Are you distressed?\!
Sad?

Missing meaning in your life?

I was once sad and tiny like you.

But let me tell you the cure to all your
troubles:\.\. the goddesses!\!
They all are wonderful, but there's one who
will always have your back.

\}Which is good, because these magnificent
globes might break it otherwise.

The cure for greyness is growth!\!
Grow beyond your sadness, grow beyond your
limits, swell up and show the world you can
stand on its level!

That's right, you need Florauna in your life.\!
Look what she's done for me!

She slaps her enormous chest.\!
The resulting jiggles take minutes to settle
down.

Florauna Priestess:
You can fit so much contentment in these
babies!
passages.content_zh:
芙羅娜女祭司：
你在那裡！ \!
你心疼嗎？ \!
傷心？

你的生活缺少意義嗎？

我曾經像你一樣悲傷和渺小。

但讓我告訴你治癒你所有問題的方法
煩惱：\.\.女神們！ \！
他們都很出色，但有一個人
永遠會支持你。

\}這很好，因為這些宏偉的
否則地球儀可能會破壞它。

治癒灰色的方法是成長！ \！
超越你的悲傷，超越你的成長
極限，膨脹並向世界展示你可以
站在它的水平上！

沒錯，您的生活中需要Florauna。 \！
看看她為我做了什麼！

她拍打著她巨大的胸膛。 \！
由此產生的抖動需要幾分鐘才能解決
下來。

芙羅娜女祭司：
你可以在這些中得到如此多的滿足
寶貝們！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Florauna devotee
passages.content:
Florauna Devotee:
They call me the Hermit Crab, 'cause I keep
outgrowing seashells.

She hefts her massive breasts and smirks.
passages.content_zh:
弗羅納信徒：
