他們叫我寄居蟹，因為我一直
貝殼長大了。

她挺起巨大的乳房，傻笑起來。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Earth devotee
passages.content:
Earth Priestess:
Here we store all the accumulated wisdom of
our people, to be handed out freely as the
goddess demands.

...I thought it would take more bookshelves.
passages.content_zh:
大地女祭司：
在這裡，我們儲存了所有累積的智慧
我們的人民，作為
女神要求。

……我認為需要更多的書架。

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
Fittina Devotee:
They say knowledge is heavy things for your
brain muscles.

She turns back to the book, chanting under
her breath.

Fittina Devotee:
THINK HEAVY THINGS!\!
THINK HEAVY THINGS!
passages.content_zh:
菲蒂娜信徒：
他們說知識對你來說是沉重的事情
大腦肌肉。

她轉回書本，在書本下吟誦
她的呼吸。

菲蒂娜信徒：
想想沉重的事情！ \！
思考重大的事情！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Florauna devotee
passages.content:
Florauna Devotee:
Florauna calls for us to pursue all types of
growth. That's why I study.

\}Also I keep praying it'll go to my boobs.
passages.content_zh:
弗羅納信徒：
Florauna 呼籲我們追求所有類型的
成長。這就是我學習的原因。

\}我也一直祈禱它會到達我的胸部。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mural
passages.content: The,\. uh\., masterpiece of the mermaids.
passages.content_zh: 這，\。呃\.，美人魚的傑作。

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
Priestess:
It's always so inspiring to gaze upon the
goddesses!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司：
凝視著這一切總是那麼令人振奮
女神們！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Shark dishes
passages.content: Shark sashimi.
passages.content_zh: 鯊魚生魚片。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Shark dishes
passages.content: Shark tartare.
passages.content_zh: 韃靼鯊魚。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Shark dishes
passages.content: Shark carpaccio.
passages.content_zh: 鯊魚生牛肉片。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Shark dishes
passages.content: Shark yukhoe.
passages.content_zh: 鯊魚 yukhoe。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Shark dishes
passages.content: Shark mett.
passages.content_zh: 鯊魚梅特。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Shark dishes
passages.content: Big hunks of shark meat.
passages.content_zh: 大塊的鯊魚肉。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Shark dishes
passages.content: Shark kitfo.
passages.content_zh: 鯊魚套件。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid
passages.content:
She's busy stuffing food into her mouth.

Mermaid:
Mmph.\!
So good.
passages.content_zh:
她正忙著往嘴裡塞食物。

美人魚：
嗯。 \!
超好的。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Mermaid
passages.content:
Mermaid:
It feels so good to be able to have a feast
again!
passages.content_zh:
美人魚：
能夠吃一頓盛宴的感覺真好
又來了！

passages.name: Mermaid Village
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
But isn't it disrespectful to the goddesses to
render them looking just like one of us?

Their impossible appearance shows that they
are separate and distinct from the merely
mortal!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
但這不是對女神的不敬嗎？
讓他們看起來像我們中的一員？

他們不可能的外表表明他們
是獨立的並且有別於僅僅
凡人！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Shrine maiden
passages.content:
Florauna Priestess:
Let me tell you about this thing called
"representational art"...
passages.content_zh:
芙羅娜女祭司：
讓我告訴你這個叫做
「具象藝術」...

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Priestess
passages.content:
Priestess:
This is the entrance to the shrine of the four
goddesses!\!
Welcome!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司：
這是四神殿的入口
女神們！ ！ \!
歡迎！

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Well
passages.content: It's full of water?
passages.content_zh: 裡面裝滿水了嗎？

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Farmer Mermaid
passages.content:
Florauna Follower:
The fields are growing so much better since
those creatures stopped attacking.
passages.content_zh:
芙羅娜追隨者：
自從那以後，田地長得好多了
那些生物停止了攻擊。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Scarecrow
passages.content:
It's a surprisingly good likeness of you.

Except way too flat.
passages.content_zh:
這與你驚人地相似。

除了太平坦。

passages.name: Mermaid Village — Debug Tree
passages.content: Gold in them/their hills!
passages.content_zh: 他們/他們的山裡有黃金！

passages.name: Inner Sanctum —
passages.content:
Goddess of Curves\!
(Especially boobs <3)
passages.content_zh:
曲線女神\!
（特別是胸部<3）

passages.name: Inner Sanctum —
passages.content:
Goddess of Microtransactions\!
(And macrotransactions)\!
(And hopefully megatransacations.)\!
(May she bless our every release.)
passages.content_zh:
微交易女神\！
（和宏觀交易）\!
（希望能進行大型交易。）\！
（願她祝福我們的每一次發布。）

passages.name: Inner Sanctum —
passages.content:
Goddess of Fitness\!
(And swole)
passages.content_zh:
健身女神\!
（並且膨脹）

passages.name: Inner Sanctum —
passages.content:
Boring Tutorial Goddess\!
(Yeah, I got nothing.)
passages.content_zh:
無聊的教學女神\！
（是的，我什麼也沒得到。）

passages.name: Inner Sanctum —
passages.content:
The plaque is too damaged to make out more
than a few letters.

\{TW-- G-DDE---- --
----T AN- -----ESS
passages.content_zh:
牌匾損壞太嚴重，看不清楚更多內容
比幾個字母。

\{TW--G-DDE------
----T AN- -----ESS

passages.name: Inner Sanctum
passages.content: I guess every game needs a tutorial?
passages.content_zh: 我想每個遊戲都需要教程吧？

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
It took us quite a while to decide on Florauna's
name.\!
Her working name was Breastia, but it was
decided early on that couldn't be the final one.

Apparently this time we're trying to *not* get
immediately kicked out of app stores.\!
(Prudes.)
passages.content_zh:
我們花了很長時間才決定選擇 Florauna's
名字.\!
她的工作名字是Breastia，但實際上是
很早就決定這不會是最終的。

顯然這次我們試圖*不*得到
立即被踢出應用程式商店。 \!
（正經人。）

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
We considered a lot of different designs for
Florauna.\!
Here's a peek at the concept art testing them
out.
passages.content_zh:
我們考慮了很多不同的設計
弗洛勞納。 \!
這是測試它們的概念藝術
出來。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
A fitness goddess is a new thing for us.\!
Most of us were in favor of just having four
boob goddesses, but app store restrictions
meant we had to hide that a little.

And Luke agreed that she'd finally stop trying
to get the rest of us to pick up running if we
put a fitness goddess in.

And I mostly did!

And hey, maybe if we got players running we
could also sell this as a fitness app.
passages.content_zh:
健身女神對我們來說還是個新鮮事！ \!
我們大多數人贊成只擁有四個
布布女神，但應用程式商店有限制
這意味著我們必須稍微隱藏一下。

盧克同意她最終會停止嘗試
讓我們其他人開始跑步，如果我們
放一個健身女神進去。

我基本上做到了！

嘿，也許如果我們讓球員跑起來
也可以作為健身應用程式出售。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
Hadea came from that universal human
impulse to release a game that sells a billion
copies, get rich and famous, and retire to a
mansion full of solid gold boobs.

...Are we sure that's really universal?

Well all of us want it, so it must be, right?
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞來自那個普遍的人類
發行銷售十億的遊戲的衝動
複製，變得富有和出名，然後退休
充滿純金胸部的豪宅。

……我們確定這真的是普遍的嗎？

好吧，我們所有人都想要它，所以它一定是，對吧？

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
The book is titled "The Simple Guide to
Completely Destroying Any Game, by the
Terra Games Developers".

Book:
Git gud.

That's...\!
That's the only text in it.
passages.content_zh:
這本書的標題是《簡單指南》
徹底摧毀任何遊戲
Terra 遊戲開發商」。

書：
吉特古德。

那是……\！
這是其中唯一的文字。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Whiteboard
passages.content:
Here's a glimpse behind the curtain: the
whiteboard we used to come up with the idea
for this game.
passages.content_zh:
這是幕布後面的一瞥：
我們曾經在白板上提出過這個想法
對於這個遊戲。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
You'd think that getting a new CEO early in
development of Better Earth would have been
a problem, but it only made us stronger.

And younger!

And sexier?
passages.content_zh:
你可能會認為儘早任命新首席執行官
更美好地球的發展本來是
一個問題，但它只會讓我們變得更強大。

而且更年輕！

而且更性感？

passages.name: Inner Sanctum
passages.content:
A scrap of newspaper has drifted in on the
currents. Read it?

It looks like part of the business section.

You leave it alone.
passages.content_zh:
一張報紙飄進了
電流。讀了嗎？

它看起來像是業務部分的一部分。

你就別管它了。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum
passages.content:
How do you like Fittina's creed, 'LIFT HEAVY
THINGS'?

We really wanted something deep, something
philosophical.\!
Something that covered the entirety of the
humanish experience.

And one day, while staring at Anthony's ever-
growing chest, it came to us.\!
Lifting heavy things is something that both
the busty and the fit can agree on!
passages.content_zh:
您覺得 Fittina 的信條「LIFT HEAVY」怎麼樣？
東西？

我們真的想要一些有深度的東西
哲學。 \!
覆蓋了整個的東西
人性化的體驗。

有一天，當我盯著安東尼的時候——
越來越大的胸膛，它走向我們。 \！
舉起重物是一件既要
豐滿和身材都能達成一致！

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
// Stick figure

Here's a look at some of the early concept
art for Fittina.\!
We thought this version was okay, but it was
missing something.

It just didn't have the life we were looking for.

Then one of our artists got a flash of
inspiration and spent a day working up a
completely new design.

// Stick figure with tail

A big improvement, wouldn't you say?
passages.content_zh:
//簡筆畫

這是一些早期的概念
菲蒂娜的藝術。 \!
我們以為這個版本還可以，但事實證明
缺少一些東西。

它只是沒有我們想要的生活。

然後我們的一位藝術家突然靈光一現
靈感並花了一天的時間製作
全新設計。

// 有尾巴的簡筆畫

你不說這是一個很大的進步嗎？

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
Some of our design goals for the game:\!
-Boobs.\!
-More boobs.\!
-Not too much boobs to stay on apps stores?

-Fun to play.\!
-Monster girls are hot right now.\!
-$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$\!
-$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$$

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
Hadea may be our goddess of money, but we
didn't want to turn her into some sort of
pay-to-win mechanic.

\..\..\..We wanted to save that for DLC.\!
*Expensive* DLC.
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞可能是我們的金錢女神，但我們
不想把她變成某種
付費獲勝機制。

\..\..\..我們想將其儲存為 DLC。 \！
*昂貴* DLC。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum —
passages.content:
So we didn't want to make Florauna *too*
busty, so that we didn't get kicked out of app
stores.

But side characters have a lot more slack.\!
Like a busty foxgirl sidekick!\!
Or a catgirl!\!
Or a foxgirl that turns into a catgirl!

Once you get past the intro the app store will
check she could be the one who shows up for
the goddess.

Profit!\!
And (   .   )(   .   )!

Kaede glares at the note.
passages.content_zh:
所以我們不想讓 Florauna *也*
豐滿，這樣我們就不會被踢出應用程式
商店。

但配角有較多的鬆弛。 \！
就像一個豐滿的狐狸女孩夥伴！ \！
或者是貓女！ \!
或是變成貓女的狐女！

一旦你通過了介紹，應用程式商店就會
檢查她是否會出現
女神。

利潤！ \！
和 （ 。 ）（ 。 ）！

楓瞪著紙條。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
So why a nature goddess?\!
Well, who doesn't like green and growing
things?

Plus, we can let you in on a little secret.\!
I know you're probably thinking of like flowers
when she talks about growing and blossoming.

But we're really hinting at other things growing.\!
You might be able to guess what.

God, we're so good at being subtle!
passages.content_zh:
那為什麼是自然女神呢？ \！
好吧，誰不喜歡綠色和生長
東西？

另外，我們可以告訴您一個小秘密。 \！
我知道你可能正在想像花一樣
當她談到成長和開花時。

但我們確實在暗示其他事情正在成長。 \！
你也許能猜到是什麼。

天啊，我們真是太擅長狡猾了！

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
Welcome!\!
Congratulations on finding the developer's
room!

We hope you enjoy hearing some of our
thoughts on making Better Earth the success
it is.

(Please say it's a success. Please.)
passages.content_zh:
歡迎！ \！
恭喜您找開發商
房間！

我們希望您喜歡聽到我們的一些內容
關於讓地球更美好的成功想法
是的。

（請說這是成功的。拜託。）

passages.name: Inner Sanctum
passages.content:
The broken statue makes a few glitchy noises,
but nothing else.
passages.content_zh:
破碎的雕像發出一些刺耳的聲音，
但沒有別的。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum
passages.content:
Hadea being the goddess of both wealth and
the underworld is actually a reference to the
Roman god Pluto!

Pluto was originally another name for the
Greek god Hades, well-known god of the
underworld.

But his domain over all things below the
ground meant that he also became
associated with mineral wealth, as well as the
seeds needed for a bountiful harvest.

That's why Hadea is so into gold!

...

What?\!
I was a classics major!

And now you're working *here*?

The ancients got horny too...
passages.content_zh:
哈迪亞 (Hadea) 是財富女神和女神
地獄其實是指
羅馬神普路托！

冥王星原本是冥王星的另一個名字
希臘神哈迪斯，著名的冥界之神
黑社會。

但他的管轄範圍是以下的一切
地面意味著他也成為
與礦產資源以及
豐收所需的種子。

這就是哈迪亞如此熱衷於黃金的原因！

…

什麼？ \！
我是古典學專業的！

現在你*在這裡*工作？

古人也太貪心了…

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Commentary
passages.content:
Hadea was originally going to just be named
Hades, but someone made a typo that none
of us caught until production.

Probably better this way, Hades is a different
game.
passages.content_zh:
Hadea 原本只是被命名為
哈迪斯，但有人打錯字了，沒有
我們中的一些人被抓到生產。

也許這樣更好，哈迪斯是不同的
遊戲。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Autoplay — p1
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
The sanctum and the horrible monster that's
taken our goddesses away from us are just
ahead.

Good luck!\!
I'll wait here for you.

Or your hideously mangled bodies.
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
聖殿和可怕的怪物
把我們的女神從我們身邊奪走只是
前面。

祝你好運！ \！
我會在這裡等你。

或者你那殘破不堪的屍體。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Final priestess — p1
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
Do you need to go back to the village?
No one will blame you if you don't want to
face the monster!

Return to the village?
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
需要回村子嗎？
如果你不願意，沒有人會怪你
面對怪物！

回村子？

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Final priestess — p2
passages.content:
Head Priestess:
That was amazing!\!
The goddesses truly smile upon you!

Kaede:
Thank you, we art truly glad to have aided
thee in thy time of need.

But I find myself in sore need of mine bed.\!
Wouldst thou mind leading us back to thy
village?

A long road lies ahead of us before we might
make it back to the surface.

Head Priestess:
I can, but...\!

Kaede:
But what?\!
Is there still aught amiss?

If not, the sooner we turn our steps towards
home the sooner completed.

Head Priestess:
I understand, but...\!
If you want to go back why not just swim
there?

She swims up high enough to easily clear
rocks around you, then back down.

\n[4]:
\{WE COULD HAVE DONE THAT
THE WHOLE TIME?!?!?!

You swim back to the entrance to the sound
of \n[4]'s grumbles.

Heade Priestess:
And here we are!

Now, if you'll excuse me, I have a
shark-harvesting mission to organize and a
shark feast to put together.

Thank you again!

She swims off.
passages.content_zh:
女祭司長：
太棒了！ \!
女神們真的對你微笑！

楓：
謝謝，我們真的很高興能提供協助
在你需要的時候。

但我發現自己非常需要我的床。 \！
你介意帶我們回到你的身邊嗎？
村莊？

在我們實現目標之前，還有很長的路要走
使其回到表面。

女祭司長：
我可以，但是...\！

楓：
但什麼？ \！
難道還有什麼問題嗎？

如果沒有，我們越早轉向
回家越早完成。

女祭司長：
我明白，但是…\！
如果你想回去為什麼不去游泳
在那裡？

她游得夠高，可以輕鬆清除
在你周圍晃動，然後後退。

\n[4]:
\{我們本來可以這麼做的
一直以來？ ！ ？ ！ ？ ！

你遊回聲音的入口
\n[4] 的抱怨聲。

海德女祭司：
我們到了！

現在，請原諒我，我有一個
組織鯊魚捕撈任務並
鯊魚盛宴放在一起。

再次感謝您！

她遊走了。

passages.name: Inner Sanctum — Boss battle — p1
passages.content:
Kaede:
Ah, now this dost be the sanctum I remember!

'Tis a bit worn, but soon thou shalt see the
true wonders of the goddesses!

You spot something moving in the depths of
the temple.

Kaede:
But first, a spot of pest disposal!

Kaede dusts off her hands as the shark
slumps to the ground.

Kaede:
Now that we havest finished our cleaning,
the time hast come for glories!\!
Wonderments!

Truly, thou shouldst count thyselves lucky to
be the first mortals in ages to see the beauty
of the goddesses' sanctuary.

...

The first landdweller mortals.

But which shouldst we view first?\!
There art so many choices!

But of course...

She leads you farther into the temple.

Kaede:
Here ist the room devoted to mine own
goddess.

And here upon the wall be the crowning jewel
of her works.

Behold! The great mural, "The Many Faces of
Florauna!"

You all take a look.

\n[2]:
Are you sure 'faces' is the right word? It seems
to be focusing on something else...

\n[4]:
Hah!\!
Yes, exactly what I expected!

Kaede:
What devilry ist this?!\!
This be not the great work I recall!

\n[2] squints at the plaque underneath the
picture.

\n[2]:
It says this is "early concept art for that
nature goddess"?

Kaede:
Stuff and nonsense!\!
I know not what couldst have bewitched yon
mural, but surely it canst not have tainted all!

She pulls a book from the shelf.

Kaede:
What of the ancient lore of the Great Lady's
primal beginnings?

\n[4] reads over her shoulder.

\n[4]:
"We first planned to name the goddess
'Breastia'"?\!
Of course those foolish morons did.

Kaede stares at the book in disbelief.

Kaede:
How canst this be?!\!
All of the Great Lady of Blossoming's works,
attainted!

She rushes over to another alcove.

Kaede:
Great Fittina!\!
Didst thy arms of swole better weather this
storm?

\n[4] examines the statue.

\n[4]:
"Luke promised she'd stop trying to get us to
all take up running if we included a fitness
goddess."

\n[2]:
Oh, that wolfgirl we fought at Terra Games?

\n[4]:
Obviousl
passages.content_zh:
楓：
啊，現在這就是我記憶中的聖所了！

有點破舊，但很快你就會看到
女神真正的奇蹟！

你發現有東西在深處移動
寺廟。

楓：
但首先，要有一個害蟲處理點！

楓像鯊魚一樣撣掉雙手的灰塵
倒在地上。

楓：
現在我們已經完成了清潔工作
榮耀的時刻已經到來！ \!
奇蹟！

確實，你應該認為自己很幸運
成為有史以來第一個看到美麗的凡人
女神的聖殿。

…

第一批凡人陸地居民。

但我們該先看哪一個？ \!
藝術有這麼多選擇！

但當然...

她帶領你進一步進入寺廟。

楓：
這是我自己的房間
女神。

牆上這就是皇冠上的寶石
她的作品。

看哪！偉大的壁畫“多面”
弗洛勞娜！ 」

大家都來看看吧。

\n[2]:
您確定“面孔”這個詞是正確的嗎？看來
專注於其他事情...

\n[4]:
哈！ \！
是的，正是我所期望的！

楓：
這是什麼鬼東西？ ！ \！
這不是我記憶中的偉大作品！

\n[2] 瞇著眼睛看著下面的牌匾
圖片。

\n[2]:
它說這是“早期的概念藝術”
自然女神”？

楓：
廢話和廢話！ \!
我不知道是什麼讓你著迷
壁畫，但它肯定不會污染一切！

她從書架上拿出一本書。

楓：
關於偉大女士的古老傳說是怎樣的
最初的開始？

\n[4] 越過她的肩膀閱讀。

\n[4]:
「我們一開始打算幫女神取個名字
‘布瑞斯蒂亞’”？ \!
當然，那些愚蠢的白痴做到了。

楓難以置信地盯著這本書。

楓：
怎麼會這樣？ ！ \！
花花大小姐的全部作品，
達到了！

她衝向另一個壁龕。

楓：
偉大的菲蒂娜！ \！
你的手臂在這個天氣裡腫了嗎？
風暴？

\n[4] 檢查雕像。

\n[4]:
「盧克答應她不會再試圖讓我們
如果我們包括健身的話，所有人都會跑步
女神。 」

\n[2]:
哦，我們在 Terra Games 打過的狼女？

\n[4]:
顯而易見

passages.name: Inner Sanctum
passages.content:
Priestess:
It's so good to get back into the temple!
passages.content_zh:
女祭司：
能回到寺廟真是太好了！

passages.name: Inner Sanctum
passages.content:
Priestess:
Did you see?\!
Aren't the pictures of the goddesses glorious?!

passages.name: CommonEvent — Command help
passages.content:
This game uses a few extra commands.

To switch between the normal view and the
magic view, hit the 'X' button. By default, this
is bound to the 'A' key on the keyboard.

To use a field skill, hit the 'Y' button. By
default, this is bound to the 'S' key on the
keyboard.

If you're having trouble getting these to work,
F1 should let you rebind the keys.

Enjoy!
passages.content_zh:
這個遊戲使用了一些額外的指令。

在普通視圖和普通視圖之間切換
魔法視圖，點擊“X”按鈕。預設情況下，這
綁定到鍵盤上的“A”鍵。

若要使用現場技能，請點選“Y”按鈕。由
預設情況下，這綁定到上的“S”鍵
鍵盤。

如果你在讓這些功能發揮作用時遇到困難，
F1 應該可以讓您重新綁定按鍵。

享受！

passages.name: CommonEvent — Upgrade companions
passages.content:
Goddess Florauna:
Who would you like me to examine?

Goddess Florauna:
Dear, that must be so uncomfortable!

She plucks at a few of the ropes around
.

Goddess Florauna:
Why, I'm sure I have just the thing to take
care of this!

She pauses for a moment.

Goddess Florauna:
But I'm not sure your body could take the
magic!

Please, come back at level 10, and I'll have
you fixed up in a jiffy!

Goddess Florauna:
Darling, that looks so uncomfortable!

Stand back and let a goddess help!\!
Why, I can just wave my hands and untie
those!

She does so, ribbons of light trailing behind
her fingers.

's shirt glows, splits down the front,
then flops open.

Goddess Florauna:
Perhaps that's the wrong approach.\.\.
I'll just make those pesky ropes vanish!

She waves her hands again, ribbons of light
flowing out to wrap  in radiance.

With a sad little *pop*, 's pants
disappear.

Goddess Florauna:
Darling, I must apologize, but those were
warm-ups!

Truly, I don't know what I was thinking. I'm
a goddess of growth, of abundance!\.\.
I'll just grow those pesky ropes until you can
step right out of them.

She waves her hands one more time.\.\.
The ropes on  start to glow,
brighter and brighter.

Then split, half moving down to wrap her legs.

Goddess Florauna:
Well!\!
That didn't go as planned!

Priestess, make a note. Ropes are
complicated!

I'm afraid I'm going to have to consider this.\!
But don't worry, darling!  You have a goddess
on your side!

Goddess Florauna:
Sorry, still considering!

Goddess Florauna:
Ah, darling, I see you're following the path of
magic!

She looks  up and down.

Goddess Florauna:
Oh yes, you've got a simply marvelous aura!\!
I think you could go far!

She pauses.

Goddess Florauna:
Though you're lacking a certain...\.\.\.
Hmm, how to express it.

The goddess starts making vague motions
with her hands.

Goddess Florauna:
The capacity to, um,...\.\.\.
It's a certain mystical gravitas...\.\.\.
Or perhaps a spiritual heft, a *

passages.name: CommonEvent — Muscles
passages.content:
You flex. You're looking a little more fit these
days. Nothing big, but noticeable.

You've got some muscle definition, like you
make it to the gym regularly. You don't, but
you're not going to complain.

Large, well-defined muscles ripple under your
skin as you move. You look pretty ripped, like
you spend a lot of time at the gym.

You check out under your shirt.\.\.
Abs!\.\.
You have an actual six-pack!

You look like a weightlifter.\!
One of the ones who go for strength, not
the kind that goes for definition only.

Bulging muscles add a layer of definition to
your entire frame, bulking you out.\!
And when you flex?\.\. You're pretty sure you
could burst a shirt if you tried.

You are RIPPED.\!
You look like you live at the gym and eat
nothing but protein powder.

Heck, you could probably *make* protein
powder by grating meat on your perfect,
perfect abs.

You look like the winner of a bodybuilding
competition.\!
You look like the winner of *every*
bodybuilding competition.

Anatomy students occasionally gather around
you, begging to trace your perfectly defined
muscles.
passages.content_zh:
你彎曲。你看起來更適合這些
天。沒什麼大不了的，但很引人注目。

你有一些肌肉的定義，就像你一樣
定期去健身房。你不知道，但是
你不會抱怨的。

寬大、輪廓分明的肌肉在你的身下蕩漾
當你移動時皮膚。你看起來很破爛，就像
你花了很多時間在健身房。

你檢查一下你的襯衫下面。 \.\.
絕對！ \.\.
你擁有真正的六塊肌！

你看起來像個舉重運動員。 \!
那些追求力量而不是追求力量的人之一
僅用於定義的類型。

凸出的肌肉為輪廓增添了一層輪廓
你的整個框架，讓你變得臃腫。 \！
當你彎曲時？ \.\.你很確定你
如果你嘗試的話，襯衫可能會爆裂。

你被撕裂了。 \!
你看起來就像住在健身房並吃飯
除了蛋白粉什麼都沒有。

哎呀，你可能可以「製造」蛋白質
將肉磨碎，磨成粉末，
完美的腹肌。

你看起來像健美冠軍
競爭。 \!
你看起來像是*所有*的贏家
健美比賽。

解剖學的學生偶爾會聚集在一起
你，乞求追蹤你完美的定義
肌肉。

passages.name: CommonEvent — Drink Milkshake
passages.content:
You drink the milkshake.

It's the most delicious milkshake you've
ever had!

Though it feels like it goes straight to your
hips.

Though it feels like it goes straight to your
ass.

// TF - adding is TRUE if we are adding to the TF level and
FALSE if we are subtracting.
passages.content_zh:
你喝奶昔。

這是你喝過的最美味的奶昔
曾經有過！

雖然感覺就像它直接到達你的
臀部。

雖然感覺就像它直接到達你的
屁股。

如果我們進行減法，則為 FALSE。

passages.name: CommonEvent — Cowchange
passages.content:
// This changes the level of cow transformation. If TF - adding is
TRUE, then we're increasing it by one. If FALSE, we're decreasing it
by one.

// The TF can only be increased up to Cowmax.  This limit will be
increased by quests and special items, while relatively more
common items and events will only increase the TF itself and not
the limit.

// I'm assuming any adding will be done up to the maximum.
If the current TF type isn't cow, first decrement that until it's gone.
Then increment cow until it's at max.

You pause for a moment as images of green
grassy fields pass through your head.

You feel bovine power flow through you.\!
And settle in your chest.

MAT +5!

You feel a weird pressure in your forehead
for a moment. \.\.
It slowly fades.

Your chest warms as more power flows into
you.\!
MDF +5!
Cowgirl's Pride learned!

You're distracted from the feeling by a sudden
sharp pain in your temples.  \!
Reaching up as it fades, you find two small
bumps just above your hairline.

What's happening to you?

There's another stab of pain as you feel the
skin split on the two lumps on your head.\!
With a strange sliding sensation, you feel
something hard grow out of them.

Reaching up, you feel short horns, maybe two
inches long, sticking out of your head.

You feel your connection to the Great Spirit of
the Cow deepen again, and can't resist letting
out a long, low moo.

As if called, you feel warm, creamy power
flow into your body again.\!
You feel it flow to your breasts, your ass, and
also\..\..\.. your ears?

You tentatively flick one, feeling how much
larger and floppier it is now. \!
You now have cow ears!

As your body swells, you can feel your magic
grow as well.\!
MAT +3!
MMP +15!

You moo again in homage and entreaty to the
Great Cow Spirit.
Once more her rich creamy power flows into
you.

This time, it all flows straight to the top of your
butt, collecting into a tight ball.

You barely have time to pull down your
waistband before it erupts into a
passages.content_zh:

如果當前的 TF 類型不是“cow”，則首先將其遞減，直到它消失。

你感覺到牛的力量流過你的身體。 \！
並安頓在你的胸口。

中密度纖維板+5！
女牛仔的驕傲學會了！

當它消失時，你會發現兩個小

你怎麼了？

當你感覺到的時候，還有另一種刺痛

伴隨著一種奇怪的滑動感覺，你感覺
他們身上長出了一些堅硬的東西。

伸手，你會感覺到短角，也許兩個
幾英寸長，從你的頭上伸出來。

你感覺到你與偉大的精神的聯繫
牛再次加深，無法抗拒讓
發出一聲長而低的哞哞聲。

彷彿在呼喚，你感受到溫暖、奶油般的力量
再次流入你的身體。 \!
你感覺到它流向你的胸部、你的屁股，
還有\..\..\..你的耳朵？

你試探性地彈了一下，感覺有多少

你現在有牛耳朵了！

當你的身體膨脹時，你可以感受到你的魔力

墊+3！
MMP+15！

你再次哞哞地表達敬意和懇求

passages.name: CommonEvent — Naturechange
passages.content:
// Turns you into a dryad/plant/flower girl. Starts with flowers in hair,
sweet smell, progresses more like a dryad than alraune.

For some reason, your thoughts turn to plants.
Vivid images of plants sprouting, vines growing,
and flowers budding pass through your mind,
accompanied by a sweet floral scent that lingers.

You picture your hair growing longer like vines
on a tree reaching for the ground.\!
Your body swelling with health as you are
nourished by the earth.

MHP +100!

You run your fingers through your hair as a
sweet scent fills your nose.\!
There's a flower there, but it doesn't seem to
want to come out.

Might as well leave it in.

You look at your hands as your fingertips
darken. A rich brown begins to curl up your
hands like vines sprouting, skin thickening
and toughening like bark.

MHP +100!
DEF +3!
Learned Armor of the Oak!

You raise a hand to your hair to find it has
grown longer and tangled, filled with leaves
and flowers that don't seem to decrease no
matter how many you take out.

Your hands run into two little sticks, one on
either side of your head. Tugging on them just
pulls on the skin at your temples.

You can also feel the bark on your arms
spreading further, winding and sprouting up
your arms and around your feet.

MHP +100!
DEF +3!

You feel things sprouting and growing all across
your body as the power of nature fills you.

The bark on your limbs stretches further,
curling and twining around your body
underneath your clothes.

As tendrils reach your waist you can feel them
twist and reach outwards, as a spray of flower
petals grows into a brief skirt above your hips.

Your hair is growing too, flowers and leaves
sprouting from it and filling the air with a strong
floral scent.

The twigs growning from your temples stretch
backwards farther, branching and splitting like
small antlers.

MHP +100!
DEF +3!

You bask in nature's attention, feeling its power
flow through you and complete your form.

You can feel your skin strength
passages.content_zh:

你看著你的手就像你的指尖

手像藤蔓一樣發芽，皮膚變厚

你舉起手摸你的頭髮，發現它已經

不管你拿出多少。

你的手碰到了兩根小棍子，一根在
你的頭的兩側。只是拉扯他們
拉扯太陽穴的皮膚。

你還可以感覺到手臂上的樹皮
進一步蔓延、纏繞、發芽
你的手臂和腳周圍。

MHP+100！
防禦+3！

你感覺周圍的事物都在發芽和生長
當大自然的力量充滿你的身體。

你四肢上的樹皮延伸得更遠，
捲曲並纏繞在你的身體上
在你的衣服下面。

當卷鬚到達你的腰部時，你可以感覺到它們
扭轉並向外伸展，如花
花瓣長成臀部上方的短裙。

你的頭髮、花朵和葉子也在生長

花香。

從你的鬢角長出的樹枝伸展開來

MHP+100！
防禦+3！

您沐浴在大自然的關注中，感受它的力量

passages.name: CommonEvent — Dragonchange
passages.content:
// This changes the level of dragon transformation. If TF - adding is
TRUE, then we're increasing it by one. If FALSE, we're decreasing it
by one.

// The TF can only be increased up to dragonmax.  This limit will be
increased by buying increases at the bank, while relatively more
common items and events will only increase the TF itself and not
the limit.

// I'm assuming any adding will be done up to the maximum.
If the current TF type isn't dragon, first decrement that until it's
gone.
Then increment dragon until it's at max.

As the fire washes over you, tough scales pop
up on your hands and all over your body.\!
Even your patches of untouched skin feel
stronger.

DEF +5!

Your hands glow as they pull in the fire, scales
blossoming out to cover them fully up to the
elbow.

You can feel your ears grow long and pointed
as well, with a dusting of scales along the top.

New muscles flex in your hands, and you watch
long claws slide in and out of your fingertips.

Combat skill "Claw" acquired!

Your new scales make you feel even tougher.\!
DEF +5!

As the fire sweeps over you, you feel stronger.\!
ATK +5!

Then you feel a sudden pressure on the sides
of your head.

Raising your hands, you almost get stabbed
when long straight horns erupt out just above
your ears, pointing backwards.

As the fire sweeps over you, you feel even
stronger.\!
ATK +5!

With an odd stretching sensation, a long
scaled tail grows from your back.\!
You feel your ass swell out to better support
it.

This time, the fire sweeps over you, then
concentrates into two points on your back.

They grow hot, then erupt out into large
scaled wings.

Giving them an experimental flap, you find
that they're not powerful enough to let you
fly, but they make it much easier for you to
suddenly dart from side to side.

AGI +5!

You breathe in deeply of the fire.\!
You feel it ignite something in you, a powerful
smouldering warmth.

It makes you feel\..\..\..
strong.

ATK +10!
DEF +10!
MAT +10!

Comba

passages.name: CommonEvent — Mirror - TF
passages.content:
// Gives the state of your TF when you look in a mirror.

// 1 = Cow
2 = Angel
3 = Nature
4 = Dragon
5 = Magical girl

You've found your thoughts drifting to delicious
green pastures more recently, though there are
no visible changes.

You give a soft moo of confusion, then decide
it's probably nothing.

You rub your forehead. Two spots hurt a little
when you press on them, but you can't see
anything odd.

There are two little bumps on the top of your
head, maybe an inch across. They don't feel
painful, but they're odd.

You've got two cute horns sticking out of your
forehead.

Combined with your hefty bust, you're looking
more and more like a perfect cowgirl.

If only your chest was larger, you'd look like
a real cowgirl.

Your sharp little cow horns are complimented
by a pair of floppy cow ears.

You twitch them back and forth, marveling at
how much more responsive they are than
your old ears.

You're looking like the ideal of a cowgirl.\!
Horns, tail, floppy cow ears, you wonder how
much deeper your connection to the Great
Cow Spirit can get.

Well, bigger boobs probably.\!
Most cowgirls have *hefty* milkers and you
don't really measure up.

You moo happily as you look at yourself,
knowing that your connection to the Great
Cow Spirit is as deep as possible.

Your gaze lingers on your horns, your floppy
ears with a tag dangling from one, and your
happily swishing cow tail.

You really are just the perfect cowgirl, you
think with a contented moo.

A slight hint of floral sweetness hangs around
you, like you were wearing a tiny amount of
perfume.

There's a brightly colored flower tucked behind
one of your ears.\!
You don't remember putting it there, but maybe
it's the reason for the sweet scent around you.

The skin of your hands has turned a rich
brown, like tree bark. It winds up your arms
in intricate vine-like patterns.

Flowers and leaves lie scattered throughout
your hair, giving off an intense floral scent.

Intricate barklike patterns wind up your brown

A black tribal band tattoo wraps around your
upper right arm.
passages.content_zh:
// 三種刺青類型：粉紅色、綠色、黑色。粉紅色很有少女心，
獨角獸等主題。綠色是花香、花朵和藤蔓。黑色是
部落的。
紋身不計入總變化。

// 1：粉紅色。  心的痕跡一直延伸到胯部？心臟在肚子周圍
按鈕？中心有向下箭頭的心形？

// 2：綠色。簡單的花。手臂周圍變得更加複雜。藤蔓
分佈於肩部，然後向下延伸至領口以下。蜷縮起來
乳房。然後，一朵花從分裂中發芽。然後
蝴蝶檢查花。背後還有藤蔓，纏繞著
小腿。

// 3：黑色。下背部有程式化的部落心臟。增益對稱
翅膀。彎曲的抽象設計爬上脊柱，形成翅膀
在肩胛骨上。環繞腿部內側。
臉兩側的幾何設計？

// 粉紅色

你的身上紋了一顆粉紅色的心
右上臂。

不同色調的三顆心紋身
粉紅色和紅色聚集在一起可見
你的右上臂。

// 綠色

一朵簡單的花被黑色紋身
在你的右上臂上。

簡單的粉紅色花朵紋身清晰可見
在你的右上臂上。

// 黑色

簡單的部落設計長達幾英寸
沿著你的右上臂。

黑色部落樂隊紋身環繞著你
右上臂。

passages.name: CommonEvent — Message on load
passages.content:
Controls Reminder:
'a' turns on and off your ARG glasses!
's' opens the field skills menu and lets you use
them on objects on the map!

// One time increase of stats if a special TF is activated, for
compatability with versions 0.12.x and before. The next update was
the one that added stats for special TFs, so this makes sure the
player has those added.  Otherwise their stats would decrease past
the normal when they switched TFs.

// More compatability - Prior to version 0.12.0, special TFs were
handled differently. This meant that the variables could be in an
otherwise impossible stat from an old save that would case a freeze
upon trying to change the value.  Reset them here to the correct
state to prevent this.
passages.content_zh:
控制提醒：
'a' 打開和關閉你的 ARG 眼鏡！
's' 打開現場技能選單並讓您使用
它們在地圖上的物體上！

// 如果啟動特殊TF，統計資料會增加一倍，例如
與 0.12.x 及之前版本的兼容性。下一次更新是
添加了特殊 TF 的統計數據，因此這可以確保
玩家已經添加了這些。  否則他們的統計數據會減少過去
當他們切換 TF 時是正常的。

// 更多相容性 - 在 0.12.0 版本之前，有特殊的 TF
處理方式不同。這意味著變數可以位於
否則不可能從舊保存中獲得統計數據，這會導致凍結
嘗試更改該值時。  在這裡將它們重置為正確的值
狀態來防止這種情況發生。

You see the bus just pulling up.

Where would you like to go?

The community center is probably still closed.\!
And,\. uh,\. covered in boulders.

您想去哪裡？

社區中心可能仍然關閉。 \！

passages.name: CommonEvent — ----Computer---------
passages.content:
// 1xx is the unread version, xx is the read version.

PeonyRose:
Great news everyone!\!
Thanks to an enormous anonymous donation,
the park is going to be reopening the gardens.

ImNotDaisy:
Garden Park will finally have gardens again!

CoveredInBees!:
Wasn't that going to take, like, an absurd
amount?\!
Who has that kind of money?

LordOfTheBeans:
I- I can't believe it!\!
After so long, after I suffered an endless
drought of creativity...

Last night, suddenly a flash of inspiration hit
me!
I have crafted a new coffee masterpiece!

Come on down to the downtown cafe to try
it!

Daisy:
The farm has finally gotten back on its feet.\!
We now have fresh milk available for
purchase again.

Goddess_Arcadia:
Humans! Rejoice!\!
Your dull and miserable lives are about to
change!

I'm here to grant your dreams.\!
Your fantasies.\!
Your browser history!

Sneeple:
Uh, what?\!
Is this an ad for something?

Horndog69:
Ooo, is it one of those softcore MMOs?\!
I love those!

Goddess_Arcadia:
No, don't worry, I can prove it to you.\!
Here, what's one of your sexual fantasies?

PeonyRose:
Okay, that's weird and kind of creepy.

Goddess_Arcadia:
No, come on! I promise I can help make what
you want real!

How about titties? Humans are interested in
titties at least 80% of the time!

PeonyRose:
And you just switched to *very* weird and
creepy.

Moderator:
User 'Goddess Arcadia' was warned for this
post.

This is a family-friendly local affairs forum.\!
Please keep the roleplaying to roleplaying
sites and the porn to private browsing.\!
Thread locked.

Manager:
Something keeps going wrong with the
department store cleanup.

We pick up an area, and as soon as we turn
our backs it's messy again.

We are out of ideas. If anyone thinks they can
help, please, come by the department store.\!
Rewards included!

Life is tough sometimes.\!
You spill your coffee.\!
Your favorite department store closes.

You get trapped in a hellish nightmare of
endless cleaning, where every effort

passages.name: CommonEvent — Flattest White
passages.content:
You drink the flattest white.
Mmmm, bland!

You drink the flattest white.\!
It's... hard to describe.

You can't really call it bland.\.\. That just means
it doesn't have much flavor.\.\.\.
This...\.\. it's like it has anti-flavor.\.\. And a lot
of it.

You could call it a palette cleanser, you guess.\!
But this didn't clean your palette.

It knocked it down, hauled away the rubble
until nothing remained, then rebuilt it from
scratch.

Your palette *gleams*.\.\. It *sparkles*.\!
You could practically see your reflection in it.

It's so strong the rest of you feels cleansed as
well.
passages.content_zh:
你喝的是最平淡的白酒。
嗯嗯，平淡！

你喝的是最平淡的白酒。 \!
這……很難描述。

你真的不能稱之為平淡。 \.\.那隻是意味著
沒有太多味道。 \.\.\.
這...\。 \。就像它有反味一樣。 \.\.還有很多
它的。

你猜，你可以稱它為調色板清潔劑。 \！
但這並沒有清理你的調色板。

它把它推倒了，把瓦礫拖走了
直到什麼都沒有留下，然後重建它
刮擦。

你的調色盤*閃閃發光*。 \.\.它*閃閃發光*。 \！
你幾乎可以在其中看到自己的倒影。

它如此強烈，讓你感覺被淨化了
好吧。

passages.name: CommonEvent — Activate Cow
passages.content: Mmmm, milk! Delicious!
passages.content_zh: 嗯嗯，牛奶！可口的！

passages.name: CommonEvent — Activate Nature
passages.content:
You sniff the flower. Wonderful!

Then your sneeze tears it to pieces.
passages.content_zh:
你聞聞這朵花。精彩的！

然後你的噴嚏就把它撕成碎片。

passages.name: CommonEvent — Rare candy
passages.content: Who would you like to give the candy to?
passages.content_zh: 你想把糖果送給誰？

passages.name: CommonEvent — Sniff flower
passages.content:
You sniff the flower. It smells of green fields
and deep, verdant forests.\!
And manure, but, you know, in a good way.

It makes you feel more connected to nature.
passages.content_zh:
你聞聞這朵花。聞到了綠色田野的味道
和茂密、翠綠的森林。 \！
還有肥料，但是，你知道，以一種好的方式。

它讓你感覺與大自然更親近。

passages.name: CommonEvent — Activate dragon
passages.content:
You give the gold a great big hug.\!
Right! This really does feel great!

Dragonfire sweeps out of your core and
washes over you.
passages.content_zh:
你給了金子一個大大的擁抱。 \！
正確的！這確實感覺棒極了！

龍火從你的核心席捲而出
沖刷著你。

passages.name: CommonEvent — Move slider
CommonEvent — Fake ARG trigger
passages.content:
// This is similar to ARG trigger, but is for when I want to only have
one map for both ARG and real.  Instead of transferring maps, it
just gives a transition and toggles the ARG on switch.  This means I
can use one map, with some events triggering off the ARG switch.

// This is attempting to make it so that if the player has just
transferred and holds down the button a little too long, the game
will wait a second and a half before it'll let them press it again.

// Mark areas with region 63 to turn off ARG glasses functiionality in
that area.

Magic filter off!

Magic filter on!

Richard Magnus, CEO:
Oh, there's no need for that.\!
All the magic is right here.

Guardian Hana:
Don't push buttons, PUSH HEAVY THINGS!

The unplanted alraune wander back to the
gate while you fiddle with your glasses.
passages.content_zh:
// 這與 ARG 觸發器類似，但適用於我只想擁有
ARG 和 Real 的地圖。  它不是傳輸地圖，而是
只是給出一個轉換並切換 ARG 開關。  這意味著我
可以使用一張地圖，某些事件會觸發 ARG 開關。

// 這是試圖做到這一點，以便如果玩家剛剛
轉移並按住按鈕太久，遊戲
會等待一分半鐘，然後才會讓他們再次按下它。

// 用區域63標記區域以關閉ARG眼鏡功能
那個區域。

魔法濾鏡關閉！

理查德·馬格努斯，執行長：
哦，沒必要這樣。 \!
所有的魔法都在這裡。

守護者哈娜：
不要按按鈕，要推重物！

未種植的阿勞恩漫步回到
當你擺弄眼鏡時，門。

A cloud of powder puffs out as you open the
